sourceDesc.bibl:
The Saraswatī Kanṭhābharaṇa by Dhāreshvara Bhojadeva with Commentaries of Rāmsimha (I-III) and Jagaddhara (IV). Edited by Paṇḍit Kedārnāth Śarmā and Wāsudev Laxmaṇ Śāstrī Paṇśīkar. Published by Pāndurang Jāwajī, proprietor of the "Nirṇaya Sāgar" Press, Bombay 1934.
Kāvyamālā 94

div.head: prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ |

lg.l: ekena yasya yaminaḥ pramadeva dehamardhena rājati pumāniva cāpareṇa |
tattvakramādatha ca na pramadā pumānvā śreyāṃsi vardhayatu sa smaraśāsano vaḥ ||

div.p:
dhvaniriti | vācāmadhiṣṭhātrī devī dyotamānā svaprakāśaśabdabrahmarūpā bhāratī | kathamupāsyate | sūkṣmādibhedena dhvanyādibhedena ca vivakṣito namaskāraḥ | śabdabrahmaṇaścatastro bhidā bhavanti | sūkṣmā, paśyantī, madhyamā, vaikharī ceti | tatrāvikāradaśā sūkṣmā | sā hi sarvasya prāṇāpānāntarālavartinī vigataprādurbhāvatirobhāvā sramyakprayogapariśīlanātmanā karmayogena mananādinā jñānayogena ca samyagadhigamyate | ‘seyamākīryamāṇāpi nityamāgantukairmalaiḥ | antyā kalā hi somasya nātyantamabhibhūyate || tasyāṃ vijñātamātrāyāmadhikāro nivartate | puruṣe ṣoḍaśakale tāmā-
huramṛtāṃ kalām ||’ iti | tasya brahmaṇo 'nādyavidyāvaśādādyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ paśyantīrūpo jāyate | sa hi varṇavibhāgādakramaḥ svayaṃprakāśaśca | pūrvāpare svāvasthe paśyatīti paśyantītyucyate | tataḥ paramavidyopādānādantaḥ saṃkalparūpakramavān śrotragrāhyavarṇābhivyaktirahitastṛtīyaḥ pariṇāmo madhyamārūpo jāyate | sā kila dvayoḥ pariṇāmayormadhye sadā tiṣṭhatīti madhyametyucyate | antaraṃ dūraprasṛtāyāmavidyāyāṃ sthānakaraṇaprayatnavyajyamānaśrotrasaṃvādivīṇādundubhinādaparicayagadgadāvyaktākārādivarṇasamudāyātmakastṛtīyaḥ pariṇāmo vaikharīrūpo jāyate | viśiṣṭaṃ khamākāśaṃ rāti prayacchatīti vikharo dehendriyasaṃghātaḥ | tathā ca śrutiḥ—‘na ha vai saśarīrasya priyāpriyayorapahatirasti | aśarīraṃ vā va santaṃ priyāpriye na spṛśataḥ ||’ iti | tatra bhavā vaikharīti | tadetāsāmavasthānāmādyāstistro nityā atīndriyāḥ | taduktam—‘sthāneṣu vivṛte vāyau kṛtavarṇaparigrahā | vaikharī vākprayoktṝṇāṃ prāṇavṛttinibandhanā || kevalaṃ budhdyupādānakramarūpānupātinī | prāṇavṛttimatikramya madhyamā vākpravartate || avibhāgāttu paśyantī sarvataḥ saṃhṛtakramā | svarūpajyotirevāntaḥsūkṣmā sā cānapāyinī ||’ iti | śrutirapyāha—‘catvāri vākparimitā padāni tāni vidurbrāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ | guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti ||’ ityādikamāgamasamuccayādevāvaseyam | kā punastā vāco yāsāmiyamadhiṣṭhātrītyata uktam—‘dhvanirvarṇāḥ padaṃ vākyamityāspadacatuṣṭayam | yasyāḥ’ iti | āspadamadhiṣṭhānamavacchedaḥ | dhvanyādibhiravacchinnā parā vāk tadvyavahārahetuḥ | sāhityaprasiddhābhidhānadhvananalakṣaṇavyavahārakāritvamekasmin varṇe na nirūpyate iti bahuvacanam | padavākyayorasti pratyekamapi tathābhāva iti tābhyāmekavacanamupāttam | tadayamatra tātparyasaṃkṣepaḥ | sāhityasvarūpanirūpaṇāya kilaiṣa granthārambhaḥ | sāhityaṃ ca śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tatra śabda eva ka ityapekṣāyāmayaṃ vibhāgo dhvanirityādiḥ | arthastu stambhakumbhādilakṣaṇo soke śāstre ca prasiddhaḥ | saṃbandhaḥ kaścidanādiḥ | sarvasvāyamānastu saṃbandho nānyatretyasminnāyatate | sa caturvidhaḥ—doṣahānam, guṇopādānam, alaṃkārayogaḥ, rasābhiyogaśceti ||

lg.l: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvankīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati || 2 ||

div.p:
nirdoṣamiti | prītiḥ saṃpūrṇakāvyārthasvādasamuttha ānandaḥ kāvyārthabhāvanāda-
śāyāṃ kaverapi sāmājikatvāṅgīkārāt | sahṛdayaślāghayā vā prītistadṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam | kīrtiradṛṣṭadvārā svargaphaletyadṛṣṭam | yadāha—‘kīrti svargaphalāmāhuḥ’ iti | aṅginaḥ kāvyasya prayojanānvākhyānenāṅgabhūtasyāsya prayojanasaṃbandha uktaḥ| yadyapi kāvyaśabdo doṣābhāvādiviśiṣṭāveva śabdārthau brūte, tathāpi lakṣaṇayā śabdārthamātre prayuktaḥ | lakṣaṇāprayojanaṃ cābhidheyānāmuddeśaḥ | tridhā hi sāstraśarīram—‘uddeśaḥ, lakṣaṇam, parīkṣā ce'ti | udāharaṇavyākhyāgranthaḥ sarvatra parīkṣāpara ityasmadguravaḥ | prayojanābhisaṃbandhaparādevoddeśo labhyata iti na virodhaḥ | ata eva doṣādyuddeśakrameṇa paricchedāḥ | nirdoṣaṃ doṣātyantābhāvavat, avayavaikadeśavartinā śvitreṇeva kāminīśarīrasya varṇamātragatenāpi doṣeṇa kāvyavairasyaniyamāt | ata evāmaṅgalaprāyāṇāmapi doṣāṇāṃ prathamamupādānam | ayameva hi prācaḥ kavervyāpāro yaddoṣahānaṃ nāma | guṇavaditi | bhūmri praśaṃsāyāṃ vā matup | alaṃkṛtamityeva vaktavye 'laṃkārairiti prasiddhālaṃkāraparigrahārtham | tathālaṃkārairityeva vācye prasiddhānāmapi vakṣyamāṇānāmevopādānārthamalaṃkṛtapadam | rasānvitaṃ rasena nityasaṃbaddham | ‘nāstyeva tatkāvyaṃ yatra paramparayāpi vibhābādiparyavasānaṃ na bhavati’ iti kāśmīrikāḥ | etena kāvyalakṣaṇamapi kaṭākṣitam | īdṛśaṃ kāvyaṃ tatkurvan | kaviriti kaverapi lakṣaṇamiti ||

lg.l: doṣāḥ padānāṃ vākyānāṃ vākyārthānāṃ ca ṣoḍaśa |

div.p: doṣāḥ padānāmiti | heyā ityanena sāmānyalakṣaṇam | ye heyāste doṣā ityabhiprāyāt | abhimatapratītivyavadhāyakatayā vighnabhūtaḥ śaśvatkāvye heyatāmāsādayati sa eva doṣaḥ | ayamevārthaḥ ‘mukhyārthahatirdoṣaḥ-’ iti padenānyeṣāmabhimataḥ | sa ca pada-vākya-vākyārthaviṣayatayā pūrvaṃ trividhaḥ | padapūrvakatvādvākyasya tatpūrvakatvādvākyārthasya yuktaḥ kramaḥ | varṇamātradoṣo nollekhītyupekṣitavān | avāntaravibhāge tu kriyamāṇe pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśabhirupādhibhiḥ saṃkulamityāha—ṣoḍaśeti | kāvyaprakāśakārādibhiruktānāmadhikānāmihāntarbhāvaḥ | anantarbhāve tu doṣatvameva nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ, na tu deśīyarāganyāyena svamataprakāśanam | pratītivyavadhāyakānāṃ sarvadā tadrūpatvāt | uktamevābhisaṃdhānam—tānevādāviti ||

lg.l: asādhu cāprayuktaṃ ca kaṣṭaṃ cānarthakaṃ ca yat |
saṃdigdhaṃ ca viruddhaṃ ca proktaṃ yaccāprayojakam || 5 ||
deśyaṃ grāmyamiti spaṣṭā doṣāḥ syuḥ padasaṃśrayāḥ |

div.p: asādhviti | mukhyārthahatau mitho 'napekṣāsūcanayā samāsaḥ | ata eva lāghave 'nādaraḥ | kathaṃ padapratīkadoṣā na gaṇyanta iti śaṅkāmabhipretyāha—spaṣṭā iti | padasaṃśrayāḥ padānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinaḥ | evaṃ vākyādāvapi guṇādāvapīdamevāśritatvam ||
athaiṣāmiti | parīkṣāṃ pratijānīte—samyagiti | lakṣaṇadoṣaśūnyaṃ lakṣaṇānupapattinirṇejanameva hi parīkṣāpadārthaḥ | kathametatsaṃpatsyate ityata āha—sodāharaṇamiti ||

lg.l: tathā na bādhate skandho yathā bādhati bādhate || 1 ||’

div.p: atra bādhaterātmanepaditvād ‘bādhate’ iti syāt, na punar ‘bādhati’ iti ||

śabdeti | śabdāḥ śiṣyante prakṛtipratyayavibhāgaparikalpanayā jñāpyante yena tacchabdaśāstraṃ trimunivyākaraṇaṃ tena viruddhaṃ tadāmnātaprātisvikaviśeṣaparityaktamato na deśīyapadānāmasādhutbam | tathā ca prācyaiḥ—‘nātha te kucayugaṃ patrāvṛtaṃ mā kṛthāḥ’ iti anyakārakavaiyarthyamiti, ‘salīlapāṇidvayalolanālamānartitātāmradalaṃ dadhantīm’ iti ca tādṛśamevodāhṛtam | atra kecidāhuḥ—‘bādhatidhātuṃ saṃskārapracyāvanena
bādhate iti bādhatibādhastasya saṃbodhanaṃ bādhatibādheti | te tava | vacanamiti śeṣaḥ’ iti, tadasat | neyārthatvaprasaṃṅgāt | anye tu ‘bādhatirbādhate yathā’ iti paṭhanti | idaṃ tattvam | vidyamānasyārthavattvasyāvivakṣāyāṃ gavityayamāhetyādāviva prātipadikasaṃjñā na pravartate ||

lg.l: sa sasti kiṃ vacantīme kambaḥ śambaṃ ghariṣyati || 2 ||’

div.p: kavibhiriti | asti hi kiṃcitpadaṃ yatrāprayojyatvenaiva heyatā | yadyevaṃ loke prayujyamānasya sādhutaiva prasaktā ityata uktam—kavibhiriti | kāvye yasyāprayojyatvameva duṣṭatvabījaṃ tadityarthaḥ | tathābhūtā ca padajātiralaṃkārakārasamayādavasīyate | tathā caikena puṃdaivataśabdo 'pareṇa cīrṇaśabda udāhṛtaḥ | evamanyadapyaprayuktamityāśayavānkiṃcidudāharati—kāmacīkamathā iti | udāharaṇatvānnaiko 'tra śloko gaveṣyaḥ | ekapadamātraprayogastu tyājyaḥ samayavirodhābhāvādityārādhyāḥ | ‘acīkamathāḥ’ iti kamerṇiṅantasya luṅi caṅi dvirvacanasanvadbhāvadīrghatvahnasvatvaṇilopeṣu rūpam | kāṃ nāyikāṃ kāmitavānasītyarthaḥ | amī ca ke | tvāmātmano hvāyakameṣitumiṣṭavantaḥ | hvāyakaśabdāt kyac | tataḥ san | tato laṅi ajihvāyakīyiṣanniti rūpam | sa kaścit sasti svapiti | ‘pasa sasti svapne’ iti dhāto rūpam | kambaḥ śambamiti | kaṃśaṃśabdau jalavācakau tābhyām | ‘kaṃśaṃbhyāṃ vabhayustitutayasaḥ’ iti matvarthīyo vapratyayaḥ | tatrādyena jaladharo jalāśayaṃ sekṣyatītyarthaḥ | ‘śambaḥ kamban’ iti kvacitpaṭhyate | tatra kalyāṇavān kapālinaṃ sekṣyatītyartho boddhavyaḥ | ‘ghṛ secane’ ityasya dhātorghariṣyatīti rūpam | sa hi dhātuḥ ‘ghṛtaghṛṇāgharmebhyo nānyatra yujyate’ iti pūrvācāryāḥ | kavibhirityanenāsādhuśaṅkā vyāvartitetyāha—śabdānuśāsanasiddhānyapīti ||

lg.l: pophullūti nīpaḥ kālo 'yaṃ carkarti hṛdayaṃ mama || 3 ||’

div.p: padamityādi | durvacakavarṇārabdhapadaṃ kaṣṭoccāraṇīyatayā kaṣṭamucyate | śruterasukhadamiti dūṣakatābījoddhāṭanam | kadarthitā hi tena śrutiśaktirna tadvākyapratīkaparāmarśakṣameti | kāvyaprakāśakṛtā padaikadeśaḥ kaṣṭa uktaḥ, yathā—‘tadgaccha sidhdyai’, 'apekṣate pratyayamaṅgalabdhyai’ ityatra ‘dhyai’ ‘dhyai’ iti, tatrāha—padamiti | na hi samastavastukaṭutva eva padaṃ kaṣṭatvamāsādayati | kārtārthyamityādau tadudāhṛte tadabhāvāt | ekadeśakaṣṭatayā padakaṣṭatvamiti cātrāpi na daṇḍavāritamiti bhāvaḥ | varvarṣṭi punaḥ punarvarṣati | vṛṣeryaṅlugantasya rūpam | dardharṣṭi punaḥ punardhṛṣṭo bhavati | ‘midhṛṣā prāgalbhye’ ityasya tatraiva rūpam | ‘dardraṣṭi’ iti pāṭhe dṛśeryaḍlukyamāgame ca rūpam | punaḥ paśyati | nīpaḥ kadambaḥ | pophullūti | ‘phulla vikasane’ ityasya tatraiva rūpam | evaṃbhūto varṣāsamayo mama vidūrakāntasya hṛdayaṃ carkarti punaḥ punaratiśayena vā chigatti | ‘kṛtī chedane’ ityasya rūpam | bhūyasāṃ kaṣṭapadānāṃ samabhibyāhārādvākyadoṣa iti bhrāntiḥ syāttatrāha—kriyāpadānīti | kathamevaṃ vibhāgo 'vasīyata ityata āha—śrūyanta iti | śrotrapratyakṣeṇaiva padamātragāmitayā kaṣṭatvamanubhūyate ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: sa vai devaḥ khalu tvāṃ tu punātu madanāntakaḥ || 4 ||’

div.p:
pādapūraṇeti | dyotanīyamarthamantareṇa prayuktamavyayamanarthakamabhimatam, ata eva prācyaiścādipadamavyayamiti prayogabījakathanārthaṃ nahi nirmūlaḥ prayogaḥ saṃbhavati vṛttinirvahaṇasamarthaḥ | prāyeṇāvyayapadāni kṣiptvā tatpūrayati | taduktam—‘kukavi-
prabandha iva śliṣṭapadapracāraḥ | prakaṭatuhinacayo janākīrṇaśca’ iti | bibhartīti | caḥ samuccayādiṣu caturṣu prasiddhaprayogo na ca teṣāmanyatamo 'pyatra saṃbhavati | nāpyuccāvacārthakaḥ iti bhāṣaṇenārthāntaramapi | evaṃ hiprabhṛtiṣvavaseyam | etenaitadapyapāstam | yadāhureke—padādiviśeṣānupādānātpadaikadeśo 'pyanarthako 'bhimataḥ | tathā ca—‘ādāvañjanapuñjaliptavapuṣāṃ śvāsānilollāsitaprotsarpadvirahānalena ca tataḥ saṃtāpitānāṃ dṛśām | saṃpratyeva niṣekamaśrupayasā devasya cetobhuvo bhallīnāmiva pānakarma kurute kāmaṃ kuraṅgekṣaṇā ||’ ityatra dṛśāmiti bahuvacanamanarthaṃkaṃ kuraṅgekṣaṇāyā ekasyā evopādānāt | na cātra vyāpāre dṛkśabdo vartate, añjanapuñjalepādīnāmananvayāpatteḥ | tathā ‘kurute’ ityātmanepadamanarthakamakartrabhiprāyakriyāphalāditi | api ca | bahutvakartra bhiprāyaphalābhāve kathanaṃ dvayorasādhutvamiti rājamārga eva bhramaḥ | nahi svarūpata eva kiṃcidasādhu sādhu vā saṃbhavati ||

lg.l: ‘vibhajante na ye bhūpamālabhante na te śriyam |
āvahanti na te duḥkhaṃ prasmaranti na ye priyām || 5 ||’

div.p: atra vibhajatervaṇṭane, ālabhatermāraṇe, āvahateḥ karaṇe, prasmaratervismaraṇe rụ̄dhiḥ | na tu viśeṣasevāyām, abhito lābhe, samantādvahane, prakṛṣṭasmaraṇe ceti ||

rụ̄dhicyutamiti | śaktimanapekṣya prayuktaṃ rụ̄dhicyutam | ata eva yadabhisaṃdhāya prayujyate na kathaṃcana yasyāsāvartha iti anvarthamanyārthamiti nāma | etadeva dhātuviśeṣo 'vāntaramupasargaviśeṣayogato yogavānityādinānyairuktam | vibhajanta iti | bhajiḥ sevārtho virupasargastadgataviśeṣadyotakastataśca yathā vidyotata iti | atra viśiṣṭadhātvanurūpaprayogābhidhānaṃ tathātrāpi bhaviṣyatīti bhramo bījamatra śabdaśaktisvabhāvāt | kvacidupasargopasaṃdānena dhāturarthāntara eva vartate | yadāhuḥ—‘upasargeṇa dhātvartho valādanyatra nīyate | prahārāhārasaṃhāravihāraparihāravat ||’ iti | tadāha—atra vibhajaterityādi | nanvarthāpekṣitve padārthadūṣaṇamevaṃvidhamiti vāmanaḥ | naitat | padasyaivānvayavyatirekavattvāt | nahyatrānvayasyāparādhaḥ kaścit | kiṃ tu
śabda eva vṛttiskhalitādibhiraparāghyati | yadi cārthāpekṣitāmātreṇārthadoṣatvaṃ kathamasādhuprabhṛtīnāmapi śabdadūṣaṇatā | nahi tāni svarūpata eva tathāpi tvarthaviśeṣo viśeṣa evāśvagośvādivaditi| arthadoṣāstu yathā bhavanti tathā vakṣyābhaḥ |
atra daśabāhuḥ, trilocanaḥ, pañcavakra iti tucchamevābhidheyamatucchaśabdairuktamiti apuṣṭārtham ||

yattu tucchābhidheyamiti | stokaśabdābhilabhye 'rthe bahutaraśabdabahulamityarthaḥ | nahi tathā kriyamāṇamalpīyasīmapi prakarṣatāṃ puṣyati yena tyājyaṃ na syādityapuṣṭapadena sūcitam | śatasyārdhaṃ pañcāśatteṣāṃ pañcatamoṃ 'śo daśa | samāse pūraṇapratyayalopaḥ ||
atra jaladharo meghaḥ, vāridhiḥ samudraḥ, bṛṃhitaṃ gajānām, hreṣitamaśvānāmiti lokaprasiddham | tadiha samudra-megha-aśva-vṛṣabhaviṣayatayā prayujyamānamasaṃgatārthatvādavācakamityasamartham ||

asaṃgatamiti | kathaṃ punaridamanyārthādbhidyate | atrārādhyāḥ | anyārthe kevalaṃ yogādrụ̄dhirbalavatī | asamarthe tu kevalayogādyogarụ̄dhiḥ | tadapare dūṣayanti | tathāpi rụ̄dhicyutiḥ sādhāraṇyeva tadavāntaraṃ viśeṣadvayamanyaditi | tanna | bhāvānavabodhāt | kiṃciddhi padamapavādakāraṇabalādavagamyamānamapi yogamanapekṣyaiva kvacidarthaviśeṣe vartate | yathā—gauriti | nahi gamanasya vākyārthe praveśaḥ saṃbhavati | kiṃcitpunara-
sati bādhahetau budhyamānasya tyāgāyogādyogaviśiṣṭameṃvopādhimabhidhatte | yathā—paṅkajamiti | tatrādyaprakāre rụ̄dhireva sarvasvamiti tatparityāge rụ̄dhicyutam | dvitīye tu yogamātre prayuktamasaṃgataṃ śaktiśūnye prayuktaṃ śattkyaikadeśe prayuktamiti bhinno 'rthastadetatsarvaṃ vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atra jaladhareti | jaladharādipadāni jaladhāraṇādiviśiṣṭe meghatvādau rụ̄dhābhidhānaśaktīni | kathametadavasitamiti cettatrāha—lokaprasiddhamiti | lokādhīnāvadhāraṇatvācchabdārthasaṃbandhasyeti bhāvaḥ | tataśca yadviśiṣṭasya yogasya śaktiviṣayatayā na tena saṃketaḥ | yatra ca samudrādau prayogo na tadupādhibhiḥ samudratvādyaiḥ saṃbhūya śattkyā saṃketaḥ | kṣārādipadopasaṃdānena ca samudrādau prayoga unnīyata ityāha—tadiheti | ata eva na tadavasthasya padaṃ vācakamata eva cākṣamatvādasamarthamiti saṃjñayaiva vyavahriyata iti saṃkṣepaḥ ||

lg.l: apratītaṃ taduddiṣṭaṃ prasiddhaṃ śāstra eva yat || 10 ||
‘kiṃ bhāṣitena bahunā rūpaskandhasya santi me na guṇāḥ |

div.p: apratītamiti | śāstramātraprasiddhaṃ śāstravyavahārimiḥ saṃketitamityarthaḥ | pratītāpratītasamabhivyāhārarūpaṃ hi vākyamaśāstrajñaviṣayaṃ prayuktamabhimatārthapratītiṃ na janayitumīṣṭe | tatrāpratītānāmevāparādho 'taḥ pariskhalanakhedadāyitayā bhavati duṣṭatvam | ata evāprayuktādbahirbhāvaḥ | kiṃ bhāṣiteneti | rūpaskandhavācoyuktiḥ saugatasamayaprasiddhā | teṣāṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāro vijñānamiti pañcaskandhāḥ | tatrāpi rūpaskandhapadārtha ekādaśapadārthakaḥ | pañcendriyāṇi pañca viṣayā vijñaptirekādaśīti prakriyā | antaramiti vinārthe gahādau paṭhyate | ‘tatra bhavaḥ’ iti che svārthike ca kani nañsamāse pṛṣodarāditvānnalopābhāva iti bhāṣyaṭīkā | premṇo vyāpakā guṇā na santi me na ca vyāpakamantareṇa vyāpyaṃ bhavatīti vyāpakānupalabdhiprayuktatvātpremābhāvasya tathopālambhe vācyatā nāstīti bhāvaḥ | śāstra evetyavadhāraṇena yavdyāvartyate tadāha—anyatreti | loka ityarthaḥ |

lg.l: dūre yasyārthasaṃvittiḥ kliṣṭaṃ neṣṭaṃ hi tatsatām |

div.p: atra vinā garutmatā jita indrastasyātmabhavo 'rjunastasya dveṣī karṇastasya guruḥ sūryastatpādairabhihato loka ākāśamabhinandati | kīdṛśam | himāpaho vahnistasyāmitro jalaṃ taddhārayanti ye meghāstairvyāptamiti vyavahitārthapratyayaṃ kliṣṭametat ||

dūra iti | dūraṃ ciraṃ vilamba ityanarthāntaram | kleśo dvividhaḥ—padaviṣayaḥ, vākyaviṣayaśca | ādyaḥ sāmānyaśabdasya prakaraṇādikamanapekṣya kvacidabhipretaviṣaye prayogaḥ | tathā sati vācakatāyāmapi jhaṭiti pratipattirna bhavati | kiṃ tu parasparānvayaparyāṃlocanayā cireṇeti virasatvam | yadāha—‘neṣṭaṃ hi tatprasitānām’ iti, ayamevārtho vyavadhānapadena vāmanādibhiruktaḥ | dvitīyastu vyākīrṇādipadenānyathā vakṣyate—vijiteti | viśabdena pakṣisāmānyavacanena tadviśeṣo garuḍātmā vivakṣitaḥ | tajjito 'pi viśeṣa eva | evamanyatrāpi | na cātrāpi kiṃcijjhaṭiti pratītyanuguṇaṃ niyamakāraṇamastīti yuktameva vyavadhānam | himāpaho vahniriti hanterḍapratyaye rūpam | tathā ca candragomī ḍaprakaraṇe ‘hanterḍaḥ’ ityeva sūtritavān | himāpaho vahiriti kvipi vyabhicāraṃ dṛṣṭvā ‘brahmabhrūṇa-’ ityādi sūtritaṃ candragominā ||
sahasraguśabdena sahasrākṣa uktaḥ | na ca gośabdasyākṣṇi bhūyasī prasiddhiḥ | hariśabdena ca sahastrāṃśuḥ so 'pi na tena nāmnā bahubhirucyata iti gūḍhatvam ||

gụ̄dhārthamiti | yasya padasya dvāvarthau siddhaścāsiddhaśca taccedaprasiddhe prayuktaṃ tadā gụ̄dhārtham | aprasiddhārtha prayogamiti | aprasidghe 'rthe prayogo yasyeti gamakatvādbahuvrīhiḥ | tava tejasi nānyatejāṃsi bhāntīti yojanā | ‘gauḥ śarākṣipayaḥsvargapaśumedavacaḥsu ca’ ityāmrāto 'pi tathā nākṣṇi prayujyate yathā paśubhedādāvityāha—na ca gośabdasyeti | ‘hariḥ kṛṣṇe ca siṃhe ca mekārkabhujageṣu ca’ iti svasaṃketitasyāpi hariśabdasya na tathā ravau prasiddhiryathānyatretyāha—so 'pi neti ||

atra paṅktiśabdena daśasaṃkhyā, anekajanāmetyanena cakram, taṅraïtyanena rathastābhyāṃ daśarathastasya tuk bālako lakṣmaṇastena jita ulūkajidindrajit | kiṃ kṛtvā | mukhāṃśavantamāsthāya hanumantam | kiṃbhūtena | vimuktapaśupaṅktinā vimukteṣu paśupaṅktinā | atra paśuśabdena gośabdo lakṣyate teneṣavastadidaṃ svasaṃketakalpitārthaṃ neyārthamucyate ||

svasaṃketeti | kalpitārthaṃ neyārthamiti sūtrayitvā vāmanena vyākhyātam | aśrautasyārthasya kalpanā kalpanākalpitārtham | asyārthaḥ—yatpadaṃ nānārthasvaparyāyalakṣaṇayā vivakṣitapratītiparyantaṃ nīyate tatkalpitārthamiti kecit | tadayuktam | svaparyāyetyasya vyarthatvādavyāpakatvācca | tasmātprayojanaṃ vinā lakṣaṇayā prayuktamityevārthaḥ | yadāha kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ—neyārtheyattvaśaktita iti yasminniṣiddhaṃ lākṣaṇikamiti | prayojanaṃ vinā rūḍhaṃ lakṣaṇāparigrahe na doṣaḥ | tathā ca dvirepharathāṅganāmādipadānāṃ rephadbayānugatabhramarādiśabdalabhaṇādvāreṇa ṣaṭpadādau vṛttirvṛddhavyavahāraparamparānupātinīti teṣāṃ prayogo 'yukta eva | ata eva ‘turaṅgakāntāmukhahavyavāhajvāleva bhittvā jalamullalāsa’ ityādikamapi neyārthamiti kāśmīrakāḥ | tadetatkhapadena darśitavān | mukhasyāṃśo hanuratrābhimataḥ | paṅktiriti daśākṣaraṃ chandaḥ daśasaṃkhyā lakṣyate | anekajo dvijaścakravākastasya nāma cakraṃ rathaikadeśastaddhārayatīti
dhārayatermūlavibhujāditvātkaḥ | tābhyāmiti | paṅktiranekaja iti nāma yasyetyarthāt | tuk tokaṃ tokmamityapatyanāmāni | upalakṣaṇatayaikadeśaṃ vyācaṣṭe | atra paśuśabdena gośabdo lakṣyata iti prṛtāpekṣayā | teneṣavaḥ pratyāyanta iti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: sa eṣa hi mahādevastriṣu lokeṣu pūjyate || 12 ||’

div.p: atra vahnirarkaḥ śivo veti na niścīyate ||

na yatpadamiti | padasvarūpameva saṃdihyamānamatra | tathāhi—sa eṣa hi mahādeva ityatra sa kimeṣa hi mahādeva iti cchedo vidhīyatāṃ mahādeva iti vā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve saṃdihyate | na ca viśeṣaṇaniyamahetuḥ | vahnyarkāvapi hi bhagavato nīlalohitamūrtibhūtau himāpahau ca na niścayakṛditi dūṣaṇatābījapradarśanam | yadaiko vivakṣitastadā doṣaḥ | sādhucara ityatrāpi ‘bhūtapūrve caraṭ’ iti caraṭpratyaye kiṃ pūrvaṃ sādhurathavā careṣṭapratyaye sādhuṣu caratīti padameva saṃdihyate tena padāvayavaḥ saṃdigdha iti kenaciduktam, tadapyapāstam ||

atra anuttamā ityanena yathotkṛṣṭastathāpakṛṣṭo 'pi | apihitamityanena yathā nācchāditaṃ tathācchāditamiti | akāryasuhṛdityanena yathākāryamantareṇa suhṛdevamakārye yaḥ suhṛtso 'pyucyate | apūrvāḥ kīrtaya ityanena yathādbhutāḥ kīrtaya evamakīrtayo 'pyucyante ||

viparītamiti | viparītaṃ prakṛtopamardakamarthakalpanaṃ yatra | tathā hi—anuttametyādau prakaraṇādibhiḥ stutiparatve vyavasthite uttamatvābhāvādinā viruddhenārthena tatra
paryavasāyayituṃ na śakyate | saṃśayaṃ yugapadvivakṣāyāmapi na virodhaḥ | iha tu stutinindayoryaugapadyamasaṃbhāvitamata evaikasya saṃbhave tvaparasya bādha eva | yathā—‘cirakālapariprāptalocanānandadāyinaḥ | kāntā kāntasya sahasā vidadhāti galagraham ||’ iti galagrahaśabdasya kaṇṭhagrahapratidvandvinyarthe vivākṣite pūrvaprakrāntānandadāyitvaṃ bādhyate | atrānuttama iti bahuvrīhitatpuruṣābhyāmapihitamiti ‘vaṣṭi bhāguriḥ’ ityādinā vikalpenākāralopavidhānāt | apūrvā iti pakṣāntare 'kārapūrvāḥ | niyāmakasadbhāve tu guṇa eva | yathā—‘apūrva yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalām’ iti śabdarūpāntarameva viruddhopacāyakamityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdadoṣatāvyavasthitiḥ ||
atra tamālaśyāmalamityādīni sāgaraviśeṣaṇāni tāni na hanūmato laṅghane 'tiśayaṃ sūcayanti ||

aprayojakamityāhuriti | tadeva hi kavīnāmupādeyaṃ yadvākyārthe prakṛṣṭakāṣṭhāṃ puṣṇāti | anyathānaṅgābhidhāne 'vācyavacanameva syātsārthakatvādananvayatvācca | na vṛttapūraṇamātraprayojanatā nātiśayamiti | sāgaralaṅghanadvārā hanūmataḥ prakarṣo vācyaḥ | na ca tamālaśyāmalatvādiviśeṣaṇāni kathaṃcitprakarṣamarpayanti yāni dūratvādīni tathā na teṣāmupādānam ||
atra gallatallādayaḥ śabdā avyutpattimanto deśyā dṛśyante ||

taddeśyamiti | avyutpattimat prakṛtipratyayavibhāgaśūnyaṃ lokamātraprayuktaṃ pada-
manādeyaṃ bhavati| taddividham—abhāgaṃ bhāgavacceti | ādyaṃ deśyam, dvitīyaṃ grāmyamiti vibhāgaḥ | vyutpannānāmanyādṛśī cchāyā deśyānāṃ ca na tādṛśīti deśyavedyapadasamabhivyāhāre prāyeṇa chāyāvairūpyaṃ bandhasya bhavatīti sahṛdayahṛdayasākṣikaṃ doṣabījam | tallamalpasaraḥ, laḍahaṃ manoharam, maḍahaṃ kṛśam, vosaṭṭaṃ vikasitam, kandoṭṭaṃ nīlotpalam, moṭṭāyitaṃ vilāsaḥ ||

aślīleti | deśyātiriktaṃ lokamātraprayuktaṃ grāmyam | tatridhā—vrīḍājugupsātaṅkadāyitvāt | tatrādyamaślīlaṃ śrīryasyāsti tacchlīlam | sidhmāderākṛtigaṇatvāllaca | kapilakādipāṭhāllatvam | na ślīlamaślīlam | vrīḍādāyitvenākāntamityarthaḥ | dvitīyaṃ ghṛṇāvadarthakam | jugupsādāyi pratyāyyamasyeti | tṛtīyamamaṅgalārthamātaṅkadāyijñāpyamasyeti kṛtvāślīlaparyāyo 'sabhyaśabdaḥ | sabhāyāṃ sādhurityarthe tenāpi śāstre vyavahāra iti pradarśanārthamasatyaśabdenāślīlamanūdya vyācaṣṭe | tatrāsabhyamiti | arthasyāsabhyatvātpadamapyasabhyam | sa cārthaḥ kvacitprakṛto 'prakṛto 'pi śleṣopasthita ekadeśātsmṛtimātrārụ̄dho vā | tatra yathākramamasabhyādayastrayaḥ | evamamaṅgalādayo 'pi | sūryasutā yamunā | abhrasindhurgaṅgā | tayormadhye ‘pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā’ ityavyayībhāvaḥ | ardhaṃ harerardhaṃ harasyeti śarīraikye kāṭaśabdasyāsabhyārthatve tadviśeṣaṇānāmapyasabhyatvamiti tānyādāya vyācaṣṭe—atra chatrākāreti ||

vidyāmiti | yā rātrau vidyāmabhyasato mantramāvartayatastava priyā samāyāti sā yakṣiṇī | ataḥ kathaṃ te dhanaṃ pelavaṃ komalam | khalpamiti yāvat | kiṃ tu yakṣiṇīprasādādbahu dhanaṃ tavocitamityarthaḥ | prakṛtapadāni tvasabhyārthāntarāṇi tānyuddhṛtya vyācaṣṭe—tadetadyā bhavataḥ priyeti | asabhyārthaprakāśanameva ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośa ityarthaḥ | yā bhavataḥ priyeti ekaṃ padaṃ yābho maithunaṃ tadvataḥ priyetyarthāt | yonirvanitāyā guhyastasya keśāḥ | pelaśabdo muṣkayoḥ prasiddhaḥ | tatra bandhanamiti ||

lg.l: kṛtaḥ kṛkāṭikāyāṃ te pādaḥ prāṇena yāsyatā || 18 ||’

div.p: utkampayasīti | he cūtavṛkṣa, kokilasya vācā kaṭutvena duḥkhadāyitvāt kiṃ māṃ bhāpayasi | nanu tava kṛkāṭikāyāṃ prīvāyāṃ pādaṃ dattvā calitā mama prāṇāstena mayā jitam | vyarthastavāyaṃ pariśrama iti vākyārtho vivakṣitaḥ | kāṭavaśabde kāṭa ekadeśaḥ kṛkāṭikāśavde kāṭiketi lopaḥ | kāṭaḥ kāṭikā ||

kheṭaka iti | atṛptaḥ sukhasyeyattāparicchedābhāvāt | kheṭake grāme yadbhaktaṃ sūpaścotpadyate tasya pattanasya nagarasya yā valabhī tasyāṃ suhitārthayoge ṣaṣṭhīniṣedhālliṅgādanumīyate tṛptyarthayoge ṣaṣṭhī bhavati | anye tu vyācakṣate—bhaktasūpapadanāmā dakṣiṇāpathe viṣayastatsadmani kheṭake valabhīnāma kasyacidvirūpākṣādhiṣṭhānasya tatraiva pattanasya hehale iti strīṇāmavyājamanyonyapremātiśayagarbhasya bhāṣitasyeti ||

pravāsayatīti | śapathadānena vinā pravāsayati anyatra prahiṇoti gṛhe samyak sthitaṃ priyaṃ sāṅnā na, kiṃ tu piśācīvadanucitakāriṇītyartho 'bhimataḥ | anyatra pravāsanamuccāṭanaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vināśaḥ vināśasya panthāstasya dānam | piśitamaśnātīti piśācī | pṛṣodarāditvāt | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atra pravāsayatīti |

mārīco 'yamiti | marīcerapatyaṃ mārīcaḥ kāśyapaḥ saṃkrandanādīnindrādīn dvādaśa putrānādityānutpāditavān | tacca kālāntakasya bhagavato mahādevasyālaye yāḥ kṛtyāḥ kriyā bhagavadārādhanarūpāstāsāṃ phalamityarthaḥ | mārīcaśabde mārakadeśaḥ kṛtyā iti subantapade kṛtyetyekadeśaḥ, kālāntakālaya ityatrāntaketi, saṃkrandane śabdakrandaneti ||
pardate hadate vamati niṣṭhīvatīti śabdānāṃ ghṛṇāvadarthatvam ||

pardata iti | utkauti utkāraṃ karoti | niṣṭhīvati thūtkaroti | āttagarbhā punarvadhūriti bālasya stanyavamanādinidānasūcanam | ata eva ‘na garbhiṇyāḥ pibetkṣīraṃ pāragarbhikakṛttu tat’ iti vaidyakam ||

bāṣpeti | vipūyo muñjaḥ | viśeṣeṇa sthito viṣṭhitaḥ smitavarco hāsyatejaḥ | tava kapolau dṛṣṭvā puraḥsthitastava priya īṣaddhāsyaṃ kurvan kapolayorhāsyajyotsnayā pūjāṃ karotītyarthaḥ | anyatra bāṣpeṇoṣmaṇā klinno mṛdūbhūtaḥ gaṇḍo vraṇaḥ | viśiṣṭaḥ pūyo vipūyastena pāṇḍaraḥ | viṣṭito viṣṭhā saṃjātāsya | varcaḥ purīṣam | yatsmaraṇādbāṣpādīnāṃ ghṛṇāvati vṛttistadeva pṛthakkṛtyāha—atra klinneti ||

pratyārdrayanta iti | anyonyalagno vṛkṣasamūhaḥ ṣaṇḍaḥ | rụ̄dhānītyanena madaneṣuvraṇānāṃ viśeṣitatvāt | madaneṣubhāgamapahāya vraṇabhāgamātreṇa rūḍhavraṇasmṛtirbhavantīpadādeveti vivakṣitavān | purīṣaṇḍaśabde purīṣetyekadeśaḥ ||
tadevaṃ padadoṣāṃllakṣayitvā kramaprāptavākyadoṣā lakṣaṇīyā iti tānvibhajate—

śabdahīnamiti | uktenaiva prayojanenāsamāsadvandvagarbhabahuvrīhisamāsau | evaṃ guṇādivibhāgavākyeṣvapi prayojanamavaseyam | bhinnaliṅgavacane ityādau tu dvandvalakṣaṇasya samāsasya pūrvavartināṃ bhinnādipadānāṃ pratyekamanvayaḥ | yamanaṃ yatiriti bhagnacchando bhagnayatiriti kecit | tathā ca vyatikīrṇo 'rthaḥ syāt | arītimaditi | rītirasyāstīti nityayoge matup | nityayogapratipādanaṃ hi dūṣakatābījoddhāṭanāyopapadyate | ata eva bahuvrīhau lāghavaṃ tatra nādaraḥ ||
atra gamitavatīti ktavatoḥ karmaṇi, ājaghna iti ātmanepadasyākhāṅgakarmaṇi prayogādapaśabdau | tau ca śilāvitānatryakṣavakṣaḥsaṃbandhādvākyadoṣau jāyamānau asādhunāmnaḥ padadoṣādbhidyete ||

ucyata iti | apaśabdatvaṃ pada eva niyataṃ vākye saṃskāraprasakterabhāvādapaśabdatvaṃ na vākyadūṣaṇam | tathā hi—‘kartari kṛt’ iti niyamātkarmaṇi ktavaturasādhuḥ | ‘akarmakācca’ ityanuvṛttau ‘āṅo yamahanaḥ’ ityātmanepadamakarmaka eva prāptaṃ 'svāṅgakarmakācca’ iti vākyaikavākyatāparyālocanayāsvāṅgakarmaṇyasādhuḥ kathaṃ vākyadūṣaṇatā | nahi vākyāntaḥ pātitāmātreṇa sā yujyate 'tiprasaṅgādityāśaṅkyoktam | tau
ceti | nahi yathā bādhṛdhātuḥ parasmaipadānta ityevāsādhutvam, tathātra padāntarasaṃnidhānāpekṣatve 'dhyavasīyate | bhūtānāmadhipatinā śilāvitāna iti yāvannānusaṃdhīyate tāvadgamitavatīti kiṃ kartari karmaṇi veti saṃdehānivṛtteḥ | tathā gāṇḍīvī viṣamavilocanasya vakṣa ityetāvatpratītya kathamājaghna ityasvāṅgakarmaṇi ātmanepadamadhyavasānayogyam | iyameva hi vākyadoṣatā yadanekapadanirūpyatā nāma vādhatītyatrāpi kiṃ bādhaśabdāt kvibantāttip, uta bādhṛdhāturiti saṃdeha iti kudeśyam | skandhādipadasaṃnidhāne 'pi tasyānivṛtteḥ | ‘tena tvāmanunāthate kucayugam—‘ ityādikamatratyamudāharaṇaṃ pramādāt kāvyaprakāśakṛtā padadoṣeṣu likhitam | yathā ca | ‘udapūtitaḥ ko na hīyate’ iti rudraṭena | tatra hi ‘apādāne cāhīyaruhoḥ’ iti tasipratyayaniṣedhaḥ | sa ca padāntarasaṃnidhānenaiveti svayamālocanīyam | śilāvitānatryakṣavakṣa ityupalakṣaṇam | adhipatigāṇḍīviśabdāvapi boddhavyāviti ||

lg.l: kramabhraṣṭaṃ bhavedārthaḥ śābdo vā yatra tatkramaḥ || 21 ||

div.p: atra mātaṅgamatha turaṅgamiti vaktavye turaṅgamatha mātaṅgamityarthaḥ | kāntipratāpau coktvā sūryācandramasoḥ samāviti śābdaḥ kramabhraṃśo lakṣyate ||

kramabhraṣṭamiti | arthādāgataḥ krama ārthaḥ | śabdādāgataḥ śābda | arthakamabhraṃśaḥ kathaṃ śabdadūṣaṇamata āha—iti vaktavya iti | mātaṅgo dīyatāmatha taddānasāmarthyaṃ nāsti tadā turaṅga iti vaktavye racanāvaiparītyamātramatrāparādhyati | nārtha iti yuktā śabdadoṣatā ||

lg.l: visaṃhito virūpo vā yasya saṃdhirvisaṃdhi tat |

div.p: atra meghānilena amunā etasminnasaṃhitayā vivakṣāmītyabhisaṃdhānaṃ visaṃgiḥ | mañjaryudgamagarbhāsau ityādau tu virūpasaṃdhānaṃ visaṃdhiḥ ||

visaṃhita iti | viśabdo vigamaṃ vaiparītyaṃ ca dyotayati | tenārthadvayaṃ saṃpadyate | ‘paraḥ saṃnikarṣaḥ saṃhitā' | tayā tatkāryaṃ lakṣyate | saṃdhānaṃ saṃdhiḥ | ardhamātrākālavyavadhānaṃ | tathā ca—saṃhitākāryaśūnyaṃ saṃdhānaṃ yatretyarthaḥ | ‘saṃhitaikapade nityā’ iti samayādanyatra vikalpaḥ | tato nāsaṃdhāvantarbhāvaḥ | vairūpyaṃ dvividham | durvacakatvam, aślīlatvaṃ ca | tatrādyamupalakṣaṇatayodāhṛtam | dvitīyaṃ yathā—‘uḍḍīya gagane dūraṃ calan ḍāmaraceṣṭitaḥ | ayamutpatate patrī tato 'traiva ruciṃ kuru ||’ nanu yadi saṃdhikārya vaikalpikaṃ kathamatra doṣa ityata āha—na saṃhitāmiti | yadi saṃhitāpratiṣedhaḥ syāttadā sakṛdvisaṃdhikaraṇena tathāvairūpyaṃ bhavatīti kaveraparādho na saṃbhāvyate, yadi tu pratiṣedho nāsti asakṛdvopādānaṃ tadā vyaktavairūpyapratibhāsātkathaṃ na doṣa ityarthaḥ | na vivakṣāmityupalakṣaṇam | vivakṣāyāmapyasakṛtprayogo virasa eva | yathā—‘tata udita udārahāvahārī’ iti | viśeṣaṃ vaiśeṣike vakṣyāmaḥ ||
atra utkānunmanayantītyarthapunaruktam | gambhīrāḥ stanayitnava iti śabdapunaruktam ||

padaṃ padārthaścābhinnāviti | padamabhinnamabhinnatātparyābhidheyamiti viśeṣaḥ | tena tātparyabhede lāṭānuprāso 'bhidheyamede yamakaṃ ca na doṣaḥ | padārtho 'bhinnaparyāyaśabdopātta iti śeṣaḥ | tena pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ | svābhidheyatātparyakapadāvṛttiḥ paryāyopādānaṃ ca dvayamapi śabdapunaruktamiṣyate | tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram—‘śabdayoḥ punarvacanaṃ punaruktamanyatrānuvādāt’ iti | yuktaṃ caitat | ekasyābhidheyasya dvirabhidhānaṃ doṣaḥ | taccābhidhānaṃ tenaiva padena paryāyeṇa vā saṃbhavatīti śabdamādāyaiva tasya vyavasthā punaruktiratraiva pade bhavati, tatko 'tra matvartha ityata uktam—yatra taditi | yatra samudāye 'vayavaḥ punaruktarūpaḥ sa matubarthaḥ | ata eva nānāpadanirūpaṇīyatayā
vākyadūṣaṇamiti sphuṭo 'rthaḥ | vikalpitaṃ cedaṃ lakṣaṇamekasyaiva dūṣaṇadhurārohaṇakṣamatvāt | saṃkṣepārthaṃ tvekamudāharaṇam | arthamādāyaiva punarabhidhānaṃ punaruktamiti vibhāvayituṃ lakṣaṇakramavaiparītyena prathamamarthapunaruktamudāhṛtamityāśayavān | vyākhyāne 'pi tameva kramamādriyamāṇa āha—atrotkāniti | utka unmanāḥ | unmanayantīti unmanasaṃ kurvantīti ṇici iṣṭhavadbhāve ṭilope ca rūpam | ambhodharā iti viśeṣyapadam | śeṣāṇi viśeṣaṇāni—gambhīrā māṃsalāḥ, stanayitnavaḥ śabdāyamānāḥ, taḍitvantaḥ prakṛṣṭataḍidyuktāḥ ||
atra karkaśakaṇṭake daṇḍe 'ṅgāni ghaṭṭayan haṃsaḥ padminyā mukhaṃ cumbatīti vaktavye yathānirdiṣṭarūpe vighaṭṭitavibhaktikayuktitvāvdyākīrṇam ||

vyākīrṇaṃ taditi | padānāmakleśe 'pyarthapratītihetubhūtākāṅkṣāvadvibhaktivyavadhānādanākāṅkṣitavibhaktisaṃnidhānācca nāhatyapadāni viśiṣṭārthajñānajananasamarthāni bhavanti | vilakṣaṇalakṣaṇakleśapadāni bhramakarāṇīti vadatāmārādhyānāmayamevābhiprāyo voddhavyaḥ | vibhaktivyavadhānamātrakṛtastu kleśaḥ prāyeṇa padaikavākyatāyāmutpadyate | daṇḍa iti | ādhāravibhaktirādheyavibhaktimapekṣate, na tu cumbatīti kriyāvibhaktim | sāpi kārakavibhaktimākāṅkṣati | padminyā iti saṃvandhavibhaktikameva tatra boddhavyam | kleśena yo 'trāvagamyate tamabhimatamarthamāvedayati—atra karkaśeti | ata eva nāpārthakatvena saṃkaraḥ samudāyārthasya pratīyamānatvāt | asti kaściduccāraṇayorviśeṣo yena vākyārthapratītiḥ kkacidāhatya bhavati | kkacittu neti sa eva viśeṣaḥ | saṃnidhānaṃ vyavadhānamiti vyākhyāyate | kāryadarśanādarśanābhyāṃ connīyata ityāśayavānāha—ayaṃ pratīko mūle tu nopalabhyate, tena kadācidayaṃ pratīkapāṭhaḥ prakṣipto bhavetyethoktarūpeṇeti(?) ||

lg.l: ‘kāaṃ khāaï khuhio kūraṃ phellei ṇibbharaṃ ruṭṭho |
suṇaaṃ geṇhaï kaṇṭhe hakkeia ṇattiaṃ ṭhero || 30 ||’
[kākaṃ khādati kṣudhitaḥ kūraṃ phellati nirbharaṃ ruṣṭaḥ |
śvānaṃ gṛhṇāti kaṇṭhe hakkāyati naptāraṃ sthaviraḥ ||]

div.p: atra kākaṃ kṣipati, kūraṃ khādati, kaṇṭhe naptāraṃ gṛhṇāti, śvānaṃ bhīṣayate, ityādauṭīkādarśanena ‘iti vaktavye’ iti bhavet vaktavye yathoktapadavinyāsaḥ saṃkīryate ||

vākyāntarapadairiti | vākyāntarasaṃvalitāni padāni vākyāntaramanupraviśya tathā pratītiṃ vighnanti, yathā samudāya eva dūṣito bhavati || kākamiti | kūraṃ bhaktaṃ kṣudhitaḥ khādati, kākaṃ ca nirbharaṃ ruṣṭaḥ san kṣipati, śvānaṃ ca nivārayati, naptāraṃ ca kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti sthavirajātiḥ || ākāṅkṣākrameṇa kiṃcitpadaṃ kasyacidvākyasya saṃbaddhamiti jñāyata eva | tadāha—atra kākaṃ kṣipatīti | śabdadoṣatvaṃ prakāśayati—iti vaktavya iti | yathoktapadavinyāsa ityanena saṃkīryata ityasyārtho vivakṣitaḥ | evaṃprakāraḥ saṃkara ityarthaḥ | vijātīyasaṃvalane loke saṃkaravyavahāraḥ ||

lg.l: ‘āujja‘jjhi’ iti saṭīkapustakapāṭhaḥa piṭṭiae jaha kukkuli ṇāma majjha bhattāle |
[āvarjya pīḍyate yathā kukkuro nāma mama bhartā |

div.p:
vibhinneti | ṣọdhā padaṃ bhavati—prakṛtistham, komalam, kaṭhoram, grāmyam, nāgaram, upanāgaraṃ ca | tatrānekadīrghasvarakṛtagauravamekasaṃyogakṛtagauravaṃ padaṃ prakṛ-
tistham | yathā—nīhāratārānīkāśasārasītyādi, hastapallavakaṅkaṇakarpūrādi ca | yathā ca—pāḍiva āmāṇa siṇivaṃ ālagoletyādi, tyajjhatujjhaüttāvilavihatthatiacchetyādi ca | ekasvarakṛtagauravaṃ guruśūnyaṃ vā komalam | kareṇutārakasarojanikarādi, madhuramasṛṇasarasasaraletyādi ca | yathā—nīhārabāṇa ivāṇaveṇītyādi, parakualaḍahataliṇetyādi ca | sānusvāravisargadīrghasvarakṛtagauravaṃ saṃyogabahulaṃ vākkaṭhoram | yathā śuddhaṃ payaḥ pācayāṃbabhūva tā piba, āhiṣātāmityatra | acchācchatatrasthavyụ̄dhoraskapracchannetyādi ca | yathā ca—ā ī i e ityādi | uppicchaüppupuaekkamekkamityādi ca | prasiddhimādāya grāmyāditrayaṃ bhavati | prasiddhistridhā | sārvalaukikī, paṇḍitajanagāminī, tadupajīvitricaturalaukikagāminī ceti | tatra sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ grāmyam | deśīpadāni sarvāṇyeva saṃskṛteṣu hastavivāhabhaginīhārakaṅkaṇādikam, tuṃbha aṃbha haliddāsāhajjādikaṃ ca | etadapabhraṃśasamānaprasiddhikamatiprasiddhaṃ ceti gīyate | grāmyavaiparītyena nātiprasiddhaṃ nāgaraṃ nagareṇopamitamiti kṛtvātiprasiddhābhāvenopamā | idameva nātyaprasiddhamupanāgaramityucyate | yathā—ādyāśakiṃśārukhuralīlātaṅketyādi, sudevaacchevaguppantī vivalāā ityādi ca | śṛṅgāraprakāśe tu bhāṣāṇāmapi bhedo padamityuktam | iha tu śabdajātyaucityāvivecanena gatamiti granthakarturāśayaḥ | tadevaṃ sthite pratipadaṃ kavīnāṃ ko 'pi kramo nirvāhyo na tvakasmādevālūnaviśīrṇabhāvo vidheyaḥ | tadidamāha—vibhinnetyādi | yuktirucitā yojanā sā prakṛtisthādīnāṃ vibhinnānyathānītātyuktiriti yāvat | etadvakṣyati—ayukteriti || āujjhia iti | āvarjya keśeṣu namayitvā | ‘āujjhie’ iti pāṭhe nirbhartsya | piṭṭiae tāḍyate | jaha kukkuli yathā kurkurī nāmaśabdaḥ prākāśye prakāśameva tāḍitamityarthaḥ | majjha bhattāle mama bhartā | pekkhantaha lāulakaṇṇiāha | anādare paṣṭhī | rājakulaniyuktān prekṣamāṇānanādṛtyetyarthaḥ | hāśabdaḥ khede | kasya krandāmi | kasya phūtkarormātyarthaḥ | atra prathame pāde āujjhie, ityupanāgaraṃ prakṛtisthaṃ ca | ‘āujjhī’ iti pāṭhe grāmyaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ ca | bhattāla ilyapi tathā | tṛtīyapāde pekkhantaheti kaṭhoramupanāgaraṃ ca | rāulakaṇṇiāheti grāmyaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ ca | heti grāmyaṃ komalaṃ ca | kasseti prakṛtisthamupanāgaraṃ ca | kandemīti grāmyaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ ca | tadihaikarūpa eva karmakaravadhūlakṣaṇe grāmye vaktari ekarūpa eva vākyārthe sarvadoṣatirodhāyakarasadīptyabhāve ca yathā bhāṣāṇāṃ vyatikaro dūṣaṇaṃ tathā grāmyādīnāmiti sahṛdayamātravedyaścāyaṃ panthā ityavahitairbhavitavyam | eteṣāṃ ca
svarūpaṃ svayameva guṇībhāvaprastāve leśataḥ prakāśayiṣyati teneha saṃkṣiptavān | naivaṃvidhaḥ kadāpi vyatikaro mahākavigirāmājānikaḥ pravartate | tathā hi—‘tyajato maṅgalakṣaume dadhānasya ca valkale | dadṛśurvismitāstasya mukharāgaṃ samaṃ janāḥ ||’ atra prathamādiṣu pādeṣu kṣaumacīravismitarāgapadāni upanāgarāṇi śeṣāṇi grāmyāṇi | pratipādaṃ ca prakṛtisthakomalābhyāmeva nirvāhaḥ | evamanyatrāpi pratyekaṃ dvandvasamudāyaiḥ pratipādamupakramopasaṃhāranirvāhakramaḥ svayamupalakṣaṇīya ityāstāṃ tāvat |

lg.l: ‘yogyo yaste putraḥ so 'yaṃ daśavadana lakṣmaṇena mayā |

div.p: atra yogyo yaste putro lakṣmaṇena mayā mṛtyuvaśaṃ nīyata iti vākyasya rakṣainaṃ yadi śaktiriti vākyāntareṇa sagarbhatvādgarbhitam ||

vākyāntareti | madhyapraviṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ pūrvottarabhāgābhyāmekībhūtasya garbhāyamāṇamekakharasaprasūtāṃ pratītiṃ vighnayadātmanā sahaiva samudāyavirasakakṣāmārohayati | vākyāntaravākyasya viśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ pratītivyavadhāyaka iti yāvat || yogya iti | mayeti | kārakavibhakteḥ kriyākāṅkṣaṇaśīlāyāstāmasaṃgamayya madhya rakṣainaṃ śaktirityetāvatā garbhasthānīyena virasīkaraṇamityāha—atra yogyo ya iti | evaṃ vākyarūpatābhaṅgahetūndoṣānabhidhāya tatraiva kāvyabhāvapratyūhahetavo 'bhidhātavyāste ca guṇabhaṅgadvārakāḥ, alaṃkārabhaṅgadvārakāḥ, chandobhaṅgadvārakāḥ, yatibhaṅgādvārakāśceti caturdhā viprathante | tataśca yadyapi prathamaṃ guṇabhaṅgadvārakā vaktumucitāstathāpi teṣāṃ bahutvāddurūhatvācca sūcīkaṭāhanyāyena paścātkaraṇamalaṃkārabhedādiṣu ca madhye pratiyogidvārālaṃkārabhaṅgasya prādhānyamiti taddvārā doṣāṃllakṣayati ||
atrāpageva tvamavigāhyo 'sīti liṅgabhedaḥ | nārīṇāmuttitīrṣata iti liṅgabhedo vacanabhedaśca | tadidaṃ dvayorekamevodāharaṇam ||

yatropameti | upamāgrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamityagre vakṣyāmaḥ | upamā upamitiḥ sādṛśyabhinnopamānavācina upameyavācinaśca liṅgaṃ strīpuṃnapuṃsakaṃ yasya sā tathoktā | evaṃ bhinnavacanopamamityatrāpi vyākhyeyam || avigāhyo 'sīti | avigāhyatāmātramatra sādṛśyaṃ vivakṣitametadupayuktameva viśeṣaṇamupamānopameyayorupādānayogyamityakasmādeva vikṛtavacanabhedanibandhanaḥ prayojanamākāṅkṣati | tathā tadanusaṃdhānapravaṇasya prakṛtapratītirācchādyata iti dūṣaṇasiddhiḥ | etena dūṣaṇatā vyākhyātā | vibhāgavākye sahitāvasthayoruddeśādiha ca militayorudāharaṇāttathābhāvo doṣatvamiti bhrāntiṃ nirasyati—tadidamiti | ekamudāharaṇaṃ natvekaḥ saṃmitra upādhiḥ pratyekameva tvasti samarthatvādityarthaḥ | etadevānusaṃdhāya vibhāgavākye dve padam ||

lg.l: śaśīva dhavalā haṃsī haṃsīva dhavalā diśaḥ || 35 ||’

div.p: jātipramāṇadharmato nyūnatā upamānasya nyūnopamatvam | tatra jātipramāṇanyūnatārthadoṣaḥ | dharmanyūnatā tu dharmābhidhāyakapadanyūnatālakṣaṇāśabdadoṣa eva | etenādhikatvaṃ vyākhyātamityāśayavānāha—

nyūnopamamiheti | ihaśabdo yeṣu madhyeṣūpamānasya stokaviśeṣaṇatayopameyanyūnetyuktaṃ tathādhikopamamiti vakṣyati—saṃhatetyādi | atra cakravākayugopamānamapadameva paramupāttama | rocanāviliptastanītyanena kamalasyopamānaṃ netrapadaṃ mṛṇālasyopamānaṃ bāhupadaṃ ca nopāttaṃ tadapi ca saviśeṣaṇamupādeyaṃ bhavati | yena vikāsādisamabhivyāhārasāmañjasyamapi syāditi | padānāmiti bahuvacanābhiprāyaḥ | ata eva dharmāṇāmekanirdeśe 'nyasaṃvitsāhacaryāditi nāvatarati vyabhicārāt | kimarthaṃ tasyopamānamanusaṃdheyamityapi na vācyam | mātrāpi nānarthikā kavinopādeyeti sāhityavidāmnāyavyavasthitāvupameyaviśeṣaṇasyopamānaviśeṣaṇatayā prayojanacintāyāṃ pūrvavadeva pratītipratyūhasya sulabhatvādanuktatvāditiśabdapradhānakatāmācaṣṭe | evamuttaratra ||

adhikamiti | yadyapyekasya viśeṣaṇādhikye viśeṣaṇanyūnatve vānyaviśeṣaṇasya nyūnādhikabhāvo niyatastathāpyupamānagatameva dvayaṃ nirūpyate | tatra hi dṛṣṭamupameye pratibimbakalpamupasthāpyate tenānto nopameye tayornirūpaṇamiti ||

lg.l: tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ || 38 ||’

div.p: atra pañcamavarṇasya laghoḥ sthāne guroḥ karaṇācchandobhaṅgaḥ ||

bhagnacchanda iti | vācāṃ śravyo 'vacchedaśchandastasyaivopamānayuktādayastenaiva gurulaghuniveśakrameṇa śravyatā bhavatītyāśayāt | tasya viparyāsaśchandobhaṅgo vyakta eva vairasyahetuḥ prāhuriti | pañcodāharaṇatvāvacchedaviparyāsatve ca bhagnavṛttavyavahārādidameva nimittamasyāvadhāryata ityarthaḥ | pañceti | pañcajanāḥ puruṣāste devapitṛgandharvarākṣasāsurabhedātpañca | athavā niṣādapañcamabrāhmaṇādicatuṣṭayabhedāt | tamevātmānaṃ brahmāparaparyāyaṃ vijñāya śravaṇamanananididhyāsanairupāsya prajñāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ sākṣātkurvīta || atra pañcamavarṇasyeti | ‘pañcamaṃ laghu sarvatra saptamaṃ dvicaturthayoḥ | ṣaṣṭhaṃ guruṃ vijānīyāccheṣāstvaniyatā matāḥ ||’ ityanuṣṭupachandaso lakṣaṇam ||
atra caturthasthāne yatau kartavyāyāṃ tadanyatra yatikaraṇādbhagnayatīdam ||

asthāna iti | śravyaḥ paṭhiti vicchedo yatirvicchidya vicchidya paṭhyamānā bhāratī svadate | śravyatopalakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dvimunivedādisaṃjñayā tatra tatra vivicyate | tathā cāsti kaścidviśeṣo yena kriyamāṇāpi viratirna saubhāgyapadaṃ puṣyati | sa ca viśeṣo nāma bhāgabhedo 'svarasaṃdhikṛtaśca prāyeṇa eteṣāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣādeva sthāne kriyamāṇāpi viratiranyatraiva paraṃ prakāśate | na tatra kathaṃcana saubhāgyamunmīlayati | sthānaparibhāṣayā vyāvartitatvāt | tadidamuktam—asthāna iti | vāmano 'pyāha—‘virasavirāmaṃ kaṣṭam’ iti | sado gṛharūpā sabhā ketūdastāmbhodaṃ dhvajadaṇḍotkṣiptajaladharamityuccaistvam| ‘vedacchedā śālinī mo 'tha tau gau’ ityupalakṣaṇaṃ śravyarateḥ | atra dvitīyapāde dhātubhāgabhedaḥ śeṣapādatraye nāmabhāgabhedāḥ | na cātra svarasaṃdhānamastīti ||

kriyāpadeti | kriyetyupalakṣaṇam| pradhānapadahīnamiti boddhavyam | pradhānāvimarśe hi vākyaśarīrameva na niṣpannaṃ syāt || śaileti | vākye kriyāpradhānamiti darśane tatpadānupādānādatra pradhānāvimarśaḥ| śailasutayāvaruddhamardhaṃ yasya | muddhāṇo mūrdhā tatrābaddhā bhugnā śaśilekhā yena | śīrṣe pratiṣṭhā gaṅgā yena | yaśca saṃdhyāyai praṇatastaṃ pramathanāthaṃ pramathā gaṇāsteṣāṃ nātham | karmavibhakteḥ kriyāmantareṇācaritārthatvātkriyāyā namaskārarūpāyā vyabhicāreṇārthāpattiviṣayatānupapatteriti | asyāṃ ca gāthāyāṃ strīmayavyāpārarūpatā bhagavataḥ pratīyate iti rahasyamārādhyā manyante ||
atra bhinnānāmapi padānāmekapadatā pratibhāsaheturanatikomalo bandhaviśeṣaḥ śleṣaḥ | tadviparyayeṇa śabdapradhāno 'yaṃ śleṣaviparyayaḥ ||

guṇānāmiti | samādhyādibhaṅgo 'pi tarhi doṣaḥ syādityata āha—śleṣādīnāmiti | śleṣaprasādasamatā saukumāryārthavyaktimādhuryakāntyudārataujasām | etadyogādvākyaṃ vakrarūpatāmāsādya kāvyavyapadeśaṃ labhate | teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ bhaṅgaḥ kāvyābhāsatvaparyavasāyī doṣaḥ | te ca śleṣādayo navaiva | teṣāmanyatamābhāve kāvyasyābhāsatvāt | teṣāṃ hi viparyaye rītiravaśyaṃ bhajyate | tasyā guṇavatpadaracanārūpatvāt | ata eva pānakarasanyāyena saṃbhūyacitrāsvādaparyavasānakṣamaṃ guṇasaṃvalanameva rītiriti locanakāraḥ | rītiḥ sārarūpatayā kāvyasyātmetyucyate | yathā citrasya lekhā uttuṅgapratyaṅgalāvaṇyonmīlanakṣamā, tathā rītiriti dvitīye vistaraḥ | tattridheti | taditi kākākṣigolakavatpūrvāparābhyāmabhisaṃbadhyate | yatra guṇānāṃ viparyayastadarītimat | tattridhetyarthaḥ | tridhābhūtaṃ bhūyastridhā pracakṣate | tena navabhedāḥ | tadetadvivṛṇoti—śabdārtheti | yogaśabdaḥ pratyekamanvīyate | śabdapradhānatvamarthānapekṣaśabdanirūpyatvam | vākyaguṇasya śleṣāditrayasya | evaśabdānapekṣārthanirūpaṇīyatvaṃ tādṛśasya kāntyāditrayasya | etenaujaḥprabhṛtitrikasyobhayapradhānatā vyākhyātā | tenāyamarthaḥ śabdārthobhayapradhānatayā sāmānyatastridhā bhūtvā śleṣāditrikavivakṣayā pratyekaṃ tridhā bhavatīti | teṣu śabdasya prāthamyāttatpradhānakaguṇabhaṅgaḥ prathamaṃ vivektavya ityāha—tatreti | arītimatīti nirdhāraṇe saptamī | jātyabhiprāyamekavacanam | viparyayeṇeti | śleṣaḥ saṃdhānaṃ ghaṭanamityanarthāntaram | na caitāvataiva guṇatvaṃ vākyamātrasādhāraṇatvāt | tena bahūnāmapi padānāmekatāpratibhāsahetutvamanatikomalatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇamicchanti | viśeṣamarthaguṇakāṇḍe vakṣyāmaḥ | evaṃbhūtaviśeṣaṇaviparyāse śithilo bandho 'tikomalo vikīrṇaprāyaścetyarthaḥ | ālīyamityādau dantyavarṇaprāyatayātikomalatvaṃ vikīrṇatā ca vyaktaiva | nāsya nirūpaṇe kvacidapyarthāpekṣeti sphuṭayannāha—atra bhinnānāmiti | śleṣasya śabdapradhānatayā tadviparyayo 'pi śabdapradhāno bhavatītyāha—śabdapradhāno 'yamiti | anyataraviśeṣaṇahānāvapi śleṣābhāvo bhavatyeva | tena pūrvārdhasya leśata aikyapratibhānasaṃbhave 'pyatikomalatayā duṣṭatvam ||
atra pūrvārdhasya mṛdubandhatvāduttarārdhasya ca gāḍhabandhatvātsamabandheṣu viṣamamiti viṣamo nāma śabdapradhānaḥ samatāviparyayo doṣaḥ ||

bhavediti | sa eva saṃdarbho mṛdumadhyakaṭhoravarṇanirvyụ̄dhāstistro bandhajātayastatraikarūpe vākyārthe ekaiva jātirupādeyeti tadviparyāso vairāgyahetureva | utchalantaḥ śīkarā yasmāttathācchācchamatyaccham | dvayamapi nirjharāmbhoviśeṣaṇam | malayamārutasyoddīpanavibhāvabhūtasya varṇamātravairūpyamasyetyāśayavānāha—atra pūrvārdhasyeti | śabdapradhānatāmasya vivṛṇoti—samabandheṣviti ||

saukumāryaviparyāsāditi | akaṭhorākṣaraprāyatābandhasya sukumāratvaṃ tadviparthaye kaṭhoratā śrutikaṭutvaṃ bhavati | asitatīṃti | ‘ṛ gatau’ iti dhātvanusārādṛtirvartma | asitā kṛṣṇā ṛtirvartma yasya kṛṣṇavartmā vahnistasya tugapatyam | adricchiditi krauñcadāraṇatvāt | svarge kṣiyanti nivasanti ye devāsteṣāṃ patiḥ senānītvāt | advidṛgdvādaśalocanatvāt | sa evaṃbhūto bhagavān kumāro 'midbhirasnigdhai rūkṣaiḥ śubhradṛgdṛṣṭairdhavalākṣivilokitaiḥ sakrodhanibhālane tārakābhāgasyordhvatayā nayanāttathābhāvo jātirvo yuṣmākaṃ dviṣaḥ śatrūñjeghnīyiṣīṣṭa | atyarthaṃ punaḥ punarvā vadhyādi- tyarthaḥ | hanteryaṅi ghnībhāve āśīrliṅi rūpam | svatantrasya padasya śrutikaṭutā padadoṣaḥ | iha tu padānāmatathābhāve rti dri cchi ityādīnāṃ varṇānāṃ parasparasaṃnidhāne ghaṭanaiva kaṭhoretyāha—atrātikaṭhoratvāditi ||

yā tu kāntīti | ‘kāntiprasādārthavyaktīnām’ iti pramādātpāṭhaḥ | vivaraṇakramānurodhena ‘prasādārthavyaktikāntīnām’ iti paṭhanīyam | aprasannamiti | śrutamātrasyaiva yasyārthaścitte pratiphalati sa prasannaḥ śabdaḥ | tathā cārthasya prākaṭyaṃ jhaṭiti pratibandhayogyatvam | ‘paścādiva gatirvācaḥ purastādiva vastuna’ iti sahṛdayavyavahārārthaviṣayatvaṃ prasādo 'rthanirūpaṇīya iti bhavatyarthapradhānaḥ | na cāsau padamātramullikhatīti vākyāṃśo bhavati | tena tadviparyayo 'pi vākyagāmī | ‘arthasya yanna jhaṭiti pratītirupajāyate | tatra tatra mahārāja śabda evāparādhyati ||’ iti vākyadoṣeṣu parigaṇanamabhyacchatayā ca śabdānāṃ pratītiḥ skhalantī dūṣaṇatāmasya sthāpayati—anaṅgakamiti | na vidyate 'ṅgaṃ yasyetyanaṅgakamākāśaṃ mayamānā gacchantī | ayamayeti daṇḍakeṣu paṭhitānmayadhātoḥ śānac | marālikā haṃsī | alaṃcakre śobhitavatī | nanu haṃsyāgamanapathālaṃkaraṇakālo rātristasyāṃ ca tuṣārakiraṇa eva tadalaṃkārakārī kimanayā varākyetyata āha—yasyeti | yadanatyarjunaṃ na bhavati abjanma toyabhavam | nīlotpalamiti yāvat | tatsadṛśalāñchano valakṣagurvalakṣo gauḥ kiraṇo yasya śubhrāṃśuścandraḥ | tenāsau sakalaṅkatayā na tathālaṃkārāya yatheyamityarthaḥ | paśyeti vākyārthakarmakameke paṭhanti | tanna yuktam | cakra iti parokṣatayā svarasabhaṅgāpatteḥ | uktayuktyā vākyadoṣatvamāha—atra śabdānāmiti | na ca mayamānādīnāṃ śliṣṭatā | tallakṣaṇāvirahāt | nāpi gụ̄dhārthatvaṃ tata eva ||

vākyamiti | saṃpūrṇaṃ vākyatvamarthavyaktiṃ karotīti vakṣyati | sarvasya vākyasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvabodhakatvaniyame yāvatāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo 'bhimatastāvatpratipādakapadopādānaṃ saṃpūrṇatā | sā ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvānurūpārthanirūpaṇīyatayārthapradhāneti tadviparyayo 'pi tatpradhāna iti pūrvavanneyam | ata eva vivakṣitavākyānyathānupapattyā neyaḥ kalpanīyo 'rtho yasyeti neyārthamityartho 'pi ghaṭate | mahīti | pūrvārdha eva kāvyaṃ nirvartitam | na ca tāvatā vivakṣitārthalābhaḥ | tathā hi—samudramadhyātpṛthivyāmuddhriyamāṇāyāṃ mahāsuravimarde teṣāṃ daṃṣṭrayā pāṭanena rudhiraśabalatayā lohitatvamudadheriti vākyārtho 'bhipretaḥ | lakṣaṇāyā abhāvānna neyārthatvaṃ padadūṣaṇamatra saṃbhāvanāmārohati | dūṣaṇatābījaṃ cātra sphuṭameva | aśarīraṃ tu kriyāpadaśūnyamityuktam | tadetatsarvamabhipretyāha—tadidaṃ nigadenaiveti ||

lg.l: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ tvaṃ na kāmayase katham || 46 ||’

div.p: kānteriti | rasasya dīptiḥ kāntiragre vivariṣyate tenārthapradhānatā vyaktā | tasyāmasti vākyavācyayorvyāpāraḥ | vākyaṃ vidagdhoktikaṃ vyāpriyate | atathābhūtasya rasāvyañjakatvaniyamāt | tathāhi—kanye iti saṃbodhanena rasavirodhinīvilasitā kṣamatā pratīyate | kāmayamānamityanenānāvaraṇamucyamāno 'rthaḥ kathaṃ na vairasyamāvahatītyādikamunneyam | tadidamāha—idamuktergrāmyatayeti ||

lg.l: ‘smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopadhanaḥ kṛśaḥ |
cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ || 47 ||

div.p: atra satyasamastapadāmidhāne satyapi cārthasaukumārye śleṣādiguṇasāmapryabhāvānna vaidarmī rītiḥ | nāpi yathoktalakṣaṇābhāvādgauḍīyādaya iti | khaṇḍitarītitvādayamojoviparyayaḥ śabdārthapradhāno guṇaviparyayo doṣo bhavati | yadāha—

vākye ya iti | nanu samāsabhūyastvamojo 'bhidhāsyate tatkathamasyābhāvo 'rthapradhāno 'pi kathaṃ ca doṣa ityata āha—khaṇḍayanrītimiti | rītirbhaṅgaparyavasāyī tasyābhāvo dūṣaṇam | na tu tanmātramityarthaḥ | etaduktaṃ bhavati | śabdārthayorucitā prauḍharojaḥ | yadāha—‘raudrādayo rasā dīptyā lakṣyante kāvyavartinaḥ | tavdyaktihetuśabdārthāvāśrityaujo vyavasthitam ||’ iti | tatrārthavyaktimarthaguṇeṣu vivecayivyāmaḥ | śabdasya tu pāruṣyaśaithilyavyatikaralakṣaṇā sā ca kvacitsamāsadīrghatayā vyajyate | yathā—‘caścandbhujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhighātasaṃcūrṇitoruyugalasya suyodhanasya |’ iti | kvacit anyathāpi prakāśyate | yathā—‘yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti’ ityādi | tadevaṃ tattvavyavasthitau pūrvācāryavyavasthityā guṇakāṇḍe samāsabhūyastvamojolakṣaṇaṃ vyabhicaritaguṇamadhye samāsaratanāsauṣṭhavaṃ vaktṛkṣamatayā guṇa ityabhiprāyādviśeṣaṃ tatra vakṣyāmaḥ—tadidamiti | rītiṃ khaṇḍayatīti | nahi praụdherabhāve guṇasaṃbandhanātmikā rītirnāmeti viparyayapadena sādhāraṇena pāruṣyaśaithilye darśayati—atreti | etadevācāryamatena draḍhayati—yadāheti | yadyapyatrānuprāso 'sti tathāpi rītimantareṇa mṛtaśarīra iva kāvye nālaṃkaraṇatāmadhyāste | tataśca na prakṛtaḥ ko 'pi camatkārāvirbhāva iti nāsyaiva kāvyatāṃ prayojayatītyarthaḥ | dākṣiṇātyā vaidarbhīmāhuḥ | pārāvarīṇāste hi viśiṣṭarītisvarūpamavadhārayituṃ kṣamā iti ||

lg.l: viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ strīṣu rājakuleṣu ca || 48 ||’

div.p: atra nakhināṃ ca nadīnāṃ ceti pṛṣṭhyantaccakāreṇa rīterupakrame śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇināmiti cakārānirvāhāt strīṣu rājakuleṣu ceti ṣaṣṭhīparityāgādamadhurārthatvācca mādhuryaviparyayanāmāyaṃ śabdārthapradhāno guṇaviparyayo doṣaḥ | yadāha—

mādhuryavyavatyaya iti | śabdārthayościttadrutividhrāyitvaṃ mādhuryam | niculitatvamivārdratāpadābhidheyā cetaso 'vasthā tatkāritā mādhuryam | sā ca śṛṅgārakaruṇānyataraprakāśānuguṇavyāpārāveśena bhavati | yadāha—‘śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ | tanmayaṃ kāvyamāśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati || śṛṅgāre vipralambhākhye karaṇe ca prakarṣavat | mādhuryamātratāṃ yāti yatastatrāghikaṃ manaḥ ||’ iti | tatra śabdasya mādhuryaṃ pṛthakpadatayā vyajyate | dīrghasamāsasya yatnāntarasādhyatayā sukumārarasaprakāśasāmaprīvahirbhāvāt | tataśca śabdadūṣaṇaprastāve pṛthakpadatāmātrapratyayo yadyucyate gauḍīyā dṛṣṭā syāt, iti rītikhaṇḍanaparyavasāyitayābhidhānām | bhavati hi kadācitkaveḥ śaktivaśātsollekhe 'pi samāse rasavyaktiḥ | yathā—‘yāte dvāravatīṃ tadā madhuripau laddattasaṅgānatāṃ kālindītaṭarūḍhavañjulalatāmāliṅgya sotkaṇṭhayā | udgītaṃ gurubāṣpagadgadagalattārasvaraṃ rādhayā yenāntarjalacāribhirjalacarairapyutkamutkūjitam ||’ evaṃ cāskhalitapratītiviṣayasyaiva saṃdarbhasya rasatvaṃ padaghaṭanārūpasya ca saṃdarbhasyānirvāhādeva pratītiḥ skhalatītyāha—tadanirvyūḍhamiti | kāvyasarvasvaṃ rasaprakāśastadvedibhistadupāyabhūtaghaṭanāsvarūpavedibhiḥ | etadeva vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atreti | nakhināṃ ca nadīnāṃ ceti cakāreṇottaratra tatparityāge 'nupapattirjāgarti tadeva pratīteḥ saṃvala- nam | evamuttaratrāpi | astu tarhi vastvasattve 'pyekadiḍyādhuryasaṃpattau kāvyatāpratilambha ityata āha—amadhurārthatvācceti | spaṣṭametacchabdārthapradhānatā | mādhuryasya pūrvācāryasaṃmatyā draḍhayati—yadāheti | mādyanti ārdracittā bhavanti | madhurasādṛśyādayaṃ vyavahāra ityata āha—madhuneti | idaṃ ca ghaṭanāyā mādhurye paramaṃ rahasya-
mityāha—yayā kayāciditi | auṣṭhyakaṇṭhyādikaṃ vā tadrūpasamānaśrutikamādau yasya tathābhūtasya padasya pratyāsattiḥ | ‘tadrūpā hi’ iti pāṭhe vyakta evārthaḥ | ata eva sānuprāsā tataśca rasāvahetyarthaḥ | yadāha—‘kaṅkaṇādivimuktāpi kāntā kimapi śobhate | kuṅkumenāṅgarāgaścetsarvāṅgīṇaḥ pravartate ||’ iti ||
tadidamapuṣṭārthatvādanutkṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇamanudāraṃ niralaṃkāramācakṣate so 'yamaudāryaviparyayo nāma śabdārthapradhāno guṇaviparyayo doṣaḥ | yadāha—

yastu rīteriti | kāvyarūpatāprayojakaṃ śabdārthayorvakratā udāratā nahi vakratāmantareṇa kāvyapadavīprāptistadāha—‘yattu vakraṃ vacaḥ śāstre loke ca vaca eva tat | vakraṃ yadanurāgādau tatra kāvyamiti śrutiḥ ||’ iti | tadetadalaṃkārasāmānyamasyābhāve niralaṃkāratā bhavatītyāha—analaṃkāramiti | dīrghapuccha ityādau prakṛtodāharaṇe dvayoravakratvaṃ sphuṭayati—yatheti | vivicya guṇaprastāve kathayiṣyāmaḥ | arthapoṣamāha—utkarṣavāniti | ubhayapradhānatāmupasaṃharati—kāvyeti ||
tadevaṃ vākyadoṣāṁllakṣayitvā kramaprāptā vākyārthadoṣā lakṣaṇīyā iti tānvibhajate—

lg.l: khinnaṃ caivātimātraṃ ca paruṣaṃ virasaṃ tathā || 44 ||
taṃ brāhmaṇī pṛcchati putrakāmā rājanrumāyāṃ laśunasya ko 'rthaḥ || 50 ||’

div.p: apārthamiti | uddeśe doṣāṇāṃ vyāsenoktiḥ pūrvoktaprayojanānurodheneti | samudāyipadānāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ samudāyārthaḥ | tena śūnyaṃ padajātamapārthakaṃ padārthānāmasaṃsargeṇa padānāmasaṃsargo 'bhidhīyate | tenārthadoṣatvam | jaradgava iti | kambalapādukābhyāmiti lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā | na ca tābhyāṃ vṛddhokṣasya saṃbandhaḥ | kathaṃ ca tasya maṅgalānāṃ dhavalādīnām | ‘madrakāṇām’ iti pāṭhe gītakaviśeṣāṇāṃ vā saṃgatiḥ, kathaṃ vā putrakāmāyāstatpraśnasaṃsargaḥ, kathaṃ ca rājanniti saṃbodhanaṃ ghaṭate, putrakāmāyāśca rumālavaṇārthapraśnaḥ | rumā lavaṇākaraḥ | tathā ca prayogaḥ—‘rumādhāsakāntādilavaṇātmavara’ iti ||

atrāhiṣātāṃ dṛṣṭvetyetābhyāmeva tāviti, raghuvyāghrāvityanenaiva rāmalakṣmaṇāviti, tanumityanenaiva khāmiti, ahauṣīdityanenaiva vahnāviti, gamyata iti gatārthatvam | na ca śarabhaṅgāśramagamanaṃ tanuhomo vāgrataḥ kathāśarīropayogīti niṣprayojakatvam | ato 'yaṃ vyarthanāmā vākyasya
mahāvākyasya ca doṣo bhavati | ārthyā ca vṛttyā labdhasya śāstretihāsādau śabdavṛttyā bhaṇanamapaunaruttayāyetyarthapunarukterbhidyate ||

vyarthamiti | vijñāto vā vigato vārtho 'bhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ yasya tavdyarthaṃ svatantraṃ ca dūṣaṇamiti vaiśeṣike vaktavyam | tathā hi—āhiṣātāmiti | aṃhergatikarmaṇo luṅi rūpam | sa ca prācuryaprayogaḥ prāptyavacchinnaṃ vyāpārapracayamabhidhatte | tathā cārthasiddhāyāṃ prāptau śabdenopādānamanucitaṃ lokānusāreṇa kāvye dṛśiścākṣuṣa eva jñāne prayujyate | yathā—‘mayā tāvaddṛṣṭo na khalu kalikandarpandarpanṛpaterguṇaistulyaḥ ko 'pi kvacidapi kimaśrāvi bhavatā | iti praśnaṃ śrutvā kvaṇitamiva karṇāntikamagānmṛgākṣīṇāṃ cakṣuścaṭulabhavatā cāntataralam ||’ yathā vā—‘naivādarśi na cāśrāvi phalaṃ malayabhūruhaḥ |’ cakṣuśca prāptameva gṛhṇātītyarthalabdhāyāṃ prāptau kathaṃ śabdenopādānam | tadidamuktam—etābhyāmeveti | raghuvyāghrādiprakaraṇādikamāsādya viśeṣaparyavasāyi yaugikatvānna tu viśeṣa eva śaktam | ‘upagamya raghuvyāghraḥ kacchabhūbhāgacāriṇīm | lulubhe munidhenuṃ tāṃ velāmiva mahārṇavaḥ ||’ iti maharṣiprayogāt | etena puṣpavadādipadavadvacanamedo 'pyapāstaḥ | evaṃ ca prakaraṇādinā raghuvyāghrapadaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇaparameveti pūrvārdhe tayoreva prakrāntatvāduttarārdhe sarvanāmnā parāmarśo yujyate, na tu svaśabdena | tanuprabhṛtiśabdānāṃ saṃbandhiśabdatvātsamabhivyāhṛtaśabdārthasaṃbandhakatvaṃ loke vyutpannam | yathā—‘karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtīrvṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam |’ iti śabdāntarasaṃnidhāne tu kvacittādrūpyāvagamo bhavati | yathā—‘umāstanodbhedamanupravṛddho manoratho yaḥ prathamaṃ babhūva | tameva menāduhituḥ kathaṃcidvivāhadīkṣātilakaṃ cakāra ||’ tadihānyasyānupādānāccharabhaṅgasaṃbandhinyeva tanuḥ pratīyate | juhotiśca vahnyādhārakameva havirdravyatyāgamabhidhatte tena ‘vahnau’ ityapi na vācyam | gatārthaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe—gamyata iti | asminnevodāharaṇe niṣprayojanatvamāha—na ceti | śarabhaṅgāśramagamanaṃ tanuhomaścātra vākyārthadvayaṃ na prayojanavat | asya vākyasya caritārthatvāt | kiṃ prayojanāntaragaveṣaṇayetyata āha—ata iti | yadvākyapoṣaṇādyanaupayikapadamaprayojakavacasā prāguktaṃ tathā ca prabandhādyarthapoṣaparyavasāyi vākyameva | ihāpyavācyavacanasya sphuṭatvāt | na cāśramagamanatanuhomau kariṣyamāṇavīrarasocitakathāśarīre kāmapi śobhāmātrāmarpeyata iti vākyasya mahāvākyasya ceti yathāsaṃkhyamanvayaḥ | kathaṃ punargatārtha prasādhitasyetyāderarthapunaruktādbhidyata ityata āha—ārthyā
ceti | śabdavṛttyaivāvagatasya śabdavṛttyā punaruktam | arthaṃto labdhasya śabdavṛttyā maṇanamiṃtyekaḥ prakāraḥ | arthato lābhaṃ vyutpādayati—śāstreti | asya raghukulabhuvaḥ śarabhaṅgāśramagamanamitihāsāccakṣuṣaḥ prāptasyaiva jñānajanakatvaṃ śāstrāt | śarabhaṅgasaṃbandhinyeva tanurlokavyutpattestena niyamena hyarthataḥ prāptirbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ ||

uktyabhinnārthamiti | vākyāntaroktyābhinnastātparyārtho yasya tattathoktam | tathā hi—‘prasādhitasya-’ ityādiśloke śleṣopahitena vyatirekeṇa kāpyapūrvā kṛṣṇasya lakṣmīstatkāle babhūveti tātparyārthaḥ | tenaiva prakāreṇaṃ ‘kapāṭa-’ ityagrimaślokeṃ sa evāsti | tulyārthatva upādānaṃ bhinnārthatve 'pi | tadidamāha—anayoḥ ślokayoriti | mahāvākye ślokadvayarūpe ekam, anyataradduṣyati | heyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ ||

saṃdigdhārthamiti | śabdasvarūpaniścaye 'pi vākyārtho dolāyita ityarthadoṣatvam | tathā hi—manorathetyādau manorathe yaḥ priyo vallabhastadālokarasena lolekṣaṇe capalalocane tava māteyamārādvṛttirdūravārtinī | ato naitādṛśaṃ sānurāgāṅganājanayogyaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṣamā iti vyavasthāpanānnāvalokayituṃ śaktā tato niḥśaṅkamālokasveti
vākyārtha uteyamāradvṛttiḥ samīpadeśavartinī | ‘ārāddūrasamīpayoḥ’ | tathā cedṛśaṃ kulāṅganānucitaṃ cāritrakhaṇḍanaṃ draṣṭuṃ na kṣamā na sahiṣṇuratomānayanacāpalaṃ kāṣīṃriti | nānārthapadaprakṣepātsādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvācca saṃdihyata ityāha—atrārātpramṛtiśabdānāmiti | na ca mitho virodhinorekatra vivakṣā saṃbhavati | na cāsti prakaraṇādikamekaniyāmakaṃ | na ca mātuḥ prakopaśaṅkayā priyavilokanarasotkāyā manorathabhaṅgo na bhavatītyarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘kārāviūṇa khaüraṃ gāmaülo majjio a jimio a |

div.p: vākyaṃ yattviti | kārayitvā kṣauraṃ gāmaülo grāmapradhānapuruṣa iti deśīyāḥ | grāme 'pi vā yaḥ kuṭo 'vyutpannaḥ | majjio a susnātaśca jimio a bhuktavāṃśca tato nakṣatraṃ tithivārau ca jyautiṣikaṃ praṣṭuṃ calitaḥ | tithivārajñānāntaraṃ kṣurakarma, tataḥ snānabhojane, iti laukikaḥ kramastasya viparyāso vyakta eva śrutivacanāt | kriyamāṇe 'pi racanāvaiparītyena kramabhraṃśaḥ samādhīyata iti nāsau śabdadoṣaḥ | atra pūrvārdhopāttānāṃ kramo na viparyastaḥ kiṃtu kṣaurottarārdhoktayorityāha—atra kṣurakarmaṇa iti ||

lg.l: roaï diaro taṃ saṃṭhavei pāsseṇa vaccanto || 56 ||’

div.p: jātyādīti | vākyārtho dvividhaḥ—svataḥsaṃbhavī, kavipraụdhoktinirmitaśca | tatrāsati viśeṣahetau yajjātīyamartha budhdyā vyavasthāpya vacanopakramastajjātīyasyaiva samastavākyanirvāho yukto na tvantareṇa parityāgena bhedaḥ | upakrāntamirvāhāśakto loke khinna ityucyate | tadidamuktam—jātyādīti | ādipadena svataḥ saṃbhaviviśeṣāṇāmupamādīnāṃ kavipraụdhinirmītānāṃ ca rūpakādīnāṃ parigrahaḥ | vivāhya navavadhūḥ sāsuraaṃ śvaśuragṛhaṃ dolikayā nīyamānā roditīti svataḥsaṃbhavī | navapariṇītāsvabhāvalakṣaṇārthastāvadupakrāntastathā sati yo janmābhyastapitṛgṛhaviyogavedanādūnamānasāyā atyantāpariśīlitena devareṇa saṃsthāpanaprakāraḥ sa na jātau niviśate | pariśīlitabhartṛkulāyā kulāyāṃ vā | tasyaucityāttasyā eva hi kiṃcana vaktavyaṃ bhavatītyāha—atra prakrāntasyeti ||

yatsarvaloketi | goṣpadapramiti pūrerṇijantād ‘varṣapramāṇa ūlopaścāsyānyatarasyām’ iti ṇamul, ūlopaśca | kalikāmakarandapariṇāmasyaitāvato loke na prasiddhiḥ | na caitatkhinnameva | kalikākusumasyānupakramāt, kiṃ tu svarūpabhramāllokamaryādātiriktavṛttamupāttamiti pṛthageva doṣaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘khāhi visaṃ, pia muttaṃ, nijjasu mārīa, paḍaü de vajjam |
[khāda viṣaṃ, piba mūtraṃ, nīyasva māryā, patatu te vajram |

div.p: yattviti | ‘khāda viṣaṃ, piba mūtraṃ, nīyasva māryā, patatu te vajram’ itthaṃ mātā putramākośati | kiṃ kṛtvā | kṣighvā bhūmau nirasya | kutaḥ | dantakhaṇḍitastanī | yato bālo dantairmātuḥ stanaṃ daśatīti jātistasyāḥ punarevaṃvidhaṃ paruṣābhidhāyitvamanucitam | atipāruṣyameva cātra virasatāhetuḥ | tenātimātrādbhedaḥ ||

aprastuteti | aprastutaḥ prastāvamantareṇa sūcico raso yatra tattathā | ekarasaprakrame hi virodhirasāntaraprastāva eva kriyamāṇo naucityavān | na caucityama- ntareṇa rasasya padasaṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati | yadāha—‘anaucityādṛte nāsti rasabhaṅgasya kāraṇam | prasiddhaucityabandhastu rasasyopaniṣatparā ||’ iti | tava vanavāsa ityādau pitṛmaraṇānubhavaprāptaśokaprakarṣāyāḥ śṛṅgāraprastāvanā virasāyate | sā hi svabhāvata eva karuṇena sahaikavākyasamāveśavirodhinī | na caikasya bādhyatvamaṅgabhāvo vāvagamyate | nāpyubhayoranyaguṇībhāvo 'vagamyate | yenāyaṃ virodhaḥ samādhīyatām | yuktiratra vidagdhaiva | arthastu rasātmāvirodhena padaṃ badhnāti tataḥ kāntiviparyayādbhedaḥ | na ca karuṇoktirupakrāntā yatastadanirvāhe khedasaṃbhāvanā syāt | kiṃtu pitṛmaraṇaśucaṃ jahīhītyanena śokāviṣṭāyāṃ śṛṅgāraprastāvanā | tathā ca bhinnameva duṣṭatābījaṃ tadetatsarvamapi saṃdhāya vyācaṣṭe—atreti ||

hīnamityādi | hīnamapakṛṣṭamasajjātīyamupamānamityupamānaprasiddhā viśeṣā upameye pratibimbakalpāśca pratīyanta ityuktam | utkṛṣṭajātīyasyopameyasya hīnajātīyena sāmānyamabhidhīyamānaṃ śābdanyāyena bodhayadanucitameva bhavati | yathā—‘raṇāśvamedhe paśutāmupāgatāḥ’ iti | nanvatra rūpakabalena varṇanīyasya paśutāvagamyata iti yuktamanaucityam | kvacidagra ityādau prakṛtodāharaṇe tu katham | nahyatra prastutopaślokasya sārameyatāvagamyate agre prasaraṇamāplutya nihananaṃ ca sādṛśyamupāttamucitameveti naitat | tattvapratibimbe sādṛśyapratītirapi śabdena kriyamāṇā loke kāntiṃ prati puṣṇāti | na hi kadāpi hīnena sādṛśyoktau varṇanā sajīvā pratīyate | pratītimātraparamārthaṃ ca kāvyadarśanamiti ||

tadeveti | hīnenotkṛṣṭaṃ yathā nopamīyata iti lokamaryādā tathotkṛṣṭena hīnam | tathā hi—cakravākopamitimanusaṃdadhatāṃ viśeṣāvagatividhurāṇāṃ ca sahṛdayānāṃ pratītiḥ skhalantī janayatyeva vairasyamiti sūkṣmekṣikayā dūṣaṇam ||
atra kopānalanirdagdhamugdhamanmathaśarīrasya harasya nitambanirgatasrotasā himavadgiriṇā sahāsādṛśyādidamasaṃdṛśopamam ||

yattviti | yadyapi balavattvādinā pratīyamānaṃ himavadbhagavatorasti sādṛśyam, tathāpi vācyopamābhrameṇāyaṃ nibandhaḥ, sā ca na saṃpannā, nahi roṣeṇa vidagdhamanmathaśarīradāho vistṛtanitambanirgatagaṅgāsrotaḥpratibimbabhūtaḥ | dhāturaṅgarañjito gaṅgāpravāho 'bhimatasya bhavati lalāṭanetrāgnijvālāpratibimbamityapi na vācyam, yenāndhatvaprasaṅgāt | nitambasaṃbandhoktiśca na saṃgatā syāt | kathaṃ ca manmathaśarīradāhaḥ pratibimbāyata ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe—atreti | viśeṣaṇayorbimbapratibimbabhāvābhāve viśiṣṭayorupamānaṃ saṃbhavatīti matvā viśeṣaṇadvayamadoṣāyaiveti vyākhyātavān ||

lg.l: ‘kumudamiva mukhaṃ tasyā gauriva mahiṣaḥ śaśīva kāvyamidam |

div.p: atra kumudamukhayorgomahiṣayoḥ kāvyaśaśinośca pratīyamāne śarattaruṇyośca vidhīyamāne sādṛśye upamānopameyasyāprasiddhatvādaprasiddhopamamidam ||

aprasiddheti | kamalamukhayoriva kumudamukhayorgogavayayoriva gomahiṣayoḥ kāvyaśabdayoriva kāvyaśaśinorasti sādṛśyaṃ saurabhādikamevānupāttamapi prasiddhatayā pratīyamānam | śarattaruṇyostu na tathā prasiddhamiti vikasitapulakāṅkurā bhātītyetābhyāmupāttam | pulaka ivāṅkurā iti tatrāśayāt | viśiṣṭabhānasya ca dvayānugatatvenaiva pratīyamānatvāttathāpi pada ivālaṃkāre 'pi kavibhiraprayujyamānatvameva doṣa iti vyācaṣṭe—atreti | pratīyamāna iti | ivaśabdasya dyotakamātratvāt | abhidhīyamānaṃ vyākhyātam ||

lg.l: uluā haṇanti kāe, kāā ulue vi vāanti || 64 ||’
ulūkā dhnanti kākān, kākā ulūkānapi vāyanti ||

div.p: yaditi | vakratāvyatireke 'laṃkārasāmānyameva na syaditi niralaṃkāramityuktam | vāyanti kṣipanti khādanti | ‘vī gativyāptiprajanakāntyasanakhādaneṣu’ iti dhātvanusārāt | nanvasti kolādisvarūpamatra | tato jātyalaṃkāreṇa vakratvamākṣipyate | viśeṣasya ca sāmānyamāntarīyakatvātkathamucyate niralaṃkāramityata āha—atreti | svaṃ rūpaṃ camatkārakāri kavipratibhāmātraprakāśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ tadevālaṃkārakakṣāmadhiśete | na cātra tathā kiṃcidabhihitamato na jātyalaṃkāraḥ | evamanyo 'pyalaṃkāro nāsti | kathaṃ tarhi vakratābhāvarūpadīrghapuccha ityādeḥ śabdadoṣādbhidyate tadāha—saviśeṣaṇāditi | tatra viśeṣaṇaprayoge śabdānāmeva vakratāvyatirekeṇāpavāda iti śabdadūṣaṇamiha tu na tathā | kiṃ tūktameva svarūpaṃ na vakramiti vākyārtha eva duṣṭaḥ ||

atrodyatasya paraṃ hantumiti saṃbhogārambhaviṣayā, stabdhasya vivaraiṣiṇa iti varāṅgaviṣayā, patanaṃ jāyate 'vaśyamiti retovisargaviṣayā, kṛcchreṇa punarunnatiriti naṣṭarāgapratyānayanaviṣayā aślīlavākyārthaviṣayā pratītirbhavati ||

aślīlamiti | udyatasyeti | paramanyaṃ hantumudyatasya vivaraiṣiṇa iti pramādakṛtāvadhānasya stabdhasyātmanyutkarṣābhidhānenānyānavadhīrayataḥ patanamāvaśyakamudgamaḥ kṛcchrāditi saṃsargo 'bhimataḥ | eṣāmeva padārthānāṃ saṃsargāntaramaślīlamevetyāha—atrodyatasyeti | etena padadoṣādbheda uktaḥ ||
deśakālādeḥ kāvyāṅgatvāttadvirodhenārtho duṣṭaḥ | virodhaśca bādhaḥ | sa pramāṇenaiva tato lokādivirodhasyālaṃkārasamayasiddhasya pramāṇavirodhaparyavasāyitvaṃ vivakṣannāha—
atra surāṣṭreṣu mathurā nāsti | tatparyantādibhūmiṣu cākṣoṭanārikerāṇāmabhāvāt | deśe 'drivanarāṣṭrādirityayaṃ deśakṛtaḥ pratyakṣavirodhaḥ ||

viruddhamiti | tatra deśakālādau pratyakṣata eva varṇyamānasyābhāvo niścīyate iti deśādivirodhaḥ pratyakṣavirodhaḥ | śūraseneṣu mathurā na surāṣṭreṣu | tatparyantabhūmiṣvakṣoṭā nālikerā vā na saṃbhavanti | adrīṇāṃ kathaṃ deśatvamityata āha—deśo 'drivanarāṣṭrādiriti ||
atra padminyā naktaṃ kumudvatyā ahni madhau niculānāmunnidratvādyabhāvānnidāghasya cāmeghadurdinatvāt | kālo naktaṃ dinartava iti kālakṛto 'yaṃ pratyakṣavirodhaḥ ||

padminīti | naktaṃ rātrau | madhurvasantaḥ | niculā hijjalāḥ | te varṣāsu puṣpyanti na vasante | yadyapi kālasvarūpamapratyakṣaṃ tathāpi tadupādhīnāṃ vyavahārāṅgateva pratyakṣatā cetyāha—kālo naktaṃ dinartava iti ||
atra hastihayairaṇḍakhadirāṇāṃ kesarādisadbhāvasya pratyakṣeṇānupalambhāt | jaṅgamasthāvaro loka iti lokakṛto 'yaṃ pratyakṣavirodhaḥ ||

ādhūteti | ante pratyakṣavirodhaśabdārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe—pratyakṣeṇānupalambhāditi | kathamayaṃ laukikavirodha ityata āha—jaṅgameti | jaṅgamasthāvaraṃ jīvaccharīraṃ lokaḥ | tatra jaṅgamaṃ gāvāśvādi sthāvaraṃ latāvṛkṣādi rāṣṭrādāveva deśaparibhāṣā idaṃ prakārāntareṇa deśaśabdenābhidhīyate ||

yuktīti | sāmānyatastāvadanumānavirodho yatpramāṇābhāvaḥ | nahi prameyābhāve pramāṇaṃ prasiddham | tadayamartho yuktiḥ pramāṇam | ādhūtakesaretyādau udāharaṇe kvacideva vyaktiviśeṣe kesarādisaṃbandhapratipādanaṃ kathamanyathā teṣāmeraṇḍaṃ nirdiśati | tato bhavati pratyakṣeṇaiva virodhaḥ | iha tu na tathā | nahi viśeṣataḥ kāpi kūrmapṛṣṭhavyaktirastīti sāmānyākāreṇa vivakṣitam | tataśca kamalajāteḥ paṅkajaprabhavāyā eva niścayātkūrmapṛṣṭhādudgame na kaścitpramāṇaṃ kadāpi kasyāpyavataratītyāśayavān vyācaṣṭe—atreti | ayuktiyuktatvāditi | yukteḥ pramāṇatvenāsaṃbaddhatvādityarthaḥ ||

aucityaviruddhamiti | aucityaṃ yogyatā tasya parābhṛśyamānasya vivakṣitaviparītaparyavasānamanyo 'numānavirodhaḥ | tathā hi—paṭṭāṃśukottarīyeṇa pāmaraḥ pāmaryā proñchati | atigurukakūrakumbhībhareṇa svedārdritaṃ vadanamityatra pūrvavatsaṃbandhagrāhakapramāṇābhāvaḥ | kadācidrājaprasādādinā tathā saṃbhavāt | kiṃ tu pāmaraucityapratisaṃdhāne paṭṭāṃśukāvaguṇṭhanamanucitam | vidagdhanepathyaparigrahādināgaravṛttāparicaya eva pāmaratvam | tataścāyamartho bhavati—paṭṭāṃśukasaṃbandhāyogyeyaṃ pāmaratvāditi | kūraṃ bhaktam | kumbhī kalaśī ||
atra svayaṃ vaktureva ‘yāvajjīvamahaṃ maunī’ ityādipadānāmuktayā pratijñāvirodhātpratijñāviruddhamidam ||

pratijñāviruddhamiti | abhyupagamavākyaṃ pratijñā | yathā—‘yadyadādiśati svāmī tatkaromyavicārayan’ iti | sādhyanirdeśaśca—‘ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ | nābhyūrujaghanasparśī nīvīvisraṃsanaḥ karaḥ ||’ iti | dvayamapi pratijñāpadenābhimatam | tatrādye ‘yāvajjīvamahaṃ maunī’ ityudāharaṇam | avyāhāro maunam | tadabhyupagamavākyenaiva bodhyate | tathā hi—nāyaṃ maunī vacanavattvādityabhyupagamya maunābhāvaparyavasannamiti tṛtīyo 'yamanumānavirodhaḥ | dvitīyapakṣakakṣīkaraṇena caturthodāharaṇe ‘brahmacārī ca me pitā, mātā ca mama vandhyā’ iti vaktā yasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ sa pitṛpadenābhimato na ca tasya brahmacāritvaṃ saṃbhavati | mātā jananyevābhidhīyate na ca tasyā vandhyātvaṃ saṃbhavati | parasparavyāghāto virodhaḥ | ayaṃ ca pañcamaprakāro yadvyāpakadvārā virodhaḥ | yathā—smarābho 'nupama iti | nahi smarābhatvaṃ loke prasiddhaṃ kitu smaratulyatāṃ vadan sopamānatvamabhyupagacchati | taccānupamatvena viruddham | tato vyāpakavirodho 'yam | yathā—vahniranuṣṇa iti | ādigrahaṇāddṛṣṭāntadvārako 'numānavirodhaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ ||
dharmārtheti | vedādhyayanānadhikārāditi | ‘akṛtavratabandhe tu gurāvuparate sati | nābhivyāhārayed brahma svadhāninayanādṛte ||’ iti dharmaśāsram ||

kāmeti | atra mahījayasyeti | mahījayasya dharmaḥ phalamiti nītiśāsre sthitam | ahaṃkāro mānaḥ sa na śatruvijaye sādhanam | ariṣaṅvargatyāge hīndriyajayaḥ | tathā vijigīṣutā | tayā ca śatruparibhava iti | yadāha—sa raghurāṣṭro vilalāsa ityupakramya kauṭilyācāryaḥ mānādrāvaṇaḥ paradārānaprayacchan duryodhano rājyāṃśaṃ ceti ||
atrottaroṣṭhe daśanāṅkasya kāmaśāsrakārairananujñānātkāmaśāsravirodhaḥ | bhinnagrāmāṇāṃ ca pūrṇasaptasvaratvānupapatteḥ | kalāvirodhe 'pi tadaṃśatvātkāmaśāsravirodha eva ||

taveti | atrottaroṣṭha ityuparitana oṣṭha uttaroṣṭhamantaramukhaṃ nayanāntaṃ ca muktvā
cumbanavaddaśanacchedyasthānānīti kāmasūtram | bhinnagrāmarāgāṇāmiti | bhinnamārgeṣu saptasvarāṇāṃ samavāyo nopanibaddhaḥ | tathā ca ‘prāṃśustu dhaivatanyāsaḥ pañcamarṣabhavarjitaḥ | ṣaḍjo dīvyatāṃ jā(yā)to bhinnaṣaḍja udāhṛtaḥ' | tamaṅgo 'pyāha—‘ṣāḍavauḍavike jātī bhinnagrāma udāhṛtaḥ’ iti | tataśca ṣaḍvā pañca vā svarā bhavanti bhinnagrāme na tu sapta | kāmaśāsravirodhaprastāve kathaṃ kalāvirodha udāhriyata ityata āha—tadaṃśatvāditi | gītādikalācatuḥṣaṣṭeḥ kāmāṅgatayā kāmasūtrakārairupadeśādbhavati tadvirodhe kāmaśāsravirodha ityarthaḥ | ādigrahaṇāddevatābhaktito muktirna tattvajñānasaṃpadetyādikaṃ mokṣādiśāstraviruddhamudāharaṇīyam ||

lg.l: evaṃ padānāṃ vākyānāṃ vākyārthānāṃ ca yaḥ kaviḥ |
vaiśeṣikāstu te nūnaṃ doṣatve 'pi hi ye guṇāḥ || 61 ||

div.p: atra bhinnānāmapi padānāmekāpadatāpratibhāsahetutvena saṃdarbhasya suśliṣṭatvādayaṃ śleṣo nāma śabdaguṇaḥ ||

evamiti | tadevaṃ doṣalakṣaṇe vṛtte kramaprāptā guṇā lakṣayitavyāḥ | tadevamojaḥ prasādādayo guṇāḥ | yamakādayastvalaṃkārā iti pūrvaprasiddhau satyāṃ vicāryate | kimeṣāṃ mitho bhedanibandhanam, kathaṃ cālaṃkārebhyo guṇānāṃ pūrvanipātaḥ, rasasya hi doṣābhāvāditrayasaṃskṛta eva padalābha ityasti paścādbhāve nibandhanamiti tatrāha—alaṃkṛtamapīti | rasāvalambino guṇāḥ, śabdārthāvalambinastvalaṃkārā iti kāśmīrakāḥ | tadagamakam | tathā hi—yadi kāvyasya rasapradhānātmakatāmāśrityāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ, alaṃkārā api tarhi tatpravaṇā eva | atha nāyaṃ niyamo yatsarvatra rasaḥ pradhānamiti, tadātra guṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tadālambananiyamaḥ | kiṃ cātra prasādādivat śleṣādayo 'pi śabdārthagatā eva pratyabhijñāyante tatkathamayaṃ vibhāgaḥ | yadyapi śabdārthā jñāyante, tathāpi rasapravaṇā iti cet | kimidaṃ rasapravaṇatvaṃ, rasāśritatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavatyeva | rasapratītiparyavasānaṃ ca yathākathaṃcidalaṃkāreṣvapi tulyamityavicāritaramaṇīyo 'yaṃ mārgaḥ | lokaśāstravacanātigāmī kaścidviśeṣaḥ śobhāpadābhilapyo bhavannasmiñśravyaśabdaḥ śabdārśau viṣayīkaroti | tataśca tathābhūtaśobhāniṣpattihetavo guṇāstadutkarṣahetavastklaṃkārāḥ | yadāha—‘kāvyaśobhāyāḥ kartāro dharmā guṇāstadatiśayahetavastvalaṃkārāḥ’ ityanye, tadapi na | asya rasādivadavyāpteḥ | nahi teṣāṃ rītiśarīrāntarniveśaḥ kaiścidabhyupagamyate, tasmādālaṃkārikasamayānupātī śleṣādyanyatamo guṇaḥ | jātyādyanyatamaścālaṃkāra iti vibhāgaḥ | tata eva ca śobhākāritvena guṇānāmapyalaṃkārapakṣanikṣepaṃ kariṣyati | udbhūtaguṇaṃ tu sphuṭālaṃkārahīnamapi camatkāramāvahatyeva | yathā—‘kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te | ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti ||’ yato guṇayogo mukhyastataḥ prathamamuddiṣṭo lakṣitaścaiṣaḥ | sāmānyaguṇasthitau guṇā-
nvibhajate—trividhāśceti | śabdaḥ śarīrasthānīyo 'dhiṣṭheyatayā prathamapratisaṃdheyatayā ca bāhyaḥ | tatastadāśritā guṇā api bāhyāḥ | arthastvātmatulyo 'dhiṣṭhāyakatayā paścādgrahyatayā cāntarastena tadāśritā guṇā apyāntarāḥ | athedānīṃ yeṣāmagre doṣatvaṃ tato guṇabhāvaḥ | kecidviśeṣamāsādyante vaiśeṣikāḥ | pūrvaṃ doṣā api viśeṣayogena guṇībhavantītyabhiprāyāt | ‘mādhuryaujaḥprasādāstraya eva guṇāḥ’ iti dhvanikārasya mataṃ nirasyati—caturviṃśatiriti | parasparasaṃkīrṇatvādupādhīnāmiti bhāvaḥ | na caitadasmākaṃ manīṣāmātreṇa kalpanamityāha—ākhyātā iti | niṣṭhāpratyayenedaṃprathamatā dyotyate | uktaviśeṣādeva śabdaguṇānāṃ pūrvabhāva ityāha—teṣviti | abhidhānaṃ dvividhaṃ vibhāgataḥ, lakṣaṇataścetyāha—nāmalakṣaṇayogata iti | padaghaṭanavyavasthitau guṇāntaragaveṣaṇam | ataḥ prathamaṃ śleṣalakṣaṇamāha—tatreti | śliṣṭāni ghaṭitāni padāni yatra tasya bhāvastattā | na ca ghaṭanāmātrasya guṇabhāva iti śaṅkyam | supadaṃ śobhanā ghaṭanetyarthaḥ | śobhanatvaṃ ghaṭanāyā masṛṇatvamekatāpratibhānasāmarthyaṃ yadbrahmaṃ sūtramuraḥsthala iti | bījaṃ cātra śrutyanuprāsavattvamalakṣitasaṃdhitā ca | tathā hi prakṛtodāharaṇe ubhāvityukārabhakārāvoṣṭhyau | yadi ‘vya’ ityādyantau vakārayakārau tālavyau | na cāyaṃ varṇānuprāsaḥ | īṣatspṛṣṭatvādibhedāt | madhye dakāravakārau dantyoṣṭhyau | ‘mni’ ityatra makāro bhakāreṇa, nakāro dakāreṇa samānaśrutika ityādi boddhavyam | tathā ‘pṛthakpravāhau’ iti kakārasya pavargagamanaikatā pratibhāsate, ‘pravāhāvākāśa’ ityaukārasyāvādeśena varṇāntaraniṣpattyā | evaṃ ‘payasaḥ patetām’ ityādāvunneyam | pṛthagiti pārśvadvaye | tena vakṣaḥsthaladakṣiṇavāmabhāgayorlambamāno dvisaro hāra iti labhyate | asya vakṣa iti | atrāsyeti padena nānyasya hāra itthamanupamo na cānyasya vakṣaḥsthalamākāśavadunnatavistīrṇamiti bhagavataḥ sakalajagadvilakṣaṇatvadhvanirityārādhyāḥ ||

prasiddhārtheti | asyārthaḥ prāgeva vivṛtaḥ | prasādo dvidhā—vācyaviṣayaḥ, pratīyamānaviṣayaśca | tatra pratīyamānaviṣayo yathā—‘evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituradhomukhī | līlākamalapatrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī ||’ atra śrutāvagatādeva vākyāllajjādayo hastadattā iva prakāśante || vākyaviṣayo dvidhā bhavati | grāmyaireva grāmya upanāgarairvā, padaiḥ saṃdarbhanirvāhe | ādyo yathā—‘candre kalaṅkaḥ sujane daridratā vikāśalakṣmīḥ kamaleṣu cañcalā | mukhāprasādaḥ sadhaneṣu sarvadā yaśo vidhātuḥ kathayanti khaṇḍitam ||’ dvitīyamudāharati—gāhantāmiti | atra prathamapāde gāhantāṃ mahiṣā iti grāmyam | nipānasalilamityupanāgaram | śṛṅgairiti grāmyam | muhurityupanāgaram | tāḍitamiti grāmyam | dvitīyapāde kadambakaromanthaśabdāvupanāgarau śeṣāṇi grāmyāṇi | evaṃ ca caramayorapi svato vivecanīyam | gāhanaṃ viloḍanaṃ tanniḥśaṅkameva bhavatīti visrambhadhvaniḥ | ata eva trāsābhāvātprakṛtipratyāpattau | śṛṅgābhyāṃ paryāyeṇa jalatāḍanaṃ mahiṣajātiḥ | chāyāśrayaṇaṃ yūthabandhaśca mṛgajātiḥ | ciraparasparavārtānabhijñānāddivā niṣpalāyanena romantho 'paricita ivāsīttasyedānīṃ śikṣākrameṇa yadi paricayaḥ syādityabhyasyatviti dhvaniḥ | varāhapatibhiriti na yādṛśatādṛśānāmasmanmṛgayāsaṃrambhagocaratvamiti prakāśyate | nanu cātra kartṛprakramabhedo dūṣaṇaṃ kasmānna bhavati | naitat | āpātaśauṇḍeṣu pariṇatibhīruṣu ca mahiṣeṣu svabhāvabhīteṣu mṛgeṣu na tathāyaṃ saṃrambhate yathā punarāvṛtticatureṣu prakārakovideṣu ca varāheṣu | tataśca teṣāmucitakriyāsu kartṛtāmātrameva na soḍhavāniti sāṃprataṃ kartṛtābhyanujñānena vyajyate | tatastṛtīyāyāmaucityaniveśinyāṃ prakramabhedo 'pyucita eveti vyaktivivekakārādīnāmapi saṃmataḥ panthāḥ | idaṃ ceti cakāreṇa cedasmaddhanurārūḍhamavatīrṇaṃ vā tadaiva saṃrambhagocarāṇāṃ bhayavisrambhāviti kopaprakarṣaḥ | ata evāsmaditi bahuvacanaṃ sajīvam ||

yaditi | pratītyantena mārgo vyākhyātaḥ | avaiṣamyeṇa bhaṇanamityanena vāgbhedaḥ svareṣu hrasvāntyāḥ, vyañjaneṣu vargāntyā dantyāśca mṛdavaḥ komalā varṇāḥ | dīrghāḥ svarāḥ vyañjaneṣu ṇakāravarjaṭavargarephaśaṣahā adantyasaṃyogāśca prasphuṭāḥ | śeṣāṇi vyañjanāni dantyasaṃyogāśconmiśramadhyamā varṇāsteṣāmanyatamairvarṇairyo bandhanavidhistaṃ prati yadavaiṣamyeṇa upakramanirvāhādinā karaṇena bhaṇanamuktiḥ sā samatā | na ceyaṃ doṣābhāvamātramekajātīyavarṇaparicayaprabandhapraveśanirvāhāṇāṃ siddhiḥ śaktivyutpattirūpatayā pradhānotkarṣaparyavasānāt | na ca doṣābhāvasyaivaṃrūpatā kenacitpratiṣiddhā | ata eva śleṣaprasādayorapi guṇabhāvaḥ siddhaḥ | nanu ‘raktāśokakṛśodarī kva nu gatā tyaktvānuraktaṃ janaṃ no dṛṣṭeti mudhaiva cālayasi kiṃ vātābhibhūtaṃ śiraḥ | utkaṇṭhāghaṭamānaṣaṭpadaghaṭāsaṃghaṭṭadaṣṭacchadastatpādāhatimantareṇa bhavataḥ puṣpodgabho 'yaṃ kutaḥ ||’ ityatra vaiṣamyaṃ doṣa eva syāt | na hyatra muktasthāne sphuṭatā | tasmādyatkiṃcidetat | tadevaṃ nirvāhyatraividhyātsamatā trirūpā bhavati grāmyā paruṣā upanāgarikā ca | tatronmiśraprāyasaṃdarbhanirvāhe grāmyā | yathā—‘puraḥ pāṇḍucchāyaṃ tadanu kapilimnā kṛtapadaṃ tataḥ pākodrekādaruṇaguṇasaṃvardhitavapuḥ | śanaiḥ kośārambhe sthapuṭanijaviṣkambhaviṣame vane pītāmodaṃ vadaramarasatvaṃ kalayati ||’ paruṣā yathā—yaccandreti | bālendumayūkhamukulajālaniculitāsu parameśvarajaṭāvallarīpu bhramaṇādhyāsādivādyāpi himādrikuñjeṣu jhāṅkārigaṅgāmbha iti pratīyamānotprekṣā | upanāgarikā yathā—‘vasane paridhūsare vasānā niyamakṣāmamukhī dhṛtaikaveṇiḥ | atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghāṃ virahavyathāṃ vyanakti ||’ atrāsmatsahādhyāyinaḥ pūrvārdhamevopanāgarikodāharaṇaṃ manyante | uttarārdhe hi viṣketyādivarṇaniveśanādunmiśratvameva | iyamaparonmiśrā saṃdarbhajātiryatkomalakaṭhoravarṇatulyatayā nirvahaṇamiti ||

yā pṛthagiti | pṛthagiva padāni yatra bhāsante sa pṛthakpadaḥ saṃdarbha ityupamāgarbho bahuvrīhiśca | tasya bhāvastattā | mādhuryamuktasvarūpaṃ tacchabdagataṃ pṛthakpadatayāvicchidyata iti | tadeva mādhuryayuktam | aucityena hi samāsavyatireka ākṛṣyate kadācidanuddhato vā samāsaḥ | anuddhatiranullekhaḥ | taduktam—‘avṛttirmaghyavṛttirvā mādhurye ghaṭanā tathā’ iti | ata eva ‘samāsanivṛttiparametat’ iti vāmanaḥ | kaścitsamāso rasaucityenākṛṣṭaḥ paribhāvyamāno manīṣibhiścamatkārakāraṇaṃ bhavati | yathā—‘teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāṃ kṣemaṃ tatra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāveśmanām | vicchinne smaratalpakalpanamṛducchedopayoge 'dhunā te nūnaṃ jaraṭhībhavanti vigalannīlatviṣaḥ pallavāḥ ||’ atra tacchabdo yeṣāṃ vilāsasaṃpattisvabhāvalabdhaprakarṣāṇāmanubhava eva sākṣīti viśeṣaprādhānyavivakṣayā nasamāsenānigamanāt | na yā kāpi vadhūḥ, api tu gopasaṃbandhinī kṛtagopācāracāturīparādhīnā | nānyatra nīrasaprāye kvacana sauhārdaṃ kiṃ tu vilāsa eva | so 'pi na yaḥkaścit, api tu gopavadhūsaṃbandhītyevaṃ bahūnāṃ piṇḍībhāvavivakṣayā samāsa evocitaḥ | etāvataivācchedo 'pyucita eva | sarvasvāyamānatvāttatsaṃbandhajanitasya viśeṣasya pṛthagevoktirucitā | rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāmityatrāpi samāsaḥ pūrvavat | yadyapi rādhāsaṃbandhasya vaivakṣikaṃ prādhānyamiti na samāsaḥ pratibhāsate tathāpi yadanyasya rādhārahasi niveśaḥ kṣama iti bhāvayansuhṛdāmityapahāya sākṣiṇāmityuktavān | sākṣī hi taṭastha eva vyāpriyate | tenāvaśyakartavyasākṣitāprādhānyavivakṣayā saṃbhavati virodhādityavaseyam | sthitā iti | pakṣmāvasthāne 'dharatāḍane stanataṭanipāte valibhaṅgaskhalane nābhinimnapnāptau jalabindūnāṃ kartṛtānirdeśātsvācchandyamunmīlitam | tathā ca—gauryā bāhyasaṃvedanābhāvastena bhagavadgato 'nurāgaprakarṣaḥ prathamapādena | nidāghatāpacchidā rajoharaṇena vasuṃdharā saurabhonmīlanena mayūrakekāyitādinā tribhuvanasyāpi
ye camatkārāspadamiti dhvanitam | tathābhūtānāmatha saṃvedane pūrva evābhiprāyaḥ | tāḍitetyākāreṇa cchedonmeṣaḥ payodharetyādāvokāraḥ | dhakāratakārau ||

aniṣṭhureti | samasta eva gumphe dvitrāṇi tricaturāṇi prasphuṭānyakṣarāṇi niveśyante sa kilāntarāntaropadaṃśanyāyena citrāsvādaparyavasāyī sukumāra iti prācāṃ matam | ata eva samatāyā bhedaḥ | bhṛdvīkāpākaḥ punaranyādṛśo vakṣyate | aniṣṭhure sukumāravyavahāro loke dṛṣṭaḥ | maṇḍalīkṛtyetyādau prathamapāde maṇḍeti, kṛtyeti, barheti atra saṃyogatrayam | dvitīyapāde ṇṭheti, rmeti ca saṃyogadvayamupanyasya gītidīrghasvaraniveśo rūpāntaramādāya viśeṣaśobhāhetuḥ | tṛtīyapāde keti na iti pranṛtyantīti ca dīrghavisargasaṃyogā iti vyantaram | caturthapāde dīrghasvarā evāntarāntareti saiva vāsanā | nanu aniṣṭhurākṣaramayatvaṃ sukumārateti vaktavye prāyaśabdaḥ kena prayojanenetyata āha—atreti | na cāyamarthaguṇaḥ sa hi vākyārthe dharmiṇi nirūpyate | ayaṃ tu padasamudāya iti yuktaṃ śabdaguṇeṣu pariṃgaṇanam | saṃmitatvamanyathā bhaviṣyati ||

vāgarthāviveti | atra vande ityuttamapuruṣavacanenaivāhamiti prāptam ‘asmadyuttamaḥ’ ityatra sthāninītyabhidhānāt | kimiti karmāpekṣāyāṃ pārvatīparameśvarāviti | tāvapi
kiṃbhūtāvityato jagataḥ pitarāviti | tena lakṣmīnārāyaṇādivaidharmyeṇa namaskāryatvam | ekaśeṣaśabdenaiva mātṛśabdārthaḥ | strīpuṃsayorityaucityādvāgarthāviveti | kimarthaṃ namaskuruta ityatra vāgarthapratipattaye iti | tadevaṃ yādṛśo yāvāṃśca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaprakāro 'bhimataḥ sa sarva eva vāgityādyupāttaśabdasamudāyamātreṇa niṣpratyūhamavagamyata ityarthavyaktiśabdārthavyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atreti | arthasamarpakatvādityanena śabdaguṇatā vyaktīkṛtā ||

l.seg: na sāle sālambo lavamapi lavaṅge na ramate |
priyaṅgau nāsaṅgaṃ racayati na cūte vicarati

div.p: atra bandhasya chāyāvatvenaujjvalyaṃ tadeva ca kāntirucyate ||

yadujjvalatvamiti | kiṃ punaridamujjvalatvaṃ nāma | kecidāhuranuprāsabahutvamiti, tadasat—‘tasyāḥ susrāva netrābhyāṃ vāri praṇayakopajam | kuśeśayapalāśābhyāmavaśyāyajalaṃ yathā ||’ ityādāvanuprāsabahulatā saṃbhavati | evaṃvidhaṃ hi purāṇacchāyamāmananti | kāntiviparyayaḥ purāṇī chāyā | yathā—‘vrajati gaganaṃ bhallātakyā dalena sahopamām’ iti | ata evāha—‘purāṇacitrasthānīyaṃ tena vandhyaṃ kavervacaḥ’ iti | tasmādaprahatapadairārambhaḥ saṃdarbhasyaiva kāntiḥ | tadyathā—kusumasya dhanuriti prahatam | kausumamityaprahatam | jalanidhāviti prahatam | adhijaladhītyaprahatam | gurutvamiti prahatam | gauravamityaprahatamityādi | ata eva prahataśaṅkā | camatkāritvaṃ tu sahṛdāhlādakatvamasti hi tulye 'pi vācakatve padānāṃ kaścidavāntaro viśeṣo yamadhikṛtya kiṃcideva prayuñjate mahākavayo na tu sarvam | yathā—pallava iti vaktavye kisalayamiti | strīti vaktavye kānteti | kamalamiti vaktavye rājīvamityādi | etadeva mahākavibhirupeyate | ‘katte maṇāma iccaṃ saccaṃ kavie samaṃ samaggesu |... sīmaṭheuṇa musmitammi saccaṇa vañcea ||’ kāntavarṇānuprāso 'pi kānta eva bhavatīti matvānuprāsotkaṭamudāharati—nirānanda iti | asti kunde madhu paraṃ na kamala-
