sajātīyamityāsakto nānandamalabhata | kundasyeti prahatam, kaundamityaprahatam | bālatve bakulakusumānāṃ na madhuprādurbhāva iti etatkāle ratiṃ na prāptavāniti vidhura ityanena vyajyate | kālāntare 'pi sāle madhuno 'saṃbhavādālambaḥ pratyāśāmātrabandho 'pi na tasyāsīt | āmodaprakarṣādantaḥ kṣaṇaṃ nipatya rasamanāsādayaṃllavaṅgamanusaratīti lavamityanena dhvanyate | evamuttarārdhe 'pi padasvaraso gaveṣaṇīyaḥ | uktameva viśeṣamamisaṃdhāya vyācaṣṭe—atreti | chāyaujjvalyaṃ kāntirityekārthatayā loke prasiddhaṃ tadiha yathā śabdeṣu saṃgacchate tathā pūrvācāryaprasiddhayā vivecanīyamityabhiprāyaḥ ||

l.seg: khaṃ vyālẹdhi viceṣṭate kṣititale kuñjodare līyate |
kiṃ tadyanna karoti mārutavaśaṃ yātaḥ kṛśānurvane || 82 ||’

div.p: atra vikaṭākṣarabandhatve nṛtyadbhiriva padairyadvākyaracanā sā udāratā ||

vikaṭeti | vikaṭairakṣarairbandho yasya tasya bhāvastattvam | asti tāvannṛtyantīva padānīti sahṛdayānāṃ kvacidarthe vyavahāraḥ | sa ca na nirviṣayo nāpyasya viśeṣa iti tatpramāṇakameva guṇāntaramavasthitamiti kaścivdyācaṣṭe | tathā tu na kathaṃcittsvarūpamudbhidya darśitaṃ bhavati | anye tu visargānuprāsādigranthilatvamanenābhimatamityāhuḥ | tadapi na | aurjityābahirbhāvaprasaṅgāt | tasmādidamatra vācyam—vikaṭāni viśālāni | prabhūtānīti yāvat | tathābhūtānyakṣarāṇi dīrghānusvārādirūpāṇi sahṛdayasaṃvedanīyāni | ata eva nṛtyatulyatā | yathā hi—nṛtyeṅgānāmaṅgulyādīnāmākuncanaprasāraṇakrameṇa rañjakatvaṃ tathātrāpi | tathāhi—ārohatītyādau prathamapāde ākārokārābhyāṃ prasāraḥ | hatyaveti saṃkocaḥ | nīruha itīkāravisargābhyāṃ prasaraṇam | nagaiḥ spardhata iti visargasaṃdhyakṣarairvikāśaḥ | dvitīyapāde 'pi prasāraṇenopakramyata iti naiva nirvahaṇamantarāntaravarohakramo bhavati | na cātra yatīnāṃ saṃniveśo 'bhimataḥ | mārutavaśaṃ yāta ityanenonmādarogagṛhīta iti śabdamūlānusvāna-
(sāra)balenāvagamyate | unmādagṛhīto 'pi vṛkṣārohaṇādikamasamañjasamavyavasthitaṃ ca karoti | vana ityanena yatra sarvathaiva pratīkārāsaṃbhava iti niraṅkuśonmādaceṣṭitamevopabṛṃhayati | nagaiḥ spardhate parvatocchrāyamanukarotīti dūraprasṛta unmādaḥ | khaṃ vyālẹdhītyatrāpi tathaivābhiprāyaḥ | kiṃ tadyaditi na śakyaṃte gaṇayitu munmādaceṣṭitānīti prakāśantetyeti granthilāvicchedāt | prasāraṇasya paryavasānaṃ śvetyanena praviśatītisaṃkocaḥ | ata eva parasmaipadayornirantaramāvāpaḥ kāntiviśeṣakaratvādupādeya eva bhavatīti ||

ślāghyairiti | utkarṣavānudātto loke prasiddhaḥ | bahūnāṃ madhye yaḥ ślāghate sa utkarṣavān | tena ślāghyatvamudāttalakṣaṇam | tadiha kāvye vākyārthapoṣādhāyakatayā sahṛdayahṛdayāvarjanakṣamatvena ślāghāviṣayatve viśeṣyatvaṃ ca vākyārtho 'tastadviśeṣaṇapadeṣu yathoktarūpa utkarṣo 'bhimato 'nudāraścāyaṃ guṇa iti svarūpaviśeṣakṛtātkāntiśarīrāntargatāccamatkāritvādbhidyate | nacātra muhatirabhimateti naikamapi kāntirūpamasti | ata eva purāṇacchāyamudāharati—śrutveti | śrutimātreṇeyaṃ daśā darśane tu na jñāyate kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti | yamiti | na hyanyasya śrutamātrasya tādṛśaprabhāvasaṃbhāvanā | sahaseti yāvatkrīḍāsahacarāṇāṃ dhavalagṛhādīnāmapi ca premānurūpamāpṛcchyate tāvānapi samayo na labdha iti dhvanyate | āgatamiti niṣṭhāpratyayena cedicchati siddhamevāgamanamiti dyotayati—nijeti | yasyānyena dharṣaṇaṃ svapne 'pi na buddhiviṣaya āsīt | sopadravasyāpi yasya na tyāgaḥ kadāpi kathaṃcidabhūditi vyajyate | nirgacchatāmiti hṛdayavamukhyena punaḥ punaravatiṣṭhamānānāmasaṃbhavadrūpaṃ nirgamanamiti
dyotyate | śatrūṇāmiti bahuvacanena yadaikāvaskandamuddiśyāyaṃ pracalati tadā sarveṣāmiyaṃ daśā bhavatīti pratyāyyate | ata evāsamāsaḥ sajīvaḥ | viyogavedanādūnamānasānāmudgato 'pi bāṣpasrāvādantareva vicchidyata iti lavapadena dhvanyate | punaḥ samāgamāśaṃsanaśīlānāmamaṅgalabhiyā bāṣpastambho lavapadarahasyamityeke manyante | anyasya bāṣpasya nirgamanānupapattau puṭayorārdrabhāvamātram | śubhra iti yatra candrātapena pallavitāḥ kāntayaḥ kṣaṇadāvilāsavihāreṣu kāmapi rasamātrāmutkarṣayantīti vyanakti | tadanantarameva vyāpyāmityāha—navāmbhoruhīti | pūrvavatsaṃbhogodgāraḥ | saśādvala ityanena ratikutūhalotkaṇṭhitānāmadriśṛṅgārohaṇaśrāntānāṃ tadevāstaraṇamiti prakaṭīkriyate | vivalitagrīvatayā ca pabhdyāṃ palāyanameva na tu śarīravalanamapīti | śṛṅgārādbhayānaka eva rasaḥ sthāyīti dhvanitam | tadetatsarvamabhipretyāha—atreti ||

oja iti | vaipulyavṛttairbahuśabdasyeyasuni bhūya iti rūpam | tathā ca samāsasya bhūyastvaṃ vaipulyavikaṭatvamiti yāvat | na caivaṃ gauḍīyā rītireveyamiti vācyam | kvacitsamāsabhūyastāmātrasyaivaucitīvaśena viśeṣaśobhāvahatvāt | yathā—‘vādyanti diggajagaṇḍakaṣaṇairbhagnasrastā’ iti | na ca samāsābhāvo nocitaḥ | nahyeka eva samāso rūpabhedamādāya guṇatvamanalaṃkāratvaṃ ca prayojayatīti kimanupapannam | evaṃ prakṛtodāharaṇe 'pi | tathā hi—pariṇatāḥ pariṇāmaṃ gatāḥ | bahūnāṃ kalpānāṃ brahmāṇa iti caturṇāṃ padārthānāṃ piṇḍatve catvāripadāni samabahuvrīhirụ̄dhibhirbhujagarajjubhiriti granthidṛḍhatābodhanāya rūpakam | ata eva nivītyupasargastātparyavān | sadyo viracitanutītyanena kapālānāmasādhāraṇo vyāpāraḥ | bandho hi brāhmarūpastālvādikamantareṇa na niṣpadyate | jīvanānantarameva trāsāveśātstutirūpa eva vrahma-
ghoṣaṃ udacaraditi bhagavatastrailokyagrahe niraṅkuśaprabhāvaḥ sadyaḥpadena sūcyate | athavā cedāgamānāmātmalābhānantarameva parameśvarastutirūpatātparyāvasānamiti sarvasyā api śruteḥ parameśvarapravaṇatvamananyasādhāraṇabhaktiprahvatāṃ ca kavirabhipraiti | purārerityanena saṃhārirūpatā bhagavataḥ prakṛtapoṣānuguṇā prakāśitā ||

aurjityamiti | ūrjito mahāprāṇastasya bhāva aurjityaṃ tatra saṃdarbhasya mahāprāṃṇatā gāḍhatvamantarāntarāvilambitanayadbhiḥ prayogaiḥ kuṇḍilatvam | guṇasāmānyalakṣaṇādatiprasaṅgo nāsti | tathā hi—prakṛtodāharaṇe prathamapāde vicchinnabhugna ityatra tālavyadvayam | kaṇṭhyadantyasaṃyogau prasphuṭonmiśrau | anye mṛdavaḥ | dvitīyapāde auṣṭhyopadhmānīyatālavyacatuṣkasaṃyogāḥ prasphuṭāḥ | svaravyañjanamadhye visargapāṭha ubhayasaṃjñābhiprāyeṇeti durgasiṃhaḥ | tena tadādeśasyāpi vyañjanatvam | anye mṛdavaḥ tṛtīyapāde dantyoṣṭhyadantyakaṇṭhyasaṃyogā unmiśrāḥ | anye mṛdavaḥ | caturthapāde rephāntasaṃyogā bhṛdavo ya iti na kāpi kaṭhoratā pratibhāsate | tathā ca—prathamatṛtīyābhyāmatra dvitīyacaturthayorgāḍhatvam | tathā—‘haste līlākamalamalakaṃ bālakundānuviddham-’ ityāderagāḍhaprathamatṛtīyayorapyasti dhāraṇī mahāprāṇatā vyaktetyāha—atreti ||
atra saujanyāmbunidha ityādīnāṃ priyārthānāṃ padānāmupādānaṃ preyaḥ ||

preya iti | parapriyākhyānaṃ cāṭūktistatra yadvidhīyate sa preyo nāma guṇaḥ kiṃ tu kriyata ityāha—priyatarākhyānamiti | pratyayāṃśe tātparyaṃ loke sādhāraṇa eva priya ityucyamāne yastatrāsādhāraṇaḥ prakarṣo 'vasīyate sa ityartho bhavati | etena lakṣaṇapade īyasun vyākhyātaḥ | uktikhaṇḍairupacito 'rthaḥ sannasanvā bhavatu kavipratikṛṣṭā sūktireka eva tribhuvane bhūyasīnāmapāmadhiṣṭānam | evaṃ bhavānapi tatsthānīyasya saujanyasyeti pratīyate | vudhapriyeti bahuvrīhitatpuruṣābhyāmarthadvayamupāttam | sūkṣmaguṇapratibimbabhāsitayā yāvadabhimatadāyitayā ca prītidhvanitayā ca prakarṣamarpayati—guṇaprākāreti | yathā prākāre uparyupari śilādīnāmavasthitirevamahamahamikayā tvayi guṇānām | athavā yathā prākāraḥ kalatrāvekṣaṇasthānamevaṃ bhavānapi guṇānāmeva procyate | dharmadrumaprāroheti | prārohaḥ praroho 'ṅkuraḥ | tenātijarato bhagnānekavikramādityādiśākhasya dharmatarostvamagrimaḥ saṃtāno 'valambaḥ | yadi vādhomukhī lambamānalatā prarohaḥ | tathā ca dharmatarorupari brahmalokādibaddhavistārasya bhagavadrūpaḥ prāroho bhūpṛṣṭhamadhitiṣṭatīti ko 'pi prītau prakarṣaḥ | pratipannavatsaleti | upakartavyatayā pratipannaḥ svīkṛtastatra vatsalo jhaṭiti snehārdrāntaḥkaraṇastenāṅgīkṛtabhaṅgabhīrutāmātreṇa puruhūtādivannāpi śleṣāviśleṣānvitatayā balikarṇādivatkiṃ tu bhavān sindhuriva vāñchitādikamupakāraṃ karotīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa | mahātyāginniti | tyāgināmapi yaḥ pūjyaḥ sa mahātyāgī tena nūnaṃ dadhīciprabhṛtayo viśrāṇitārthā api na tava tulyatāmārọdhumīśata iti pūrvavat | vivekāśraya iti | yathākartavyatājñānaṃ vivekastasyāśrayo viśrāntisthānaṃ yadi tvaṃ mūlastambho nābhūstadā kamāśritya vivekaprāsādaḥ padamāropayedityādikaṃ svayamūhanīyamiti tadetatsarvaṃ sūcayannāha—priyārthānāṃ padānāmiti | priyārthānāṃ prītiprakarṣārthānām ||

lg.l: vyutpattiḥ suptiṅāṃ yā tu procyate sā suśabdatā |

l.seg: bhūyādvā 'jananiḥ kimamba’ ‘janinā’ iti saṭīkapustakapāṭhaḥjanuṣā jantorvṛthā janmanaḥ |
yastvāmeva na vandate na yajate nopaiti nālokate
nopastauti na manyate na manute nādhyeti na dhyāyati || 87 ||’

div.p: atra ajīvaniḥ—ajananiḥ—ityādīnāṃ suvantānāṃ vandate—yajate—ityādīnāṃ tiṅantānāṃ ca vyutpattiḥ suśabdatā ||

vyutpattiriti | viśiṣṭā utpattirvyutpattiḥ | subantānāṃ tiṅantānāṃ ca bahūnāmapi cakārādimantareṇa ghaṭanāsauṣṭavārpakatayā camatkārakāritvamityarthaḥ | ‘ākrośe nañyaniḥ’ | kimarthabhidamāśāsyata ityata āha—jīvato 'vamāna iti | jīvato 'vamānanaṃ mābhūnmaraṇamapi tadapekṣayā varamityarthaḥ | āyuḥkarmavaśāttathābhūto 'pi jīviṣyatīti yadri tadā 'jananiranutpattireva bhūyāt | kuta ityata āha—kimiti | janineti puṃliṅganirdeśaścintyaḥ ikaḥ strīprakaraṇe vidhānāt | janirutpattiriti sāhacaryācca | kasyedaṃ sarvamāśāsyata ityata āha—yastvāmeveti | tvadanyadevatāpravaṇasya janmādikaṃ viphalamiti vadataḥ ko 'pi bhagavatīviṣaye bhaktiprakarṣo 'vasīyate | anye tu vyācakṣate kaveḥ padaparicayāntarī vyutpattiḥ | padaṃ ca suptiṅantatayā dvividham | tayorekamubhayaṃ vā yatra niveśyamānaṃ vyutpattimabhivyanakti tatra sauśabdyamiti lakṣaṇārthaḥ | tathā hi—ajīvaniriti sopādhisiddhakṛdantaṃ jīvitamupanyasya tadeva jīvasya jīvata iti nirupādhisiddhasādhyārthābhidhāyikṛdantamupanyastavān | mātaravameti mātṛtvamubhayathotprekṣitavān | dvitīyapāde janijīvamivopakṣipya janinā janmeti tameva prakāradvayenopāttavān | ekaikadhātuprapañcānāṃ subantānāṃ durghaṭamekasaṃdarbhapraveśaṃ tattaducitakriyāsaṃgamena vihitavāniti subantavyutpattiriti dik | avameti astvityanuṣajyate | vṛthādivā pūrveṇāpi saṃbadhyate | athottarārdhe tiṅantavyutpattiḥ | tatra pūrvaprakārabhedo na ghaṭate | ataḥ sābhiprāyāṇāmevotprekṣaṇaṃ sā vācyā | tathā hi—vandata iti jāyamānamātrābhivādyatayā tribhuvanamātṛtā | yajata iti samastadevatārupatvam | upaitīti sarvopagamyatayā jagaccharaṇyatvam | ālokata iti viśvavarti yāvanmanoharatvam | stautīti samastābhimatadāyitā | manyata iti nikhilajñeyasvarūpatā | manuta ityavadhāraṇīyatayā tattvātmakatā | adhyetīti kāntārādismartavyatayā durgādibhedena prapañcyamānatvam | dhyāyatīti nididhyāsanaviṣayatayā pratyagjyotīrūpateti parāparabhedabhinnā bhagavatī stutā bhavati | manyate manute iti yathā sāmānyaviśeṣābhidhāyinau tathādhyeti dhyāyatītyapi | tiṅantānāṃ ca durghaṭo 'pi paraspara-
manvayaḥ kenāpi prakāreṇa ghaṭita iti pūrvavadvoddhavyaḥ | tadetadāha—atretyādipadamubhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate | tena jīvitavargo janivargaścābhimataḥ | matiḥ sakṛdevāvṛtta iti noktaḥ bhūyasā hi loke vyapadeśo dṛśyata iti ||

l.seg: mitīyaṃ mādhuryaṃ spṛśati ca tanutvaṃ ca bhajate || 88 ||’

div.p: samādhiriti | samyagādhānamāropaṇaṃ samāghiḥ | samyaktvaṃ ca kakratālokātigatvaṃ na tadadhikabhāvaḥ | tadidaṃ lakṣaṇe sphuṭam | ‘kamalāni nimīlanti kumudānyunmiṣanti ca’ ityādau vyabhicārācca | tena saṃbandhitā na dharmaviśeṣaṇamatrābhimatā | alaṃkārādbhedaścaturthe vakṣyate—pratīcchatīti | pratyeṣaṇaṃ dīyamānasya grahaṇaṃ cetanadharmaḥ sa virahavatyā acetane 'dhare samāropitaḥ | kisalayakāntimito mandībhūtatāmavagamayati | deyasya dāturapasaraṇe 'nyatra saṃkrāntau ca pratyeṣaṇanirvāhācca | tathā cāśokakisalayebhyo 'pi komalapāṭalatvamadharasyeti mādhuryapoṣaḥ | tadabhimukhapravartanamavataraṇamapi cetanadharmaḥ so 'cetane kapole samāropitaḥ kiṃcitpāṇḍutāmavadyotayati | na ca pratyeṣaṇavatsāmastyena grahaṇamapi tu saṃmukhībhāvamātramityāśayāt | tathā ca pūrvavanmādhuryaṃ puṣṇāti, anuvādo 'pi cetanadharma eva so 'cetanāyāṃ dṛṣṭāvāropitaḥ paryuṣitakamalacchāyāmakhaṇḍāmevātra bodhayati | paraprakarṣābhimukhe 'pi vipralambhe kadācitsaṃkalpopasthitaprāṇanāthāyāṃ dṛṣṭau kāntī bhavatīti prāyaḥpadena sūcitam | sparśasya mādhuryaviṣaye 'saṃbhavātspṛśatītyapyāropaḥ | prathamavigrahaśobhāvirbhāvamabhivyanakti—cetanakriyeti | prakṛtāpekṣayā kriyākriyāvatoḥ sādṛśyābhāvānneyaṃ gauṇī kiṃ tūpacaritaiva śuddhetyāha—upacāreṇeti | etena rūpakādibhyo bhedaḥ samarthitaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘kevalaṃ dadhati kartṛvācinaḥ pratyayāniha na jātu karmaṇi |

div.p: atra śrutāvagatavākyārthasya sṛjati—saṃharati—śāsti—stūyate—iti śabdānāmantaḥsaṃjalparūpeṇa sūkṣmatayā sūkṣmatvam ||

antariti | yathā karituragādirūpakāṇāṃ pāṣāṇaśilādāvabhivyaktamavasthitau sūkṣmarūpatā tathā śabdānāṃ śrūyamāṇānāmapi kathamanyathā vākyārthabhāvanadaśāyāṃ śeṣaniyamenonmeṣaḥ | kevalamityādau sṛjati—saṃharati—śāstayo dhātavaḥ kartaryeva bhagavadviṣaye prayujyamānāḥ pratyayānprayojayanti na karmaṇīti vākyārtho yadā bhāvyate tadaivāyaṃ sṛjati saṃharati śāsti, na tu sṛjyate saṃhriyate śiṣyate iti śabdāḥ prakāśante | evaṃ stautirviparītakārakaḥ | atra stautiḥ karmaṇyeva pratyayaprayojako na kartarīti vākyārthabhāvanāsamaya eva nāyaṃ kiṃcitstauti kiṃtu sarvaiḥ stūyata eveti śabdā unmiṣanti | tadetadāha—atra śrutāvagateti | yāvadeva vākyaṃ śrūyamāṇamavagamyate tasyaiva bhāvanāpallavaḥ paścādavasīyata iti vaṭabījanyāyamupodbalayati | so 'yaṃ sahṛdayapratītisākṣiko 'rthaḥ ||
atra nābhyāṃ puṇḍarīkadhāraṇaṃ parimitavikramatvaṃ cakrāṅkitakaratvaṃ daṃṣṭrayā vasudhoddhāraṇaṃ vakṣaḥsthalaniveśitalakṣmīkatvamindrāvarajatvaṃ ca dhvanayatīti gāmbhīryam ||

dhvanimatteti | dhvananaṃ dhvanirvyañjanātmā vyāpāraḥ | sa dvividhaḥ—śabdadhvaniḥ
arthadhvaniśca | yena śabda eva dhvanyate sa śabdadhvanirabhimata iti kecit, tanna | śabdasyaiva dhvanyatānaṅgīkārāt | nābhyāṃ puṇḍarīkadhāraṇamityādi vyākhyāgranthabhaṅgaprasaṅgācca | tasmācchabdāśritaṃ dhvananaṃ śabdadhvanirarthāśritaṃ cārthadhvaniriti vaktavyam | prabhūtadhvanisaṃbaddhapadakadambakasya gāmbhīryam | athavā dhvanayatīti dhvaniḥ śabdātmako yatrāsti padasamudāyastadgāmbhīryam | tathā hi puṇḍarīkapadaprastāvātsitacchatre niyatābhidhānaśaktikaṃ kāṃsyatālānusvānasthānīyāṃ sitāmbhojavyaktimupajanayaccopalabhyate | anekārthaniyatābhidhānaśaktikatvācca | tadāha—‘anekārthasya śabdasya vācakatve niyantrite | saṃyogādyairavācyārthadhīkṛvdyāpṛtirañjanam ||’ iti | evaṃ vikramādiṣu | tathāpi vikramaḥ paurūṣaṃ pariśiṣṭaḥ pādavikṣepaśca | cakraṃ cakravarticihnaṃ rekhāsaṃniveśalakṣaṇamāyudhaviśeṣaśca | abhyuddharaṇaṃ samyaglābhapālanaprāpaṇamutthāpanaṃ ca | lakṣmīḥ saṃpaddevatāviśeṣaśca | jyāyān praśasyataro vayojyeṣṭhaśca | idamevābhisaṃdhāya divaukaspaterityantaṃ vyācaṣṭe—atreti | tadapītyapiśabdena virodhadyotinā haribhāvamācaranniti pratīyate puṇḍarīkadhāraṇāderubhayatulyatvānmaulāvityādiviruddham, atastadviparītasthānīyaṃ viṣṇau dhvanayatprasiddhibalānnābhyādikameva dhvanayati | prasiddhirapi hi viśiṣṭārthapratipattau kāraṇamevetyabhipretya śabdadhvaniprastāve 'pyanyavdyākhyātavān | anyathā tu prakṛtāsaṃgatiśaṅkayā na vācyārthapuṣṭiḥ syāt | so 'yaṃ virodharūpamūlaḥ pratīyamānavyatireko vākyārthaḥ śabdadhvaniścātra jīvabhūtaḥ | viśvāntaḥkaraṇaikacora ityanena tribhuvanamanoharatā | divāniśamantaḥkaraṇāni corayannabhyāsakauśalādivātyantaprasiddhāni nārāyaṇacihnāni gopāyasīti pratīyamānotprekṣā | nanu vastudhvaniṃ śabdaśaktimūlameke na manyante | kathaṃ tarhi ‘panthia na ettha sattharamatthi maṇaṃ pattharatthale gāme | unnaapaoharaṃ pekkhia uṇa jaï vasasi tā vasasu ||’‘pathika nātra srastaramasti manākprastarasthale grāme | unnatapayodharaṃ prekṣya punaryadi vasasi tadvasa ||’ iti cchāyā ityādau vastuvarṇanaṃ? na hyatra śleṣanyāyo na vā samāsoktinyāyaḥ saṃbhavati | kiṃ cālaṃkāra dhvanāvapi śabdaśaktirevopayuktetyakṣuṇṇaḥ śabdadhvaniḥ | ye tu vadanti śabdasyābhidhāvyatiriktā vṛttireva nāstīti, lakṣaṇāpi tairanaṅgīkaraṇīyā syāt | na cānaṅgīkartavyeti vācyam | "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityatra saptamyananvayāpatteḥ | prakṛtyanugatasvārthābhidhānaṃ hi vibhaktīnāṃ vyutpannamiti ghoṣapratiyogikādhikaraṇabhāvayogyaḥ kaścidartho gaṅgāpadasya vaktavyaḥ | tathā ca kānyā nāma lakṣaṇā | evaṃ puṇyatvādi-
pratītistata eva bhavantī dhvananamupasthāpayatītyādikamasmābhiḥ kāvyaprakāśavivaraṇe prapañcitam | iha tu granthagauravabhiyā viramyate ||

l.seg: stathāvasthaṃ cainaṃ nidadhatu śubhaiḥ ‘śuktivadane’ iti mūlapustakapāṭhaḥśuktivadanaiḥ |

div.p: atra kathamahaṃ tvatkucataṭe viluṭhāmītyabhiprāyasya vistareṇa prakāśitatvādayaṃ vistaraḥ ||

vyāseneti | yatra stoke 'pi vācye vacanapallavaścamatkārakārī tatra sa eva guṇakakṣādhirohaṇakṣama iti śabdaguṇeṣu yukto vivektumata evoktiṃ viśeṣyatayā nirdiśati | janaḥ puṇyairityādau kathamahamityādau nirdiṣṭo 'pi vakrābhiprāyarūpo 'rtha uktipallavena prakarṣamānīyate | tathā hi jana iti taṭasthoktyā na mamedṛśāni bhāgagheyāni yenāhatya mano nirvahati | puṇyairiti bahuvacanenānekajanmopāttānāmevedaṃ phalam | yāyāditi saṃbhāvanābhiprāyeṇa liṅā muktāphalapariṇatiyogyajaladhijalaprāptisaṃbhāvanāpi kasyacideva dhanyajanmana iti prakāśite ko 'pi kāraṇaprakarṣaḥ | jalamuca ityanena yeṣāṃ na jaladānameva vyāpāraḥ, api tu viśvasaṃtāpacchidurāṇāmanyopakārapravaṇatayā śuktimukhaparyantamapi nayanamupapadyata iti | tathāvasthamityanena yadaiva smarāvasthā tadaiva jaladharaiḥ pānamāśaṃsāmātragocaro na tu pūrvavatsaṃbhāvanāmātragocaraḥ, ata eva śubhairiti samayavilambanasya prāktanapuṇyamānahetukatvādityādi svayamavaseyam | etena ‘padarthe vākyaracanam’ iti yadanyairguṇāntaramabhihitaṃ tadvistāramekameva | ghaṭanāsauṣṭhavamātropayuktastu pallavo viśeṣaguṇeṣvasmābhirabhidhāsyate | tvatkucataṭe luṇṭhanamatyalpapuṇyasya na saṃpadyata ityetāvānevārtho vivakṣāviṣaya iti kāryavikāsasyaiva camatkārārpaṇe prāgalbhyamiti śabdapradhānakatayā yuktamatra parisaṃkhyānamiti ||

samāseneti | asti kaścidviśeṣo yatra vākyasaṃkocaḥ prakṛtaucitīvaśena camatkārakāraṇam | tathā hi—sa mārutītyādau mārutinā yadoṣadherānayanam, yacca tayā vyathāharaṇam, tadubhayamapītihāsakathāvistareṇa pratipāditamiha tu ślokārdhamātreṇeti śabdadattabhara evāyaṃ guṇo yadyapi bhavati, tathāpi yāvadvivakṣitopādānakāvyarūpeṇārthasaṃkoco vaktavyaḥ | sa ca tathāvidhavakroktisaṃkroca eva bhavatītyuktāveva saṃkoca ullikhati | kathamayaṃ saṃkocaḥ prāptocitabhāva ityāha—prakṛteti | ata evopakṣiptamapītihāsārthamapahāya tvarāviṣṭena kavinā prakṛtamuttarārdha evāsaṃhitaṃ pūrvottarārdhasāmañjasyāya saṃkṣipyaiva prakṛtamapyuktam ||

lg.l: vāci vastuni cāpyanye nānye vāci na vastuni || 93 ||’

div.p:
yāvaditi | yāvanti varṇāni vinā prakṛtamanusartumeva na śakyante tāvanmātramayatvaṃ vākyasya saṃmitatvam | ataḥ saṃkṣepādbhedaḥ | kaveḥ śaktivyutpattibhyāmasatyapi pallave kadāciddhaṭanālāvaṇyamunmiṣatyeva | yathā pūrvamudāhṛtam—‘kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā’ ityādi | arthavyaktisaṃkaraśaṅkāpyata eva nirākṛtā | 'astyuttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā’ iti kecidudāharanti tadayuktam | anena nāmapadayoḥ pallavarūpatvātsaṃmitatvābhāve kathamābhāsatvaṃ bhavatīti visbhṛtavyamicāriguṇaprakaraṇasya bhāṣitamupekṣaṇīyam | keciditi sarvanāmna evābhimatakaviviśeṣe parya-
vasānaṃ sāmarthyena saṃbhavatīti nādhyāhāraśaṅkā | śaktā ityādikriyāpi sāmarthyenāvasīyate tadetatsarvamabhipretyāha—tulāvidhṛtavaditi ||

l.seg: cumbāmi mūrdhani ciraṃ ca pariṣvaje tvām |

div.p: bhāvata iti | bhāvanādṛśāpannā cittavṛttirbhāvaḥ | bhāvanā vāsanāvyāptirityanarthāntaram | tathā hyucyate—anena gandhena rasena vā sarvaṃ bhāvitamiti | harṣādibhāvitacetaso hi vīciprāyā uktibhedāḥ prādurbhavanti yairapratyūhameva bhāvo 'bhivyajyate tadidamuktaṃ yā bhāvato vācaḥ kāvyarūpāyāḥ pravṛttirniṣpattiḥ saiva bhāvikam | bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | tathā hi—prakṛtodāharaṇe ehītyekenaiva yuṣmadarthāvinābhāvinābhimukhīkaraṇe vṛtte dvitīyasya yadupādānam, pūrṇacandreti yadagrimakriyāsvanupayuktasyaivābhidhānam, cumbāmīti kariṣyamāṇasyāpi yo vartamānopadeśaḥ, cumbāmītyatra viśeṣaṇamanupādāya pariṣvaja ityatra ciramiti yadviśeṣaṇopādānam, tvamiti yogyārthasyāpi prayogaḥ pūrvopāttavaduttarakriyāspardhitayā yadekasyaiva vahanasya bhāṣaṇameva samastasamakakṣatayaiva yadvahanābhidhānam, vatsetyabhidhāya caraṇau banda iti yā virūddhoktiḥ, yacca te ityasyāvagatārthasyāpi vacanam, tatsarvamadharmasiddhameveti bhāvārthasya niṣpāditayā svādaheturbhavati | pravartante hi laukikānāṃ snehārthānāmutkalikāprāyā vācaḥ svadante ca | yathā—‘iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayorasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahalaścandanarasaḥ’ iti | tadetadabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—atreti | udbhaṭatvāttena śeṣāṇyupalakṣayati—anaucityenāpi vanda iti ||

l.seg: ‘varāhaḥ kalyāṇaṃ vitaratu sa vo yasya śaśabhṛ-

div.p: gatiriti | kecivdyācakṣate | yatīnāmārohāvarohau vivakṣitau kvacitkaviśaktivaśādyadyavdyārụ̄dhā avarụ̄dhā iva prakāśante | yathā—‘bhuvo nīcairnīcairavaṭaparipāṭīṣu patatāṃ sphuratyarvāgarvāgakhilabhuvane bhogitilakaḥ | kramāduccairuccairgiriśikharabhājāmapi nṛṇāmayaṃ dūre dūre bhavati bhagavānambaramaṇiḥ ||’ atra yatī nānārohāvarohau tilatandulavatprakāśete | iyaṃ tu vṛttaucitī vakṣyate | tathā ca dvitīye saṃgatā syāt | tasmādayamarthaḥ—svarāṇāmakārādīnāmuparyuparitayā bodhaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭānāmiva prakāśanaṃ gatiriti | tathā ca vyākhyāsyati—svarasyeti | tathā hi prakṛtodāharaṇe varāhaḥ kalyāṇamityatrākāradvayaṃ tulyajātīyaṃ nirdiśya sa vo ityatrokāreṇa tuṅgatvamiva vidhāya dvitīyapādopakrame kalākoṭīkāntamityatrābhinnajātīyārohaparamparā vihitā | uttarārdhe tu tathā nāsti | śete ityatrāpi na sollekha ārohaḥ so 'yamānubhaviko guṇaḥ ślokārdhaślokapādaślokāṃśakrameṇa narasiṃhavadbhavati | atropalakṣaṇatayādyamudāharati—atra pūrvārdha iti | kramairitastataścaraṇavinyāsairvigalantī asaṃpadyamānā yābhyuddhṛtirabhyuddharaṇaṃ tasyā yā bhīrbhayaṃ tayeti kecit | anye tu vadanti—krameṇa vigaladabhyuddhṛtibhayamūrdhvanayane sphuṭanādibhayaṃ yasyāḥ sā kramavigaladabhyuddhṛtibhiyeti ||

l.seg: ‘grāvṇā nāsi gireḥ kṣatā na payasā nārtāsi na mlāyitā
na śvāsaiḥ phaṇino 'si na tvadanugā nāyāsitā kvāpi na |
svaṃ veśma pratigacchatoriti muhuḥ śrīśārṅgiṇoḥ saspṛhaṃ

div.p: upakramasyeti | yādṛśī padasaṃniveśatvenopakramyate tādṛśyā vṛttanirvāhaḥ kvacidviśeṣaśobhāvaho bhavati | ata evātra nātyantanirvāho 'bhimataḥ | ekādaśavṛtterapyabhiprāyasamagrakāvyajīvabhūtatvādetasyā eva nātiprasaṅgo 'pi tathā prakṛtodāharaṇe prathamotthitāyā abdhiduhituravyājasarvāṅgīṇalāvaṇyamavalokayitā kṛṣṇaḥ svacakṣuṣoḥ kṛtārthatāṃ gamitavān | idānīmadharoṣṭhamudrābhedena yadi varṇamātrāmapi bhāratīṃ niścarantīmākarṇayāmi tadā śrotrayoḥ saphalatā bhavediti manyate | na cetthameva mugdhāṅganānāmālāpaḥ pravartate api tu nāyakasannidhau bhayādeveti prathamaṃ pṛcchati—grāvṇā nāsi gireḥ kṣateti | anantaraṃ ca yadi na vakṣyāmi tadā dhṛṣṭāmākalayiṣyatīti jānatyā dvayamuttaramaucityāpannaṃ syāt śiraḥkampa ekākṣaraṃ ca | tatrādyaḥ kālidāsena prayukto ‘mūrdhakampamayamuttaraṃ dadau’ iti | dvitīyaṃ kavinā viniveśitam—netiḥ | evaṃ śrutajalpitābhṛtastadanubandhena kṛtakṛtyamivātmānaṃ manyamāno 'dhikatrāsahetuṃ smārayanpṛcchati—payaseti | tadidamuktam—ārteti | prakārāntareṇottaradānāsaṃbhavātpunarapyāha—neti | tadanantaraṃ vyājarasāyāḥ kiyadadhikavacanaśravaṇotkaṇṭhitaḥ sarvaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ bhayahetuṃ smārayanpṛcchati—mlāyiteti | abhimatasyāniṣṭaṃ svapne 'pi na sajjata iti dṛṣṭāsīti noktam | evaṃ prasiddhamapi vacanapallavanena samastamugdhāṅganāprasiddhena vacanonmudraṇaprakāreṇa pṛcchati—tvadanugeti | sarvākāreṇottamatāmabhijñāyamāno dṛptaḥ svaveśma pratyeva gatavān na tu pṛṣṭavāniti | tadidaṃ sarvamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—atreti ||

lg.l: viśiṣṭā bhaṇitiryā syāduktiṃ tāṃ kavayo viduḥ || 76 ||
punarapi tadeva kathayasi mṛtāṃ nu kathayāmi yā śvasiti || 97 ||’

div.p: atra kuśalaṃ tasyā iti pṛṣṭe kuśalamakuśalaṃ veti vaktavye yo 'yaṃ jīvatītyādyuktibhaṅgyā jīvitamātraśeṣatāpratipādanaprakāraḥ sa kāvye śabdaguṇeṣūktisaṃjñāṃ labhate ||

viśiṣṭeti | lokottarāḥ santi hi bhaṇitiprakārā lokaprasiddhāḥ | yathā supto 'sīti praśne gṛhe devakule vetyādi | etatprasiddhivyatikrameṇa tu yā kācitkavipratibhayā bhaṇitirākṛṣyate sā bhavati lokottarā | tathā ca pratibhākṛṣṭatayā camatkāritvādguṇatvam | ata eva kavaya ityāha | kavisahṛdayānāmeva tādṛśoktiparicayasaṃbhavāt | tathā hi—prakṛtodāharaṇe kuśalapraśne kuśalaṃ veti lokaprasiddhamatastadeva vaktumarhati | yattu tadapahāya jīvatītyupāttamaparatrāpi praśne tathaivoktaṃ tatpratibhākṛṣṭatayā sāmiprāyamunnīyata ityāha—atra kuśalamakuśalamityādi ||

atra prakṛtisthakomalakaṭhorebhyo nāgaropanāgaragrāmyebhyo vā padebhyo 'bhyuddhṛtādīnāṃ grāmyādīnāmubhayeṣāṃ vā padānāmāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ sanniveśacārutvena yo 'yamābhyāsiko nālikerapāko mṛdvīkāpāka ityādirvākyaparipākaḥ sā praụdhirityucyate | tathā caitadvākyaṃ nālikerapāka ityucyate | evaṃ sahakāramṛdvīkāpāke apyudāharaṇīye iti ||

ukteriti | uktervākyasyāyaṃ pākaḥ sā praụdhiḥ | śabdānāṃ paryāyaparivartāsahatvaṃ pākaḥ | yadāha—‘yatpadāni tyajantyeva parivṛttisahidhṇutām | taṃ śabdanyāyaniṣṇātāḥ śabdapākaṃ pracakṣate ||’ iti | prauḍha iti | upakramopasaṃhārayornirvyūḍhaḥ sa cāyaṃ nāyaṃ nālikerasahakāramṛdvīkopalakṣaṇaistrividho gīyate | tadyathā—nālikeraphalaṃ pakvaṃ tvaci kaṭhinaṃ śirāsvavivṛtakomalaprāyaṃ kapālikāyāṃ kaṭhinataraṃ tathā kaścitsaṃdarbho mukhe kaṭhinastadanantaraṃ mṛduprāyastataḥ kaṭhinataro nālikerapāka ityucyate | tathā hi—prakṛtodāharaṇe prathamapāde 'bhyuddhṛteti varṇacatuṣṭayamāramme kaṭhinaṃ ‘vasumatī dali’
iti varṇaṣaṭkaṃ komalaṃ ‘taṃ ripūraḥ’ ityanusvārarephadīrghairakṣaracatuṣṭayaṃ kaṭhinataram | atrāpi tamiti mṛduprāyāniveśanena komalakapālikāmukhabhāgasārūpyaṃ draḍhayatītyasmadārādhyāḥ | evaṃ dvitīyādipādatraye catuṣkaṣaṭkacatuṣkairnālikeraphalasāmyamutreyam | kathaṃ punarevaṃvidhaḥ pākaḥ saṃbhavatītyata āha—atreti | abhyāsena nirvṛtta ābhyāsikaḥ | kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vicārayituṃ ca ye jānanti tadupadeśena karaṇe yojane ca paunaḥpunyena pravṛttirabhyāsaḥ | asāvapi kathaṃ pākaviśeṣo bhavatītyata āha—sanniveśacārutveneti | sanniveśo racanā tasyāṃ cārutvam | tadapi kathamityata āha—āvāpodvāpābhyāmiti | saṃdarbhānupraveśanamāvāpaḥ | tataḥsamuddharaṇamudvāpaḥ | keṣāmityata uktam—padānāmiti | uddhṛtānāmiti budhdyā pṛthakkṛtānām | kebhya ityata uktam—prakṛtisthādityādi | tenāyamarthaḥ—prakṛtisthādipadato 'pyetadevoddhartavyaṃ yad ghaṭanāsauṣṭavena paryāyaparivartanaṃ na sahate | bhavati hi sahṛdayānāmevamanyatpadaṃ nāstīti vyavahāraḥ | so 'yaṃ racanāsiddhiviśeṣaḥ kathamanyathā tajjātīyameva padamanyatra saṃdarbhe niveśitaṃ na tathā svadate | ata evāsau vākyaguṇaḥ | kāṭhinyaṃ ca saṃyogairdīrghairvā svarairbhavati | yathātraivodāharaṇe ripūra ityādau | suptiṅvyutpattilakṣaṇastu vārtākapākaḥ kaiściduktaḥ, sa tu suśabdatālakṣaṇaguṇa eva | evamiti | yathā drākṣāphalaṃ tvaca ārabhya komalamantarā dvitricaturāsthisaṃpāditaṃ kiṃcitkāṭhinyamevaṃ kaścitsaṃdarbhamupakramopasaṃhārayoḥ komala eva madhye kaṭhina eva | saṃyogadīrghasvaramātrakṛtamanākkaṭho rabhāvo mṛdvīkāpāka ityucyate | yathā—‘ayi tvadāvarjitavārisaṃbhṛtaṃ pravālamā- sāmanubandhivīrudhām | cirojjhitālaktakapāṭalena te tulāṃ yadārohati dantavāsasā ||', yathā ca—‘anavaratanayanajalalavanipatanaparipītahariṇamadatilakam | vadanamapayātamṛgamadaśaśikiraṇaṃ vahanti loladṛśaḥ ||’ ata eva kavikalpalatākārādibhirukto nīlakapitthapākaścaturtho nāsti | yadvacca pariṇataṃ sahakāraphalamāramabhādeva komalamasthani tu kaṭhoraprāyamevamaparaḥ saṃdarbho mukhādāramya mṛdurantare kaṭhinataraḥ sahakārapāka ityucyate | yathā—‘kamalini kuśalaṃ te suprabhātaṃ rathāṅgāḥ kumudini punarindāvudgate tvaṃ ramethāḥ | sakhi rajani gatāsi tvaṃ tamo jīrṇamuccairiti taralitapakṣāḥ pakṣiṇo vyāharanti ||’ atraivodāharaṇe 'pi dvidhā kaṭhoratvamavaseyam | te 'mī traya eva śuddhapākāḥ | vyatikarajanmānastu bhūyāṃsaḥ | eta evārthapākāḥ pañcame prakārāntareṇa pratipādayiṣyante ||

lg.l: teṣāṃ śleṣa iti proktaḥ saṃvidhāne susūtratā || 78 ||

div.p: atraikāsanasaṃsthitayoḥ priyatamayorvilāsinā hyekā nayanamīlanakelikarmaṇā vañcitā | anyā tu vadanacumbanena rañjiteti | seyaṃ saṃvidhāne susūtratā | śleṣo nāma vākyārthaguṇaḥ ||

uktā iti | vṛttakīrtanaṃ hetubhāvapradarśanārtham | etāneva śleṣādināmakāniti | eṣāmiti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī | ‘vākyārthaśarīrabhūtaḥ śleṣaḥ prathamaṃ lakṣyata iti | ghaṭanāśleṣaḥ’ iti sūtrayitvā ‘kramakauṭilyānulbaṇatvopapattiyogo ghaṭanā’ iti vāmanena vyākhyātam | asyārthaḥ—idaṃ kṛtvā idaṃ kartavyamiti kramastatraiva kauṭilyaṃ lokātigāminī vakratā | avakrayoḥ śabdarthayoḥ vacanamātratvāt | atimātratayā pratibhāsābhāvo 'nulbaṇatvam | kathamevamarthaḥ saṃgacchata ityanupapattisamādhānaupayikaviśeṣaniveśanamupapattiḥ | tathā ca kameṇa kauṭilyenānulbaṇatayā upapattyā yojanamarthasya śleṣa iti tatra saṃvidhānakramānulbaṇatvena sūtraśabdenopatte svapadena kauṭilyamuktamaghaṭamānasyeva vākyārthasya buddhicāturyeṇa ghaṭaneti vākyārthaḥ | dṛṣṭveti | ekā nāyikā | aparā nāyikā ca tatsakhī pracchannanāyakapremapātraṃ tenaikāsanasaṃgatiḥ | priyatame iti tadanurañjanameva jīvitasarvasvamiti manyamānasya yugapatpravṛttiḥ | ādareṇa nimṛtapadanyāsatā tathā bhūtvā yugapatkarābhyāṃ nayanadvayapidhānaṃ lokaprasiddhā keliḥ | īṣaditi kandharāmātraṃ yathā calate na tu śarīramapi | anyathā calanajñāne nāyikāyāḥ kaṣāyabhāvaḥ syāt | nibhṛtarāgonmudraṇāt pulakodgamaḥ | ata eva premṇā svagocaralokottaratvābhimānarūpeṇa tattadanekabhāvormibhirāndolanaṃ manasa ullāsaḥ | sādhuvañcanaṃ na jānātītyabhiprāyikasapatnīgatadhikkārabhāvanayā nibhṛtahāsonmeṣaḥ | vañcanācāturyeṇa svamanīṣitasaṃpādanaṃ dhūrtatā | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atraikāsaneti ||
atra padminīvikāsakaraṇe udayaśailāvataraṇe kokaśokaharaṇe tamovidāraṇe cānukto 'pi sūryalakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ prakaṭamupalakṣyate ||

yattu prākaṭyamiti | samabhivyāhṛtapadārthasaṃsargātmani vākyārthe darpaṇatala ivānupāttasyāpi vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ pratibhāso 'rthaprasādaḥ | na cedamanumānaṃ samānasaṃvitsaṃvedyatvāt | tadāha—anukto 'pi sūryalakṣaṇo 'ryaḥ prakaṭamupalakṣyata iti ||

l.seg: mugdhatvasya ca yauvanasya ca sakhe madhye madhuśrīḥ sthitā || 101 ||’

div.p: avaiṣamyamiti | yena rūpeṇa loke 'rthaḥ pratītastadanatikrameṇa tasyoktiḥ samatā | vakratā cātra viśeṣaṇamūhanīyam | anyathā muktvā vrajatītyataḥ ko viśeṣaḥ syāt | agre iti | mugdha iti koṣātprathamamudbhidyamānā kurabakakalikā kāntānakhavatpāṭalā bhavatīti madhuśriyo bālyam | tataḥ praụdhimāpadyamānāsu kalikāsu śyāmo vantabhāgaḥ sphuṭitatvāddvidhāvatiṣṭhata iti yauvanam | evaṃ bālāśokamityādau krameṇa bālyayauvanacihnopadarśanamavaseyam ||

l.seg: mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca no praśrayaḥ || 102 ||’

div.p: atra vāsavadattālakṣaṇasyārthasya kope 'pi yo 'yaṃ vinayāvambanena kopacihnanihnavastanmādhuryam |

mādhuryamiti | śṛṅgārakaruṇau hi madhurau tatastavdyañjako 'rtho 'pi madhurastasya śarkarādirasasodaraṃ mādhuryam | yathā hi—śarkarārasaḥ sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya vā, susthasyāsusthasya vā, jhaṭiti rasanāgramarpitaścamatkāramāvahati, tathā cittadrutisāracarvaṇaikaprāṇarasavyañjako 'rthastena tavdyañjanaśaktisamudraikanirvahaṇaṃ vākyārthasya mādhuryamiti paryavasito 'rthaḥ | tatra vāsanāparipākavaśādudayavyayavatīṣu dīptacittavṛttiṣu jāgarūkāsvapi samastanyagbhāvanayā virodhaḥ saṃpadyata iti krodhādāvapyatīvratā ityuktam | tathā hi—bhrūmede ityādau gātraskhalitādinā kadācidaparāddhe nāyake premasvabhāvādīrṣyāroṣalakṣaṇavyabhicāriprādurbhāvāttadanubhāvabhrūbhedodgamo ratiprakarṣādbhaviṣṇunāvahitthena nyagbhāvyate | virodhivijaye hi bhūyānprakarṣaḥ parasya bhavati | ata eva parāmityuktam | evaṃ ‘īṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitam’ ityādau mādhuryamunneyam | tadidamāha—atra vāsavadattālakṣaṇasyeti ||
atra sītāyāḥ purīparisare 'pi kiyadasti gantavyamiti vacanaṃ śṛṇvato rāmasya śirīṣamṛdutadaṅgāvalokanenāśruṇo 'vatāraḥ saukumāryamāha ||

aniṣṭhuratvamiti | sāmagrīsaṃbhave 'pi cittadrutimanāsādayannīrasaḥ kaṭhoro 'bhidhīyate | atathābhūtastu jhaṭiti tanmayībhavanayogyāntaḥkaraṇaḥ sukumārastadidamuktamaniṣṭhuratvamiti | prāhurityanena prasiddhiṃ dyotayati—sadya iti | sahagantumutsukā kathamevaṃ sukumāraprakṛtiḥ kāntāreṣu bhaviṣyasīti vāryamāṇāpi hṛdayavaimukhyena pabhdyāmatitvaritaṃ gamiṣyāmīti snehamụ̄dhā tricaturāṇi padāni javādgatavatī | aśruṇaḥ prathamāvatāro bhaviṣyadaśruparamparāpracārabhūtaḥ | saukumāryamāheti aśrupātenānubhāvāśrunimittabhūtā cittadrutiḥ karatalāmalakavatprakāśyate ||

arthavyaktiriti | svarūpaṃ svamasādhāraṇaṃ kavipratibhaikagocaraṃ camatkārirūpaṃ tasya sākṣātkathanam | kaviśaktivaśātsākṣātkārasodarapratītijanakapadavattvaṃ saṃdarbhasyārthavyaktināmā guṇaḥ | artho yathoktastasya vyaktiḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatā | jāterbhedastṛtīye vakṣyate || ‘pṛṣṭhe 'pi’ ityādarśapāṭhaḥpṛṣṭheṣviti | īṣadvikasvarasya kumudasya kiṃcidvighaṭamānavahiḥ palāśasaṃbandhiṣu śītātapāsaṃparkādatyantaviśadānāṃ dalānāṃ pṛṣṭhāni pākalohitarekhāṅkitāni dṛśyante | ata evāmodate kiṃcidudbhidureṇa mukhena garbhapiṇḍitamāmodaṃ muñcatīti ||
atra nāyikāyā sapatnyāmīrṣyānubandhena pratipāditasya priyatamānurāgalakṣaṇasya śṛṅgārasya dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ ||

kāntiriti | raso 'bhimānātmā śṛṅgārastasya dīptatvaṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhiḥ samyak saṃcalitena sthāyinā nirantaramupacīyamānasya paramakoṭigamanam | tathā hi—mā garvamityādau yatra bhaṅgeṣu bahutarasūkṣmabhaṅgaviśeṣamayamañjarīlikhitena bahirviṣayātirodhānalakṣaṇatādavasthyāt prakāśanena nāyakasya sapatnyāmanurāge vicchāyabhāvoktiḥ | svātmani tu sahasāvirbhavatsāttvikapratipādanena jīvitasarvasvābhimānātmakratisthāyibhāvaprakāśane tasyā: sāpekṣabhāve nāyikāyā api tadavasthaiva sā pratīyate | tadidamāha—priyatamānurāgeti | anurāgeṇa lakṣyate saptārcirivārciṣopacīyata ityanurāgalakṣaṇaḥ ||

bhūtītyādi | bhūtiḥ saṃpattasyā utkarṣo lokātigaprakarṣastasyaiva sahṛdayacamatkārārpakatatyā guṇadhurādhirohaṇakṣamatvāt || prāṇānāmiti | ucitā tapoyogyā |
vanasya kalpatarusaṃbandhaḥ saṃpat, tatraiva satpadena muktāstabakamāṇikyamañjarīcīnāṃśukakisalayādiviśeṣadyotinā prakarṣaḥ | padmaprakarastoyasaṃpat, tatraiva kāñcanamayatvena padmānāṃ prakarṣaḥ | bahutvaṃ śilāveśmasaṃpat, tatraiva ratnarūpatāprakarṣaḥ | saṃnidhi srīpratiyogikatāsaṃpat, tatraiva vibudheti prakarṣaḥ | tadidamāha—satkalpavṛkṣādipadairiti ||

lg.l: vrīḍāsmitaṃ tasya tadā tadāsīccamatkṛto yena sa eva devaḥ || 107 ||’

div.p: āśayasyeti | utkarṣaḥ pūrvavat | uccāśayo loke udātta iti pratītaḥ || pātra iti | viśvanātha iti yadājñāvaśaṃvadā trilokī so 'pi yatprārthayata iti, valaye 'pītyapiśabdena yasyaikadeśaḥ kurupāṇḍavanidhananidānatayā vikhyātastasyāpi deye lajjata iti | devāsurakinnarādirayaṃ jaṅgamasthāvaraprapañco yaducchvāsavilasitaṃ so 'pi camatkṛta iti padārthānabhihitaḥ prakarṣo 'bhidheyaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘tānyeva yadi bhūtāni tā eva yadi śaktayaḥ |

div.p: oja iti | adhyavasāyo niścayastatra viśeṣaḥ pūrvavat | svapadena vaktābhimataḥ || tānīti | yadi hantavyajātīyameva na viparyaṃstam | tā eveti | prabhāvotsāhamantrajāstadvadarthanibarhaṇapraụdhiprakhyātakīrtayaḥ śaktayo yadi na vilīnatāmayāsiṣuḥ | paraśurāma iti | arjunabhujasahasracchedādinā yasya paraśu(rāma)rvaradānena tribhuvane 'pi prasiddha ityādi ||

rụ̄dheti | ūrjitaśabdo 'haṃkṛte prasiddhastātkālikanimittopanipāte vāsanāvikāsāttamonirbhedasthāneṣu suptaprabuddha iva sthāyibhirasaṃsṛjyamānaḥ prathamaprādurbhūto 'bhimāno 'haṃkāra ityucyate | rūḍhaḥ sūkṣmāvasthāto dvitīyāmāvirbhāvadaśāmāpanno 'haṃkāro yasya sa rụ̄dhāhaṃkārastasya bhāvastattā | sugamamudāharaṇam ||

preya iti | śabdaguṇe tu nippāditavarṇanīyaprītijanakatvaṃ padānāmuktam | iha tu vākyārthasya vaktṛprītigocaratvamucyata iti viśeṣaḥ | prītiruktapūrvā | tatraivābhiśabdena prakarṣo dyotitaḥ | abhīṣṭatā preya iti preyaḥpadapravṛttinimittam | rasavaditi | praśaṃsāyāṃ matup | amṛtamiti yasya prasādāttridaśairamaratvamāsāditaṃ nānyatheti pratyakṣasākṣike vastuni pramāṇāntarānusaraṇam | prasannarasamiti amlatālakṣaṇakāvyārthāpagamena pariṇatirityādi ||

lg.l: ‘devavrate vāñchati dīrghanidrāṃ droṇe ca karṇe ca yaśo 'vaśeṣe |

div.p: atra mumūrṣāmaraṇādīnāṃ dāruṇārthānāṃ dīrghanidrāṃ vāñchati yaśo 'vaśeṣa ityādibhiḥ suśabdaiḥ paryāyeṇa bhaṇanaṃ suśabdatā | sā ca mukhyārthavyatikramasya vākyārthatvānna śabdaguṇaḥ ||

adāruṇetyādi | jhaṭityātaṅkadāyī dāruṇastasya sākṣādabhidhāne vivakṣitapratītiskhalanakhedasaṃbhavāttadupanītasya vastunastadadhyāsāntaritasya vākyārthatvāditi | sarvatraiva hi lakṣaṇāyāmarthādhyāso 'ṅgīkriyate | laukikī ceyaṃ lakṣaṇeti na prayojanagaveṣaṇamapīti | sugamamudāharaṇam ||
atra gamane sati priyajanāvalokanābhilāṣiṇyāḥ śakuntalāyā darbhāṅkuracaraṇakṣativalkalavyāsaṅgādivyājāvalambanaṃ samādhiḥ ||

vyājeti | cittavṛttiṣu balādāvirbhavantīṣu prakṛtarasaucityavirodhiprakarṣātprakaṭamanāvaraṇīyāsu ca yadanyathā samarthanaṃ tavdyājāvalambanaṃ prastutocitasamādhānātmakatvāt | tathā hi—pūrvānurāge trapāsādhvasavivaśāyāstāvannāyakasamīpādapasaraṇamaucityāpannam | anantaraṃ tūtkaṇṭhātaralitāyāḥ kathamālokamātreṇāpi kṛtārthaḥ syāditi parāvartanam | tatra ca maugdhyabhaṅgaśaṅkāyāṃ darbhāṅkurakṣatiprabhṛtivyājāvalambanameva kāryasarvasvabhābhāsata iti ||

saukṣmyamiti | sūkṣmamityādivākyaikagocaro 'rthaḥ kuśāgrīyabuddhitayā sūkṣma- stasya darśanamupāyavailakṣaṇyāttattadviśeṣavataḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatā | sūkṣmālaṃkārādbhedastṛtīye kariṣyate | sa cāyaṃ bhāvyo vāsanīyaśca | bhāvanāmātragamyo bhāvyo yathā—

lg.l: pāṇau pasarantamattācaṃvaphalihacasaambhuhaṃ bālā ||’‘ucyārāgaccherāvardhaya siddhāntaraḥ saparivāram | pāṇau prasaranta... ... ... ... ... ...bālā’ iti cchāyā

div.p: ekāgratāprakarṣagamyo vāsanīyastamudāharati—anyonyeti | vyājāpasṛtaparivāre līlāveśmani tatkālakalitamanmathonmāthaṃ vidagdhamithunamuttarottaramapanīyamānatrapāsādhvasatayā pratikalaṃ navenduvatkāntiviśeṣamāsādayati | vicitramavyabhicāryanupraveśe harṣaruditasmitādīnāmavyavasthitatayā vyatirekarūpakilakiñcitākhyaśṛṅgārabhāvonmeṣaḥ ||

śāstrārtha iti | ekapuruṣārthaprayojanakapadārthavyutpādanaṃ vidhiniṣedhavyutpattiphalakaṃ śāstraṃ tadarthasavyapekṣatvam | taduktaprakriyānirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ vākyārthasya gāmbhīryam | maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā iti catastraścittasaṃmārjanāḥ | avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ pañca kleśāḥ | cittavṛttinirodho yogaḥ; sa eva vyutthānahetubhiranāskandanīyaḥ sabījaḥ | sattvaṃ pradhānam, puruṣaścidrūpastayorbhedaḥ prathākhyātiriti sāṃkhyaprakriyā | atra maitrryādipadānāmiti | vākyārthasyaiva yathoktarūpatve tatpratipādakapadānāmavaśyaṃ tathābhāvo bhavatīti vaiśeṣikādbhedo vakṣyate ||

l.seg: tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrttiranaghā kīrtyā ca saptābdhayaḥ || 115 ||’

div.p: vistara iti | vākyārthasya pallavabhūtatattatsahṛdayacamatkāriviśeṣaprasāraṇaṃ saṃvṛtavivṛtapaṭavat vistarākhyo guṇaḥ | vistara iva vistaraḥ śabdaprapañcavadityarthaḥ | anyathā vistāra iti syāt | saṃgrāmāṅgaṇetyādau tu śatruśiraśchedātsaptābdhivyāpinī tvayā kīrtirārjitetyetāvānvākyārtho laukikasādhāraṇatayā ca camatkārāspadamiti saṃgrāmāṅgaṇasaṃgatireva na tathā yathā vīramātrasyocitā tatrāpi cāpasamāropaṇamiti kāpyutsāhaśaktiḥ | ata eva balavadāśrayaprasaktaluṇṭākavadhena yadavasitaṃ tenaiva tadāsāditamiti sopaskārakartṛkarmaprapañcena vikāsanameva kāvyapadavīprāptibījam | tadidamāha—bahuvidhaṃ vikāsitatvāditi | nātra śabdavikāsādhīnaḥ prakarṣa iti śabdavistarādbhedaḥ ||

lg.l: ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni ‘na pareṣām’ kha gapareṣāṃ na samācaret || 116 ||’

div.p: atra śāstre vistarapratipāditasya dharmasya ślokārdhenokta‘pratipāditatvāt’ khatvādayamarthasaṃkocaḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ||

saṃkṣepa iti | tasyetyarthasya samāse guṇībhūtasyāpi budhdyā vibhajya parāmarśaḥ | yathā—‘atha śabdānuśāsanam | keṣāṃ ? śabdānāmi'ti | aśeṣaviśeṣopagrāhakapuraskāreṇa vākyārthasyābhidhānaṃ vivṛtasaṃvṛtapaṭavatsaṃkṣepaḥ || śrūyatāmiti | atra tena tena viśeṣeṇa vistarataḥ pratipādayitavyasya dharmasya yatkiṃcidātmanaḥ pratikūlamanyasya nācaraṇīyamiti sāmānyenābhidhānamapravṛttapravartane pragalbhāyamānamatisundaramābhāsate | nātra racanāsaṃkocapratiṣṭhitaṃ kāvyamiti śabdaguṇādbhedaḥ ||

lg.l: śabdārthau yatra tulyau staḥ saṃmitatvaṃ taducyate |

l.seg: saṃvādaḥ praṇavena yasya dalatā kāyaikatāyāṃ tayo-
rūrdhvadvāravicintitena ca hṛdi dhyātaḥ svarūpeṇa ca || 117 ||’

div.p: atra praṇavalakṣaṇasyārthasya tulyatvena yathāvadvibhajya viniveśanaṃ saṃmitatvam ||
śabdārthāviti | śabdasyārthau tayorvibhajya viniveśanaṃ saṃmitatvamiti kecit, tanna | śabdagrahaṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt | dvitvāvivakṣāprasaṅgācca |

lg.l: phaliaṃmiva pīṇapaoharehiṃ ajjāi lāvaṇṇam ||’‘pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullitagiva mugdhākṣibhyām | phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāmāryāyā lāvaṇyam ||’ iti chāyā

div.p: ityādau dviprabhṛtīnāmarthānāmavibhajya viniveśanamiṣyate | tasmācchabdaścārthaśca śabdārthau | tayostulyatvaṃ yāvaduddeśaśabdārtham | arthasya vibhajya tulādhṛtavatpratiniveśaḥ saṃmitatvamiti | arthamuddiśya śabdatulanaṃ kāvyabhāvabījaṃ śabdaguṇaḥ, śabdamuddiśya tvarthatulanamarthaguṇaśca | tathāhi—parameśvarasya mūrdhni bālenduḥ, pārvatīstane nakhāṅka iti pṛthakśabdenoddiśya tadupamāyogyatayā kāyaikatāyāṃ dalanaṃ hṛtpadmanavamadvārayordhyānena yugapatsaṃnidhānamiti samyagvibhajya tulitasyeva praṇavasya pratinirdeśa iti || tadidamāha—atreti | yathāvaditi | yena prakāreṇa saṃgacchata iti tadanatikrameṇeti ||

l.seg: prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati |

div.p: atra tamālamālāvalayitasarittīrakṛtasaṃketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ svatanau bhāvināṃ parapuruṣanakhakṣatānāṃ nalagranthyālekhavyājagopanena sābhiprāyabhaṇanaṃ bhāvikam ||

sābhiprāya iti | abhiprāyaviśeṣapratibaddhasya vākyārthasyoktivinyāsa uktayā viśeṣo nyāsaḥ | śabdaguṇe padānāṃ bhāvyarthaniṣpāditā iha tvarthasyeti viśeṣaḥ | tathā hi—dṛṣṭimityādau tanumālikhantu jaraṭhacchedā nalagranthaya ityuktayā vinyasyamāna eva bhāvinalagranthyālekhyarūpārthaḥ kulaṭāsvarūpānusaṃdhānadattāntaḥ karaṇasya pratipatturanantarameva svaiṃravihāracihnagopanamabhivyanakti ||

l.seg: ‘śubhe ko 'yaṃ vṛddho gṛhaparivṛḍhaḥ kiṃ tava pitā
na me bhartā rātrau vyapagatadṛganyacca badhiraḥ |
kva yāminyāṃ yāsi svapihi nanu nirdaṃśamaśake || 119 ||’

div.p: gatiriti | arthādarthaviśeṣāt | hṛdayasaṃvādina iti yāvat | arthāntarasya tathābhūtasya | tena yatra sahṛdayahṛdayaṃgamādarthātkāṃsyatālānusvānusvānanyāyena tādṛśamarthāntaramavagamyate sā gatiriti lakṣaṇārthaḥ || śubhe ko 'yaṃ vṛddha iti | sarvākāramanavadyāyāstāvaddāsyamapi nāyamarhatīti hṛdayānukūlamarthaṃ praśnādavagatya gṛhaparivṛḍha ityuttaram | asmādapi mama nāyaṃ ko 'pi kiṃ tu gṛhasvāmīti hṛdayasaṃvādinamarthamavadhārya kiṃ kava pitetyādikamapraśnottaraśṛṅkhalā gaveṣaṇīyā | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—uttarāditi | uttarapratyuttaravākyāt | uttaraṃ tu padaṃ praśnapadameva ||
rītiriti | utpattyādīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ kramaḥ kāvyaśobhāvahatvena guṇaḥ | nedaṃ vastusvabhāvavarṇanamiti jāterarthavyakteśca bhedaḥ | sugamamudāharaṇam ||

l.seg: api dvandvaṃ diṣṭyā taditi subhage saṃvadati vā-

div.p: uktiriti | svīyo 'bhīṣṭo 'rthaḥ svārthaḥ | tasya sākṣātpratipādanamanucitamiti arthāntarabhaṅgibhiḥ pratipādanamarthaguṇaḥ | bhavyo manoharaḥ | sugamamanyat | nāyakanāyikāsaṃgamasyeti | nāyakasya nāyikayā tasyāśca nāyakeneti parasparotkaṇṭhāprakarṣo vivakṣitaḥ | tenaikaśeṣo na bhavati ||

l.seg: naināmādriyase tvamicchasi nu tāṃ tvāmeva sā dhāvati || 122 ||’

div.p: atra tvadvaktravilokanākulena dhātrā tvadīyā lakṣmīḥ śatruṣu nikṣipya viduṣāṃ ca lakṣmīstvayyāropitā | ‘yataḥ’ gaatastvaṃ vipakṣalakṣmīmādriyase sā ca tvāmanudhāvati | yā ca viduṣāṃ lakṣmīstayā tvamāpūritastena te daridrāḥ | ata eva tvamenāṃ nādriyase | iyaṃ ca vidvadgeheṣveva dṛśyate ityetāvataḥ prabhūtasyārthasyānekavākyena pratipāditatvādvivakṣitārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhiḥ ||

vivakṣiteti | kaverabhimatasya bhūyaso 'pyarthasya svalpenaiva vākyena pratipādanaṃ praụdhiḥ | tathā hi—tvāṃ nirmāya jagadvilakṣaṇavastunirvahaṇacamatkṛtasya dhātustvadvaktrenduvilokanaṃ tadāsaṅgena tvadarthanirbhitāyāḥ śriyaḥ pratirājakeṣu bhramaṇakrameṇa saṃcāraṇaṃ tatpūrvāparapratisaṃghāta (na)balādvidvabhdyo lakṣmīmākṛṣyetyādiko bhūyānarthaḥ stokena vākyenopanīta iti ||
saṃpratyatiprasaṅgavāraṇārthaṃ kramaprāptā vaiśeṣikaguṇā lakṣitavyāḥ | te ca doṣā api santo guṇībhāvamāpannā ucyante | tatraiṣa kavīnāmālāpaḥ—

lg.l: ‘‘sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhrabhamudvahatyavinayocchrāyaḥ | dhūmoccayaḥ prajvalitānāṃ bahumataḥ surabhidārūṇām ||’ iti chāyāsāmaṇṇasundarīṇaṃ vibbhamamuvvahaï aviṇaoccea |

div.p: ‘kvaciddūṣaṇānāmapi guṇatvamiti darśayannāha—‘ iti bhavetdāruṇānāṃ guṇatvamiti śaṅkāṃ darśayannāha—

lg.l: huṃ hu muñca mamameti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 123 ||’

div.p:
padādīti | padavākyavākyārthadoṣāṇāṃ guṇatvāpattaye nityaṃ ye bhavanti, te 'nukaraṇādiṣu madhye doṣaguṇāḥ smṛtā iti saṃbandhaḥ | yadyapi cānukaraṇādikā eva na guṇāḥ, tathāpyanukriyamāṇādyabhedopacāreṇoktam | padādidoṣeṣvantyāntyasyaikasya navadhāmede caturviṃśatiprakārāḥ | yatheti | yenopādhinā guṇībhavanamācāryairupapāditaṃ tattadupādhivibhāgapradarśanaṃ kariṣyata iti | yā mliṣṭeti | iha dvaye doṣā nityā anityāśca | tatrānukaraṇamātrānapavadanīyadoṣabhāvāścyutasaṃskārāprayuktādayo nityāḥ | anukaraṇīyānukaraṇānapavādakahetukāḥ śrutikaṭutvaprabhṛtayastvanityāḥ | yeṣu padadoṣeṣu mliṣṭamlecchitaprabhṛtīnāṃ yāsādhutā nirūpitā, sā guṇatvamanukaraṇe prapadyata ityanvayaḥ | luptaikadeśaṃ mliṣṭam | avyaktarūpaṃ mlecchitam | ādigrahaṇena grastanirasto-
paghmātakampitādayaḥ | huṃ hu iti dvitīyahuṃkāre binduproñchanānmliṣṭam | mamameti kiṃ muñca muñceti mliṣṭamuta mameti na niścīyate | anukaraṇatvāhuṇatvamiti | arthaviśeṣe hi sādhutvavyavastheti | yaccāśaktijamasādhurūpam, tasyānukaraṇe sādhutvamiṣyata ityuktam, anukriyamāṇaṃ tu svarūpapadānukaraṇatayā pūrvārthatyāgena sāghveva | tasyaivānukaraṇasya tatkālarañjakamānavatīmamamavacanānukāratayā ca guṇīkaraṇasāmarthyamiti ||

lg.l: patkāṣiṇo 'pi no yānti ye vacanti prayuñjate || 124 ||’

div.p: guṇatvamiti | patkāṣiṇa iti pādamapi kaṣantaḥ | ‘himakāṣihatiṣu ca’ iti pādaśabdasya padbhāvaḥ | vacervacantītyeva rūpamaprayuktam | na tvanyathāpi | ‘satyaṃ nāma na vacmi’ ityāderanumatatvāt | ityādipadānāmityudāharaṇāntarābhiprāyeṇa ||

lg.l: ‘‘nāṣṭrā’ sva-rā; ‘nāṃṣṭrā’ iti paṭhitvā ‘nāṃṣṭrā rākṣasāḥ’ iti vyākhyātaṃ kāvyānuśāsanaviveke hemacandrācāryaiḥtvāṣṭrāstvāṣṭrārirāṣṭre na bhrāṣṭre nādaṃṣṭriṇo janāḥ |
dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ surāṣṭre na mahārāṣṭre ca noṣṭriṇaḥ || 125 ||’

div.p: yacchruteriti | durvacakayogā iti vyāvahārikacatuḥṣaṣṭyāṃ durvacakaprayogo 'numataḥ | tasyānuprāsaghaṭakatve 'laṃkāranirvahaṇakṣamatayā kaviśaktivyañjakasya guṇībhāvaḥ | ādipadena raudrādirasānupraveśaḥ | yadāha—

lg.l: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre tena varṇā rasacyutāḥ ||
ta eva viniveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā |
tadā taṃ dīpayantyeva tena varṇā rasacyutāḥ

div.p: tvāṣṭrā rākṣasāstvaṣṭurapatyaṃ vṛtrastasyāririndrastasya rāṣṭre svarge na santi | bhrāṣṭre caṇakādibharjanasthāne na kuṇṭhadaṃṣṭrā bhavanti | asitacañcucaraṇā haimā‘haṃsā’ kha dhārtarāṣṭrā va vidyante | uṣṭriṇa uṣṭropajīvinaḥ ||

lg.l: babhau mukhenāpratimena kācana śriyādhikānāṃ prati menakā ca na || 127 ||’

div.p: atra khaluśabdasya caśabdasya ca pādapūraṇamātre 'pi prayojane yamakatvādguṇatvam ||

yatpādapūraṇeti | dyotanīyamarthamantareṇa prayuktamavyayapadamanarthakamityuktam | pādapūraṇārthatvaṃ tu dūṣaṇatābījam | ādigrahaṇādgadyapūraṇam | sati tūpayoge tasya tadbijābhāvāddoṣabhāvaviraho 'laṃkārārambhe ca guṇatvam | tadidamuktam—yamakādiṣviti | ādiśabdo 'nuprāsacitrādiparaḥ | vākyālaṃkārārthatvamapi śabdālaṃkārārambhakatvameva | yadāha—‘ārṣārṣiputrakarṣikavaidikādivākyānāmalaṃkārahetavo vākyālaṃkārārthāḥ’ iti | tena—

atra hi pra ityetayorna vākyālaṃkāraprayojakatvamityuktaprāyam | yoṣitāmityādābatitarāṃ nakhalūnaṃ yoṣitāṃ gātramujjvalatayā nonamityeva paryāpte dvitīyapāde tadubhayamapi yamakārambhakaṃ satprastutopayogitayā kavivyutpattipuraskāra pravṛttamapajahāti doṣabhāvamupādatte ca guṇatvamiti ||

lg.l: ‘‘khādayaḥ’ khakhātayaḥ kani kāle te sphātayaḥ sphārhavalgavaḥ |

div.p: atra ‘khādayaḥ’ khakhātaya ityādīnāṃ ghargharikādau dhṛṅaścānavasthāne na rụ̄dhiḥ | gụ̄dhārthe tu prahelikādau tanna duṣyatīti teṣāṃ doṣaguṇatvam ||

yattviti | rụ̄dhicyutatvena dvitīyāṃ saṃjñāṃ prayojayati | ākīrṇāmantraṇādyupayoginī prahelikā | tathā ca—tadvidyasaṃbhāṣāyāṃ vidagdhairupanyāsaiḥ svārthāpratyāyakatvalakṣaṇabījābhāvānna doṣaḥ, guṇastu bhavati | anukaraṇādikamādipadena gṛhyate | khātayo ghargharikāḥ | kanīti kanyāsaṃbodhanam | kālaścaraṇaḥ karṇāṭadeśabhāṣānusārāt | sphātayaḥ sphītāḥ | sphārho manoharaḥ | valgurdhvaniḥ | candra āhlādakaḥ | vāyavaḥ prāṇāḥ | dhāriṇo 'navasthitāḥ | tadayaṃ vākyārthaḥ—he kani kanye, tavāhlādakacaraṇabaddhā yathoktaviśeṣaṇā ghargharikāḥ sākṣādbhavanti śrotreṇa pratyakṣīkriyante | atra prastāve mama prāṇā uddīpanaprakarṣamasahiṣṇavo dhāriṇo 'navasthitā iti | vraṇaprarohasthānādau khātyādiśabdānāṃ rụ̄dhirna tu ghargharikādāvityāha—atreti | nāmadhātuvivakṣayā dvidhā vyākhyātam ||
atra dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtimiti kalpopapadaṃ mahīruhamiti hiraṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipumityasya tucchārthatve 'pi cchando 'nurodhādguṇatvam ||

tuccheti | śabdapallavanasya prakṛtarasānanuguṇatvena doṣatvaprasaṅge kvacidananyagatikatayā kaverutpādyate | tathā hi—bhinnasargāntairityādinā sargāṇāmautsargikaikavṛttanirvāhaucitye sa yathoktasaṃkṣiptaśabdāpraveśātpararūpeṇa tadarthatvasya vivakṣitatvācca
śabdavikāse na doṣaḥ, kiṃ tu guṇa eva | prakṛtodāharaṇe dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtimiti kalpopapadaṃ mahīruhamiti ca nidarśanaṃ manyante | ṣoḍaśādiśabdānāmapi vaṃśasthapraveśatvādananyagatikatvābhāvāt | hiraṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipumiti tu saṃgacchate | nahi hiraṇyakaśipuśabdo 'tra praviśati | pradarśanārthaṃ tu dvayamanyadapyupāttam | evaṃvidhaḥ śabdavistaro guṇatāmāsādayatītyāśayāt | tenāyamarthaḥ—pallavākhyaśabdaguṇe tāvattucchatā camatkārakāritayā guṇadhurādhirụ̄dhaivāvistaraviviktaviṣayatayā kva viśeṣaguṇasya bhavatīti jijñāsāyāṃ tu chando 'nurodho vihitaḥ | so 'pi hi kādācitkaḥ karotyeva doṣabhāvavyāvṛttimiti ||

pratipāditamiti | asti kaścidevaṃ viṣayo yatrāsamarthasya cārutayā guṇabhāvaḥ | tathā hi—yadyapi gaṇapāṭhādavyaktaśabdaḥ kūjitam, tathāpi loke pakṣiviṣaya eva niyatam, tathā cābhimataviṣaye prayuktaṃ pakṣivirutākāramāvedayati | 'hārītaprabhṛti—‘ ityādinā kāmaśāstrakāraiḥ sītkāropadeśanāt | sītkārasya ca catuḥṣaṣṭikalātvena pravaṇatayātyantamupādeyatvāt | tadāha—‘anyānyapyākṛtigrahaṇānyupalakṣayet’ iti ||

śāstreti | śāstramātraprasiddhānāmāhatyapratītyajananena vivakṣitavākyārthapratyayapariskhalanaṃ khedadāyī nānāmṛduduṣṭatābījam | yadi tu kutaścidviśeṣājjhaṭityeva pratītiṃ janayettadā kathaṃ doṣaḥ | asti ca pratipattivyutpattyatiśayalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ | tadidamuktam—tadvidyeti | mantraṇādyavasare aucitīvaśāttattatpadānāṃ guṇatvamapi nirvahati | śāstraprakiyāpekṣitvaṃ gāmbhīryam | śāstravyavahārasaṃketitapadānāṃ guṇatvamityanyaḥ prakāraḥ | yathāvadviniyogaḥ kāryastasya prakārasākalyaṃ śarīram, śabdacchalātkāyaḥ, ātmā sārabhūtaḥ kṣetrajñaśca | karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ puruṣadravyasaṃpaddeśakālavibhāgo vinipātapratīkāraḥ kāryasiddhiriti pañcāṅgāni | rūpaṃ saṃjñā saṃskāro vedanā vijñānamiti pañca skandhāḥ ||
atrātmanā padaṃ śabdaguṇamiti pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamiti cākāśaviṣayā kāñcīguṇasthānaṃ nitambaviṣayamiti sarvaprasiddherjhaṭityeva pratītiṃ karotīti kliṣṭasyāsya guṇatvam ||

arthapratītikṛditi | ihāpi tadeva dūṣaṇatābījaṃ jhaṭiti pratītijanane sati samādhīyate | samādhānopāyaśca padāntarasaṃnidhānamatiprasiddhiḥ prakaraṇaṃ vā | tathā hi—prakṛtodāhaऱṇe uttarārdhe harirityabhidhānādātmanaḥ padamiti hareḥ padamiti saṃpannam, asya ca sāmānyaśabdatvādākāśaviṣayā pratītiryadyapi jhaṭiti notpattumarhati, tathāpi śabdaguṇamiti viśeṣaṇena padārthāntarādyavacchidya vivakṣitābhimukhī pratītirupajanyate | pituḥ padamiti | yadyapi padamiti sāmānyaṃ tathāpyākāśasyaiva madhyamacaraṇavinyāsasthānatvena prasiddherna tathocitapratītivyavadhānam | kāñcīguṇasthānamiti | caraṇādārabhya varṇanākrame nitamba eva kāñcīniveśanasyocitatvānna pratī-
tivyavadhānam | tadidamudāharaṇatrayaprayojanamudāharaṇāderaneko 'tra vākyārtho gaveṣaṇīyaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi sarvaprasiddheriti bravīti | itthaṃ śabdaguṇaśabdasya bahuvrīhitvādavaśyaṃ viśeṣaparyavasānāya prasiddhiranusaraṇīyā | avaśyaṃ na varṇanakrame 'pi kāñcīguṇasthānamaninditāyā ityatra kāñcīguṇasthānaśabdasya nitambaviśeṣaparyavasānārthaṃ kavīnāmaucityaprasiddhiraṅgīkartavyeti | nanu cātmanaḥ padaṃ śabdaguṇatvamityatra prasādaḥ kasmānna bhavati | evamāha na bhavatīti | udāharaṇasyādūṣaṇatvātsāmānyaśabdasya viśeṣaparyavasānam, anyacca samabhivyāhṛtapadārthasaṃsargarūpe vākyārthe svacchasalila ivābhimataviśeṣapratibimbanamityupādhidvayasya saṃkarācca ||

lg.l: ‘amhārisā vi kaïṇo kaïṇo ‘anda’ (canda)’ kha gahalibụdhḍhasālipamuhā vi |
maṇḍukkamakkaḍā vi hu honti harīsappasiṃhā vi || 133 ||’
maṇḍūkamarkaṭā api khalu bhavanti harisarpasiṃhā api ||]

div.p: aprasiddhārthasaṃvandhamiti | tasya guṇārthasya vyākhyānaṃ tavdyākhyānam | atrāpyatiprasidhdyākṛṣṭasyānatiprasiddhārthapratītyakaraṇaṃ duṣṭatābījamabhidhānīyam, tattu pratītiparyavasānādeva nivartate | bhavati cābhidhānakopa iva vyākhyāne jhaṭiti pratyayaḥ | asmādṛśā api mandapratibhānāḥ kavayaḥ kaviśabdavācyā harivṛddhaśālipramukhāśca lokottarapratibhāśālinastadavayavatāṃ vikhyāte cāvikhyāte ca śabdāḥ sādhāraṇā bhavanti | tadyathā—hariśabda eveti vyākhyānam | tato doṣatvābhāvaḥ prativastulakṣaṇālaṃkāraparyavasāyitayā ca prakṛtārthānuguṇatvena guṇatvalābhaḥ | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—svayaṃ vyākhyātatvāddoṣābhāvo guṇatvaṃ punarābhiprāyikātprakṛtānuguṇabhāvāditi boddhavyam ||
atra mayūrabarhacandrakasaṃketena kalpitasya candranāmno neyārthatve 'pi prahelikātvādguṇatvam ||

neyārthamiti | atrāpi pūrvavadeva vāsanā | ākīrṇāmantraṇādau vidagdhānāṃ lakṣaṇādayaḥ prahelikāviśeṣānunmīlayanta upayujyante | tathā hi—mayūreti | 'jianāu’ iti pāṭhe jitanauka iti sa evārthaḥ | mayūro barhabhāre candrakaṃ vahati | anena saṃketena candranāma labhyate | saṃviṣṭasya śirodeśa ucchīrṣam, caraṇadeśaḥ pādāntaḥ | ucchīrṣeṇa prācī diglakṣyate | ‘prākśirāḥ śayīta’ iti vacanāt | arthātpādāntena pratīcī | tataśca ‘prācyāḥ pratīcimardhacandro gataḥ’ iti prātaḥkālodbhedo vākyārthaḥ | ‘aṇuṇenti ajiṇaṇāu’ iti pāṭhe subhagamāninaṃ kāntamanunayantyā mayā jñāta hati khaṇḍitakāminīkhedoktiḥ | na caitāsāṃ lakṣaṇānāmasti kiṃcitprayojanamiti neyārthatvaprasaktau prahelikābhāva eva samādhānahetuḥ | nanu cocchīrṣapādāntarapadayorastu, mayūrakalāpa ityādau tu katham | yamiti hi sarvanāmābhimatameva tāvadupasthāpayati | barhe bahūnāṃ bahule kathamekasya pratītirityabhidhāne 'pi kadācitkliṣṭasya viśeṣaguṇaḥ syāt | nātra neyārthatā, kiṃ tu tena saṃketena kalpitasya candranāmna iti | tasya nāmnaḥ sadṛśanāmetyanena mukhyavṛttyaiva vivakṣitasadṛśalābhāditi | atredaṃ vaktavyam—tasya nāmna ityanena candrakapadamupasthāpitam, na ca tena sahāsti candrapadasya sādṛśyamiti | tatra lakṣaṇāśrayaṇīyā | tadidamuktaṃ candrasaṃketena kalpitasya candranāmna iti | upalakṣaṇatayā ca ekadeśavyākhyānam ||

atra tasminnapatye ityaniścitasyāpyapatyaviśeṣasya saṃdigdhatve 'pi gauryāmiti prakaraṇena gamyate | meghacchavirityasya ca navaśyāmādipadānupādāne 'pi śaurisaṃbaddhatvānnavameghacchavirmeghaśyāmacchaviriti vā viśeṣo niścīyata iti tasyāpi guṇatvam ||

yaditi | saṃśāyakajātīyasya saṃdehajanakatvaṃ nāma dūṣakatābījam | tadyadikutaścidviśeṣādvivakṣitapratītirapratyūhamupapadyate tadā bhavatyeva doṣābhāvaḥ | viśeṣāvagamo viśeṣadarśanaṃ tasyaiva saṃśayavirodhitvāt | mahībhṛta ityādāvapatyaśabdo yadyapi gaurīśabdo 'pi taditaradattapada iti saṃśāyakajātīyo bhavati, tathāpi tacchabdopasthāpita eva vivakṣitaviśeṣe paryavasyannapajahāti doṣatvam | tacchabda eva kathaṃ tamarthamupanayatītyatra tu prakaraṇameva jāgradavasthamasti | meghacchavirityatra tu yadyapi meghapadaṃ śyāmāśyāmadattapadatayā saṃśāyakajātīyam, tathāpi prasiddhapadanīlavarṇārthagaurīpadasamabhivyāhārācchabdāntarasaṃnidhirapi viśeṣe niyamayati tadvā chavipadaṃ vā viśeṣe paryavasyati | atra prakaraṇādīnāṃ viśeṣasmṛtihetutvāt | ata eva sūtre bahuvacanādipadānupādānādanupāttāstadetadabhisaṃdhāya vyācaṣṭe—atretyādi | evaṃ navameghacchaviriti cokte yathā niyamenārthapratītirapratyūhā bhavati tathā meghacchavirityukta iti | ata eva kavisamayaprasiddhaviśeṣāvagamasāmagrīsaṃpādanena guṇatvamiti | kathaṃ punaridaṃ kliṣṭasya vaiśeṣikaṃ na bhavati ko vākyabhūtena bhavati | kiṃ tu saṃśāyakatvamāpādayataḥ pratibhāso 'pyuktayuktyā nivartata ityabhimatam | na caivaṃrūpatā kliṣṭavaiśeṣike saṃbhavati | ekasyaiva citrapadasya saṃśayaśaktiriti na vākyārthagāmitā ||

yattaditi | evaṃ vastu prakṛtamabhisaṃdhāya vākyaracane tadupamardakavastvantarapraveśo virodhaḥ | yatra dve api vastunī prakṛte vastvantarameva vā prakṛtaṃ tadyathoktarūpābhāve kathaṃ doṣaḥ | tathā hi—abhidhāyetyādau dūtavākye saṃdhivigrahayormitho virodhinorapi vivakṣitaṃ sa doṣaḥ | saruṣaḥ sakrodhasya tava mānanāṃ pūjāṃ śiśupāla icchati | anuśayaḥ paścāttāpaḥ | abhimukhaṃ sotkaṇṭhaṃ mano yasya sa tatheti saṃdhipakṣe | vigrahapakṣe tvanuśayaḥ krodho bhavataḥ sakāśādabhi bhayaśūnyaṃ mano yasyeti nityasāpekṣatvātsamāsaḥ | saruṣo mānanā upayogastadiha nisṛṣṭārthasyobhayopanyāso yadrocate tadvidhīyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya racita iti guṇatvamityubhayavivakṣāpakṣe vyākhyānam | yadā tu śāsanaharo dūtastadodyateṣvapi śastreṣu yathoktavaktāro dūtā bhavantīti nyāyena vigraharthamevābhimataḥ vipakṣasyāpi prarocanā dūtakartavyeti mukhe saṃdhiḥ paryāyabhūto yukta eva | tadidaṃ vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atreti | saṃdhirūpo 'rthaḥ saṃdhyarthaḥ, vigraharūpo 'rtho vigrahārthaḥ | tayorabhidhānena sphuṭa eva bhinno 'rthaḥ prayojanam | pakṣadvaye 'pi yatprayojanamuktaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇaitavdyākhyānam ||
atrāsiśyāmamityākāśaṃ prati, sāgramityanena ca varṣasahasraṃ prati viśeṣānabhidhāne 'pi dūrotpatanaciratapaścaraṇayorupayogavivakṣāyāṃ guṇatvam ||

aprayojakamiti | tadeva kavibhirupādīyata iti yadabhipretasaṃdhimādhatte | yatra vākyārthapraviṣṭamapi na tathābhāvamāsādayati tadaprayojakamityuktam | tasya yadi viśeṣasvarūpābhidhāne paryavasānena prayogo na tarhi doṣaḥ | tathā hi—ākāśamityādau nātiśyāmatārūpaṃ viśeṣamākāśe kāṃcidapi viśeṣamātrāmunmudrayati, ākāśasya sarvadā tadrūpānapāyāt | evamasamagrasya sahasratvābhāvātsāgramityapi na viśeṣādhāyakam | ākāśasahasrayostu yadeva rūpabhāvedanīyamityatraitāvanmātrābhiprāyeṇa nāsti dūṣaṇam, tathāpi nāntarīyakayorabhidhāne kiṃ prayojanaṃ yenānayorguṇabhāvasaṃpattirityata āha—dūra iti | atidūre śyāmatvamadhikaṃ pratibhāti | kṣaṇamātramapi na viratirāsīditi sāgrapadābhiprāyo 'ta eva nātra paunaruktyam | tarhi vākyārthe viśeṣādhāyakatvamevānayoriti kathaṃ dūṣaṇatvasaṃbhāvanā | ittham | yasminnanupādīyamāne 'pi nābhimatanyūnatā tatpadamaprayojakam | asti cātra dvayorapi tajjātīyatāyāṃ doṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ | sa prakṛtopayogavivakṣāyāmeva nivartate | sarvathā prakṛtānupayoge dūṣaṇatvānapāyitā | asti cātrocita evopayogo yo vivakṣitumarhatītyāha—vivakṣāyāmiti ||

yaditi | saṃdarbhacchāyāvaiṣamyamatra kaṣṭatābījamiti pūrvamuktaṃ tatra yadi samānacchāyaśabdamadhyaniveśanena pratikṣipyate tadā kathaṃ doṣaḥ | tathābhūtānāmeva padānāṃ saṃdarbhanirvāhakatayā mahākavinibaddhamiti | ata eva śabdagamakatayā guṇatvalābhaḥ | uddaṇḍatvena piṇḍītagarāṇāṃ kaṭhoratā | tādṛśānāmapi taralanena praụdhiḥ | uttāle-
tyādyanuprāsavatproḍhapadasajātīyameva tallapadam | evaṃ galletyādau boddhavyam | tadidamāha—atra tallagalletyādi ||

lg.l: ‘tasmai himādreḥ prayatāṃ tanūjāṃ yatātmane yojayituṃ yatasva |

div.p: grāmyamiti | atra kecidyathāsaṃkhyaṃ vyācakṣate—ghṛṇāvadādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ krameṇa saṃkhyānagopanalakṣaṇāni doṣatvābhāvabījānīti, tadasat | ghṛṇāvadarthādimātra evāgre pratisaṃbhedatrikamupādāya saṃvyānāditrikasyopadarśanāt | etādṛśayathāsaṃkhyasūcanāyaiva lakṣaṇātikrameṇa ghṛṇāvataḥ prathamamupādānam | tasmātsaṃkhyānamiva saṃkhyānaṃ lokānumatiḥ | kiṃcitpadaṃ duṣṭajātīyamapi loke nopādānāttādrūpyaṃ jahātyeva | prāyeṇa lokānusāri kāvyadarśanaṃ bhavatyataḥ pratisvaṃ bhedatritayasaṃbandhādupapannaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ syādityabhidhāya pūrvakrameṇodāharati—atreti | etena saṃvīteṣvityādikaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vyākhyātam | yathā śivaliṅgasya saṃsthāna ityatra yadyapi mukhyavidhaiva śivaliṅgapadamślīla evārthe, tathāpyavigānenādiprayogayogitvānna vrīḍādānakṣamaṃ tathehāpi taddhīryeti | śivaliṅgetyatra bhagavatsaṃbandhaḥ prayojaka iti tu tulyamatrāpītyāha—taditi | atra hi jagadantaryāmiṇo bhagavatastadvirodhitayā prasiddhirupajīvyā tadupajīvane vrīḍādāyinī pratītiranutthāyinyeva | atraivācāryamataṃ likhati—saṃvītasya hīti | kasyāsabhyatveti | bhāvanā sakalalokasādhāraṇaṃ jñānam ||

lg.l: sa te 'nuneyaḥ subhago 'bhimānī bhaginyayaṃ naḥ prathamābhisaṃdhiḥ || 142 ||’

div.p: yasya padasya vyutpattilabhyamarthāntaraṃ grāmyam, yasya vā samabhivyāhāralabhyam, tatra gopanaṃ samādhānabījam | tadubhayaṃ bhavati rụ̄dhervā balavattvaṃ jaladharādiṣviva tathā tātparyonnayanapratibandhena viparītārthatātparyonnayanaparyavasānaṃ vā | yathodāhariṣyamāṇe tathā ca pratīterapratyūhe dūṣaṇatābījābhāvastatra prathamakakṣāpakṣīkaraṇenādyamudāharati | rụ̄dhyupasthāpitaḥ prāthamiko 'rthastasya bhāvo jhaṭiti vākyārthajñānaṃ tasya bhāvanā vāsanā tayā gopanaṃ camatkārārpaṇamatirodhānam | amumevārthamācāryamatena svahastayati—vastumāhātmyeti | avibhāvanāditi | viruddhaṃ vrīḍādāyitayā bhāvanaṃ tasyābhāvāt | tena kvacidyogopādāne 'pi tathābhāvasaṃpattau na doṣaḥ | etadevodāharaṇena sphuṭayati—bhaginīti | etena bhagavatīti pūrvānupāttamudāharaṇaṃ vyākhyātam | dvitīyagopanamaśastārthāntare vyaktībhaviṣyatīti ||

yasya padasyaikadeśo grāmyānugāmī tasya smṛtihetutā | tatra kutraciduktivaicitryādekadeśo jhaṭiti smārakaḥ, kvacittathaiva samudāyaśaktyā viparītārthopasthāpanājjhaṭiti svārthaṃ samudāya eva pratipādayati | ādyo dūṣaṇam | dvitīyastu vaijātyābhāvādguṇaḥ | tadevaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yatrādye grāmyatvaṃ tato 'nyatraiva bahudhā lakṣaṇāttadidamuktam—anyatra lakṣitatvāditi ||

lg.l: ‘bhadre māri praśastaṃ vada sadasi mudā nṛtya kṛtye muhūrtaṃ‘muhurte’ kha mṛtyo ratnaiścatuṣkaṃ viracaya racayārātrikaṃ kālarātri‘rātre’ kha |

l.seg: mevaṃ deve bhavānīṃ vadati parijanavyāhṛtistrāyatāṃ vaḥ || 144 ||’

div.p: atra mārīkṛtyādīnāmaśastārthānāmapi padānāṃ samastamaṅgalāyatanasya bhagavato viśveśvarasya saṃbandhenoktatvādguṇatvam ||

punarapareṇa prakāreṇa saṃvyānaṃ bhavatītyapraśaste sphorayati | parameśvarasya maṅgalāyatanatvaṃ tatsaṃbandhimātrasyaiva maṅgalībhavananiyamena śāstretihāsādau prasiddhatvāt | taduktam—‘tathāpi smartṝṇāṃ varada paramaṃ maṅgalamasi’ iti | ayaṃ ca prakāro 'praśastārtha eva bhavati | māryādayo mātṛviśeṣāḥ | ārātrikaṃ nīrājanadīpavyāsaṅgapātram | parijanapadaṃ saṃbandhaṃ puṣṇāti ||
atra dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe nipatantītyasyāmaṅgalārthāntaratve 'pi ‘haṃsānahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāniti vyapadiśāmi’ iti vakṣyamāṇa‘vākyāntaraguptatvāt’ khavākyaguptatvādguṇatvam ||

yathā veti | pakṣaḥ patatraṃ parikaraśca | āśā dik pratyāśā ca | madaḥ kṣībatā darpaśca | nipāta āgamanaṃ śastrādihatānāṃ medinīsaṃgatiśca | raṅgamaṅgalāntaḥ svastyayanapravṛttasya sūtradhārasya maṅgalārthādhikāravastuprastāvanaṃ tāvadbuddhipūrvakamatra na saṃbhavati haṃsānahamityādinā tātparyasya niyamitatvāt | svaśaktyā tu padārthāntaramā-
bhāsayanti padāni doṣatayā na pratibhāsate | tatra vīthyaṅgaviśeṣopakṣepasyāmukhaśarīratvādaucityaniveśa eva sphuṭaṃ kāraṇamityāśayo boddhavyaḥ | aucityavirodho na sārvatrika iti nātiprasaṅga ||
atra rāgātiśayahetubhūtayoḥ kāminīkapolacandramasoḥ svarūpabhāvanāmāhātmyenārthāntarabhāvanā gupteti gaṇḍanisyandabindurityasya ghṛṇāvadarthāntarasyāpi na ‘doṣaḥ’ ka-khadoṣatvam ||

athāparaṃ saṃkhyānaprakāraṃ ghṛṇāvadarthe kathayati—yatheti | guṇavṛttivyāpārāśrayeṣvavāntarādipadeṣu prathamata evānyakriyādidharmāṇāmanyatrārope samādhiprādurbhāvā-
danutthānaṃ doṣābhāvatvadvāraṃ, tataśca mukhya eva sthāne jugupsādāyitvaṃ pūrvācāryaślokenaiva vyācaṣṭe—atretyādi | guṇagrastatvamabhipretyātiśayasaṃpattau prakṛtaucityātkapolasyaiva pratibhāsastadidamuktam—rāgātiśayahetubhūtayoriti | tathā ca jagannayanānandabhūtasya niḥśeṣitāśeṣatamasaścandramaso yadidamabhipretakāminīkapolalāvaṇyabindumātratayā bhānaṃ taducitameveti ||
yatheti | āṣạ̄dho daṇḍa; | brahmavarcasina iti | ‘brahmahastibhyāṃ varcasaḥ’ iti samāsāntastato matvarthīya iniḥ | pogaṇḍo bālaḥ ||

evamiti | anityo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ | tena yatra doṣatā nāsti tatra viṣaye rasaprakāśasāmagryābhantarbhāvātkathaṃ na guṇatvam | antarbhāvaśca dvidhā—prayogaviṣayaucityena vā, vāganubhāvaucityena vā | tatra prathamaṃ darśayati—kiṃciditi | yathāñjanasya nāñjanavallyādisaṃgatatvena śataśo bhāvyamānasyāpyuddīpanavibhāvanā | bhavati tu kāntāvilocanacumbitayānusaṃdhīyamānasya | tathāpadasyāpi viṣaye 'tadviṣaye ca prayujyamānasya | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atrāśrayasyeti |
atra śrṛṅgāriṇo hi jagadapi śrṛṅgāramayaṃ paśyantīti bībhatsarase 'pi ‘mārdavena’ kamādhavenāntrādiyadānāmantarāleṣu niveśitānāṃ maṅgalapratisarādipadānāmadoṣaḥ ||

dvitīyamantarbhāvaprakāraṃ vyutpādayati—saṃniveśavaśāditi | saṃniveśo vāganubhāvaḥ | aucityākṛṣṭapadaghaṭanā tadvaśatvaṃ tadākṛṣṭatvamata eva virodhisaṃgatatayā vijātīyayorapyaucitīvaśena kāntiviśeṣonmīlakatvāt patrapuṣpavyatikarajamālāsādṛśyaṃ darśayati—nīlamiti | antrairityādau pratyutpannadoṣonmattapretāṅganāvalokasya mādhavasyālambanoddīpanavibhāvādiprakarpe bībhatsarasotsekastāvadupapannaḥ | yastvayamakasmādeva maṅgalādipadānāṃ śṛṅgārānuyāyināmiha niveśaḥ sa kathaṃ doṣabhāvādapanetavyaḥ, kathaṃ vā guṇatvamāsādayitavyamityato hetugarbhaṃ vyācaṣṭe—atra śrṛṅgāriṇa iti | śrṛṅgāravāsanāniviṣṭaḥ śrṛṅgārī | tathā ca pūrvaṃ bībhatsarasānvaye 'pi prakṛta śrṛṅgārabhaṅgo mā bhūdityetadarthameva kavinā ‘mama hi’ ityādinā pratijñāya ‘līneva’ ityādivāsanādṛḍhatvamupapāditam | ata eva pratipadaṃ rūpakamāviṣṭābhiprāyamevaṃ śrṛṅgāramayaṃ śrṛṅgārāṅga-
tayā rasatāpannam | upapadyate ca taccittasya sādṛśyamātreṇa tadrūpatānusaṃdhānam | tataśca kathaṃ noddīpanatā vastusattvasyānupayogitvāt | ata eva sūtritasya bībhatsasya prakṛtena bādhāt prakṛtārthānupoṣa iti ||
nanu kathamuddeśe caturviṃśatidhetyuktam | doṣā hi pūrvaṃ ṣoḍaśaiva vibhaktā ityata āha—

lg.l: bhavanti nava tenaite pūrvoktā daśa pañca ca || 108 ||

div.p: aślīlāderiti | nigadavyākhyātam | caturviṃśatirityeṣeti | ā daśabhyaḥ saṃkhyā saṃkhyeye bartate, tataḥ saṃkhyāne saṃkhyeye cābhidhānāt kevalasaṃkhyānavacanatvena gavāṃ viṃśatiritivatpadasamāśrayetyupapannam |
atra ‘na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatṛnām’ iti kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhe kimeṣāṃ‘ṣāmasti’ ga duṣkaramityapabhāṣaṇe 'pi saṃbandhamātravivakṣāto guṇatvam |

yasya vastuno nānārūpāṇi vijātīyarūpāṇi tatra tadrupavivakṣāvaicitryācchabdacaicitryaṃ saṃgacchata iti doṣatvābhāvaḥ | evaṃ rūpatā śabdahīnadoṣodāharaṇabhūte ‘nīrandhraṃ gaditavati’ ityādaugamitavatītyādau kadāpi nāstītidoṣarūpataiṣā | kvacitpunarasti rūpāntaramityāha—kvaciditi | bhavatvevam | guṇatvaṃ tu kathamityata āha—nisargeti | niyatarūpavivakṣā hi mahākavīnāṃ na lāvaṇyamanusaṃdhāya bhavitumarhati | tathāhi—ākṣipantītyādau eṣāṃ duṣkaramityatra khalarthayoge ‘na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatunām’ ityanena ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhādeṣāmiti kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhīti duṣṭajātīyatāmādāya śeṣarūpaviśeṣavivakṣā samādhānahetuḥ | asti hi ṣaṣṭhyarthasya saṃbandhasya dvarūpyam—saṃbandhasāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca janyajanakabhāvādiḥ | tatra saṃbandhaviśeṣavihitaṣaṣṭhīmupādāya ‘na loka—‘ ityādinā niṣedhaḥ | saṃbandhasāmānyarūpamupādāya ṣaṣṭhī kena vāryate | ayameva saṃbandhaḥ śeṣa ityucyate | evaṃ tāvanna doṣatvam | yathā koṣasamagrāṇāṃ rājñāṃ vipakṣaśrīharamupadiśya yatkimapi saṃbandhimātrameva na duṣkaraṃ tathā padmānāmiti samarthayāmahe | kathamanyathā durāpatvadvadanaśrīharaṇamiti prakṛtapoṣalābhādguṇatvamatisulabhaṃ tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atreti | nanu saṃbandhamātravivakṣāyāṃ doṣatā mā bhūt, guṇatvaṃ tu kathamiti yathoktamabhisaṃdhāya paramataṃ likhati—idaṃ hīti | śāstramāhātmyaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ parasparāsaṃkīrṇaviṣayatvam ||
ādyantau madhyama iti saṃbandhanirjñānahetorvidhānānna śābdakramalaṅghanaṃdoṣaḥ | vaktuśca bandhutyāgadeśatyāgayostanutyāgādgarīyastvenābhimatatvādityarthakramalaṅghanasyāpi guṇatvam ||

yatna iti | kramabhraṃśe hi yathābhimatānvayapratītipratyūho dūṣakatābījam | tadyadi kutaścidviśeṣādaskhalitaiva pratītirupajāyate tadā bījābhāvena tathābhāvo nivartata eva | sa ca viśeṣaḥ pratipadamanukramituṃ na śakyate iti ko 'pi yatna iti sāmānyena pratipāditam | so 'yaṃ śabdakramalaṅghanāpavādaḥ | arthakramalaṅghane tvabhi-
prāyaviśeṣaḥ | tathā hi—bandhutyāga ityādau bandhutyāgatanutyāgadeśatyāgānkameṇoddiśya tathaivānudeśo 'pyarhati na tvādimamuddiśya tato 'ntyastato madhya iti uddeśānudeśalakṣaṇaśāstrakramabhraṃśajātīyatve 'pi saṃbandhajñānahetuyatnakaraṇādadūṣaṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate | yatnaścāyameva yadādipadairullekhaḥ | tāni hi tattatsthānaviśeṣagāmina eva pratītimupajanayanti | avaśyaṃ cānena krameṇātra vaktumucitaṃ tanutyāgasya vijātīyatāvivakṣayā pṛthageva vaktumarhatvāt | evaṃ cānupapattirloke bandhutyāgāpekṣayā śarīratyāgasyātikṛcchratvena prasiddhiḥ | ataśca ‘madhyama āyatakleśa ādyantau kṣaṇikajvarau’ iti vacanamucitamiti ārthakrabhamabhraṃśaḥ kathaṃ na bhavati tatrāha—vaktuśceti | abhimata‘matatvādi’ iti syātmityanenābhiprāyaviśeṣo 'pavādahetuḥ—‘yathāruci yathārthitvaṃ yathāvyutpatti bhidyate | ābhāso vyartha ekasminnanusaṃdhānasādhitaḥ ||’ ita nyāyādupapannamevaitaditi ||

lg.l: na ca durvacake prāyaḥ pragṛhyādau ca duṣyati || 113 ||
sa ito 'bdaṛtāvṛtapriyo na ṛcastvaṃ na yajūṃṣi ūhase || 155 ||’

div.p: virūpeti | virūpo durvacako visaṃdhirvigataṃ saṃhitākāryaṃ durvacake kalāviśeṣarūpatayānumate saṃhitākāryaniyamaḥ | dvitīye kutrādūṣaṇamityāha—pragṛhyādāviti | pragṛhyaṃ ‘īdūdevddivacanaṃ pragṛhyam’ ityādinā yatra pragṛhyasaṃjñā vihitā, ādigrahaṇādvināpi pragṛhyasaṃjñayā yatra prakṛtibhāvavidhānaṃ tathodāhariṣyate | yatra vā vaktuḥ khedādinā vicchidya pāṭhe viratirbhavati | yathā—kā ekaśiroruheti | tadevaṃ durvacakapragṛhyādi yathāsaṃkhyaṃ virūpavisaṃdhivigatasaṃdhānayorapavādakāraṇe ityāha—atreti | prayujyanta iti prayuktayo durvacakāśca tāḥ prayuktayaśceti durvacakaprayuktaya iti karmadhārayaḥ | sudurvacā iti anyenoccārayitumaśakyāḥ | svayameva kaviḥ pratijñāya uttarārdhe durvacakānyāha—ameḍityādi | he nageḍje parvatarājaputri, khamākāśaṃ bheḍ bhānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmīḍīśvaraścandraḥ so 'vidyamāno yatra | tirodhānādasatkalpanā candramasaḥ | kena punastirodhānamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ dvitīyaṃ viśeṣaṇam—apogreti | apagatogradīptirbha ugrarucirādityastadīyadrohakāriṇo 'bhrapadavācyā meghā yatra | apsu rohatītyabruṭ padmaṃ tadvanmukhaṃ yasyā iti devīsaṃbodhanam | cedīdṛśaṃ tarhi sadhryaṅ sahacaro bhavāsmākamiti gauryā uttaram | kalārūpatvena virūpasaṃdhānasya guṇatvamityāha—kalāvidbhirādṛtatvāditi | kamale ivetyādāvudāharaṇatvānnaikaḥ ślokārdhaḥ | pūrvārdhe kamale ityāditritayaṃ pragṛhyasaṃjñodāharaṇam | uttarārdhe vinaiva pragṛhyasaṃjñāṃ prakṛtibhāvavidhānaṃ yatra tattritayodāharaṇam | tathāhi—abdaṛtāviti | ‘na ṛca’ iti ca ‘ṛtyakaḥ’ ityanena prakṛtibhāvaḥ | yajūṃpi ūhasa iti 'iko 'savarṇe śākalyasya hrasvaśca’ ityanena | aparamādipadagrāhyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtam | atrāpi sa iti voddhavyam | tadetacchāstrānumatamapi ghaṭanāsauṣṭavena niveśanīyam | na tvanyathā | uktaṃ ca pūrvameva yatpragṛhyādihetukamapi nāsakṛtprayoktavyamiti ||
atra hanyate hanyata iti śabdapunaruktaṃ cārusarvāṅgī varārohetyarthapunaruktaṃ tadubhayamapyanukampādyatiśayavivakṣāyāmadoṣa iti guṇatvam ||

anukampeti | saṃbhramādau yāvadbodhamityādinā padadviruktyāderanumatatvānna doṣatvam | abhiprāyavyañjananaiyatyena prakṛtipoṣānuguṇatayā guṇatvam | tathāhi—hanyata ityādau hanyata iti yadyapyabhidheyatātparyamiti śabdapunaruktajātīyaṃ bhavati, yadyapi ca varārohetyabhidhāya cārusarvāṅgītyabhinnābhidheyatātparyaṃ paryāyarūpatvādarthapunaruktajātīyam, tathāpi virahavedanādūnāyāmanukampātiśayādasakṛdupādānamahirahirbudhyasveti lokānusārāt | anukampābhayādyasya hi tādṛśī padadviruktirabhiprāyaviśeṣārthaniṣpāditayā guṇakakṣādhirohaṇakṣamaivetyāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—tadubhayamapīti ||

lg.l: padānāṃ vyutkamo yatra krameṇa vyutkameṇa vā |
tavdyākīrṇaṃ vidustasya na doṣaḥ kvāpi tadyathā || 116 ||

div.p: atra ‘mā sma jugupsata’ iti vaktavye ‘jugupsata smainamaduṣṭabhāvaṃ maivam’ iti padavyatikramasya ‘vyaste 'pīcchanti kecit’ iti luṅlaṅorviśeṣalakṣaṇatvādguṇatvam ||

padānāmiti | ekasmin vākye padānāmucitasaṃniveśaviparyāsaḥ kramabhraṃśaḥ | sa dvidhā bhavati—pūrvāparabhāvaniyatānāṃ tādṛśakramapracyāvanena vā | yathā bahutṛṇamityanyo 'rthaḥ, tṛṇaṃ bahvityanyaḥ | pūrvāparaniyamaśūnyānāmiti tādṛguccāraṇaviparyāsena vā | yathā kapālamanulimpati, dukūlaṃ paridadhātītyatra kramaniyamo 'bhimataḥ | anulimpati kapālam, paridadhāti vastramityapi kṛtena tasyaivārthasya lābhāt | yadā tu kapālaṃ paridadhāti dukūlamanulimpatīti kriyate tadā bhavati saṃnidhiviparyāsastadetavdyākīrṇasaṃkīrṇayostulyaṃ, tadidamuktam—krameṇa vyutkrameṇa vā | nanu ‘smotare
laṅ ca’ ityanena māśabdāduttaraṃ yatra smaśabdaprayogastatra luṅlaṅorvidhāne padakramaniyamaḥ kṛtastatkathaṃ sma mameti prayukte so 'rthaḥ pratyetavya ityata āha—vyasta iti | viśeṣeṇa lakṣyata iti viśeṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tasya bhāvastattvam ||

l.seg: ‘bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
nanvetanmama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate || 158 ||’

div.p:
paryāyeṇeti | yatra vākyaikavākyatāyāmavāntaravākyeṣu parasparapadārthapraveśena yathābhimatasaṃsargapratītiḥ skhalitā bhavati tatra saṃkaro dūṣaṇam, pratīteraskhalane tu na doṣaḥ | skhalanaṃ cānekavaktṛkaparyāyapravṛttavākyāvayavamiśraṇena bhavati | tadapi miśraṇaṃ praśnottararūpamanyādṛśaṃ vā bhavatītyāha—praśnottarādiṣviti | viṣayasaptamīyam | vākye vākyaṃ vākovākyaṃ pṛṣodarāditvātsādhu | tatra praśnottarādirūpaṃ vākovākyamudāharati—bāle iti | atra ‘bāle vimuñca māṃ prati ruṣam’ iti prathamapraśnavākyam | ‘nātha roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtam’ iti tādṛśamevottaravākyam | tatra bāle iti vākyapratīkānantarameva nātheti vākyāntarapratīkasya nirdeśaḥ saṃkīrṇajātīyatāmākārayitumudyataḥ praśnottaraprabhāvādapodyate | saṃkīrṇayorapi vākyayoḥ paryāyanirdeśe bhavatyeva vākovākyamiti cet, na | vyatikarasyābhiprāyaviśeṣavyañjakatayā camatkārakāritvena vijātīyatvāt | ata eva guṇatvam | tathā hi bāle iti padaṃ paracittānabhijñāyāḥ kṣudrasahacarīvacasi viśvāsabhājaḥ sopālambhaṃ saṃbodhanamāviṣkaroti | etadākarṇyānantarameverṣyākaṣāyakāminīvacanamucitamiti nātheti saṃbodhanaṃ sābhiprāyam, prabhurasi na punarasmāsu dattāśayo na vā svādhīnatāsaubhāgyabhāgiti vivakṣitatvāt | evamuttaratra svayamunneyam | upalakṣaṇaṃ ca dvayoriti ekasyāpi vaktuḥ prahelikādau tadvidyaviṣaye tadābhāṣaṇasyocitatvāt | vijātīyavākyadvayasaṃdaṃśapatita-
pade kimidamanenānvīyate 'nena veti saṃdehasaṃkīrṇatāsaṃśayo 'pi saṃkaramadhyāsīna eveti guravaḥ | ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājapadaṃ saṃdaṃśapatitaṃ kiṃ pūrveṇātha pareṇānvīyata iti saṃdihyate | rājagokṣīrādau dvayenānvayo gopadasya niścita iti ||

l.seg: ‘hā to jo jjaladeu naiva madanaḥ sākṣādayaṃ bhūtale
‘tā kiṃ’ ga; paraṃtu ‘takkim’ iti bhavettatkiṃ dīsaï saccamā hatavapuḥ kāmaḥ kila śrūyate |
‘pacchā ai’ iti ṭīkāsaṃmatamukhyapāṭhaḥai dūe kialeu bhūtapatinā gaurīvivāhotsave
aiseṃ sacca ji bollu hastakaṭakaḥ kiṃ darpaṇenekṣyate || 159 ||’

div.p:
atra grāmyaḥ praṣṭā nagaramāgato rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmyaiḥ prakṛtisthaireva vā padaiḥ prākṛtena pṛcchati—‘hā to jo jjaladeu’ iti | nāgaraśca tamanujighṛkṣurupanāgaraiḥ komalairvā padaiḥ savakrokti pratyācaṣṭe—‘naiva madanaḥ sākṣādayaṃ bhūtale’ iti | atha grāmya āhitapratibhaḥ pūrvapadānurodhādardhaprākṛtenaiva grāmyopanāgaraiḥ prakṛtisthakomalairvā padaistamupālabhate—‘tatkiṃ dīsaï saccamā hatavapuḥ kāmaḥ kila śrūyate’ iti | atha nāgaro jñātatatprāvīṇyaḥ‘ṇyastatpadā’ ka-kha pādānurodhādeva ardhaprākṛtena grāmyopanāgaranāgaraiḥ prakṛtisthakomalakaṭhorairvā padaiḥ samādhatte—‘ai dūe kialeu bhūtapatinā gaurīvivāhotsave’ iti | atha grāmyaḥ ślokasamāpteḥ pādasya taduttarasya cānurodhādgrāmyāṇi prakṛtisthāni vā tricaturāṇi padāni prākṛte noktvā pādārdha eva tiṣṭhati—‘aiseṃ sacca ji bollu’ iti | atha nāgaro jitakāśī grāmyo-
panāgaranāgaraiḥ prakṛtisthakomalakaṭhorairvā padaiḥ ślokamuttaraṃ ca pūrayati—'hastakaṭakaḥ kiṃ darpaṇenekṣyate’ iti | tatra ca prākṛtānāṃ sarveṣāmapi grāmyatvam | praṣṭuḥ saṃskṛtapadeṣu vapurityupanāgaraṃ śeṣāṇi grāmyāṇi, prativaktuśca hastavivāha gaurīpadāni grāmyāṇi, bhūtapatineti nāgaram, śeṣāṇyupanāgarāṇi | tadidamīdṛśi prameye tathaivopakramādetanna duṣyati ||

prakṛtistheti | ‘vibhinna-’ ityādāvapadalakṣaṇasūtre ṣaṇṇāmiti vyatikara ekatvena nābhipretaḥ | api tu grāmyāditrikasya vā prakṛtisthāditrikasya veti vikalpenopanyāsaprayojanamanujñāsaṃpattistena doṣatābhāvaguṇībhāvau pratipāditau | viṣayaṃ darśayati—bhāṣācitra iti | saṃskṛtādivyatikarasyāpadatvenābhipretatvāt saṃskṛtādayo grāmyādayaḥ prakṛtisthādayaśca bhāṣāśabdenābhimatāḥ | yathā hi—nānāvarṇārabdhamālekhyacitraṃ yathā vā bhinnaprakāratantunirvātaḥ paṭaścitrapaṭastathā nānābhāṣābhirārabdhaṃ kiṃcitkāvyaṃ citramucyate | citramāścaryaṃ tatkāri ca citram | tena rūpadvayasaṃpattau yuktipoṣaḥ syādevaṃ yathaucityākṛṣṭanānābhāṣāvyatikarajamekaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśaṅkya/ saṃkṣepātsarvaṃ bhāṣāsaṃkaramevodāharati—yatheti | saṃkaramācitīṃ ca vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atra grāmya iti | grāmavāsī kiṃcivdyutpannaśca | grāmyāśca nagaravastunyadbhutacamatkāravanto jijñāsavaśca bhavantīti jātiḥ | tatra rājānaṃ dṛṣṭveti adbhutavastukathanena camatkāraḥ | pṛcchatīti jijñāsā bahumāna ādaraścamatkāreṇaiva | yadvā yānpṛcchati teṣveva bahumāno dhanyāste ye nāmagotrādikametasya jānantaḥ satatamenamavalokyanta ityāśayāt | prastutagrāmyaprakṛteścāsya prākṛtapadaireva praśno yogyaḥ | tadetatsarvamādarśayituṃ praśnaṃ pṛthakkṛtya darśayati—hā to ityādi | ‘hā to’ iti mahārāṣṭrabhāṣāyāṃ praśnakākurayaṃ sa ityarthe | sa iti yo nāmaitannagaranāyakatvenāsmadgrāme 'pi vahuśo vikhyātakīrtiriti camatkāraḥ | jo jjaladeu iti | jijñāsāsāmānyataśca nagarasaṃcariṣṇujanagocaro 'yaṃ praśnaḥ | atra sarvāṇyeva padāni nātihīnapātre grāmye prakṛtibhavānyapabhraṃśapadāni deśīpadatvena sarveṣāṃ grāmyatā | ‘hā to’ ityanena svarakṛtagauravam | ‘jo jjaladeu’ ityekasaṃyogavarṇāpāditagauravaṃ ca prakṛtisthaṃ tadatra prākṛtagrāmyayoraucityākṛṣṭam | prakṛtisthe tu naucityamupayujyate | api tu saṃdarbhārambhastena prakrānta iti vivakṣitam | adhikasya praṣṭavyasyābhāvādetatpraśnānantaramevottarāvasaraḥ | tataśca nānaucityam | praśno-
ttaropanyāso hi prakṛtyaiva ca nāgarakā grāmyamatavirodhino vakroktirasikā bhavanti | yadi tasya grāmye jaghanyabuddhiḥ kimityuttarameṣa dāsyatītyata uktam—anujighṛkṣuriti | sabahumānaṃ pṛcchati | grāmye yasya dayā tadānīmāsīt | jijñāsānivartakrajñānajananamanugrahaḥ | yadyapi nāgarasya nāgarāṇi padāni prayoktu‘marhāṇi’ iti syātmarhanti, tathāpi grāmyānugrahe kartavye tadbodhayogyamevābhimataṃ na tu nāgarakatvam | tarhi grāmyaireva kuto na bravītītyapi na vācyam | sahasaiva tathākaraṇe grāmyamatavirodhaḥ | api tūpanāgarakarūpabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt, tato madhyamānyupanāgarāṇi prayogayogyānītyāha—upanāgarairiti | svabhāvata eva prākṛtaprakṛtisthānāṃ saṃskṛtaprakṛtisthānāṃ prauḍhatvaṃ bhavati | tena yadyapi grāmyaprayuktajātīyānyeva saṃdarbhaikarūpatāsidhdyarthaṃ ghaṭayitumucitāni tathāpyaucitīprāptasaṃskṛtapadaniveśane yadi prakṛtisthatvamādriyeta tataśchāyāvairūpyaṃ syādityāśayena komalaprāyāṇyeva niveśitānītyāha—komalairveti | bhūyasā vyapadeśo bhavatīti lokanyāyānusārāt ‘sākṣāt’ ityekasya prakṛtisthatve 'pi komalairityuktam | sākāṅkṣapraśne ca kimarthaṃ lokottaro ‘jo jjaladeu’ nānyaḥ kaścittādṛgiti bhāvo vivakṣitastatra netyevoktenānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ syādityadhikamapi kiṃcidvaktumucitamityāha—savakroktīti | etena nāgarakavṛttirupabṛṃhitā | naivetyevakāreṇa manuṣya evāyaṃ na bhavati dūre tadviśeṣarūpo ‘jo jjaladeu’ iti prakāśitam | sākṣāditi pratyakṣeṇāvadhāryamāṇaḥ kiṃcivdyutpannatvena grāmyasyoktatvāt | kāmavyāvṛttasākṣādbhāvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmānusaṃdhānena madanadāhavyatikaratā saṃbhavatīti labdhāvasaraṃ grāmyānuyogamavatārayati—atheti | śikṣāviśeṣasparśinī buddhiḥ pratibhā | māmekāntato nāgarakavṛttaparicayaparādhīnaṃ mā śaṅkiṣṭhā ityāśayaśauṭīryeṇa nāgarakaprayuktajātīyaireva padaiḥ praśno yogyo na caitāvataiva sarvathā prakṛtityāgo 'rhatītyataḥ svaprayogayogyānyapi prayogamarhanti tatrārdhaṃ prakṛtivaiśasenārdhaṃ prākṛtamardhaṃ grāmyaṃ ca praśnavākyānucitamityāha—pūrvapadānurodhāditi | pūrvaṃ paraprayuktaṃ padaṃ ‘tat kim’ iti syāttarkitam | ‘saccamā’ iti sūlādarśatraye pāṭhaḥsaccimā satyaḥ | yāvatī grāmyasya vyutpattirarhati tāvatīmupanyasyati—śrūyata iti | aitihāsikamukhādevamākarṇitaṃ punaradyāpi nirṇayo vartata ityarthaḥ | tarkitamiti prakṛtistham | dīsaīti komalam | ‘saccamā’ iti sūlādarśatraye pāṭhaḥsaccimeti prakṛtistham | hatavapuriti komalam | kāmaḥ kiletyapi tathā | śrūyata iti prakṛtisthamiti | anantaraṃ nāgarikasyottarā-
vasaraḥ | kathaṃ paramārthavādinyuttaraṃ dātavyamityanupapattāvayaṃ samādhānaprakāro bhavati | asti grāmyasya ‘kila śrūyate’ ityetābhyāṃ saṃdihānatvaṃ kiṃcivdyutpannatvaṃ connītamiti kimapyalīkameva buddhikauśalāttathā pratīyamānamabhidhāya pratāraṇamupapadyate | tanmātraparatvācca sarvākāramadhikāvyutpattirāhatya darśayitumarhatīti tarkitamityādipade yāvatī grāmyasya vyutpattistābadanukaraṇaṃ kiyadadhikavyutpattipuraskāramarhatītyāśayavānuttaramavatārayati—atheti | pādastarkitamityādigrāmyaprayuktastasyānurodho vyutpattyanukaraṇam | pacchā paścāt | ai eṣaḥ | ‘ai dūe’ iti pāṭhe dūaṃ vyājo 'nena vyājena | bhūtapatiḥ paśupatiḥ | nanu na kvacidevaṃ śrūyate tatkathaṃ grāmyasya prabodho bhavatītyāha—gaurīvivāhotsava iti | mā śrūyatāmupapattyā tu siddho dvitīyo yadi kāmaprādurbhāvo na syātkathaṃ gaurīpāṇigrahe bhagavata utsāha ityatastenaiva karuṇāsaṃtānaśāntātmanā bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ syādityarthaḥ | paccheti prakṛtistham, ai iti kaṭhoram, kialeu iti komalam, bhūtapatineti tathā, gaurīvivāhotsava iti prakṛtistham | 'eṁdūeṁ’ iti pāṭhe dvayamapi kaṭhoram | tadatra kaṭhoraniveśanaṃ vyutpattyādhikyasūcanāya | etāvatyukte parīkṣaṇavyutpattirna kiṃcidgrāmyaṃ pratibhāti | na ca tasyādyāpi niḥśaṅkatā vartate | tato nāgarakaprāmāṇyadattabharaḥ praśno ghaṭata ityāśayavānavatārayati—atha grāmya iti | prakṛtyāpanna eva, tena yathā prathamaṃ ‘hā to’ ityādipraśne gatistathātrāpīti
