grāmyaprakṛtisthayorupanyāsaḥ | bhāṣācitreṇa parasparasaṃgharṣādekakāvyaracanāpravṛttayorgrāmyasyāpi ślokaślokasamāptipadārambho yogya eva | yadi cāyameva samastaṃ nirvāhayannaśeṣaśaṅkānivṛttyupayuktamuttaraṃ nāgarasya niveśitaṃ syāditi taduttarānurodhena pādārdha eva vilambo 'pyucitaḥ | ‘aiseṃ’ evamityatrārthe kākugarbham | ‘sacca ji bollu’ iti jiravadhāraṇe | satyamevaitaduktam | yadi satyapuraḥsaraṃ brūyāstadā pratyemītyarthaḥ | evaṃ grāmyatāpratāraṇasiddhau kimatra sarvalokasākṣike vastuni vakroktyaiva pūrvavyutpattimātraniveśanenottaraṃ dattvā ślokapūraṇameva nāgarasyocitamityāśayenottaramavatārayati—atheti | haste iti prakṛtistham, kaṭakamiti komalam, darpaṇenekṣyate ityete prakṛtisthe, iti prakṛtisthādīnāṃ supariceyatvādgrāmyādīnyeva vyācaṣṭe—tatra ceti | prakṛtivyatikarāvyatikaratvayoraucityāpannatvādbhāṣāsaṃkaraḥ śobhāvahatvena guṇa eva bhavatītyuktamupasaṃharati—taditi ||

l.seg: siddhā sā ca vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo

div.p: atra ‘yathoktā mahī sādhyate, siddhā sā ca viprāya pratipādyate iti vaktavye, yeyaṃ vīrādbhutarasavaśapravṛttena ‘vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romā ñcitāḥ paśyata’ iti vākyena prakṛtavākyokterasamāptāveva ‘viprāya ityādipadavicchittiḥ sā rasāntaratiraskṛtirityucyate | tayā cedaṃ vākyāntarasagarbhamapi vākyaṃ na doṣāya bhavati ||

vākyāntareti | rasāntaraṃ rasaviśeṣaḥ prakṛtarasānusaṃhito rasastena tiraskāro doṣabhāvasya, tasmin sati tathākṛtaṃ vākyamiṣṭameva kavīnāmupādānayogyameva anyathā neṣṭaṃ duṣṭamevetyarthaḥ | tenāyamartho bhavati—prakṛtarasatirodhāyakatvaṃ kila dūṣaṇatābījaṃ tadatirodhānenaiva nivartate | pratyuta dvitīyaparicchede vakṣyamāṇagarbhādivākyayojanaprakārasaṃpattāvalaṃkāralābhe guṇatvaṃ bhavati | tathā hi—diṅmātaṅgānāṃ ghaṭayā vibhaktāḥ pṛthagudbhidya vyavasthāpitāścatvāra āghāṭā yasyāṃ sā, tathā tena ‘saptadvīpā vasumatī sādhyate’ iti vivakṣitam | ye tāvadbharatabhagīrathaprabhṛtayaḥ prathitapratāpātiśayāsteṣāṃ taddūṣaṇapariniṣṭhitaśaktīnāmekasyāpi samastakṣattravaṃśonmūlanena navakhaṇḍamedinīsiddhau notsāhaśaktiḥ śravaṇagocaratāmayāsīditi lokottarā paraśurāmasyotsāhaśaktirāvedyate | 'siddhā sā ca’ ityanena yāvadabhilaṣitaṃ tāvadeva siddhamityaho vijigīṣuteti pūrvavadevābhiprāyaḥ | na cedasau siddhimabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ | anupadameva sā saṃpanneti cakāreṇa dyotyate | evamabhihite ‘viprāya‘ 'bhiprāye’ ityādarśe pāṭha āsīt’ ityādikamasti vākyaśeṣabhūtam, tadvicchidyaiva madhye ‘vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ’ iti vākyena sagarbhatā, sā na doṣāya | anena hi vākyena lokottaravastubhāvanātmakavibhāvasaṃpattau prādurbhavan vaktumabhimato raso vyajyate | sa ca vīrānusaṃdhānaheturvīrādbhutayoḥ samānabhūmikayoranyonyānugamanena pratikūlatā virahatā | tatra yathā śṛṅgāraraudrabībhatsānāmeka-
praghaṭṭakena sūtreṇa saṃnipātitairapi hāsyakaruṇabhayānakairna tiraskāraḥ, ‘svāṅgamavyavadhāyakam’ iti nyāyāt, tatheha vīrasyādbhutenāta evādbhutādudvelasya prādurbhūtaputrakāṅkuralakṣaṇānubhāvapradarśanam—‘paśyata’ iti | na cātra doṣodāharaṇe ‘mayā’ iti kārakavibhakterutthitākāṅkṣāyā ‘rakṣainam’ ityādinā svarasaṃbādhastathātra saṃbhavati, 'siddhā’ ityetāvatyapi darśite vākyārthaparyavasānāt | na ca saṃpūrṇe rase ‘vadanta eva’ ityādikamabhidhātumarhati | adbhutatā ca pārthivānubhāvasya tanmātrapūraṇāpekṣatvāt | evaṃ rasānubhāvanātṛptasya tatraiva punaḥ punarutkaṇṭhāyāṃ jigīṣukaraṇīyalavdhapātrapratipattiviśeṣasphoraṇe ‘viprāya pratipādyate’ ityuktam | dānavīro 'pi vīra eva | ata evādhikasya kartavyasyābhāve kimaparamityādirupasaṃhāraḥ | tadetatsarvaṃ vyācaṣṭe—atreti ||

atra ‘puṃso yoṣita iva’ ‘śamo lajjeva’ ‘parākramo vaiyātyamiva’ iti liṅgabhedaḥ | ‘paribhave surateṣviva’ iti tu liṅgabhedo vacanabhedaśca dṛśyate | sa caiṣāmeva parasparamupamānopameyabhāvavivakṣāyāṃ paryāyāntarābhāvādanyathākartuṃ na śakyata iti sahṛdayānudvejakatvānna duṣyatīti doṣasyāpi guṇatvam | tadidaṃ dvayorapyekamudāharaṇam |
atra prāgvadeva paryāyāntarābhāvāt ‘sa lohakārabhastreva’ iti liṅgabhedasya na doṣaḥ ||

yadbhinneti | doṣaprakaraṇānurodhena samastavyastodāharaṇaṃ boddhavyam | sahṛdayodvejakatvena hi doṣatā | yatra tu kathaṃcittathābhāvo na bhavati, tatra doṣatvahānirucitaiva | tathā hi strīpuṃsayoreva prakṛtānuguṇopamānopameyabhāvavivakṣāyāmāvaśyakaṃ liṅgavaṃcanabhedayoranyataradekasya puṃsa upameyatvena dāraśabdasya bhinnavacanatvaniyamātkalatrapadaṃ bhinnavacanameva | paryāyāṇāmapi liṅgabhedo niyataḥ | na ca puṃvacanaṃ kiṃcitsamānasvabhāvamasti yenāyaṃ prakāro nivarteta | na caivaṃvidhopamāmantareṇa prastutavākyārthapoṣaḥ | evamananyagatikā bhinnaliṅgatā bhinnavacanatā vā sāhityasamayavidāmudvegaṃ notpādayati | ata evālaṃkāraucitīsaṃpadā guṇatvasiddhiḥ | evaṃ śamalajjayoḥ parākramavaiyātyayoḥ paribhavasuratayośca boddhavyamityāśayavān vyācaṣṭe—atreti | ‘rataṃ, rahaḥ, śayanaṃ, mohanam’ iti suratavācināṃ sarveṣāmeva napuṃsakatā na duṣyatīti sahṛdayahṛdayānudvejakatvāditi heturguṇatvetvābhiprāyikaḥ | sa ca darśita eva | atheti | dharmārthakāmāstrivargaḥ | vahnividhmāpanacarmapuṭo bhastrā sā yathā vātena pūryate, vātaṃ ca muñcati, na tu kiṃcitpuruṣārthamāsādayati, tathā trivargaśūnye 'pi bhastrāparyāyasya samānaliṅgasyābhāvena sahṛdayānāmanudvegālaṃkārasaṃpattyā guṇatvamupapannamityāha—atra prāgvadeveti | ‘na doṣaḥ’ iti mūlapustakeadoṣa ityupalakṣaṇam, guṇaśca bhavatītyapi boddhavyam ||

lg.l: muktātmā naḥ śivaṃ nemiranye 'pi dadatāṃ jināḥ || 163 ||

div.p:
atra ‘nemiranye 'pi’ iti vacanabhedadoṣe 'pi ‘dadatām’ iti kriyāpadādervacanaśleṣamāhātmyādguṇatvam | na cedaṃ vācyamatrevādirna vidyata iti nopamātvam | ivasyāpinā samuccayārthena tulyadharmāṇāṃ tu ‘dharmasya prabhavaḥ’ ityādibhirvacanaśleṣairviṣayāpahārāt | yathā agrato dyotakalopa upamāyām—'komalāpāṭalau tanvi pallavaścādharaśca te |’ nanveṣo 'pi śleṣaḥ kasmānna bhavati | ucyate—‘yatra dvayoḥ sadṛśayorabhidhānaṃ sa śleṣaḥ | yatra sadṛśātsadṛśapratipattistadupamānam, yatra dvayoḥ sādṛśyamabhidhīyate pratīyate vā
sopamā’ iti prabandhenāgrato vakṣyāmaḥ | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat—yadupamāyāmeva liṅgavacanabhedo na dūṣaṇamiti | tasya sarvālaṃkārasādhāraṇatvātkevalaṃ ‘sādṛśyamātra’ gasādṛśyamalaṃkāra iti darśane upamāyāmudāhriyate ||

prājyeti | ārhatānāṃ nemināmā jinaviśeṣo 'nye jinā ṛṣabhanāthaprabhṛtayaḥ prājyamucitaṃ tathābhūtaḥ prabhāvaḥ siddhirūpo yasya tādṛśo nemiḥ śivaṃ dadatāṃ dadātu | 'dada dāne’ iti dhātvanusārāt | kasmai ityapekṣāyāṃ muktātmā ityatra naḥ | pakṣe vo‘no 'smabhyaṃ’ iti syāt; yadvā ‘no 'smabhyam’ pakṣe ‘vo yuṣmabhyam’ ityeva pāṭhe ‘prājyaprabhāḥ’ iti prathamāntamapi pṛthak kalpanīyam yuṣmabhyaṃ śivaṃ dadatāṃ dadatviti | dharmasya ‘prabhava utpatti—’ iti syātprabhavamutpattinimittaṃ nemiḥ | prabhavaḥ prabhutā yathāvadanuśāsanena jināḥ | rajaśca tamaśca rajastamasī te aste kṣipte yena sa tathābhūto nemiḥ | astaṃ rajo yaiste 'starajasasteṣu prakṛṣṭāstamapyarajastamāḥ | mukto nirāvaraṇa ātmā ātmaśabda ātmavacanaḥ svarūpavacana iti vā bahuvrīhistādṛśo nemiḥ | jināstu muktātmāna iti spaṣṭam | tadiha vacanabhedamantareṇa vacanaśleṣābhāvādbhinnavacanatvasyāvaśyakatvena doṣaḥ | śleṣalakṣaṇālaṃkāraghaṭanayā guṇatvam | nanu ca liṅgādibheda upamāyā dūṣaṇatvamuktam, iha tvalaṃkārāntara udāhriyate, tatkathaṃ pūrvāparasamañjasatvam | na cātropamā saṃbhavati, tatsāmagryasaṃbhavāt | upamānopameyasādhāraṇadharmevādiśabdāḥ kila taddhaṭakāḥ | tadatra tritayasaṃbaddhe‘baddhe 'pīva’ iti syāt tvapīvavadvāprabhṛtiṃśabdānupādānātkathamupameti śaṅkāmutthāpya nirasyati—na ceti | ivādayo hi śabdāḥ sādṛśyadyotakāḥ | tathā ca kvacitprasiddhasya prakṛte saṃbandhapratītistebhyo bhavati bimbapratibimbanyāyāśrayaṇāt | evaṃ ca na yugapattulyarūpasaṃbandhaḥ | apiśabdastu yugapattulyarūpasaṃbandhaṃ bodhayatīti vibhinnaviṣayatvam | nahīvādiśabdābhāve sādṛśyameva na pratīyate, luptopamāprapañjabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt | anyata eva pratītisiddherupāyāntaravaiyarthyāt | kimitīha nevādipadaṃ prayuktamiti praśno 'vaśiṣyate tatredamuttaram—ivasyetyādi | nemiranye 'pītyapiśabdena samuccayo 'pyavasīyate | sa ca yugapadekasaṃbandhābhidhāne nirvahati | tenānekamuddiśya kiṃcidekasaṃbandhābhidhānaṃ samuccayābhidhāyino viṣayaḥ | ekamuddiśya prasiddhānyadha‘dharmābhidhānaṃ tu yathevāde’ iti syātrmavidhānaṃ tu yathevādiriti viṣayavirodhānna prayujyata iti | syādetat— ivavadvāyathādiśabdā
yatparāstasyaivopamānatāpratītistathā cānenedaṃ tulyamiti sādhāraṇadharmavidhirūpā kathamupametyata uktam—tulyadharmāṇāṃ tviti | nātra vacanaśleṣatulyadharmāgamaḥ, api tu tathā ‘vyavasthitānāmeva śabdatantratā’ iti ‘dharmasya prabhavaḥ’ ityādibhi‘rbhihiṃ vacanaśleṣa’ iti syātrdvivacanaśleṣaistathāpi viṣayopahṛta iti | yadi cevādimantareṇa nopamāpratītistarhi prasiddhamupamodāharaṇaṃ bhajyetetyāha—yatheti | agrataścaturthaparicchede | atrāpyupamāmanaṅgīkurvato matamāśaṅkate—nanviti | ihāpi cakārābhyāṃ yugapatpallavādharayorekadharmavidhānasya tulyatvāditi deśyābhiprāyaḥ | uktayuktayā dūṣayati—ucyata iti | tarhi prakṛtodāharaṇe nāstyevopamā, kathaṃ vacanabhedasya guṇībhāva udāhriyata ityāha—yatreti | yadyapyabhidhīyamānaṃ nāsti sādṛśyam, tathāpi pratīyamānopamā vyavahriyatāmityarthaḥ | śabdamātrasāmyaṃ śleṣasaṃkīrṇamevetyupekṣitavān | nanu yatropamayā kāvyavyapadeśastatra pratīyamānamapi sādṛśyamūrīkriyate | yatra tvalaṃkārasvabhāvavyavasthāpitameva kāvyaṃ na tatrāpītyāha—upalakṣaṇamiti | pratipattivairūpyasyālaṃkārāntarasādhāraṇyādupamāto 'nyatrāpi liṅgavacanabhedo dūṣaṇameva | tadyathā 'mukhaṃ padmam’ iti rūpake, ‘mukhaṃ padmaṃ vā’ iti saṃśaye, ‘na mukhaṃ padmameva’ ityapahnave | evamanye 'pi | ata eva dve bhinnaliṅgavacane ityatra nopamāgrahaṇam | yadyevaṃ kathamupamāyāmeva dūṣaṇamudāhriyata ityata āha—kevalamiti | ciraṃtanairhi bharatamuniprabhṛtibhirdve eva yamakopame śabdānugatālaṃkāratve neṣṭe | tatprapañcanamātraṃ tu punaranyairalaṃkārakāraiḥ kṛtamupamāyāḥ prabhūtaviṣayatayā prādhānyāccodāhṛtamatisphuṭaṃ bhavatīti saṃkṣepaḥ ||
atra sendrāyudha iti ‘kārmukamātropādānaṃ’ ka; ‘kārmukasyopādā’ gakārmukamātrasyopādānaṃ vāsaḥśaṅkhyostvanupādānādūnopamatvam | tatrenduvidyutoratiprasiddhatvādadoṣatvam ||

yatropamāneti | upameyenopameyaviśeṣaṇena saṃmitāstulyasaṃkhyāḥ | indrāyudhamindradhanurekamupamāne upameye pītaṃ vāsaḥ śārṅgamabjaḥ śaṅkha iti trīṇi viśeṣaṇāni tadihādhikaviśeṣaṇaviṣaya iti jijñāsāsamakālamevāprasiddhendubimbayorupamānayormeghānusaṃdhānāt skhalanābhimukhī pratītiravalakṣyate | dhvananavyāpāronmeṣācca guṇatvalābhaḥ | taduktam—‘mukhyā mahākavigirāmalaṃkṛtibhṛtāmapi | pratīyamānacchāyaiṣā bhūṣā lajjeva yoṣitām ||’ iti | na caivaṃ stanitādīnāmiti kathaṃ pratītiriti vācyam | pratīyamānasyāpi pratipattivairūpyasamādhāvānaupayikasthānākāṅkṣitatvenādarādityāha—sarvaṃ sarveṇeti | yathopapattiparyanto yāvatopamānaviśeṣaṇatvena prakṛtamupameyaviśeṣaṇapratibimbatā nīyate tadatikrameṇaikapratītyanurodhe kalpitenāpyupameyaviśeṣaṇenetyarthaḥ | anyathā candramukhādīnāṃ nopamā paryavasyetetyāha—akhaṇḍeti ||
atra śaśino grahaṇādadhikopamatve 'pyupamānatvenāvivakṣitatvādguṇatvam | yadi vopamāne dharmoddhāṭanānumānāt ‘śaṅkhacakragadādharo viṣṇuḥ’ iti prasiddheḥ śārṅgamanumeyam ||

krameṇeti | yatropamāne 'dhikaviśeṣaṇasaṃkṣepastadvākyamadhikopamamityucyate tatra jhaṭiti pratibimbabhūtopameyaviśeṣaṇapratisaṃdhānena doṣaḥ | tadeva tu kathamata uktam—
viśeṣastviti | upameyāṃśe viśeṣa‘viśeṣāditi’ ityādarśapāṭhaḥviśeṣaṇamupādānā(?)dupamānaviśeṣaṇātpratīyate | śatahradā vidyut | upamānatvenāvivakṣitatvādityāpātataḥ | upamānaviśeṣaṇānāṃ yāvatpratīti na grahaṇamiti prakāśayituṃ pāramārthikastvayaṃ siddhānta ityāha—yadi veti | upamānadharmasyādhikasyoddhāṭanamabhidhānaṃ tasyānu paścānmānaṃ jñānam | kathametadityāha—itiiti mūle pāṭhaḥ prasiddheriti ||

lg.l: na cchandobhaṅga‘bhaṅgamapyāhuḥ’ ka ityāhustadā doṣāya sūrayaḥ || 123 ||
taha a ṇhāā si tumaṃ sacche golāṇaītūhe || 166 ||’
tathā ca snātā bhavasi tvaṃ svacche godānadītīrthe ||]

div.p: atra dvitīyaikādaśatrayoviṃśativarṇānāṃ saṃyogaparatvādgurutve 'pi ṇhālhādisaṃyogasya tīvraprayatnoccāraṇena ‘punarlaghu’ gapūrvalaghutve na chandobhaṅga iti guṇatvam ||

yadeti | prayatanaṃ prayatnaḥ sthānakaraṇavyāpārastasya tīvratvamudrekastata eva hi piṇḍākṣarādīnāmakaṭhoratvamābhāsate | ādigrahaṇādivahikārau‘ihikārā vindujuā’ iti prākṛtapiṅgaloktyā ‘ikārahikārau’ iti; ‘ihikārau’ iti vā pāṭhaḥ sānusvārau ca kevalau padānte vartamānau tattadbhāṣāviṣaye 'vaseyau | kvacideva hi varṇe tathāvabhāsate na tu sarvatra | tadupalakṣaṇameva ‘raha vaṃjaṇasaṃjoe’ [ ‘rahau vyañjanasaṃyoge’ ] ityādikaṃ chandovicitau darśitam | jaheti | snātumavatīrṇe tvayi aṃśukārdhamudbhraṣṭaṃ sadabbhantamārdrobhūtaṃ yathā calatvaṃ‘labdham’ syāt sthitestathāvagamyate na tvantarjalaṃ jalakelisthānamavatīrṇa ityabhiprāyaśeṣaḥ | kathamanyathā godāvarīnadyāḥ svacchaṃ jalaṃ dṛśyate iti | tūhaṃ tīrtham | atra dvitīyaikādaśādisthāneṣu yadyapi saṃyogātpūrvabhāve gurutvaṃ vidyate-
rtathāpi tīvraprayatnoccāraṇīyaśakārahakārādisaṃyogamahimnā nāvacchedaśravyatā kaluṣīkriyata iti | evamanyadapyudāhāryam | yathā—
ityādi nāmadhātubhāge svarāsaṃdhāne ca paṭhitivicchedo na bhavatītyuktaṃ sa ‘mullaṅghya’ syāttadullaṃṅghanamātreṇa samādhīyate śobhāṃ puṣyatīti ||

l.seg: nvaśyāmurvīṃ vahati nṛpa ityasti cāyaṃ prayogaḥ || 167 ||’

div.p: atra pādatraye caturthasthāne yatau kartavyāyāṃ pañcamasthāne kṛtatvādaparatra ca pādasya madhyabhāge niviṣṭakevalasvaratvād yatibhraṃśe 'pi svarasaṃdhikṛtatvādavibhinnanāmadhātuśarīratvācca na doṣatvam ||

lg.l: nāmabhede ca śeṣeṣu na doṣa iti sūrayaḥ ||
lupte padānte śeṣasya padatvaṃ niścitaṃ yathā |

div.p: kāryākāryeti ca nāmabhāgamullaṅghya vicchedaśravyatā ca parasya yaṇādeśena ‘kiṃcidbhāvā’ iti ‘nṛpa’ iti ca svarasaṃdhāne vicchedo 'ta eva śravyatvamapi | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atreti | ‘mandākrāntā mabhanatayugaṃ gadvayaṃ vedadigbhiḥ’ iti caturthadaśamayoryatirāmnātā | pañcamasthāna iti | prathamatṛtīyayordvitīye tu ṣaṣṭhe yatikaraṇāditi boddhavyam | nanu padacchede svarasaṃdhānapaṭhitivirāmaḥ sollekho lakṣyate, na tu catuṣpāde tathāstīti kathaṃ śravyatvamata āha—lupta iti | saṃdhau vikāro yatvayalopādikaṃ kāryaṃ, tathā ca padānte sati padaccheda evāyamikāro 'vatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: aśarīraṃ kriyāhīnaṃ kriyāpekṣā na yatra tu |

div.p: atra triṣu pādeṣu padāni kriyā viśeṣakriyā | kriyāsāmānyavācakapadaṃ tu ‘tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe prathamā’ ityuktayanusāreṇa prathamāsidhdyarthamapekṣitameva | ataeva ‘sāpekṣam’ ityādyagrimagranthasaṃgatiḥkriyāpadaṃ nāpekṣante | sāpekṣaṃ cāsamarthaṃ bhavati | caturthe tu nahītyādibhiḥ santītyapekṣate‘prekṣyate’ iti syāt na caitāvatāmīṣāmasāmarthyaṃ bhavati | yadāha—‘yatrānyat kriyāpadaṃ nāsti, ‘astirbhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ’ katatrāsti bhavatīti padaṃ prathamapuruṣe prayujyate’ iti ||

aśarīramiti | pradhānāvimarśe hi dūṣaṇamityuktaṃ tadupāttānāmeva padārthānāṃ pradhānagarbhīkaraṇe tatpratibandhe 'vaśyavidheyamanyaṃ prati guṇībhāve vā samādhīyate | ata eva viśeṣādguṇatvam | tathā hi—‘kiyanmātraṃ’ ‘jānudaghnam’ ityanayoḥ ‘parimitikriyā’ syātparimitam | kriyā pradhānagarbhabhūtā | ‘nahi sarve bhavādṛśāḥ’ ityatra tu sattākriyāyāḥ sakalapadārthāvyabhicārāt ‘apekṣyate’ iti siddhiḥ | tadidamācāryamatenāha—yatrānyaditi | bhavantī vartamānā | tadetadvākyaṃ kriyāpradhānamiti ‘darśane’ iti syātdadarśa ‘sa‘sā’ iti syāt pradhānaṃ
viśeṣyamātraṃ tu vākyārthe’ iti paramārthaḥ | tena ‘rādhā rahaḥ sākṣiṇām’ ityādāvāvaśyakavidheyasākṣibhāvādiguṇatayā rādhāsaṃbandhādīnāṃ vaivakṣikaprādhānyānāmapi pradhānatvāvimarśo na doṣa ityuktaṃ bhavati ||

śliṣṭamiti | pāruṣyaśaithilyābhyāṃ vinā kṛtaṃ śliṣṭamityuktaṃ tasya viparyayo viparītaṃ vākyaṃ śithilaṃ bhavati | paruṣamalpaprāṇākṣarottaraṃ vetyarthaḥ | evaṃvidhamapi caitadanuprāsasauṣṭhavātpadānāmekatāpratibhāse samādhīyata udbhaṭānuprāsatayā ca kāntiprādhānye gauḍīyarītiprādhānyena guṇatvamāsādayati tadidamuktam—bandhaprāśastyagauravāditi | gauḍīyairgauḍīyarītigocarahetuvākprakarṣaśālibhiḥ || līleti | atra dantyavarṇamayatvenālpaprāṇākṣarottaratāyāmapi padaikatāpratibhāsānuprāsayorudrekaḥ kāntiprakarṣo 'vaseyaḥ ||

na doṣa iti | arthālaṃkārakāraṇādarthālaṃkārarūpam | yatra hiśabdasyārtho 'nyathānyathārūpaṃ bhajate tatrāvaśyaṃ tadanuyāyinā padasaṃdarbheṇa bhinnarūpeṇa bhāvyam | evamapi chāyāvairūpyaṃ vairasyamevāvahatītyāśaṅkya ‘śabdāḍambara’ ityuktam | āḍambara
udbhaṭatā | ‘tasyāpyekarītyanirvāho dūṣaṇamityatra ‘paurastyaiḥ’ ityuktam | śarāvatyāḥ prāgdeśabhavāḥ paurastyāstadīyahevākaprācuryabhāja eva hi khaṇḍarītayaḥ | candaneti | atra yadyapi malayānila eka eva vākyārthastathāpi candanapraṇayena pravṛddhasaurabhe manda ityābhyāṃ śṛṅgārāṅgatāpratītāvunmiśraḥ saṃdarbhaḥ | malayamāruta iti komalaḥ, vararāmāmukhānilairityapi tathā, tatrāpyārabhaṭīprakāśane spardhata iti sphuṭam | evaṃ rūddhamaddhairya iti | tadevaṃ samatāviparyāse 'pi viśeṣaṇānāmarthānāṃ bhinnabhinnarasānupraveśe pṛthagarthālaṃkāraḥ prakāśante | asti cātra śabdāḍambaravaśādeva chāyārūpāpratibhāsaḥ | lāṭīyā ca rītiḥ ||

lg.l: teṣāṃ matena tasyāpi dūṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate || 128 ||

div.p: kaṭhoramiti | sukumāratāviparyāsaḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṃdarbhaḥ prasphuṭataravarṇāpradhānamiti yāvat | so 'yaṃ dīptarasānupraveśādaucityena guṇatvaṃ bhajata iti vyaktam | apare paurastyāḥ | nyakṣeṇa sāmastyena ||

avidvaditi | viparyayaḥ pratyanīkabhūtaṃ vākyam | ādigrahaṇādyamakaśleṣaprahelikāprakaraṇāni | yā devī pavitratvenāśritā | anīcayā tuṅgyā budhdyā māyāyāmasya avidyāvistārasyāyāsaṃ glāniṃ vicchedaṃ yācanīyā prārthanīyā | yato yātanaṃ narakā-
nubhavanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ chinatti | śriyāpi stuteti | aṣṭadalakamalabandho 'yam | tadiha tathā varā(?)saṃniveśasya camatkārakāritvena prasādo 'pi sahṛdayaślāghāviṣayo guṇatāmadhyāsta iti ||

lg.l: ‘māṃ bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madakalaḥ paraśurvā |
vāhinījalabharaḥ kuliśaṃ vā svasti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa || 172 ||’

div.p: adhyāhāreti | asaṃpūrṇaṃ vākyaṃ neyārthamityuktaṃ tasyaivaṃrūpatā jhaṭiti śrutārthāpattiprādurbhāvaparihnavakasaṃdhānātsamādhīyate | tathā hi—‘mā bhavantamanalaḥ’ ityādau vṛkṣasamabhivyāhāreṇa dahanādīnāṃ yogyatayā śīghrameva dhākṣīdityādikriyānvayo 'vasīyate | svastivacanena cāmaṅgalaprastāvanirāsāttathābhūtakriyānupādānaṃ vakrakṣamatayā guṇa iti ||

asabhyārthamiti | rasasyādīptiḥ kāntiviparyayo ‘vacanāparārdhena’ iti pāṭhaḥvacanāparādhena dūṣaṇatāmadhyāste, sa samādhīyate 'tra grāmyoktiparihāreṇaiva | ata evoktisamarpitacchāyāviśeṣayoge guṇatvalābhaḥ | sahṛdayasabhāyāṃ na sādhurasabhyaḥ | vaidagdhyavidhuraṃ grāmyam ||

l.seg: ‘yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ
yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ

div.p: oja iti | dīptarasānupraviṣṭārthapratipādakasaṃdarbhaucityena samāsabhūyastvamojaḥ | asya viparyayo dīpterapratyūhādeva samādhīyate | tadidamuktam—‘dīptārthaṃ badhyate yatra taddīptaṃ cenna duṣyati’ iti | sugamamudāharaṇam | vyūḍhaḥprauḍhaḥ ||

samastamiti | upakrāntarīteranirvāhe ‘madhurasaparyantā’ iti syātmadhurarasaparyantā pratītiḥ skhalatīti dūṣaṇatābījamuktam | tathābhūtarasānuguṇavyabhicāryanupraveśavyañjanaucityādupakramanirvāhaḥ sarvasvāyamāno guṇatāmāsādayati | tathā hi—prasīdetyādau praṇayakelikupitakāminīprasādanāyāṃ śṛṅgāravirodhisamāsavyatikareṇa rīterapyapakrame roṣalakṣaṇabhāvānubhāvabhūḥ‘bhūtastana’ syāt stanakampavarṇanāyāṃ samāso 'nupraviṣṭa iti vyaktaḥ pūrvarīteranirvāhaḥ | rasāntaraṃ prakṛtavijātīyarasasaṃbaddho vyabhicārī bhāvaḥ ||

analaṃkāramiti | anutkṛṣṭāpraviṣṭaviśeṣaṇavadvākyaṃ niralaṃkāraḥ pūrvottaravākyasaṃgatikaraṇaprayojanakatayā na doṣaḥ | kathaṃ tathābhūtasya kāvyatvamityapi na vācyam | anugatena vakrībhāvena tatsamarthanāt | vyaktamudāharaṇam ||

l.seg: ‘kvākāryaṃ‘kṛtyaṃ’ ga śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā
kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyo‘dhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā’ ga rekhaiva sānyādṛśī
cetaḥ svāsthyamupehi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati || 177 ||

div.p:
vākyāśrayāṇāmiti | ‘mattādivavanānya’ pāṭhaḥsattādivacanānyanukriyamāṇāni camatkāramarpayanti | ata eva chāyālaṃkāraprādurbhāvādguṇaḥ | anityadoṣatayā cānukaraṇādanyadapi guṇībhavanabījamunneyamityudāharaṇena vyañjayannāha—kvākṛtyamiti | atra śrutiśālino
nāyakasya vāsanāparipākavaśādvipralambhāveśe 'pi prathamaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ—‘kvākṛtyaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva nu kulam’ iti | tadevaṃ śāntarasānuyāyinamanantarameva bādhitvā cittānurañjakaprakṛtarasāvyabhicāriṇā autsukyasya prādurbhāvaḥ—‘bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā’ iti | evaṃ ‘doṣāṇāmupaśāntaye śrutam’ ityādyaucityādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvaprādurbhūtānāmuttarottarabhāvibhiścintāprabhṛtibhirapavāde prakṛtavāsanā praụdhiravaseyā | unmattavacanatvāditi | rasāviṣṭacetasastadutkalikāprāyāṇāṃ bhāvānāmavyavasthayā kīrtanamunmādaḥ ||

lg.l: tasyāpi kvāpi nirdoṣaḥ prayogo dṛśyate yathā || 137 ||
na śrutā bhārate yena tasya janma nirarthakam || 178 ||’

div.p: atra gītāviduravākyādīnāṃ kathāyāmaprayojakatve 'pītihāsavyājena caturvargapratipādanasyārambha eva pratijñānādguṇatvam | tadidamaprayojanam ||

yadprayojanamiti | prabandhārthapoṣā‘poṣo nādhāyaka’ pāṭhaḥnādhāyakavākyamaprayojanam | arthaṃlābhapratipādakatayā kṛtakaraṃ vyartham | evakāro bhinnakramastacchabdānantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ | dṛśyata ityanena tatra tatra prakṛtasaṃgatau satyāṃ doṣābhāvo 'vaseya iti darśitam | yadyapi bhagavadgītāyāṃ mokṣādhikāriṇāmastyeva prakṛtaśāntarasaparipoṣakatvam, tathāpi tadantargatānāṃ bhūyasāmāhatya nāsti | bhīṣmaviduravākyānāṃ tu dharmādhikāre prakṛtānāṃ vyakta eva niṣprayojanaprastāvaḥ‘stāvaḥ’ pāṭhaḥ | so 'yaṃ yathā samādhīyate tadvivṛṇoti—atreti | itihāsarūpe prabandhe satyapi śāntasya vākyārthābhāvena bahūnāmitihāsānāṃ trivargādhikāritvāccaturvargapratipādanameva maharṣerabhimatam, dharmāditritayasya ca prāsaṅgikatayā na pūrvavadasyārthaikatāvirodhaḥ | tadidamuktam—vyājeneti | evaṃ ca vyutpādayitavyaviṣayajijñāsopādāne dharmārthapravṛttaye vākyamidaṃ saphalatāmāsādayadguṇa eva bhavati ||

atraikenaivopamānena ‘śubhratva’ gaśauklyapratītau śeṣopamānapādānāṃ vyarthatve 'pi yaśasaḥ smaryamāṇatvagīyamānatvastūyamānatvaśrūyamāṇatvairhṛdayādiṣu śrīkhaṇḍādivadanasthānasya pratīyamānatvādguṇatvam ||

evaṃ gatārthamapīti | śrīkhaṇḍenaivopamāne yaśasaḥ śuddhatvamavagataṃ śleṣopamānapadāni kevalakṛtakarāṇīti vyarthatvaprasaṅge smaraṇādiviśeṣavivakṣayā tiraskriyate, yathāsaṃkhyādibhaṅgisaubhāgyena ca guṇībhāva iti ||
'asāraṃ saṃsāram’ ityuktvā ‘paribhuṣitaratnaṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokam’ ‘jagajjīrṇāraṇyam’ iti yaduktam, tasya viśeṣānabhidhāyakatve 'pi rasākṣiptena vaktrābhihitatvādguṇatvam ||

aviśeṣeṇeti | pūrvoktapūrvoktābhinnatātparyakamaviśeṣeṇa tātparyāvṛttiprayojanamantareṇa tanmayībhavanaṃ cetasa ākṣepaḥ | ‘asāraṃ saṃsāram’ ityanena sthāvarajaṅgamaprapañcasya niḥsāratāṃ pratipādya ‘jātau jātau yadutkṛṣṭaṃ taddhi ratnaṃ pracakṣate’ iti | 'paribhuṣitaratnam’ ityatrāpi tāvāneva tātparyārthaḥ | evaṃ ‘nirālokaṃ lokaṃ', ‘jagajjīrṇāraṇyam’ ityatrāpi draṣṭavyam | sugamamanyat ||

lg.l: uṇṇaapaohare pekkhiūṇa jaï vasasi tā vasasu || 181 ||’

div.p: atra kenāpi pathikayūnā prāvṛḍārambhe grāmaṇīvadhūḥ pīnonnatastanī sattharaamiti srastarakavyājena śastarataṃ yācitā | taṃ pratyācakṣāṇeva yathoktaṃ brūte—‘kuto 'tra grāmaṇīgṛhe srastarakaḥ, kuto vā śastaṃ ratam | unnatau payodharau mama hṛdaye nabhasi vā payodharāndṛṣṭvā yadi vasasi tadā vasa’ iti tadetasya gopanāya ‘nānārthaireva’ gavdyarthaireva padaiḥ prayuktamiti saṃdigdhasyāpyasya guṇatvam ||

saṃśayāyaiveti | miśro viruddhārthavākyaṃ saṃśayāpādanena duṣyatītyuktam | yadā tu saṃdeha eva tātparyamavadhāryate tadā sa eva rañjakatayālaṃkāratāmārohatīti ‘kathaṃ na’ syātkatthanaṃ guṇībhāva iti, tadidaṃbhuktam—syādalaṃkāra eveti | kuto labhyate pathika srastaraḥ śastarataṃ cātra grāmaṇīgṛhe | grāmaṇīrgrāmapradhānam | unnatapayodharānmedhān payodharau stanau vā dṛṣṭvā yadi vasasi tadvasa | atra praṣṭuḥ saṃdehajanakatvena nibhṛtānurāgaprakāśanaṃ pathikaviṣaye pratīyate || dvyarthairiti | taduktam—‘vdyarthaiḥ padaiḥ piśunayecca rahasyavastu’ iti ||

lg.l: doṣaḥ sopakramo nāma citrahetau ca duṣyati || 140 ||

div.p: vākya iti | arthānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāṃ teṣāmeva paurvāparyaniyamādya iti pūrvārdhe 'dhyāhāryam | citrahetāviti prasiddharūpaviparyāsena hetuvacanadvārā prakṛtavākyārthaparipoṣādhānaṃ citrahetuḥ | paryasya vistārya candrodayarāgoddīpanayoḥ satyapi hetuhetumadbhāvena paurvāparye prathamaṃ rāgasāgaraḥ paścāccandramaṇḍalamudīrṇamiti viparyāsapratītisamasamayamuddīpanavibhāvanānusaṃdhānād himāṃśoratiśīghrakāritāprakāśanāt prakṛtaśṛṅgāraraso dīpyate | evaṃ kulakādirūpaṃ prabandhāntargatavākyeṣvapi guṇatvamavaseyam ||

lg.l: na doṣastasya tu kvāpi yatra cchāyā na hīyate || 141 ||

div.p: atropamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ samasyanta iti prakrāntarīteranirvāhe 'pi samāsavyākhyāparatvenaiva ivaśabdataddhitayoḥ prayoge pratyuta cchāyotkarṣa iti guṇatvam ||

yasminniti | vākyārthasya dharmiṇo yadalaṃkārabhaṅgyā prakramasthayā nirvahaṇābhāvaḥ khedaḥ | sa tu pūrvālaṃkāraviśrāntau pratīteraskhalane na doṣaḥ | guṇatvaṃ ca tasya bhaṅgyantarairapi prakṛtālaṃkāre dhvananāt | tathā hi—‘abhinavavadhūroṣasvādu asaralajanāśleṣa iva krūraḥ’ ityupamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ samasyanta iti samāsadvayenopamāmupakramya malinavibhavasyājñeveti samāsatyāgādvirahivanitāvakraklaibyaṃ bibhartīti cāntaradharmāropeṇa copamātyāgātsatyapi rīteranirvāhe upamāyāmeva paryavasānaṃ samādhānahetuḥ | guṇatvahetumāha—vyākhyāparatveneti | galitavibhāvājñāmasṛṇeti samāse kartavye yo 'yamivaśabdaprayogaḥ sa ivārthe pūrvau samāsau bodhayati | klaibyaṃ
bibhartīti sāmānyālaṃkāre kathamanyadharmamanyo vahatīti pratisaṃdhānasamasamayaṃ vakraklaibyamasyetyantargatopamāprakaṭībhāve upamāsamāsapadayorapi sā pratīyate iti seyaṃ kavicāturīpratīyamānacchāyāmeva puṣṇāti | tadidamuktam—pratyuteti ||

lg.l: vārtādau tena tuṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ || 142 ||

div.p: lokāṃtīta iti | ‘anāmaye priyālāpe vārtaṃ vārtā ca kīrtyate | varṇanāsvapi’ ityādipadavivaraṇaṃ dṛśyate | kāntamityabhisaṃbandhaḥ | laukikārthānuyāyi yajjagati loke kāntamucyate tathābhūtamatikramya yatkavīnāṃ prasthānaṃ pravartate tadapi gauḍānāṃ manaso mude proktam | śabdāḍambarātmakagauḍarītipriyāṇāṃ vidagdhakāmājñāpakaṃ sadguṇī bhavatīti ślokārthaḥ | dhiṣṇyaṃ gṛham | nanu priyālāpavarṇanayorevaṃvidhā eva loke kāvye ca vacanasaṃdarbhā iti nāstyatimātratānatimātratayorbheda iti pṛcchati—atheti | sugabhamanyat ||

lg.l: ‘hālāhalaṃ viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣva sakhi mā tatra viśvasīḥ |
yadvā na dahyase kāṣṭhaiḥ svalpaistvamiti me matiḥ || 188 ||’

div.p: paruṣamiti | viruddhalakṣaṇā laukikī tasyā hi jhaṭityabhidhānāvinābhāvādaparuṣārthapratīterabhidhānataḥ pāruṣyaṃ na doṣo lakṣaṇāparigraheṇa ca guṇatvam | tadāhuḥ—‘abhidheyāvinābhāvapratītirlakṣaṇeti yā | saiṣā kāvye dagdhavakrā jīvitaṃ vṛttiriṣyate ||’ iti |

l.seg: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāṃbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ || 189 ||’

div.p: atra karuṇe śrṛṅgārasyāpra‘stutatve’ iti saṭīkapustakapāṭhaḥkṛtatve 'pi śaṃbhuprabhāvavarṇanāṅgabhūtatvena dvayo- rapyaprādhānyādavairasyena guṇatvam ||

aprastuteti | aprādhānya ityupalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyatve 'pīti ca boddhavyam rasavastunoḥ parasparavirodhirasavyañjakayoḥ | yadvā mithovirodhirasarūpayoreva vastunaḥ | tadāha—‘bādhyānāmaṅgabhāvaṃ vā prāptānāmavi‘muktivatsalā’ iti pāṭhaḥmuktatā’ iti ||
hīnamiti | jātipramāṇābhyāmapakṛṣṭaṃ hīnaṃ candrāpekṣayā kāminīkapolasyāpakarṣe ātmanastulyatāmuddīpanasya pratipādyamānaḥ prakṛtaśṛṅgāraprakarṣamarpayiṣyatīti guṇatvam | evamadhikopame 'pi ||

yasyopamānamiti | lokaprasiddhameva kavibhirupamāne kāntaṃ bhavati tena yatra loke prasiddhaṃ tena sahopamāvarṇane saṃbhavadapyaprasiddhopamatvaṃ rasānupraveśena guṇī bhavati | udgarbhatvena stanāgraśyāmikā tayā lāñchanānukaraṇamabhilaṣitam ||

l.seg: pāṇiḥ saṃprati me haṭhātkimaparaṃ spraṣṭuṃ dhanurvāñchati || 194 ||’

div.p:
niralaṃkāramiti | dainyaparābhavapraṇayinīmityādyutkṛṣṭapuṣṭiviśeṣaṇayogādastiśabde 'spaṣṭe vakratārthe tu nāsti vakratvaṃ cālaṃkāra iti | yadyapi vākyārtho niralaṃkāra
iva bhāsate, tathāpi viśeṣato 'laṃkārādhyavasāye 'pi sāmānyena vakratā prakāśata eva | nahi laukikaśāstrīyavacanārthavaiparītyamiha pratīyate | tadidamuktamarthaurjityāditi ||
asti hi vayaṃ yācāmaha ityukte yācñā ca bhikṣākarānālakṣitā(?)ityuktau nāyakaprakarṣābhivyañjako viśeṣa ityāha—

lg.l: tasyeha dṛśyate bhūmnā prayogo nāpi duṣyati || 152 ||

div.p: asabhyārthamiti | kvacitprāthamika eva padārthasaṃsargo 'ślīlaḥ | kvacittu na tasmiṃstathābhūte 'pi saṃsargāntaramiti yadaślīlamarthāntaravāci vetyuktam | kavibhiravigītatvāditi | aviparītādviparītaṃ ratamutkṛṣyata iti śāstrakārairāmnānāttasya śṛṅgāroddīpanatayā kavibhirādṛtatvādityarthaḥ ||
atra deśaviruddhatve 'pi tasya rājñaḥ prabhāveṇeti kāraṇopanyāsādguṇatvam ||
deśo 'drīti | ādipadena dvīpādiparigrahaḥ | kāmārthasaṃśrayāḥ, arthasaṃśrayāḥ pravṛttayo 'vasthāviśeṣāḥ | hetuvidyā ānvīkṣikī | ayathārūḍhaṃ aprasiddham ||
atra kālaviruddhatve 'pi rājñāṃ vināśapiśuna ityaniṣṭasūcakotpāta rūpatvādguṇatvam ||

sa saṃkoca iti | yadi candrādibhyaḥ kumudasaṃkocādayo bhaveyustadā bhavadguṇebhyaḥ khalānāmudvega upamīyeta na tu tathā saṃbhavati tenāyamalaukikatvādāścaryamarpayatīti vākyārthaparipoṣāttathopanyāso guṇa eveti ||

lg.l: pibāmi taralaṃ tasyāḥ kadā nu radanacchadam || 201 ||’

div.p: dharmavirodhasyeti | daivo hīti | siddhādeśācca satītvaṃ pāñcālakanyakāyāḥ | tiraskṛtamityata eva vā pañcadhā vivakṣita ityāgamaḥ ||
atrāpanna: śatrurabhiyātavya iti nītiḥ, tacca mānino hriye bhavatī‘to 'ti’ mūlapustakapāṭhaḥtiviruddhamapi uddhatapuruṣabhāṣitatvānna duṣyatīti guṇatvam |
atra trāsato layavaiṣamyeṇa geyasya rāgahetutve 'pi kāminīmukhodgīrṇatvādrāgavivardhanatvena guṇatvam ||

kāmaśāstreti | layavaiṣamyāditi gītasya kalāprakathanāttasya ca viṣamalayasyārañjakatvātkathaṃ rāgavardhanamiti dūṣaṇaṃ dolāgatāgatatrastakāminīgītaprabhāvokteścamatkāritvāttirodhīyata iti guṇabhāvaṃ ca nīyate | bhāvāntarālavartī kāmo layaḥ ||

lg.l: itthaṃ guṇāśca doṣāśca kāvye doṣaguṇāśca ye |

div.p: nanu guṇaireva śabdārthayoḥ sanāthīkaraṇe kimalaṃkāravivecanaprayāsenetyata āha—

lg.l: yuvateriva rūpamaṅga kāvyaṃ svadate śuddhaguṇaṃ tadapyatīva |

div.p: vikalpo viśeṣastarhi kimuttarasiddhau pūrveṇeti nyāyena tyajyantāṃ guṇā ityata āha—
te cālaṃkārā yathāsthānaṃ niveśyamānā eva sahṛdayarañjanakṣamā iti kavīñśikṣayati—
dīrgheti | tena śabdādiviṣayavibhāgenālaṃkāravivecanaṃ saprayojanameveti tātparyārthaḥ | śeṣamatirohitam ||
div.trailer: iti śrīmiśraratneśvaraviracite ratnadarpaṇanāmni sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇavivaraṇe guṇavivecano nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
iti śrīmahārājādhirājabhojadevena viracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇanāmni alaṃkāraśāstre guṇavivecanaṃ nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ |

div.head: dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ |

div.p: evaṃ doṣaguṇeṣu nirṇīteṣvalaṃkārāḥ prāptāvasarāstatrālaṃkārasāmānyalakṣaṇamādyaparicchede tadvibhāgaṃ darśayanparicchedatrayaṃ saṃgamayati—

śabdārthobhayasaṃjñābhiriti | itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā | madhyamapadalopīsamāsaḥ | tena śabdālaṃkārārthālaṃkārobhayālaṃkārasaṃjñābhirityarthaḥ | guṇaprastāve bāhyatvādikaṃ vivṛtaṃ śabdo 'vacchedakatayā prathamapratisaṃdheyabhāvena ca śarīrasthānīyo bāhyastatastadāśrayā alaṃkārā api bāhyāḥ | artho vicchedyatayā paścādanusaṃdheyatayā cātmatulya ābhyantarastena tadāśrayā alaṃkārā apyābhyantarāḥ | etena bāhyābhyantarā vyākhyātāḥ | āśrayāśrayibhāvaśca yathātathoktameva | ubhayālaṃkāreṣu yogasya prāyikatvamāśritya kavīśvarāṇāmanuśāsanamuktam | etadvivecayiṣyate caturthārambhe ||

ye vyutpattīti | viśiṣṭā utpattirvyutpattirlopāgamavikārādiprapañcaḥ | ata eva hi saṃskṛtādijātayo vyavatiṣṭhante | ādigrahaṇādgurulaghusaṃniveśādayo gatyādyavacchedāstrayoviṃśatirupāttāḥ | bāhyakaṅkaṇādisāmyādiyaṃ saṃjñā pravṛttetyāha—śabdālaṃkārasaṃjñā iti ||
svarūpasthitau rūpāntaragaveṣaṇamanucitam | ato jāteḥ prādhānyātprathamaṃ lakṣaṇamityāha—

tatreti | saṃskṛtamiti bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | bhāratīgrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭārtham | nanvavaśyaṃ śabdena saṃskṛtādyanyatamena bhavitavyam | tatko 'tra kaveḥ śaktivyutpattyoraṃśo yenālaṃkāratā syādityata āha—seti | aucityākṛṣṭa evālaṃkāraḥ | asti ca saṃskṛtāderapi tathābhāva iti bhāvaḥ ||
yadyapyarthaucitī pūrvaṃ darśayitumucitā tathāpi prādhānyamāvedayituṃ pṛthaktaucitīmāha—

lg.l: na mlecchitavyaṃ yajñādau strīṣu nāprākṛtaṃ vadet |

div.p: na mlecchitavyamityādi | mlecchanamapaśabdaḥ | prākṛtaṃ saṃskṛtabhavam | abhijātaḥ śuddhānvayaḥ ||
saṃskṛtenaiveti | yathā hi—devatāstutyādau saṃskṛtaṃ pragalbhate na tathā prākṛtādi | yathā ca sūkṣmavastusvarūpoṭṭaṅkane prākṛtasya sauṣṭhavaṃ na tathā saṃskṛtāderityādi ||
paiśācyeti | dvitrābhiḥ ko 'pi kāvyasamasyābhedasyārthaḥ | sarvābhiḥ kaścana prakaraṇāderarthaḥ ||
brahmanniti | bahmannityādinā nindārthānuvādena gauḍeṣu prākṛtānaucityaṃ rājaśekhareṇa vyañjitam ||
ke 'bhūvanniti | ạ̄dhyarājaḥ śālivāhanaḥ | sāhasāṅko vikramādityaḥ | granthakṛtpūrvajatayā śrīpadam ||
tā imāḥ parasparasaṃkīrṇāḥ ṣaḍeva saṃskṛtādibhāṣā bhavantīti sāmānyavibhāgametadviracanaprayojanaṃ copasaṃharati—

l.seg: rnibaddhā yasteṣāṃ sa iha kavirājo vijayate || 16 ||

div.p: gira iti | divyāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ | bhūtavacanaṃ paiśācam | mathurāvāsibhaṇitiḥ śaurasenī | teṣāmiti | tacca bhūtavacanaṃ sa cāpabhraṃśastāśca divyādyā iti ‘napuṃsakamanapuṃsakena’ ityekaśeṣaḥ | pākṣikaṃ bahuvacanam | pratibhārthaprāṇānāṃ jīvadvarṇanānipuṇo hi kaviḥ, sa eva hi sarvapathīnatādṛguktisiddhisaṃpannaḥ kavirājaḥ, ata eva vijayate sakalalokaśāstravacananirmātṛbhyaḥ prakarṣeṇa vartata iti ||
saṃskṛtādiṣu yathāyogaṃ śuddhādibhedena jātiḥ ṣọdhā bhidyata ityāha—

śuddhā sādhāraṇīti | iha bhāṣārūpaviṣayabhedena bhinnāḥ saṃskārā yānadhikṛtya pāṇini-vararuci-prabhṛtīnāmanuśāsanāni vyavatiṣṭante | tadyatraika eva saṃskāraḥ pratyabhijñāyate sā śuddhā | saṃskārāntarāgrahaṇāt | yatra tu lakṣaṇasaṃbhedena nānāsaṃskārasaṃpātaḥ kṣīranīravatsā sādhāraṇī | rūpasādhāraṇyānnarasiṃhavadbhāṣābhedavya-
vasthitabhāgadvayātmikā miśrā | rūpamiśraṇāttilataṇḍulanyāyena saṃkīrṇā | vijātīyavastvantaravyatireka eva loke saṃkīrṇavyavahārāt | yā punaḥ prakṛtibhāvenāpi bhāṣāntarasaṃparkaṃ na sahate sānanyagāminī | saṃskārasaṃbhedena vā prakṛtibhāvena vā nānyaṃ gacchati yato 'paśabdarūpā sāpabhraṣṭā ||

tāsūttameti | pātralakṣaṇamuttamādibhedaśca pañcame vakṣyate | unnamitaiketi | padāni prakṛtānaṅgalekhocitāni nirvyājapremagarbhāṇi | ata evāvāpodvāpapratisaṃdhānanimagnamānasāyāścintānubhāvarūpaṃ bhrūlatāvirecitamivāsīt | hastatalanihitaikakapolāyāstādṛkpulakitaikakapoladarśanādatimānātmā śṛṅgāraḥ suprabuddha iva tatkālaṃ nāyakasyāpīti mitho 'nubandhalakṣaṇāpūrvānurāgakakṣāmadhirụ̄dhā ratireva kāvyasarvasvāyate | atra ca kasyacitpadasya bhāṣāntarasādhāraṇye 'pi bhūyasāmudāharaṇatvam | evamanyatrāpi ||

lg.l: ‘tujjha ṇa āṇe hiaaṃ mama uṇa maaṇo diā a rattiṃ a |
ṇikkiva tavei valiaṃ tuha juttamanorahāiṃ aṅgāiṃ || 2 ||’
tava na jāne hṛdayaṃ mama punarmadano divā ca rātriṃ ca |
aṇiśaṃ ca piāmi śoṇide valiśaśade śamale huvīadi || 3 ||’
aniśaṃ ca pibāmi śoṇitaṃ varṣaśataṃ samaro bhaviṣyati ||]

div.p: śada māṇuśeti | śataṃ mānuṣamāṃsabhāraḥ kumbhasahasraṃ vasābhiḥ saṃcitam | aniśaṃ ca pibāmi śoṇitaṃ varṣaśataṃ samaro bhaviṣyati ||’ atra māṃsādilābhahetutayā samarāśaṃsanaṃ bībhatsamunmudrayaddhīnapātratāṃ draḍhayati ||

nātyuttameti | uttamādapakṛṣṭaṃ madhyamādutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyuttamam | ‘praṇamata praṇayaprakupitagaurīcaraṇāgralagnapratibimbam | daśasu nakhadarpaṇeṣvekādaśatanudharaṃ rudram ||’ evaṃ nāma devīkope bhagavataḥ praṇayakātaratā yena yugapadiva sarvābhirapi mūrtibhiḥ praṇamatīti pratīyamānotprekṣā ||

lg.l: ‘tuṃ si mae cūaṅkura dipṇo kāmassa gahidadhaṇuhassa |

div.p: natimadhyameti | hīnādutkṛṣṭaṃ madhyamādapakṛṣṭaṃ nātimadhyamam | tuṃ sīti | kāmasya | kāmāyetyarthaḥ | caturthyāḥ ‘saṃbandhasāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī’ iti sūtrāt ṣaṣṭhī ||

lg.l: ‘laï vappula pia duddhaṃ katto amhāṇahuṃ chāsi |
puttahumatthe hattho jaï dahi jammevi jaa āsi || 6 ||’
putrakamastake hasto yadi dadhi janmanyapi jātamāsīt ||]

div.p: prāyikaṃ caitat | tena kaverabhiprāyaśaktyādibhyaḥ sarvā api sarvaprayojyā bhavanti | tā imāḥ śuddhāḥ ṣaḍeva ||

nātihīneti | hīnātkiṃcidutkṛṣṭaṃ madhyabhādapakṛṣṭaṃ nātihīnam | laï vappuleti | laï gṛhāṇa | vappuletyanukampāsaṃbodhane | piba dugdham | kuto 'smākaṃ chāsi-
padābhidheyaṃ takram | puttahumatthe iti śapathaḥ, putrasya mastakenāhaṃ śape yadi takrasya vyāpakaṃ daghi janmanyapi jātamāsīditi vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ prayuktā ||

nanu prākṛtādiṣūttamādipātravyatikaradarśanātkathameṣā vyavasthā ghaṭata ityata āha—prāyikamiti | yatra prakṛtinirvahaṇocitaviśeṣābhisaṃdhānena kaviranyathā pravartate | yathā mālatyāṃ saṃskṛtamāśritya ‘eṣo 'smi bhoḥ kāryavaśātprayogavaśācca prākṛtabhāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ’ ityādi | yatra vā kavervyutpattikṛto bhāṣāviparyāsaḥ śaktyā tiraskriyate | yathā mṛcchakaṭike viṭasya madhyamapātrasyāpi saṃskṛtoktiḥ | yatra vā prabandhaucitīparavaśāḥ saṃskṛtādijātayo viparyasyante | yathā sargabandhādau madhyamāderapi saṃskṛtameva, khaṇḍakathāparakathādau uttamāderapi prākṛtameva, bṛhatkathādau paiśācameva, vastubandhādāvapabhraṃśa eveti, tatra saṃdhisaṃdhyaṅgaghaṭanāsauṣṭhavena rasaḥ puṣyatīti bharatamuniprabhṛtīnāmatiprakāśa eva panthāḥ ||
sādhāraṇyādayaḥ punaranantāḥ | tāsu madhyamapātrabhūmikāsthottamapātraprayojyā saṃskṛtaprākṛtayoḥ sādhāraṇī yathā—

lg.l: virasaṃ virahāyāsaṃ sọdhuṃ tava cittamasahaṃ me || 7 ||’

div.p: sādhāraṇyeti | saṃskṛtasya prākṛtādisādhāraṇye pañca prakārāḥ, prākṛtasya śaurasenyādisādhāraṇye catvāraḥ, śaurasenyāḥ paiśācyādisādhāraṇye trayaḥ, paiśācyā māgadhyādisādhāraṇye dvau, māgadhyā apabhraṃśasādhāraṇye eka iti | dvivikalpe pañcadaśa prabhedāḥ, trivikalpe viṃśatiḥ, caturvikalpe pañcadaśa, pañcavikalpe ṣaṭ, ṣaḍvikalpe ekaḥ, iti sarvamilane saptapañcāśatprakārā sādhāraṇī | evaṃ miśrādāvapi loṣṭaprastāvakrameṇa bahavo bhedā iti tāvadudāharaṇe granthagauravaṃ syāditi diṅmātramudāharati—tāsviti | saṃbhinnasaṃskārā bhāṣāprayoge hi prayoktṛprakṛtisaṃbhede bhavati | na ca prakṛtisaṃbhedastāttvikaḥ svabhāvasaṃkaraprasaṅgāt | ata uktaṃ madhyamapātrabhūmikāstheti | bhūmikā varṇikā | madhyamapātraprakṛtyucito rāgādyabhinayastatra tiṣṭhati tatparigraheṇa tricatura(?)gavatsāmājikānāṃ samyaṅmithyāsaṃśayasādṛśyapratītivilakṣaṇapratipattipadavīmavataratīti madhyamapātrabhūmikāstham, upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam | uttamabhūmikāsthamadhyamaprayojyāpīyameva | evamuttaratra | tava virahāyāsaṃ soḍhuṃ mama cittamasahamiti yojanā ||

vaktṛviṣayeti | yadottamādiṣu nānāvaktṛbhirekā kāvyasamasyā kriyate, bhinnabhāṣocitavarṇanīyaviṣayaṃ vā kāvyamekamupakramyate, yadā vā śaktinirūpaṇāya kavereva nānābhāṣāmayaṃ kāvyamārabdhaṃ syāt, tadā kathaṃ nālaṃkārapadavīmadhyāste | ata āha—miśreti | tamalliantī tamālīyamānā ||

l.seg: lavaï a muhuryāmyo vāyurnivāara vāi a |
na kaja na kajaṃ mānenādya priyaṃ pratijāhudā || 10 ||’

div.p:
durvidagdhādīti | nāgarakabhāvamavāptastadbhūmikāmavalambamāno durvidagdhaḥ | ādipadātpūrvoktāḥ samasyādayaḥ | akaṭamāścaryam | gumaṭī manojñā | āsphālitakhaṅgasyeva sphuraṇe lavaï iti mahārāṣṭradeśī | tathā ca prayogaḥ—‘lavaï a
vijjūmaṇoharī’ ityārādhyāḥ | anye tu lapatītyarthamāhuḥ | evaṃ ca kalaśabdaḥ puṣyatīti | yāmyo dakṣiṇaḥ | nivāara nirvañcako vārakaśūnyo vā idāvāraka iti | alā āgataḥ | yadiha māno na kriyeta jyotsnādayo manomudamevādhāsyantīti prarocanā | yadā tu ‘manonude’ iti pāṭho 'piśabdena nāyakasādhāraṇamutkaṇṭhākāritvamuktaṃ candrajyotsnādīnāmiti | ato nakajanakajannārtho nārtha īrṣyāroṣalakṣaṇena pratikūlabhāvāvalambinā mānena, tasmātpriyameva pratijāhudā yāmaḥ, yadāmananti svayaṃ vā tatra gamanamiti ||
atra pūrvārdhapadāni saṃskṛta eva, uttarārdhapadāni prākṛta eva | seyamasādhāraṇyananyagāminī ca jātirucyate | bhāṣāntarāṇāṃ punarasādhāraṇyaṃ nāsti ||

krīḍeti | kāvyasamasyā krīḍā, uktapūrvā goṣṭhī, tatra vinodo manonukūlena samayātivāhanam | ādipadaṃ pūrvavat | nanu mā bhūtprakṛtibhāvena bhāṣāntarasaṃbhedaḥ saṃskārasaṃpāte tu bhaviṣyati, tathā ca kathaṃ sādhāraṇīto bhidyata ityata āha—asādhāraṇī ceti | gose prabhāte, taviñchiriñcholī kamalarajaḥpaṅktiḥ | tallamalpasaraḥ | tūhaṃ tīrtham | vivallidā prasāritā | nātra pūrvottarārdhayoraikamatyamudāharaṇatvāt | ārādhyāstu yathā sarastīre kamalarajaḥpaṅktiḥ prasṛtā śobhate tathā vidvadvaktreṣu bhīṣmavākyānītyupamākalpanayā kathaṃcidekavākyatāmāhuḥ | atra pūrvārdhapadānīti | na bhīṣmādayo 'nabhidhānāditi bhāṣāntarasthānibhāvasya pratiṣedhāt | evaṃ vācaspativiśiṣṭarasavaśapracetasapotādayo draṣṭavyāḥ | prākṛta eveti | mahārāṣṭradeśīyatvāddeśīpadānāṃ ca sthānibhāvāsaṃbhavāt | bhāṣāntarāṇāṃ punariti | siddhirmahārāṣṭrītaḥ, siddhiḥ śaurasenītaḥ, ityupakramyānuśāsanāttadbhavarūpataiva sphuṭā | tatsamānāṃ tu sādhāraṇyameveti ||

lg.l: ‘muddhe gahaṇaaṃ geṇhaü taṃ dhari muddaṃ ṇie hatthe |
ṇicchaü sundari tuha uvari mama suraappahā atthi || 12 ||’
[mugdhe ratamūlyamgrahaṇakaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dhāraya mudrāṃ nije haste |

div.p: seyamapaśabdaprayogato 'pabhraṣṭāpyavidvadbhiḥ śrotriyādyaiḥ prayujyata ityapabhraṣṭā jātiḥ | asyā api cānukaraṇe sādhutvamiṣyate ||

apabhraṣṭeti | atra tavopari surataspṛhāstītyādikāpaśabdabahulatvenāpabhraṣṭā spaṣṭaiva | sā tu kathamalaṃkāra ityata āha—seyamiti | śrotriyaśchāndasaḥ | ādyapadena bālādayaḥ | sarva eva hi laukikaḥ padārtho 'bhinayakakṣāmadhirūḍhaḥ parityajya grāmyamabhimukhībhūto vibhāvādiṣu kathaṃ nālaṃkārastadidamuktaṃ prayogata iti | na cāpaśabdānāṃ doṣatvameveti vācyam | anukaraṇe tu sarveṣāmiti doṣasāmānyāvalambinā guṇībhāvenāsya viṣayīkṛtatvāditi ||
nānāvacchinnajātiḥ kāvyaśarīre niviśata iti tadavacchedarūpāṃ gatimanantaraṃ lakṣayati—

lg.l: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca kāvyaṃ yatsā gatiḥ smṛtā |

div.p: padyamiti | paṭhiteḥ padātpadāntarasaṃcāro gatiḥ | sā kenacidaucityopanipātinā saṃdarbhaparimāṇena niyamyate | tatastadapyupacāreṇa gatiḥ | paṭhitiparimāṇaṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāśrayata iti tadapi gatistacca padyādibhedena trividhamiti saṃkṣepaḥ | ata eva gadyabandhe tu kaiścidvṛttamāśritaṃ vṛttaṃ vartanamiyatteti yāvaditi | sarvanāmaśabdā hi kadāciduddeśyasya liṅgamāśrayante kadācitpratinirdeśyasyeti kāvye yatsā gatirityuktam | tatra padyaṃ catuṣpadīti na lakṣaṇamullālamātrādau dvipadapañcapadādiśarīre tadabhāvāt | apādaḥ padasaṃtāno gadyamityapi na | apādatvaṃ hyapratyabhijñāyamānavṛttabhāgatvaṃ, vivakṣātaścatuṣpadīvyatiriktatvaṃ vā | ādye vṛttigandhipadyaṃ na syāt | dvitīye tvatiprasaṅgaḥ | tasmācchandoniyamavatī kāvyam, atathābhūtā tu gadyamiti vibhāgaḥ | gadyapadyātmakaṃ kāvyaṃ miśram | tadasyā gateralaṃkāratvamupapādayati—arthaucityādibhiriti ||

lg.l: kavituṃ kaścana dvābhyāṃ kāvye 'rthaḥ kaścana tribhiḥ || 19 ||

div.p: kaścidgadyeneti | yathā hyaṭavīvarṇanādau gadyaṃ pragalbhate tathā na padyam, yathā ca kāvyaśāstratānirvahaṇocite 'rthe padyamutsahate na tathā gadyamityādi | evaṃ kathākhyāyikādau gadyameva, campūprabhṛtau miśramevetyādipadopāttabandhaucitī draṣṭavyā ||
āstāṃ tāvadarthādyaucityagaveṣaṇaṃ svarūpeṇaiva padyādikaṃ parisphuratkavipratibhāviśeṣāvedanena sahṛdayāvarjakamavasīyate | kathamanyathā kvacideva kasyacitsauṣṭhavamityāha—

lg.l: gatyāṃ gatyāmiyaṃ devī vicitrā hi sarasvatī || 20 ||

div.p: yādṛgiti | gatyāṃ gatyāmiti | padye gadye miśre cetyarthaḥ | vicitrā avyavasthitasiddhikā ||

yathāmatīti | matirvyutpattiḥ | yuktāyuktaviveka iti yāvat | śaktiḥ kavitvabījabhūtaḥ prāktanaḥ saṃskāraḥ | aucityaṃ darśitameva | rucirmanonukūlatāpratisaṃdhānam | kaveḥ pātrasyeti yathāyogam | tathā hi śaktivyutpattī kavereva | aucityaṃ pātrasyaiva | rucirubhayorapīti ||
sa cāyaṃ saṃdarbhāvacchedo gurulaghusaṃniveśenaiva śobhata iti tamāśritya vibhāgamāha—
druteti | ādyāstisraḥ śuddhāḥ | āsāmeva mithovyatikareṇottarāstistraḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ || kathameṣāṃ vyavasthetyata āha—

lg.l: padye gadye ca miśre ca ṣaṭprakāropajāyate || 23 ||

div.p: sā laghūnāmiti | bāhulyamalpatvaṃ miśraṇaṃ ca tulyavatpratibhānam | na gadyādikameva gatiḥ kiṃtu tadādhāraḥ paṭhitisaṃcāra iti vyanakti-padye gadye ca miśre ceti ||

lg.l: tatra vṛttaṃ ca jātiṃ ca padyamāhuratho pṛthak |

div.p: tatreti | varṇaniyataṃ chandovṛttam | mātrāniyataṃ jātiḥ | samaprastāvaṃ samam | prathamatṛtīyayordvitīyacaturthayośca tulyaprastāvamardhasamam | ubhayabahirardhaṃ viṣamam ||

gadyamiti | utkalikā kallolastatprāyam | uccāvacamiva pratibhāsamānamityarthaḥ | yathā—‘salīlakarakamalatālikātaralavalayāvalīkam’ iti | vṛttagandhi pratibhātavṛttaikadeśam | tadetadalpākhyāyāmutpannena samāsāntena vyañjitam | tadayamarthaḥ— sāmānyataḥ padyādibhedena gatistridhā | tatrāpi jātyādibhedena ṣaṭprakārāḥ | te 'pi drutādibhedena ṣaṭtriṃśaditi ||
nanu lalitādayo gadyabhedāḥ kaiścidalaṃkārakāraiḥ parisaṃkhyātāste kasmānnocyanta ityata āha—

lalitamiti | sukumārasaṃdarbhaṃ lalitam | yathā—‘kamalinīvanasaṃcaraṇavyatikaralagnanalinanālakaṇṭake vane kvacinnirbharaṃ padamādadhāti’ iti | prasphuṭasaṃdarbhaṃ niṣṭhuram | yathā—‘uttambhitakuṭilakuntalakalāpaḥ śmaśānavāṭamavatarati’ iti | anullikhitasamāsaṃ cūrṇam | yathā—‘abhyāso hi karmaṇaḥ kauśalamādadhāti | na khalu saṃnipātamātreṇodabindurapi grāvaṇi nimnatāmādadhāti’ iti | udbhaṭasabhāsamāviddham | yathā—‘kuliśaśikharakharatarasvarapracayapracaṇḍacapeṭapāṭitamattamātaṅgamadacchaṭācchuritacārukesarabhārabhāsuramukhe kesariṇi’ iti | rītivṛttyoriti viṣayasaptamī | tathā lalitaṃ kaiśikyādau, niṣṭhurabhārabhaṭyādau, cūrṇaṃ vaidarbhyādau, āviddhaṃ gauḍīyāprabhṛtau, yathāyathamantarbhavatīti noktabhedāḥ parisaṃkhyātā ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: aruṇakarodgama eṣa vartate varatanu saṃpravadanti kukkuṭāḥ || 13 ||’

div.p:
tatreti | navasaṃgamabhīrviti saṃbodhanam | bhīruśabdādūṃṅ, tasmātsaṃbodhanahrasve
rūpam | garbhagṛhasthā‘gṛhastho nālo’ iti pāṭhaḥ nālokayati cettadāha—saṃpravadantīti | atra pratipādamaṣṭau laghavaścatvāro gurava iti laghubāhulye saṃyogākṣarāṇāmudreke ca tālalayavadativyakta eva drutabhāvaḥ ||

praṇamyeti | atra yadyapi padacatuṣṭaye gurulaghūnāṃ samasaṃkhyatvameva, tathāpi saṃyogākṣarairantarāntarā paṭhitidīrghābhāvonmeṣādārohaprādhānye vilambitā | evaṃ vyutkrameṇa samānikāyāmapi vilambitaiva | yathā—‘mīnajālaghaṭitāni sūryaraśmibodhitāni | mattaṣaṭpadākulāni paśya bhīru paṅkajāni ||’ iti |

lg.l: vadanti sma balaṃ bāhvoḥ sitacchatrasmitāḥ śriyaḥ || 15 ||’

div.p: āsīditi | atra yadyapi guravo bahavastathāpi na drutirna vilambanaṃ paṭhiterityanubhavasākṣiko 'yamarthastadetadāha—nātilaghvakṣareti ||

avatu va iti | aruṇo garuḍāgrajaḥ śoṇaśca | nāyako netā hāramadhyamaṇiśca |
payodharā meghāḥ stanau ca | tadetasmin drutavilambitākhye vṛtte samākhyaiva rūpaṃ bodhayatīti ||

api turageti | utpannāvirbhavadbarhagatojjvalavicitrakomalamayūrastatkālamavyājapremaniryantraṇakaṇṭhagrahavilulitapriyākeśapāśavāsanāvikāsahetuḥ sarvasvāyamānaḥ kathaṃ bāṇalakṣyatāṃ sahata iti cvipratyayena vyajyata iti | atra pādacatuṣke 'pi prathamaṃ drutā paścānmadhyā ca bhāgaśaḥ pratyabhijñāyata ityāha—seyamiti ||
dundubhaya iti | atrāpi pratipādaṃ pūrvaṃ madhyā tato vilambitā ca khaṇḍaśaḥ pratibhāsata iti darśayati—seyamiti |

lg.l: ‘vihitāṃ priyayā manaḥ priyāmatha niścitya giraṃ garīyasīm |

div.p: utkalikāprāyeti | uccāvacabhāvena pratibhāsamānamutkalikā | yathā—‘salīlakarakamalatālikātaralayāvalīkam’ iti | tathaiva tadapi prakṛtodāharaṇamiti vyaktam | ‘pātāla—’ ityādau vasantatilakābhāga iva, ‘hara iva’ ityādāvāryābhāga iva pratibhātīti ||
padyagandhigadye vṛttagandhau madhyā, jātigandhau drutā yathā—
vṛttagandhau madhyā, jātigandhāviti | ‘tṛtīyādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskaṃ puṃvadgālavasya’ (7|1|74) iti puṃvadbhāvena numna bhavati ||

hanteti | āścaryastimitasya hantetyeva vāganubhāvastato 'bhimānonmeṣe puṇyavānasmīti anantaraṃ lokottaravibhāvavarṇanāttvaritasya yadahamityāgadyaparyavasāna evāviralamityādivṛttamāvirāsīditi | madhye vicchedakāraṇānupapattau gadyapadyābhyāmekavākyam ||
atra bālasuhṛdā makarandena saha vidyāmānvīkṣikīmadhīte sa eṣa mādhavo nāma iti ||

asāviti | dūtīkalpe kayācitpracchannaprārthanīyayā ‘āsaṃbhogamunnayet’ ityāmnātam | tadihotprekṣāmanoharagrāmyamālokanamuktam | tenaikasminvarṇanīyavastuni vṛttaprapañcenokte prakṛtasaṃgatimātraṃ gadyena kṛtavatīti yukteyamānupūrvī vākyaikavākyatā ceti ||

lg.l: vaidarbhādikṛtaḥ panthāḥ kāvye mārga iti smṛtaḥ |

div.p: vaidarbhādīti | guṇavatpadaracanā rītiḥ | guṇāḥ śrleṣādayaḥ kāvyāvyabhicāriṇo nava | teṣāmanyonyamīlanakṣamatayā pānakarasa iva, guḍamaricādīnāṃ khāḍava iva madhurāmlādīnāṃ yatsaṃmūrcchanarūpāvasthāntaragamanaṃ tatsaṃskārādeva hi lokaśāstrapadaracanātaḥ kāvyarūpā ca racanā vyāvartate | ata eva mṛgyate kavibhirāsaṃsāramiti mārgapadenocyate | vaidarbhādayo vidarbhādideśaprabhavāstaiḥ kṛtamukhahevākagocaratayā prakaṭito na tu tattaddeśaiḥ kāvyasya kiṃcidupakriyate || panthā iti | pratiṣṭhante hi mahākavipadavīlābhārthina iti | īdṛśameva rītilakṣaṇamānandavardhanādīnāmapi matam | etadupalakṣaṇatayā sūtraṃ vyākhyātam | kathaṃ punaruktamupamāde rītipadaṃ pravṛttamityata āha—rīṅ gatāviti | riyante paramparayā gacchantyanayeti karaṇasādhano 'yaṃ rītiśabdo mārgaparyāya ityarthaḥ ||

tatreti | asamāsā anullikhitasamāsā | niḥśeṣaśleṣādīti | śleṣādayo nava guṇāstairgumphitā | mithomilanena saṃmūrcchitairanupalabhyamānānyatabhamātrakairapi parasparavibhaktasvarūpabhāvena sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvādagocarairārabdhā | evaṃ vipañcīsvarasaubhāgyā | vipañcī vāgrūpā sarasvatī bimbapratibimbabhāvena dvividhā | pratibimbādhiṣṭhānatayā dārvādiyantramapi vipañcītyucyate | tadīyāḥ svarāstantrīkaṇṭhotthitāḥ sthānakramavaiparītyānumeyaśārīrāḥ pratibimbabhāvāḥ ṣaḍjādayasteṣu śrutasaṃmūrcchanarūpeṣvapi mithovibhaktāḥ śrutayaḥ śrotrarañjakasvarāvasthāmāpannāḥ samastagāndharvavitsākṣikāḥ prakāśante | ata eva vīṇaiva pradhānaṃ samastasya svarajātasya tatraiva śrutimaṇḍalonmeṣāditi ||
yadā tu pānakādinyāyena kaścidaṃśa udito bhavati tadā rītyantaramuttiṣṭhatītyāha—

lg.l: madhurāṃ sukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ || 30 ||

div.p: samasteti | ojaḥkāntivivarjitām ojaḥkāntyorviśeṣeṇa varjitām | nyagbhūtaujaḥkāntiguṇāmiti yāvat | yatastatpratidvandvinormādhuryasaukumāryayostatrodbhavastadetadāha—madhurāṃ sukumārāṃ ceti | ata evaujaḥprakāśakaḥ ṣaḍadhikeṣu padeṣu samāso na kriyate ||
samasteti | atyudbhaṭāni sollekhasamāsāni yasmādojaḥkāntyorudbhave nyagbhūtaguṇasaptakeyaṃ rītiḥ ||
antarāla iti | mādhuryasaukumāryayoḥ kiṃcidudbhavena nimīlanāṅgaprādhānyena vāntarālakalpanā tāṃ vyanakti—dvitrairiti | dve trīṇi vā trīṇi catvāri veti vārthe bahuvrīhiḥ ||

samasteti | yadyapyupakrāntarītyanirvāho 'trāpyasti tathāpi tilataṇḍulavadyāvadvibhaktarītisaṃvalanasya kavisaṃrambhagocarasyottararīteḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ | pūrvarīteriti | ekāṃ rītimupakramya yadanyayā saṃdarbhanirvahaṇamasāvanya eva prakāraḥ | na cānirvāho doṣaśchāyāvairūpyābhāvāt | rītikhaṇḍane 'pi hi saṃdarbhasaubhāgyasaṃpattiḥ śaktimevāviṣkaroti ||

lg.l: ‘manīṣitāḥ santi gṛheṣu devatāstapaḥ kva vatse kva ca tāvakaṃ vapuḥ |
padaṃ saheta bhramarasya pelavaṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ na punaḥ patatriṇaḥ || 25 ||’

div.p: manīṣitā iti | atra dīrghasamāsābhāve kathamoja iti kasyacitkudeśyamaparītimatprakaraṇa evetyapāstam | etena guṇanavakasya samakakṣatayā saṃbhedaḥ kṣaṇa iti | asamastapadetyanullekhasamāsapadetyarthaḥ | samagrā nava | guṇavatīti nityayoge matup ||

gātrāvighāteti | atrādyatṛtīyayoḥ ṣaḍ dvitīye ca pañca padāni samastāni | ojaḥkāntyabhāvāditi | īṣadarthe nañ | ata eva mādhuryasaukumāryayorunmeṣaḥ | śliṣṭā prāptā yathāsaṃkhyamojaḥkāntinimīlanalabdhaprādurbhāvā ślathā purāṇī ca cchāyā yayeti vigrahaḥ ||
yasyeti | avaskando dhrāṭakaḥ | samastodbhaṭabhūripadeti | udbhaṭatā praụdhiprakarṣaḥ ||

l.seg: ete ca ‘vartmataravaḥ’ kha ‘tīrataravaḥ’ kamārgataravaḥ prathayanti tāpa‘māliṅgito’ kha-

div.p: etānīti | ‘niḥsahatanorasamañjasāni’ ‘mārgataravaḥ’ iti dve dve pade, ‘ālambita-’ ityādau trīṇi padāni samastāni | mādhuryasaukumāryayormanāgunmeṣaḥ pāñcālībhāgaḥ | itareṣāṃ samakakṣatā vaidarbhībhāgaḥ | anayoḥ saṃbhedenāntarālakalpanā vyaktaiva ||

ayamiti | mudrābhañjana iti dvābhyāṃ samastābhyāmāvantī | udayagirītyādinā pañcakena pāñcālī | praụdhiprakarṣeṇa gauḍīyā | ayasudayatītyādyasamāsena vaidarbhī ca pratyabhijñāyata iti pūrvoktasamastarītisaṃbheda iti ||

karikavalaneti | atra pūrvārdhe yathoktābhāvantīmupakramya caramārdhe gauḍīyāparigrahādupakrāntarīteranirvāhaḥ khaṇḍanam, tathāpi ca na cchāyāvairūpyamiti kaviśaktivyañjakatvādalaṃkārabhāva iti | śāko vṛkṣaviśeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: yā vikāse 'tha vikṣepe saṃkoce vistare tathā |
cetaso vartayitrī syātsā vṛttiḥ sāpi ṣaḍvidhā || 34 ||

div.p: yā vikāsa iti | vṛttirvartanaṃ rasaviṣayo vyāpāraḥ kāvyasya rasapravaṇatvāt | sa ca vyāpāraḥ sattvādyudrekalakṣaṇo janmāntarānubhavabhāvitavāsanāsamutthaḥ paripūrṇībhaviṣyadrasāsvādasarvasvāyamānacittāvasthanidānabhūto 'rthagataḥ pañcame 'bhidhāsyate | śabdagataḥ punaratra saṃgataḥ saṃdarbhasya rasaprakāśakāraṇeṣu pradhānatvāt | yadāha—

vartate 'nayā cittamiti karaṇasādhano 'yaṃ vṛttiśabda iti vartayitrītyanena prayojakavyāpārapradhānena darśitam | tatra viṣayavaicitryādvikāsādyāścatasraścittāvasthāḥ | viṣayo hi dīptamasṛṇamadhyamabhedena trividhaḥ | vibhāvādyupadhānamahimnā tanmayībhavanayogyaṃ hi cetaḥ kadācidvikasati | sattvāvirbhāvo vikāsaḥ | nyagbhūtarajastamoguṇaṃ hi cetaḥ sattvodrekaprakāśānandamayasaṃvidviśrāntimāsādayati | tataḥ sattvabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ
śṛṅgārastadābhāso 'pi tāmeva bhūmikāmālambate | ata eva śuktirajatavadbhāvodaye 'pi doṣamahimnaiva kāvyamahimnā tavdyañjanāt | tatsamānabhūmikayā hāsyo rasaḥ prādurbhavatītyabhisaṃdhāyāha—‘śṛṅgārāddhi bhaveddhāsyam’ iti bharatamuniḥ | tena vikāsabhūmikau śṛṅgārahāsyau | vikāsātpracyutamaprāptaguṇāntaraprādurbhāvaṃ vikṣiptaṃ cittamucyate | tatrocitavibhāvādivaicitryādāvirbhavadrajoguṇasya cetaso vikṣepapracyutidaśāyāṃ raudrarasonmeṣaḥ | ata eva samānabhūmikayā ‘raudrācca karuṇo rasaḥ’ ityāha | yadā tu sattvatamonimīlanena kevalarajaḥpratiṣṭhaṃ cetastadā bahumukhavyāpāronmeṣādvistarākhyāmavasthāmāsādayati | tadbhūmiko vīrarasastadavasthāmevāsthāyādbhuto 'pi prathata iti ‘vīrāccaivādbhutotpattiḥ’ ityuktam | nyagbhūtarajoguṇasya prabuddhatamasaścetaso 'vasthāviśeṣaḥ sasaṃkocastamālambya bībhatsaḥ prādurāste tadekabhūmikaśca bhayānaka iti ‘bībhatsācca bhayānakaḥ’ ityāha ||

lg.l: kaiśikyārabhaṭī caiva ‘sātvatī bhāratī tathā’ kabhāratī sātvatī parā |

div.p: sukumāreti | cittadrutikāritvaṃ saukumāryaṃ sukumārāvarthasaṃdarbhau yasyāmiti vigrahaḥ | evaṃ praụdhārthasaṃdarbhetyapi | cittadīptividhāyitā praụdhiḥ | arthasaukumāryādinā viśeṣyamāṇasaṃdarbhaḥ sukumāratvādiḥ śabdālaṃkāratāṃ prayojayati | komalapraụdho madhyamaḥ | prakārāntaravirahācca madhyamabhāratyādayo na saṃbhavanti ||

lg.l: ‘śaśiruciṣu daleṣu nāgavallyā vicakiladāmani candane ca hṛdye |

div.p: seyamarthasya ca saṃdarbhasya ca saukumāryātkaiśikī nāma vṛttiḥ ||

śaśiruciṣviti | niyamitādiṣu mugdhāṅganācumbanarasotsukānāmatimanojñādhararāgasamarpakeṣu nāgalatādaleṣu, tato mānaparigrahe valitakādicumbanaviśeṣārthinīnāṃ kacagrahasaubhāgyasundare mallikādāmni, tataḥ sarvāṅgīṇāśleṣasaubhāgyārthakacandanarase 'nantaramīrṣyāroṣavāsanāniḥśeṣakeliyantraṇaratotkaṇṭhitānāṃ sīdhupātre, tataḥ sarvopakaraṇajīvitasarvasve priyatame samakakṣatayaiva dṛṣṭayaḥ peturiti | ‘kuvalayini’ iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ | ‘kuvalayita—’ iti pāṭhe viśeṣaṇāṅgaprādhānyavivakṣāyāṃ samāse guṇībhāvasyānucitatvāt | seyaṃ kaiśikī masṛṇe śṛṅgārādau viniyujyata iti ||

l.seg: ‘yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujaguru‘madāt pā’ iti pāṭhaḥmadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ
yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ

div.p: yo ya iti | ojaḥpradhānatayā prauḍhaḥ saṃdarbhaḥ | yasmādiyamārabhaṭī dīpte raudrādau viniyuktā, tena yuktaṃ śabdārthayoḥ prauḍhatvamiti ||

uttiṣṭhantyā iti | sarvāṅgīṇāśleṣasamutsuke priyatame bahirvyāvartanamantaranuvartanaṃ ca mugdhāṅganājātiriti nyāyena nīvībandhakeśapāśasaṃyamārthinyā nirbharakelikhedena bhujalatālasaṃ lasatyeva na tu vyāpārayitumapi śakyeti tatkāliko 'tipoṣaḥ | atra masṛṇe 'pi rase vṛttyaucityena saṃdarbhasya praụdhirucitaiva | dīrghasamāso hi śrṛṅgārādau niṣiddho na tu praụdhiḥ | rephahakārādivarṇaniveśāttu komalatā saṃdarbhasyeti | evamuttarodāharaṇeṣvapi viśeṣaḥ svayamūhanīya iti ||

lg.l: ekenāmṛtavadvidārya karajaiḥ pītānyasṛñji dviṣāmanyenāpi hatāhitāsrasarasi snātaṃ krudhaḥ śāntaye || 34 ||’

div.p: seyaṃ praụdhārthā nātiprauḍhasaṃdarbhā sāttvatī nāma vṛttiḥ ||
seyaṃ sukumāre 'rthe prauḍhasaṃdarbhā madhyamakaiśikī nāma vṛttiḥ ||
seyaṃ praụdhe 'rthe sukumārasaṃdarbhā madhyamārabhaṭī nāma vṛttiḥ ||

anyoktīnāmiti| loke bimbapratibimbayoḥ pratibimbaṃ camatkāritayā prasiddham | ata eva ‘śravyātprekṣyaṃ jyāyaḥ’ ityāha | śabdālaṃkārakāṇḍe vākyānukaraṇameva pratibimbavācinā chāyāpadena guṇavṛttenākhyāyate | tadetadanukaraṇamanukāryabhedādeva ṣọdhā vyavatiṣṭata ityāha—cheketi | chekādīnāṃ lokaviśeṣāṇāmeva śobhākāritvena pṛthagupādāne 'rthāttaditarānekavicitratattadanukāryaparo lokaśabdaḥ | chekā vidagdhāḥ | ‘poṭā strīpuṃsalakṣaṇā' | sahajakeliriti prasiddhā poṭā | bhujiṣyā dāsītyanye | atra kecidanyacchāyāyonijamapi kāvyaṃ chāyālaṃkāravyavahārabhūmimāhuḥ ||
prakṛtipariṇāmaḥ, parapurapraveśaḥ, khaṇḍasaṃghātyam, cūlikā, parimala iti pañca yonijakāvyabhedāḥ | tatra kiṃcidvikṛtārthaḥ prakṛtipariṇāmaḥ | yathā—

lg.l: ṇahayā avasāhāo ṇia avvāṇa vayaḍi gaāo disāo ||’
iharaï arayā aliaṃ vittharadi disāhiṃ kaṭṭhiaṃ vaṇahaalam ||’

div.p: atrākāśadiśāṃ vistārabhaṇanaṃ manāgvikṛtamupalakṣyata iti prakṛtipariṇāmanāmāyaṃ yonijakāvyabhedaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘devādhipo vā bhujagādhipo vā dharādhipo vā yadi haihayaḥ syām |
saṃdarśanaṃ te guṇakīrtanaṃ te sevāñjaliṃ te tadahaṃ vidadhyām ||’

div.p: atra bhāṣāmātraṃ bhinnamiti parapurapraveśanāmāyaṃ yonijakāvyabhedaḥ || vikīrṇamasamāhāraḥ khaṇḍasaṃghātyam | yathā—
atra kāvyacatuṣkāducchidya pādacatuṣṭayaṃ grathitamiti khaṇḍasaṃghātyanāmāyaṃ yonijakāvyabhedaḥ ||
atra sthāne sthāne 'dhikāvāpasya pratyabhijñānāccūlikānāmāyaṃ yonijakāvyabhedaḥ || bandhacchāyāmātrasaṃvādī parimalaḥ | yathā—

lg.l: ‘anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccinmanaso ruciste |

div.p:
śāpānta iti | locane mīlayitvetyanena lokoktyanukāreṇa nayananimīlanavadāśubhāvitā samāgamasamayasya pratipādyate | tathā ca—sukumāratarakāntājī
vitādhyavasāyābhiprāyaḥ pravāsavipralambhāviṣṭacetasaḥ prakāśito bhavatīti | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | varṣākāle caturo māsānityapi lokoktireva ||
seyaṃ tasmai nṛpaśave nama iti vidagdhokteranukṛtiśchekokticchāyā ||
yo hīti | kāntāmukhameva jīvitasarvasvamabhimanyamānastatrālaṃpratyayaśālinaḥ paśūniva prati śṛṅgārī vidagdhaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘kiṃ sa svargataruḥ ko 'pi yasya puṣpaṃ niśākaraḥ |
te vṛkṣāḥ kīdṛśā mātaryeṣāṃ muktāphalaṃ phalam || 39 ||’

div.p: kiṃ sa iti | nūnaṃ trijagadvartisakalārthisārthakīkaraṇavikhyātakīrteḥ pārijātapramukhasya kasyacidekaḥ stabakaḥ sudhābhirāhlādayannayamavaloke dṛśyata ityādi ||

lg.l: ‘dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ sutanu kiṃ kurute kimasmadvārtāṃ sa pṛcchati śrṛṇoti nivedyamānām |
‘āsāṃ’ khaāstāṃ kimasya kathayā kathayāśu tāvadatrāgamiṣyati na vā khalu so 'bhimānī || 40 ||’

div.p: dṛṣṭa iti | kathamityādinā tadekatānatāmāviṣkṛtya sahasaivāstāmityādinā saṃprahāṇam, kathaya tāvadityādinā ca punarādānamasamañjasam ||

l.seg: ‘pi pi priya sa sa svayaṃ mu mu mukhāsavaṃ dehi me
ta ta tyaja du du drutaṃ bha bha bha bhājanaṃ kāñcanam |

div.p: sābhiprāyeti | yadyapi saṃpūrṇameva kāvyaṃ vaktrabhiprāyapraticchandakabhūtam, uktaṃ ca—‘vakrabhiprāyaṃ sūcayeyuḥ’ iti, tathāpi nāsminnitarasādhāraṇatayā vākyārthagocaramabhiprāyamāvedayatyeva kāvyasanāthīkaraṇakṣamavakrabhiprāyaviśeṣapratirūpaka ekadeśaniveśo dṛśyate | ata evāṅgulīyādimudreva mudretyucyate | niruktimāha—mutpradāyitvāditi | mudyupapade rāterdānakarmaṇaḥ ke rūpam | mudraiva padādiprakāśyadhvanivyavahārabhūmiranyeṣām ||
sāsminniti | padaṃ prātipadikaṃ kṛttaddhitasamāsarūpam | vibhaktivacanayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāve 'pi pṛthakpṛthagabhiprāyavyañjakatayā nirdeśaḥ | āstāmityādivacanasaṃkocaḥ saṃvṛtiḥ ||
atra nirmālyaṃ, dāsaḥ, sanābhi, añcalaḥ, ucchiṣṭamiti padānāṃ gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayeṇa mutpradāyināṃ sābhiprāyaniveśādiyaṃ padamudrā ||

lg.l: ‘tālā jāanti guṇā jālā te sahiṁaehiṁ dheyyanti |
ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyapi |’
tigmaṃ dhāma ciraṃ cakāsti divi yattatrāsti divyaḥ pumānyaṃ vijñātavatāṃ truṭanti nikhilā bhūyo bhavagranthayaḥ || 44 ||’

div.p: atra ‘tatrāsti divyaḥ pumān’ ityādervākyāntarasya pūrvavākyopakāritvena mutpradāyakasyābhiprāyapūrvaniveśādiyaṃ vākyamudrā ||
yatsvaccha iti | ādityakalā eva prati phalitāścandravyapadeśaṃ labhanta ityāgamaḥ |

pūrvavākyopakāritveneti | deve pīyūṣākṛti tattvāntaraṃ tigmaṃ dhāma cakāstīti ca yadagādhatayā tarkitamiti kilaśabdakaṭākṣitamabhidhānam | tatra kiṃ saṃbandhamityākāṅkṣāvipūrakaṃ tatrāstītyādi vākyam | tathā hi—‘ya eṣa ādityapathaṃ vyāpya puruṣo dīpyate’ ityādyupaniṣadarthaniveśanamabhiprāyapūrvakamābhāsate | etenānye 'pi vākyaprakāśyaprakārāḥ parigṛhītā boddhavyāḥ | pūrvaṃ vākye 'ntarbhāvitadvitvamavaseyamiti ||

lg.l: ‘śriyaḥ pradugdhe vipado ruṇaddhi yaśāṃsi sūte malinaṃ pramārṣṭi |
saṃskāraśaucena paraṃ punīte śuddhā hi buddhiḥ kila kāmadhenuḥ || 45 ||’

div.p: atra pradugdhe, ruṇaddhi, sūte, pramārṣṭi, punīte, iti tiṅvibhaktīnāṃ ‘duhipacyorbahulaṃ sakarmakayorupasaṃkhyānam’ (3|1|87 vā॰), 'rudhādibhyaḥ śnam’ (3|1|78) ityādibhirviśeṣa‘lakṣaṇavatīnāṃ yogaiḥ’ kalakṣaṇayogaiḥ parasmaipadātmanepadaparyāyeṇa niveśo dṛśyate | śriyaḥ, vipadaḥ, yaśāṃsi, malinaṃ saṃskāraśaucena, iti ca subvibhaktīnām ‘aci śnudhātubhruvāṃ yvoriyaṅuvaṅau’ (6|4|77) ityādiviśeṣa‘lakṣaṇavatīnāṃ yogaiḥ’ kalakṣaṇavatīnāmavikṛtavikṛtānāṃ maṅgalāmaṅgalārtha‘padaparatvena’ iti ṭīkāsaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥparatvena ‘maṅgalārthānām’ kamaṅgalādyarthānāmabhiprāyataḥ prayogo lakṣyate | teneyaṃ vibhaktimudrā bhavati ||

śriya iti | buddhirūpā kāmadhenuḥ śriyaḥ prathayatītyukte na tathā prakarṣaḥ, yathokte tu viśiṣṭaḥ kaverabhiprāya unnīyate | tathā hi—yathodumbaraḥ sa lohitaṃ phalaṃ pacyata iti karmakartari phalodumbarayoraikātmyabhavasīyate tathehāpi śrīrūpamātmānaṃ buddhiḥ prakāśayatīti | ata eva hi ‘duhipacyorbahulaṃ sakarmakayoḥ’ (vā 3|1|87) iti bāhyakarmaviśiṣṭasyaiva kartuḥ karmavadbhāvaḥ śiṣyate | ‘na duhasnunamāṃ yakciṇau’ (3|1|89) iti yagabhāvo 'pi viśeṣābhiprāyaniyata eva ruṇaddhītyāgamarūpaḥ | sūte iti luptaḥ | pramāṣṭīṃti bṛddhiyojakaḥ | punīte iti svarūpeṇa vikṛtaśca
vikaraṇaḥ | ātmanepadaparasmaipadayorekāntarito niveśaḥ | śriya iti prakṛtibhāge iyaṅādeśo vikāro vibhaktāvapi vikāraḥ | vipada iti prakṛtiravikṛtā | vibhaktistu rutvena vikṛtā | yaśāṃsīti dve api vikṛte | malinamiti vaikalpikaparasavarṇavidhau dvayamavikṛtam | saṃskāraśauceneti prakṛtiravikṛtā | pratyayastvinādeśena vikṛtaḥ | tathā śriya iti māṅgalyam, vipada iti viparītamiti krameṇa śuddhā buddhiḥ kāmadhenuriti | maṅgalaparamparāniveśanenopasaṃhāraścitrāṃśukojjvala iva pratibhāsamāno nu bimbamiva kāmapi kāntimabhivyañjayattūpalakṣyate | maṅgalāmaṅgalārthapadaparatveneti | maṅgalāmaṅgalebhyaḥ padebhyaḥ paravartitvenetyarthaḥ ||

l.seg: yeṣāṃ kuleṣu savitā ca gururvayaṃ ca || 46 ||’

div.p: atra vayamityātmani bahuvacanena savitā ceti savitaryekavacanena saviturapyahaṃ bahumata ityabhiprāyo vakturitīyaṃ vacanamudrā ||
viśvaṃbhareti | ahaṃkāraprarohasya pūrvaṃ guṇaprayojakatvamuktam | iha tu kaverabhiprāyaviśeṣasyālaṃkāraghaṭakateti vibhāgaḥ ||
atra ‘āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavacca’ (3|3|132) iti bhūtavadbhāvasya hayagrīvaprabhāvātiśayaśaṃsinaḥ samuccayadvāreṇa niveśādiyaṃ samuccayamudrā ||

atrāśaṃsāyāmiti | gatamiti niṣṭhāpratyayena bhūtatādyotanādāśaṃsāpratītāvapi kathaṃ prakṛtapoṣa ityata uktam—samuccayadvāreṇeti | tena hi tulyakakṣatāpratītau tvaṃ cedaṅgīkṛtaroṣastadā siddhameva samīhitamiti vakturadhyavasāyaviśeṣaprartītau samuccaya eva mudrāpadavīmārohatīti | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

lg.l: labdhaṃ yenādyayogena tena kiṃ kīrtitena vaḥ || 48 ||’

div.p: atra ‘kathāpi khalu pāpānāmalamaśreyase yataḥ’, tataḥ ‘kiṃ tena vaḥ kīrtitena’ iti sābhiprāyasaṃvṛtikaraṇādiyaṃ saṃvṛtimudrā ||

lg.l: vidhidvāreṇa vā yatra niṣedhenātha vā punaḥ |

div.p: vidhīti | uktirabhidhā | sā dvayī bhāvābhāvaviṣayatvāt | tarhi gorapatyamayaṃ gaurityataḥ ko bheda ityāśaṅkya vidhidvāreṇa vetyādi | bhāvajñānaṃ vidhirabhāvajñānaṃ niṣedhaḥ | loke gṛhītavyutpattibalena bhāvābhāvānyatarasaṃvitsaraṇimāruhya kāvyaikagocare rasādyātmani paryavasyantī bhavatyuktiralaṃkāra iti bhāvaḥ ||
so 'yaṃ bhāvādiprapañcena ṣọdhā vidhiḥ prathata ityāha—

vidheriti | upādhirviśeṣaṇam | vidhyadhikārau śuddhabhāvabhedau | niṣedhaniyamau śuddhapratiṣedhabhedau | vikalpaparisaṃkhye saṃkīrṇabhedāviti | tatrāprāptaprāpaṇo vidhiḥ | prasaktapratiṣedho niṣedhaḥ | kriyāphalasaṃbandho 'dhikāraḥ | tulyakakṣayorekabādhenānyasaṃbandho vikalpaḥ | vyāvṛttiphalako vidhirniyamaḥ | śeṣavidhiniṣedhanāntarīyakau viśeṣaniṣedhavidhī parisaṃkhyā ||
aprāptau prāpaṇavacanamiti | apravṛttapravartanātmako hi vidhiḥ kathamitarāpekṣatve saṃgacchate | ata evocyate—‘vidhiratyantamaprāptau’ iti ||

vidhiniṣedhajñānāditi | vihitaniṣiddhakriyājñānena tatphalasaṃbandhayogyatvamadhikāraḥ | śuśrūṣasveti, bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhava dakṣiṇeti dve vihite | mā sma pratīpaṃ gama iti, bhogeṣvanutsekinīti dve niṣiddhe | vidhiniṣedhayogyatā vidhiniṣedhaphalasaṃbandhayogyatvam | gṛhiṇīpadaprāptirvihitakriyāphalam | kulādhībhavanaṃ tu niṣiddhakriyāphalamiti ||

lg.l: ‘eko netā kṣatriyo vā dvijo vā ekā vidyādhyātmikī vā trayī vā |
ekā bhāryā vaṃśajā vā priyā vā ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā || 50 ||’

div.p: so 'yamiti | jātyādaya eva padārthāste ca vikalpante | kuto jātyādinā tavdyavasthā | vāśabdaḥ pākṣikabhāvamāheti bhāvābhāvasaṃkaraḥ ||

apārtha eveti | viśeṣaṇasaṃgata evakāraḥ kevalaviśeṣaṇayogasyāsaṃbhave vyutpattivaśena tadabhāvaṃ vyavacchindanyogavyāvṛttāvavatiṣṭhate | pārtha eveti viśeṣyasaṃgata evaśabdastadanyasya dhanurdharatārūpaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vyāvartayannanyayogavyavacchedadyotako bhavati | kevalamiti abhinandanasya nāyogaṃ navānyayogaṃ vyavacchinatti, kiṃ tu tatsaṃbandhaṃ bodhayannātyantikamayogamatyantāyogavyavacchedo 'bhidhīyate ||

pañca pañceti | pañcanakheṣu pañca bhakṣyā nānye | kucayorasyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ na vacanādāviti viśeṣavidhī śeṣaniṣedhamanujānītaḥ | vāmena na paśyati dakṣiṇena tu paśyatyeva | kimasatkimaśobhanam ? yadyasmai na rocate itarattu sadeveti viśeṣaniṣedhau śeṣavidhyabhyanujñāviṣayāviti ||

ayujyamānasyeti | pūrvaṃ padaikavākyatā tato vākyaikavākyatvamanantaraṃ prakaraṇaikavākyatvamiti prabandhanirvahaṇaṃ yāvatkavivyāpāraḥ | tatra ‘gāmabhyāja śuklāṃ daṇḍena’ ityādīnāṃ loke gṛhītavyutpattīnāmeva yadyapi kāvyānupraveśastathāpi bhaṅgībhaṇitisanāthānyeva kāvyapaddhatimadhyāsata ityaprahatānāmupādeyatve yatrāpātataḥ parasparamanvayo na pratibhāsate tatrāvaśyaṃ kavinā svābhiprāyapraticchandakabhūtaviśeṣaniveśanena vivakṣitavākyārthapratītyaskhalanaṃ vidheyam, ata eva vaicitryādalaṃkāratā | tadidamuktam —ayujyamānasyeti | āpātata iti śeṣaḥ | yojanā anvayaupayikarañjakaviśeṣaniveśanaṃ tasya viṣayaḥ | śabdāthā śabdaḥ padaṃ vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prabandhaḥ | arthaḥ padārtho vākyārthaśca ||

lg.l: padaṃ caiva padārthaśca vākyaṃ vākyārtha eva ca |

div.p: yogeti | yogetyādau dvandvaparavartī paramparāśabdaḥ pratyekamanvīyate | yogo yogarụ̄dhiḥ | kāraṇaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | nirụ̄dhāḥ pramitāḥ | padasiddhaye padasamudāyātmakavākyaikadeśatāsiddhaye ||
yadyapi padānāmarthadvāraka eva saṃbandhaḥ, tathāpi tadaupayikaviśeṣaḥ kvacitpadeṣveva sākṣādavasīyate kvacitpadārtheṣvityabhipretyāha—

lg.l: yojanā yeha tāṃ yuktiṃ padārthaviṣayāṃ viduḥ || 47 ||

div.p: garbha iti | garbhastasyaikadeśabhūtastathābhūto nigarbhaḥ | ukterupasaṃhāravacanaṃ saṃvṛttiḥ | tulyapradhānabhāvānāṃ yugapadekārthasaṃbandhaḥ samuccayaḥ | ādipadādanvācayādayaḥ ||
yattadāderiti | yattadoruddeśyavidheyagāminorādigrahaṇādidametadāsāṃ kriyāṇāmāvṛttirabhyāsaḥ | vijātīyānāmekadaikatra saṃbandhaḥ samuccayaḥ | samabhihāro bhṛśatvaṃ prakarṣa iti yāvat ||

atra jambhajiddvipa iti yogarụ̄dhiparamparā, hayāṅganāsyahutabhugiti paryāyaparamparā, prātarjātamadonmiṣatkamalinīkiñjalkakalkodbhaṭamiti hetuparamparā, nabhaḥkaṭāhakuharakroḍamityaṅgāṅgigabhāvaparamparā ca parisphurantī dṛśyate ||

prācyāmiti | jambhajitpadaṃ kṛdantatvādyaugikam | tathā jambhajid dvipa ityapi samāsatvāt | tadetadubhayaṃ yogenātiprayujyamānaṃ nirụ̄dhidvayena vivakṣitairāvatarūpe vastuni niyamyate | hayāṅganeti vaḍavāparyāyaḥ | āsyamiti mukhaparyāyaḥ | hutabhugityanalaparyāyaḥ | seyaṃ padaparamparāparyāyatāpratisaṃdhānenābhimatavaḍavāmukhānalapratītiṃ karoti | madasya kiñjalkonmeṣe tasya kalke tasyāpyudbhaṭatāyāṃ hetubhāva iti kāryakāraṇaparamparā | nabhaḥkaṭāho 'ṅgī | tasyāṅgamekadeśaḥ kuharaṃ tasyāpi kroḍa ityaṅgāṅgigaparamparā ca yathābhimatapadaikavākyatānidānamiti tadetad vyācaṣṭe—atreti | parisphurantī kaviśaktivyañjakatayā sahṛdayahṛdayeṣu pratiphalati ||

l.seg: nābhiṣṭauti hasanna nindati tadā śliṣṭo 'mbayā pātu vaḥ || 54 ||’

div.p: atra strīpuṃsākṛtīti viruddhajātiyojanā, nābhiṣṭauti na nindatīti viruddhakriyāyojanā, ramyogramiti viruddhaguṇayojanā, mukhe vapurīkṣāmahe iti viruddhadravyayojanā ca lakṣyate ||

tannāgeti | nāgendrakaravadūruḥ pārvatībhāge, dorbāhuśca devabhāge, karikumbhavatpīnaḥ stano devībhāge, aṃsaḥ skandhaśca devabhāge evaṃvidhatvatpiturīśvarasya vapustvanmukhe | ekaviṣāṇatayā karikariṇīsamāhārātmani vīkṣāmaha iti vārāhyāḥ parihāsoktiḥ | vārāhī varāhaprakṛtibhūto mātṛviśeṣaḥ | ibhavadano vināyakaḥ | strītvapuṃstvayoḥ parasparaparihāreṇopalambhādviruddhayorapi tvatpiturityanena stutinindayoḥ pratiṣedhena ramyatābhīṣaṇatayorbhāgavyavasthayā mukhavapuṣoḥ sādṛśyenābhito 'bhiprāyapratibimbitena yojanā vihiteti tatpratipādakānāṃ padānāmekavākyatāsiddhiḥ | tadidamāha—atreti ||

l.seg: siddhā sā ca vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo

div.p: atra vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyateti vākyagarbhaḥ | tatraiva paśyateti vākyāntare bhāvāviṣkāravācā nigarbhaḥ | kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai nama iti vākyasaṃvṛttiḥ | yasmādāvirabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ gatamiti vākyasamuccayaḥ | seyameteṣāṃ yojanādvākyaviṣayā yuktirbhavati ||

diṅmāteti | jātikriyetyādinā krameṇa virodhaprasiddherguṇavirodhamullaṅghya kriyāvirodho vyākhyātaḥ | āghāṭaḥ sīmā | garbho vivṛtapūrvastatraivāścaryarasāviṣṭabdhasya vaktuḥ paśyateti vākyāntaraṃ nigarbhaḥ | garbhavākyena samarpyamāṇaprakṛtarasānvayini rase prakarṣādhāyako nigụ̄dho garbho nigarbha ityucyate | tadidaṃ bhāvāviṣkāravācītyuktam | viprāya pratipādyate saṃpannā tairabhujyata ityādi vaktavye kimaparamityasya saṃvṛttitvena yojanā | evaṃ hi kiyadasya mahānubhāvasya tādṛśācaritaṃ prāpyate tadiha maunamevocitamiti bhūyānprakarṣo 'vasīyate | ‘yasmādāvirabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ gatam’ iti vākyadvayasya pūrvavākyagatatarkārthasamuccayavācinā cakāreṇa yojanā vyaktaiva | evamādaya iti | tadyathā—vīthyaṅgāni trayodaśaprastāvanāpariceyāni | saṃdhyaṅgāni vilāsādyāni catuḥṣaṣṭisaṃdhayaśca rūpakāvayavabhūtā mukhapratimukha-
garbhabimarśanirvahaṇākhyāḥ pañca | prakṛtarasāvasthārūpāṇi ca pañcaiva | bījabindupatākāprakarīkāryāṇi tattatprakaraṇaprabandharūpavākyaikadeśayojanānyavagantavyāni ||

l.seg: ‘tiṣṭha dvāri bhavāṅgaṇe vraja bahiḥ sadmeti vartmekṣate
dūtiṃ saṃdiśa saṃdiśeti bahuśaḥ saṃdiśya sāste tathā
talpe kalpamayīva nirghṛṇa yathā nāntaṃ niśā gacchati || 56 ||’

div.p: atra prathamapāde kriyāsamuccayaḥ, dvitīye kriyābhyāsaḥ, tṛtīye dūtīṃ saṃdiśa saṃdiśeti yāvatkriyāsamabhihāraḥ | śeṣe tu tathā sāste yathā niśāntaṃ na gacchatīti yattadorupādānaṃ vākyārthayukterhetuḥ pratīyate | seyamuktalakṣaṇā vākyārthayuktirbhavati ||

tiṣṭheti | upasthitisamayasīmāmatikrāmati priyatame tatkāladviguṇitotkaṇṭhātaralitāntaḥkaraṇaḥ kadācitprāgiva garbhagṛhadvāri tiṣṭhati | tatastatrānavalokamānā gṛhāṅgaṇe bhavati | tadanantaraṃ veśmano bahirvrajati | so 'yaṃ vijātīyakriyārthanānādhātugocaraḥ sarvakāleṣu ‘samuccaye 'nyatarasyām’ (3|4|3) iti loṭo hiranuśiṣyate | ata eva darśanāvacchedabhūtadvārāvasthānādisāmānyavacanaḥ ‘samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya’ (3|4|5) ityanuśāsanānniyamitaprayuktirīkṣatiranuprayujyate | nāyakasya sarvathā hṛdaya
vaiśasaṃ sarvathaivāśraddadhānā dūradūrataradūratamarathyābhāgāvalokanārthinī śālāgṛhamārohati, tatastasmāduccaistamaṅgagam aṭṭālakam, anantaraṃ tasmāduccatarāṃ valabhīmuparitanakuṭīmiti | ata evāñcanakriyaivātrāvṛtteti ‘kriyāsamabhihāre loṭra loṭo hisvau vā ca tadhvamoḥ’ (3|4|2) ityanuśiṣyate | ata eva ca ‘yathāvidhyanuprayogaḥ pūrvasmin’ (3|4|4|) iti tasyaiva dhātoranuprayogo 'pi | evamapyanāgacchati nāyake dūtīvyāpāraḥ śaraṇaṃ yatkuṇṭhanāyāṃ svayaṃ vā tatra gamanamityupadiśyate tena tattadabhiprāyasaṃvardhakasaṃdeśaprakarṣaḥ so 'yamābhīkṣṇyadviruktyā vyajyate | ata eva loṭaḥ samabhivyāhāro viṣayo na tu ghañādivadabhidheya iti pūrvācāryāḥ | itiśabdādadhikaṃ caturthavākyānupraviṣṭamiti yāvacchabdenāvacchinatti saṃdiśa saṃdiśeti yāvaditi dik ||

uktīti | uktirabhidhānamuccāraṇakriyā lakṣaṇakriyā sā sarvavākyasādhāraṇī kathamalaṃkāra ityāśaṅkya prakārapadam | prakāro bhaṅgīrūpatā | laukikaśāstrīyavacanātigāmī viśeṣaḥ | sa eva kaiścidavyāptimananusaṃdadhānairalaṃkārasāmānye uktaḥ | uktirūpatvāviśeṣe kathamayameva saṃgacchatāmityato vibhāgapradarśanavyājena viṣayaviśeṣādeva tadrūpatāmupapādayati—saṃbhava ityādi | tatra bahirasaṃbhāvyamānasyāpi pratibhānirbhitacitraturagavatpratītiḥ saṃbhavastāmarpayantī saṃbhāvanātmikā bhaṇitiḥ | saiva hi ‘kiṃtvasti kācidaparāpi padānupūrvī yasyāṃ na kiṃcidapi kiṃcidivāvabhāti’ iti nyāyena tattadarthanirmāṇapravīṇā ‘yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathaiva parivartate’ iti vyavahārakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti tathāvidha eva viṣaye śāstraprasiddhaprakāravaiparītyena bādhavarṇanamasaṃbhāvanā | taducyate—

lg.l: vāāsu ṭhiaṃ dīsaï āmoa ghaṇaṃ va tucchaṃ va ||’

div.p:
ataeveyaṃ niṣedharūpā tajjātīyavyāvṛtto dharmo viśeṣastaṃ kvacidvidadhānā kaverabhiprāyaviśeṣamarpayantī ‘niṣedhaprasaṅge viśeṣabhaṇitirvidhirūpā bhavati’ iti tāmavalambamānā camatkārakāriṇī viśeṣe paryavasyantī varṇanā pallavaprasaṅge saṃkocamavagāhamānā vidhau niṣedharūpā paryavasyati | atarkitopanataṃ vismayajanakamāścaryaṃ tasya niṣedhe vidhātavye yatkiṃcidvidhānaṃ tadāścaryarūpatāmantareṇa kāvyakakṣāmārọdhuṃ na kṣamata iti nūnamanayā vismayārpaṇameva sarvasvabhūtamavalambanīyamiti niṣedhavidhi-
prasaṅge niṣedharūpā bhaṇitirbahirasaṃbhāvinaḥ kvacidasato viśeṣasyotprekṣākalpanā | tāmāśrayantī vidhānaniṣedhamātreṇa caritārthā kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ vidadhātīti vidhiniṣedhaprasaṅge sāmānyataḥ pratiṣedhati viśeṣataśca vidhatta iti niṣedhavidhirūpā kalpanā bhaṇitiḥ ||

lg.l: utsekyā kalaśībhirañjalipuṭaiḥ peyā mṛṇālāṅkurairmātavyā ca śaśinyamugdhavibhave sā vartate candrikā || 59 ||’

div.p: sadya iti | ketakodaradalānāṃ drāvaṇam, tataḥ srotorūpatā, tatastenopamitāyā bahalatarabahirbhāgasya kalaśībhirutsecanam, anantaraṃ kiṃcidalpībhūtamadhyabhāgasya karatalāñjalipuṭairmānam, tataḥ śeṣībhavataḥ sārabhāgasya mṛṇālāṅkuraiḥ pānamiti bahirasaṃbhāvina eva śriyaṃ bibhratīti nidarśanayā yogyapadenautsekyetyādibhiścamatkāriṇī saṃbhāvanā jāyate ||

lg.l: ‘kva peyaṃ jyotsnāmbho vadanabisavallīsaraṇibhirmṛṇālītantubhyaḥ sicayaracanā kutra bhavati |

l.seg: kva vā pārīmeyo bata bakuladāmnāṃ parimalaḥ

div.p: kva peyamiti | svapnasya sākṣātkalpane sāmarthyamasaṃbhāvitaṃ tadevamevocyamānaṃ tathā śobhāmunmīlayatīti kva peyamityādi prativastunā nirdeśavyaṅgyāraktisuṣamāvistāraṃ kurvāṇā bhavatyasaṃbhavabhaṇitiḥ | pārī bhāṇḍabhedaḥ ||
atra revatīdaśanocchiṣṭayorapi halidṛśoryatpūtatvaṃ, madakṣībasyāpi halino yatpāvanatvamasau viśeṣa itīyaṃ viśeṣabhaṇitirniṣedhe vidhirūpā ||'

revatīti | daśanocchiṣṭaṃ cumbitam | ucchiṣṭakṣībayorna kvacitpūtatvaṃ pāvanatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭacaramiti halinetrapuṭahalinorvidhīyamānaṃ devatācaritasya lokottaratāṃ gamayatīti niṣedhaprasaṅge vidhirūpeyaṃ bhaṇitiḥ ||

ābharaṇasyeti | atra candramukhī dugdhadhavalanayanā bimboṣṭī karikumbhastanītyādikavisamayaprasiddhavarṇanāprapañcaprasaṅge yathoktarūpeṇa tasya saṃkoco niṣedhastatpratiṣṭhābhaṇitiralaṃkaraṇamevānayā kriyata iti kāntiviśeṣaṃ vyañjayantī vidhau prasakte niṣedharūpā bhavati ||

l.seg: ko nāmāsya vidhiḥ praśāntiṣu bhavedbāḍhaṃ drạdhīyānayaṃ

div.p:
jyotirbhya iti | priyo hi nāpriyamācaratītyutsargasiddhāpriyānācaraṇaṃ daiva-
gatyā śaṭhe saṃbhāvyamānamāścaryamunmudrayatsāmānyaparamparayā premāviṣṭamantaḥkaraṇamāvedayati | yadi jyotirādestamaḥprabhṛtīnāmudgamaḥ syādapi priyādapriyamiti sarvathaiva niṣedhe vidhātavye pratyakṣaparikalpitasyānyathākartumaśakyatvātprameyavirodhamasahamānā vidhatte ca niṣedhati ceti niṣedhavidhiprasaṅge vidhiniṣedharūpā bhaṇitirbhavati ||

dṛśyamiti | yadyapi dvābhyāmekenālpīyasā ca netrābhyāṃ manasā sukṛtena ca vayaso yauvanasya dṛśyatvavibhāvanīyatvabhogyatvāni pratītimukhamavatīrṇāni, tathāpijīvitasarvasvabhūtāyāmitarakāminīsādhāraṇyāmitarasādhāraṇyamasahamāno dṛgādisāmānye sahasratvādikaṃ kalpayansādhāraṇadharmaniṣedhasaraṇimāruhya viśeṣaṃ vidhatte | seyaṃ bhaṇitirvidhiniṣedhaprasaṅge niṣedhaghaṭakadvārā vidhirūpā bhavatītyāstāṃ vistaraḥ ||

vākya iti | ekārthapratipādanāvacchinnaḥ śabdasamudāyo vākyam, tasminviṣayabhūte ānupūrvyeṇa granthanaṃ racanā, sā kathamatiprasaktāpyalaṃkāra ityata āha—samyagiti | prakṛtaparipoṣādhānalakṣaṇamaucityamāpannetyarthaḥ | vākyatvamarthaśabdābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyābhyāṃ vyavatiṣṭhate | tena dvayoreva gumphanā samāpyata ityāśayena śavdārthayorityuktam | tatra śabdo dvividhaḥ—vācyaḥ, upādhiśca | pratipādakaśabdo dvirūpaḥ padavākyabhedāt | padaṃ dvidhā—paryāyabhūtarūpam, atathārūpaṃ ca | tadetadvivakṣāvaicitryamaṅgīkṛtya vibhajate—śabda iti | apratipādakaḥ śabdaḥ śabdapadenoktaḥ | artho vācyaḥ | kramagrahaṇamupādhyupalakṣaṇam ||

rāmeti | rājyābhiṣekotsavajātaharṣāyāḥ karātpracyutasya sopānaparamparāsu skhalataḥ kāñcanakalaśasya bhūbhāgaprāptiryāvatkrameṇoccarantī śabdamālānukṛteti prakṛtārthānuguṇyam | evaṃ hi karacyutamapi na saṃbhāvayatīti ko 'pi madaprakarṣo vyajyate ||

l.seg: yatrāmuṣya sudhībhavanti kiraṇā rāśeḥ sa yāsāmabhūt |
yastatpittamuṣaḥ sa yasya haviṣe yastasya jīvātave
vọdhā yadguṇameṣa manmatharipostāḥ pāntu vo mūrtayaḥ || 66 ||’

div.p: dikkāleti | dikkālātmatulyaṃ sarvamūrtaṃ saṃyogāśrayatālakṣaṇaṃ vibhutkmākāśasyaiva tasminnarthākṣipte yacchabdo 'yamuddeśyagāmī niviśate tamupajīvya tacchabdena pratinirdeśo yuktaḥ | ākāśe viśeṣeṇa candratārāditejobhibhavasāmarthyalakṣaṇena dyotate bhagavānāditya iti yacchabdena tamuddiśyottaravākye 'dasā pratinirdiṣṭavān | karṇagatyā pratiphalitāḥ sūryakiraṇāḥ salilamayeṣṭāśinyeva sudhāvyapadeśaṃ labhante, tatraiva yacchabdo niviṣṭastadupanītamarthamuttarastacchavdo viṣayīkarotītyādi—apāmeva rāśeścandro jātastāsāṃ pittaṃ vanhistasya sāyaṃprātarāhutaye yajamānaḥ sa vāyunā jīvati | sa ca pṛthivīguṇaṃ gaṃndhaṃ vahatīti pūrvapūrvasaṃkalanenottaravākyārtharacanā vihiteti | yadyapi cārthagumphe śabdagumpho dhruvabhāvī, tathāpi prathamānusaṃdheyamarthagumphanamevātra pradhānamiti tenaiva vyapadeśo yukta ityāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—atreti | yadīyaṃ śṛṅkhalā na pratisaṃdhīyate kathaṃ parameśvaramūrtayo 'ṣṭau labhyanta iti bhāvaḥ ||

nīlābjeti | patradāne spardhā vyajyate | sā ca sādṛśyaparyavasāyinīti pratīyamānopamā | ibhakumbhapūrvapakṣīkaraṇena kucābhogasya siddhāntabhāvo 'vagamyate | tathā ca vyatireko dhvanitaḥ | anuvādenāpyupamā pratīyate dūṣaṇena vyatireka iti prakṛtaparyavasāne samāsoktyā yatra dānādīnāṃ vidvadvādiprasiddhānāṃ śabdānabhidheya eva krama upādhibhūto grathita ityudāharaṇavyākhyānagranthārthaḥ ||

lg.l: pūsaabhāsaṃ muñcasu ṇa hu re haṃ dhavvavāāḍī || 68 ||’
kīrabhāṣāṃ muñca na khalu re 'haṃ dhṛṣṭaśukī ||]

div.p: kaṇaïlli ccia iti | kenacidviṭena śukabhāṣāmanukurvatā priyāyāḥ parihāsa ārabdhaḥ | sā tasya durvidagdhatvamākalayantī taducitamuttaramadāt śukapralapitāni kila śukī jānāti nānyā | na cāhaṃ śukī | tato viphalastavāyaṃ prayāsa ityarthaḥ | atra kunta-kīra-pūsa-śabdāḥ śukaparyāyāḥ | kaṇaïllī-vāāḍī-śabdau śukīparyāyau | tatrāpi kīraśabdastatsamaḥ | anye deśīrūpāḥ | tadeteṣāṃ paryāyāṇāṃ yathoktarūpānuguṇānāmekatravākye gumphanameva kavisaṃrambhagocara iti ||

atra lāṅgūlavallīvalayitabakulairnadadbhirgolāṅgūlaiḥ pratirasitajaratkandarāmandireṣu khaṇḍeṣu uddaṇḍapiṇḍītagarataralanāḥ puṭakinībandhavo gandhavāhā velāmālambya yena prāpire ityato 'dhikānāmapuṣṭārthānāmapi padānāmanuprāsāya cchandaḥpūraṇāya cārthānuguṇyena racitatvādiyaṃ padaracanā ||

lolallāṅgūlavallīti | lāṅgūlavallīvalayitetyādi yathoktavākyaviracanamātreṇaiva prayojanaparigrahe siddhe yadadhikānāṃ loladvallīprabhṛtipadānāmāvāpastena vinā nocitānuprāsasiddhirnaca tayā vinā vṛttaucitī samāpyate | na vā tāmantareṇa lāṅgūlādīnāmabhimatāste te viśeṣāḥ pratīyanta iti pallavapratiṣṭhaiva hi sarasvatī sahṛdayānāvarjayatīti—‘vākyapratītimātrārthamupātteṣu padeṣu yaḥ | upaskāraḥ padairanyaiḥ pallavaṃ taṃ pracakṣate || apallavaṃ tu yadvākyaṃ kavibhyastanna rocate | prayujyate tathābhūtamudīcyaiḥ kavigarhitam ||’ tadidamāha—atretyādi ||
iha mahato 'rthasyālpīyasā granthenābhidhānamiti vyutkrameṇāpi granthalāghavāya vākyārtho racita itīyaṃ vākyaracanā ||

vākyeti | vākyaracanā tu mahāvākya eva bhavatīti | tathāhi | patiśvaśuratetyādikamalpākṣarameva vākyaṃ mahato 'rtharāśeḥ samarpakamiti bhāvayatāṃ sahṛdayānāṃ kavitvaśaktirapratyūhaiva prakāśate | ata eva śaktitiraskārādādyantāvabhidhāya madhyamābhidhāne kramabhraṃśo 'pi tiraskriyata ityāha—atreti ||

śayyeti | kiṃcidekaṃ vastu buddhau samādhāya tadadhikāraprabandharacanāyāmadhikasyāntarāntarā prakṛte yojanā śayyā | padārthānāṃ prastutāprastutavastūnām | tacca yojanīyaṃ śabdārthabhedena dvividham | tatra vastuvākyayoreva yojanā mahākaviprabandheṣu dṛśyate | arthastu prākaraṇikārthopayogī tadanuyogī ceti dvividhaḥ | dvitīyo 'pyatikrānto 'tathābhūtaśceti pūrvavadvibhāgavākyaṃ vyākhyeyam ||

lg.l: vākyārthe vākyayoḥ kvāpi prakīrṇānāṃ ca dṛśyate || 55 ||

div.p: iyamatikrāntasyāpi kadambavanarājīnāmārdramukulodbhedasya virahimanaścamatkārakāriṇo rāmasya smṛtidvāreṇa ghaṭanādatikrāntaghaṭanā ||
