nirvighnaṃ nighnatī vaḥ śamayatu duritaṃ bhūribhāvā bhavānī || 211 ||’

div.p: vidrāṇa iti | upaghna āśrayaḥ | nighnaḥ paravaśaḥ | anuprāsajāterāsamāpti nirvāho 'bhimataḥ | vyaktayaḥ punaranyā anyā evābhimatāstena vṛttyanuprāsādbhedaḥ | ata eva veṇītulyatā | tatra hi kila keśagrathanā nirvyụ̄dhaiva bhaktiḥ punaranyānyeti ||

l.seg: nidrā drāgeva devadbiṣi muṣitaruṣaḥ saṃsmarantyāḥ svabhāvam |
devyā dṛgbhyastisṛbhyastraya iva galitā rāśayo raktatāyā

div.p: uktalakṣaṇebhya iti | pūrvoktavarṇānuprāsebhya iti | tathāhi prakṛtodāharaṇe sthāne sthāne stabakāvivakṣāyāṃ na stabakavān, vibhāgaparihāreṇa na sthānī, varṇāntarāyānupapattau na garbhaḥ, saṃkocavikāsābhāvena na vivṛtasaṃvṛtaḥ, cakravālakramābhāvena na gṛhītamuktaḥ | evaṃ kramaviparyastamithunabahirbhāvo 'vagantavyaḥ | āsamāptinirvahaṇābhāve veṇībhedaḥ sphuṭa eva ||

ekavarṇāvṛtteriti | vargyāvṛttau hi kadācidekavarṇāvṛttirapi saṃdarbhavyāpinī saṃbhāvyate | tasyāṃ pratīyamānāyāmevāntarāntarā nānājātīye varṇāvṛttiścitraśobhādāyinī vicitrānuprāsa ityucyate | tathā hi | prakṛtodāharaṇe saṃdarbhasamāptiṃ yāvadāvartamāne eva cakāre kāñcana kāñceti layavaladityādiṣu kakāralakārādyanuprāsodbhaṭabhāvenava varṇāvṛtternyagbhāva iva prakāśate | cārī saṃcaraṇaprakāraḥ | sā bhaumī ākāśī ca | cañcuro manoharaḥ | cañcarīko bhramaraḥ ||
anye punaranyathā citravicitrayorlakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣate | tatra yamakacchāyānukārī citraḥ | sa eva varṇānuprāsavānvicitra iti | tatra citro yathā—

l.seg: jyeṣṭhe māsi kharārkatejasi kathaṃ pāntha vrajañjīvasi || 214 ||’

div.p: anye punariti | vibhinnārthaikarūpatvaṃ sthānavibhāgālambanaṃ vyapetāvyapetabhāvaśca yamakacchāyāvarṇānuprāsavāniti atiśāyane matup | sarvāśārudhītyādau viprabhṛtīnāṃ vibhinnārthaikarūpāṇāṃ vyapetānāmeva pādamadhyāntayoravasthitiḥ | evamavyapetamapyunneyam | nātra varṇānuprāsa utkaṭa iti vicitrādbhedaḥ ||
te 'mī śuddhavarṇā vṛttiprakārāḥ ṣaṭratriṃśallakṣitāḥ, sāṃprataṃ dvādaśatāpannavarṇāvṛttayo lakṣyanta ityāha—varṇāvṛttiranuprāsa iti | dvādaśadheti vīpsā draṣṭavyā ||
samagramiti | padālambano 'nuprāsaḥ padānuprāsastena padāvayavamālālambano 'pi padālambana eva | tadidamāha—padāśrayeṇeti ||

nanu yadi padāvṛttirabhinnārthā tadā punaruktireva, bhinnārthā cedyamakānna bhidyata ityata āha—visargeti | binduranusvāraḥ | sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādikam | vṛtteḥ pādādiyamakatābhāvo nirvāhaḥ prāyonirvāha iti yojanā ||
vāraṇāsyo vināyakaḥ | atra raṇeraṇeti śaneśanīti kārakāramiti bhujaṃbhujeti padaṃ tadekadeśāvṛttiḥ sphuṭamupalabhyate | masṛṇastu kathamityata āha—so 'yamiti ||
atra niṣiddhaśatruriti pade saṃyogādhikyena danyuratā | so 'yaṃ padānuprāso dantura ityucyate ||
sa naiṣadhetyādau niṣadharūpo varṇasamudāyaḥ padaikadeśatāmāpannaḥ sādhāraṇa eva | tadatra danturatā kīdṛśītyata āha—atra niṣiddheti |
atra svareṇa sahāvṛtteḥ ślakṣṇatā | so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ ślakṣṇa ityucyate ||
saṃpuṭavadekarūpasyaiva khaṇḍasya nirantaramāvartanaṃ saṃpuṭam | tatkathamiva kaṃsaṃśabdairantarāye saṃpadyata ityata āha—atrevaśabdasyeti ||
atra karoti karotītyekaṃ saṃpuṭam, kiṃ kirātaḥ kiṅkirāta iti dvitīyam, samākṛṣya samākṛṣyeti tṛtīyam, śilīmukhāñchilīmukhāniti caturtham | so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ saṃpuṭāvalītyucyate ||

karoti kiṃ kirāto 'yamityādau madhye śilīmukhāñchilīmukhāniti prathamaṃ saṃpuṭam | tasya bahirāvaraṇabhūtaṃ samākṛṣya samākṛṣyeti dvitīyam | tasyāpi kiṃ kirātaḥ kiṅkirāta iti tṛtīyam | tasyāpi karotīti caturtham | tadetadviparītavyākhyayā vyañjayannāha—atra karotītyādi ||
atra rīteranirvāhātkhinnatā | so 'yaṃ padānuprāsaḥ khinna ityucyate ||

kuleti | atra prathamapāde kuleti avivakṣitasvarādivarṇayugmamakṣaracatuṣṭayavyavadhānena kulītyāvṛttam | dvitīyatṛtīyapādayostu sukhadasukheti abhavavibhaveti caikavarṇavyavadhānenāvṛttiḥ | caturthapāde tu bhavabhaveti rītibhaṅgo na ca doṣaḥ | pratītyavyavadhānāt ||

lg.l: ke na yānti nibandhāraḥ kālidāsasya dāsatām || 222 ||’

div.p: vaicitrīviśeṣeṇālaṃkārabhāvo bhāsayatītyādāvādyantayordūrāntaritaivāvṛttiḥ | sthānaniyamastu na vivakṣitaḥ | tadidamuktam—sthāne sthāna iti ||

l.seg: muṇālī vāṇālī jaladi a jaladdā taṇuladā
variṭṭhā jaṃ diṭṭhā kamalaṇaaṇā sā suvaaṇā || 223 ||’
mṛṇālī bāṇālī jvalati ca jalārdrā tanulatā

div.p: joṇhā uṇhā riso raso ityādikā pratipādaṃ madhyāntasthānaniyamenāvṛttiḥ | kṣato 'rpitaḥ kṣāraḥ | jalārdrā jalārdre vastre ||

pārābhidhānā nadī | apārā pārarahitā | sindhurnadī sindhunāmā | viśālā ujjayinī | śālābhiritītthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇeṃ tṛtīyā | atra pārāpāreti sindhuḥ sindhuriti dagre dagra iti śālāśāleti krameṇa prathamādipādeṣu dvayorevānuprāsayorvinyāsaḥ | yadyapi tṛtīyapāde girigirīti dvitīyamapi miṃthunaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpi varṇadvayavyavadhānādanullekhītyupekṣitavān ||

l.seg: ‘śirasi śarabhaḥ kroḍe kroḍaḥ karī karaṭe raṭa-
nnurasi ca rururmarmaṇyeṇaḥ śikhī mukharo mukhe |

div.p: śirasīti | śarabho 'ṣṭāpadaḥ | kroḍo varāhaḥ | rururbahuśṛṅgo mṛgaḥ | hariḥ siṃha | svarabhāgavivakṣāyāṃ vyañjanayugalāvṛttirmithunam | tadevāvṛttibhūmnā mithunāvalī śaraśareti kroḍakroḍeti karakareti davadavetyādinā krameṇa supratyabhijñānaiva ||

gṛhītamukto yatheti | puṃnāgaḥ puṃgaja iti prasiddhaḥ | kesaro bakulaḥ | bhāvanā vāsanā | surabhirvasantaḥ | nānāmadhupānalālasānāmitastataḥ ṣaṭcaraṇānāṃ caraṇaṃ bhramaṇam | atra cakravālakramo vyakta eva | āvṛttyādhikyābhāvācca gṛhītamātrasyaiva mocanam ||

punaruktimāniti | vācyābhedātpunaruktiḥ sā yasminnāvṛttilakṣaṇenānuprāse sa punaruktimān | tātparyabhedāñca na doṣaḥ | dhūmajvalanarasanānāmākāśadeśavyāpitayā dhanuḥprakarṣadvāreṇa rāmabhadragatotsāhaśaktidhvananātprakṛtavīrarasapoṣaḥ | atra dhūmadhūmetyādinā vācyabhedaḥ ||
nanu varṇāvṛttiranuprāsasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktā na cāsau padādyāvṛttāvastītyata āha—

varṇāvṛttiriti | samudāyāvṛttirapi varṇāvṛttireva | nahi varṇātiriktaḥ samudāyo nāma | iyāṃstu viśeṣo yatpūrvajātīyavṛttānusaṃdhānamalaṃkāratāṃ prayojayati | tatra ca kāryānumeyaḥ samayasaṃnikarṣaviśeṣa eva prayojaka iti | tadidaṃ diṅmātramuktam ||
anye 'pi padānuprāsaprakārāḥ svayamutprekṣitavyā ityāha—lāṭeti | gatiḥ prakāraḥ ||

kramaprāptaṃ nāmadviruktyanuprāsaṃ vibhajate—svabhāvata iti | yadyapi padānu-
prāsādau nāmadviruktirativyāpikā tathāpyarthopakṣepopanipātinī saha vivakṣitā | artho dvividhaḥ—ābhidhānikaḥ, upādhiśca | ādyo gauṇamuṃkhyabhedena dviprakāraḥ, dvitīyo 'pi vīpsābhīkṣṇyādiranekavidhaḥ | dvaruktirapi nāma śarīrasaṃpādikā nāmnaḥ sataśceti dvayī boddhavyā | ata eva dviruktasyaivābhidhāśaktiyogātsvabhāvata ityuktam ||

kurvanta iti | calācalāścañcalāḥ | calateracrapratyaye 'bhyāsasyāki rūpam | gulu ityavyaktānukaraṇasya ḍāci dvirvacane ca guluguleti nāmasiddhiḥ | atra kalakalādipadānāmarthavaśāyātadviruktiśarīrāṇāṃ svabhāvata eva yathoktarūpavyavasthitiḥ ||

l.seg: ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyāpi |
iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṃkaraṃ

div.p: amṛtamiti | atra dvitīyāntānāmamṛtādipadānāṃ dviruktidoṣeṇa tātparyāparyavasānādamṛtādiguṇaparatve kalpanīye 'pi nikṛṣṭaguṇaparāṇāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattestattadasādhāraṇaguṇopabṛṃhitāmṛtādiniṣṭhānāmādyapadopāttasāmānyāpekṣo viśeṣyabhāvaśca viśeṣaṇatvaṃ ca nirvahati | na ca paryāyaniveśe 'rthāntarasaṃkramitavācyatā saṃbhavatīti pūrvācāryāḥ | seyaṃ gauṇārthaparavaśā nāma dviruktiḥ ||

lg.l: ‘śaile śaile na māṇikyaṃ mauktikaṃ na gaje gaje |
deśe deśe na vidvāṃsaścandanaṃ na vane vane || 230 ||’

div.p: seyaṃ dravyavīpsā nāma dviruktiḥ | evaṃ guṇajātikriyāvīpsāyāmapi draṣṭavyam ||

vīpseti | nānārthānāṃ yugapadekaikena padena kenacidvakturvyāptivivakṣā vīpsā | sa prayoktṛdharmo dviruktyā vyajyate | ata eva yā kācidarthasāmarthyākṛṣṭā dviruktiḥ sā saptavarṇādivannāmadviruktisamākhyayā pratipādyate | śaile śaila iti | atra kiṃcidekamasādhāraṇaguṇāśrayaṃ vivakṣan taditarasya tajjātīyasya guṇasaṃsparśamasahamāno 'prastutameva śailādikaṃ prastutavān | rohaṇādivyatiriktāsu vyaktiṣu māṇikyādyabhāvaguṇavyāptiryugapadeva vivakṣitā | śabdādupasarjanatayā pratīyamānaḥ siddhasvabhāvaḥ padārtho guṇa ityucyate | evaṃ kriyayāpi vyāptiravaseyā | seyaṃ dravyavīpseti | śailādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmekena guṇādinā vyāptumicchetyarthaḥ ||

lg.l: mandamandamuditaḥ prayayau khaṃ bhītabhīta iva śītamayūkha || 231 ||’

div.p: prakāre guṇavacanasyeti | prakāraḥ sādṛśyaṃ tatpūrṇaguṇena nyūnaguṇasya sādhāraṇaguṇānvaye bhavati | evaṃ cāsti samānaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ ca vyāptiḥ | iyāṃstu viśeṣo yadekatra siddhasyānyatra pratibimbanaṃ sādṛśyaṃ, śuddhavīpsāyāṃ tu yugapadekasya nānāpadārthasaṃbandha iti | so 'yaṃ vīpsāprakāraśabdārthaḥ | ata eva ‘prakāre guṇavacanasya 8|1|12’ iti pṛthaksūtritam | iha tu vīpsāpadenaivāyamartha upagrāhya ityābhiprāyaḥ | mandaṃ mandamivodita iti kriyāviśeṣaṇamupamitam | evaṃ bhīta bhīta iti kartṛviśeṣaṇamapi | sādṛśyalakṣaṇaguṇotprekṣāyāmivaśabdaḥ ||
so 'yamābhīkṣṇye ṇamul | sa cānuprayujyata iti punaruktiḥ ||

ābhīkṣṇyeneti | ‘nityavīpsayoḥ8|1|4’ ityanena nityatvamābhīkṣṇyamuktam | yāṃ kila kriyāṃ kartā prādhānyenānuparatyā ca kartumicchati tadrūpamābhīkṣṇyam | ata eva tiṅavyayakṛtāṃ ca dviruktiriyamasādhāraṇī | ubhayatraiva kriyāprādhānyapratīteḥ |
siddhe hi vastuni paunaḥpunyapratītiḥ kriyopādhite eva na svarūpeṇa | nanu ṇamulaivābhīkṣṇyābhidhānātkiṃ dviruktiḥ kariṣyata ityata āha—so 'yamiti | na cābhīkṣṇyaṃ ṇamulo vācyam | ktvārthe tasyābhidhānāt | dviruktisahitasyaiva tasyānuparativyañjakatvāt | svarūpārthābhyāmantaratamaśabdadvayarūpa ādeśo vā dviruccāraṇaṃ vā dviruktiśabdārthaḥ ||

na cāvaśyaṃ dvāveva śabdau prayoktavyau kiṃtu yāvadbhirabhimato 'rthaḥ pratīyate tāvanto 'bhīkṣṇyaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāste nāvyayakṛtsu dṛśyante kiṃtu tiṅpadeṣvevetyāha—kriyāpadeti | yadyapyekavākyārthasaṃgatyā kriyāpadasya dvayamevoccāraṇaṃ tathāpi kāvyāpekṣayā bāhulyamavaseyam ||

ādigrahaṇeneti | tattaditaraprakaraṇaprāpitānāṃ dviruktiprakārāṇābhādipadenopagraho vidheyaḥ | tadyathā—‘arvāgarvāgbalavadupalagranthayaḥ kṣetraśailā dūre dūre maṇimayadṛṣanmekhalo ratnasānuḥ | ārādārānnidhirayamapāṃ yaddavīyo davīyāndugdhāmbhodhistadayamasadṛkchilpa evādiśilpī ||’ atrānupūrvye dve bhavata iti dviruktiḥ | evaṃ svārthe 'vadhāryamāṇe ityādayo 'pi dviruktiprakārāḥ svayamavaseyā ityāśayavānupalakṣaṇatayā kiṃcidudāharati—nimūlakāṣamiti | ‘kaṣādiṣu yathāvidhyanuprayogaḥ’ iti tasminneva prayukte dviruktisiddhiḥ ||
saṃbhrameṇeti | bhayasaṃvegādarātmakaḥ saṃbhramaḥ saṃvegastvarā | saiva prakṛtodāharaṇe dviruktiṃ prayojayati ||
harṣāvegavismayādayo 'pi saṃbhramasyopādhayo bhavanti | teṣu harṣasaṃbhrameṇa yathā—

nanu harṣādīnāṃ mahākaviprabandheṣu dviruktirupalabhyate | sā kathamupagrāhyetyata āha—harṣeti | harṣādayo 'pi saṃbhramaprayojakāstairasādhāraṇatāmāpannairavacchidyamānaḥ saṃbhramo 'nyonyo bhavati na ca saṃbhramatā jahātīti saṃbhramadviruktiprakāra evāyamityarthaḥ ||

atra muñca parityaja dahati apākuru iti kriyāpadeṣvāvegasaṃbhramānnadvirukteḥ | tathāhi—araṇyānīpraveśe vijigīṣudviṣāṃ yoṣiddāvāgnisaṃbhramāvegātkayāpyevamucyate, tatra prathamaṃ kañcuka evāvegasaṃbhramaḥ | sa hyāgate dāvāgnāvuttārayitumaśakyaḥ | tatastavdyāsaṅgahetau hāre, anantaraṃ parāpatitadāvāgnidīpte vāsasīti ||

nigūḍhagambhīra udvega āvegaḥ | nanu kañcukaṃ kañcukamitivanmuñcetyādikamāvegasaṃbhramaprabhavameva tatkathaṃ na dvirucyata ityata āha—atreti | kañcukasya hāreṇa hārasyottarīyavāsasā vyāsaṅgasaṃbhāvanā saṃbhramahetuḥ ||

l.seg: vada vada vada śravyaṃ vidvannidaṃ hyavadhīyate |
nahi nahi nahi kṣmāmārtaṇḍaḥ kṣaṇena virajyate || 239 ||’

div.p: saṃbhrameṣu yāvadbodhamiti yāvacchabdārthamāviṣkurvāṇaḥ pūrvoktamabhipretyāha—evaṃ triruktirapīti | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam | caturādidviruktiradaṇḍavāritaiva ||
nanu vākyārthaprayuktyaiva kāvyasya sanāthīkaraṇātkimanuprāsenetyata āha—jāyate na ceti | udāharaṇenālaṃkāryasaṃkaravadalaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pi lokaprasiddha eva śobhāheturityabhimatamiti ||

kramaprāptaṃ lāṭānuprāsaṃ lakṣayati—arthābhede iti | lāṭajanavallabho 'nuprāso lāṭānuprāsaḥ | arthabhede kathaṃ na punaruktidoṣa ityata uktam—pravṛttyā bhinnayeti | tātparyabhedenetyarthaḥ | ata eva yamakādbhedaḥ ||

lg.l: sa cāvyavahito vyastaḥ samasta ubhayaḥ punaḥ |

div.p: sa cetyanuktavyavahitasamuccaye cakāraḥ | lāṭānuprāsaḥ sāmānyato dvidhā—avyavahitaḥ, vyavahitaśca | anāvṛttaśabdānantarito 'vyavahitaḥ, tadantaritaśca vyavahitaḥ | tayoravyavahitaḥ ṣọdhā bhavati | vyastaḥ samasto dvāvubhayāviti tāvacca tvāraḥ | tatrobhayadvayaṃ dviprakārakamiti sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvābhyāṃ ṣaḍbhedā vyākhyeyāḥ | ubhayaḥ punariti | punaḥśabdo vyāvṛttau | pūrvasmādanya evāyamekaśabdābhilaṣya ityarthaḥ | ādyobhayadvayamagre vakṣyate ||

lg.l: yastu vyavahito nāma neyatā tasya śakyate |

div.p: dvitiyaṃ tu cakravālai garbhaścetyukta vyavahitasya tarhi kiyanto bhedā ata āha—yastviti | tena bahubhāvāvāntaraviśeṣatayā nāyaṃ samaśīrṣikayā gaṇita ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘uahissa jaseṇa jasaṃ dhīraṃ dhīreṇa garuiāi vi garuam |
rāmo ṭhiea vi ṭhiiṃ bhaṇaï raveṇa a ravaṃ samupphundanto || 240 ||’
rāmaḥ sthityāpi sthitiṃ bhaṇati raveṇa raveṇa ca ravaṃ samabhikrāman ||]

div.p: atrāvyayānāṃ dyotakāditvādivādibhirvyavadhānaṃ nāśrīyate | na hīvādeḥ prakṛte 'pi pṛthakpadatvamasti | yadyevāmidamihodāharaṇaṃ yujyate—

lg.l: tvanmūrtiriva mūrtiste tvamiva tvaṃ kṛśodari || 241 ||’ iti |

div.p: astyevaitat | kiṃ tu yathā—‘amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandraḥ—’ ityādikamabhede 'pi bhedopacārānnāmadviruktistatheyamityutprekṣate ||

teṣviti | dviruktaśabdarūpeṣu pūrvaparayornaikamapi samāsāntargatamiti vyastaḥ | etena samastādayo vyākhyātāḥ | dhairyagurutāsthitigāmbhīryānuniṣpādī vāganubhāvo rasapūrṇakumbhocchalananyāyena sākṣādiva tattatprakarṣamarpayan śobhāvikāsahetuḥ |
samupphundanto samabhikrāman | nanu jaseṇa dhīreṇa garuiāi vi i raveṇa a iti yadapañcake vibhaktyā taduttarayoścakāradvayena ca vyavadhānātkathamavyavahitabheda udāhriyata ityāha—atreti | avyayānāmityupalakṣaṇam | dyotakatvāditi vibhaktisādhāraṇo hetuḥ | pañcakaprātipadikārthatvapakṣe vikṣaktirdyotikaiva | śākalyo 'pi avyayavācakatvavādī | so 'pyasattvārthānāmivādīnāṃ svātantryeṇa vācakatvaṃ na manyate | yato na pṛthakpadatvamanuśiṣṭavān | tathā ca dyotakānāṃ paraśaktisahakāritvena tadanupraveśātsvāṅgamavyavadhāyakamiti nyāyāt | nanu kimatra kliṣṭakalpanayā | astyavyavahitodāharaṇamapyanyadapīti śaṅkate—yadyevamiti | atra pūrvārdhavartidvayamudāharaṇamuttarārdhavartino dvayasya pūrvatulyatvāt | pariharati—astīti | ananvayamātramatrodāharaṇam | tatra cāvaśyabhedakalpanayā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvī vācyastathā ca gauṇī nāma dviruktiḥ syāditi saṃkaraśaṅkanāyodāhṛtamiti siddhāntatātparyasaṃkṣepaḥ ||

lg.l: sakhi vijitā parasumanaḥsumanaḥ subhaga ca madhutilakam || 242 ||’

div.p: atra ‘kisalaya kisalaya’ iti, ‘sumanaḥ sumanaḥ’ iti ca samastānāmevāvyadhānādayaṃ lāṭīyo 'nuprāso 'vyavahitasamastaḥ pūrvaḥ punaravyavahitavyasta ityucyate ||
ubhayastu dvidhā—prathamaḥ samastoparo vyastaḥ | dvitīyo vyasto 'paraḥ samasta iti ca | tayoḥ prathamo yathā—
svāpekṣayā vyasto 'nyāpekṣayā ca samastaḥ, dvitīyo vyasto 'paraḥ samasta iti sa dvitīyobhayaśabdavācyaḥ | so 'pi dvidhā—pratipādamantādyorgarbha ivānuprāsavinyāsāt | tayoḥ prathamaścakravālaṃ yathā—

atra timiravallabhapūrvāśetiśabdāstimirādiśabdāpekṣayā vyastāḥ yathā—svapūrvottarapadāpekṣayā ca samastāḥ padāntādyorviniveśitā iti yathoktalakṣaṇānugamāllāṭīyānuprāso 'yamavyavahito vyastasamastaścakravālamityucyate ||
dvitīyamubhayaṃ vivecayati—svāpekṣayeti | timirāndhāścakravākāḥ | yatha śrutidviruktaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrveṇottaraścottareṇa samasta iti pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: savibhramā vibhramadāyinī vaḥ sapaṅkajā paṅkajalocanā śrīḥ || 246 ||’
du saho vidviṣāṃ svāmī duḥsahastamasāṃ ca saḥ || 247 ||’

div.p: so 'yamekaguṇo vyastaśca lāṭīyānuprāso vyavahita ityucyate | vyastaścānekaguṇo yathā—

l.seg: ‘kiṃcidvacmi na vacmi vacmi yadi vā kiṃ vacmi vacmīdṛśaṃ
dṛśyante na bhavādṛśeṣu patiṣu sveṣāmadoṣe damāḥ |
te kiṃ santi na santi santi yadi vā ke santi santīdṛśāḥ

div.p: anekaguṇā iti | āvṛttidvaiguṇyādinānekaguṇatvam, na ca guṇanāyāmiyattāvadhāraṇakāraṇamastītyabhisaṃdhāya tasyeyattā na śakyate kartumiti pūrvamuktam | sveṣāmātmīyānāṃ madhye yaḥ kaściddoṣastatra damā daṇḍaprakārā na dṛśyanta iti ||
nanviha tithirityasamastam | na kevalamasamastaṃ bhinnārthatayā lāṭīyānuprāse 'pi na saṃgacchate | saṃgate ca kenacitpadānuprāsena | na ca lāṭīyānuprāso vā nāmānuprāso vā padānuprāsādbhidyata iti ||

yadyapyekaparihārākārodāharaṇadvayamucitameva tathāpi kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ vivakṣannākṣipya samādhatte—nanviti | mā bhūdatrāsamāso 'nyathāpi nedamudāharaṇamiha saṃgatamityāha—na kevalamiti | tatkimanuprāsa evāyaṃ na bhavatīti pṛcchati—kena tarhīti | uttaram—padānuprāseneti | padānuprāsenārthabhedābhedau vivakṣitau | kiṃtu padāśrayeṇāvṛttimātraṃ padānuprāsāvṛttiśca lāṭānuprāse 'pyastīti saṃgatyātredamudāhṛtamityarthaḥ ||
atrānekaśo daṇḍa ityasyāvṛttiḥ | ābhyāṃ vyastasamastabhedo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
śatadhṛtirbrahmā tasya bhuvanabhūtamambhoruda padmaṃ tasya, kṣoṇī pṛthvī tadrūpā yā naustaristasyāḥ kūpadaṇḍaḥ guṇavṛkṣaḥ | daśasviti | eko daśaśabdo vyastaḥ, anye trayaḥ samastāḥ ||
nanu vyavahita eva kiṃ guṇanādibhedo netyāha—avyavahite 'pīti | vastrāyanta ityādau kāśapadaparihāreṇodāharaṇam | tatra hi prathamaḥ kāśaśabdo bhinnārtha eva ||

lg.l: dhanebhyo hi kaścitsuhṛnnāsti loke dhanānyarjayadhvaṃ dhanānyarjayadhvam 253’

div.p: yatra vyavahitāvyavahitayorekavākyānupraveśo 'sti tatrāpi guṇanābheda udāharaṇīyaḥ | dṛśyata ityanena yadvavdyavahite bhūyasī guṇanā mahākaviprabandheṣu pratīyate na tadvadavyavahite 'pīti pūrvaṃ vyavahitamātre guṇanādikamupanyastamiti tātparyam |dhanairiti | atra dhanapadavyavadhānena bahvīṃ guṇanāmavalambamānameva caturthapāde tvavyavahitā tvanuprāse 'pi praviṣṭamiti bhavati vyavahitāvyavahitabhedatā | so 'yaṃ padābhyāso darśitaḥ ||
yo 'pi cārdhābhyāsaḥ so 'pi vyavahitāvyavahitabheda eva | yathā—

lg.l: ‘yaistvaṃ sākṣātkṛto nātha teṣāṃ kāmeṣu ko grahaḥ |
yaistvaṃ sākṣātkṛto nātha teṣāṃ kāmeṣu ko grahaḥ || 254 ||’
tāvubhau yadi na syātāṃ medhayā kiṃ prayojanam || 255 ||’

div.p: śraddhāyatnāviti | atra yadi syātāmiti pādabhāgena saha padāvṛttistribhāgāvṛttirbhavati ||
padābhyāsaḥ punaravyavahito vyavahitaśca dṛśyate | tayoravyavahito yathā—

lg.l: na subhruvāṃ tulyamihāsti ramyaṃ na subhruvāṃ tulyamihāsti ramyam 256’

div.p: mukheneti | phullapaṅkajamiva cāru phullena paṅkajena cāruriti yadyapi vṛttyarthau bhidyete, tathāpi padānāmabhinnārthatvādudāharaṇatā ||
arthābheda iti nārthaśabdo 'bhidheyavacanaḥ kiṃtu śabdapratipādyamātravacana ityāśayavānāha—ivādīti ||
nanvanye 'pi padāvṛttiprakārāḥ kimiti nodāhṛtā ityata āha—yamakānāṃ hīti | bhedabhaktayo 'vāntaraprakāravicchittayaḥ sthānāsthānapādabhedalakṣaṇā ślokāvṛttiḥ paramatra nāstīti yamakādapakarṣaḥ ||
etadeva khaṇḍasarasvatīṣu kaviṣu na tathā kāvyasiddhiriti darśayandraḍhayati—śrutivarṇānuprāsāviti ||

kramaprāptaṃ citralakṣaṇamavatārayati—varṇeti | citramālekhyaṃ tadiva jīvitasthānīyadhvanirahitaṃ citramiti kāśmīrakāḥ | tadasat | dhvaneḥ prādhānyānaṅgīkārātpratīyamānamātrābhāvasya kvacidapyasaṃbhavāt | yadvā ākṛtiviśeṣayuktaṃ citramiti tadapi na | avyāpakatvāt | ato varṇādiniyamena pravṛttamāścaryakāritayā citramityeva yuktam | varṇā vyañjanāni | sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādi | svarā akārādayaḥ | ākāraḥ padmādyākṛtyunmudraṇam | gatiḥ paṭhitibhaṅgaviśeṣaḥ | bandho viviḍitiprabhṛtiḥ ||
varṇaśabdena cātra svarāṇāṃ pṛthaṅnirdeśāvdyañjanānyeva pragṛhyante | tatra varṇacitreṣu caturvyañjanaṃ yathā—

pañcaprabhṛtiniyamena tathāśaktiñyutpattyorutkarṣa iti caturādi gṛhṇāti—tatreti | avaśyaṃ yoddhā jājī | jajeryuddhārthādāvaśyake ṇiniḥ | jajā yuddhaśauṇḍāsteṣāmojasā jātā yā ājiḥ saṅgrāmastaṃ jayatiti kvip | taṃ veṇudāriṇaṃ tato 'nantaraṃ atitatān caturaṅgabalena prāptavistārān ātinaḥ satatagamanaśīlān tudatīti kvip | bhānāṃ dīptatārānurūpāṇāṃ śukrabṛhaspatyādīnāmābhevābhā kāntiryasyetyupamānapūrvapadabahuvrīhau uttarapadalope ca bhāmaḥ | abhiyo bhayaśūnyānibhānabhibhavatīti kvip | abhībhābhibhūstādṛśī yā bhā tejastasyā bhūrāśrayaḥ | āra jagāma | ariḥ śatruḥ | balabhadra ityarthaḥ | arīṇāṃ rīḥ saṃcaraṇam | ‘rīṅ gatau iti dhātvanusārāt | tasyā īro dhūnanaṃ rāti dadāti arīraraḥ ||

devaḥ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārakrīḍārataḥ, dānavanandī hiraṇyakaśipustasya dāne 'vakhaṇḍane yo nādo vakṣaḥkapāṭapāṭanakaṭakaṭāśabdastena divaṃ svargaṃ dudāva kimetadityākasmikasaṃbhrameṇetyupatāpayāmāsa | jagatkaṇṭakanirākaraṇāddevānāṃ nandana ānandakṛt | vedanindināṃ ca nodanaḥ pratikṣepakaḥ | sāmānyābhiprāyeṇaikavacanam ||

bhūribhirbahubhirbhāribhiḥ prakṛtisārabhāravāhibhiratipramāṇakāyatayā bhuvo bhārabhūtairantaḥkāṃsyabhājano niḥsvāno bherī tadvadebhibhiḥ | ‘rebhṛ śabde’ iti dhātvanusārāt | abhrābhaiḥ prathamonnatameghakāntibhiribhairhastibhirbhiya rānti prayacchantīti bhīrā ibhāḥ pratidvipā abhirebhire abhiyuktāḥ ||

nanu nānānanā vividhākāravadanā gaṇā ūnena hīnena nunno jito nā na na puruṣaḥ | tathā nunna inaḥ prabhuryasya so 'pyātmani jīvati nānā puruṣo 'puruṣa eva | yato nanunneno 'jitaprabhurnunno 'pyanunna eva | tathā nunnanunnaḥ jita iva klībatayā parābhūta iti | ‘prakāre guṇavacanasya’ iti dviruktiḥ | tamapi yo nudati sa nānenā na niṣpāpaḥ bandhacchāyārpakānyavarṇagurutvonmeṣamātraprayojakastakāro na vṛttiśarīrāntargata iti dvivyañjanatā nāśaṅkanīyā ||

kramastheti | varṇasamāmrāye yena krameṇa kādayo māvasānāḥ paṭhitāstena krameṇa vyañjananiveśaḥ | kaḥ khagaughastattatprasiddhāvadānapakṣisamūhastamañcatīti kvini saṃyogāntalope kṛte ca khagaughāṅiti rūpam | citaṃ saṃvidaṃ chyati chinattīti cicchaṃ yadojastannāsti yasyāsāvacicchaujāḥ | ‘jhamu adane’ asmāt kvip | ‘anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ 6|4|16’ ityupadhādīrghaḥ | ‘mo no dhātoḥ 8|2|64’ iti nakāra iti jhān parabalabhakṣako jñaḥ paṇḍitaḥ | ‘sto ścunā śruḥ 8|4|40’ iti nakārasya ñakārāḥ | aṭāḥ saṅgrāmāṅgaṇaparyaṭanaśīlāḥ subhaṭāstānoṭhate bādhata iti kvip | ‘uṭha gatau’ iti dhāto rūpam | teṣāmīḍīśvaraḥ | aḍaṇḍhaṇo 'capalaḥ | ḍaṇḍhaṇa ityavyutpannaṃ capalavāci prātipadikam | tathā abhīrbhayarahitaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ ko nāmāyamudadhīn papharba pūrayāmāseti praśnaḥ | uttaram—arīn lunanti yā āśiṣastāsāṃ sahaḥ kṣamo mayo daityarāja iti ||
chandokṣareti | ‘myarastajabhnagā lāntāśchandovicitivedibhiḥ | daśaiva varṇā nirṇītāśchandorūpaprasiddhaye ||’ tanmātravyañjananibaddhachandokṣaravyañjanam | subodhamudāharaṇam ||

ṣaḍjādīti | ‘sarigāmapadhāniśca varṇāḥ sapta svarādayaḥ | ṣaḍjādikṛtasaṃketā dṛṣṭā gāndharvavedibhiḥ ||’ tanmātravyañjanamayaṃ ṣaḍjādivyañjanam | saha ena viṣṇunā vartate iti sā lakṣmīḥ | arīn dhamati tāpayati iti dhamaterlyuṭi bahulavacanamanyatrāpīti dhamādeśaḥ | evaṃvidhā mama bhūyāditi śeṣaḥ | nidhāninī padmādinidhānavatī | sāmnaḥ sāntvasya dhāma gṛham | dhanināṃ dhāmasādhinī tejaḥprasāghikā | māninī pūjāvatī | sagarimā gauravavatī | apapāpānniṣkaluṣān pātītyapapāpapā | seti prasiddhavibhavā āpagā nadī | samaḥ tattulyaḥ kṣaṇavisarpā bhaṅguraḥ samāgamo yasyāḥ sā tathā | asamā anupamā ||
murajeti | ‘pāṭhākṣarāṇi muraje lahakārau tathadadhācchamau rephaḥ | naṇakakhagaghaṅāścetthaṃ ṣoḍaśa bharatādikrathitāni ||’ tanmātraviracitaṃ murajākṣaravyañjanam | subodhamudāharaṇam ||

varṇavatsthāneṣvapi caturādiniyamena citram | yadyapi ca ‘aṣṭau sthānāni varṇānāmuraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śirastathā | jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭau ca tālu ca’ iti, tathāpi jihvāmūlīyasya svaratvādurasyanāsikyayoḥ kāvyapraveśābhāvāduronāsikājihvāmūlaparyudāsena sthānapañcake caturādinirūpaṇam | he sūcirucidhīḥ śucibhiḥ śuddhābhirnutibhiḥ stutibhiryathoktaviśeṣaṇa viriñciṃ brahmāṇaṃ dhinu prīṇayeti | akuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyāḥ ||
kuṇḍalaratnaugha eva maghavato dhanustena karburo meghanādanāmā rākṣasaḥ | icuyaśāstālavyāḥ ||
caṇḍīśamiśraḥ parameśvareṇaikaśarīratāmāpannaḥ | mukhyāmarā brahmādayaḥ | lṛtulasā dantyāḥ ||
aghana iti | śaratkālaśobhayā dṛśyatame | upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyāḥ ||
tena kapilena rājñā | tasya kosalādhipasya prasenajitaḥ | ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhanyāḥ ||
niroṣṭhyadantyamiti | anenaiva dvikāntaraparihāreṇa loṣṭaprastāvo gaveṣaṇīyaḥ | tathottaratrāpi ||

sadānagha anavadya sadaiva priyālābhenānandayukta | natāṅgyā kasyāścidanyasyāḥ saṅge saṃgata, tava śobhanāṅganā kāmākramaṇaprāptanānārūpatayā vartate | atastāmanukampasveti sopalambhaprārthanāvākyārthaḥ ||

gāṅgakaṃ gaṅgāsaṃbandhi jalaṃ tasyākaḥ kuṭilā gatiḥ | ‘aka aga kuṭilāyāṃ gatau’ iti | tasyāṅkasya tanmadhyasya gāhako vilolakaḥ | kutsitamaghaṃ pāpamaghakaṃ sa eva kākastaṃ hatavānaghakakrākrahā | anye tu visargāntaṃ paṭhanti | tadā jahātervidhirūpam | evaṃvidhastvaṃ gāṃ svargaṃ agāḥ yāyā iti āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtapratyayaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ san | hānaṃ hāḥ na hā ahāstāñjihīte prāpnotīti ahāhaṃ tādṛśamaṅgaṃ yasya sa khago garuḍaḥ sūryo vā so 'ṅkaścihnabhūto yasya tādṛśo 'go 'rthānmerustadvartinaḥ kaṅkākhyā agakhagā vṛkṣanivāsinaḥ pakṣiṇaste 'pi ākākakā gamanaspṛhayālavo yasya sa tathā | āstāṃ tāvadanye, patattribhirapyabhinanditagamana ityarthaḥ ||

svaracitreṣvekādikrameṇopanyāso granthavaicitryārthaḥ | uruguṃ vistīrṇavācam | dyuguruṃ svarvāsināmācāryam | yutsu yuddhārtham | ‘nimittātkarmayoge’ iti saptamī | gīrvāṇabhaṭāśrukruśurārtāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayācire | ata eva puru bahudhā tuṣṭuvuḥ | yuddhaprayojana﻿-
māha—mutsu harṣeṣu lulubhuḥ | pupuṣuḥ puṣṭā babhūvuḥ | nu vitarke | muhurmuhurvāraṃrvāraṃ kiṃ mumuhurmohamāsāditavantaḥ | yataḥ krośanādīnāmavyavastheti bhāvaḥ ||

vidhirviriñciḥ, ī lakṣmīstasyā inaḥ prabhurviṣṇuḥ, īśo mahādevaḥ, indro vāsavaḥ, ījaḥ kāmo lakṣmīputratvāt, ilā pṛthvī, jino buddhaḥ, siddhā devaviśeṣāḥ, mitraḥ sūryaḥ, raido dhanadaḥ kuberaḥ, devā uktavyatiriktā marudādayaḥ, eṣāṃ saṃbandhibhidhaiṃyaiṃrdhṛtibhiḥ svairvittaiśca naikairanekavidhaistaistaiḥ prasiddharūpairahaṃ svairaiḥ suṣṭhu āsamantātsamṛddho bhavānītyāśaṃsā | vai vākyālaṃkare ||

lg.l: mama tryakṣa namaddakṣa hara smarahara smara || 278 ||’

div.p: kṣitiḥ pṛthvī tasyāḥ sthitiḥ pālanaṃ mitirmānaṃ kṣiptiḥ saṃhārastadvidhiṃ vetti | nidhisiddhī lẹdhīti kvie | naman bhagnatejā dakṣo yasmāt | smarahara kāmadahana, tryakṣa trinayana, hara mahādeva, mama smara | adhīgarthayoge karmaṇi ṣaṣṭī ||

lg.l: edhete dve dve te ye neme deveśe || 279 ||’

div.p: śrīdīptī lakṣmītejasī | hrīkīrtī lajjāyaśasī | dhīnītī buddhinayau | gīḥprītī vākpramodau | ime ye deveśe 'pi na staste dve tava edhete vardhete ||

lg.l: uru rurudhurguru dudhuvuḥ svamarikulaṃ yudhi kuravaḥ || 280 ||’

div.p:
kṣitervijitiḥ vijayaḥ, sthitervarṇāśramamaryādālakṣaṇāyā vihitirvidhānaṃ tadeva vrataṃ
tatra ratiryeṣām | parā śreṣṭhā gatirjñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā | evaṃvidhāḥ kuravaḥ svadviṣāṃ kulamuru vistīrṇa rurudhuḥ | tadeva guru mahat dudhuvuḥ kampayāmāsuḥ ||

lg.l: bhogo rogo moho modo dhyeye vecchetkṣeme deśe || 281 ||’

div.p: āmrāyānāṃ vedānāmantyā vāgupaniṣat sā hitāhitapratipādanaparā kimāha | yā gītayastā ītaya upasargāḥ | yāḥ prītayastā bhītayo bhayāni | yo bhogaḥ sa rogaḥ | yo modo harṣaḥ sa mohaḥ | na paramevamāha | kiṃtu yāvadhdyeye dhyātavye kṣeme kleśarahite deśe viṣaye mokṣalakṣaṇe icchedicchāṃ kuryāditi | vāśabdaḥ samuccaye | anye cakārameva paṭhanti ||

heye hātavye vastuni yā villābhaḥ | ‘vidḷlābhe’ iti dhātvanusārāt | tatra ye lobhino lobhavantastannindanaśīlena tāpena tejasārthādugraścaṇḍaraśmiḥ sa naḥ mama dehe 'stu | tejasvī bhavānīti yāvat | kimityevamāśāsyata ityata āha—amṛtasyandini kāntāgre guṇināṃ priyatame 'kṣepo 'vilamba eva hito 'rthataḥ samarasya | ‘iti datvāśiṣaṃ ko 'pi svasmai kārmukakarmaṇe | jagāma samaraṃ kartumarilakṣmīsvayaṃvaram ||’
grastadahana abhibhūtapāvaka | hayavallabho revantaḥ sa tanayo yasya | hatakṣapa apahṛtarātra | matakṣaṇa saṃmatotsava ||

lg.l: ‘karṇikāyāṃ nyasedekaṃ dve dve dikṣu vidikṣu ca |

div.p: yā śritetyādikamudāharaṇaṃ prāgeva (pa0 1 ślo0 170) vyākhyātam | ataḥ paraṃ hāriharivyākhyā | sāpyatraiva likhyate | tadyathā—yā devī pavitratvenāśritā anīcayā tuṅgyā budhdyā māyāyāmasyāvidyāvistārasyāyāsaṃ glāniṃ vicchedaṃ yācanīyā prārthanīyā yato yātanaṃ narakānubhavanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ chinatti śriyāpi stuteti || asya nyāsamāha—karṇikāyāmiti | ādyo yāvarṇaḥ karṇikāyāṃ śriteti pāveti krameṇa dvikaṃ dvikamaṣṭapatreṣu | yāśritā śriyetyādau digdaleṣu praveśanirgamau ||

carasphāretyādi | saṃcaraṇaśīlaḥ sphāro yo varastaṃ kṣarati dadāti iti | varāñchreṣṭhān kirati kṣipati kṛṇoti hinasti veti karmaṇyaṇ | garaḥ kālakūṭastasya jvaro jvaraṇāt | tāṇḍavārambhe calāḥ sphālā yasya | valakṣa dhavaladeha, alavala prāptaśakte, kālagala nīlakaṇṭha, jvala dīpyamāno bhava || nyāsamāha—aṣṭadheti | atha prathamārdhe eka eva repho 'ṣṭadhā karṇikāyām | aparārdhasyānye 'ṣṭau lakāravarjaṃ daleṣu ceṣāṃ saṃdhiṣvanye 'ṣṭau lakārāḥ ||

na śaśīśetyādi | śaśīśe candre nave bhāve bhaktau | sthita iti śeṣaḥ | tvāmahaṃ na namāmi | kākvā namāmyeva | naman bhagnaḥ kāmo yasmāt | natamupanataṃ vrataṃ yasya saṃyamidhaureyatvāt | mānanamanaṃ śatrūṇāmunnatināśanam | nanviti pūjāsaṃbodhane | tvā iti tvām | anunayan vinayaṃ kurvāṇo 'yam || nyāsamāha—prākkarṇikāmiti | pūrvaṃ karṇikāyāmādyo nakāro grāhyaḥ, tataḥ śeti parṇamadhye, śīti parṇāgre, parāvṛtya parṇakarṇikayoḥ śakāranakārau, punaḥ karṇikāto dalāgragamāgame 'pi | ayameva kramaścaturdalapadme ||

sāsavetyādi | sāsavā āsvāditamadirā | pīvareṇa stanạ̄dhyenorasā natā sāradhāmā utkṛṣṭakāntiḥ sahasā sahāsyā akasmādvā śrṛṅgāroddīpanasvabhāvena mārgaśīrṣeṇa hetunā śobhanena vāsasā ca lakṣitā he sāhasardha sarvaniśīthābhisaraṇa sāhasarasika, tvāmeti upagacchatīti || nyāsamāha—karṇiketi | subodhametaditi ||

ṣoḍaśapattramāha—namasta ityādi | mahimani premā yasya tat | namasya amatimato dāmyatīti amatimaddama | kṣāmaḥ kalāmātreṇa cūḍāsaṃgataḥ somo yasya | naman bhagnaḥ kāmo yasmāt | dhāmnā tejasā bhīma bhayānaka | samā sakalavyutthānahetusādhāraṇī kṣamā yasya | yasyaitāni saṃbodhanaviśeṣaṇāni te tubhyaṃ namaskurute
kaściditi || nyāsamāha—gomūtriketi | varṇā makāravyatiriktāḥ samāḥ makārasahitāḥ | samāḥ samā iti vīpsā prativarṇaṃ makārasāhityabodhanārthā ||

aṣṭapattrameva kavināmāṅkamāha—rātāvadyeti | ‘gīrvāṇasubhaṭaḥ kaścidyuyutsurdaityasenayā | tatkālakṛtasāṃnidhyāṃ māyādevīmapūjayat ||’ tathāhi—vyājo māyā saiva vāgrūpā vyājaśabdopapadaṃ vāgabhidhānaṃ yasyāḥ sā mahyaṃ rakṣāstviti saṃbandhaḥ | rātaṃ dattamavadyaṃ doṣabahulamādhirājyam, avadyā ādhayo yatra tādṛśaṃ vā rājyaṃ yayā | viśiṣṭaṃ saraṇaṃ visarastaṃ rāti prayacchati yo raso 'rthādvīrastaṃ vetti vindati vā | yā kṣmāyāṃ pṛthivyāmapakāraḥ putrakalatrādirūpo yasyāḥ sakāśāditi gamakatvādvahuvrīhiḥ | rākā pūrṇimā, dvādaśavarṣadeśīyakanyārūpā vā | pakṣmābhaḥ śarīrasaṃlagnaḥ śeṣaḥ sarpaḥ | yasyā nayanaṃ nītistānnayatīti yannayanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ | jñānamiti yāvat | tadeva svamātmā yasyāḥ | khe vyomni yātīti khayā | stavyo māro māraṇaṃ kāmo vā yasyāḥ | sā rāmā ramaṇīyā strīrūpā vā | vyastaṃ vināśitaṃ sthiratvaṃ yayā | tuhinaṃ nayati prāpayatīti nayaterḍapratyaye tuhinanaścandrastasya nahiturjaṭājūṭe bandhayituḥ parameśvarasya śrīḥ śaktirūpā | nahyati badhnātīti nahervici nahaṃ stutimāsādayatīti | ‘sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ kvibvaktavyaḥ’ iti kvipi tṛjantasya rūpam | kaṃ sukhaṃ rāti dadātīti karastasya kṣārabhūtā dasyavasteṣāṃ khaṅgādidhāreva dhārā chettrī | rādheti devyāḥ paurāṇikaṃ nāma | mametyavyayaṃ bhāvapradhānam | śive manatvaṃ mānti paricchindanti ye vaśino yoginasteṣāmapi vyālavidyāṃ kṣudravidyāmavatārayati yā sā tathā || nyāsamāha—niviṣṭeti | aṣṭabhiḥ pādārdhairaṣṭadalaviracanā | yadvarṇāṣṭakaṃ nāmno﻿-
ttiṣṭhati tadāha—‘rājaśekharakamala’ | kavikāvyanāmalābhādaṃvibhaktikatvamapyadoṣaḥ | eteneti | nāmāṅkapadmakathanena cakramapi nāmāṅkamavaseyam ||

l.seg: muktvā kāmamapāstabhīḥ paramṛgavyādhaḥ sa nādaṃ hare-

div.p: sa tvamityādi | harernādaṃ siṃhanādaṃ ropairbāṇairājirabhasātsaṅgrāmaharṣāduddharataraśrīvatsabhūmirunnatahṛdayaḥ sa tvamālambya mānena tadviśiṣṭamiti viśeṣaṇam | prāptapāpavināśo mudā harṣeṇa apagatabhīḥ śatrurhariṇavyādho 'bhramākāśaṃ pidadhe tadā tasminkāle siṃhanādamuktveti saṃbandhaḥ || nyāsamāha—pura iti | puraḥ puro likhitvānyānagre likhedyathā ṣaḍarāḥ saṃpadyante ||

lg.l: tathyaṃ cintitaguptirastavidhidigbhedaṃ na cakraṃ śucācāro 'prāṃśuradabhramugra tanu me ramyo bhavānīrucā || 298 ||’

div.p:
yathā vā—śuddhamityādi | cakraṃ me mama gavi vāci śuddhamakaluṣam, dharmādutkāntamuddharmamīdṛśaṃ yadrajo rājasabhāvastasya padaṃ sthānaṃ tadbhraṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ yasmāt | astā vidhidigdaivapāratantryaṃ yatra tathāvidhaṃ, śucā śokena ca na vakrīkṛtamanapahatamadabhramupacitaṃ yadbhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ tattanu vistārayeti prārthanā | baddhairalaṃkārīkṛtaiḥ surāṇāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sāraṃ śirastadasthibhirbaddhamuṇḍamālābhirbhayānaka | rujāṃ rogāṇāṃ jayenāti-
sthira | akṣīṇenopacitena cañcadbhuvā sāhlādena gavā vṛṣeṇa lakṣita | tathyamiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | cintitā guptirbhūtānāṃ rakṣā yena | cāro ramaṇīyaḥ | ugro mahādevaḥ | tvamaprāṃśuḥ sarvasmāduccaiḥpade sthitaḥ | bhavānīrucā vāmārdhasthitapārvatīkāntyā ramyastanviti saṃbandhaḥ || atra pūrvavadeva nyāsaḥ | aṅkāstu catvāra iti viśeṣaḥ ||

idānīṃ gaticitraprastāvaḥ—vāraṇetyādi | vāraṇā eva agāḥ parvatāstairgabhīrā duravagāhā | sārā śreṣṭhā | bhiyaṃ yena yānti tādṛśānāṃ gaṇānāmāravo yatra | sāro vā bhīgagaṇāravo yatra | kāritaḥ kṛto 'rīṇāṃ vadho yayā | svārthe ṇic | āsedhaḥ paraiḥ pratiṣedhastena hīnā | varitāḥ subhaṭairyuddhārthamāhūtā arayo yasyāṃ sā tathā | ‘vara īpsāyām’ iti dhātoḥ ktapratyaye variteti rūpasiddhiḥ | atrāyukpādayoḥ prathamatṛtīyayorānulomyena varṇāvalīṃ gṛhītvā tatpratilomarūpau yukpādau dvitīyacaturthau gṛhyete | paṭhitervarṇādvarṇāntarasaṃcāro gatistanniyamanena citraṃ gaticitraṃ sa cātra yathoktarūpa eva ||

lg.l: cāruṇā ramate janye ko bhīto rasitāśini || 300 ||’

div.p: he amaraṇā maraṇarahitāḥ, niśitakhaṅgarato bhayaśūnyaśca rucā tejasā nyejate na kampate | yo hi bhītaḥ sa kathaṃ śabdāyamānāśanaśīlarakṣaḥpiśācādisaṃkule janye saṅgrāme cāruṇā karituragādinā ramate | na kathaṃcidityarthaḥ | atra saṃdarbhasamāptiparyantaṃ yā varṇamālā gṛhītā saiva samāpterārabhya pratyāgatyā yāvadārambhaṃ samāpyata iti pūrvaṃ tvardhenaivamiti ||

vāhaneti | tato 'nantaraṃ vāhanā senā 'namā natiśūnyājani jātā | sārājāvutkṛṣṭasaṅgrāme mānāse paramānakṣepake mattāḥ sāragāḥ sotkarṣagatiśālino rājebhā rājadantino yatra | bhāriṇaḥ svāminārpitasamarabharāḥ ata eva yathocitaceṣṭāvantasteṣāṃ janānāṃ dhvaniḥ siṃhanādo yatreti kriyāviśeṣaṇamityanulomaślokārthaḥ | nidhvanantaḥ stananto javena vegena hāriṇa ibhā yatra | tato vistīrṇo mānavajārāsaḥ sainikakṛta ārāvaḥ kolāhalo yatra | mānijanānāṃ sāhaṃkārāṇāṃ vīrāṇāmāhavo dvandvayuddhaṃ yatra | īdṛśī senā rāgarasātparalakṣmīharaṇarasena tamo bheje krodhamavāpeti pratilomaślokārthaḥ ||

iha re ityādi | lāse nṛtye bahalā asaṃkucitā rāhumalīmasā śyāmā sālakā bhrūkarṇādiparabhāgārpakacūrṇakuntalavatī rasācchṛṅgārāllīlā yasyāḥ sā, tathā tuṅgā uccavyavahārā evaṃvidhā sā bālā he catuḥṣaṣṭikalārata, alāli lālitā tvayeti saṃskṛtaślokārthaḥ | kalā gītavādyanṛtyānāṃ saṃkarīkaraṇasahitā paṭīyasī gātuṃ taralā tvaritā sālālī nānāvṛkṣapaṅktistadīyena sarakeṇa madhunā alasā | śyāmā madhurālāpā selā uttamā nārī | ‘selā syāduttamā nārī’ iti deśīkośe | saha irayā madirayā vartante selā vā | ralayorekatvasmaraṇāditi kecit, taccintyam | alā bhūṣayitrī | hava dhaveti saṃbodhanam | rehaï rājate | prākṛtaślokārthaḥ | evaṃ bhāṣāntarāṇāmapi gatapratyāgatī boddhavye ||

lg.l: vigadaṃ gavi roddhāro yoddhā yo natimeti na || 305 ||’

div.p: vidita ityādi | vidite svarvāsināmapi prasiddhe nijitāḥ pareṣāmājayo yuddhāni yena tādṛśyanīke samare prāptaṃ gavi parāhvānarūpāyāṃ vāci vigadaṃ hṛdayajvararahitaṃ ke nāma bhaṭā yoddhāraḥ | na ke 'pi santītyarthaḥ | taṃ kam | yo yoddhā sankathamapi natiṃ namratāṃ naiti na yāti | atra tadarthaka eva pratilomaślokaḥ | sa yathā—‘natimeti na yoddhā yo roddhāro vigadaṃ gavi | nijitājinitaṃ yātaṅkenīke vidite divi' ||

bāletyādi | bālā ṣoḍaśavarṣadeśīyā śobhanakṛṣṇakeśī kāntipradacūrṇakuntalaśobhitā sasvā ātmasaṃpadyuktā sutavatī putrayuktā utkṛṣṭābhimānātmakaśṛṅgāravatī abhilaṣitasvavivāhādivratākāṅkṣā atastaṃ bhajasveti | hṛdaye iti śeṣaḥ || nyāsamāha—kramāditi | lalito manojñastīvraḥ pravīṇaḥ sva ātmā yasyāḥ | rāgeṇa premṇā tarpayati yā | śobhanadantayuktā | vardhitāvāsā saṃpūrṇīkṛtasakalasthānā | kālo bhṛṣāvyāhārastena saha vartate yā | tale lāsakā nartakā yasyāḥ sā tathābhūtā | adhaḥkṛtasakalanartakaloketyarthaḥ | evaṃbhūtā sā bālā tvayopabhukteti vākyārthaḥ ||
sasatveti | sadarāḥ sabhayāḥ | tvarādhikānāṃ kasannitastataḥ saṃcarannādo yatra | ata eva vīrānprati ramakatvamakarṣati ||

‘kanī dīptau’ | devānākanituṃ śīlaṃ yasya | kāvāda īṣadvādo yatra | kasya mastakasya sannā saṃgatā ādā grahaṇaṃ yatreti vā | vāhikā paryāyavahanam | ‘paryāyārhaṇotpattiṣu’ iti ṇvuc | saiva svaṃ vittabhūtā yeṣāmevaṃvidhā ye svakā ātmapakṣīyāstānājihīte iti vic | kaṃ madajalamākirati iti kākārastādṛśa ibhabharo hāstikaṃ yatra | he 'kākāḥ sāttvikā iti saṃbodhanam | kākāḥ saṅgrāmalolubhā vā | kvacitkartaryapi ghañū | niḥsvā nirātmāno bhavyā ādheyaguṇāstānapi vyayanti svabalenopabṛṃhayanti ye te nisvabhavyavyāsteṣāṃ bhasvani bhartsanaśīle | ‘bhasa bhartsane’ ityataḥ kvanip ||

jayada ityādi | natā indrādayo yasmai sa tathā | jagatāmedhana vardhana | candrābhālaṅghinī candrakāntivijayinī dantaprabhāṇāmāyatiryasya sa tathā || nyāsamāha—iheti | śikharamālāṃ saṃdhimālāṃ ca pūrvārdhavarṇaiḥ krameṇa bibhṛyātpūrayet | nemividhau cāparamuttarārdhaṃ bhramayet ||

dve śṛṅgāṭake mitho vaiparītyena yatra śikharaṃ dviśṛṅgāṭakam | karaiḥ kiraṇairāsañjayatīti karāsañjaḥ | khe vyomni gauravaṃ yasya sa tathā | vanātmaka jalasvarūpa | candrakalāsu rasamanurāgaṃ saṃdhāya kṛtvā antaḥsvacchatayā dṛśyanabhobhāganemimadvalayākārollekhinīṃ me mamāgaurīṃ śyāmāṃ śaṅkāmapanaya | sya iti kriyāpadam | pūrṇo bhaveti yāvat | vaśeśamāyattaśaṃkaramiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam || nyāsamāha—śrṛṅgāditi | śeṣākṣarairiti | ādyātkakārādārabhya yāvatsamāpti śeṣāṇyakṣarāṇi tairnemiriti nyāsaḥ | atra granthivarṇaireva ‘rājaśekharasya’ iti nāmāṅkavarṇāvalī labhyate ||

lg.l: sāraṃ paraṃ sa ca jayī śamitāsyandanenasā || 315 ||’

div.p:
viviḍitabandhastu pañcaśṛṅgacakram | taddevatāmnāye darśitam | ‘karpūrakundagaurīṃ tanumatanuṃ kārmukabhrūkām | varadānasundarakarāṃ viviḍitacakrasthitāṃ vande ||’ seti | prasiddhānubhāvā satī gaurī sarantī nirargalaprasarā na trasyatītyatrasā | asyandanena sthireṇa enasā kalmaṣeṇa śamitā viklavībhūtā | rahiteti yāvat | ‘śama vaiklavye' | atra jagati paraṃ sāraṃ yaṃ bhagavantamitā saṃgatā | sa ca jayī maheśvaro jayatāditi || nyāsamāha—śikharāditi | ‘anyatamādvā’ iti pāṭhaḥ | ‘anyatamasmāt’ iti pāṭhe tu sarvanāmatvaṃ cintyam | kecittu ‘kiṃyattadekānyebhyaḥ’ iti paṭhitvā ḍatama﻿-
dvārikāṃ sarvanāmatāmāhuḥ | gaṇe cānyataraśabdaṃ na paṭhanti | avyutpattimātraṃ cedam | anirdhāritaikābhidhāyakastvanyatamaśabdaḥ ||

namasta ityādi | jagatāṃ nāmarūpaprapañcasya gātrabhūta dānavakulakṣayeṇa sahita mudāṃ harṣāṇāṃ rakṣaka aja viṣṇo, atra jagati satāṃ madhye na ko 'pi te tava samaḥ | tato lakṣaya dṛkpātenānugṛhāṇa | māmiti śeṣaḥ || nyāsamāha—caturṣvapīti | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

l.seg: na nagāmikaraṃ divi sāramanāramaṇaṃ jaratāṃ na |
na namāmi ciraṃ savitāramanādimahaṃ jagatāṃ na || 319 ||’

div.p: kamalāvaliṣu padmakhaṇḍeṣu praśasteṣu hārī manojño yo vikāsa[viśeṣa]stasya vọdhāraṃ janairlokaiḥ stutyaṃ tadīyaṃ kaṃ śirastatrāṅka cihnabhūta, na nagāmikaraṃ, kiṃtu visṛtvarakiraṇameva divi vaimānikapathe sārabhūtaṃ jaratāṃ pariṇatānāmanāramaṇaṃ na, kiṃtu prītikarameva | tamasāṃ balahānau yo vilāsavaśaḥ saṃtato vyāpārastena varamutkṛṣṭaṃ, janakānta lokahṛdayaṃgama, jagatāmanādiṃ na, kiṃtvādimeva | evaṃvidhaṃ bhagavantaṃ savitāramahaṃ na namāmi kiṃtu namāmyeva || nyāsamāha—aṣṭādaśeti | ādyantairdṛṣṭāmiti | pādādyantavarṇayoraikyāditi bodhyam ||
anāratā avicchinnapraharaṇavyāpārā āsīt | mattadhīranāgamiti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | rasena vīreṇa | mahāprāṇaśabdajanā || atra nyāsamāha—atra pādeti | atra puṭacatuṣkakalpanayā murajatrayonmeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘surānana tvāṃ na na hānanaṣṭaye punaḥ stuve 'narghaghanaplavānanam |

div.p: surāṇāṃ devānāmānanaṃ mukhaṃ tadbhūta vahne | hānanaṣṭaye hānināśāya tvāṃ na na stuve, kiṃtu staumyeva | punariti devatāntaravyāvṛttau stutyāvṛttau vā | anarghye ghanaughaprāṇane yasmāt | ‘ana prāṇane’ iti dhātvanusārāt | praṇatānāṃ manasi yadanūnamanādibhavaparamparānupāti vyasanaṃ tasya pradhūnanaṃ pratikṣepakam | sakānaneṣu vanagahaneṣu sthāneṣu nadīnasya payorāśeriva nardanaṃ kolāhalo yasyeti || nyāsamāha—ślokasyaitasyeti | prathamapādasthādakṣarādārabhya caturthapādasthamakṣaraṃ yāvadekajātīyākṣaracatuṣkāvalīṃ gṛhītvā parāvṛtya tajjātīyānāmeva catuṣṭayī gṛhyate | tenaikamurajonmudraṇamaparatrāpyanenaiva prakāreṇātrodāharaṇe ekākṣaramurajatrayī bhavatīti nyāsārthaḥ ||

tālataroryatsāraṃ khādyabhāgastatprabhevāvadātā prabhā yasyāḥ | rākā pūrṇimā | tārakāpatinā candreṇa daṃśitā kavalitā | mārasya kāmasya dhāma sthānaṃ yatra | ramayā lakṣmyā adhītābhyastā | salakṣmīketyarthaḥ | valayāmāsa cālitavatī, balavantaṃ vā cakāra | ‘vinmatorluk’ ityanuśāsanāt ||—krameṇaiveti | turyācca pādaprathamākṣarādupakrame yena yena mārgeṇa murajākṛtirlabhyate tenāyamaparaḥ śloko bhavati || varasya īpsitasya vastunaḥ kāraḥ kāraṇaṃ tatpradaṃ tāraṃ dīptaṃ dhāma kāntiryasyāḥ | asamā ananyasādhāraṇī āsikā sthitiryasyāḥ sā nāyikā latāmālayā saṃketalatāmaṇḍapena amā sārdhaṃ āpa prāptavatī | tārā rohiṇīprabhṛtistadātmā, tārairnirmalamauktikairvā bhāti yā | atiśayitena rasena pūrṇā upagatā saṃgatā | prakṛtodāharaṇe 'ṣṭākṣaraprastāvāntaḥpātī yaḥ prakārastadantaḥpātī murajākṣarairlabhyate ||
udāharaṇamātraṃ caitat, tena gativicitrādigomūtrikādayo 'nye 'pi citraprakārā bhavanti |

nanu yāvadudāhṛtameva kiṃ gatyādi citraṃ, tathā sati kiṃ gomūtrikādīnāṃ pṛthagbhāgavibhāgavyāghātaḥ syādityata āha—udāharaṇamātraṃ caitaditi | gatiḥ paṭhitisaṃcāro varṇānāmuccāvacaṃ vorghvādhaḥparyāyeṇa pravṛttā | māyāṃ saṃsārabandhamapāsya duḥkhabhayātpāyāditi saṃbandhaḥ || nyāso yathā—ayugmataḥ prathamāttṛtīyā-
ccopakramya dvitīyacaturthapādasaṃdaṃśena gomūtrikayā prathamadvitīyayostṛtīyacaturthayośca parasparamunmeṣaṇamitīyamayukpādagomūtrikā ||

mahāsurajanena brahmādinā citte deyo dhāraṇīyaḥ | śamenaikena vikalīkṛta ibharaṇo gajānāmuruyuddhaṃ yena | śubhaṃ kalmaṣarahitaṃ cittaṃ vidhattām, aviśeṣeṇa saṃsāriṇāmeva | atra pūrvavatsamapadamupakramya viṣamapādasaṃdaṃśena samāptiriti viśeṣasteneyaṃ yukpādagomūtrikā ||

indorbhāgaḥ khaṇḍaṃ | śaṃ kalyāṇaṃ | amarajanatā devasamūhaḥ | nāstyanyaddhāma sthānaṃ yasya so 'nanyadhāmā | svātmārāma ityarthaḥ | na paraṃ devo devī ca | bhruvā bhrūkṣepeṇa durīrandūramapanayan no 'smākaṃ dehe damaṃ deyāditi saṃbandhaḥ | dhūteśabhāmā praṇayenāpahṛtaparameśvarapraṇayaroṣā | ‘bhāma krodhe’ iti dhātvanusārāt | dyusadanā devāḥ | aratamaviśrāntaṃ nandinā natā umā gaurī | apūrvaṃ dhāma tejo yasyāḥ ||

purākhyadānavasya davo dāvāgniḥ styānāyāḥ ghanāyāḥ saṃvido nidānam | daityādhīśenāndhakenānatacaraṇaḥ | bhavyānāmuttamānāṃ bhāvyo dhyeyaḥ | rūḍhakandānyaravindāni yasmāt | praṇatānāṃ ruganurāgo yasya | surāṇāṃ manujānāṃ ca damaṃ damatīti vā | tyāgasaṃpado nidhānamāśrayaḥ | diśāṃ kṣobhadāyikā śrīryasya | sade upavane sadarā sabhayā yā vadhūstadīyānāṃ khaṇḍanāgirāṃ nirbhartsanavacasāmaviṣayaḥ | adaityaidhī na daityavardhanaḥ | saṃsārabandhavicchittaye vistīrṇarayo nayo yasya | śaṃ sukhaṃ piparti pūrayatīti śaṃparo divyaḥ sevyaśceti | evaṃvidhaścaṇḍadhāmā ravirno 'smākaṃ dehe bhandaṃ kalyāṇaṃ deyādityarthaḥ ||

mandacaraṃ mandālasagamanam | kathāsu bhaktadevānāṃ vārtāsu mahāśayatayā smerānanam | vighnaparamparāhāriṇāṃ ca sāramutkṛṣṭam | calantīnāṃ latānāmārabdhaṃ sāntvanaṃ yena | bahuvipramānyaṃ dvijarājaśekharatvāt | samānavarṇamadhyagam | navena kambunạ̄dhyamupacitam | ādyaślokasyādhastādviparīto dvitīyaśloko lekhyaḥ | tataḥ kramagomūtrikayā parasparollekhaḥ ||

abhāgyasya radaṃ vilekhakam | nāśakamiti yāvat | samitau saṃgrāme rāvaṇasya kailāsoddharaṇabhagnaśaktikatāśāsanavikramāvājñāpauruṣe yena tam | vāñchitapradam | caṇḍamugraṃ kamraṃ kamanīyaṃ ca | pareṣāṃ darpamardanaśīlasya nāgasya kāliyākhyasya daṃṣṭrābhiḥ, kuvalayāpīḍākhyasya hastino vā viṣāṇābhyāṃ yā ājiḥ saṅgrāmaḥ tatrājayyaṃ jetumaśakyam | gadayā nānāratnakhacitayā karburam | citramiti yāvat ||

skandaḥ kārtikeyaḥ | rundāṃ vipulām | dārite śatrusamūhe saspandaḥ sphuradrūpo mandaḥ svasthacittaḥ bhavabhayasya saṃsāratrāsasya kalane kṣepaṇe ihajane martyaloke saṃdohena ya ullāghaḥ sāmarthyaṃ nīrogatvāttena lasanaśīlaḥ | balināṃ hantā | caṇḍatāyāstaikṣṇyasya bhūrāśrayaḥ | akharvaḥ sarveṣāmupari vartamānaḥ | devaujasāṃ rājñāṃ khaṇḍayitrī īhā ceṣṭā yatra tādṛśe mahimni nirataḥ ||

viharaṇe saṃcaraṇe saphalaḥ | udbhūtaḥ śubhāśubhasūcakatvāt | melikārī saṃgamakārī, cūḍāmaṇitvāt | aikyakārī vā, tanmūrtitvāt | kandodaṃ kumudamihābhimataṃ tadvikāsena lasanaśīlaḥ | jyotsnājalaughāndadat | vibhramāṇāṃ balena vihitā nije ātmani ratiryena sa tathā ||

lg.l: dehaṃ harantī sahasā surāmā gehaṃ carantī sahasābhirāmā || 335 ||’

div.p: vilāsāvaliṣu hārī hāso vikāso yasyāḥ | lolā calā | amalā nirmalā | bhāvānanekavidhānyā sahate sā bhāvasahā | hāvaḥ krīḍāviśeṣaḥ ||

divasānpūrayatīti divasapūraḥ tasmai | suṣṭhu tāmaraseṣu bhāsanaśīlāya | natā bhavyā yasmai | arīndārayatītyaridāraḥ | tataḥ karmadhārayaḥ | natānāṃ bhavyānāmaridāra iti vā, natā bhavyā aridārā yasminniti vā | suṣṭhu sāro layastatra layanaṃ taṃ bhāvayati yastasmai ||

natā divyā devā yasmai | asadavidyamānamari cakraṃ yasya | tataḥ karmadhārayaḥ | śobhanānāṃ sāmnāṃ lasanena bhāsanaśīlāya | bhāni nakṣatrāṇyāvarituṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti bhavāri ākāśaṃ pūrayati vyāpnoti evaṃbhūtāya | suṣṭhu tāra ucchrito yo rayo vego gamanaṃ tena bhāvine ||

mama sphuratviti | mama cidgato madīyāṃ saṃvidamārūḍhaḥ sāmaraḥ sadevo haraḥ sphuratu | satataṃ cintanīye rakṣāmatī vā yasya | samastairdvādaśabhirapi ravibhirādityaiścitritā ālekhyīkṛtā stutā praśastā ruciḥ kāntiryasya | smarasya kṣemaṃ kuśalaṃ kṛntati chinattīti smarakṣemakṛt | samaśabdaḥ sarvaparyāyo gaṇe paṭhyate | sarvāsu aṇimādyṛddhiṣu rataiścintitaḥ prasabhaṃ dhyātaḥ | pativiyogādvicitrāyā raterāmayāḥ kṛtā yena | namaskāreṇa cihnitā praṇāmapṛcchābhāvinī prasādajanmā smitaprabhā yasya sa tathā || asyā nyāsamāha—caturṇāmiti | krameṇa pādānāṃ nairantaryeṇa prathamadvitīyābhyāṃ dvitīyatṛtīyābhyāṃ prathamacaturthābhyāṃ dvitīyacaturthābhyāmiti vyutkramabhedāstrayo vaiparītyavaśena caturthāditaḥ prathamaṃ yāvadyojanenātrāpi kramavyutkramābhyāṃ ṣaṭ prakārāḥ | te 'mī dvādaśa bhedāḥ śuddhāḥ | eṣāṃ vyatikarajanmānaḥ punaranye caturviṃśatirbhavanti | tadyathā—prathamatṛtīyābhyāṃ ca prathamadvitīyābhyāṃ ca prathamacaturthābhyāṃ ca dvitīyatṛtīyābhyāṃ ca prathamacaturthābhyāṃ ca tṛtīyacaturthābhyāṃ ca prathamatṛtīyābhyāṃ ceti draṣṭavyam | tadevameka eva gomūtrikāśloko yathoktarītyā ṣaṭūtriṃśadgomūtrikātarṇakānprasūta itīyaṃ gomūtrikādhenuḥ ||

l.seg: devaiḥ stutyā kinnarageyā bhaktyā varacaritamahiṣamathanī jagattrayanāyikā |
dhīraiḥ pūjyā darpaṇapāṇirnūnaṃ guṇanilayalaṭabhalalitā satīṣu dhuraṃdharā ||’

div.p: vandyeti | vareṇa devatāprasādena carito nirargalaprasaro guṇānāmāśrayo laṭabhaṃ manojñaṃ ca lalitaṃ vilāso yasyāḥ sā tathā | yativicchedinīti | atra karaṇam—‘pratilomaṃ vinikṣepyamanulomamadhaḥ kṣipet | sthitenāgantukaṃ hanyādīpsitena vibhājayet ||’ sthitaṃ pratilomamāgantukaṃ kramavinyastamīpsitaṃ hi pratilomasya krameṇa phalaṃ guṇakārastathaivānulomaṃ bhāgahāraḥ | anena krameṇaikaikayatiyojane sapta ślokāḥ | yatidvikayojane caikaviṃśatiḥ | yatitrikayojane ca pañcatriṃśat | yaticatuṣkayojane 'pi tāvanta eva | yatipañcakayojane punarekaviṃśatiḥ | ṣaḍyatiyojane sapta | saptayatiyojane tvekaḥ | sarvamelanena ca saptaviṃśatyadhikaṃ śatam | atra ca kriyāhīnatvena kārakavihīnatvena ca padāvayavavattayā padāvayavamātratvena ca nirarthakān ṣaḍviṃśatimapāsya ślokadhenurekaiva vṛttabhedena śataṃ ślokatarṇakānprasūte | tathāhi | prathamadvitīyacaturthībhiryatibhiratyuktā jātiḥ | tṛtīyapañcamībhyāṃ supratiṣṭhā | ṣaṣṭhyā gāyatrī | saptamyā coṣṇigiti | ekagaṇanāyāṃ vṛttabhedaḥ | evaṃ dvikādigaṇane 'pi gaveṣaṇīyam ||

l.seg: maṇiśaśipadmakambucamarāḥ kariṇaḥ sutanoḥ sudhā ca hasitā hariṇāḥ |
phaṇigaṇasiddhasādhyadayitā na samāḥ sakalāstvayā ca khabhuvacchalitāḥ

div.p:
nakheti | he lalite gauri, tava śobhanayā dṛśā sutanoḥ śobhanasya śarīrasya | sādhyā devaviśeṣāḥ khabhuvo grahatārādyāḥ ( rāpyata iti rāpyam | ‘āsuvapirapitrapicamaśca’ iti rāpatibhāṣitamityarthaḥ |) daryeti pāṭhena vā yojanīyam | padavicchedinīti | padānyatra pratipādaṃ sudhākalaśābhidhāne chandasi ṣaḍ vibhajyante | yadyapi dvitīyatṛtīyapādayoścakārābhyāṃ nakāreṇa caturthapāde taveti
padādhikyaṃ tathāpyādyapadārthānurodhena samuccīyamānaniṣidhyamānārthānurañjakatvena saṃbodhyamānārthānuyāyitayā cakāranakārayostaveti ca tatpādāvayavarūpā eveti tadasatkalpameva | tathā ca ṣaḍbhyaḥ padatraya upādīyamāne saptadaśākṣarāyāṃ jātau yathāsaṃkhyānurodhenādye 'rdhe prastāraracanākrameṇa daśa vikalpāḥ, tṛtīyacaturthayośca pādayostāvantastāvanta eveti daśabhirāhatairdaśabhiḥ śatam | śatena cāhatairdaśabhiḥ sahasraṃ tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyanta itīyaṃ sahasradhenuḥ ||

l.seg: stuṣe mṛṣasi mṛṣyase hṛṣasi pīyase prīyase |
stuṣe mṛṣasi hoḍase kuṭasi galbhase klībase
hnuṣe harasi rajyase rajasi rājase bhrājase || 341 ||’

div.p: kriye iti | he kriye karman | ‘miṣa spardhāyām’, ‘pīṅ pāne’, ‘mṛḍa sukhane’ tudādau, ‘hoḍṛ anādare’, ‘kuḍa saṃhāre’, rajyase āsajasi | rajasi matsarayasi | rājase śobhase | bhrājase jājvalyase | eṣeti | iha pṛthvīnāmani chandasi ṣaḍbhyaḥ saṃbodhanānuge padacatuṣṭaye upādīyamāne ekādaśākṣarāyāṃ jātau prastārālpatvena yadi vā chandobhedasya śabdenāpratipāditatvāt tadbhedo 'pyudāharaṇīya iti tasyāmeva rathoddhatābhidhāne chandasi daśasu vikalpeṣu pratipādaṃ bhavatsu daśabhiḥ śataṃ śatena sahasraṃ sahasreṇa ca daśasahasrāṇi tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyante itīyamayutadhenuḥ ||

l.seg: nitye hṛdye vareṇye kalikamalikale kālike caṇḍi caṇḍe |
dhanye puṇye śaraṇye śaci śabari śive bhairave rājñi sandhye
chāye māye manojñe 'vani janani jaye maṅgale dhehi śaṃ naḥ || 342 ||’

div.p: durge iti | saṃbodhanairiti | atra hi sragdharābhidhāne chandasi pādatrayapadānurodhenāntyapādadvayenaikaikameva padaṃ turyapāde parikalpyamiti sarvatra navasu padeṣu sthiteṣu padacatuṣṭaye padapañcake copādīyamāne prathame āpātalikāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatau dvitīye ekayā prācyavṛttyā saha vaitālīyake yadi vā pañcabhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ samamaupacchandasike caturviṃśatau tṛtīyavaitālīya eva caturviṃśatau caturthe ca pāde prācyavṛttidvaye samamāpātalikāyāṃ ṣoḍaśabhirekayā prācyavṛttyā vaitālīyaprācyavṛttyā saha vaitālīyaiḥ ṣaṅbhistathaivaupacchandasike dvābhyāmiti caturviṃśatau vikalpeṣu prabhavatsu pañcaviṃśatyāhateṣu caturviṃśatau śatāni ṣaṭ | ṣaṅbhiśca śatairāhateṣu pañcaviṃśatau sahasrāṇi pañcadaśa | tairāhateṣu caturviṃśatau lakṣāṇi trīṇi sahasrāṇi ca ṣaṣṭiḥ tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyanta itīyaṃ lakṣadhenuḥ | eṣeti | tathā hyatra pādatraye navasu turyapāde ca daśasu | traye padacatuṣke padapañcake copādīyamāne prathama aupacchandasika ekasya padasya dviruktyā viṃśatau yadi vā āpātalikāyāṃ daśa | vaitālīye pañcadaśasu aupacchandasike udīcyavṛttidvayena yad vaitālīye catasṛbhirudīcyavṛttibhiḥ samamekonaviṃśatiriti ca pañcaviṃśatau tṛtīyasminnaupacchandasike pañcabhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ samamekādaśa | vetālīye tathaiva caturdaśa aupacchandasike tisṛbhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ saha ṣaḍiti viṃśatau tṛtīyāsminnaupacchandasike tisṛbhirudīcyavṛttibhiḥ samaṃ pañcaviṃśatau caturthe tvāpātalikāyāmeka eva | dviruktyādinā ṣoḍaśabhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ samamaśītau vikalpeṣu prabhavatsu viṃśatyāhatapañcaviṃśatau pañcaviṃśatyā dvāviṃśatau pañcaśatādhikāni dvādaśasahasrāṇi tairapyāhateṣu aśītau daśalakṣāṇi tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyanta itīyaṃ prayutadhenuḥ ||

l.seg: ‘sthūlaṃ datse sūkṣmaṃ dhatse bhuvi bhavasi rabhasi ramase rame divi modase
chintse bāḍhaṃ bhintse gāḍhaṃ ruṣimiṣasi dhanuṣi manuṣe jaye puri jṛmbhase |
svalpaṃ śeṣe kalpaṃ preṣe 'citi carasi yaśasi yatase cale yudhi galbhase
brūṣe vāmaṃ śrūṣe kāmaṃ hṛdi viśasi vacasi sacase ruce dṛśi dīpyase ||’

div.p: sthūlamiti | preṣa iti iṣa gatāvityasya, citi caitanye, gṛdhu gārghye | sacase vacase rame jaye cale ruce iti devyāḥ saṃbodhanapadāni | saṃbodhanairiti | atra bhuñjaṅgavijṛmbhite chandasi ekādaśabhyaḥ padebhyaḥ pañcasu ṣaṭsu ca padeṣu upādīyamāneṣu jagatījātau prasiddhākṣarojjvalā jaladharamālā navamālinī chandaḥsu saptatau | dvitīye pūrveṣu candravartmadrutavilambitamaṇimālāprabhavatsu ca śate tṛtīye 'smin prathamapādacchandasyeva pañcāśati caturthapāde dvitīyapādacchandasyeva śateṣu vikalpeṣu prabhavratsu saptatyāhateṣu śateṣu saptatisahasrāṇi śatairāhatāyāṃ saptatilakṣāṇi, saptatisahasraiṃrāhateṣu pañcāśallakṣāṇi trīṇi sahasrāṇi ca pañcaśatairāhate śate koṭyastisraḥ sārdhāstarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ saṃpadyanta itīyaṃ koṭidhenuḥ | yadā tviti | tathāhi padatraye padacatuṣke padapañcake copādīyamāne pūrvasyāmeva jātau prathamadvitīyacaturtheṣu pādeṣu pratyekaṃ jaladharamālāprabhācchandasorekasya dvayordviruktyā śate tṛtīyasmiṃśca pūrvasyāṃ maṇimālojjvalānavamālinītāmaraseṣu chandaḥsu tathaiva śate vikalpeṣu prabhavatsu śatenāhate śate daśa sahasrāṇi taiścāhate śate daśa lakṣāṇi tairapyāhate śate koṭyastarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ saṃpadyanta itīyameva daśakoṭidhenuḥ ||

lg.l: ‘yā gīḥ śīḥ śrīrdhī strī hrīrbhīrjūrmūstūḥ sūḥ strūrdhūḥ pūrbhūḥ |
struk sragyugbhugruk śuk tṛṭ dviṭ yut krut cidvinmugdigdyūḥ || 344 ||’

div.p: ṛk dṛk vāmā mṛtkṛdbhāmā mutkṣutkāmā dvārdyaurgauḥ

yānaṃ yātīti yā, kācicca yā | giraṇaṃ giratīti vākū ca gīḥ | śaraṇaṃ
śīḥ śrṛṇātīti śīḥ | śrayatīti śobhā lakṣmīśca śrīḥ | dhyānaṃ dhyāyatīti buddhirdhīḥ | stryeva stṛṇāti mantrākṣaraṃ strī | hrīcchatīti māyā lajjā ca hrīḥ | bibhetīti bhayakāmo bhayaṃ ca bhīḥ | jvaro gatirjarā ca jūḥ | mūrcchā mohasamucchrāyayorbandhanaṃ ca mūḥ | tvarā hiṃsā tvarate ca tūḥ | sūyate savanaṃ suṣṭhu uśca sūḥ | agre bhāge bhāraṃ dhuraṃ vahatīti dhūḥ | pūrī pālanaṃ pūraṇaṃ ca pūḥ | bhūmirbhavanaṃ lokaśca bhūḥ | yajñapātraṃ sravatīti sravaṇaṃ sruk | puṣpamālā paṅktaśca sṛjyata iti srak | yogaḥ samādhiḥ samaśca yuk | bhojanaṃ pālanaṃ kauṭilyaṃ ca bhuk rogo dīptirbhaṅgaśca ruk | śokaḥ śucitvaṃ dīptiśca śuk | abhilāṣaḥ pipāsā | hiṃsā ca tṛṭ | dveṣaḥ śatrubalamabhilāṣaśca dviṭ | śuddhaṃ miśraṇamamiśraṇaṃ ca yut | krodhaḥ krudhyatīti rudraśaktiśca krut | cetanā cinoti cayanaṃ ca cit | jñānaṃ sattā vibhavalābhaśca vit | mokṣo moho muñcatīti muk | āśā atisarga upadeśaśca dik | krīḍā vijigīṣā vyavahāraśca dyūḥ | śrutivākyaṃ vivecanaṃ ca hiṃsā ca ṛk | dṛṣṭirjñānaṃ paśyatīti dṛk | gatirgandhanaṃ vikalpaśca vā | lakṣmīrmānaṃ śabdāvayavaśca mā | mṛttikā maraṇaṃ mudnātīti mṛt | kṛntati karoti karaṇaṃ ca kṛt | dīptirbhānaṃ bhātīti bhā | śabdaḥ śabdāvayavaśca pratiṣedhaśca mā | harṣo moda āmodaśca mut | bubhukṣā kṣutkṣodaśca kṣut | praśnaḥ sukhaṃ kānanaṃ ca kā | amatītyamā pīḍārthe 'lakṣmīśabdāvayakśca amā | dvāraṃ dvāḥstha upāyaśca dvāḥ | svarga ākāśo devanaṃ ca dyauḥ | vāgbhūmirdhenuśca gauḥ | saha ena akāreṇa viṣṇunā vartata iti sā lakṣmīḥ | mā mānaṃ | tado rūpaṃ ca sā | pratidānaṃ śabdāvayavaśca sarvanāma ca sā | iṣṭā ayata iti śabdāvayavaśca yā | candrakalā mahadarthaśca mā | lakṣmīsaṃbodhanaṃ caturthyantaṃ ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ ca me | dhāraṇaṃ poṣaṇaṃ śabdāvayavaśca ve | dhātrī poṣayitrī śabdāvayavaśca dhā | śabdāvayavo 'smadartho lakṣmīsaṃbodhanaṃ ca me | pratiṣedhaḥ puruṣavācī
śabdāvayavaśca nā | mimīte māteti śabdāvayavaśca mā | tadartho yuṣmadarthaśca lakṣmīsaṃbodhanaṃ ca te | yuṣmadartho bhāvapratyayaḥ śabdāvayavaśca tvam | śabdāvayavāsmadarthau ca me | jalayānaṃ na vidyate aurdvivacanaṃ yasyāṃ sā advitīyetyarthaḥ śabdāvayavaśca nauḥ |

yā gīriti | padagrahāditi | tathāhi pañcadaśabhyaḥ padebhyaḥ kramavyutkramābhyāṃ navādipadayoge 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe bṛhatījāterārabhya pratijātipāde ye vikalpāstairuttarottaramāhanyamānaiḥ, yadi vā samaste 'pi śloke ṣaṣṭipadebhyaścaturviṃśatyaṣṭāviṃśatyādipadayojanāyāṃ gāyatrījāterārabhya praṃtijātipāde ye vikalpāstaiḥ parārdhebhyaḥ parārdhāni tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyante itīyaṃ parārdhaparārdhadhenuḥ | ekākṣareti | arthatrayapratipādakatvena pratipādaṃ padatraye parikalpyamāne 'nekavidhacchandobhiruktāni caturvyañjanādīnyanuktāni khaṅgaprabhṛtīni sarvacitrāṇyeṣaiva yathākāmaṃ prasūyata ityarthaḥ ||
tāsu ṛjūktirdvidhā | grāmyopanāgarikā ca | grāmyā yathā—

lg.l: mahomi bhāruñcule mellāsato vikiṇaku uvāṇaü ujju akkhu kahahi 345

l.seg: karaï valivaṃ uu ca vakkasa macchalu

div.p: seyamubhayato 'pi ṛjunaiva mārgeṇoktipratyuktyoḥ samā pravṛttiritīyamṛjūktirnāma vākovākyam ||

l.seg: ‘bāle, nātha, vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ, roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ,
khedo 'smāsu, na me 'parādhyati bhavān sarve 'parādhā mayi |
tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā, kasyāgrato rudyate,
nanvetanmama, kā tavāsmi, dayitā, nāsmītyato rudyate || 347 ||’

div.p: vakroktirdvidhā | nirvyụ̄dhā anirvyụ̄dhā ca | tayornirvyụ̄dhā yathā—

l.seg: ‘kiṃ gauri māṃ prati ruṣā nanu gaurahaṃ kiṃ
mevaṃ prokto bhavānyā prativacanajaḍaḥ pātu vo manmathāriḥ || 349 ||’

div.p: seyamanirvāhādanirvyụ̄dheti vakroktirnāma vākovākyam | te ime ubhe api śleṣavakroktirnāma vākovākyam ||
vaiyātyoktirdvidhā | svābhāvikī naimittikī ceti | tayoḥ svābhāvikī yathā—

l.seg: satyaṃ nāma pibāmi katyapatṛṣaḥ pītena nāmnābhavan |
kiṃ varṇā api santi nāmni rahitaṃ kiṃ tairalaṃ tvaṃ kuto

lg.l: ‘kuśalaṃ rādhe, sukhito 'si kaṃsa kaṃsaḥ kva nu sā rādhā |

div.p: atra gotraskhalite vipakṣanāmnaiva vaiyātyenottaraṃ dattamiti naimittikīyaṃ vaiyātyoktirvākovākyam ||
gụ̄dhoktirdvidhā | mukhyā gauṇī ca | tayormukhyā yathā—
atra priye haṃsa ityatrāvarṇalope priye ahaṃ sa ityarthasya mukhyayaiva vṛttyā gūḍhatvādiyaṃ mukhyā gụ̄dhoktirnāma vākovākyam ||

lg.l: ‘nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yayā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam |
utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva kṛtā vinidrā nalinī na yena || 353 ||’

div.p: tāvimau pūrvottarārdhayoranyonyoktyā gūḍhakāmalekhāvitīyaṃ gauṇī gụ̄dhoktirnāma vākovākyam ||
praśnottaroktirdvidhā | avidhīyamānahṛdyā pratīyamānahṛdyā ca | tayorādyā yathā—

l.seg: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle

div.p: citroktirdvidhā | citrā vicitrā ca | tayościtrā yathā—
tadidaṃ svakalpitoktipratyuktibhyāṃ jīvato 'pi janmāntarāvāptisādhanenāścaryaheturiti citrā nāma citroktipratyuktirvākovākyam ||

l.seg: ‘ko 'yaṃ bhāmini bhūṣaṇaṃ kitava te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ kuṅkumā-
tkūrpāsāntaritaḥ priye vinimayaḥ paśyāparaṃ kvāsti me |

lg.l: padamekaṃ na kā yāti yadi hāreṇa varjitā || 358 ||’

div.p: atra vihaṅgikā kāhāreṇa varjitā na yātīti vaktavye hāreṇa varjitetyuktam | ataḥ kā ityakṣarasya cyutatvāccyutākṣareyam ||
atra śabara iti śambara ityanusvārākṣarasya dattatvāddattākṣareyam ||

lg.l: tanvaṅgyāliṅgitaḥ kaṇṭhe kalaṃ kūjati ko viṭaḥ || 360 ||’

div.p: atra viṭa ityasminpade vikāre cyute ghakāre datte ghaṭaḥ kūjatīti dvitīyo 'rtho bhavatīti seyaṃ cyutadattākṣarā ||

lg.l: ‘atiḥ atiḥ anmaalaṃ prīdya radya jadya phadya |
melā melā melaṃ melaṃ phasa phasa phasa phasa || 361 ||’

div.p: seyamakṣarāṇāṃ muṣṭirityakṣaramuṣṭikā | atra pādaśaścatuḥpaṅktilikhitacaturbhirmurajabandhaiḥ śloka uttiṣṭhati | tadyathā—

lg.l: ‘adya me saphalā prītiradya me saphalā ratiḥ |
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ phalam || 362 ||’
phalaṃ pratyadbhutopāyaṃ yaśāṃsi natu na kvacit || 363 ||’

div.p: ityanena ślokenoktārthasya yathāsthitasvarānusvāravisarjanīyasaṃyogasya ślokottarasya bindubhireva sūcanākrama iti bindumatī | tadyathā—

lg.l: sāhase sāhase siddhiḥ sarvatra tava kīrtayaḥ || 364 ||

div.p: atra jaghanabharābhirāmamandaṃ madirekṣaṇāyā gamanamavalokayanto he yuvānaḥ, kathamiva yūyaṃ madanaśarajvarajarjarā na stheti kriyāpadasya stanaśabdena jaghanasāṃnidhyādgopitena kriyāgūḍhamidam ||
atra na me āgorasābhijñaṃ ceta iti saṃbandhipadasya mayeti tṛtīyābhrāntyā gopitatvādidaṃ saṃbandhagūḍham ||
atra pūrvārdhasthitairdvitīyaprathamasaptamapañcamaikādaśanavamatrayodaśaṣoḍaśākṣaraiścaturthapādo gūḍha utthāpyaḥ | yathā—‘vidyutāmiva saṃhatiḥ’ iti | idaṃ pādagūḍham ||

lg.l: ‘jaï deareṇa bhaṇiā khaggaṃ ghettūṇa rāulaṃ vacca |
tā kiṃ sevaavahue hasiūṇa valoiaṃ saaṇam || 370 ||’
[yadi devareṇa bhaṇitā khaṅge gṛhītvā rājakulaṃ vraja |

div.p: atra nirīkṣitamanenātra puruṣāyitalakṣma pādalākṣādikaṃ, tena niyuṅkte māṃ na karmaṇītyabhiprāyeṇa vadhvāḥ śayanāvalokanamityabhiprāyagūḍham ||

lg.l: yadi dāsyasi necchāmi no dāsyasi pibāmyaham || 371 ||’

div.p: atra dāsyasīti dāsīlakṣaṇasya vastuno gūḍhatvādidaṃ vastugūḍham ||

lg.l: vidagdhagoṣṭhyāṃ vākyairvā taṃ hi praśnottaraṃ viduḥ || 136 ||

div.p: atra ‘kadarthayasi’ iti padaṃ kathamuktaṃ rephayakārayuktaṃ darthayasīti, ato vākyāntare praśnottarasyoktatvādantaḥpraśnamidam ||
atra ‘vāyutaḥ’ ityuttareṇa praśnādbahiruktena vāyuto naro vānaro bhavati, subhadropayantāpyucyate | tenaitadbahirantaḥpraśnaṃ bhavati ||
'haimavāra karañjinā’ ‘nājiraṃ karavāmahai’ ityuttarābhyāṃ gatapratyāgatābhyāṃ praśnottarajātirabhidhīyate | tena jātipraśnamidam ||

lg.l: ‘ko so joaṇavāo ko daṇḍāṇaṃ duve sahassāiṃ |
kā kālī kā madhurā kiṃ śukapṛthukānanacchāyam || 376 ||’

div.p: atra ya eva praśnāḥ kaḥ sa yojanapādaḥ kaḥ sa yo daṇḍānāṃ dve sahasre ityādayaḥ ta eva ‘krośo yojanapādaḥ’ ‘kodaṇḍānāṃ dve sahasre’ ityādīnyuttarāṇi bhavanti | evaṃ ‘kā kālī kā madhurā kiṃ śukapṛthukānanacchāyam’ ityuttaraṃ kimabhihitaśeṣasya praṣṭavyamiti pṛṣṭapraśnam ||
atra praśnasya he kānanāda he timirāda pikālītyetadevottaraṃ bhavatītyuttarapraśnamidam ||

lg.l: yadvidhau ca niṣedhe ca vyutpattereva kāraṇam |
kāvyaṃ śāstretihāsau ca kāvyaśāstraṃ tathaiva ca |
‘yadi smarāmi tāṃ tanvīṃ jīvitāśā kuto mama |
bhayābhdrāntaiḥ suraiścakre tasyai tasyai diśe namaḥ || 380 ||’
‘dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha |
ākṣiptikā dhruvā ceti śeṣo dhyeyaṃ bhaviṣyati || 141 ||

div.p: atrāśaṃsāyāṃ liṅ loṭ ca | tadidaṃ vākyadvayamāśīḥ ||

l.seg: aṇṇāṇaṃ pi paraṃ paaṭṭhadu varā vāṇī chaïllappiā |
vacchobhī taha māahī phuradu ṇo sā kiṃ a pañcāliā
rīdīyo vilihantu kavvakusalā joṇhaṃ caorā via 385
vaidarbhī tathā māgadhī sphuratu naḥ sā kiṃ ca pāñcālikā
rītikā vilihantu kāvyakuśalā jyotsnāṃ cakorā iva ||]

div.p: so 'yaṃ kathāśarīravyāpino vastuno nāyakasya nirdeśo vastunirdeśaḥ ||

lg.l: tallāsyaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ caiva chalikaṃ saṃpayā saha |
hallīsakaṃ ca rāsaṃ ca ṣaṭprakāraṃ pracakṣate || 143 ||
jaliu jāṇaï ṇaru riusantāvaṇu aṇalasariccha jaï hoi mahāraṇu 391’
jvalito jāyate naro ripusaṃtāpano 'nalasadṛśo yadi bhavati mahāraṇaḥ ||]
ṇiakantaṃ ḍāḍhajualehiṃ puṇu puṇu ṇa a balanti || 392 ||’
nijakāntaṃ daṃṣṭrāyugalena punaḥ punarna ca daśati ||]
‘vīhesi harimuhi avi hohi maṃ gale lehi saï |
[vibheṣi harimukhi api bhava māṃ ca gale gṛhāṇa sadā |
durmanasāṃ durmanaskaṃ saṃkrāmitamaṇḍanaṃ māninyānanaṃ kiṃ tava karasthitam ||]
maṇḍalena tu yatstrīṇāṃ nṛtyaṃ hallīsakaṃ tu tat |
jeṇa jivijjaï jeṇa vilāso palihijjaï kīsa jaṇo 395
[ayi durmanaska adya kiṃ no pṛcchāmi tvām |
yena jīvyate yena vilāsaḥ parihriyate kimiti janaḥ ||]

l.seg: ‘dordaṇḍāḥ kva dhṛtāṅgadāḥ kva nu śirānaddhau bhujau dvāvimau
vakrāṇi kva nu kāntimanti balimatkvedaṃ mamaikaṃ mukham |
helākampitabhūdharaḥ kva caraṇanyāsaḥ kva mandā gatiḥ 396’
tkrodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām 400’>

div.trailer: iti śrīrājādhirājabhojadevenaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇanāmni alaṃkāraśāstre 'laṃkāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ |

div.p: alamarthamiti | viśiṣṭā utpattirvyutpattirjāteravacchedakaḥ prakāraḥ | ādiśabdādvividhaśaktipratibandhādayo vibhāvanādyavacchedāstrayoviṃśatiḥ | arthālaṃkārasaṃjñayeti | arthaśobhānivṛttiheturvicchittirarthālaṃkāra iti sphuṭalakṣaṇam ||
pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdārthāpattyabhāvākhyāni jaimineḥ pramāṇāni ṣaṭ | tenaiva krameṇa lakṣaṇānyākhyātuṃ pratyakṣapūrvāṇītyuktam | sāhityasya sarvapariṣadyatvannānādarśanarītyupajīvanamucitameva ||
nāstyevāsavarthālaṃkāro yaḥ svarūpaṃ nāśrayata iti prāthamyaṃ jāterevetyāha—

teṣviti | kālakṛto viśeṣo 'vasthā | tāmadhikṛtya jāyante vastusvarūpavyabhicāriṇyutpadyante | nanvevaṃ ‘ya ete yajjvānaḥ prathitamahaso ye 'pyavanipā mṛgākṣyo yāścaitāḥ kṛtamaparasaṃsārakathayā | aho ye cāpyanye phalakusumanamrā viṭapino jagatyevaṃrūpā vilasati mṛdeṣā bhagavatī ||’ ityādāvapi jātitvaṃ syādityata āha—svebhyaḥ svebhya iti | svabhāvabhūtānītyarthaḥ | kavipratibhāmātraprakāśanīyarūpoṭṭaṅkanaṃ jātiriti lakṣaṇam | laukikavikalpaviṣayo 'pi pratibhayā bhāsata eva | yadāha— ‘rasānuguṇaśabdārthacintāstimicacetasaḥ | kṣaṇaṃ viśeṣasparśotthā prajñaiva pratibhā kaveḥ | sa hi cakṣurbhagavatastṛtīyamiti gīyate | yena sākṣātkarotyeṣa bhāvāṃstrailokyavartinaḥ ||’ iti ||

arthavyakteriti | vastusvarūpollekhanarūpārthavyaktirarthaguṇeṣūktā | tatra sārvakālikaṃ rūpamupajanāpāyāntarālavyāpakamityarthaḥ | atra tu jāyamānamāgantunimittaṃ samavadhānaprabhavaṃ vyabhicaritamityarthaḥ | vicchittiprakārayorasaṃkarātpṛthakśobhārpaṇācca yukto vyatirekastena svabhāvoktirevārthavyaktiriti yatkenaciduktaṃ tadapāstam | ata eva jātyantaraprakārāṇāmapi pṛthagalaṃkāratā syāditi na yuktamavāntaravacasaiva vyāghātāt | na hi sāmānyaviśeṣayorvibhāgo bhavati ||

svarūpamiti | āśrayaviśeṣahetuviśeṣavyatirikto 'vacchedakaprakāraḥ svarūpam | etadeva vibhajate—te saṃsthānādaya iti | nanu kimanena prapañcena pūrvābhihi-
tarūpamātrasyaiva jātitvādityata āha—teṣu seti | viśeṣeṇa śobhāhetureva hyalaṃkāraḥ | asti cātra tathābhāva iti bhāvaḥ ||
tatra svarūpaṃ dvidhā | śarīrāvayavasaṃniveśalakṣaṇamatādṛśaṃ ca | ādyamapi buddhi- kāritamatathābhūtaṃ ca | tadetadāha—

lg.l: deśaḥ kālaśca śaktiśca sādhanāni ca hetavaḥ || 8 ||

div.p: śaktiḥ padārthānāṃ sāmarthyam | sādhanāni kartrādīni ṣaṭ ||
atra dhanurdhareṇaivamaṅgāni samyagbuddhipūrvakaṃ sthāpanīyānīti saṃsthānamidaṃ jātibhedaḥ ||

atra dhanurdhareṇeti | taduktam—‘apāṅge dakṣiṇāṃ muṣṭiṃ vāmāṃ vinyasya mastake | pādamākuñcayedvāmaṃ lakṣye niścalalocanaḥ ||’ iti | atra sarvasyaiva dhanurdharasyaivaṃvidhaśarīrāvayavasaṃniveśo bhavati na kāmasyaiveti nāśrayaviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ | evamuttaratrāpi ||
atra striyāḥ śūlaprollāsanādau vyāpāre buddhikāritamapi śarīrāvasthānamīdṛśaṃ jāyata itīdamavasthānaṃ nāma jātibhedaḥ ||

pādāvaṣṭambheti | ullasadbāhumūlamiti prollasanakriyāviśeṣaṇam | saralitavapuṣa iti madhyabhāgaviśeṣaṇam | ata eva valīnāṃ viśleṣo mitho vibhāgaḥ upariśarīrākarṣaṇātkañcukaprāntāpasaraṇam | musalollāsanādau dṛṣṭamidamabuddhijameva nārīṇāṃ rūpamiti bhagavatīviṣaye pratibimbanamatisphuṭameva | tadāha—ādāviti ||

lg.l: ‘kassa kaa cūamañjari putti tue maṇḍio gāmo || 3 ||
kasyakṛte cūtamañjari putri tvayā maṇḍito grāmaḥ ||]

div.p: atra vasantotsave grāmataruṇīnāmayaṃ veṣo janamanaḥpramodāya jāyata iti veṣo nāmāyaṃ jātibhedaḥ ||

atra vasantotsava iti | yadyapyatra kālaḥ pātraṃ cāsti tathāpi ‘saṃvāllaṇamaülijhavivaraürāhaïambiraïaüṇa tālaṅkam | siṭilāantaṃ savaṇā arambhisāreha ekkāvi ||’ ityādau na saṃkaraḥ kādācitkastvasau guṇa eva veṣasya kathaṃ rañjakatetyavaśiṣyate | tatrāha—janamanaḥpramodāyeti | rucyarthitvamutpattīnāṃ pratipakṣagatānāmakṣuṇṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
atra tādṛśi vyāpāre vyāpṛtānāmīdṛśameva svarūpaṃ jāyata iti vyāpāranāmāyaṃ jātibhedaḥ ||

agre gateneti | atrodbāhuneti yadyapyavasthānamasti tathāpi tatparihāreṇodāharaṇabhasaṃkīrṇam | ‘sahiāhi bhammamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusumbhapupphaṃ ti | muddhavahuā hasijjaï papphoḍantī ṇahavaāham ||’ ityatraikasyāḥ kadācidvitarkāyedamapi vākyaṃ bahūnāṃ tu neti bahuvacanasvarasaḥ | kusumbhakesarāṇyuccetuṃ vāraṃvāramasau kṣetraṃ praviśatīti saṃbhāvanā | mugdhā apariśīlitābhimānikasukhā vadhūḥ prathamapariṇītā | prasphoṭyamānāmapi tvayā nāpasaratītyaho tava saukumāryamiti cāṭugarbhaṃ hasitam | ata eva priyatamā tasyānubandho vartamānanirdeśena vyajyate | evadagrimodāharaṇavyākhyāne kriyāvyāpāragrahaṇamupalakṣaṇato na vyāpārasaṃkaraḥ | anye tvāhuḥ āśrayāvacchedena bahirbhāvo 'tra bhedaheturiti ||

lị̄dheti | vyastaṃ vigatarudhiram | sāvajñaṃ tiryak valantī ye sṛkkiṇī tābhyāmāhatā iti saṃbandhaḥ | yathaikatra kuñje svapataḥ svarūpaṃ tathānyatrāpīti bahuvacanarahasyam | ata eva na deśahetuśaṅkā | atra siṃheti | madavāsanayā viśeṣitatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||

l.seg: sthāne rūpamanuttamaṃ sukṛtinā dānena karṇo jitaḥ |
ityālocya ciraṃ dṛśā karuṇayā śītātureṇa stutaḥ

div.p: bhadraṃ ta iti | karuṇākārpaṇyavyañjakaviśeṣaśālinī | garvāyate agarvavāneva garvavānbhavati | bhṛśādau lakṣatvādermatvarthalakṣaṇatvāt ||
atra vindhyādrerīdṛśeṣu pradeśeṣvitthaṃbhūtā vāyavo vāntīti hetutvenoktatvāddeśasya deśaheturjātiriyam ||

imāstā iti | deśaviśeṣamuddiśya marutāṃ vidhānamuddeśyasya ca vidhau hetubhāvaḥ | vaṃśīvanānāṃ duṣpraveśatayā marutāṃ mandībhāvo dviradaistarubhaṅgādavakāśalābhe pragalbha- tvamataḥ klamasvedāpanayanasāmarthyametatsarvamāha—atra vindhyādreriti ||

l.seg: tsvānyaṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotumākāṅkṣati || 10 ||’

div.p: gojāvikamiti | ‘vibhāṣāvṛkṣamṛga 2|4|12’ ityādinā pākṣika ekavadbhāvaḥ | atra hemanteti | yadyapi tiryagāśrayeyaṃ jātiḥ tathāpi hetoradhikasya praveśātpṛthagbhāvaḥ | saṃkarastu na duṣyati ||
romāñcabandhādiṣviti | badhnannityādau śatṛpratyayena kartābhidhīyate | sa ca sāmānādhikaraṇyātsparśa eva | sparśatvāviśeṣe tu śaktireva prayojikā vācyetyarthaḥ ||
atra jāyamānakriyāhetubhūtayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ sādhanayoḥ svarūpavarṇanādayaṃ sādhanaheturnāma jātibhedaḥ ||
upanihiteti | agāradvārasya halīśāvaruddhatayā duṣpraveśatvamata eva bahiściraṃ vilambāt pratyeṣaṇaveśanayorvartamānatā | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam | tena karaṇādayo 'pyudāhāryāḥ ||
pakṣe svabhāvaparyavasānamastīti jāteḥ kiṃcidapakṛṣṭāṃ vibhāvanāṃ vibhāvayitumāha—

lg.l: yatra svābhāvikaṃ vāpi vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā || 9 ||
śuddhā citrā vicitrā ca vividhā sā nigadyate |

div.p: prasiddheti | prasiddhasparśahetorvibhāvyatayā prasiddhagrahaṇaṃ niyamena tadbhāvāpattimūlatvaṃ cāsyāstena virodhaḥ | tathā hi ‘ṇamaha avaṭṭhiatuṅga—’ ityādau vardhanajanyamanyadeva tuṅgatvamanyacca pārameśvaramājānikamiti tayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ | eta- devābhisaṃdhāya kāśmīrakairatiśayoktirasyā mūlamuktā | yaditi nipāto yatrārthe | yadyapi kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryotpattirityeva lakṣaṇaṃ tathāpi mahāsaṃjñākaraṇaprayojanaṃ kimityāśaṅkāyāṃ dvayaṃ vibhāvyamāha | tadayamatra saṃkṣepaḥ—yathoktā tāvadvibhāvanā | sā dvayī | kāraṇāntaraparyavasitā, svabhāvaparyavasitā ceti ||
pratyekaṃ ca śuddhādibhedātṣọdhā saṃpadyata ityetāvataiva vibhāvanā śarīraniṣpatteḥ | yathā varṇo varṇena karambitaṃ citraṃ tathā vibhāvanāpi vibhāvanayā tādṛśī citretyāha—

lg.l: aneko yatra sā citrā vicitrā yatra tāṃ prati |

div.p: aneka iti | yathā ca svarūpasaṃpādakātiriktaviśeṣapraveśādvicitrāḥ sragdāmādayastatheyamapīti darśayati—vicitrā yatreti | tāṃ vibhāvanām | tayā vibhāvanayā | anyayeti alaṃkārāntararūpayā ||
atraikaikaṃ kādambādikamuddiśya kṣībatādeḥ pītatvādirekaikaḥ prasiddhaheturvyāvartate | hetvantaraṃ ca śaratprabhāvo vibhāvyate | seyaṃ śuddhā nāma kāraṇavibhāvanāyāṃ bibhāvanā ||
pītaṃ pānam | sūkṣmaṃ nirmalam | śaratprabhāva iti | prastāvaucitībhyāmabhivyaktaḥ ||
atraikaikaṃ dṛṣṭyādikamuddiśyāsitatvāderanañjitatvādirekaiko heturvyā vartyate | svābhāvikatvaṃ cāsitatvādi dṛṣṭyādervibhāvyate | seyaṃ śuddhā nāma svābhāvikavibhāvanāyāṃ vibhāvanā ||

lg.l: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede 15’

div.p: atraikameva vayolakṣaṇaṃ padārthamuddiśyāpyaneko maṇḍanādeḥ prasiddho hetuḥ saṃbhṛtatvādirvyāvartyate | kāraṇāntaraṃ ca stanodbhedadhātūpacayalāvaṇyalakṣmīlābhādirvibhāvyate | seyaṃ citrā nāma kāraṇāntaravibhāvanā ||

asaṃbhṛtamiti | nanu maṇḍanasya saṃbharaṇapūrvakatayā prasiddherastu vibhāvanā | ‘anāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastram’ ityatra tu katham | tathāhi | karaṇamiti karaṇe vā lyuṭra | ādye madasya karaṇamāsavo vayastu tato bhinnamiti kadācivdyatirekaḥ syānnatu vibhāvanā | dvitīye 'pi vayo madasya kriyā āsavanāmnī na bhavatīti na saṃgatam | evaṃ puṣpavyatiriktamastramityatrāpi vikalpya yathāyathaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vācyam | tatkathametat | ucyate | karaṇaṃ kriyā āsavamākhyātītyāsavākhyam | stryākhyavatpratyayavidhiḥ | na tathābhūtamanāsavākhyam | hetutayā na kvacidāsavabodhakṣamam | tathā hetupratiṣedha eva bhaṅgyā darśito bhavati | astramapi kriyārūpaṃ tatpuṣpavyatiriktaṃ puṣpacyutaṃ vinā puṣpebhya iti pūrvavadunneyam | stanodbhedetyādau nārthasaṃdehaḥ ||
atraikameva madhumathanamuddiśyānekastuṅgatvādeḥ pravṛddhatvādiḥ prasiddho heturvyāvartyate | svābhāvikatvaṃ ca taṃ pratyeṣāṃ vibhāvyate | seyaṃ citrā nāma svābhāvikatvavibhāvanāyāṃ vibhāvanā ||

atrottarayorvirahasamāgamādikāraṇāntaravibhāvanayoḥ svābhāvikībhyāṃ prāgvibhāvanābhyāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ viśeṣa uktaṃ | seyaṃ vibhāvanayaiva vibhāvanāyāṃ viśeṣoktestayaiva gīrbhaṅgyā vicitrā nāma vibhāvanā bhavati ||

vakraṃ nisargasurabhīti | tasyā yathokte vakravapuṣī mamākāraṇaripurnirnimittaṃ suhṛccetyanvayo vivakṣitapratītilābhācca nārthāntaraikavācakatvalakṣaṇo doṣaḥ | yathāsaṃkhyamiti | tayorapyekaikaṃ prati saṃpādanalakṣaṇaviśeṣārpaṇakṣamatvāt ||
atrātailapūrāḥ suratapradīpā iti svābhāvikatvavibhāvanāyāṃ śeṣapadārthairavibhāvanārūpairviśeṣa uktaḥ | seyamanyayā gīrbhaṅgyā vicitrā nāma vibhāvanā bhavati ||

lg.l: kriyāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ kārato jñāpakaśca saḥ |

div.p:
hetupratiṣedho vibhāvanāyāmuktaḥ, atha hetureva ka ityapekṣāyāṃ hetulakṣaṇamāha—kriyāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ heturiti | upapattau kriyāyāmeva sarvasya nimittabhāvo nirūpyata ityabhisaṃdhāya kriyāyā ityuktamiti kaścit | tadasat | dravyaguṇakriyā-
viṣaye hetuḥ kriyāmātraviṣayaśca kārakamiti prakīrṇapravṛttau vibhāgakaraṇātkriyāgrahaṇaṃ ceha niṣphalaṃ syāt | tasmādyatra kriyāṃ pratyavadhibhāvo nirūpyate tatra dvayīgatirnimittatvamātravivakṣā avastuvivakṣā vā, dvitīye 'pi kārakatvavivakṣā vā | ādye 'pyāśritāvadhibhāvasya vastvantaraparahetubhāvavivakṣā avastutvavivakṣā vā | dvitīye 'pi kārakatvakriyānubandhivyāpāratvam | pradhānakriyānukūlakriyāntarasamāveśa iti yāvat | taddvividhaṃ śabdābhihitam, atathābhūtaṃ ca | ādyaṃ kārakavibhakterviṣayaḥ, dvitīyaṃ hetuvibhakteḥ | dvayamapi ca kriyāviṣayameva | ṣaṇṇāmapi kārakāṇāṃ kriyāghaṭitamūrtitvāt | avastubhūtaṃ tu nimittamabhāvātmakatayā na vikriyate | vikārābhāvācca na kriyāviśiṣṭamatathābhāve | na ca kārakamiti tṛtīya eva prakāraḥ prasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvaviparyāsenopanibadhyamāno heturāścaryakāritayā citra āropitamapi ca hetutvaṃ hetutvameveti bhavati caturthaḥ prakāraḥ | bahirasaṃbhāvyamānasyāpi kavipratibhāsaṃrambhotthāpyatayā camatkāraviśeṣārpaṇādakṣuṇṇaivālaṃkāratā | yadāha—‘ko hi pratītimātrakāvye vastusthitiṃ bhāvayet’ iti | tadetatsarvamabhisaṃdhāya vibhāgamāha—kāraka ityādi ||

lg.l: yaḥ pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ ca prayuktiṃ cāntarā viśan |

div.p: asataḥ sattā pravṛttiḥ | sato 'pagamo nivṛttiḥ | pravartamānasya pravartanā prayuktiḥ | antarā viśannupāttayuktiḥ | udāsīno 'tathābhūtaḥ | tena kārakasya ṣaṭū prakārāḥ ||
so 'yaṃ yathokto malayamārutaḥ prītyutpādanakriyāsamāveśātpravartako nāma kārakahetubhedaḥ ||
atra prabhāvaḥ kriyāyāmaniviśamāna eva hetau tṛtīyāṃ pravartayati na kartarīti kriyāyāmanāviṣṭakārakahetubhedaḥ ||
tasya rājñaḥ prabhāvenetyatra sadapi kartṛtvamavivakṣitaṃ, ato hetumātravivakṣāyāṃ pākṣikī tṛtīyā bhavatītyāha—hetau tṛtīyāyāmiti | karaṇabhāvastvasaṃbhāvita eva prabhāvamātrasya vyabhicārāt ||
atraivaṃvidhasya pavanasya pathikapramāthasādhanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtvenāveśānnivartako nāmāyamāviṣṭakriyaḥ kārakahetubhedaḥ ||

atra samāgamanivṛttāvaniviśamānaḥ prajāgarastṛtīyārthe pañcamīṃ prayojayati | bāṣpaḥ punardānakriyāveśāddarśanakriyāyāmanāviśankarmasaṃbandhāttāmapradhānabhāvena copagṛhṇātītyanāviṣṭakriyo nāma nivartako 'yaṃ kārakahetubhedaḥ ||

khilībhāvo nivṛttiḥ | tṛtīyārtha iti | hetāvavadhitvāpratīterapādānabhāvena saṃbhāvitaḥ | dānakriyeti | syādatra darśanakriyāsamāveśo yadi dānakriyāveśaḥ syāt | sa eva tu nāsti nañā niṣedhādityarthaḥ ||
atra balapratyujjīvanamaraṇakriyayoḥ saptamīvācyanaimittikādhikaraṇakārakabhāvena hanūmānāviśanprayojako bhavatīti kriyāviṣṭo 'yaṃ prayojako nāma kārakahetubhedaḥ ||

tasmiñjīvatīti | jīvanamaraṇayorbalasyaiva svātantryaṃ hanūmānprayojayati | prayojakatā cāsya (te eva) jīvatyujjhitaprāṇe iti padābhyāmupāttā | katabhatkārakamidaṃ bhavatītyāha—saptamīvācyeti | nanu ca—‘aṅgulyagre madakalaghaṭāndarśayantīva dhūrtā’ ityādau kālpanikādāvapi saptamībhāvātkathaṃ kārakatetyata āha—naimittiketi | anyasyāsaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ ||
atra mānābhyāsakriyāyā bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣiprekṣaṇādirūpāyā ātmanyevātmanaḥ samāveśo na bhavatīti kriyānāviṣṭo 'yamiti śabdābhidheyaprayojako nāma kārakahetubhedaḥ ||

mānayogyāmiti | bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣisphuritādharādiprekṣaṇārūpāyāṃ mānābhyāsakriyāyāmapi bālāyāḥ svātantryaṃ, tādṛśīṃ tu tāmiti śabdanirdeśyo 'bhiprāyaviśeṣaḥ prayuṅkte | tasya tu na kriyāntaramupāttam | upāttāyāstu mānakriyāyāḥ svātmani samāveśo 'nupapannaḥ | abhiprāyo 'pi hi vyāpārapracayarūpakriyāntarbhūta eva | yadāha mahābhāṣyakāraḥ—‘yat kiṃcittadabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ pacyartha’ iti | smaraṇādikaṃ cāsya vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavatītyato nākārakatvaṃ vācyam | tadetadabhisaṃdhāyāha—ātmanyevātmana iti ||

lg.l: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca caturthī saptamī ca yam |
pravālaśobhā iva pādapānāṃ śṛṅgāraceṣṭā vividhā babhūvuḥ || 25 ||

div.p: atra kriyānāviṣṭatayaivendumatyāṃ mahīpatīnāṃ śṛṅgāraceṣṭā bhavantyo lakṣyante | so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇahetuḥ pratinā yoge dvitīyāmutpādayati ||

iha pañcaiva lakṣaṇe vibhaktayo vihitāḥ | tadyathā | ‘anurlakṣaṇe 1|4|84’, ‘lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūta 1|4|90’ ityādinā karmasaṃjñāṃ vidhāya ‘karmapravacanīyayukte 2|3|8’ iti dvitīyā | ‘yenāṅgavikāraḥ 2|3|20’, ‘itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe 2|3|21’ ityetābhyāṃ tṛtīyā | ‘utpātena jñāpite ca 1|4|44 vā.’ iti caturthī | ‘yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam 2|3|37’ iti saptamī | ‘ṣaṣṭhī cānādare 2|3|38’ iti ṣaṣṭhī | tadetadāha—dvitīyā ceti | ṣaṣṭhīmagre vakṣyati | ‘ṣaṣṭhī cānādare 2|3|38’ iti sūtre cakārasya samucceyatayā na pradhānā seti nātra tulyakakṣatayā gaṇitā | kriyānāviṣṭaṃ svavyāpāraśūnyaṃ taṭasthameva yavdyāpriyate, tena kārakādbhedaḥ | atra hi kriyānāviṣṭasyaiva indumatyāmitīndumatīmālambanavibhāvīkṛtya (vidhīya)mānāḥ śṛṅgāraceṣṭāstayaivāvacchidyante, tadavasthā eva ca lakṣyante, tato bhavati hetutvaṃ lakṣaṇatvamavadhitvaṃ ceti | nanu kathamatra dvitīyā, yāvatā hetutvāttṛtīyayā bhavitavyamityata āha—dvitīyāmiti | nāprāptāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāmiyaṃ vidhīyamānā balavatī tāṃ bādhata ityarthaḥ ||
atra kaṇṭhekāla ityādīni kriyāyāmaniviśamānānyeva vṛṣadhvajaṃ jñāpayanti yathā jaṭābhistāpasa iti ||

kaṇṭhekāla ityādīnīti | yadyapi kapālena jaṭābhirityevodāharaṇaṃ tathāpi prasaṅgāditaravdyākhyānaṃ jñāpakatvam | ubhayatrāpi tulyavibhaktivācyatāyāṃ tu viśeṣaḥ | tenānyo 'pyevaṃjātīyo lakṣaṇaprakāraḥ svayamūhanīya ityuktaṃ bhavati, yadvakṣyati ‘upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat’ ityādinā | uktameva prasiddhodāharaṇena draḍhayati—yathā jaṭābhiriti | yathāhītthaṃbhūtasya tenaiva prakāreṇa prakāravato lakṣaṇaṃ jaṭā bhavanti tathehāpi kapālādikamiti bhāvaḥ ||
atra vapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena trilocanastejasā ravirityaṅgavikārairaṅgino vikṛtirlakṣyate yathākṣṇā kāṇa iti ||

tṛtīyāvācya eveti | sūtre 'ṅgapadenāṅgī lakṣyate | tasya ca saṃbandhiniyamādaṅgavācinastṛtīyā bhavati | aṅgaṃ ca dvividhamājānikamaupacārikaṃ ca dvayamapīha vivakṣitaṃ vikārādikaṃ cetthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇamevedam | ata eva sūtrakramo nāddata ityāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—atra vapuṣeti | vikṛtiravasthāntaraprāptiḥ ||

l.seg: rakṣatvadrisutā vivāhasamaye prītā ca bhītā ca vaḥ || 28 ||’

div.p: atra gauryā vivāhamaṅgalānaucityenotpātarūpairagadarajoniyogādibhirbhagavadgatā gonāsādayo jñāpyante, yathā vātāya kapilā vidyuditi | tataścotpātena jñāpiteceti saṃbandhasyobhayaniṣṭhatvāttādarthya iva lakṣyavācinaścaturthī na lakṣaṇavācinaḥ | tṛtīyāviṣayāpahārādekayaiva ca vibhaktyobhayagatasyāpi saṃbandhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa itivaduktatvāttṛtīyāpi na bhavati ||

gonāsāyeti | nanūtpātenāviṣṭena yajjñāpyate tatra caturthīti lakṣaṇamevāsyā vācyaṃ pratibhāti, naitat | lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo 'sāvabhidhīyate na tu lakṣye . . . . . | tataśca yato vidhīyate tasya lakṣaṇīyatāmarthāditarasya lakṣaṇatāṃ bodhayatīti | agadarajaḥprabhṛtayastu kathamamaṅgalarūpā ityavaśiṣyate | tatrāha—atra gauryā ityādi | nanu tathāpi lakṣaṇavācina eva caturthīti kathamavasitabhityata āha—tataśceti | yathā tādarthyasyobhayaniṣṭhatve 'pi kaṅkaṇāya kanakamityatra kāryavācina eva caturthī na tu kāraṇavācinaḥ, tathehāpi saṃbandhasyobhayāśrayatve 'pi lakṣyavācina eva caturthī natu lakṣaṇavācina ityarthaḥ | tarhi tṛtīyā kathaṃ na bhavatītyata āha—ekayaiva ceti | saṃbandhasya saṃbandhināveva viśeṣastena lakṣaṇamapi caturthyeva pratipādayatyata āha—uktārthatvātkathaṃ tṛtīyā na bhavatīti śuddhaprātipadikārthābhidhāne prathameti bhāvaḥ ||

atra senānyaḥ palāyamānagaṇānuśāsanakriyayāndhakāreḥ svaprakāśanakriyā lakṣyate yathā—‘goṣu duhyamānāsu gataḥ’ iti | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenānyadapi bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ śatrādyabhidheyamupalakṣyate, yathātraiva hasatā tasthe iti ||

‘yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam 2|3|37’ ityasya sūtrasyārthastu yasya vastuno bhāvena kriyayā vastvantarasya bhāvaḥ kriyā lakṣyate tadvacanātsaptamītyata āha—atra senānya iti | hasatā tastha iti lakṣaṇe śatṛvidhiḥ ‘lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ 3|2|126’ iti sūtraṇāt ||

abhāvasāmānyamabhāvapramāṇanirūpaṇaprastāve ‘asattāyāḥ padārthānām’ ityanena vakṣyati | tenātra sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ na kṛtavān | sa dvividhastādātmyapratiyogikaḥ, saṃsargapratiyogikaśca | dvitīyastridhā prākpradhvaṃsātyantābhāvabhedāt | tadāha—prāgabhāvāditi | nanu na prāgabhāvādireko 'sti pratiyogibhedena bhedādityata āha—ghaṭābhāvādīti | anena rūpeṇa saṃkhyā nāstyeva | sāmānyaṃ tu prāgabhāvatvādikamāśritya cāturvidhyam, so 'yaṃ tuśabdasyārthaḥ ||

lg.l: gato mohaścyutā tṛṣṇā kṛtaṃ puṇyāśrame manaḥ || 32 ||’

div.p: anabhyāseneti | yāvadvidyāṃ nābhyasyanti tāvanna dhīmadbhiḥ saṃsṛjyante, yāvaccākṣāṇi na nigṛhṇanti tāvavdyasanamiti vivakṣitam | tena nātyantābhāvasaṃkaraḥ | ārādhyāstvāhuḥ—‘śikṣāparasyāsya ślokasyāpyanyaprayojanakatayā nātyantābhāvasaṃkaraḥ’ iti ||

lg.l: mṛgā ime na dāyādāstanme nandati mānasam || 33 ||’

div.p: atra vanāni amūni na gṛhāṇītyāderitaretarābhāvasya manaḥpramodakāraṇatvam ||
