atra pūrṇenduriva pūrṇendurityādikayopacāravṛttyā yadyapi pūrṇenduprabhṛtaya upamānaśabdā apyupameyeṣu vadanādiṣu vartante, tebhyaśca yadyapi svārtha eva svārthikāḥ kalpabādayo bhavanti, tathāpi te śabdaśaktisvābhāvyādguṇabhūtamupamānārthamātraṃ bruvate yathā śuklādibhyastarabādayaḥ | tathā hyayaṃ caṃ śuklo 'yamanayoḥ śuklatara ityukte śauklyasyaiva prakarṣo gamyate na śauklyavataḥ | seyamupamānārthapratyayānāma pratyayopamāsu padopamābhaktiḥ ||

pūrṇetyādi | sā svapne 'pi na dṛśyate | kīdṛśī | pūrṇendorīṣadasamāptaṃ vadanaṃ yasyāḥ sā | mṛṇālyā īṣadasamāptā dorlatā yasyāḥ sā | cakrādīṣadasamāptaṃ jaghanaṃ yasyāḥ sā | iha kalpetyādāvīṣadasamāptau ‘īṣadasamāptau kalpabdeśyadeśīyaraḥ 5|3|67’ iti kalpabādayaḥ | iha pūrṇendvādaya upacāreṇopameyavṛttayastatsamabhivyāptakalpabādinā svārthikapratyayena copamānārthātiśaya evābhidhīyata iti pratyayasyopamānārthatā | idamevāha—śabdeti | guṇabhūtamiti | atiśayasya pratyayārthatvena tannirūpakatvameva guṇatvamityarthaḥ ||
atropamānādācārādibhiḥ sūryādibhyaḥ kyajādaya ācāralakṣaṇakriyāviśeṣa utpadyamānā upamānopameyayoḥ sāmānya evotpadyanta iti seyaṃ sāmānyārthapratyayānāma pratyayopamāsu padopamābhaktiḥ ||

lg.l: ‘eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ |

div.p: atra ‘tena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiḥ 5|1|115’ ityanena candraśabdāccandreṇa tulyaṃ dṛśyata itīvārtha eva pratyayo na tu tulyakriyārthaḥ anyathā dṛśyata iti ivārtha iva tulyakriyāprayogo 'pi na syāt | tadaprayoge 'pi ca gauriva gavaya ityādau vatiḥ prasajyeta | seyamivārthapratyayānāma pratyayopamāsu padopamābhaktiḥ ||

sūryīyatītyādi | candraḥ sūryīyati sūrya ivācarati kāmo 'timṛtāyate 'timṛtavadbhavati | priyāviyoge mṛtasya punaḥ svargo 'pi narakīyati naraka ivācarati | sūryīyatītyatra ‘upamānādācāre 3|1|10’ iti kyac | atimṛtāyata ityatrācārārthe ‘kartuḥ kyaṅ salopaśca 3|1|11’ iti kyaṅ | prakṛte sūryanarakayoḥ karmādhikaraṇatvabhāvena cintyametat | padye kyaṅprayogastu sarvatra nyāyyaḥnarakīyati ityatra ‘adhikaraṇācca 2664 sū. vā.’ iti kyac | ihācāra ācaraṇakriyā sācopamānopameyasādhāraṇīti sāmānyapratyayā | eka ityādi | eka eva bhūtātmā paramātmā pratidehamavasthitaḥ san ekadhā bahudhā caikānekaprakāreṇa jalacandravaddṛśyate | iha jalacandravaddṛśyata ityatrevārthe sādṛśye vatirna tu tulyaḥ kriyate tadā dṛśyata iti padena vatinā ca samarthatayā paunaruttkyaṃ syāt | na bhavatu tulyakriyāprayogaḥ, tataḥ kimaniṣṭamata āha—taditi | gauriva gavaya ityādau kriyāyā aprayogāttulyakriyāprayogābhāva iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: vākyopamā tu yā tatra dvaividhyaṃ sāpi gacchati |
ādyā pūrṇā ca luptā ca luptavarṇā tathaiva ca |

div.p: vākyeti| | tatropamāyāṃ mitho 'nyonye sāmya iti yāvat | ‘mitho 'nyonye rahorthe ca mitho 'nyonyasamuccaye |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ādyā padārthopamā pūrṇā sāmānyadharmādisākalyavatī | prayoga iti sarvatrānvīyate ||
atra kamalamṛṇālālimālādīnāmupamānadyotakatulyadharmopameyavācakānāṃ caturṇāmapi padānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak prayoge padārthayoḥ sādṛśyasyābhidhīyamānatvādiyaṃ pūrṇānāma padārthopamāsu vākyopamābhāktiḥ ||

kamalamityādi | he madirekṣaṇe raktanetre, tava vadanaṃ padmamiva cāru | bāhudvayaṃ bisamiva mṛdu | kabarī keśaveśo bhramarapaṅiktariva nīlo 'sti | madirāvadraktamīkṣaṇaṃ netraṃ yasyāḥ sā | ‘kabarī keśaveśo 'tha’ ityamaraḥ | iha kamalamupamānam, ivapadaṃ dyotakam, cārupadaṃ tulyadharmopasthāpakam, vadanamupameyamiti pūrṇatā, padārthayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vākyārthaḥ, sāmānyadharmādīnāṃ virahe lope luptā tarhi sarvalope upamaiva na syādata āha—pratīyamāna iti | tathātve 'pi prasiddhaiva kāntyāditulyadharmapratītiriti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘na padmaṃ mukhamevedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime |

div.p: netyādi | idaṃ na padmaṃ kiṃtu kāntāyā mukhameva | na bhramarau kiṃtu ime netre | na kesarāṇi kiṃtu imāstāḥ prasiddhā dantapaṅktaya eva | cakṣuṣī ime ‘īdūdevddivacanaṃ pragṛhyam 1|1|11’ iti pragṛhyatvam | padmamidaṃ kāntāsyamiti mithyājñānaṃ tasya pratyākhyānaṃ niṣedho na padmamiti | evaṃcevādyabhāve 'pi kāntyādeḥ prasidhdyaiva pratīteriyaṃ luptā ||
atra sāmānyadharme lupte pratīyamānasādṛśyatvena padārthayorupamānopameyabhāvasya paripūrṇatve luptapūrṇānāmeyaṃ padārthopamāsu vākyopamābhaktiḥ ||

rājīvamityādi | he priye, tava mukhaṃ padmamiva, netre nīlanaline iva, ūrū kadalīstambhāviva, stanau hastikumbhāviva staḥ | utpale iveti ‘īdūded 1|1|11’ iti pragṛhyasaṃjñā | iha sāmānyadharmasya kāntyāderlopaḥ, itareṣāṃ pūrṇateti luptapūrṇā || 11 ||

lg.l: dyotakasya tu lope yā pūrṇalupteti sā smṛtā || 17 ||

div.p: atra tantreṇa sadṛśayoranabhidhānātsādṛśyasya punarupamānopameyabhāvavivakṣitena śleṣato 'nyatve satītaretarayogenopamānopameyayorekaśeṣeṇa ca tadviśeṣaṇayoḥ samudāyenābhidhānādivādimantareṇāpyupamānādīnāṃ caturṇāmapi pūrṇatve satyuktārthatvādivādirlupyata iti pūrṇaluptānāmeyaṃ padārthopamāsu vākyopamābhaktiḥ ||

tvadityādi | idaṃ vivṛtaṃ sadṛśavyatirekasthale | tantreṇa prādhānyena | ‘tantraṃ pradhāne siddhānte’ iti medinīkāraḥ | yadvā tantreṇa ekārthaprayojakeneha sadṛśayormukhapadmayoḥ pradhānāṅgabhāvenābhidhānaṃ tulyatā ca padārthaḥ | evaṃ ca mitho 'nvayenopamānopameyatvābhidhānam | phulle iti viśeṣaṇadvayam | ekaśeṣeṇa hetūpamānopameyatulyadharmadyotakapūrṇatā | ivādilopastūktārthatvādataḥ pūrṇalupteyam | yatra samakakṣatayā dvayorabhidhānaṃ tatra śleṣa evetyativyāptirata āha—śleṣata iti | vākyārthasya vākyasāpekṣatayā tadbhedatā ||

atra himavatpāṇḍyayornirjharahārayorbālātapaharicandanayośca parasparamupamānopameyavivakṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaparikalpanena vākyārthayordvayorapi kalpitatvādekenaivevaśabdena tayoḥ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvo 'bhihitaḥ itīyamekevaśabdānāma vākyārthopamāsu vākyopamābhaktiḥ ||

eka evaśabdo yasyāṃ sā || pāṇḍya iti | ayaṃ pāṇḍyo rājabhedaḥ śobhate | kīdṛśaḥ | aṃse skandhe 'rpito datto lambahāro yena saḥ | haricandanena candanamedena kṛtāṅgānulepanaśca, abhinavakiraṇalohitaśṛṅgaḥ pravahannirjharaśca himavānivābhāti | iha dvayorvākyārthayorupamānopameyabhāva ekenaivevapadenokta ityekevopameyam ||

lg.l: ‘dine dine sā parivardhamānā labdhodayā cāndramasīva lekhā |

div.p: atra kriyāpadasya vākyārthadvayaikatāpattihetoḥ sakarmakatvātkartuḥ karmaṇaścopamānāt pṛthagivaśabdaprayoga iti seyamabhi dhīyamānasādṛśyā anekevaśabdānāma vākyārthopamāsu vākyopamābhaktiḥ ||

dina iti | sā gaurī dine dine pratyahaṃ parivardhamānā satī lāvaṇyamayānkāntipradhānān viśeṣānutkarṣān pupoṣa puṣṇāti sma | kīdṛśī | labdhaḥ prāpta udaya upacayo yayā sā | yathā cāndrī lekhā kalā prāptodgamā pratyahaṃ vardhamānā ca satī kalāntarāṇi anyānyā kalā dhatte jyotsnāntarāṇi ca dhatte tathetyarthaḥ | lāvaṇyaṃ jyotsnāsthānīyam, viśeṣaḥ kalāsthānīyaḥ | yadvā kalāntarāṇi kīdṛśāni | jyotsnā antarā garbhe yeṣu tāni | yadvā jyotsnāyā antaro 'vakāśo yeṣu tāni | 'lekhā syāllipikalayoḥ’ iti viśvaḥ | candramasa iyaṃ cāndramasī | ‘tasyedam 4|3|120’ ityaṇ | ‘lāvaṇyaṃ cārutā matā’ iti śāśvataḥ | ‘garbhāvakāśabhedeṣvantaraṃ vācyaliṅgavat |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | iha poṣaṇarūpakriyayā vākyārthayorekavākyatā, sā ca sakarmaketi kartṛkarmaṇoḥ pṛthagivapadaprayogādanekevopameyam ||

atra pulomārivarṇanīyayordyāvābhūmyorasurāṇāmavaliptapārthivānāṃ ca tulyakriyāsamāveśādivādimantareṇāpi vākyārthānāṃ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvo 'vagamyata itīyamanivādiśabdānāma vākyārthopamāsu vākyopamābhaktiḥ |

diva iti | bhavān bhūme rakṣāyai pulomāririndro divaḥ svargasya rakṣāyai jāgarti | tenendreṇāsurā hanyante, tvayā nṛpā hanyante | sāvalepāḥ sagarvā iti nṛpaviśeṣaṇam | pulomanāmā daityabhedaḥ sa cendreṇa hatastatsutā pulomajendrāṇī ca gṛhīteti purāṇam | iha tulyā samaikakriyā jāgaraṇarūpā hananarūpā ca tavddayaghaṭita evopamānopameyabhāvaḥ ||

atra satyupamāne satyupameye satyapi cevaśabde mahaujasāṃ malimlucānāṃ ca yo 'yaṃ chalāpakaraṇaṃ nāma vastudharmaḥ sa upamāna eva nakāreṇa niyamyata iti vaidharmyavatīnāmeyaṃ vākyārthopamāsu vākyopamābhaktiḥ ||
prahita ityādi | ayaṃ vividha ucyatāsadṛśopamaviśeṣaguṇe(?) ihānyarūpaiḥ sāmye 'pi vācyadharma upamāna eva niṣedhena niyamita iti vaidharmyam | tadvatīyamupamā |
yatreti | vākyārthe vacanabhaṅgyā yatra vākyārthayorvistareṇa sādṛśyaṃ jñāyate sā prapañcopamā ||

lg.l: sā tu prakṛtarūpā syādrūpeṇa vikṛtā tathā |
tayoḥ prakṛtarūpā sā vijñeyā ca caturvidhā || 20 ||
bhānti latā lalanā iva pāṇibhiriva kisalayairadhikam || 17 ||’

div.p: atra vasantalakṣmīpariṣkṛtalatānāṃ lalanānāṃ ca pratīyamānasādṛśyānāmupamānopameyabhāvavivakṣāyāṃ yeyamalivalayādibhiralakādīnāṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyānāmeva pṛthakpṛthagivaśabdaprayogavatīti vistareṇāvayavino 'vayavānāṃ ceti sāmastyena vākyārthayoraupamyoktibhaṅgiḥ | seyaṃ samastopamānāma prakṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||

alītyādi | latā vasante lalanā iva striya ivādhikaṃ śobhante | kaiḥ | alakairiva bhṛṅgavṛndaiḥ, puṣpagucchaiḥ kucairiva, pallavaiḥ pāṇibhiriva | ihāvayavinorlatāstrīrūpayoravayavānāmekadeśānāmalivalayālakādīnāṃ sāmagryeṇopamānopameyabhāvāt samastopameyam | teṣāṃ ca prakṛtatvaṃ prasiddhameva ||

atra nalinīnāṃ vilāsinīnāṃ ca parasparamupamānopameyabhāve vaktavye vilāsinīlakṣaṇamupamānārtham, evamavayavāntarāṇi ca yāni stanādyupameyāni, tāni parityajya kamalamevaikaṃ tadavayavairdalādibhiḥ sahādharādibhirupamānaiḥ pṛthakpṛthagivaprayogādvistareṇopamitam | teneyamekadeśopamā nāma prakṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||

kamaleti padminyaḥ śobhante | kaiḥ | adharairiva padmapattraiḥ, dantairiva kiṃjalkaiḥ, alakairiva bhṛṅgasaṃghaiḥ, mukhairiva padmaiḥ | iha vistaropamayā prapañcopamā, haṃsastanādityāgātkamaladalādinā sahādharāderekadeśasyopamayā caikadeśopameyam ||

lg.l: kittivva pavaṇataṇaaṃ āṇavva balāiṃ se vilaggaï diṭṭhī || 19 ||’

div.p: atra rāmadṛṣṭerlakṣmaṇamukhādiviniveśinyāḥ śobhādyupamānamālayā pratīyamānasādṛśyayā vistareṇopamitermālopamā nāmeyaṃ prakṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||

soheti | ‘śobheva lakṣmaṇamukhaṃ vanamāleva vikaṭaṃ haripateruraḥ | kīrtiriva pavanatanayamājñeva balānyasya vilagati dṛṣṭiḥ ||’ asya rāmasya dṛṣṭirlakṣmaṇamukhaṃ vilagati saṃbadhnāti | śobheva darśanānantarameva mukhaprasādāt | haripateḥ sugrīvasya vistīrṇamuraḥ sā vilagati vanamāleva pauruṣādhyavasāyanimittam, samastavakṣaḥsthalavilokanāddhavalaśyāmalayā dṛṣṭyā vanamāleva pramāṇāvasare prabhuṇā sugrīvāya prasādīkṛteti bhāvaḥ | pavanatanayaṃ hanūmantaṃ vilagati kīrtiriva, tasya jñātapauruṣasya vikasitayā dhavalitagaganayā dṛṣṭyā nirīkṣaṇaṃ kṛtamiti bhāvaḥ | balāni vilagati ājñeva, tadanantaramevātibalānāṃ teṣāṃ gamanodyogāt | ‘āpādapravaṇāṃ mālāṃ vanamāleti tāṃ viduḥ |’ iti śāśvataḥ | mukhāderādhārasyaiva karmatā | yadvā ‘upasargeṇa dhātvartho balādanyatra nīyate |’ iti vyutpattyā vilagateḥ sakarmakatā | iha rāmadṛṣṭeḥ śobhādyupamānamālayā sūtreṇa grathanameva, vistareṇopamitermālopameyam | na ceyaṃ bahūpamā; ekasya dharmasya bahubhiranupasthitatvāt ||

lg.l: kāntāyate sparśasukhena vāri vārīyate svacchatayā vihāyaḥ || 20 ||’

div.p: atra candrādīnāṃ śauklyādibhirabhidhīyamānasādṛśyairhaṃsādibhiryeyaṃ rasanānyāyena paścādvalanayā vistaravatī hetumatī ca pratyayopamāpaṅktistathehaikavākyatākaraṇena śaradramaṇīyatoyavarṇanamiti seyaṃ rasanopamā nāma prakṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||

candreti | atha haṃsaḥ śvetadīptyā candrāyate candra ivācarati | priyā manojñagamanena haṃsa ivācarati | vāri jalaṃ sparśasukhena kāntevācarati | vihāyo gaganaṃ nirmalatayā vārīyate jalamivācarati | ‘vārvāri jalam’ ityamaraḥ | ‘puṃsyākāśavihāyasī’ iti ca | iha paścādvalanā pūrvāpekṣatayā kṣudraghaṇṭikākramaḥ prapañcavattvaṃ rucetyādihetumattvaṃ pratītyupamābāhulyaṃ ca sphuṭameva | tarhi prakṛtarūpatā kathaṃ syādata
āha—tatheti | upamāpaṅktyāṅktyā caikavākyatāvidhānena śaradṛtuvarṇanena prakṛtarūpeti bhāvaḥ | (turīyā caturthī ca, ‘turaṇamattāvādyakṣaralopaśca’ iti (?) chaḥ ||

atra netrādīnāmupameyatvamindīvarādīnāmupamānatvamiti prasiddhau yeyamatyanurāgānnetrādiṣvādhikyabuddhirnātyanurāgādindīvarādiṣu tadanukāribuddhistayeha rāmeṇa virahiṇābhidhīyamānasādṛśyānāmamīṣāṃ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvaḥ prasiddherviparyāsena kalpita iti seyaṃ viparyāsopamā nāma vikṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||

yaditi | he priye, mama tvatsādṛśyaharṣamātramapi na daivena kṣamyate | yasmāttadindīvaraṃ jale magnam | kīdṛśam | tvannetrasamaśobham | candro meghairantaritaśchannaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ | tvanmukhapratibimbasadṛśaḥ | te 'pi rājahaṃsā gatāḥ | ye tvadgatitulyagamanāḥ iha prasiddhiviparyayeṇopamiterviparyāsopamā ||

lg.l: nilīnāṃ nalinīkhaṇḍe kathaṃ nu tvāṃ labhemahi || 22 ||’

div.p: atrāpyatyantasādṛśyādekasminpakṣe prasiddherviparyāsa iti seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyobhayopamā nāma vikṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ |

taveti | he priye, tvāṃ kathaṃ nu labhemahi | kīdṛśīm | padminīkadambe nilīnāṃ sthitām | mukhenāpi na lābha ityāha—tava mukhamiva padmam padmamiva mukham | iha prathamapakṣe viparyāso 'thobhayopamānopameyabhāvādubhayopameyam ||
atropamānārthamutpādyopameyena pratīyamānamabhidhīyamānaṃ ca sādṛśyamabhihitamiti seyamutpādyopamānāma vikṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||
ubhāviti | ubhāvityādivivṛto 'yaṃ śleṣaguṇe | iha yadyete patetāmityupamānatā tasyotpādyata itīyamutpādyopamā | anekeṣāmupamiteḥ prapañcophmātvam ||

atra tvamevedṛśī nānyā tvatsadṛśītyananvaye sati upamānopameyabhāvavivakṣayaikasyāpi vastuno bhedamupakalpya pratīyamānasādṛśyamaupamyenābhihitamiti seyamananvayopamānāma vikṛtarūpopamāsu prapañcopamābhaktiḥ ||

tvadityādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ lāṭānuprāse | ihānyā tvatsadṛśī netyupamānāntarasaṃbandhābhāvo 'nanvayaḥ | tadupamitiḥ kathaṃ tasyā bhedagarbhatvādata āha—ekasyāpīti | tathā cābhede 'pi bhedakalpanādadoṣaḥ | aupamyenopamāyāḥ, svārthe kaḥ ṣyañ | ityupamālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

yadeti | yadopamānapadānāṃ padmādīnāmupameyeṣu mukhādiṣu vṛttirbodhakatā bhave-
ttadā rūpakam | kathamanyasyānyabodhakatātiprasaṅgāt | tatrāha—gauṇeti | gauṇavṛttirgaiṇī tadāśrayaṇāt | tathā ca gauṇānyasyānyabodhakatā | evaṃ ca yatropamānopameyapadābhyāmabhedo guṇādipuraskāreṇa bodhyate tatra rūpakaṃ, yatra sādṛśyamātraṃ tatropameti tayorbhedaḥ ||

śabdeti | prathamaṃ yāvadrūpakaṃ tridhā—śabdabhūyiṣṭhārthabhūyiṣṭhatadubhayabhūyiṣṭhabhedāt | tatra śabdabhūyiṣṭhaṃ prakṛtavikṛtabhedāddvidhya, arthabhūyiṣṭhamaṅgipradhānāṅgapradhānabhedāddvidhā, ubhayabhūyiṣṭhamapi śuddhasaṃkīrṇabhedāddvidheti vibhāgaḥ ||

atra ‘upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge 2|1|56’ iti samāse padmānīva padmāni candrā iva candrā ityabhedopacāreṇotpannasādṛśyātpāṇīnāṃ nakhānāṃ ca padmacandrādibhirabhidhāne sāmānyevādiśabdāprayogādupamānārthastirobhūta iti so 'yaṃ gauṇaśabdavyapāśrayaḥ samāsahetukaḥ samastarūpaṃ nāma prakṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

caturdheti | pāṇīti | tvatpādanakhacandrāṇāmarciṣastejāṃsi bhūpānāṃ karakamalāni saṃkocayituṃ nimīlayitumīśate samarthā bhavanti | arciṣaḥ kīdṛśyaḥ |
kundapuṣpavadamalāḥ | ‘arcirhetiḥ śikhā striyām’ ityamaraḥ | pāṇiḥ padmamiva nakhaścandra ivetyatra ‘upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge 2|1|56’ iti samāsaḥ | iha sāmānyasyevāderaprayogeṇābhedopacārādupamānārthastirobhūta iti gauṇīpuraskāraḥ | tirobhūtatvaṃ ca paramārthataḥ sannapi bhedo na bhāsata iti, tattu samāsenaiva kṛtam, ata eva śabdaprācuryācchabdabhūyiṣṭhatā ||

atrāpi pūrvavatpallavakusumalatāvasantaśrīśabdānāṃ guṇavṛttyāśrayeṇāṅgulīnakhārcirbāhuvarṇanīyanāmikābhiḥ saha sāmānādhikaraṇyātsāmānyevādiśabdāprayogācca tirobhūte 'pyupamānārthe samāso na kṛta ityasamastarūpaṃ nāma prakṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyeṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

aṅgulya ityādi | he sundari, tvaṃ no 'smākaṃ pratyakṣacāriṇī dṛṣṭiviṣayā pādavihāriṇī vā vasantasya śrīrasi | abhedopacāre bījamāha—tavāṅgulyaḥ pallavānyāsan | nakhadīptayaḥ puṣpāṇyāsan | bāhū late bāhudvayaṃ ca latādvayam | ‘pallavo 'strī kisalayam’ ityamaraḥ | upamānopameyabhedamāha—sāmānyeti | iha samāsābhāvāvdyastarūpatā ||

atra mukhendoḥ smitameva jyotsnā, kucakumbhayoḥ prabhaivāmbu, dorlatayoḥ pallavabhūte pāṇau nakhārciṣa eva puṣpamiti samastānāmasamastānāṃ ca gauṇaśabdānāmupamātiraskāreṇa darśitatvādidaṃ samastavyastarūpaṃ nāma prakṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

smitamityādi | he sakhi, tava mukhendau smitamīṣaddhāso jyotsnāsti | kucakumbhayoḥ prabhā dīptirambu jalam | bāhulatāyāḥ pallavabhūte maṇau nakhadīptayaḥ
puṣpam | ‘nīrakṣīrāmbuśambaram’ ityamaraḥ | vādivyatirekādupamātiraskāraḥ | iha prathamaṃ samastaṃ tato 'samastamiti samastavyastatā ||

atra yathoktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo yo haripādo yaśca harihatāsurebhyo niḥśaṅkānāṃ surāṇāmānandotsave dhvajastayoḥ saviśeṣaṇayoreva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ parasparamupamānopameyabhāva iti saviśeṣaṇaṃ nāma prakṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | tadetaccatuṣṭayamapi prakṛtasamāsādiśabdairnibaddhamiti prakṛtamucyate ||

harītyādi | śirasi agraṃ lagnaṃ balivañcane trivikramadaśāyāṃ brahmāṇḍāptau brahmaṇā pādyārthamāvarjitaṃ yajjahnukanyāyā gaṅgāyā jalaṃ tadevāṃśukaṃ vastramiva yatra tādṛśo harervāmanarūpasya pādo balivijayādasurebhyo niḥśaṅkānāṃ devānāṃ harṣotsave dhvaja eva jayati | ata eva jāhnavījalamaṃśukatvena rūpitam, tena vinā dhvajānupapatteḥ ‘śiro 'gre mastake 'pi ca’ iti medinīkāraḥ | iha pādadhvajayorviśeṣaṇavatoreva rūpaṇāt saviśeṣaṇarūpakatā | prakṛtatvaṃ prastutatvam | tacca samāsādibhireveti prakṛtarūpakatā ||
catura iti | vikṛtasyāpi caturo bhedān pratijānate svīkurvanti | dhīrā iti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: kaha kaha vi dāsarahiṇo jaakesaripañjaro gao ghaṇasamao 29’

div.p: atra dāśarathisaṃbandhino vyavasāyasya raviṇā, roṣasya gajendreṇa, jayasya kesariṇā sahopamānopameyabhāvakalpanayā yadekaṃ rūpaṇamathaitatsaṃbandhitayā pradoṣaśṛṅkhalāpratibandhapañjarāṇāṃ dvitīyaṃ tatra trayāṇāmapi ghanasamayena tṛtīyaṃ tenedaṃ rūpakaṃ paramparānāma vikṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

vavasāa ityādi | ‘vyavasāyaravipradoṣo roṣagajendradṛḍhaśṛṅkhalāpratibandhaḥ | kathaṃ kathamapi dāśaratherjayakesaripañjaro gato ghanasamayaḥ ||’ atra dāśarathe rāmasya kathaṃ kathamapi kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā ghanasamayo varṣarturatītaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ | vyavasāyaḥ kāryodyogaḥ sa eva ravistejomayatvāttasya pradoṣo 'stagamanakālaḥ | doṣa eva gajendro durnivāratvāttasya dṛḍhaśṛṅkhalāpratibandhaḥ pratibandhakatvāt | jaya eva kesarī tasya pañjaro gṛhabhedo niyāmakatvāt | ‘śṛṅkhalā nigaḍe triṣu’ iti bhedinīkāraḥ | iha rāmasaṃbandhisaṃbandhirūpaṇātparamparārūpakam | saṃbandhisaṃbandhitvādeva vikṛtatvam ||

atra kisalayakaraiḥ, karakamalaiḥ, kamalamukhaiḥ, mukhendubhiriti raśanākrameṇa śabdānāṃ saṃdarbha upalabhyamānastadarthānāṃ manobhuvo jagadvijaye latādisaṃbandhātkaraṇabhāvamanumāpayatīti raśanānāmaitadvikṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

kisalayetyādi | madanaḥ kāmo hariṇākṣīṇāṃ hastapadmairlatānāṃ kisalayakarairjagajjayati | yoṣitāṃ mukhacandraiḥ padminīnāṃ padmamukhaiśca jagajjayati | iha raśanā kṣudraghaṇṭikā tasyāḥ kramaḥ paścādvalanayaikaikaprathanā śabdagatā pratīyata iti raśanārūpakamidam ||

l.seg: rvisrambhe hṛdayaṃ niyogasamaye dāso bhaye cāśrayaḥ |
sarvākāramaho svayaṃvarasuhṛtko vā na karṇo mama || 31 ||’

div.p: atra svāmyādīnāṃ mālopamādikrameṇa nirūpitatvānmālārūpakaṃ nāma vikṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

svāmītyādi | ko vā na, api tu sarva eva | tadevāha—durnayasya vāraṇe nivāraṇe vyatikara āsaṅgastatra svāmī prabhuḥ | durnayanivāraka ityarthaḥ | śauryasyopadeśe gururupadeṣṭā | visrambhe hṛdayaṃ viśvāsapātram | niyoga ājñā tatkāle dāsaḥ | bhaye āśrayaśca | saptasamudrasīmāna eva raśanādāma taccihnitāyā bhūmerdātā | aho āścaryaṃ sarvākāraṃ yathā syādevaṃ svayaṃvarasuhṛt sahajamitraṃ ca, nirupadhitvaṃ svayaṃvaraśabdārthaḥ | hṛdayamityajahalliṅgatayānvayaḥ | ‘ājñā niyoga ādeśaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | iha vistareṇa rūpitatvānmālārūpakam ||

atra mukhameva paṅkajaṃ tadeva raṅgaḥ, bhrūreva latā saiva nartakī, līlaiva nāṭyaṃ tadevāmṛtamiti rūpitānāmapi rūpaṇena samāsena rūpakarūpakaṃ nāmāyaṃ vikṛtarūpakeṣu śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | tadetaccatuṣṭayamapi paramparādibhirvikṛtasamāsādiśabdairnibaddhamiti vikṛtamucyate ||

mukhetyādi | he sakhi, tava bhrūlatāsminmukhapadmaraṅge nartakī yūnāṃ dṛṣṭau netre līlānāṭyāmṛtaṃ niṣiñcati | līlāvilāsa eva nāṭyaṃ nṛtyaṃ tadevāmṛtam | iha mukhaṃ paṅkajena rūpayitvā raṅgatvena rūpitam, evaṃ bhruvau latātvena rūpayitvā nartakītvena rūpite | līlaiva nāṭyaṃ tadevāmṛtamiti rūpitarūpaṇādrūpakarūpakam ||

lg.l: samastaṃ cāsamastaṃ ca yuktaṃ cāyuktameva ca |

div.p: atra samastopamāyāmiva pādākhyaḥ paṅkajākhyaścāvayavī parasparamupamānopameyabhūtaḥ pratīyamānābhidhīyamānasādṛśyairaṅguliśreṇinakhadīdhitibhirdalaśreṇikesaraiśca saha sāmastyena rūpitastadyogyasthānavinyāsena cārthasya prādhānyamabhihitamiti samastaṃ nāma rūpakamidamaṅgipradhānarūpakeṣvarthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | na caitadvācyam—'pāṇipadmāni bhūpānā'mityāderudāharaṇādidaṃ na bhidyata iti | tatra hi nakhārciṣāṃ kriyāsamāveśena prādhānyamavagamyate, na nakhacandrāṇāṃ tataśca na rūpakam | pāṇipadmetyasya tu yadyapi saṃkocakriyāyāmasti samāveśastathāpi na tāni varṇanīyatvenopanyastāni, api tu jigīṣubhāvavarṇanāṅgatayā | ataḥ samāveśamātrabhaṇanānna tatra pāṇipadmānāṃ nāpi nakhacandrāṇāmarthaprādhānyamapi tu śabdaprādhānyameva | iha tu caraṇapaṅkajatāmrāṅgulidalaśreṇyādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya bhūpālamauliviniveśanena prādhānyaṃ pratīyata ityubhayamapi niravadyam ||

samastamiti | tāmretyādi | bhavaccaraṇapadmaṃ nṛpairmastake dhriyate | kīdṛśam | tāmrāṅgulayo dalaśreṇiḥ pattrapaṅktiryatra tat | nakhadīdhitayaḥ kesarāṇi yatra tat | samasteti | yathā samastopamāyāmavayavinoḥ sāmastyenopamā, tathātrāpyavayavinoreva prādhānyena sāmastyena rūpakamityarthaḥ | aṅgulyādau pratīyamānatā dalādāvabhidhīyamānatā | tarhi śabdabhūyiṣṭhatvameva syādata āha—tadyogyeti | śabdopasthāpitānāmarthānāmiha yathāsthānaṃ viniveśādarthaprādhānyamityarthabhūyiṣṭhatvamuktamityarthaḥ | śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhede samaste 'tivyāptimāśaṅkate—na ceti | tatrāpi nānāśabdopasthāpitānāmarthānāmavayavinoreva prādhānyamato nānayorbheda ityāśayaḥ | pariharati—tatra hīti | tatrārciṣāṃ prādhānyaṃ sākṣātkriyānvayāt, samarthānāmavayavinoreva prādhānyamato 'nayorbheda ityāśayaḥ | nakhacandrāṇāṃ tadaṅgatayānvayaḥ |
tarhyarciṣāmeva rūpakatvamastu, tathāpi sa doṣastadavastha evetyata āha—tāśceti | tā arciṣaḥ | pāṇipadmānītyatra rūpakatve doṣatādavasthyādāha—pāṇīti | jigīṣubhāvavarṇanāyāṃ mukhyatvenāṅgatayā pāṇipadmādyanvaya iti śabdaprādhānyameva | prakṛte tu caraṇāderavayavinaḥ pradhānakriyānvaya ityarthaprādhānyamiti bhedaḥ ||

atrāpyekadeśopakrameṇādharapallavasvedāmbukaṇamañjarīṇāṃ sahajāhāryāvayavānāmabhidhānādupamānāvayavinaścānabhidhānādidamasamastaṃ nāma rūpakamaṅgipradhāneṣvarthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | atrāpi ca sphuritādharapallavamiti viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya mukhyavastunaḥ gharmāmbhaḥkaṇamañjarīdhāraṇakriyāsamāveśaḥ prādhānyaṃ sthāpayati ||

akasmādityādi | he caṇḍi kopane, tava sphuritādharapallavaṃ mukhaṃ kartṛ, akasmādeva kāraṇaṃ vinaiva mauktikacchāyā gharmāmbukaṇamañjarīrdhatte bibharti | atrāpīti | yathaikadeśopamāyāmavayavānāṃ prādhānyaṃ tathātrāpyavayavānāmeva prādhānyādasamastarūpakatvam | evaṃ cāvayavino mukhasya rūpakābhāvādavayavarūpakamidamiti bhāvaḥ | sahajāvayavatādhare āhāryāvayavataupacārikyavayavatā gharmāmbhaḥkaṇasyāvayavāśrayatvāt | upamānāvayavino latākhyasya | śabdabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedāsamastarūpakādasya bhedamāha—atrāpīti | ihoktayuktyārthaprādhānyamiti bhedaḥ ||

atra smitapuṣpojjvalaṃ lolanetrabhṛṅga surabhiśvasitānilaṃ te mukhaṃ na kasya nandanamiti puṣpabhṛṅgādīnāṃ parasparaṃ yuktyupapatteryuktaṃ nāmāyamaṅgāṅgipradhānarūpakeṣvarthabhūyiṣṭho rūpakabhedaḥ | atra yadyapi nandanamiva nandana-
miti gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayaḥ śabda eva samastaviśeṣaṇaiḥ pariṣkriyate tathāpi nandayatīti nandanamiti kṛdabhihitakriyāsamāveśe mukhākhyasyaiva vastunaḥ prādhānyamavagamyate tasya tvapahriyata ityarthapradhānamevaitat ||

smitetyādi | he subhru, tavedaṃ mukhaṃ kasya na nandanaṃ harṣajanakamapi tu sarvasyaiva | naḥ śiraścālane | kīdṛśam | smitameva puṣpaṃ tenojjvalaṃ dīptimat | lolanetre eva bhṛṅgau yatra tat | surabhiḥ śvāsānilo yatra tat | yuktiryogaḥ upapattiścobhayamapi vivakṣitamiha | tathā hi puṣpabhramarayoryuktiryogaḥ puṣpaiḥ saha bhramarāṇāṃ makarandapānakṛtaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | ata evopapadyate puṣpabhramarayorekatrāvasthānam, na hi puṣpāṇi bhramarairvinā śobhanta iti yuktarūpakatetyāśayavānāha—parasparamiti | nandanamiva nandanamiti śabdaprādhānye 'pi nandayatīti nandanamiti kṛdabhihito bhāvo dravyavatprakāśata iti vacanādanyaprādhānyameva vivakṣitamiti śaṅkottarābhyām ||

atra jyotsnotpalayorayogājjagannetrendośca mukhasya saṃtāpakāraṇamidamayuktaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānarūpakabhedeṣvartha bhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | atrāpi pūrvavanmuravākhyavastuno viśeṣaṇaiḥ pariṣkaraṇamiti tasyaiva prādhānyamavagamyate ||

idamityādi| he kānte, tavedaṃ mukhaṃ jagannetrāṇāmindurasmākaṃ tāpāya kathaṃ kalpate śakto bhavati | kīdṛśam | ārdrasmitaṃ saraseṣaddhāsa eva jyotsnā yatra tat | snigdhaṃ netrotpalaṃ yatra tat | smitasyārdratvena snehajanitatā lakṣyate, kopasmitasya sūkṣmatvāt | iha jyotsnāyā utpalasya ca sahānavasthānaṃ tacca mitho 'nupakāryopakārakabhāvādityayuktarūpakatā | arthaprādhānyaṃ pūrvoktayuktyātrāpītyāha—atrāpīti ||

atrauṣṭhādīnāṃ dalādīnāṃ ca mukhāmbhojāvayavānāṃ sphuritavigalitotkhaṇḍitasphuṭaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭānāṃ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvarūpitānāṃ mukhapakṣe kamalapakṣe ca sahajatvaṃ gamyata iti sahajāvayavo nāmāyamaṅgapradhānarūpakeṣvarthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | naitadvācyam—tāmrāṅgulidalaśreṇītyāderarthapradhānabhedādidaṃ na bhidyata iti | tatra hi bhūpālamaulidhāraṇakriyāsamāveśenāvayavinaḥ prādhānyaṃ vivakṣitam, iha tu patanakriyāyāmavayavānāmata eva te sphuritādiviśeṣaṇairviśiṣyante ||

bhedāniti | tayoḥ sahajāhāryayoryogastadyogaḥ, tayorvaiṣamyaṃ viṣamāvayavatā | papphuria iti | iha mukhameva kamalaṃ tatpatitam | kīdṛśam | prasphuritamoṣṭhapuṭameva dalaṃ patraṃ yatra tat | tatkālavigalitarudhirameva madhupravāho yatra tat | vicchardaḥ pravāhaḥ | utkhaṇḍitakaṇṭha eva nālo yatra tat | sphuṭadaśanā eva kesarāṇi yatra tat | iha mukhasyauṣṭhādīni padmasya patrādīnyavayavāste ca sahajā iti tatprādhānyādidaṃ sahajāvayavarūpakam | na ca tāmrāṅgulītyanenāvayavipradhānenāsyābheda iti vācyam, tatrāṅgiprādhānyasya vivākṣitatvādihāṅgaprādhānyasya tattvādityāha—na ceti ||

atra kumbhakarṇaprativacanamamarṣo 'śukamiti daśānanapakṣe daṇḍo ghora-
viṣaṃ nirmoka iti bhujagapakṣe ye 'vayavāsteṣāmāhāryatvādidamāhāryāvayavaṃ nāma rūpakamaṅgapradhānarūpakeṣvarthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | atrāpi kumbhakarṇasaṃbandhaparighaṭṭitagalitaviśiṣṭānāmavayavānāmeva daśānanabhujagabhīṣaṇatarīkaraṇakriyāyāṃ prādhānyamavagamyate ||

to ityādi | ‘tataḥ kumbhakarṇaprativacanadaṇḍaparighaṭṭitāmarṣaghoraviṣaḥ | galitāṃśukanirmoko jāto bhīṣaṇanaro daśānanabhujagaḥ ||’ tato 'nantaraṃ daśānana eva bhujagaḥ sarpaḥ so 'tibhayānako jātaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ | kumbhakarṇaprativacanameva daṇḍastena parighaṭṭita utthāpito 'marṣa eva ghoraviṣaṃ yasya saḥ | galitaścyutoṃśukaṃ vasrameva nirmokaḥ kañcuko yasya saḥ | ‘samau kañcukanirmokau’ ityamaraḥ | iha prativacanādīnāmavayavatvābhāvādāhāryāvayavatā, teṣāmeva prādhānyādāhāryāvayavarūpakamidam ||

l.seg: skandho dāraparigrahaḥ paribhavaḥ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ durgatiḥ

div.p: atra bījaṃ mūlamaṅkuraḥ puṣpaṃ phalamiti latāpakṣe sahajāḥ, tṛṣṇāpakṣe punarahaṃkṛtyādaya āhāryāvayavā iti tadidaṃ sahajāhāryāṇāmavayavānāṃ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvarūpaṇenobhayāvayavaṃ nāma rūpakamidamaṅgapradhānarūpakeṣvarthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | atrāpi cāhaṃkāramamatādhrauvyasmaraṇasutādidāraparigrahaparābhavadurgatīnāmavayavānāmeva bījādirūpeṇa rūpitānāṃ bhagavadārādhanakuṭhāreṇa tṛṣṇālatā lūyatāmiti prārthanakriyayā samāveśena prādhānyamavagamyate ||

yasyā ityādi | sā mama tṛṣṇaiva latā he kṛṣṇa, tvatpādapūjāparaśunā lūyatāṃ chidyatām, tvaccaraṇārhaṇaiva paraśuḥ kuṭhāraḥ | yasyāstṛṣṇālatāyā ahaṃkṛtirahaṃkāra eva bījamādikāraṇam, gurutaro mametigraho mamatvaniścayo mūlam, nityamidamiti
smṛtiraṅkuraḥ, putramitrabhṛtyādayaḥ kisalayāḥ, dārāṇāṃ patnīnāṃ parigraho 'nurāgaḥ skandhaḥ, paribhavaḥ parābhavaḥ kusumam, durgatirnarakaḥ phalam | sarvatra yasyā ityanvayaḥ | ‘taruprakāṇḍe skandho nā’ iti viśvaḥ | ‘narako nirayo durgatiḥ striyām’ ityamaraḥ | iha bījādīnāṃ sahajāvayavatā, ahaṃkṛtyādīnāmāhāryāvayavatā, teṣāmeva ca prādhānyaṃ vivakṣitamityubhayāvayavapradhānamidam | dhrauvyaṃ nityatā ||

atrendunā mukhāvayavī rūpitaḥ, bhruvau ca tadavayavau latāvayavibhyām, madaraktau tu kapolau na kenāpīti sarvato veṣamyādviṣamāvayavaṃ nāma rūpakamidamaṅgapradhānarūpakeṣvarthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ | atrāpi madaraktanartitayoḥ kapolabhruvoreva manmathasya jagatritayamardanakriyāyāṃ prādhānyaṃ sādhakatamatvamavagamyate ||

madetyādi | he priye, tvanmukhendunā manmatho bhuvanatrayaṃ mardituṃ jetumalaṃ samartho 'sti | kīdṛśena | madaraktau kapolau yatra tena | nartite bhrūlate yena tena | iha mukhamavayavi candratvena rūpitam, bhruvau cāvayavau latātvena, gaṇḍastu na kenāpīti vaiṣamyam, prādhānyaṃ cāvayavānāmeveti viṣamāvayavarūpakatā ||

atra samudratvena rūpitaṃ gaganamādhāraṃ parikalpya rajanīmeghatārakau-
ghānāṃ velāśuktimuktāphalaprakarāṇāṃ ca pratīyamānābhidhīyamānasādṛśyānāṃ śabdaprādhānyato 'rthaprādhānyataśca rūpakaṃ kṛtamityādhāravannāma rūpakamidaṃ śuddharūpakeṣu śabdārthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

ādhāravaditi | sohaï ityādi | iha gaganameva samudrastatra tārā eva suktāstāsāṃ prakaraḥ samūhaḥ śobhate | kīdṛśaḥ | viśeṣeṇātiśayena śuddhakiraṇaḥ | rajanyeva velā tīrabhūmistatra lagnaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ | sphuṭavighaṭitā vyaktībhūya vidīrṇā meghā eva śuktisaṃpuṭāstairvimuktaśca | iha sādṛśye rajanyādīnāṃ pratīyamānatā velādīnāmabhidhīyamānatā, śuddharūpakatā upamādyasaṃbhedāt | gaganasyādhāratayedamādhāravadrūpakam ||

atra dhūmotpīḍānāṃ vanarājikeśahastatvena kusumāyudhasurabhisaṃcaracdvvajapaṭatvena śaśikaramuhūrtameghatvena ca tamaḥpratihastatvena ca rūpitānāṃ nirādhārāṇāmeva śabdaprādhānyamarthaprādhānyaṃ cāvadhāryata iti nirādhāraṃ nāma rūpakamidaṃ śuddharūpakeṣu śabdārthabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

vaṇetyādi | iha dhūmasamūhā etādṛśā vijñāyante | kīdṛśāḥ | vanarājyā vanapaṅkteḥ keśahastāḥ keśakalāpā eva, ‘pāśaḥ pakṣaśca hastaśca kalāpārthāḥ kacātpare |’ ityamaraḥ | kusumāyudhasya kāmasya sugandhi caladdhvajapaṭā eva candrakiraṇānāṃ muhūrtameghā eva tamasāmandhakārāṇāṃ pratihastāḥ pratinidhayaḥ | ‘pratihastaḥ pratinidhau’ iti viśvaḥ | iha dhūmotpīḍasya vanarājikeśakalāpāderādhāratvānupapatternirādhārarūpakamidam ||

atrāvayavina eva kevalasya vadanaṃ paṅkajamiveti rūpaṇādasya śabdaprādhānyaṃ vellitabhruprabhṛtiviśeṣaṇopādānāccārthaprādhānyameva lakṣyate tena kevalaṃ nāma rūpakamidaṃ śuddharūpakeṣūbhayabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

velliteti | tavedaṃ vadanapaṅkajaṃ kartṛ madāvasthāṃ madyapānajāṃ daśāṃ vivṛṇoti prakāśayati | kīdṛśam | vellite nartite bhruvau yatra yat | ālohite atirakte īkṣaṇe yatra tat | iha mukhapadmarūpasyāvayavinaḥ kevalasya rūpaṇātkevalarūpakamidam ||

l.seg: ‘anāmuktaṃ’ iti ṭīkākārasaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥranāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 44 ||’

div.p: atra puṣpakisalayaratnamadhupuṇyaphalānāmanāghrātamityādiviśeṣaṇāpāditavyatirekāṇāṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyena śakuntalārūpeṇa rūpaṇādarthataḥ śabdataśca prādhānyamavadhāryata iti vyatirekavannāma rūpakamidaṃ śuddharūpakeṣūbhayabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

anāghrātamityādi | anaghamanavadyaṃ tasyā rūpamiha bhuvi kaṃ bhoktāraṃ samupasthitaṃ kariṣyati tadahaṃ na jāne | kīdṛśam | anāghrātamagṛhītagandhaṃ puṣpameva | kararuhairnakhairalūnamakhaṇḍitaṃ kisalayam | anāmuktamaparihitam, anāsvāditarasamagṛhītāsvādaṃ nūtanaṃ madhu,puṇyānāṃ cākhaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ phalamapi | ‘āmuktaḥ parihite śubhre’ iti viśvaḥ | iha puṣpādīnāmanāghrātādinā vyatirekavatāṃ rūpaṇādvyatirekavadrūpakamidam ||

atra pitāmahotpattipaṅkajamiva nabhastalaṃ śobhata ityupamānopameyabhāvenāvayavāvayavinorabhedasyāvivakṣāyāmupamaiva na rūpakam | ravikaradhavalābhradalasahasrayoḥ kesaranikaradalasahasrayośca pratīyamānābhidhīyamānasādṛśyayośca sahajāhāryāvayavabhūtayorabhedopacāreṇa rūpaṇamiti sāvayavarūpeṇopamāyāḥ saṃkīrṇatvādidaṃ sāvayavasaṃkīrṇaṃ nāma saṃkīrṇarūpakeṣūbhayabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

atheti | āhvayo nāma | sarvamekīkṛtya gaṇayati—saiṣeti | caturviṃśatirityarthaḥ || raïaretyādi | iha nabhastalaṃ śobhate pitāmahasya brahmaṇa utpattipadmamiva tasya padmayonitvāt | kīdṛśam | ravikarāḥ sūryakiraṇā eva kesaranikarā yatra tat | dhavalābhrāṇi śvetameghā eva dalasahasrāṇi taiḥ parigatamanvitam | madhumathasya viṣṇordarśanayogyam, śaradi tasya jāgaraṇādasya ca ramyatvāt, padmapakṣe 'pi nābhikamalatayā madhuripudarśanayogyatā | yadvā madhumathasya bhṛṅgasya daṃśanaṃ kavalanaṃ tadyogyam | madhu mathnātīti madhumathaḥ mūlavibhujāditvātkaḥ | ‘madhumatho haribhṛṅgayoḥ’ iti śāśvataḥ | atra ravikaradhavalābhrasahasrayoḥ sahajāhāryāvayavayoḥ kesaranivahatvena dalasahasratvena ca rūpaṇāt paṅkajanabhastalayoravayavinorupamānopameyatvācca sāvayavasaṃkīrṇarūpakamidam ||

atra divasāvayavino bhujaṅgāvayavinaścābhidhīyamānapratīyamānadairdhya-
dāruṇādidharmayorabhedopacāreṇa rūpaṇamavayavānāṃ caturṇāṃ ravibimbātapaphaṃṇāmaṇinirmokāṇāṃ satyāmapyabhedopacārayogyatāyāṃ dvayorivaśabdaprayogenopamāyāṃ dvayostulyarūpaṇe 'pyasāmānādhikaraṇyānnāvayavāvayavibhāvo vibhāvyata iti niravayavasyopamāyāṃ saṃkīrṇatvānniravayavasaṃkīrṇaṃ nāma saṃkīrṇarūpakeṣūbhayabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

dīho ityādi | iha divasa eva bhujaṅgaḥ sarpo 'parasamudraṃ paścimasamudraṃ gata iva | kīdṛśaḥ | dīrgho mahāparimāṇaḥ | sūryabimbameva phaṇāmaṇiprabhāṃ vikāsayan ātapasamūhaṃ kañcukamiva tyajan | atrāsāmānādhikaraṇyenāvayavāvayavibhāvo na jñāyate, ivaprayogeṇa copamā jñāyata iti niravayavasaṃkīrṇarūpakamidam ||

atra pādaparūpeṇa rūpitasya nabhaso yadetaddiśāṃ śākhārūpeṇa rūpaṇaṃ meghānāṃ ca madhukaraprakareṇa tadubhayamapyanyapadārthaṣaṣṭhīsamāsayorabhidhīyamānena sāvayavaṃ niravayavaṃ cetyutprekṣayā ca saṃkīryamāṇamubhayasaṃkīrṇarūpakavyapadeśaṃ labhate | so 'yaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpakeṣūbhayabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

dhua ityādi | iha diśo nijasthānaṃ svakīyasthānaṃ pratigatā iva | ivapadamutprekṣāyām | kīdṛśyaḥ | dhutā meghā eva madhukarā bhramarā yāsu tāḥ | ghanasamayena varṣākālena ghanāvaraṇādākṛṣṭāḥ saṃnihitīkṛtā avanatā bhūmilagnāḥ paścādvimuktāstyaktāḥ | nabha eva pādapo vṛkṣastasya śākhābhūtāḥ | atra dhutameghapade bahuvrīhiḥ | nabhaḥpādapapade ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastābhyāṃ sāvayavatvaṃ niravayavatvaṃ ca yathākramamuktam | ata evobhayasaṃkīrṇarūpakamidaṃ | ‘skandhakaṃ nāma chandaḥ'.skandhake, dhvanistu diśantīti diśaḥ prauḍhanāyikāḥ | anyā api diśo nijasthānamiva gacchanti | kīdṛśyaḥ dhutamedhaṃ(dhyaṃ) yanmadhu madyaṃ
tatkare yāsāṃ tāḥ | yadvā dhutā medhā buddhiryena tādṛśaṃ madhu kare yāsāṃ tāḥ, yadvā dhutā medhā yasmādevaṃvidho madhukaro vidagdho yāsāṃ tāḥ | ghanena dṛ̣dhena samayena śapathena samadena puṃsā vā ākṛṣṭā āhatā avanatā vaśīkṛtāḥ | upabhuktā iti yāvat | paścādvimuktāstyaktāḥ, yadvā vimuktā vigatamuktāhārāḥ paścātkarmadhārayaḥ | ‘samayaḥ śapathe kāle’ iti viśvaḥ | nakhasya pātaḥ kṣataṃ tadeva prasādhaḥ prasādhanaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥpakṣe ‘nakhapātaprasādhāḥ’ iti ||

atra sarasanakhapadākārasyendradhanuṣa utpannasādṛśyādabhedopacāreṇa rūpeṇa yo 'yaṃ sarase nabhasi padamasyeti vyutpattyā śliṣṭarūpeṇa tadviśeṣaṇaprakāro yaśca śobhāyāḥ prathamamagryaṃ cihnaṃ saubhāgyasya ca prathamaṃ cihnaṃ pīnapayodhare meghe stane vā lagnamityādiviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvastenedaṃ śleṣeṇopadhīyata iti śleṣopahitaṃ nāma saṃkīrṇarūpakeṣūbhayabhūyiṣṭharūpakabhedaḥ ||

pīṇetyādi | ihendradhanuḥ prasādhayati...... śliṣyati vā | kīdṛśam | pīne payodhare meghe lagnam | pravasatā gacchatā jaladasamayena varṣākālena diśāṃ vitīrṇaṃ dattam | saubhā‘śobhāgraprathamacihnaṃ’ iti vā chāyāgyasya śreṣṭhaṃ prathamamādyaṃ cihnam | sarase snigdhe nabhasi gagane padaṃ sthānaṃ yasya tat | pakṣe sarasaṃ nakhapadaṃ krameṇa pramīyate (pramlāyati) | kīdṛśam | diśāṃ praụdhāṅganānāṃ sundarīṇāṃ vā pīne māṃsale payodhare stane lagnam | pravasatā jaladasamayena nāyakena vitīrṇaṃ dattam | jalān mūrkhān dyati khaṇḍayati jalada īdṛśaḥ samaya ācāro yasya saḥ | saubhāgyasya prathamacihnamindradhanurākāraṃ ca | ‘samayaḥ syātkāla ācāre’ iti śāśvataḥ | pravāsagamane smaraṇārthaṃ vidagdhena nakhakṣataṃ deyam | taduktaṃ madrasikasarvasve—'pravāsagamane deyāḥ snehasaṃskārakā nakhāḥ |
cirotsṛṣṭeṣu rāgeṣu prītirgacchetparābhavam || rāgāyatanasaṃsmāri yadi na syānnakhakṣatam | rekhāstisraścatasraśca vakrā vakrākṛtirnakhaḥ ||’ iti | atra śleṣālaṃkāreṇopahitatvādeva saṃkīrṇarūpakatā || iti rūpakālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
sā kriyāyoganimittasāmyā dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmānyataḥ pūrvā yathā—

atra dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoranāviṣṭaliṅgatvādavaśyābhidheyatvācca sthita ityādiṣu na liṅgabhedadoṣaḥ | abhidhīyamānasthānādikriyāyogajanitaṃ sāmyaṃ samastamūrtimatsādhāraṇaśca pūrvameva chāyādṛṣṭāntaḥ | seyaṃ kriyāyoganimittasāmyā sāmānyataḥ pūrvā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

dvayoriti | dvayorupamānopameyayorvacanaracanābhedādyatraupamyārthatulyatā jñāyate tatsāmyamāmananti kathayanti | tarhyupamārūpakayorativyāptiḥ | ata uktam—upameti | yadyapi triṣu sādṛśyamasti tathāpi prakārakṛto bheda iti bhāvaḥ | tadvibhajate—tasya tviti | yadyapi bhedānāmānantyādasaṃkhyaṃ tatsāmyaṃ tathāpi tisra uktayaḥ prakārānugamakāstatretyarthaḥ || vastviti | vastu vācyaṃ kimapyupanyasya tatsadharmaṇastena tulyaguṇasya nyasanādudāharaṇātsāmyajñānaṃ prativastūktirityarthaḥ || pūrvādītyādipadenottaragrahaṇaṃ kriyāyoga eva nimittaṃ tatkṛtasāmyāt | sthitetyādi | sa bhūpatirdilīpastāṃ surabhimanvagacchadanugacchati sma | anugamanamevāha—sa kīdṛśaḥ | sthato 'vasthitaḥ uccalitaḥ prasthitaḥ, āsanavānupaviṣṭaḥ, jalābhilāṣī jalecchāyutaśca | jalābhilāyītipāṭhe ‘lā dāne’ tācchīlike ṇini ‘āto yuk-7|3|33’ iti yuki jalapānaśīla ityarthaḥ | tāṃ kīdṛśīm | sthitām, prayātāṃ kṛtagamanām, niṣeduṣīmupaviṣṭām, jalamādadānāṃ gṛhṇantīṃ ca | chāyeva yathā chāyā kamapyanugacchati tathetyarthaḥ | etāsāṃ kriyāṇāmekacittatayānugamārthaṃ dhīra ityuktam | nanu chāyeva sa iti liṅgabhedadoṣuṣṭamevedam | ataḥ kuto 'laṃkāratetyata uktam—anāviṣṭeti | avivakṣitaliṅgatvāt | nahi liṅgavivakṣāyāmiha kiṃcitprayojanam | iyaṃ copamā laukikī | loke ca chāyāyā āvarakānugamanaiyatyaṃ natvanyasyeti tāvanmātramevoddeśyamiheti na doṣaḥ | tadidamuktam—avaśyeti | sarvakriyāyāḥ prathamata eva sāmyātpūrveyam | upamāyāmeka eva vākyārthaḥ, iha tu vākyārthayorbheda iti bhitrālaṃkāratā ||

lg.l: ṭhāi ṇa ciraṃ ravimmi va vihāṇapaḍiā vi maïladā sappurise 50’
tiṣṭhati na ciraṃ ravāviva vidhānapatitāpi malinatā satpuruṣe ||]

div.p: atra jagaduddyotanakriyā pratāpaguṇayogahetusāmyamasādhāraṇaśca sūryadṛṣṭanta iti viśeṣataḥ kriyāguṇayoganimitteyaṃ pūrvā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

saalu ityādi | iha satpuruṣe malinatā ciraṃ na tiṣṭati | kīdṛśe | sakaloddyotitā vasudhā yena tasmin, samaste jīvaloke martyaloke vistīryamāṇaḥ pratāpo yasya tasmin | malinatā kīdṛśī | vidhānena itikartavyatayā vidhinā vāpāditotpāditā | ravāviva yathā sūrye malinatā ciraṃ na tiṣṭhati tathetyarthaḥ | kīdṛśe | sakalojjvalīkṛtavasudhe samastajīvaloke vistīryamāṇaḥ pratāpaḥ pratapanaṃ yasya tasmin | malinatā kīdṛśī | vihāṇaṃ prātaḥ tasmātpatitāpi | ihāsādhāraṇyameva viśeṣaḥ, pūrvatāpi samastakriyayā prathamataḥ sāmyena ||

lg.l: na kāraṇātsvādbibhide kumāraḥ pravartito dīpa pratīpāt 51’

div.p: atra rūpādiguṇayogajanmajanitaṃ sāmya sāmānyarūpaśca paścātpradīpadṛṣṭānta iti sāmānyato guṇayoganimitteyamuttaro nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

rūpamiti | kumāro bālako 'jaḥ, svānnijātkāraṇātpiturna bibhide na bhedaṃ jagāma | abhede hetumāha—ojasvi dīptaṃ tadrūpaṃ, saukumāryaṃ tadeva, vīryaṃ tejastadeva, naisargikaṃ svābhāvikamunnatatvamucchritatvaṃ ca | yathā dīpātpravartita utpādito dīpaḥ svātkāraṇāddīpānna bhinno bhavati | atrāpi rūpādikaṃ tulyameva | dṛṣṭāntasya prakṛtavākyārthaparyavasāne sati paścādanvaya ityuttaratā ||

lg.l: ucchāho subhaḍāṇaṃ visamakkhalio mahāṇariṇa va sotto || 52 ||’

div.p: atrāvyavacchinnaprasṛta iti kriyāyoganimittaṃ sphuritaśauryacchāya iti guṇayoganimittaṃ sphuritasūryacchāya iti dravyayoganimittaṃ ca sāmyaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpaśca viṣamaskhalitamahānadīsrotodṛṣṭānta iti viśeṣataḥ kriyādiyoganimitteyamuttarā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

avvocchiṇṇeti | iha subhaṭānāmutsāho viṣame duṣkaro skhalitaḥ satradhikaṃ yathā syodevamuddhāvati prakāśate | kīdṛśaḥ | avyavacchitro nirantaraḥ san prasṛtaḥ, sphuritā śūrasya subhaṭasya śauryasya vā chāyā khyātiḥ kāntirvā yatra saḥ | yathā mahānadīnāṃ srotaḥ pravāho viṣame deśe skhalitaḥ sannadhikamuddhāvati udgacchati so 'pi nirantaraṃ prasṛtaḥ sphuritā sūrasya chāyā kāntiḥ pratibimbo vā yatra saḥ | ‘pratibimbe ca kāntau ca khyātau chāyārkayoṣiti |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ('kāryārambheṣu saṃrambhaḥ stheyānutsāha ucyate |’ iti bharataḥ|) atra tādṛśanadīsrotaso viśeṣarūpatā ||

lg.l: ‘visaveo vva pasario jaṃ jaṃ ahilei vahaladhūmuppīho |
sāmalaïjjaï taṃ taṃ ruhiraṃ va mahoahissa viddumaveṇṭam (ḍham) 53 ||’

div.p: atra dhūmaviṣayorvidrumarudhirayośca dravyajātiyogakṛtaṃ pratīyamānaṃ śyāmalāyata iti dhūmaviṣadravyayogajanitamabhidhīyamānaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ ca sāmyam | seyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pūrvamevopanyāsāddravyacātiyoganimittasāmyā sāmānyataḥ pūrvā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

viseti | iha bahaladhūmotpīḍo mahādhūmasamūho viṣavega iva prasṛto yadyadvidrumapīṭhamabhilīyate 'bhilāti gṛhṇāti vā tattanmahodadhervidrumapīṭhaṃ śyāmalāyate kajjalībhavati | kīdṛśam | rudhiramiva, iyaṃ pūrvadiśā | abhilīyata iti abhipūrvāt līṅ āśleṣe daivādikaḥ... | ‘syādutpīḍaḥ samūhe 'pi’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | atra jāterdravyasya sāmānyata eva sāmyamiti sāmānyarūpatā dṛṣṭāntasya pūrvāmupanyāsātpūrvatā ca ||

lg.l: ‘saṃcāriṇī dīpaśikheva ratrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 54 ||’

div.p: atra dīpaśikhādidravyayogakṛtaṃ sāmyaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpau saṃcāriṇī dīpaśikheti ca rājamārgāṭṭa iti ca dṛṣṭāntau pūrvamevopanyastau | seyaṃ viśeṣato dravyayoganimittasāmyā pūrvā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

saṃcāriṇītyādi | sā patiṃvarā indumatī yaṃ yaṃ bhūmipālaṃ vyatīyāya tatyāja sa sa bhūmipālo vivarṇabhāvaṃ vivarṇatvaṃ prapede leme | yathā rātrau saṃcariṇī dīpaśikhā yaṃ yaṃ rājamārgāṭṭaṃ vyatikrāmati sa sa rājamārgāṭṭo vaivarṇyaṃ prāpnoti tathetyarthaḥ | vyatīyāyeti vyatipūrvāt ‘iṇ gatau’ iti dhātorliṭi rūpam | aṭṭo aṭārīti prasiddhaḥ | ‘syādaṭṭaḥ kṣaumamastriyām’ ityamaraḥ | iha saṃcaraṇatvasāmānyayogātsāmānyarūpatā, rājamārgāṭṭa iti viśeṣarūpatā ||
atra dravyayogakṛtaṃ sāmyaṃ sāmānyarūpaśca pradīpaḥ paścātpradīpaśikhāvartirdṛṣṭāntaḥ | seyaṃ yathoktarūpottarā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

ujjvaletyādi | tvayā tyaktā snigdhā snehavatī sakhī na rājate iti priyāyāḥ sakhīṃ prati patyurvacanam | tvayā kīdṛśyā | ujjvalo nirmala āloko darśanaṃ yasyāstayā | snigdhā kīdṛśī | malīmasaṃ mlānaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā | yathā pradīpaśikhayā tyaktā vartirna śobhate tathetyarthaḥ | pradīpaśikhayā kīdṛśyā | ujjvala āloka uddyoto yasyāstayā | vartiḥ kīdṛśī | snigdhā snehavatī, snehastailam | malānamukhī ca | 'malīmasaṃ tu malinam’ ityamaraḥ | iha nāyikāśikhayordravyayoryogaḥ | dṛṣṭāntasya sāmānyarūpatā paścādupādīyamānatā ca vyaktaiva ||

lg.l: ālekkhapaīvāṇaṃ va ṇiaaṃ païicaḍulattaṇaṃ pi vialiam 56’

div.p: atra hatacchāyamityādīnāmantargataguṇatvena kriyāviśeṣaṇatvāt kriyāguṇayoganimittaṃ nijaṃ prakṛticaṭulatvamapi vigalitamiti guṇayoganimittaṃ ca sāmyaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpaścālekhyapradīpadṛṣṭānta iti kriyāguṇayoganimitteyaṃ viśeṣata uttarā nāma dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ | atha dṛṣṭāntokterdṛṣṭāntālaṃkārasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ | ucyate | ‘laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminnarthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ’ ityarthaṃ prati tu na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | uktiṃ prati punaraneko vidyate | tadyathā—dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayormitre vākye nirdeśo dṛṣṭāntālaṃkāraḥ | ekavākye nirdeśo dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ | sādhyadharmasiddhaye dṛṣṭāntālaṃkāraḥ, sādharmya[nimitta]siddhaye dṛṣṭāntoktaḥ | ivādyaprayoge dṛṣṭāntālaṃkāraḥ, ivādiprayoge tu dṛṣṭāntoktaḥ | ata eveyamubhayālaṃkāraḥ sa punararthālaṃkāra iti ||

to tāṇetyādi | iha tatasteṣāṃ vānarāṇāmālekhyapradīpānāmiva nijakamātmīyaṃ prakṛticañcalatvamapi vigalitamapagatam | hatā chāyā pratiṣṭā kāntirvā yatra tat | pakṣe hatā chāyā ātapābhāvarūpā yatra tat | niścalaṃ locanameva śikhā yatra tat | proṣito 'ntargataḥ pratāpa pauruṣaṃ pratapanaṃ ca yatra tat | kriyāviśeṣaṇatrayamidam | ‘nijamātmīyanityayoḥ’ iti viścaḥ | svārthikaḥ kan | atra chāyāderguṇasya kriyāviśeṣaṇatayā kriyāyā guṇāyogaḥ | pradīpasya dṛṣṭānta iti viśeṣaḥ | uttarā ca vyaktaiva | atheti | ubhayatra sāmyamātrasyopajīvanāditi bhāvaḥ | laukikā lokaviditāḥ, parīkṣakāḥ pramāṇena vyavahāriṇaḥ | buddhisāmyasyobhayatra tulyatvādāha—na kaściditi | abheda evetyarthaḥ | tarhyabheda eva, netyāha—uktimiti | vacanaracanayāneke bhedāstayorityarthaḥ | sādhyeti sādhyo dharmaḥ sisādhayiṣitaḥ | sādharmyeti | sādharmyaṃ samānadharmatā tasyā nimittaṃ guṇādi tayoḥ siddhirityarthaḥ | ivādiprayogapuraskāreṇa śabdālaṃkāratā, sāmyādipuraskāreṇa cārthālaṃkāratetyubhayālaṃkāratetyāha—ata iti |
atra mṛgalocanopamānānāṃ tallocanopameyayośca sāmyamavikṛtānāmeva pratīyate | seyaṃ sāmānyena prakṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

sāmyeti | upamānopameyayoḥ sāmyenotkarṣeṇāpakarṣeṇa ca prapañcoktiḥ | sā ca kvacitprakṛtā svabhāvasiddhā, kvacidvikṛtaupāghikī || araṇyetyādi | tasyāṃ gauryāṃ ca tathā tena prakāreṇa hariṇā viśaśvasuḥ viśvāsaṃ jagamuḥ | kīdṛśāḥ | araṇyabījasya aṃḍorīti khyātasyāñjalidānena lālitā vilāsitāḥ | tadañjalisthanīvāradhānyabhakṣakā ityarthaḥ | yathā sā gaurī tadīyairmṛgasaṃbandhibhirnetrairagre sakhīnāṃ locane 'mimīta samīcakāra kautukāt | araṇye bījāni yasya tadaraṇyabījam | viśaśvasuriti vipūrvāt ‘śvasa prāṇane’ ityasmālliṭyusi rūpam | pramādoktireṣā | jauhotyādermādhātoriti tu nyāyyamamimīteti ‘māṅ māne’ ṇici luṅi caṅi rūpam | ihāvikṛtatā mṛgalocanānāṃ sahajasaukaryāt | ata eva prakṛtatā prapañcoktirivāderaprayogāt ||

lg.l: santīdṛśāni diśi diśi saraḥsu nanu nīlanalināni || 58 ||’

div.p: atra tava dve locanotpale eva, sarasāṃ punarbahūni nīlotpalānītyupamānotkarṣaḥ prakṛta eva pratīyate | seyamupamānotkarṣeṇa prakṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

garvamityādi | nanu he nāyike, locanadvayenāsaṃvāhyaṃ garva tvaṃ kiṃ vahasi | na vọdhumarhasītyarthaḥ | diśi diśi pratidiśaṃ saraḥsu taḍāgeṣu rhadṛśāni tvannatratulyāni nīlotpalāni santi | ata eva garvabhaṅgaḥ | ‘syānmardanaṃ saṃvāhanam’ ityamaraḥ | iha nīlotpalānāmutkarṣaḥ sāhajika eva | netradvayāpekṣayā teṣāṃ bahutvāt ||

lg.l: ‘anyato naya muhūrtamānanaṃ candra eṣa sarale kalāmayaḥ |
mā kadācana kapolayormalaṃ saṃkramayya samatāṃ subhāṣitāvalau tu ‘sa neṣyati’ iti pāṭhaḥnayiṣyati || 59 ||’

div.p: atropamānasya malinatākṛto 'pakarṣaḥ prakṛta eva pratīyate | seyamupamānāpakarṣeṇa prakṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ |

anyata ityādi | hesarale ṛjuprakṛtike, ānanaṃ mukhaṃ muhūrtamanyato 'nyatra naya prāpaya | atra hetuḥ | eṣa candraḥ kalāmayaḥ kadācana kapolayormalaṃ saṃkramayya melayitvā mā samatāṃ sāmyaṃ nayiṣyati prāpayiṣyati | anyasyānyatra saṃkramaṇe kalāmayatvaṃ hetuḥ | anyata iti saptamyāṃ tasiḥ | iha candrasyopamānasya kalaṅkarūpamalasaṃbandhakṛto 'pakarṣaḥ sāhajika eva jñāyate ||
atropamānasyopameyādīṣadutkarṣaḥ prakṛta eva pratīyate | seyamīṣadutkarṣeṇa prakṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

āpātetyādi | he āpātamātrarasike etatkṣaṇamātrarasavaśe he nāyike, sarasīruhasya padmasya bījaṃ vāpikāyāmarpayituṃ kṣeptuṃ kimicchasi | kiṃ tu nedamarhamityarthaḥ | atra hetuḥ | ayaṃ kālaḥ kaliyugākhyaḥ, ata evedaṃ jagannakṛtajñamamaryādam | tato he ajñe, sthitvā kālāntara idaṃ sarasīruhaṃ tavaiva mukhasya śobhāmatha ca saṃpadaṃ hariṣyati grahīṣyati | jeṣyatīti yāvat | ‘āpātaḥ puṃsi tatkālaṃ’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘maryādāvānkṛtajñaḥ’ iti ca | iha padmasyopamānasya mukhādupameyātkiṃcidutkarṣaḥ sāhajika eva vivakṣitaḥ ||

lg.l: chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï candāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā || 61 ||’
spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā ||]

div.p: atrotkṛṣṭopameyasya masīmālinyavaikṛtenopamānasāmyamāpadyamānaṃ pratīyate | seyamupamānopameyayoḥ sāmyāpattyā vikṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

ghariṇītyādi | ‘gṛhiṇya mahānasakarmalagnamasīmalinitena hastena | spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā ||’ iha kayācinnāyikayā candreṇa spardhamānayā pākāsaktayā śyāmitahastena mukhe spṛṣṭe sati nāyakastanmukhasya candrasamatvaṃ sūcayannupahasatītyekāparasyai kathayati—gṛhiṇyā iti | gṛhiṇyāḥ pākakriyālagnaśyāmabhāgaśyāmitena kareṇa spṛṣṭaṃ mukhamata eva candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā hasyate | ‘pākasthānamahānase’ ityamaraḥ | atra masīmālinyaṃ vaikṛtaṃ tata eva mukhacandrayoḥ sāmyāpattiḥ ||
atropameyasya madhumadatāmratvavaikṛta utkarṣaḥ pratīyate | seyamupameyotkarṣeṇa vikṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

rattuppaletyādi | iha kathāpi nāyikayā locanābhyāṃ caṣake sugandhimadyabhṛte pratimayā pratibimbena patitābhyām | ata eva madenātāmrābhyāmatilohitābhāyāṃ manojñā raktotpaladalasya śobhā laghvīkṛtātyalpā kṛtā | jiteti yāvat | ‘caṣakaṃ pānapātraṃ syāt’ iti hārāvalī | ‘surā...varuṇātmajā’ ityamaraḥ | bharita ityatra
bāhulakātpākṣika iḍagamaḥ | yadvā bharitaḥ saṃjātabharaḥ | tārakāditvāditac | ‘pratibimbaṃ pratimā’ ityamaraḥ | atra netrayorupameyayormadatāmratvaṃ vaikṛta utkarṣaḥ sphuṭa eva ||

lg.l: ‘mṛgaṃ mṛgāṅka sakalaṃ sadāṅke bibhārti tasyāstu mukhaṃ kadācit |

div.p: atra mṛgāṅka sakalaṃ mṛgaṃ sadāṅke bibhārti, tanmukhaṃ ca kadācinmṛganābhimātrajapatramevetyupameyasya vācanikyapakarṣāpattiḥ pratīyate | seyamupameyāpakarṣāpattyā vikṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

mṛgamityādi | he sakhe, tasya mukhasya tataścandrādiyānetāvānprakarṣaḥ | tamevāha | mṛgāṅkaścandro 'ṅke kroḍe sadā sakalaṃ mṛgaṃ bibharti | tasyāḥ punarmukhaṃ (kartṛ), kapoladeśe mṛganābheḥ kastūrikāyāḥ pattraṃ pattrāvalīṃ kadācidvahati | iha mukhasyopameyasya vācanikī vacanatātparyaparyavasannāpakarṣāpattiḥ | kalaṅkinā samamanayoralpa evotkarṣa iti hi vacanamapasarṣabodhakameva | vikṛtatā ca kastūrīpattrādhānāt ||

lg.l: ‘na martyalokastridivātpratīyate mriyeta nāgre yadi vallabho janaḥ |
nivṛttameva tridivaprayojanaṃ mṛtaḥ sa cejjīvata eva jīvati || 64 ||’

div.p: atropameyasya yathoktadharmayoge satyupamānena pūrvārdhe sāmyamuttarārdhe tu kiṃcidutkarṣo bhavati | seyaṃ yathoktā | vikṛtā nāma prapañcoktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

na martyetyādi | vivṛto 'yamabhāvālaṃkāre | ihopameyasya martyalokasya yathoktadharmasyāgre vallabhamaraṇābhāvarūpasya yoge satyupamānena tridivena taulyamagre tridivaprayojananivṛttyukterutkarṣa eva jñāyate | vallabhasyāgre maraṇābhāvāśaṃsanayā vikṛtatā ||
sā dṛṣṭāntokticchāyayā vidhāvṛjuḥ pūrvā ca yathā—

atra tadindostārakaughena kāntirucchedyā iti pūrvamṛjūktyā dṛṣṭāntarūpaṃ paścādyadetanmukhaṃ yuvatimukhāni vijayanta iti ṛjūktyaiva dārṣṭāntikarūpaṃ prativastūpanyastamiti seyaṃ dṛṣṭāntokticchāyayā vidhāvṛjvīpūrvā ca prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

pratīti | sā prativastūktirdṛṣṭāntoktiprapañcoktyośchāyāṃ dharmaṃ gāhate bibharti tayośchāyāvāhinītyarthaḥ || tanmanye ityādi | etasyā etanmukhaṃ yadi yuvatimukhāni (kartṝṇi) vijayante tattadā himabhāsaścandrasya kāntistārānikareṇocchedyetyahaṃ manye | iha karmānumitiradhyāhāryā | vijayanta ityatra ‘viparābhyāṃ jeḥ 1|3|19|’ iti taṅ | atra prathamamṛjūktyā dṛṣṭāntaḥ, paścāddārṣṭāntikamṛjūktyaiva prativastūpanyāsaḥ | tathā ca dṛṣṭāntokticchāyā vyaktaiva, vidhimukhatāpi vyaktaiva ||

atra śuddhāntadurlabhamiti vakroktyā pūrvaṃ dārṣṭāntikarūpaṃ vastūpanyasya paścāddūrīkṛtāḥ khalu guṇairiti vakroktyaiva dṛṣṭāntarūpaṃ prativastūpanyastamiti seyaṃ dṛṣṭāntokticchāyayā vidhau vakrottarā ca prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

śuddhetyādi | yadyāśramavāsino janasya vapuridaṃ śuddhānte 'ntaḥpure durlabhamasti tadā khalu niścayena vanalatābhirudyānalatā guṇairdūrīkṛtāḥ santi | ‘śuddhāntaścāvarodhaśca’ ityamaraḥ | atra śuddhāntadurlabhapadenedṛśaṃ rūpamantaḥpure 'pi nāstīti vakroktayā pratipāditapūrvaṃ dārṣṭāntike | uttarārdhe 'pi vakroktyaiva dṛṣṭāntakathanamiti dṛṣṭāntokticchāyatvavighitā tu sphuṭaiva ||

lg.l: ‘na mālatīdāma vimardayogyaṃ na prema navyaṃ sahate 'parādhān | mlānāpi na mlāyati kesarasragdevī na khaṇḍapraṇayā kathaṃcit 67’

div.p: atra na mālatīdāma vimardayogyāmiti, mlānāpi na mlāyati kesarasragiti ca ṛjūktibhyāmeva pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāntarūpe vastunī pratiṣidhyottarakālaṃ na prema navyaṃ sahate 'parādhāniti, devī na khaṇḍapraṇayā kathaṃciditi ca dārṣṭāntikarūpe prativastunī ṛjūktyaiva pratiṣiddhe | seyaṃ niṣedhe ṛjvī pūrvā ca dṛṣṭāntokticchāyāyā prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ |

na mālatītyādi | mālatīmālā vimardayogyā nāsti | atimṛdutvāt | tadvannavyaṃ navīnaṃ prema aparādhānna sahate | kesarasrak bakulamālā mlānāpi satī na mlāyati atimalinā na bhavati tadvaddevī kathaṃcinna khaṇḍapraṇayā na khaṇḍitapraśrayā bhavati | ‘navyo navīno nūtano navaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra dṛṣṭāntokticchāyayā niṣedhaḥ | pūrvatvamṛjutvaṃ ca sphuṭameva ||

atra kathaṃ vā syāditi vakrayā niṣedhoktyā dārṣṭāntikamabhidhāya paścānna vasudhātalātprabhātaralaṃ jyotirudetīti vaiyadhikaraṇyavakrayaiva niṣedhoktyā dṛṣṭanto 'bhihitaḥ | seyaṃ niṣedhe vakrottarā ca dṛṣṭāntokticchāyayā prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

mānuṣīṣvityādi | vivṛto 'yamabhāvālaṃkāre | atra kathaṃ vā syāditi vitarkotthatayā vakroktirniṣedharūpā, uttarārdhe tādṛśajyotiṣo bhūmāvasaṃbhave 'tirūpavatyā bhūmāvasaṃbhava ukta iti vaiyadhikariṇyaṃ vakratā ca ||

l.seg: udañcaya mukhaṃ manāgbhavatu ca dvicandraṃ nabhaḥ || 69 ||’

div.p: atra prathamacaturthapādayorupamānopameyasāmyaṃ vaikṛtam, dvitīyatṛtīyapādayorupamānāpakarṣaḥ prakṛta iti | seyaṃ prapañcokticchāyayā vidhāvṛjvī nāma prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

taraṅgayetyādi | he aṅgane rūpavati, dṛśo netrāṇi taraṅgaya cañcalāni kuru | tato nīlamindīvaraṃ padmaṃ patatu bhaṅgavadbhavatu | radacchadaṃ daśanācchādakamadharaṃ sphuṭīkuru vyaktīkuru | tato vidrumaḥ pravālavṛkṣaḥ śvetatāṃ vrajatu yātu | kṣaṇaṃ muhūrtamātraṃ vapuḥ śarīramapāvṛṇu nirāvaraṇa kuru | tataḥ kāñcanaṃ kanakaṃ (kartṛ) kālikāṃ śyāmikāṃ spṛśatu | manāk alpaṃ yathā syādevaṃ mukhamudañcayottolaya ca | tato nabha ākāśaṃ dvicandraṃ candradvayānvitaṃ bhavatu | taraṅgayeti taraṅgaśabdāt ‘tatkaroti-’ iti ṇici loṭi rūpam | ‘oṣṭhādharau tu radanacchadau’ ityamaraḥ | ‘vidrumo nā pravāle 'pi’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘kālikā śyāmikā caṇḍyāḥ’ (?) iti śāśvataḥ | dvau candrau yatra tadvicandram | atra vikṛtatayā prakṛtatayā ca prapañcokticchāyā vaikṛtamasāhajikam | prakṛtaḥ sahajaḥ | vidhitā tu vyaktaiva ||

atropameyotkarṣo vaikṛtaḥ, upamānāpakarṣaḥ prākṛtaḥ prakāśata eva | yā punariyamuttarārdhena rūpakeṇopamānāpakarṣasyoktibhāṅgistayeyaṃ prapañcokticchāyayā vidhau vakrā nāma prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

ekko ityādi | ‘ekonnāmita bhrūbhaṅge vimalakapole vadane tava mṛgākṣi tiryaṅgayane | etacchaśibimbaṃ kalaṅkāgāraṃ pāṇḍaramutkṣiptamupari bhrāmayitvā nirmañchanakarparam ||’ iha he mṛgākṣi, tava vadana etacchaśibimbaṃ nirmañchanakarparamupari bhrāmayitvotkṣiptam | kīdṛśe vadane | eka unnamita uttolito bhrūbhaṅgo yatra tasmin | vimalau kapolau yatra tasmin | tiryagnayane yatra tasmin | etādṛśasya nirmañchanamucitameva | śaśibimbe nirmañchanakarparadharmamāha—kalaṅka evāṅgāro yatra tatpāṇḍaraṃ śvataṃ ca | ‘aṅgāro 'lātamulmukam’ ityamaraḥ | ‘karparo 'srī kapāle 'pi’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atropameye vadane bhrūbhaṅgādervikṛtatvaprakāśaḥ sphuṭaḥ | uttamasya nirbhañchanaṃ kriyata ityuktibhaṅgī ||

l.seg: kiṃ karpūraśalākayā yadi dṛśoḥ panthānameti priyā

div.p: atropameyotkarṣa ṛjūktyaiva ca nibaddha iti seyaṃ prapañcokticchāyayā niṣedhe ṛjurnāma prativastūktiḥ sāmyabhedaḥ ||

dātāra ityādi | yadi dātāraḥ santi tadā kalpaśākhibhiḥ kalpavṛkṣapañcakairalaṃ niṣphalam | dānasya dātṛbhireva niṣpādanām | yadyarthino yācakāḥ santi tarhi tṛṇaiḥ kim | yācakānāmeva tṛṇākāryakaratvāt | evamanyatrāpi | cedyadi santaḥ sajjanāstadā amṛtena kim | khalā durjanā yadi tadā kālakūṭena viṣeṇa kim | dṛśornetrayoḥ | panthānaṃ mārgaṃ yadi priyā eti āyāti tadā karpūraśalākayā kiṃ karpūraghaṭitakāṣṭhikayā kim | karpūrāñjanyā vā kim | saṃsāre 'pi sati vidyamāne tasmādaparamindrajālamasti tenāpi kim | sakalendrajālātsaṃsārasya mahattvāt | ‘candrādikāṣṭhyañjanayoḥ śalākā’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra dātṛprabhṛterutkarṣa upamāne ca niṣedha ṛjūktyaiva ||

l.seg: ‘tadvakraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā ‘hā hema sā ceddayutiḥ’ iti pāṭhaḥtaccetsmitaṃ kā sudhā
taccakṣuryadi hāritaṃ kuvalayaistāścedgiro‘staccetsmitaṃ kā sudhā’ iti pāṭhaḥ dhiṅmadhu |
dhik kaṃdarpadhanurbhruvau ca yadi te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe
yatsatyaṃ ‘vastuvimukhaḥ sarga॰’ iti pāṭhaḥpunaruktavastuvirasaḥ sargakramo vedhasaḥ || 72 ||’

div.p: atropamānāpakarṣo vakroktyā ca niṣedhaḥ | śeṣaṃ pūrvavat | te ime dve api mālopamācchāyayā prapañcoktipūrve, punaḥ upamācchāyayeti mantavyam ||

tadvakramityādi | tasyāstatprasiddhaṃ mukhaṃ yadyasti tadā śaśikathā mudritā luptā | tanmukhasyaiva candratvāt | evamanyatrāpi | sarvatra tacchabdaḥ prasiddhau | cedyadi tatsmitamīṣaddhāsastadā kā sudhā kimabhṛtam | yadi tannetraṃ tadā hāritaṃ nīlanalinaiḥ | yadi tā giro vāṇyastadā dhiṅmadhu | yadi te bhruvau ca tadā kaṃdarpadhanurdhik | yadvā kiṃ bahu brūmahe vadāmo yatsatyaṃ niścitaṃ vedhaso dhātuḥ sṛṣṭikramaḥ punaruktavastuṣu dviruktapadārtheṣu vimukha eva | tathā ca tadvakrādau sati taccandrādisargo na syāditi bhāvaḥ | ‘ūrdhve dṛgbhyāṃ bhruvau sriyām’ ityamaraḥ | atra kathāmudraṇādinā candrādereva niṣedha iti vakroktiḥ | śeṣaṃ prapañcokticchāyatvādikaṃ pūrvavat ṛjuprativastūktivat | anayoḥ prapañcokticchāyā kathamityata āha—māleti | yathā mālopamāyāṃ vistareṇopamitistathātra prapañcoktirapi vistareṇetyarthaḥ || utpādyeti | yathotpādyopamāyāmupamānārthamutpādyopameyena pratīyamānamabhidhīyamānaṃ ca sādṛśyamuktaṃ tathā pūrvayorapīti prapañcokticchāyatvamityarthaḥ || iti sāmānyālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

arthayoriti | arthayorvācyayoratisāmyādyatra mano dolāyate naikatra sthiraṃ bhavati idaṃ vedaṃ veti kṛtvā taṃ saṃśayamāhuḥ | sa caikaviṣayo 'nekaviṣayaśca | yatraikasmindharmiṇyanekaḥ śaṅkyate sa ekaviṣayaḥ | yasminnānādharmiṇyekaḥ śaṅkyate so 'nekaviṣayaḥ ||

l.seg: maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamakhilaṃ yadviśvamābhāti te
tadbrūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kimasi bhoḥ kiṃ vā viyoginyasi 73’

div.p: atraikasminvastuni vastudvayasyābhidhīyamānasāmānyapratyakṣaṃ tadviśeṣapratyakṣādubhayaviśeṣasmaraṇācca yo vimarśaḥ so 'yamekaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ ||

āhāra ityādi | he sakhi, tadbrūyāstvaṃ vada | kiṃ yoginyasi yogavatyasi kiṃ vā viyoginyasi viyogavatyasi | ubhayasādharmyamāha—āhāre bhakṣye viratirvirāgaḥ samaste viṣayagrāme sragādau parātyarthaṃ nivṛttiḥ | nāsāyā agre nayanaṃ nāsikāgranirīkṣaṇamityarthaḥ | etadyadaparaṃ yacca mana ekatānamacañcalaṃ dhyeye patyau ca | idaṃ ca maunamavacanam | idamakhilaṃ viśvaṃ yacchūnyamābhāti | sarvatra taveti yojyam | 'āhāralāghavaṃ maunaṃ nāsāgrasya ca vīkṣaṇam | manaḥsthairyaṃ vaśitvaṃ ca yogināṃ viśvaśṛnyatā ||’ iti yogaśāsram | ‘bhakṣye virāgo nayanāgravīkṣā maunaṃ manoniścalatā vaśitvam | viśvasya śūnyatvavibhāvanaṃ ca viyogikṛtyaṃ munayo vadanti ||’ iti bharataḥ | atraikasminvastuni sakhīviṣaye vastudvayasya yogaviyogarūpasyābhidhīyamānaṃ yatsāmyaṃ tasya pratyakṣāddarśanāt | samānadharmadarśanāditi yāvat | viśeṣāpratyakṣādviśeṣādarśanādubhayaviśeṣayogaviyogayoḥ smaraṇādvimarśaḥ saṃkhayaḥ | iha sādhāraṇadharmadarśanaṃ viśeṣādarśanamāropya koṭidvayasmaraṇakāraṇamiti saṃśayakāraṇamuktam ||
atra mukhalakṣaṇe locanalakṣaṇe caikasminneva padmalakṣaṇaṃ bhramaralakṣaṇaṃ cāparamapi vastu pratīyamānasādṛśyamāśaṅkyate so 'yamapyekaviṣaya eva saṃśayaḥ ||

kimityādi | he ghanastani kaṭhinakuce, tvāṃ paśyato mama cittaṃ dolāyate saṃśayārūḍhaṃ bhavati | tadevāha—antarmadhye bhrāntaḥ kṛtabhramaṇo 'lirbhramaro yatra tatkiṃ padmam | lolamīkṣaṇaṃ cakṣuryatra tādṛśaṃ tava mukhaṃ kimiti dolāyate dolevācarati | kyaṅ kyaṣ vā | dolācittayorubhayakoṭiyogitvena sāmyam | atra sādṛśyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa | sugamamitarat ||
anekavastuviṣayo dvidhā śuddho miśraśca | tayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyaḥ śuddho yathā—

l.seg: ‘vālī bhaṃbhurabholī(bhambhalabhelī)‘āṇatariceḍiā bhelī’ iti, ‘bhambhalasaddo appiajaḍesu’ iti ca deśīnāmamālā ullasiaṇiaṃsiṇī
gahaṇaṃ suṇia vinikkantā ṇiddāe bhe(bha)mbhalī‘āṇatariceḍiā bhelī’ iti, ‘bhambhalasaddo appiajaḍesu’ iti ca deśīnāmamālā |
rahuvi tīa muhu johaī puṇa johaī
gaaṇu bhullalleo ṇa hu āṇaī doṇhavi candu(nda)kaṃ ‘vaṇe’ iti vikalpārthe nipātaḥvaṇu(ṇe) 75’
rāhurapi tasyā mukhaṃ paśyati punaḥ paśyati
gagane bhrāntimān na khalu jānāti dvayoścandraḥ kaḥ ||]

div.p: atra dvayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorbālikāmukhacandrayorekaścandra eva viśaṅkayata iti so 'yamanekaviṣayaḥ śuddhaḥ saṃśayaḥ ||

vālītyādi | ‘bālī(lā) bhumbhurabholī(?) skhalitanivasanā grahaṇakaṃ śrutvā viniṣkāntā nidrayā bhembhalī(jaḍā) | rāhurapi tasyā mukhaṃ vilokate punarvilokate gagane bhrānto na khalu jānāti dvayoścandraḥ kaḥ ||’ iha bālikā bhumbhurabholī ajñā |
ullasitaṃ skhalitaṃ nitambopari nivasanaṃ yasyāḥ sā | uparīti yogyatayā vaktavyam | ni drayā bhembhalī vihvalā grahaṇaṃ candroparāgaṃ śrutvā viniṣkrāntā | arthāt gṛhāt | rahurapi tasyā mukhaṃ vilokate punarvilokate | gagane bhrāntaḥ saṃśayānaḥ san naiva jānāti kāntāmukhacandrayordvayormadhye kaścandra iti | khalu evārthe | atra saṃśayaśuddhatānyāmiśraṇena ||

l.seg: astaṃ ko yātyudayati ca kaḥ ko raviḥ kaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
kā ca prācī tadiha na vayaṃ kā pratīcīti vidmaḥ || 76 ||’

div.p: atra dvayorabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sūryācandramasoḥ prācīpratīcyorvā tadanyatamamekameva vastu paryāyato viśaṅkyata ityanekaviṣayo 'yaṃ miśraḥ saṃśayaḥ | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tena vitarkoktyādayo 'pi saṃśayoktāveva draṣṭavyāḥ ||

dvāvityādi | dvāvapyetau raviśaśaṅkau navīnajapākusumadīptīnāmāśrayau staḥ | upasaṃdhyaṃ saṃdhyāsamīpe dvayamapi ravicandrarūpaṃ viyanmaṇḍalasyākāśamaṇḍalasyānte 'vasāne tiṣṭhati | tadiha ko 'staṃ yāti, ko vodayati | kaḥ sūryaḥ, kaścandraḥ, kā prācī pūrvā dik, kā pratīcī paścimā digiti na vayaṃ vidmaḥ | atra raktarūpatayā gaganāntagamanena cābhidhīyamānaṃ sādṛśyam | anekaviṣayatayaiva miśratā | tarhi vitarkoktiḥ pṛthak kathaṃ noktetyata āha—upalakṣaṇamiti | saṃśayoktāvevāntarbhāvānna pṛthaguktā setyarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘agūḍhahāsasphuṭantakeśaraṃ mukhaṃ svidetadvikacaṃ‘vikasannu’ iti ca pāṭhāntarāṇi nu paṅkajam |
iti pralīnāṃ nalinīvane sakhī vidāmbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ ||’

div.p: sarojetyādi | nilīnāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ ṣaṭpadā bhramarā yayoste padmapatre nu | ime viśāladṛṣṭernāyikāyā amū netre | svit | vitarke | śiroruhāḥ keśāḥ svit | natā pakṣmasaṃtatiryasya tat | niśabdaṃ śabdaśūnyaṃ niścalaṃ sthiraṃ ca bhramaravṛndaṃ nu || agụ̄dhetyādi | etanmukhaṃ svit | kīdṛśam | agụ̄dhena prakāśena hāsena sphuṭo vyakto danta eva kesaro yatra tat | etadvikacaṃ praphullaṃ paṅkajaṃ nu | ityanena prakāreṇa nalinīvane padminīmadhye pralīnāmavasthitāṃ sakhīṃ yoṣitaḥ sriyo bahukālena vidāmbabhūvurjñātavatyaḥ | vidāmbabhūvurityatra ‘uṣavida 3|1|38’ iti liṭyām ||

l.seg: māhaü puma tthaṇaguḍare ṇa muṇaï kahiṃ vasaï || 79 ||’
māghe punaḥ stanagṛhe na jñāyate kutra vasati ||]

div.p: kaḥ punarvitarkasaṃśayayorviśeṣaḥ | ucyate | nirṇayāsanno vitarkaḥ, vitarkāsannaśca saṃśayaḥ | saṃśayāno hi vitarkasya koṭimāruhya tato vibhraṣṭastattvamabhiniviśate | yathā pūrvavākye vidāmbabhūvuriti | saṃśayameva vā vigāhate yathā—'māhaü puṇa tthaṇaguḍare ṇa muṇaï kahiṃ vasaï |’ iti | śabdāśca kiṃsvidādayastulyarūpā eva saṃśayaviparyayayoriti duravabodhastadviśeṣaḥ | nanvevaṃ vitarkādayo 'pyubhayālaṃkārāḥ syuḥ | styam | kiṃtūktipakṣe parārthānumānavat, svarūpapakṣe svārthānumānavaditi | ayameva coktiśabdasyārthaḥ, tena svarūpamātroktau saṃśayavitarkādayo 'pyarthālaṃkārāḥ | uktiprādhānye tūbhayālaṃkārāḥ ||

muhe ityādi | ‘mukhe madaskhalitollape srānārdre cikure veṇīnivasanasāre samuktāhāre urasi | kālāntare taralākṣṇi madanaḥ samullasati māghe punaḥ stanagṛhe na jñāyate kutra vasati ||’ iha kālāntare māghātiriktakāle madaskhalitollāpe mukhe srānārdre keśe veṇīnivasanena kañcukavasreṇa sāre muktāhārasahite vakṣasi taralanetre ca madanaḥ kāmaḥ samullasati dīpyate | māghe punaḥ stana eva gṛhaṃ tatra na jñāyate kutra vasatīti | ubhayatra viruddhakoṭidvayaviṣayatayaikāmāśaṅkya pṛcchati—ka iti | nirṇayāsanno nirṇayāvyavahitapūrvaḥ, vitarkānantaraṃ nirṇayāt | vitarkāsanno vitarkāvyavahitapūrvaḥ | saṃśayānantaraṃ vitarkāt | etadevāha—saṃśayeti | saṃśayāno vitarkakoṭyavalambī vitarkānantaramuktameva jānāti | ata eva vidāmbabhūvuriti saṃśaya uktaḥ | tathā māhahu ityādāvapi śabdakārito 'nayorbheda ityāha—śabdāśceti | tarhyubhayālaṃkāratā vitarkādīnāmityāśaṅkya samādhatte—uktīti | yathā parārthānumāne śabdaprayogakārito viśeṣastathā śabdapakṣe svarūpamarthastatpakṣe svārthānumānavatpravṛttiḥ | sāmyoktādāvuktiśabdasyāyamevārtho yaduktinibandhanaṃ nāma | tathā ca svarūpamātrasyoktau nirvacane 'rthālaṃkāratā saṃśayatarkāderuktiprādhānye punarubhayālaṃkārateti || iti saṃśayoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: vācye pratīyamāne ca sādṛśye prathamā tayoḥ |

div.p: apahnutiriti | kiṃcitprasiddhaṃ dharmiṇaṃ dharmaṃ vāpahnutyāpalapyānyasyārthaṃsya prasiddhasya dharmāderdarśanaṃ prakaṭanamapahnutiḥ | na cāsyā ākṣepādabheda iti vācyam | tatra hi pratiṣedhamātramartho 'tra tu pratiṣedhapūrvakamanyārthakathanamiti bhedaḥ | aupamyamupamā tadvatīti vācye 'bhidhīyamāne | apahnotavyavastunyapahnutiviṣayapadārthe ||

lg.l: āśvasihi proṣitapati ke na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||]

div.p: gimhe ityādi | ‘grīṣme dāvāgnimasīmalinitāni dṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi | āśvasihi proṣitapatike na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||’ iha virahiṇī dāvāgninā digdhe vindhye meghabhrāntyā ārtā sakhyā samāśvāsyate—grīṣma iti | he virahiṇi, vindhyaśikharāṇi grīṣme vanāgninā śyāmitāni dṛśyante | natu nūtanavarṣākālīna(lika)meghā amī bhavantīti samāśvāsaṃ kuru | atra śyāmikayā vindhyaśikharanavame ghayoḥ sāmyamabhihitamata aupamyavatīyam ||

lg.l: ‘na ketakīnāṃ vilasanti sūcayaḥ pravāsino hanta hasatyayaṃ vidhiḥ |
taḍillateyaṃ na cakāsti cañcalā puraḥ smarajyotiridaṃ vijṛmbhate 81’

div.p: atra ketakīsūcīnāṃ vidhivihasitaiḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyaistaḍillatāyāśca smarajyotiṣāpahnutatvādiyaṃ pratīyamānaupamyavatyapahnutiḥ ||

netyādi | ketakīnāṃ sūcayo 'grāṇi na vilasanti śobhante | hanta viṣāde | ayaṃ vidhiḥ sraṣṭā pravāsinaḥ pānthān hasatyupahasati | ketakīsūcīrūpeṇa | iyaṃ cañcalā capalā taḍillatā na śobhate | puro 'gre iyaṃ smaradīptiṃrvijṛmbhate prakāśate | 'sūcyagre sīmanadravye’ iti viśvaḥ | atra kiṃcitprakāśena ketakīsūcīvidhihasitayoḥ sāmyapratītirevamitaratra | aupamyamapyubhayatra vyaktameva ||

atra rājakanyānurāgalakṣaṇasya romāñcakāraṇasya rakṣakāvagatihetoḥ
pūrvamevābhihitasya ca vanānilaśaityalakṣaṇena kāraṇāntareṇāpahnavaḥ | na caitayoḥ sādṛśyamasti seyamanaupamyābhidhīyamānāpahnotavyavastuḥ | kāryātpūrvaṃ kāraṇopanyāsena pūrvetyucyate |

rājetyādi | romodbhedena romāñcena rājakanyānuraktaṃ bhūpakanyānurāgiṇaṃ māṃ rakṣakāstadavekṣakā avagaccheyurjñāyeran | āṃ smaraṇe, jñātam | aho vanaṃ śītalānilam | ato romāñcaḥ | ‘āṃ jñānaniścayasmṛtyoḥ’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra pūrvābhidhānena pūrvatvamubhayorasādṛśyādanaupamyatā ||
atrānandāśrupravṛttamiti pūrvaṃ kāryasya, paścāt dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakāmiti kāraṇasyopanyāsaḥ | śeṣaṃ pūrvavat | seyamabhidhīyamānāpahnotavyavasturanaupamyāpahnutirapūrvetyucyate |

ānandetyādi | kanyakāmeva dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ mamānandāśru pravṛttamasti | vātodbhūtena rajasā vāyucālitadhūlyā mamākṣi pūritam | śeṣamapahnavādikaṃ pūrvavatpūrvāpahnutivat | abhidhānamanaupamyamapi pūrvavadeva pūrvaṃ kāraṇānupanyāsenāpūrvatvam ||

atra naitasyāḥ stanayorupapatinā nakhakṣataṃ kṛtamapi tu kaṇṭakairiti pratīyamānāpahnotavyaṃ vastu prakāśate | pūrvavadeva ca pūrvārdhe kāraṇasyopanyāsaḥ, paścimārghe tu kāryopadeśo dṛśyate | seyamanaupamyā pratīyamānāpahnotavyavastuḥ pūrvā nāma—‘apahnutirapahnutya kiṃcidanyārthadarśanam’ iti lakṣaṇayogājjāyate |

ura ityādi | ‘uraḥpreritavṛtikāravellīphalānyuccinoṣi dayitavatsale | kaṇṭakavilikhitapīnonnatastani tāmya idānīm ||’ iha he dayitavatsale priyapremavati kaṇṭakalikhitapīnonnatastani, idānīṃ tāmyodvignā bhava | kiṃ kṛtvā | urasā vakṣasā preritā yā vṛtirveṣṭanaṃ tatra kāravellīphalāni uccinoṣi troṭayasi | kāravellī karavellī | atra pūrvārdhe kāraṇakathanātpūrvatā | uktayoranaupamyaṃ vyaktameva | nanu nātra sāhajiko 'pahnavastatkathamapahnutirata āha—apahnutyeti | āropeṇāpahnavalakṣaṇayogādapahnutirityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāi savvaṇaṃ aharam |
sabhamarapaümagdhāiṇi ‘vāritā adharadarśanaparyavasāyisabhramara padmāghrāṇaṃ nidhuvanaṃ ca mā kṛthā iti nivāritāpi vāmā nivāritācaraṇā pratikūlā’ ityudāharaṇacandrikāvāriavāme sahasu eṇhim || 85 ||’
[kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam |

div.p: atrāpi nāsyā upapatinādharo vraṇitaḥ kiṃ tarhi bhramareṇeti pratīyamānāpahnotavyaṃ vastu | pūrvārdhe tu savraṇamadharamiti kāryamupanyasya, paścimārdhe sabhramarakamalāghrāyiṇīti kāraṇamupanyastam | seyamanaupamyā pratīyamānāpahnotavyavasturapūrvā ca yathoktalakṣaṇayogājjāyate |

kassa va ityādi | ‘kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam | sabhramarapadmāghrāyiṇi vāritavāmye sahasvedānīm ||’ iha preyāyā adharaṃ sakṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasya roṣo na bhavati | tato hetorbhramarasahitapadmasyāghrāṇakārike, he vāritavāmye dākṣiṇyavati, saṃprati tvaṃ sahasva sahiṣṇurbhava | atrottarārdhe kāraṇopanyāsādapūrvatā | pūrvavadāśaṅkāsamādhāne ityāha—yathokteti | ityapahnutyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
samādhiriti | anyadharmasyānyatra viśeṣe ya āropaḥ sa samādhiḥ | nirudbhedo 'vyaktaḥ, sodbhedaḥ sphuṭaḥ ||
atra dinakaradinalakṣmīpratīcīnāṃ samāropitanāyakanāyikāpratināyikādharmāṇāṃ dūrapratibaddharāga ityādibhiḥ śliṣṭapadairanudbhedaḥ | evamanyadharmādhyāropādayaṃ nirudbhedaḥ samādhibhedaḥ ||

dūra ityādi | ‘dūrapratibaddharāge 'vagūhamāna eva dinakare 'paradiśam | asahamāneva klāmyati priyatamapratyakṣadūṣaṇaṃ dinalakṣmīḥ ||’ ihātyarthadhṛtalauhitye 'tyarthaṃkṛtānurāge ca dinakare sūrye vallabhe cāparadiśaṃ pratīcīmaparanāyikāṃ cāvagūhamāne saṃbadhnātyāśliṣyati ca sati dinaśobhā vallabhasphuṭadūṣaṇamasahamāneva klāmyati mlānā bhavati | atra ca nāyakatvādyāropaṇaṃ rāgādipadaiḥ śliṣṭaiḥ kriyata iti nirudbhedatā ||

l.seg: ‘vallahe lahu volantaï ettaï puṇu bahu bali
jeṇa ṇiraggalu jampaï kimpi ṇa jāva jaṇu(ṇa)
yena nirargalaṃ jalpati kimapi na yāvajjanas

div.p:
atrāpi priyatamavyalīkāsahiṣṇuḥ kāpi kāminī himānīpluṣṭāṃ
kamalinīmālokya tasyāmātmadharmān, priye ca sūryadharmānāropayati | te ca baliḥ kriye 'haṃ tava roṣasyetyādibhiḥ padairudbhidyamānā iha pratīyanta ityayaṃ sodbhedaḥ samādhibhedaḥ | anyaścānyadharmāścānyadharmā arthapradarśanametat | vyutpattistu ‘anyaśca dharmaśca’ ityevaiti vyutpattyā dharmiṇo 'pyadhyāse samādhiriṣyate ||

vallahe ityādi | ‘vallabhe laghu vyapakrāmati punarāgacchati cireṇa baliḥ kriye tāmarasini tava roṣasya sthirasya | yena nirākulaṃ jalpati kimapi na yāvajjanastāvaddhimena viśīrṇā jhaṭiti pluṣṭatanuḥ ||’ iha he tāmarasini padmini, vallabhe sūrye laghu śīghraṃ vyapakrāmatyapagacchati sati himasamaye rātredīṃrghatvāccireṇa punarāgacchati sati tava roṣasya sthirasya balirupahāro 'haṃ kriye iti kācitkhaṇḍitā padminīmuddiśya vadati | yena hetunā nirākulo jano yāvadeva kimapi na jalpati tāvadeva himena viśīrṇā jhaṭiti tvaṃ dagdhatanurasi | vyalīkamapriyam | ‘himānī himasaṃhatiḥ’ ityamaraḥ | pluṣṭāṃ dagdhām | te dharmāḥ | dharmāroparūpe samādhāvavyāptirata āha—anya iti | anyo dharmīha vivakṣito dharmapadasaṃnidheḥ ||

l.seg: sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam || 88 ||’

div.p: atra saṃbodhya varṇanīye viṣṇusvarūpasya dharmiṇastaddharmāṇāṃ cādhyāsādayaṃ dharmidharmādhyāsarūpaḥ samādhiḥ ||

candretyādi | kayościt siddhayūnoḥ sarayvā nadībhedasyāsmin saikate bahukālaṃ vādadvaitaṃ vacanavivādo 'bhavat | ‘vādadyūtam’ iti pāṭhe vādo vivāda eva dyūtamityarthaḥ | saikate kīdṛśe | candrajyotsnayā viśadaṃ svacchaṃ pulinaṃ toyotthitabhāgo yatra tatra | anena ramyatoktā | vādasvarūpamāha—ekaḥ keśinaṃ prathamanihataṃ brūte, anyaḥ kaṃsaṃ prathamanihataṃ brūte | he bhagavan, sa prasiddhastvaṃ tattvaṃ yathārthaṃ kathaya |
bhavatā tatra tayoḥ keśikaṃsayormadhye kaḥ pūrvaṃ hata iti | siddhau ca tau yuvānau ceti siddhayuvānau | keśī asurabhedaḥ | kaṃso 'pyasurabhedaḥ | atra viṣṇostaddharmāṇāṃ ca cakradharatvādīnāmāropaḥ sphuṭa eva ||

lg.l: ‘prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyānnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva saṃbhāvayāmi |
setuṃ badhnāti kasmātpunarayamakhiladvīpanāthānuyātastvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ || 89 ||’

div.p: atra prāptaśrīreṣa kasmādityādibhirmanthakhedādidharmāṇāṃ nivartitatvāt prāptaśrīrityādīnāṃ ca śleṣeṇaivābhidhānāt tvayīti varṇanīyapade viṣṇusvarūpasya dharmiṇa evādhyāsāt taddharmāṇāṃ cānadhyāsādayaṃ dharmyadhyāsarūpaḥ samādhiḥ ||

prāptetyādi | he rāmadeva, samudrasya kampa ābhāti | kīdṛśasya | svavyāghāte sati iti vitarkān dadhata iva | eṣa prāptalakṣmīḥ ko 'pi kasmātpunarapi madviṣaye manthena manthanadaṇḍena khedaṃ vidaghyātkuryāt | analasamanasa ālasyahīnasyāsya nidrāmapyapūrvāṃ naiva saṃbhāvayāmi | akhiladvīpanātho rāvaṇastamanulakṣyīkṛtya yātaḥ prayātaḥ punarayaṃ kasmāddhetoḥ setubandhaṃ badhnāti | mathyate 'neneti manthaḥ | karaṇe 'halaśca 3|3|12’ iti ghañ | atra prāptaśrīrityādiśliṣṭapadairdharbhiṇa eva viṣṇurūpasyāropo na tu taddharmāṇāmasuraghātakatvādīnām ||

lg.l: samādhimeva manyante 1. ‘ādhārapustakadvaye ṭīkāpustake ca melitamiti pāṭhaḥ samupalabhyate | paraṃ kāvyaprakāśādiṣu tathā sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇātprācīne rudraṭaviracite kāvyālaṃkāre 'pi 'mīlitam’ ityeva varīvartīti tadanurodhādatrāpi ‘mīlitaṃ, ‘militaṃ’ vā yuktaṃ pratibhāti.me(mī)litaṃ tadapi dvidhā |

div.p: atra pallavitamiva puṣpitamiva phalitamivetyutprekṣayā latādharmāṇāṃ lāvaṇyadharmiṇi dharmādhyāropo dṛśyate | karapallavādīnāṃ cānupāttavyāpārahetutvena sādhakatamatvena vā prādhānyaṃ lakṣyate | so 'yamanyavastuni punaranyadharmāṇāmevāropeṇa melitaṃ nāma samādhereva bhedo bhavati | sa tūddeśe samādhyuktirityuktigrahaṇāllabhyate |

pallaviamityādi | ‘pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullitamiva nayanābhyām | phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāmāryāyā lāvaṇyam ||’ ihāryāyā gṛhapatiputryā nāyikāyā lāvaṇyaṃ saukumāryaṃ hastapallavābhyāṃ pallavitamiva netrābhyāṃ phullitamiva pīnastanābhyāṃ phalitamivāsti | adhyārope bījamāha—utprekṣayeti | tarhi karapallavādīnāmadhyāropādbahirbhāva eva bhavedata āha—kareti | anupātto 'nukto yo vyāpāro 'dhyāsaviṣayastaddhetutvena tadupasthitikāraṇatvena tatkaraṇatvena vā | ata eva kartrapekṣayā pradhānatayā svātantreṇānvayasteṣāmityarthaḥ | tarhi samādhyuddeśe 'nuddeśaḥ kathamastyata āha—sa tviti | samādhyuktirityatra samādhiriti kartavye uktigrahaṇamadhikārthasūcakamityuktipadenaiva melitoddeśaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘deho vva paḍaï diaho kaṇṭhaccheo vva lohio hoi raī |
galaï ruhiraṃ vva saṃjhā gholaï kesakasaṇaṃ sirammia timiram || 91 ||’
[deha iva patati divasaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva lohito bhavati raviḥ |
galati rudhiramiva saṃdhyā ghūrṇate keśakṛṣṇaṃ śira iva timiram ||]

div.p:
atra dehādayo yathoktakriyāvanto jantuvadhakriyāyāṃ nibaddhā divasādibhirupameyā divasāvasānakriyāyāṃ melitāstadetat guṇakriyāvatāṃ
dravyāṇāṃ pradhānakriyādhyārope dharmidharmādhyāse melitaṃ nāma samādhereva bhedo bhavati |

deho vva ityādi | ‘deha iva patati divasaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva lohito bhavati raviḥ | galati rudhiramiva saṃdhyā ghūrṇate keśakṛṣṇaṃ śira iva timiram ||’ iha dinamaṅgamiva patati, raktaḥ sūryaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva bhavati, raktamiva saṃdhyā galati, timiraṃ keśaśyāmaṃ śira iva ghūrṇate itastato yāti | atra patanādayaḥ kriyāḥ, lauhityādayo guṇāḥ, pradhānakriyāḥ patatītyādikāḥ, tadadhyāropo divasādiṣu | iti samādhyuktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

yatreti | yatrātiprasiddhatayopamānādevaitasyopameyasya jñānaṃ sā samāsoktiḥ | samasanaṃ samāsaḥ saṃkṣepastaduktirityanvarthatāpi | pratīyamāne jñāyamāne vācye 'bhidhīyamāne ca sādṛśye | ślāghāṃ praśaṃsām, garhāṃ nindām | ubhe ślāghāgarhe ca, nobhe aślāghāgarhe caitānupādhīnprayojakān samāsoktau vadanti | viśeṣyamātrābhyāṃ yuktāyuktābhyāṃ bhinnāpi viśeṣaṇadvayabhedavatī ekā tulyākāraviśeṣaṇā, uparā tulyātulyaviśeṣaṇā | saṃkṣepoktau ca prakāradvayaṃ bhavati tadāha—anyetyādi ||

l.seg: nyagrodhasya kimaṅga tasya vacasā ślāghāsu paryāpyate |
bandhurvā sa purākṛtaḥ kimathavā satkarmaṇāṃ saṃcayo
mārge rūkṣavipattraśākhini jano yaṃ prāpya viśrāmyati || 92 ||’

div.p: atra nyagrodhenaivopamānena pratīyamānasādṛśyasya varṇanīyavadānyopameyasyoktatvāttacchlāghayaiva tacchlāghā pratīyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāvatī samāsoktiḥ ||

uttuṅge ityādi | tasya nyagrodhasya vaṭavṛkṣasya ślāghā svapraśaṃsā svavacasoktyā kiṃ samāpyate | kiṃtu na | tasya ślāghā vaktumaśakyetyarthaḥ | aṅgeti sānunayasaṃbodhane | kīdṛśasya | uttuṅge ucchrite | uccāvacā nimnonnatā ye grāvāṇaḥ pāṣāṇāstadyukte ca śikhariṇi girau kṛtāvāsasya | ślāghāhetumāha—sa vaṭo bandhurmitraṃ vā purā pūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ | arthājjanena | athavā satkarmaṇāṃ śreṣṭhavyāpārāṇāṃ saṃcaya upacayaḥ kim | arthājjanasya | rūkṣā asnigdhā vipatrāḥ patraśūnyāḥ śākhino vṛkṣā yatra tādṛśe mārge yaṃ vaṭavṛkṣaṃ prāpya jano viśrāmyati | uccāvacetyatra bahuvrīhyanantaraṃ matubiti bhramo na kāryaḥ | uccāvacagrāvāṇo 'tra santīti viśiṣṭasyaiva matvarthasaṃbandhādbisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta itivatkevalādviśiṣṭasya bhinnabuddhiviṣayatvāt | ata evādaṇḍītyādayo nistaraṅgaṃ prayogā ityavadheyam | ‘grāvopalāśmānaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra paropakāritayā nyagrodhavadānyayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ tata evobhayoḥ ślāghāpi ||

l.seg: ‘kiṃ jāto 'si catuṣpathe yadi ghanacchāyo 'si kiṃ chāyayā
saṃpannaḥ phalito 'si kiṃ yadi phalaiḥ ‘ạ̄dhyo 'si’ iti ṭīkākārasaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥpūrṇo 'si kiṃ saṃnataḥ |

div.p: atropamānabhūtasya sadvṛkṣasya vyājagarhaṇayā tadupameyaḥ ko 'pi satpuruṣo vigarhyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyā garhāvatī nāma samāsoktiḥ |

kimityādi | he sadvṛkṣa, catuṣpathe kimarthaṃ jāto 'syutpanno 'si | yadi tvaṃ
ghanā nibiḍā chāyā yasya tādṛśo 'si tadā chāyayā kiṃ vṛthā | yadi saṃpannaḥ samṛddhaḥ san phalito 'si tadā phalabharaistava kim | kiṃtu na tava kimapi | yadyāḍhayo 'si mahānasi tadā samyakprakāreṇa nataḥ kim | saṃpratyadhunā svairnijaireva duśceṣṭitairjanato lokāttvaṃ śikhāyāmagrabhāge śākhāśatasyākarṣaṇamākṛṣṭiḥ, kṣobhaścālanam, āmoṭanaṃ saṃkocanam, bhañjanaṃ chedanametāni sahasvānubhava | ‘ạ̄dhya ibhye mahatyapi’ iti viśvaḥ | sahasveti ‘ṣaha marṣaṇe’ iti loṭi madhyamapuruṣaikavacane rūpam | ‘agramātre śikhā matā’ iti dharaṇiḥ | janata iti pañcamyantāttasiḥ | vyājagarhaṇā kapaṭanindā vaṭavṛkṣanindāṃ vyājīkṛtya satpuruṣanindopakramāt ||

l.seg: yasyā eva śiśoḥ sthitā vipadi bhūḥ sā putriṇī potriṇī 94’

div.p: atra pūrvārdhe garhā, uttarārdhe ślāghā gamyate, seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyobhayavatī samāsoktiḥ |

niṣkandāmityādi | itarānyā varāhī sūkarī sutān sūkarān sūte janayati | kiṃ kartum | aravindinīṃ niṣkandāmunmūlitamūlāṃ kartuṃ, sthapuṭito nimnonnatīkṛta uddeśo yasyāstādṛśīṃ sthalīṃ kartuṃ, palvale 'lpasarasi ambu jalaṃ jambālena kardamenāvilamanacchaṃ kartum | sā potriṇī varāhī putriṇī praśastaputravatī | yasyāḥ śiśoreva bālakasyaiva daṃṣṭrāyāmiyaṃ bhūrvipadi pralaye sthitā | daṃṣṭrāyāṃ kīdṛśyām | caturṇāmarṇavānāṃ samudrāṇāmūrbhipaṭalaiḥ kallolasamūhairāplāvitāyāṃ pūritāyām | vyāptāyāmiti yāvat | ‘jambālaḥ paṅko 'strī’ ityamaraḥ | varāhīti ‘puṃyogādākhyāyām 4|1|48’ iti ṅīṣ | putriṇīti praśaṃsāyāminiḥ | ‘varāhaḥ sūkaro gṛṣṭiḥ kolaḥ potrī’ ityamaraḥ | atrobhayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ varāhatvādinā pratīyamānam ||

lg.l: ‘itaḥ svapiti keśavaḥ ṭīkākṛtā tu ‘puramitastadīyadviṣā—’ iti pāṭho dhṛtaḥkulamitastadīyadviṣāmitaśca śaraṇārthinaḥ śikharipakṣiṇaḥ śerate |
ito 'pi vaḍavānalaḥ saha samastasaṃvartakairaho vitatamūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhorvapuḥ || 95 ||’

div.p: atra garhā ślāghā vā vismayoktāvevāstamayate | seyaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyānubhayavatī nāma samāsoktiḥ |

ita ityādi | sindhoḥ samudrasya vapurāśayo vitataṃ vistīrṇamūrjitaṃ balavat bhāravahanakṣamaṃ ca | atraivāścaryam | ito 'traiva harirvasati, atraiva keśavaripūṇāmasurāṇāṃ puraṃ nagaramasti | atraiva śaraṇaṃ prāptaḥ śikhariṇāṃ parvateṣu madhye pakṣiṇaḥ sapakṣā mainākādayaḥ śerate svapanti | naca śikharipakṣiṇa ityatra ‘na nirdhāraṇe 2|2|10’ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaniṣedha iti vācyam | tanniṣedhasyānityatvānnirdhāraṇasyāvivakṣaṇādvā nirdhāraṇadyotakajātyāderabhāvena tadunnayanāt, yadvā śikhariṇaśca te pakṣiṇaśceti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | pūrvanipāte tu bahuṣvekatra niyama iti vyavasthitiḥ | atraiva vaḍavānalo 'sti sakalameghaiḥ saha | ‘puṣkarāvartasaṃvartakālakāntijalaplavāḥ | iti vārimucāṃ vaṃśa ścaturdhā parikīrtitaḥ ||’ iti purāṇam | atra ślāghāgarhayorastamanādanubhayavatīyam ||

atrāmburuhasatpuruṣayoḥ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvasyātiśayaprasiddherupamānenaiva śleṣavattulyaviśeṣaṇapadābhidhīyamānasādṛśyamupamānamupameyamevāva-
gamyate | seyamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyā ślāghāvatī tulyaviśeṣaṇā nāma samāsoktiḥ ||
