nālasyetyādi | yasyāmbujasya padmasyaivamanenākāreṇa sthitiravasthitistatrāmbuje śriyo lakṣmyā vasatirvāso yukta eva | tadāha—nālasya nālāyāḥ prasaro vistāraḥ, atha ca na ālasyasyālasatāyāḥ prasara ādhikyam | jaleṣvapi toyeṣu kṛtāvāsasya, atha ca mūrkheṣvapi kṛtāvāsasya | koṣe kuṅmale ruciḥ kāntiḥ, atha ca koṣe pātre 'rthasārthe vā ruciḥ prītiḥ | daṇḍe prakāṇḍe karkaśatā kāṭhinyam, atha ca daṇḍe śāsane karkaśatā kārkaśyam | mukhe upakrame mṛdutā komalatā, atha ca mukhe vadane mṛdutā madhuravāṇīkatā | mitre sūrye mahān praśrayaḥ prītiḥ, atha ca mitre suhṛdi mahāprītiḥ | āmūlaṃ mūlādārabhya guṇasya tantoḥ saṃgrahe grahaṇe vyasanitā āsaṅgaḥ, atha cāmūlamādipuruṣādārabhya guṇānāṃ śīlādīnāṃ saṃgrahe vartulīkaraṇe vyasanitā prayatnaḥ | doṣākare rajanikare dveṣo 'sūyā, atha ca doṣāṇāmākareutpattisthāne jane dveṣo 'prītiḥ | ‘nālo nālamathāstriyām’ ityamaraḥ | ‘jalaṃ nīre ca mūrkhe ca’ iti viśvaḥ | ‘koṣo 'strī kuṅmale pātre hyarthasaṃghātadivyayoḥ |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘daṇḍaṃ prakāṇḍe śāstau ca’ iti | ‘mukhamāsye ca prārambhe’ iti | 'mitraṃ suhṛdi mitro 'rke’ iti | ‘śiphāyāṃ kāraṇe mūlam’ iti | ‘guṇastantau ca śīlādau’ iti | ‘doṣaḥ syāddūṣaṇe doṣā rātrau bāhau ca kīrtitā |’ iti | ‘vasatiḥ syādavasthāne’ iti viśvaḥ | atra padmasajjanayoḥ prasiddhisiddhamupamānopameyatvamata ubhayārthakaviśeṣaṇapadairaśleṣa iva sādṛśyamabhidhīyate | praśaṃsāparatayā ca ślāghāvattvam ||

atra pūrvārghe 'bhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ ślāghā, paścimārghe tu pratīyamāna﻿-
sādṛśyayorgarhāvagamyate; seyamubhayavatī tulyātulyaviśeṣaṇābhidhīyamānapratīyamānasādṛśyā samāsoktiḥ ||

upādhvamityādi | he pānthāḥ, tatsarastaḍāgamupādhvaṃ sevadhvam | kīdṛśam | mārgasya tilakabhūtamalaṃkārībhūtam | yatsara āsādya gataśramabharā yūyaṃ svecchaṃ vilasatha yathecchaṃ krīḍadhvam | ito 'smātkṣārābdhernivṛttireva kalyāṇī kuśaladā na punaḥ kathamapyavatāro 'tra kuśaladaḥ | atrāvataraṇaṃ na kartavyamiti bhāvaḥ | kṣārābdheḥ kīdṛśāt | jaraṭhena jīrṇena kamaṭhena kacchapena kṣuṇṇaṃ payo jalaṃ yasya tasmāt | upādhvamiti upapūrva ‘āsa upaveśane’ loṇmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacane ‘dhi ca 8|2|25’ iti sakāralopaḥ | ‘kamaṭhakacchapau’ ityamaraḥ | kalyāṇīti gaurāditvānṅīṣa | atra pūrvārdhe saraḥsajjanayoḥ paropakāratvādiguṇaistulyaireva sādṛśyamabhihitam | ślāghā tu vyaktaiva | uttarārdhe tu kṣārābdhestādṛśasyānupakārakatayā garhā vyaktaiva jñāyate, ihāsajjanagatā nindāpi pratīyate; kiṃtu sā viśeṣaṇadvārā netyatulyaviśeṣaṇatā ||
anyoktirdvidhā svajātau jātyantare ca | tayoḥ svajātau yathā—
atra hariśabdena baliśabdena vā kaścit samānetivṛttaḥ puṃviśeṣa evocyate; seyaṃ svajātiviṣayānyoktiḥ saṃkṣepoktirūpatvātsamāsoktireva |

lakṣmītyādi | sa balireva vadānyaḥ | yena balināsya harerviṣṇoḥ karo hasto bhikṣāpātrīkṛto bhikṣāpātratvamāpāditaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ karaḥ | lakṣmīstanakroḍakuṅkumenāruṇito lohitīkṛtaḥ | atra svajātitvaṃ tulyacaritatvam | haribalyorapekṣayānyatvamapi || tarhi samāsoktitā kathamata āha—saṃkṣepeti | saṃkṣepeṇopasthāpanādeva samāsoktitvamityarthaḥ ||

atra bhramaraśabdena kaścit kāmī, phullapaṅkajaśabdena kāpi praụdhā
ṅganā, kuṅmalaśabdena kāpi mugdhāṅganābhidhīyate; seyamanyajātiviṣayānyoktiḥ samāsoktireva bhavati ||

pibannityādi | bhramaro yathākāmaṃ yathecchaṃ praphullapaṅkaje madhu piban san asaṃnaddhasaurabhyamaprāptasaugandhyamapi kuṅmalaṃ cumbati | tatpaśya | atra vākyārthasyaiva karmatā | atra bhinnabhinnajātitayānyajātitā ||
ananyoktiśabdenehādhyāsaviṣayā tadbhāvāpattirucyate | yathaiṣa brahmadatta iti | sā dvidhā śuddhā citrā ca |

atra kasyāścinmukhe candramasamadhyāsya kaścidevaṃ brūte | sā ceyaṃ pūrvārdhe 'bhidhīyamānatulyaviśeṣaṇā, paścimārdhe punaranākāśe ko 'yaṃ galitahariṇa ityatra tulyaviśeṣaṇā samāsoktirevānanyoktiḥ | ekasyaiva cādhyāsādiyaṃ śuddhetyucyate ||

nānyasyoktirananyoktiḥ | tathācānanyoktipadena tadbhāvāpattistattā viṣayataivocyate | eṣo 'yamityākārastasyāḥ | mudhetyādi | he sakhe, upaprākārāgraṃ prākārāgrasamīpe nayane netradvayaṃ prahiṇu dehi | manāk tvaṃ tarkaya | anākāśe ākāśātiriktadeśe galitahariṇastyaktalāñchanaḥ ko 'yaṃ śītakiraṇaścandra iti | kīdṛśaḥ | jyotsnāṃ kiran vikṣipan | kīdṛśīm | mudhā mithyā baddho 'nubaddho grāsaḥ kavalo yairevaṃbhūtairupavanasthitacakorairanusṛtāmanugatām | svacchām | navā nūtanā yā lavalī latābhedastasyāḥ pākasya praṇayinīṃ praśrayavatīṃ ca | ‘lavalī ca latābhidā’ iti viśvaḥ | lavalīvācako lavaliśabdo 'pi | ‘lavaliḥ śvetapārthapī‘pādapī’ iti syāt (?) iti śabdabhedaḥ | upaprākārāgramityatra sāmīpye 'vyayībhāvaḥ | atra adhyāsya āropya | pūrvārdhe tulyaviśeṣaṇatvamuktam, uttarārdhe 'tulyaviśeṣaṇatvam | tasyaivābhidhānādananyoktirekasyaivābhidhānācchuddhatā ca ||
atrādhyāsaḥ pūrvavadvaicitryaṃ ca nigadenaiva vyākhyātam | seyamananyoktiḥ samāsoktirevānekādhyāsavaicitryāccitretyucyate ||

kamalamityādi | anambhasi jalaśūnye deśe kamalamasti | kamale punaḥ kuvalaye nīlanalinadvayam, tāni ca kamalakuvalayāni kanakalatikāyāṃ suvarṇalatāyām, sā ca kanakalatikā sukumārā komalā satī subhagā ramyetyanena prakāreṇa keyamutpātaparamparāriṣṭapaṅktiḥ | ‘utpāto 'riṣṭamityapi’ ityamaraḥ | pūrvavaditi | kasyāścinmukhādau kamalādyāropaḥ, vicitratā ca kamalādau kuvalayādyabhidhānenaivoktā tasyā evābhidhānādananyatayoktiḥ ||

atrāpūrveyaṃ lāvaṇyasindhurityanyoktiḥ, yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavanta ityādirananyoktiḥ, seyamubhayayogādubhayoktirapadiśyate | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenānyāpi yopamānopameyaviṣaye saṃkṣepoktiḥ sāpi samāsoktireva bhavati |

lāvaṇyetyādi | atra deśe 'paraivāpūrvaiva keyaṃ lāvaṇyasindhuḥ saukumāryanadī | yatra candreṇa saha padmāni saṃplavante saṃmilitāni bhavanti | yatra kumbhikumbhataṭī unmajjati utthitā bhavati | yatrāpare 'nye kadalīprakāṇḍabisadaṇḍāḥ santi | 'sindhurabdhau pumānnadyāṃ striyām’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘tīradeśe taṭī matā’ iti ca | atra siṃdhūktyānyoktitā, yatretyādinā sindhurevoktetyananyoktitā | anyānanyātiriktasamāsoktiṃ saṃgṛhṇāti—upalakṣaṇamiti ||

l.seg: sītāyāḥ purataśca hanta śikhināṃ barhāḥ sagarhā iva 103’

div.p: atra saṃkṣepataḥ sītāśabdavācyasya mukhāderavayavasamūhasyāśrayata indurañjanenaiva liptaḥ, jaḍiteva mṛgīṇāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ, pramlānamivāruṇyaṃ vidrumasya, śyāmeva hemakāntiḥ, paruṣā iva kokilālāpāḥ, sagarhā iva śikhināṃ barhā ityutprekṣokteranuktānyapi tadupameyāni mukhādīni pratīyante, seyamapi saṃkṣepoktiḥ samāsoktireva bhavati | kaḥ punaḥ samāsokteḥ samādhyuktervā viśeṣaḥ | ucyate | yatra prākaraṇike 'prākaraṇiko dharmo 'dhyāsyate sā samādhyuktiḥ yathā—'asahantibba kilimmaï piaamapacchakkhadūsaṇaṃ diṇalacchī |’ iti | yatra punaraprākaraṇike prākaraṇikadharmaḥ sā samāsoktiḥ | yathā—'pibanmadhu yathākāmaṃ bhramaraḥ phullapaṅkaje |’ iti | nanu dharmiṇo 'dhyāse samānamiti cet | na | ‘sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam—’ ityādiṣu ‘anākāśe ko 'yaṃ galitahariṇaḥ śītakiraṇaḥ’ ityādiṣu ca pravyakta evādhyāsaviśeṣo dṛśyate | ekatra manasānyatra tu vacaseti so 'yaṃ samādhyukteḥ samāsokteśca bhedo bhavati |

indurityādi | sītāyāḥ purato 'gre 'ñjanena kajjalena lipta iva candraḥ | hariṇīnāṃ dṛṣṭirjaḍitaiva jaḍībhūtaiva | pravāladalaṃ vimlānalauhityamiva | kalakokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣu pāruṣyamatikramavacana miva prastutamupakrāntam | hanta harṣe viṣāde vā | śikhināṃ mayūrāṇāṃ barhāśca sagarhā iva jātāḥ | ‘pāruṣyamativādaḥ syāt’ ityamaraḥ | atra sītāpadena mukhādyavayavasamūha uktastadagre upamānānāṃ tattaddṛśā utprekṣābhidhānādanuktā
nyapi tadupameyāni mukhādīni jñāyanta ityupamānopameyaviṣaye saṃkṣepoktiriyam | samādhyuktisamāsoktyorabhedaṃ manvāno bhedakaṃ pṛcchati—ka iti | uttaram—yatreti | yatra prakaraṇapariprāpte viśeṣye 'prakaraṇapariprāptadharmādhyāsaḥ sā samādhyuktiḥ | [yathā— ] asahamāneva klāmyatītyādi | atra priyatamapratyakṣadūṣaṇādhyāropo 'prākaraṇikaḥ | yatrāprastute prastutadharmādhyāsaḥ sā samāsoktiḥ | yathā—pibanmadhu yathākāmamiti | atra bhramare 'prakṛte prakṛtasya kāmino 'dhyāsaḥ tarhi dharmyadhyāsatulyataivāsyetyāha—nanviti | prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikatvābhyāmeva viśeṣastayoriti dharmyadhyāse 'pi na doṣa ityāha—neti | sa tvaṃ tattvamityādau dharmidharmayoradhyāsaḥ, anākāśa ityādau dharmiṇa evādhyāsa iti bheda ityarthaḥ | sa tvaṃ tattvamityādau manasā, anākāśa ityādau ca vacanenādhyāsaḥ || iti samāsoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: dravyaṃ guṇaḥ kriyā cāpi tāmutprekṣāṃ pracakṣate || 50 ||

div.p: utprekṣālakṣaṇamāha—anyatheti | prakārāntareṇāvasthitaṃ vastu yatra prakārāntareṇotprekṣyate parikalpyate sotprekṣā | asadāropaṇamutprekṣeti lakṣaṇam | kiṃrūpaṃ vastbityākāṅkṣāyāmāha—dravyamiti | dravyaṃ pṛthivyādi, guṇo rūpādiḥ, kriyā pākādiḥ ||
atra pratibimbarūpeṇa darpaṇe 'nyathāvasthitasyārdhanārīśvararūpalakṣaṇasya dravyasya yadaparārdhotpannārdhanārīśvararūpāntareṇa dravyāntararūpeṇotprekṣaṇaṃ seyamutprekṣā dravyotprekṣeti bhavati |

dehasthetyādi | yasya darpaṇe pratimāṃ pratibimbaṃ dehasthā gaurī paśyati anyārdhābhyāmutpannamardhanārīśvarāntaramiva | atrevaśabda utprekṣāvyañjakaḥ | ardhanārīśvarāntararūpaṃ dravyamiha kalpyata ityutprekṣā dravyagatā ||
atra karapallavādirūpeṇānyathāvasthitasyāṅgalāvaṇyalakṣaṇasya yadetat pallavitatvādirūpeṇānyathotprekṣaṇaṃ seyamutprekṣā guṇotprekṣeti bhavati |
pallaviamityādi | vivṛteyaṃ samādhyalaṃkāre | atra saundaryasya guṇasya pallavitatvādinā kalpanaṃ guṇotprekṣā ||

atra senāgajānāṃ gaṇḍasthalebhyo lekhanyākāraiḥ karairmaṣīrūpasya madapayaso yadādānam, yaścāsya tīratālīpatrodareṣu mahāvarṇatayā nikṣepaḥ sa uktarūpeṇānyathotprekṣyata iti seyamutprekṣā kriyotprekṣā bhavati |

senetyādi | he narendra, senāgajāstava vijayastutimālikhantīti manye | kīdṛśāḥ | svakarāṇāṃ hastihastānāṃ yāni puṣkarāṇyagrāṇi tānyeva lekhanyaḥ bhāṣāntaraśabdo 'yamkāpa iti khyātāstābhirgaṇḍasthalāt madameva maṣīṃ vāraṃvāramādadānā gṛhṇantaḥ | kutra likhantītyata āha—samudratīratālapatramadhyeṣu | manyeśabda utprekṣāvyañjakaḥ | ‘puṣkaraṃ karihastāgre’ iti viśvaḥ | na ca likheḥ kuṭādipāṭhāt ṅittve guṇābhāve likhanīti syāditi vācyam | ‘rada vilekhane’ iti nirdeśena ṅittvavidheranityatvabodhanāt | ata eva ‘lekhanīkṛtakarṇasya kāyasthasya na viśvaset |’ ityādiprayogāḥ | ‘lekhanī
lipisādhikā’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | (‘kariṇāṃ bandhanastambha ālānam’ ityamaraḥ | ‘śarīraṃ varṣma vigrahaḥ’ iti ca |) atra puṣkarāderlekhanyāditvenotprekṣaṇaṃ kriyotprekṣā | na ceha dravyotprekṣaiveti vācyam; likhanarūpakriyāyāmeva sarveṣāṃ tātparyāt | tasyā eva sarvairnirvāhāt yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti nyāyāt ||

atrāṅgulībhiḥ keśeṣu gṛhītvā priyāmukhaṃ cumbyate sā ca locane nimīlayatīti prāyovādaḥ | tatra mukhacumbanādikriyā pradhānamaṅgibhūtā pratīyate, keśagrahaṇākṣinimīlane cāṅgabhūte 'pradhāne | tatrāṅgibhūtāyāḥ kriyāyā utprekṣaṇenāvayavabhūtā kriyotprekṣitā bhavati | yathā hi ‘kuṅmalī kṛtasarojalocanam’ ityatra notprekṣāpadam, evaṃ ‘aṅgulīmarīcibhistimirakeśasaṃcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya’ ityatrāpi tanna prāpnoti; marīcyaṅgulisaṃnigṛhītatimirakeśasaṃcayamityevaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ bhavati | tatra yo 'yamavayavakriyāyāmapyanyapadārthoktadvitīyāvayavakriyāvilakṣaṇa iva prayogeṇa pṛthakpadatayā vākyakalpaḥ sa ivāsyāpi vyākhyānaparatvenāpyanuyojyamānaḥ kavibhirutprekṣāvayava ityucyate | anye punaryatra pradhānakriyā notprekṣyate, avayavakriyā tūtprekṣyate tamutprekṣāvayavaṃ varṇayanti |

aṅgulībhirityādi | śaśī rajanīmukhaṃ cumbatīva | kuṅyalīkṛtāni sarojānyeva locanāni yatra cumbane tadyathā syādevam | kiṃ kṛtvā | marīcibhiraṅgulībhistimiraṃ keśasaṃcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya gṛhītveva | prāyovādo bhāratādau darśanāt | atra dvitīyenevapadena bhinnapadatayā vākyakalpanamitarapadasyāpi tacchūnyapadasyāpi tadartha-
paratvamityutprekṣāvayavatvam | ata evotprekṣābhedatvam | avayavakriyāmātrasyāvayavikriyotprekṣaṇādavayavāvayavibhāvaḥ | tatrāṅgāṅgibhāva eva | yadvā avayavamātrakriyotprekṣaṇamevāvayavitvotprekṣetyāha—anya iti ||
līnevetyādi | vivṛto 'yamanuprāse | etanmate pūrvodāharaṇam ‘aṅgulībhiriva-’ ityādi | utprekṣopamāyāmantarbhavatītyāha—teṣāmiti ||

atra vyapadeśaśabdena kiṃśukakusumānāmagnisādṛśyamabhidhāya darśanakriyotprekṣyata iti seyamutprekṣopamā | pūrvasminnapyudāharaṇe marīcibhiraṅgulībhiriva timiraṃ keśasaṃcayamiva saṃnigṛhyetyupamānārthānupraveśa utprekṣāyāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ | seyamutprekṣāvayava utprekṣopamā cotprekṣaiva bhavati ||

kiṃśuketyādi | vibhāvasuragniraraṇyānyā mahāraṇyasya dagdhādagdhaṃ dagdhamadagdhaṃ ca bhāgaṃ paśyatīva | kiṃ kṛtvā | kiṃśukavyapadeśena kiṃśukakusumavyājena sarvatra vṛkṣamāruhya | ‘mahāraṇyamaraṇyānī’ ityamaraḥ | ‘citrabhānurvibhāvasuḥ’ iti ca | atra vyājapadena kiṃśukakusumāgnyoḥ sādṛśyamabhipretamata upamāgarbhotprekṣeyam ||

l.seg: tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā |

div.p: atra kaṭākṣolkāpātavraṇakiṇakalaṅkāṅkitatanumindumahaṃ manye ityanena svamatadvārakamutprekṣāyāḥ samarthanaṃ kṛtamityayaṃ matābhidhānamutprekṣāyā eva prakāraḥ ||

yadetadityādi | yadetaccandrasyāntarmadhye meghakaṇavilāsaṃ kurute lokastacchaśaka ityācaṣṭe vadati | māṃ prati tathā naitat | ahaṃ punarinduṃ manye | kīdṛśam | tvadīyaśatruvirahagrastāyā yuvatyāḥ kaṭākṣa evolkāpātastasya vraṇakiṇa eva kalaṅkastenāṅkitā tanuḥ śarīraṃ yasya tādṛśam | ‘lavaleśakaṇāṇavaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | ‘amānonāśca pratiṣedhavacanāḥ’ iti ca | atra nijamatopanyāsādutprekṣāsamarthanamiti matotprekṣeyam || ityutprekṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: kuto 'pi hetorvācyā ca pratyetavyā ca socyate || 52 ||

div.p: aprastuteti | astotavyasya ninditasya kuto 'pi kāraṇātstutiḥ praśaṃsā aprastutastutiḥ ata eva samāsokterbhedaḥ | tatra hyupamānopameyatā, atra tu ninditamarthāntaram, anyasya stutiriti | sā tvabhidhīyamānā pratīyamānā cetyāha—vācyeti | tatra hetudvārakamapi vibhāgamāha—sā tviti | dharmaścārthaśca kāmaśca teṣāmanyatasamasya prāyo bāhulyena bādhayā sarvatra svābhiprāyasya prakṛṣṭasidhdyā sotpadyamānā pratīyata ityarthaḥ ||

l.seg: utkarṣaḥ sa ca dhanvināṃ yadiṣavaḥ sidhyanti lakṣye cale

div.p: atra yathoktairhetubhiḥ svābhiprāyasādhanena yadidamīdṛgvinodaḥ kuta iti sākṣānmṛgayābhinandanaṃ seyaṃ vācyā nāmāprastutastutiḥ ‘ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ’ iti dharmaṃ bādhate ||

bheda ityādi | santo mṛgayāmākheṭakaṃ vyasanamakartavyaṃ vadanti yattanmithyā | īdṛgvinoda utsāhaḥ kutaḥ kutra | kiṃtu na kutrāpi | hi yato vapurlaghu bhavati ninditamiva bhavati | kīdṛśam | medaso balasya chedena saṃcalanena kṛśamudaraṃ yatra | medasāṃ sthityā sthaulyaṃ bhavati | kṛśodaratayaivotsāhayogyam | ata eva tundileṣvanutsāhaḥ | sattvānāṃ prāṇināṃ bhayakrodhayorvikārayogi cittamapi lakṣyate | bhaye cittamīdṛk, krodhe cedṛgiti | sa ca dhanvināṃ dhanurdharāṇāmutkarṣo yadiṣavaścale lakṣye sighyanti ca bhedakā bhavanti | ‘medastu vapā vasā’ ityamaraḥ | atroktahetudvārā nijābhiprāyasya sidhdyā mṛgayābhinandanaṃ dharmabādhanayābhidhīyamānamata iyamaprastutastutiḥ || dharmabādhanāmāha—ahiṃseta | mṛgayā hiṃsājanikā | ato dharmabādhātretyarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘kālākkharadu ssikkhia bālaa re lagga majjha kaṇṭhammi |
doṇha vi ṇaraaṇivāso samaaṃ jaï hoi tā hou || 112 ||’
dvayorapi narakanivāsaḥ samakaṃ yadi bhavati tadbhavatu ||]

div.p: atra kālākṣaraduḥ śikṣiṇetyanena lipijñānādibhiradhītadharmaśāstrābhimatarūpakapogaṇḍaḥ ko 'pi kayāpyavinayavatyā sopālambhamehi re kaṇṭhe lagetyabhiyujyate | tatra te matamevaṃ kṛte yadi narakaḥ syāt; sa yadyāvayoḥ sahaiva, nāsau naraka iti; kiṃ tarhi svarga iti | so 'yaṃ svābhiprāyasādhanānmahāsāhase niyogastasyeha sākṣādastutasyāstotavyasya stutiḥ pratīyate | seyaṃ pratyetavyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā ‘parasya dārānmanasāpi necchet’ iti dharmaṃ bādhate ||

kālākkharetyādi | ‘kālākṣaraduḥśikṣita bālaka re laga mama kaṇṭhe | dvayorapi narakanivāsaḥ samako yadi bhavati tadā bhavatu ||’ iha re kālākṣareṣu duḥśikṣita durupadeśa bālaka ṣoḍaśavarṣavayaska, mama kaṇṭhe laga | māmāliṅgayetyarthaḥ | dvyorāvayostathā sati narakanivāsaḥ samakastulyo yadi bhavati tadā bhavatu | tatrāpyāvayoḥ samāna eveti narako 'pi svargaḥ | kālākṣareti laukikī saṃjñā | re iti nīcasaṃbodhanam | ‘bāla āṣoḍaśādvarṣāt’ iti manuḥ | samaka iti svārthe kan | pogaṇḍo vyavahārānabhijñaḥ | pogaṇḍastu tataḥparam |’ ‘parato vyavahārajñaḥ’ iti manuḥ | adhīteti | adhītaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ manvādismṛtiryena saḥ | abhimatamākāṅkṣitaṃ rūpaṃ saundaryaṃ yasya saḥ | tādṛśaścāsau pogaṇḍaśceti karmadhārayaḥ | rūpaka ityatra ‘śeṣādvibhāṣā 5|4|154’ iti kap | avinayavatī veśyā | atra nijābhiprāyasidhdyā mahāsāhase suratarūpe niyogasya sākṣādanabhidhānātpratīyamāne vā prastutastutiḥ | dharmabādhāmāha—parasyeti | dārān patnīm ||

l.seg: ‘paṅgo vandyastvamasi na gṛhaṃ yāsi yo 'rthī pareṣāṃ
ślādhyo mūka tvamapi kṛpaṇaṃ stauṣi nārthāśayā yaḥ
stotavyastvaṃ badhira na giraṃ yaḥ khalānāṃ śrṛṇoṣi || 113 ||’

div.p: atra stotavyānāṃ paṅgvandhamūkabadhirāṇāṃ vandyadhanyaślāghyastotavyapadaiḥ sākṣādabhinandanādiyaṃ vācyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsābhimānino 'rthasiddhiṃ bādhate ||

paṅgo ityādi | he paṅgo khañja, tvaṃ vandyo 'si; yastvamarthī san pareṣāṃ gṛhaṃ na yāsi | he andha dṛṣṭiśūnya, tvaṃ dhanyaḥ, yaddhanagarvavatāṃ mukhāni tvaṃ nekṣase na paśyasi | he mūka, tvaṃ ślādhyo 'si; yastvaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ janamarthāśayā na stauṣi | he badhira śravaṇaśūnya, tvaṃ stotavyo 'si; yastvaṃ khalānāṃ durjanānāṃ giraṃ vārṇī na śrṛṇoṣi | ‘paṅguḥ khañja iti smṛtaḥ’ iti hārāvalī | ‘avāci mūkaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra paṅgvādīnāṃ vandyādipadaiḥ sākṣādabhinandanādabhidhīyamānatā | arthabādhāmāha—abhīti | anena mānināmarthasiddhibādha evoktaḥ ||

lg.l: vidadhati dhaniṣu na dainyaṃ te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiyaḥ || 114 ||

div.p: atra te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiya iti mṛgāṇāmasākṣādaminandanaṃ teneyamastotavyānāmamīṣāṃ vākyārthatvena stutipratīteḥ pratyetavyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā manasvino 'rthasiddhiṃ bādhate ||

kāmamityādi | hariṇā vaneṣvaprayatnataḥ sulabhena tṛṇena kāmamatyarthaṃ jīvanti | dhaniṣu dhanikeṣu dainyaṃ na vidadhati na kurvanti | tathāpi te hariṇāḥ paśavo vayaṃ punaḥ sudhiyaḥ paṇḍitāḥ | kila prasiddhau niścaye vā | ‘atyarthe 'numatau kāmam’ iti viśvaḥ | atra mṛgāṇāṃ na sākṣādabhinandanam, kiṃtu tatpratīyata itīyaṃ pratyetavyā | atrāpyarthabādhā manasvina eva ||

lg.l: ‘ṇa muanti dīhasāsaṃ ṇa ruanti ṇagāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘ciraṃ ṇa honti kisiāo’ iti pāṭhabhedaḥ, ‘ciraṃ na bhavanti kṛśāḥ’ iti chāyābhedaśca honti virahakisiāo |
dhaṇṇāo tāo jāṇaṃ bahuvallaha vallaho ṇa tumam || 115 ||’
[na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsaṃ na rudanti nagāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘ciraṃ ṇa honti kisiāo’ iti pāṭhabhedaḥ, ‘ciraṃ na bhavanti kṛśāḥ’ iti chāyābhedaśca bhavanti virahakṛśāḥ |
dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha vallabho na tvam ||]

div.p: atra dhanyāstā yāsāṃ tvaṃ na vallabha iti yeyamatiraktāyāḥ sākṣādastotavyastutiḥ seyaṃ vācyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā tasyā eva kāmasiddhiṃ bādhate ||

ṇetyādi | ‘na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsaṃ na rudanti na bhavanti virahakṛśāḥ | dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha vallabho na tvam ||’ nāyikāṃ nāyakaviśeṣavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsakhī nāyakamupagamya tasyā anurāgaṃ daśāṃ cāha—na muñcatīti | he bahuvallabha, tā nāthikā dhanyā dīrghaśvāsaṃ virahajaṃ na tyajanti, na rūdanti, virahakṛśāśca na
bhavanti | yāsāṃ tvaṃ vallabho nāsi | atra dhanyā ityādinā anurāgiṇyāḥ sākṣātstutirabhihitā tasyā eva kāmasiddhibādhikā ||

lg.l: ‘suhaücchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ vi dūrāhi amha āṇanta |
uaāraa jara jīaṃ vi ṇenta ṇa kaāvarāhosi || 116 ||’
upakāraka jvara jīvamapi ‘gṛhṇanna’ iti pāṭhaḥnayanna kṛtāparādho 'si ||]

div.p: atra pūrvoktāsmadabhiprāyasidhdyaivaṃnāma tvayāsmākamupakṛtaṃ yena jīvitamapi harannāparādhyasīti jvaraṃ prati yadatiraktatayā vākyaṃ tenehāstotavyasya jvarasya stutiḥ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratyetavyā nāmāprastutapraśaṃsā tasyā eva śarīrabādhayā sarvānapi kāmān bādhate ||

suhetyādi | "sukhapṛcchakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi dūrānmamānayamāna | upakāraka jvara jīvamapi gṛhṇanna kṛtāparādho 'si ||" kācidatyanurāgiṇī nāyakamanyānuraktamapi vārtākaraṇāyātaṃ doṣagarbhamāha—sukheti | he jvara, sukhapṛcchakaṃ tavāṅge sukhamadhuneti praśnakārakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi mama kṛte dūradeśādānayamāna prāpaka, ata evopakāraka, jīvamapi gṛhṇan tvaṃ na kṛtāparādho 'si | sukhaṃ suṣṭhu pṛcchati sukhapṛcchakaḥ | ‘kriyāsamabhihāre vun’ iti yogavibhāgādvun | atra sukhapṛcchaketyādinā svābhiprāyasidhdyānuraktāyā jvaraṃ prati vākyam | tenāprastutastutirjāyate na tvabhidhīyata iti | kāmabādhāmāha—śarīreti || ityaprastutapraśaṃsālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |

vivakṣiteti | vivakṣito vaktumiṣṭo yo guṇastenotkṛṣṭā adhikā ye taiḥ saha stutyarthaṃ nindārthaṃ vā kasyacitsutyasya nindyasya vā tena guṇena tasya yatsamīkṛtya
kīrtanamabhidhānaṃ sā tulyayogitā | guṇo 'tra dharmaḥ sādhurasādhurvā | atra eva stutirvā nindā vā syāt ||
atrābhidhīyamānamahattvādiguṇotkṛṣṭābhyāṃ śeṣāhituṣāraśailābhyāṃ saha stutyarthaṃ tulyayogena kṣitipaterabhihitatvādiyaṃ stutyarthā tulyayogitā ||

śeṣa ityādi | śeṣaḥ sarpaṃbhado himālayastvaṃ ca sarve yūyamimāṃ kṣitiṃ bibhṛtha dhārayatha | kīdṛśāḥ | mahānto mahattvavantaḥ guravo gurutvāśrayāḥ sthirāḥ sthairyavantaśca | kīdṛśīm | laṅghitātikrāntā maryādā yayā tāmata eva calantīmitastato gāminīṃ ca | atra mahattvādikamabhihitam | bhūpasya ca śeṣahimādribhyāṃ tulyatākhyāpanenotkṛṣṭasāmyakathanātstutiyogaḥ ||
atra ghanārabdhānyapītyādibhirabhidhīyamānatulyaguṇānāṃ mṛgākṣīsaṃgatānāṃ taḍidvilasitānāṃ ca nindārthaṃ tulyayogenābhidhānādiyaṃ nindārthā tulyayogitā ||

saṃgatānītyādi | mṛgākṣīṇāṃ saṃgatāni saṃgamāḥ svayaṃ ghanaṃ nirantaramārabdhānyapi kṛtānyapi, tathā taḍitāṃ vidyutāṃ vilasitāni ca ghanairmedhairārabdhānyapi kṣaṇadvayamārambhakṣaṇādūrdhvamaparamapi kṣaṇaṃ na tiṣṭhanti; kuto dīrghakālam | atra prasiddhacāpalayā vidyutā strīṇāṃ saṃgamasya capalatā samīkṛtyocyata iti nindātulyayogiteyam ||
atra yamādayaḥ pañca bhavanto lokapālā ityanuktamapi tulyavastuyogitayaiva stutyarthameṣāṃ mithaḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratīyamānatulyaguṇatve stutyarthā tulyayogitā ||

yama ityādi | yamādayo bhavanto 'nanyaviṣayāmananyagāminīṃ lokapāla ityanenākāreṇa śrutiṃ khyātiṃ bibhrati dhārayanti | sahasrākṣa indraḥ | ‘śrutiḥ khyātau ca vede ca’ iti viśvaḥ | atra catvāro yamādayo lokapālāḥ, idānīṃ bhavān pañcamo lokapālaśabdavācya iti yamādisamānatākhyāpanenotkṛṣṭasāmyakathanādrājñaḥ stutiḥ | sā tu pratīyamānatulyaguṇenaiva ||

lg.l: ramante ca parastrībhirviṣamāḥ‘raho sāhasikā narāḥ’ iti pāṭhaḥ khalu mānavāḥ || 120 ||’

div.p: atra yo 'yaṃ sevādirmānavānāṃ rājaviṣaye strīṣu ca vaiṣamyahetutulyatvena yogo rājādīnāṃ vā ‘karmatvādirūpasya’ iti ka khakarmāditulyatayā tatkriyāyāṃ samāveśaḥ so 'mīṣāṃ mithaḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratyāyayan rājasevāparastrīratyorviṣopabhogatulyatāṃ gamayatīti seyaṃ pratīyamānatulyaguṇatve nindarthā tulyayogitā ||

rājānamityādi | bhūpamapi sevante, viṣamapyupabhuñjate khādanti, anyastrībhiḥ saha ramante vilasanti | ato manuṣyā viṣamāḥ sāhasikāḥ | khalu hetau | atra viṣamatāyāṃ vā tulyayogastatkriyāviṣayatayā vā rājasevāparastrīratyorviṣopamogatulyatāṃ bodhayati sa ca pratīyamāna eva ||

lg.l: anye sukhanimitte ca duḥkhahetau ca vastuni |

div.p: anye iti | sukhahetuduḥkhahetuvastunoḥ stutinindāryaṃ sāmye tulyayogitāmanye prāhuḥ ||
atra rāmasya rājyābhiṣekavanagamanayoḥ piturādeśena tulyarūpatayā stutiḥ pratīyate ||

āhūtasyetyādi | abhiṣekāya rājyābhiṣekāyāhūtasya kṛtāhvānasya, vanāya vanaṃ gantuṃ visṛṣṭasya ca tasya rāmasya svalpo 'pyākāravibhrama ākārānyathātvaṃ mayā na lakṣitaḥ | ‘anyathātve 'pi vibhramaḥ’ iti dharaṇiḥ | atra rājyābhiṣekaḥ sukhahetuḥ, vanagamanaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ, tayoḥ pitṛbhaktyā tulyatvena stutitvam ||
atra yaḥ paraśunā chinatti, yo 'muṃ madhusarpiṣā siñcati, yo vā gandhamālyābhyāmarcati taṃ prati tulyameva nimbasya kaṭutvamiti samāsoktyā tadupameyasya nindā pratīyate ||

yaścetyādi | yo nimbavṛkṣaṃ paraśunā kuṭhāreṇa chinatti, yaścainaṃ nimbaṃ madhusarpiṣā madhusahitena ghṛtena siñcati, yaścainaṃ gandhamālyābhyāmarcati sarvasya kṛte sa nimbaḥ kaṭureva tikta eva | ‘puṣpapuṣpasrajormālyam’ ityamaraḥ | atra samāsoktayā samasanena | sāmyāpādaneneti yāvat | upameyanindajñānam || iti tulyayogitālaṃkārānirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: doṣasya yo guṇībhāvo doṣībhāvo guṇasya yaḥ |

div.p: doṣasyeti | doṣasya guṇatvam, guṇasya ca doṣatvaṃ yattadeva leśalakṣaṇam | tarhi vyājastutāvapyevam | tathā cātivyāptiḥ | ata uktam—tata iti | tato leśāvdyājastutirabhinnaiveti | nātivyāptirityarthaḥ ||

atra yeyamuttarārdhena rājño vīryaprakarṣasya stutiḥ sā kanyāyā nirantarānbhogān nirvivikṣordoṣatvena pratibhāsiṣyata ityabhipretya yo 'yaṃ vidagdhasakhyā rājaprakopaparijihīrṣayā doṣo 'pi guṇarūpeṇoktaḥ; so 'yaṃ doṣasya guṇībhāvo nāma leśato 'lpatayā śanairananyavidita ucyamāno leśa ityucyate ||

yuvetyādi | svayaṃvare kasminnapi nṛpe darśitabhāvāṃ sakhīṃ nivartayituṃ kāpi stutivyājāttaṃ nindati | yuvatvaguṇitvanṛpatvabalavattvebhya eṣa tava patiryogyaḥ | yasya kāmotsavādapi viṣayotsavamanādṛtya raṇotsave manaḥ saktamāsaktam | nirvivikṣorupabhoktumicchoḥ kanyāyāḥ | ‘nirveśa upabhogaḥ syāt’ ityamaraḥ | atra vidagdhayā sakhyā rājakopaśāntaye bhogecchuṃ prati vīryaprakarṣarūpastavasya doṣatve 'pi guṇatvenālpatayopanyasanālleśo 'yaṃ doṣasya guṇībhāvalakṣaṇaḥ | alpatayaivātra leśatā ||

lg.l: ‘capalo nirdayaścāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi |

div.p: atra pūrvārghena mānaparigrahānuguṇaṃ sakhīnāmagrataḥ prakāśaṃ pratijñāya tadanirvāhamāśaṅkamānā tadupahāsaṃ parijihīrṣurdoṣābhāsaṃ tadguṇagrāmamāha —āgaḥpramārjanāyaiva cāṭavo yena śikṣitā iti; so 'yaṃ guṇasya doṣībhāvo nāma leśabhedo bhavati | anye punaḥ samastameva leśalakṣaṇamācakṣate—yatra doṣasya guṇībhāvo guṇasya ca doṣībhāva iti | so 'pi dvidhā—samāsoktyā, asamāsoktyā ca ||

capala iti | he sakhi, capalo nirbhayaścāsau jano bhavatu tena mama kim | kiṃtu na kimapi | yena janenāgaḥpramārjanāyāparādhaproñchanāya paraṃ cāṭavaḥ priyavādāḥ
śikṣitāḥ | ‘āgo 'parādho mantuśca’ ityamaraḥ | atra doṣavadābhāsate pratibhātīti doṣābhāso na tvayaṃ paramārthato doṣaḥ | cāṭukāritā hi guṇo yena kṛtāparādho 'pi māmanukūlayanmānabhaṅgaṃ karoti | ata eva ca tatrānurāgaḥ | tathā ca capala ityādinā sakhījanoddiṣṭaṃ mānaṃ rāgātkartumaśaktatayā bālayā cāṭukāritā doṣābhāso guṇaḥ ko 'pi darśita iti guṇasya doṣatātra | guṇadoṣayormilitayoreva tattvaṃ leśa iti matamāha—anye iti | samāsoktirgopanena bhaṇanam, asamāsoktiḥ sphuṭabhaṇanam ||

guṇānāmityādi | guṇānāṃ vahanakṣamatvādīnāṃ daurātmyāddoṣāddhuryo dhuraṃdharo gaurvṛṣo dhuri dhurāyāṃ niyujyate | galiḥ punargaurasaṃjāto 'nutpannaḥ kiṇo mṛtaśoṇitamāṃsapiṇḍo yatredṛśaḥ skandho sasya sa sukhaṃ yathā syādevaṃ svapiti | dhuraṃ vahatīti dhuryaḥ | ‘dhuro yaṅḍhakau 4|4|77’ iti yat | ‘kiṇaḥ syānmṛtaśoṇite’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | 'galistu vahanāśakte’ ityapi | atra roṣabhayādeva samāsena guṇadoṣayorabhidhānālleśaḥ ||

l.seg: avyutpannamatiḥ kṛtena na satā naivāsatā vyākulo

div.p: atrāpi prakopabhayādi pūrvavat | athaiṣa vyastalakṣaṇatvena kasmānna leśa ityucyate | doṣaguṇībhāvasyāprastutastutyā guṇadoṣībhāvasya tu vyājastutyāpahārāt ||

santa ityādi | santaḥ sadā duḥkhaṃ yathā syādevaṃ jīvanti | kīdṛśāḥ | saccaritasya savdyāpārasyodaye vyasanina āsaktāḥ | prādurbhavantyāvirbhavanti yantraṇā anāpattayo yeṣāṃ te | sarvatra karye janānāmapavāde dūṣaṇoktau cakitāḥ satarkāḥ | ata
eva duḥkhamayatā | prākṛto 'vivikto jano dhanyo 'sti | kīdṛśaḥ | avyutpannā aviśeṣavatī matiryasya saḥ | na satā sādhunā kṛtena kāryeṇa naivāsatā asādhunā kāryeṇa vyākulaḥ | sādhvasādhukāryarahita ityarthaḥ | ata eva idaṃ kṛtyamidamakṛtyamiti vicāraśūnyahṛdayaśca | atrāpi roṣabhayādeva leśato 'bhidhānam | doṣaguṇībhāvo guṇadoṣībhāvaśca vyasto 'tra kathaṃ na leśa iti pṛcchati—atheti | attaram | doṣeti | ādyasyāprastutastutyām, antyasya vyājastutyāṃ viṣayīkaraṇāttayorevāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ ||
vyājastutirapi dvidhā—śuddhā miśrā ca | tayoḥ śuddhā yathā—
atra śuddhaparadārāpaharaṇalakṣaṇanindāvyājena stutervihitatvādiyaṃ śuddhānāma vyājastutirguṇadoṣībhāvalakṣaṇālleśānna pṛthak ||

puṃsa ityādi | purāṇātpuṃsaḥ purāṇapuruṣādviṣṇoḥ śrīḥ kamalā ācchidya gṛhītvā tvayā paribhujyate sevyate | he rājan, ikṣvākurnṛpaviśeṣo vaṃśyo yasya tasya tavedaṃ kiṃ yujyate | kiṃtu nārhatīti nindābhāsaḥ | atha ca purāṇātpuṃso vṛddhātpuruṣācchrīḥ saṃpadācchidya tvayā bhujyata iti tātparyārthaḥ | atra śrīpade vyājaḥ | sa ca śuddha eva | tena ca śuddhiriha || leśābhedamāha—guṇeti |
atra stutipadamiśraiva vyājagarhayā stutiritīyaṃ miśrānāma vyājastutirleśabhedaḥ ||

priya ityādi | he rājan, priyaḥ prīto 'si | prājña utkṛṣṭamatirasi | īśvaro 'si | śuddhavaṃśo 'si | taruṇo 'si | evaṃ sati kiyatyastaruṇyastvāṃ patiṃ na vṛṇate na svīkurvanti | ato hetoretāṃ kīrti parāmraṣṭumākramituṃ bhavānnārhati | kīdṛśīm | raghunahuṣamāndhātṝṇāṃ nṛpaviśeṣāṇāṃ mahiṣīṃ mahādevīmata eva vṛddhāmativayaskāṃ ca |
‘kṛtābhiṣekā mahiṣī’ ityamaraḥ | atra mahiṣīvṛddhāpadayorvyājāt kapaṭānnindāstutirleśata eva || iti leśālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
kartreti | kriyādiṣu kartrādīnāmanyaiḥ saha yaḥ samāveśo 'vasthānaṃ sā sahoktiḥ | ādipadātkarmādiparigrahaḥ | sa samāveśo viviktaḥ kevalaḥ, avivikto miśraḥ ||
atra surabhivāsarā iti kartṛpadārthaḥ kevala eva janānandaiḥ saha vṛddhiprāptikriyāyāṃ samāviṣṭa iti seyaṃ viviktakartṛkriyāsamāveśā nāma vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ ||

kokiletyādi | surabhivāsarā vasantadivasāḥ janaharṣaiḥ saha vṛddhiṃ yānti | kīdṛśāḥ | kokilālāpo madhuro manoharo yeṣu te, sugandhayaḥ śobhanagandhavanto vanavāyavo malayānilā yeṣu te | atra kevalasya karturvasantadinasya janānandaiḥ saha vṛddhiprāptikriyāsamāveśaḥ | sa ca visadṛśa eva | dinavṛddherdaṇḍādhikyarūpatvāt, ānandavṛddheratisukharūpatvāt ||

lg.l: ‘ujjhasi piāi samaaṃ taha vi hu re bhaṇasi kīsa kisiaṃ tti |
uvaribhareṇa a aṇṇua muaï vaïllo vi aṅgaïṃ || 130 ||’
[uhyase priyayā samadaṃ tathāpi khalu re bhaṇasi kimiti kṛśeti |
uparibhareṇa ca he ajña muñcati vṛṣabho 'pyaṅgāni ||]

div.p: atra saṃbodhyamānayuṣmadarthaḥ karmatāmāpanna uhyasa iti kriyāyāṃ kevala eva kriyāpadārthena saha samāviṣṭaḥ; seyaṃ viviktakarmakriyāsamāveśā nāma vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ ||

ujjhasītyādi | "uhyase priyayā samadaṃ tathāpi khalu re bhaṇasi kimiti kṛśeti | uparibhareṇa ca he ajña muñcati vṛṣabho 'pyaṅgāni ||" aparādhavatā kenacidabalā durbalā kimiti tvaṃ kṛśeti pṛṣṭā | tamuddiśyāha—uhyasa iti | priyayā samadaṃ sagarvaṃ yathā syādevaṃ tvamuhyase bhriyase | tathāpi re tvaṃ vadasi kimiti kṛśāsi tvamiti | he ajña jñānahīna, uparibhareṇa goṇyādigauraveṇa vṛṣabho 'pyaṅgāni muñcati tyajati | kiṃ punaravaleti bhāvaḥ | uhyasa iti ‘vaha prāpaṇe’ karmaṇi lakāraḥ | vaïllo vṛṣabhaḥ | reśabdaḥ sākṣepasaṃbodhane | atra vahanakriyāyāṃ tvamiti bodhyo 'rthaḥ karmībhūtaḥ kevala eva priyāpadārthena saha samāśliṣṭastayośca visadṛśatā vyaktaiva ||
yatreti | yatrānekaḥ kartrādirbhinnai kriyādibhirbhedaṃ labhate sā vivikteti kathyate ||

atra cūtamañjarī mūrcchayā saha varghanakriyāyām, malayānilāścāśrubhiḥ saha vahanakriyāyāṃ pṛthak pṛthagvivekenaiva kartāraḥ samāviṣṭāḥ, seyamapi viviktakartṛkriyāsamāveśaiva vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ | evaṃ karmaṇo 'pi viveke draṣṭavyā |

vardhata ityādi | cūtamañjarī pānthānāṃ mūrcchayā saha vardhate, malayānilāsteṣāṃ pānthānāmaśrubhiḥ saha vahanti vānti bhraśyanti ca | ‘pathikaḥ pāntha ityapi’ ityamaraḥ | atra cūtamañjaryādestatkriyāyāṃ vivekenaiva kartṛtvena samāveśaḥ | visadṛśatā tu vyaktaiva ||

lg.l: ‘dhīreṇa ‘ṇisāāmā’ iti setubandhe pāṭhaḥsamaṃ jāmā hiaeṇa samaṃ aṇiṭṭhiā uvaesā |
ucchāheṇa saha bhuā bāheṇa samaṃ galanti se ullāvā || 132’
utsāhena saha bhujau bāṣpeṇa samaṃ galantyasyā ullāpāḥ ||]

div.p: atra yāmādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ dhairyādibhiḥ saha galanakriyāyāmekasyāmevāviviktaḥ samāveśo dṛśyate; seyamaviviktakartṛkriyāsamāveśā nāma vaisādṛśyavatī sahoktiḥ ||

dhīreṇetyādi | "dhairyeṇa samaṃ yāmā hṛdayena samamaniṣṭhitā upadeśāḥ | utsāhena saha bhujau bāṣpeṇa samaṃ galantyasyā ullāpāḥ ||" asya rāmasya dhairyeṇa samaṃ yāmā rātripraharā galanti | hṛdayena samamaniṣṭhitā anirvyụ̄dhā aniścitā vā upadeśā galanti | utsāhena saha bhujā bāhavo galanti | bāṣpeṇa samamullāpā ālāpā vacanāni galanti | dhairyavigamānucite sadupadeśāvasthitiḥ | tato manaḥśūnyatā, tata utsāhatyāgaḥ, tato bhujaskhalanam, tato 'śruṇā saha vacanateti krameṇādhikārtito manmathadaśādhikyamuktam | utsāho 'dhyavasāyaḥ | atra galanakriyāyā ekatvenāviviktatā | vaisādṛśyaṃ ca vyaktameva ||
karmaṇāmaviviktakriyāsamāveśe ivaśabdena sahaśabdasya sthāne sasādṛśyā yathā—

lg.l: ṇaïsotteva taraṅge raaṇāiṁ va garuaguṇasaāiṁ vahantam || 133 ||’

div.p:
atra dhairyeṇa saha jalasamūhasya, timinivahena sapakṣaparvatalokasya, nadīsrotobhistaraṅgāṇām, ratnaiśca gurukaguṇaśatānāṃ mithaḥ pratīyamānaṃ sādṛśyamivena dyotyate | sahārthaśca vākyārthasāmarthyena labhyata iti seyaṃ
dhairyādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ vahanakriyāyāmekasyāmevāvivekataḥ karmabhūtānāmāveśenāviviktakarmakriyāsamāveśā nāma sasādṛśyā sahoktiḥ ||

dhīraṃ vetyādi | "dhairyamiva jalasamūhaṃ timinivahamiva sapakṣaparvatalokam | nadīsrotāṃsīva taraṅgān ratnānīva gurukaguṇaśatāni vahantam ||" iha samudraṃ kīdṛśam | dhairyamiva jalasamūhaṃ vahantam, timinivahamiva matsyaviśeṣasamūhamiva sapakṣaṃ pakṣayuktam, svapakṣaṃ svamitraṃ vā parvatalokaṃ mainākādikaṃ vahantam, nadīpravāhāniva taraṅgān vahantam, ratnānīva gurukaguṇaśatāni mahattvādīni vahantam || ‘asti matsyastimirnāma śatayojanavistṛtaḥ |’ iti rāmāyaṇam | ‘samūhe 'pi mato lokaḥ’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | guruketi svārthe kan | atra dhairyajalasamūhādīnāṃ mithaḥ sādṛśyaṃ vyaktameva pratīyamānamivaśabdena dyotyate, sāhityaṃ ca vākyārthatayā gamyata iti sahoktiriyaṃ sādṛśyavatī ||

atra rātrayo dīrghāḥ pāṇḍurāśceti dairghyapāṇḍuratvaguṇayoravivekena rātriṣu rātrīṇāṃ ca tayoḥ śvāsairaṅgaiśca saha samāveśo dṛśyate; seyamaviviktaguṇasamāveśānāmevādyaprayoge 'pi sasādṛśyā sahoktiḥ |

ādīti || sahetyādi | imā rātrayaḥ saṃprati virahāvasthāyāṃ mama saha dīrghāḥ, mamaivāṅgaiḥ saha candrabhūṣaṇāścandrālaṃkārāstā rātrayaḥ pāṇḍurāśca | candrabhūṣaṇatvaṃ rātrīṇāṃ pāṇḍuratve hetuḥ | virahadaśāyāṃ khedānniḥ śvāsadīrghatā, aṅgapāṇḍimā, rātridīrghatā ca bhavati | atra dīrghatvapāṇḍutvaguṇayoḥ samāveśaḥ sādṛśyagarma eveti sasādṛśyeyaṃ sahoktiḥ || iti sahoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: anvācaya ihānyo yaḥ so 'pi nānyaḥ samuccayāt || 61 ||
padaiḥ śuddhāśca miśrāśca turīyo dyotakaṃ vinā || 63 ||

div.p: dravyeti | dravyādīnāmekakriyādisamāveśaḥ samuccayaḥ | itaretarayogādīnāṃ samuccayāmedamāha—itareti | itaretarayogaḥ parasparāpekṣāvayavabhedānugataḥ samuccayaḥ | samāhārastirohitāvayavabhedaḥ saṃhatipradhānaḥ samuccaya eva, anvācayo yatraikaṃ pradhānamanyadapradhānamanvīyate saḥ | samuccayaṃ vibhajate—dvipadeti | ubhayaṃ dvipadabahupade | anubhayamadvipadabahupade | eṣu madhye ādyāstrayaḥ pratipadaṃ vottaratra vā padadyotakaiḥ saha saṃbhavantītyāha—traya iti | traya eva śuddhā miśrāśca bhavanti | turīyo 'nubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayo dyotakaṃ cakārādikaṃ vinaiva bhavati ||
tatra dvipadāśrayaḥ pratipadāśritadyotakatvena dravyayoḥ kriyāsamuccayo yathā—
atra dīpakaśca madanaśceti dve dravye pratipadaṃ cakāreṇaikasyāṃ didyute iti kriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśite; tena didyutāte iti dvivacanam, dīpakamadanāviti cārthe dvandvaśca na bhavati ||

niryatetyādi | dīpakaḥ praśastadīpaśca madanaḥ kāmaścādhikaṃ didyute dīpto babhūva | kīdṛśaḥ | niryatā gacchatā sevakena sakhyādinā ca bodhitaḥ prakāśito jāgaritaśca | sphūrjamānā sphurantī rucirdīptiranurāgaśca yasya saḥ | ullasantī daśā vartiravasthā ca sya saḥ | dvāre gṛhadvāre madanabodhakabhāve ca saṃvalanaṃ milanaṃ tena māṃsalaḥ sphītaḥ | dīpaka iti praśaṃsāyāṃ kan | didyuta iti ‘dyuta dīptau’ ityasya liṭi rūpam |
atra cakārābhyāṃ dravyayorekakriyāniveśanātsamuccayaḥ | yadi samuccayena niveśanaṃ na syāttadā doṣamāha—teneti | anyonyanirapekṣatayā dvivacanaṃ dvandvaśca syādityarthaḥ ||

l.seg: miyaṃ naḥ kalyāṇī ramayati manaḥ kampayati ca 136’

div.p: atra ramayati kampayati ceti dve kriye uttarapadavartinā cakāreṇaikasminmanolakṣaṇe dravye karmaṇi samuccayenaikakālameva niveśite; tenāyamanvācayo na bhavati ||

nikāmamityādi | iyaṃ mālatī no 'smākaṃ mano ramayati kampayati ca | kīdṛśī | madana eva dahano 'gnistasmāduddāhaḥ prakṛṣṭadāhastena vidhurā vihvalāmavasthāṃ daśāmāpannā prāptā | ata e nikāmamatyarthaṃ kṣīṇāṅgī | saraso yaḥ kadalyā garbho majjā tadvatsubhagā manoharā | anena pāṇḍuratā tīkṣṇatā coktā | candrasya kalāśeṣā kalanāmātrāvasthitā mūrtiriva netrānandajanikā kalyāṇī kuśalavatī | kadalyā garbhapadenātipāṇḍuratvakomalatve dhvanite | prakṛtakāryasaṃpādakatayā ramayati | atipīḍayāriṣṭāśāṅkitvānmanaḥkampanamihetyāśayaḥ | atra kampayati cetyuttarapadasthena cakāreṇaikatra manolakṣaṇe dravye kriyādvayaniveśanātsamuccayaḥ | samuccayena niveśanābhāve doṣamāha—teneti | parasparanairapekṣye uttarapadasthacakāreṇānvācayāpattirityarthaḥ ||

atra karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā cetyādayo guṇāḥ pratyekaṃ bahupadāśrayatvena
cākareṇaikasyāmuvāseti kriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśyante | tena guṇeṣu bahuvacanaṃ na bhavati, karuṇākṛtajñatādīnāṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na bhavati yasminnityapekṣāyāṃ cāyameva guṇānāṃ dravyasamuccayo bhavati ||

aprākṛta ityādi | sa nṛpatirvismayāya kathaṃ nāstu | kīdṛśaḥ | aprākṛto 'nīcaḥ | mahājana iti yāvat | ‘nīcaḥ prākṛtaśca pṛthagjanaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | yasmin karuṇā dayā, kṛtajñatā vijñatā, lakṣmīḥ saṃpattiḥ, sāttvikaguṇena jājvalyamānaṃ tejaśca, dharmaḥ sukṛtaṃ, māno vinayaḥ, parākramaścovāsa vasati sma | iha kāruṇikasya karuṇāmātrapravṛttyā kṛtajñatāyāḥ sāhajiko 'bhāva iti | tathā cāsminnubhayamiti mahājanatāsya sūcitā | tathāpyalakṣmīkasya na kimapi ślāghāviṣaya iti salakṣmīkatoktā | tathāpi niḥsāttvikasya kuto mahājanatvamataḥ sāttvikaguṇādhikyamuktam | niṣpratāpasya sarvamuktaṃ lakṣaṇalaśobhākarameva bhavatīti tejasa ādhikyamuktam | bhavatu yathoktaguṇasaṃpattiḥ, adhārmike sarve guṇā viguṇāyante | tadartamāha—dharmaśceti | mānavinayaparākramāḥ pratyekaṃ mahāpuruṣe viśeṣaguṇā iti te 'pyuktā iti | atrānekapadāśritacakārairekākriyāyāṃ nānāguṇāḥ samuccayena niveśitā iti samuccayatā || tadabhāve doṣamāha—teneti | asamuccayaniveśe karuṇādaya ūṣuriti syādityarthaḥ | yasminniti | yadi yasminnityaikadravye guṇasamuccayavivakṣātra tadā so 'pi bhavatītyarthaḥ ||

atra rūpaṃ prema cāṭu ceti bahavo guṇā uttarapadāśrayeṇa cakāreṇāgamadityekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśyante, tenāgamanniti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvo vā na syāt | kārmaṇatvamityapekṣāyāṃ cāyameva guṇānāṃ jātisamuccayo bhavati ||

rūpamityādi | āsāṃ srīṇāṃ ramaṇeṣu viṣaye idamidaṃ kārmaṇatvaṃ vaśīkaraṇe mūlakarmatvamāgamat yayau | apratividhānenānirbandhena | sahajeneti yāvat | manojñarūpaṃ kāryamanapekṣya vikāśi sahajaprakāśavatprem, akṛtakaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbhrama
ādaro yatredṛśaṃ cāṭu kauśalaṃ ca | ‘mūlakarma tu kārmaṇam’ ityamaraḥ| atra rūpādayo guṇā antyapadasthitacakāreṇa gamanarūpākriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśitā iti samuccayaḥ | tadabhāve doṣamāha—agamanniti | asamuccaye bahuvacanaṃ dvandvaśca syādityarthaḥ | idameva guṇānāṃ kārmaṇatvam | jātyā samuccayena jātisamuccayo 'pītyāha—kārmaṇatvamiti |

lg.l: ‘vicintyamānaṃ manasāpi dehināmidaṃ hi lokeṣu cakāsti durlabham |
niśā sacandrā madirā ca sotpalā priyānurāgo 'bhinavaṃ ca yauvanam ||’

div.p: atra niśā madirā ca dravye, anurāgo yauvanaṃ ca guṇau, bahuṣvapi padeṣu dvandve satyapi uttarapadāśrayaniveśinā cakāreṇa cakāstītyekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ niveśyante; tena cakāsatīti bahuvacanaṃ samāsaśca na syāt | ayameva ca durlabhamityapekṣāyāṃ dravyaguṇānāṃ guṇasamuccayo bhavati | te 'mī trayo 'pi śuddhāḥ ||

vicintyetyādi | idaṃ lokeṣu bhuvaneṣu madhye dehināṃ prāṇināṃ vicintyamānaṃ manasāpi dulabhameva cakāsti | hiravadhāraṇe | kiṃ tat | sacandrā rātriḥ, sakamalaṃ madyam, priyāyā anurāgaḥ prītiḥ, abhinavaṃ yauvanaṃ ca | atra dvandvaśo yugalatvenāntyapadasthitacakāreṇaikakriyāniveśaḥ | tadabhāve doṣamāha—teneti | durlabhatvavivakṣayā duḥkhamayatve guṇasamuccayo 'pītyāha—ayamiti ||

lg.l: ahaśca rātriśca ubhe ca saṃdhye dharmaśca jānāti narasya vṛttam 140’

div.p: atrādityacandrādayo dravyaviśeṣā uttarapadaniveśinā pratipadaniveśinā ca cakāraṇa jānātītyekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ saṃniveśyante | tena ca bahuvacanābhāve samāsābhāve caiṣa miśraḥ samuccayabhedo bhavati ||

ādityetyādi | anilo vāyuḥ, analo 'gniḥ dyaurākāśaḥ, āpo jalam, hṛdayam, yamaḥ, aho dinam, ubhe prātaḥsāyam, dharmo vidhātā cāyaṃ janasya vṛttaṃ caritraṃ jānāti | ādityacandrau jānīta iti vibhaktivipariṇāmenānvayaḥ | ‘dharmo guṇādau lokeśe’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | atrādityādaya uttarapadapratipadaniveśitacakāreṇaikakriyāyāṃ niveśitā iti miśratā | tadabhāve doṣamāha—teneti |
anubhayāśrayastu samuccayo 'nvācayaśca na bhavati | dvyorapi dīpakena viṣayāpahārāt | tenetaretarayogasamāhārayoḥ sa udāhriyate tatretaretarayogo yathā—

atroktam, upekṣā, utthitamityete kriyādravyaviśeṣā itaretarayogena madavilāsadyotanakriyāyāṃ niveśyante; tena dyotayantīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca tadvivakṣāyāṃ syāt | na ceha dyotakaścakāra uttarapade pratipadaṃ vā vidyata iti so 'yamanubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayamedaḥ ||

anubhayeti | yatra dvipade bahupade vā cakāro nāsti samuccayo 'nvācayo 'pi na bhavati | dīpakalakṣaṇena tasya viṣayīkaraṇādekatravartinā kriyādivācakapadena sarvavākyopakārakatvasya dīpakatvāt, tādṛśasamuccayānvācayayośca tatsattvādityāśayaḥ || sāvaśeṣetyādi |āsāṃ strīṇāmetāni madavibhramaṃ mattatāvilāsaṃ dyotayanti sma | tānyāha —sahāvaśeṣairavaśiṣṭabhāgairvartate sāvaśeṣaṃ sakhaṇḍaṃ padaṃ yatredṛśamuktaṃ vacanam | khaṇḍākṣaravacanamityarthaḥ | srastāni skhalitāni yāni mālāvastrālaṃkaraṇāni teṣūpekṣā asaṃvaraṇam | akāraṇato hetuṃ vinaiva gantuṃ gamanaṃ kartumutthitamutthāna ca | uktamiti bhāve ktaḥ | utthitamityapi bhāve ktaḥ | akāraṇata iti pañcamyāstasiḥ | atroktādervacanādirūpakriyātmakasya tadāśrayasya dravyasya mitho yogena pradhānakriyāyāṃ niveśaḥ | ata eva dyotayantīti bahuvacanam | samuccayasvīkāre doṣamāha—dvandveti ||

lg.l: vareṣu yadbālamṛgākṣi mṛgyate tadasti kiṃ vyastamapi trilocane 142’

div.p: atra ‘yadvareṣu mṛgyate tatkiṃ trilocane vyastamapyasti’ iti bruvan vapurvayovasūnāṃ samudāyaṃ samastamevābhisaṃdhatte | tasya cāvirbhūtāvayavabhedatvenetaretarayogaḥ, tirohitāvayavabhedatvena samāhāraḥ | sa iha yadityekavacanāntena napuṃsakena ca kathyate | na ceha kvacidapi cakāro 'stīti so 'yamapyanubhayāśrayaḥ samuccayamedaḥ ||

vapurityādi | he bālamṛgākṣi śiśuhariṇanetre gauri, vareṣu yanmṛgyate 'nviṣyate tattrilocane śive vyastamapyekaikamapyasti kim | kiṃtu nāstyeva | tadāha—vapuḥ śarīraṃ virūpamakṣi yatra tādṛśaṃ virūpaṃ virūddhasvarūpam | netre dvitvasaṃbandhasyāviruddhatvāt, tritvasya viruddhatvāt | alakṣyamalakṣaṇīyaṃ janma utpattiḥ kulamiti yāvat | yasya so 'lakṣyajanmā tasya bhāvo 'lakṣyajanmatā | akulīnatetyarthaḥ | diśa evāmbaraṃ yasya tadbhāvena vasu dhanaṃ niveditaṃ kathitam | ‘nagno 'vāsā digambaraḥ’ ityamaraḥ | bhṛgyata iti mṛga anveṣaṇe karmaṇi lakāraḥ | atra vapurādisamuccaye yadā sphuṭāvayavabhedatāṃ tadetaretarayogaḥ | yadā tu tirohitāvayavabhedatā tadā samāhāraḥ | yadityekatvaklībatvābhyāmiha samāhāra evoktaḥ | cakārayoge 'pītaretarayogamāha—na ceti ||

lg.l: sā babhūva vaśavartinī dvyoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca || 143 ||’

div.p: atra śūlino madasya cetyattarapadāśrayeṇa cakāreṇa dvau dravyaviśeṣau ‘vaśavartinī’ ityetasmin guṇapade yadītaretarayogena saṃniveśyete tadā ‘viparivartitahriyoḥ’ ityādiṣu ‘dvyoḥ’ itiparyanteṣu dvivacanamekaśeṣo vā na syāt | so 'yamapi dvipadāśraya uttarapadāśritadyotakaśca samuccayabhedaḥ ||

tatkṣaṇamityādi | sā suvadanā gaurī śūlino harasya madasya mattatāyāśca dvyorvaśavartinī āyattā babhūva | dvyoḥ kīdṛśayoḥ | tatkālaṃ viparivartitā vigatā hrīrlajjā yayostayoḥ | iddha upacito rāgo yayostayoḥ | ata eva śayanaṃ neṣyatoḥ śavyāṃ necchatoḥ | atra śūlimadayorvaśavartitva itaretarayogena saṃniveśe doṣamāha—
tadeti | bahupadāśraya uttarapadāśritacakāreṇetaretarayogo bhavatītyāha—evamiti | samāhāramiti | vicintyamānamiti śloke idamityekatvaklībatvābhyāṃ samāhāra ukta ityarthaḥ | dravyādiviṣayatve itaretarayogasamāhārayoḥ sattvādanvācaye viṣayāntaramāha—kriyeti ||
evamapare 'pītaretarayoge 'pi cayogā udāhāryāḥ | samāhārastu cayogaviṣayo vicintyamānamityādinaivoktaḥ, anvācayastu kriyāviṣaya evopapadyate | tatra cottarapadāśraya eva cakāro bhavati || yathā—

atra pūrvaṃ ‘darśaya’ ityurvīkarmaviṣayatvena kriyāmupanyasya ‘toyotsargastanitamukharo mā ca bhūḥ’ iti tatkartaryeva dharmiṇyakarmakaṃ kriyāntaramanvācīyate, so 'yaṃ bhinnakālatvabhinnaviṣayatvābhyāmanvācayaḥ samuccayādbhinno bhavati ||
nanvevaṃ yadi samuccaye 'pi bhinnaviṣaye kriye tulyakālameva prayujyete; ko doṣaḥ syāt | na kaścit | kiṃtu tasya samuccayamudrayā viṣayo 'pahṛta iti nodāhriyate ||

gacchantīnāmiti | tatra strīṇāṃ saudāminyā vidyutā tvamurvī bhūmiṃ darśaya | kīdṛśīnām | naktaṃ rātrau patigṛhaṃ gacchatīnām | kasmin sati | sūcyagrabhedanīyairandhakārai rājamārge 'varuddhadarśane sati | saudāminyā kīdṛśyā | kanakasya hiraṇyasya nikaṣaḥ kaṣapaṭṭikāyāṃ kaṣaṇarekhā tadvatsnigdhayā ramyayā toyatyāgastanitamukhastvaṃ mā bhūḥ mā bhava | yatastā anāthā viklavā vihvalāḥ syuḥ | ‘nikaṣaḥ kaṣarekhāyāṃ paṭṭikāyāṃ kaṣasya ca’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘stanitaṃ ghanagarjitam’ ityamaraḥ | mābhūrityatra ‘na māṅyoge 6|4|74’ ityaṅniṣedhaḥ | atrādyakriyāmuktvā dvitīyakriyāyā anvācayaḥ | samuccayādbhedamāha—bhinneti | samuccaye ekakālika
ekaviṣaye 'nvayaḥ, atratvanvaye kālabhedo viṣayabhedaśceti bhedādityarthaḥ | uktavaidharmyayoḥ samuccaye sattvamāśaṅkya pariharati—kiṃtviti | samuccaye ubhayadharmavattve 'pi samuccayatvenaiva viṣayaparihāraḥ, iha tu vivakṣayaiva vinigamanetyāśayaḥ ||

atra ‘vāgarthāviva’ iti paravalliṅgatā ‘saṃpṛktau pitarau’ ityatra yo 'yaṃ ‘pumān striyā 1|2|67’, ‘pitā mātrā 1|2|70’ iti caikaśeṣastenaiṣa viśeṣalakṣaṇayogādvakroktitve satyalaṃkāratā labhata iti; na dhavakhadirādiṣvatiprasaṅga ityayamapi samuccayabhedaḥ ||

vāgarthāvityādi | ahaṃ gaurīharau vande namāmi | kimartham | vāk cārthaśca tayoḥ pratipattaye niścayāya | kīdṛśau | vāgarthāviva śabdatadabhidheyāviva saṃpṛktau saṃbaddhau | yathā śabdastadvācyo 'rthaśca dvau nityasaṃbaddhau vācyavācakatvasaṃbandhena tathā yau nityasaṃbaddhāvityarthaḥ | jagato lokasya pitarau mātṛjanakau | pitā ca mātā ceti dvandve ‘pitā mātrā 1|2|70’ ityekaśeṣe pitarāviti | pārvatyā mātṛtvena mātuścātigauraveṇābhyārhitatvātpūrvanipātaḥ | ‘sahasreṇa piturmātā gauraveṇātiricyate |’ iti smṛtiḥ | anenārdhanārīśvara uktaḥ | yadvā pārvatīṃ pātīti pārvatīpo haraḥ, ramāyā lakṣmyā īśvaro haristau vande | yadvā pārvatīparo haro māyā lakṣmyā īśvaro haristau haraharī vande | kīdṛśau | lokasya pitarau janakau | anyattulyameva | etena harihararūpamuktamiti kuvyākhyā | ‘ramā lakṣmyāmapīṣyate’ iti viśvaḥ | ‘mā ca lakṣmīrnigadyate’ ityekākṣaraḥ | paravalliṅgatā arthaśabdaliṅgatā | saṃpṛktā ca saṃpṛktaścetyatra ‘pumān striyā 1|2|67’ ityekaśeṣaḥ | ataevoktervakratayehālaṃkāratā | na ca dhavakhadirāvityādiṣu vakroktirato nālaṃkāratā ||

atrāpi yo 'yaṃ ‘akṣibhruvam', ‘śarakārmukam', ityetayoḥ ‘dvandvaśca prāṇitūryasenāṅganām 2|4|2’ iti, ‘vāṅmanasākṣibhruva—5|4|77’ iti ca viśeṣalakṣaṇayogastena dhavakhadirapalāśamityevamādiṣu nātiprasaṅgā bhavati ||

strīṇāmityādi | yatra nagare manobhuvā kāmena tanmukhe strīṇāṃ mukhe 'kṣibhruvanibhaṃ netrabhrūvyāja śarakārmukaṃ nyastamāropitam | strīṇāṃ hāvaiḥ śṛṅgārajakriyāmirnijakārye manaścāpalādau kṛte sati | ‘hāvāḥ kriyāḥ śṛṅgārabhāvajāḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atrāpi viśeṣalakṣaṇābhyāmeva vakroktitā || iti samuccayālakāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: śuddhā miśrā ca sākṣepo rodho nākṣepataḥ pṛthak || 64 ||

div.p: vidhineti | vidhinā hetunā pratiṣedhena vā hetunā yā pratiṣedhasyoktirnirvacanaṃ sā ākṣepaḥ | rodhaḥ punarākṣepa evetyāha—rodha iti | ākṣepalakṣaṇenaiva gṛhītatvādrodho na tato bhinna ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘gaccha gacchasi cetkānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ |
mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān || 147 ||’

div.p: atra ‘gaccha’ ityasya vidhivākyasya ‘mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyāt’ ityāśiṣānukūlatayaiva maraṇasūcanānniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti śuddho 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ ||

gacchetyādi | iha he kānta vallabha, cedyadi gacchasi tadā gaccha | videśamiti śeṣaḥ | mayā na rodhaḥ kriyate | kiṃtu bhavānyatra gato bhūyāttatraiva mamāpi janma bhūyāditi | paraṃ vadāmiti śeṣaḥ | atra gamanasya vidhirūpasya janma bhūyādityanena vidhirūpeṇaiva tvayi gate mayā martavyamiti maraṇasūcanādvidhinā gamanapratiṣedhoktiḥ anyāsaṃkareṇa ca śuddhatā ||

lg.l: ‘alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate 148’

div.p: atra ‘alaṃ vivādena’ iti niṣedhena, ‘tathāvidhaḥ so 'stu—’ iti vidhinā ca tanmatamavasthāpya, ‘mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitam’ iti vidhinā, ‘na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate’ iti pratiṣedhena ca yatpunarākṣipati, so 'yaṃ vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ vidhimiśra ākṣepo bhavati ||

alamityādi | tvayā yathā śrutaṃ tatra vivādenālaṃ niṣphalam | aśeṣaṃ samagraṃ yathā syādevaṃ sa tāvattathāvidha evāstu | mama mano 'tra bhāvaikarasamabhiprāyavaśaṃ sthitamasti | yadyapi bhave virūpākṣatvādikaṃ tvaduktaṃ vartate, tathāpi manmanastadekaparamityarthaḥ | atra hetuḥ kāmavṛttiricchāvyāpāro vacanīyaṃ vaktavyaṃ nekṣate na paśyati | ‘kāmāvṛttiḥ svecchāvyavahārī vacanīyamasthānasaṅgāpavādaṃ nekṣate na vicārayati | nahi svecchācāriṇo lokāpavādādbibhyatīti bhāvaḥ |’ iti mallināthavyākhyānamevātra sādhīyaḥicchā na parārthayojyā bhavatītyarthaḥ | atra niṣedhavidhibhyāṃ tanmatasthāpanarūpasya vidhervighiniṣedhābhyāmākṣepa iti vidhyākṣepo 'yaṃ miśraḥ ||
atra ‘kutaḥ kuvalayaṃ karṇe karoṣi’ ityasya niṣedhavākyasya ‘kimapāṅgam—’ ityādinā praśnapareṇāpi niṣedhaparyavasāyinā vākyena samarthanaṃ kriyata ityayaṃ śuddho niṣedhākṣepaḥ ||

kuta ityādi | he kalabhāṣiṇi madhuravacane, kasmānnīlotpalaṃ karṇe karoṣi | kuta iti pratiṣedhe hetumāha—asmin karmaṇi kāmivaśīkaraṇādau kimapāṅgaṃ netraprāntamaparyāptamasamarthaṃ tvaṃ manyase | atra niṣedhasya niṣedhaparyavasāyivākyena kṣepaṇānniṣedhākṣepaḥ | śuddhatā ca kaivalyena ||

lg.l: ‘saccaṃ guruo giriṇo ko bhaṇaï jalāsaā ṇa gambhīrā |
dhīrehiṃ uvama māuṃ taha vi khu maha ṇatthi ucchāho || 150 ||’
[satyaṃ guravo girayaḥ ko bhaṇati jalāśayā na gambhīrāḥ |

div.p: atra ‘satyaṃ guravo girayaḥ’ iti vidhiḥ, ‘ka āha jalāśayā na gambhīrāḥ’ iti paramatākṣepastābhyāṃ girīṇāṃ gurutvam sāgarāṇāṃ ca gāmbhīryaṃ yadayamuttarārdhena dhīrāpekṣayā niṣedhati, anyāpekṣayā tattadeva vidhatte; sa eṣa miśro niṣedhākṣepaḥ ||

saccamityādi | ‘satyaṃ guravo girayaḥ ko bhaṇati jalāśayā na gambhīrāḥ | dhīrairupamātuṃ tathāpi mama nāstyutsāhaḥ ||’ iha parvatā niścitaṃ gurutvāśrayāḥ | ko vadati jalāśayāḥ sāgarā na gambhīrāḥ kiṃtu gambhīrā eva | girisāgarau dhīraiḥ sahopamātuṃ sadṛśīkartuṃ tathāpi mama notsāho 'sti dhīrāṇāṃ tayorādhikyāt | ‘jalāśayo jalādhāraḥ’ iti koṣādyadyapi jalāśayapadaṃ jalādhāramātrārthakaṃ tathāpyatigāmbhīryayogyatayā sāgaraparam | atra vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ gurutvagāmbhīryaniṣedho 'nyāpekṣayā vidhiśceti miśratā ||

lg.l: uktyā yuktyā ca rodho ya ākṣepaḥ so 'yamucyate || 65 ||

div.p: rodhe viśeṣamāha—kriyāsviti | kriyāsūdyogināṃ hetudvārā yannivāraṇamuktyā yuktyā ca sa rodhaḥ | sa ca śeṣībhūta ākṣepa eva | vidhiniṣedhayogitvamathākṣepasādhāraṇyam || 65 || 66 ||

lg.l: ettia jampiasāraṃ ṇihaṇaṃ aṇṇe vi vajjadhārāsu vaā || 151’

div.p: atra ‘kimaḥ’ pratikulavācitvād vacanavṛttyaiva jalpan daśānanaścitrarathena ruddhaḥ, kāraṇaṃ ca vajraprabhāvakīrtanāditi prātikūlyenopanyastam; so 'yamauktaḥ pratikūlaśca vidhyākṣepo rodha ityucyate ||

kimityādi | "kiṃ jalpitena daśamukha jalpisadṛśamanirvāhayato bharam | etāvad jalpitasāraṃ nidhanamanye 'pi vajradhārāsu gatāḥ ||" iha he daśamukha rāvaṇa, jalpitena bhāṣitena kim | kiṃtu na kimapi | kasya, uktisadṛśaṃ bharamanirvāhayataḥ puṃsaḥ | bharamadhyavasāyam | etāvadetadeva jalpitasāraṃ śreṣṭham yadanye 'pi yodhā vajradhārasu nidhanaṃ nāśaṃ gatāḥ | ‘śreṣṭhe 'rthavatsāramudaharanti’ iti śāśvataḥ | atra jalpan rāvaṇaścitrarathena vajraprabhāvakīrtanarūpapratikūloktyā rūddha iti vidhyākṣepavirodhaḥ ||

lg.l: kiṃ icchasi kāuṃ je pavaavaï piaṃ ti viṇpiaṃ rahavaïṇo 152’
kimicchasi kartuṃ yatplavagapate priyamiti vipriyaṃ raghupateḥ ||]

div.p: atrāpi ‘kimaḥ’ pratiṣedhavācitvāt vacanavṛttyaiva daśānanavadhāyottiṣṭhamānaḥ sugrīvo jāmbavatā ruddhaḥ, kāraṇaṃ punarānukūlyenaivoktam—'kimetat tvayā raghupateḥ priyarūpaṃ viprayamupakrāntam’ iti | so 'yamaukto 'nukūlaśca vidhyākṣepo rodha ityucyate ||

hantumityādi | "hantuṃ vimārgamāṇo hantuṃ tvaritasyātmanā daśavadanam | kimicchasi kartuṃ plavagapate 'sya priyamiti vipriyaṃ raghupateḥ ||" iha he plavagapate sugrīva, daśavadanaṃ hantuṃ vimārgamāṇo yācamānastvaṃ raghupate rāmasya kiṃ priyamiti kṛtvā
vipriyamaniṣṭaṃ kartumicchasi | kathaṃ vipriyatā tatrāha—kīdṛśasya | daśavadanamevātmanā hantuṃ tvaritasya, prabhuṇā jighāṃsitasya hi vadhe 'parādha iti sa eva puruṣottamastaṃ ghātayatu | sametairbhavadādibhiḥ sāhāyyamācaryatāmityāśayaḥ | yacchabdo 'vyayatvenānekārthatayā saṃbodhanārthaḥ | yadvā jeśabdaḥ pādapūraṇe | daśavadanapadamākāṅkṣākrameṇāvṛttyā hananadvayānvayi | atra rāvaṇavadhodyamo vidhiruktyaiva jāmbavatā ruddho 'nukūlatayā hetumudbhāvyeti rodho 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaśeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: nirgacchati mukhādvāṇī mā gā iti karomi kim || 153 ||’

div.p: atra yathoktamuktvā ‘kiṃ karomi’ ityānukūlyenaivāha | atra kimaḥ praśnārthatve 'pi yuktyā niṣedhārthatvaṃ gamyate, so 'yaṃ yaukto 'nukūlaśca vidhyākṣepo rodha ityucyate || ayameva cāsyā vaiyātyoktipakṣe yauktaḥ pratikūlavidhyākṣepo rodho bhavati ||

gacchetyādi | he sakhi, tvatpriyaṃ gaccheti vaktumicchāmi | matpriyaiṣiṇī strītvena strī priyatvānmā gā iti vāṇī mama mukhānnirgacchatīti kiṃ karomi | ‘matpriyaṃ tvatpriyaiṣiṇī’ iti pāṭhe tu tvatpriyaiṣiṇyahaṃ gaccheti vivakṣāmi, matpriyaṃ yathā bhavati tathā mā gā iti vāṇī niḥsaratīti yojyam | atra kiṃ karomītyasya yuktyā prakṛtopapattyā niṣedhārthatāvagamaḥ | yadi vaiyātyātprāgalbhyād viparītamabhidhatte tadā mā gaccheti vaktumicchāmi, gaccheti vāṇī niḥsaratītyatra kiṃ karomīti tadā yuktisiddha eva rodho 'yam ||

lg.l: juṇṇasurā sāhīṇā asaī mā hou kiṃ maraü || 184 ||’
jīrṇasurā svādhīnā asatī mā bhavatu kiṃ mriyatām ||]

div.p:
atra ‘asatī mā bhavatu’ iti yaḥ pratiṣedhamāha sa ‘pracurayuvā
grāmaḥ—’ ityādi kāraṇamuktvā tataḥ ‘kiṃ mriyatām’ iti pratikūlyena rudhyate | tatra kimaḥ kākvā sāsūyapraśnārthasya yuktyā niṣedhārthatvaṃ gamyate; so 'yaṃ yauktaḥ pratikūlaniṣedhākṣepo rodha ityucyate ||

paüra ityādi | "pracurayukko grāmo madhumāso yauvanaṃ patiḥ sthaviraḥ | jīrṇasurā svādhīnā asatī bhā bhavatu kiṃ mriyatām ||" kācidvṛddhapatikā calacitteti jñātvā kayācitkasyaicitkathitam | sā tu tatrottaramāha—pracura iti | pracurā bahavo yuvānastarūṇā yatra tādṛśaḥ | ‘śeṣādvibhāṣā 5|4|154’ iti kap | madhumāso vasantaḥ, yauvanam, svāmī sthaviro vṛddhaḥ | jīrṇasurā purāṇamadyaṃ svādhīnaṃ nijāyattamato 'satī sā mā bhavatu kiṃ mriyatām | yadyasmin vatsare sā cañcalā na syānmriyetaivetyarthaḥ | surā jīrṇā prītikarīti madyapaprasiddhaḥ | atra kiṃ mriyatāmiti kimaḥ kākugarbhatayā sāsūyapraśnārthatā yuktyā niṣedhaviṣayiṇī jñāyata iti rodho 'yam ||

lg.l: ‘kaha mā jhijjaü majjho imāi ‘uppalie kalamakandoṭṭā’ iti deśīnāmamālākandoṭṭadalasaricchehiṃ |

div.p: atra ‘stanādivadasyā madhyo 'pi mā kṣīyatām’ iti niṣedhavādī kenacidānukūlyena rūdhyate | kathamayaṃ mā kṣīyatāmiti | yo 'syāḥkuvalayadalasadṛkṣābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ ghanastanaruddhaprasarābhyāṃ na dṛśyate | iyaṃ hyetābhyāmanyamīkṣamāṇā yanna paśyati so 'hamiva madhyo 'pi kṣīyamāṇo lakṣyate tatra kimaḥ praśnārthatve niṣedhārthatvaṃ gamyate; so 'yaṃ yaukto 'nukūlaśca niṣedhākṣepo rodha ityucyate ||

kahamityādi | "kathaṃ mā kṣīyatāṃ madhyo 'syāḥ kuvalayadalasadṛkṣābhyām | akṣibhyāṃ yo na dṛśyate ghanastanabhararuddhaprasarābhyām ||" ihāsyā nāyikāyā madhyaḥ kathaṃ mā kṣīyatāṃ na kṣīṇatāṃ yātu | yo 'syāḥ kuvalayadalatulyābhyāmakṣibhyāṃ nibiḍa-
kucabharāvaruddhagatābhyāṃ na dṛśyate | atrānayā netrābhyāmanyamīkṣamāṇayā yathāhaṃ na dṛṣṭa ityahaṃ kṣīṇastathā madhyo 'pi tenaiva kṣīṇatāpanna iti lakṣyate | ihāpi kimo niṣedhārthatvaṃ yuktyaiva jñāyate ||

lg.l: iyamatiprabhutā kriyate balādakupito 'pi hi yatkupito janaḥ 156’

div.p: atra ‘akupito 'pi kupitaḥ kriyate’ iti yo 'yaṃ niṣedhākṣeparūpa upālambhaḥ, tatra ca ‘bhrukuṭirāracitā—’ ityādivaiyātyena pratikūlaṃ kāraṇamupanyasya, ‘seyamatiprabhutā, so 'yaṃ balātkāraḥ’ iti kakvā vācanikamevopālambhamabhidhatte; tenāyamauktaḥ pratikūlaśca niṣedhākṣepo rodha ityucyate || ayameva cāsyā avaiyātyoktipakṣe svarūpākhyānādaukto 'nukūlaniṣedhākṣepo rodho bhavati ||

bhrukuṭirityādi | iyamatiprabhutā balātkāraḥ | hi yato 'kopavānapi jano balātkāreṇa kopavān kriyate | tadāha—tvāyā bhrukuṭirbhrūkauṭilyamāracitam | agrato 'gre gatam | anantaramānanaṃ cumbanādapahṛtam | asādhūktaṃ ca | vāśabdaścārthe | atra dhārṣṭyena pratikūlakāraṇamupanyasya kākvā vācanika evopālambhaḥ | asyā adhārṣṭyapakṣe svarūpākhyānaparamidamityuktānukūlaniṣedhākṣeparodho 'pyayamityāha—ayamiti ||
yadā tu kāraṇamupanyasyāpi kriyāsūttiṣṭhamāno na rūdhyate tadākṣepa eva na rodhaḥ |

lg.l: sahio gajjiasaddo taha vi hu se ṇatthi jīvie āsaṃgo ||’

div.p:
atra kadambavātātivāhanādīnāṃ jīvitādhyavasāyahetūnāmupanyāse 'pi
kriyāsūttiṣṭhamāno na rudhyate kathamayaṃ na jīvatīti | kiṃ tarhi kāraṇamevākṣipyate—‘tathāpi nāstyasya jīvite 'dhyavasāya’ iti | so 'yamākṣepa eva na rodhaḥ ||

gamiā ityādi | ‘gamitāḥ kadambavātā dṛṣṭaṃ meghāndhakāritaṃ gaganatalam | sọdho garjitaśabdastathāpi khalvasya nāsti jīvite āsaṅgaḥ ||’ ihāsya rāmasya tathāpi jīvite prāṇadhāraṇe āsaṅgo 'dhyavasāyo nāsti | khalu niścaye vākyabhūṣāyāṃ vā | yadyapi kadambapuṣpasaṃparkiṇo vātā gamitā nītāḥ dṛṣṭaṃ meghāndhakārayuktaṃ gaganatalam, garjitarūpaḥ śabdaḥ soḍhaḥ śrutaḥ | ihāsahyasahane 'pi jīvitānadhyavasāye premātiśayo hetuḥ | prayāṇocitakāle śaradyapi yadi na gamanaṃ syāttadā priyāsamāgamo me na syāditi buddhiḥ | yadvā netavyakālasya ghoratvāddurgavāsarayoradhyavasāyaḥ | yadvā kadambavātā gamitāḥ, vikasadamalakamalavātāḥ kathaṃ gamitavyāḥ | moghāndhakāritaṃ gaganatalaṃ dṛṣṭam, śaraccandracandrikādhavalitaṃ kathaṃ draṣṭavyam | garjitaśabdaḥ soḍhaḥ, kalahaṃsakalaravaḥ kathaṃ soḍhavya iti vimarśenānadhyavasāyaḥ | yadvā etairevānarthasārthaiḥ kadarthitā vyarthapratyāśāsamarthanā sītā yadi bhṛtā syāttadā madīyāśānāśa eva bhaveditibudhdyānadhyavasāyaḥ | atra jīvanakriyāyāmupasthitasya na rodhaḥ, kiṃ tu kāraṇākṣepa evetyākṣepatā ||
kriyodyatasyāpi vāraṇe kāraṇānāmanyaparatve rodho na bhavati | yathā—

lg.l: ‘dhanaṃ ca bahu labhyante sukhaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vartmani |
na ca me prāṇasaṃdehastathāpi priya mā sma gāḥ || 158 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapi yatrodyataḥ priyo rudhyate | prabhūtārthalābhādīnāṃ kāraṇānāṃ gamanaparatvameva na nivāraṇaparatvam; ato 'yaṃ na rodhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ākṣepa eva bhavati ||

dhanamityādi | he priya, yadyapi te tava dhanaṃ bahu pracuraṃ labhyaṃ prāpyam | vartmani sukham; na durgo mārgaḥ | kṣemaṃ kuśalaṃ ca caurādyanupahateḥ | na ca me prāṇasaṃśayo 'sti | tathāpi tvaṃ mā gāḥ sma māyāsīḥ | ‘kuśalaṃ kṣemamasriyām’ ityamaraḥ | atra pracuradhanalābhādihetūnāṃ gamanaparatvenākṣepatā || ityākṣepālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
jñeyamiti | kiṃcana kimapi vastu vācyaṃ prastutya prakramya tadvastusādhanasamarthasyānyasya vastuno vākyārthanyāsa upanyāso yaḥ so 'rthāntaranyāsaḥ | vaiparītyaṃ viparyayaḥ ||
atra parītāpāpaharaṇakṣamasya jaladākhyasya mahāvastuno nyasanaṃ vidhāya tatsādhanasādharmyeṇaiva tatsādhanakṣamaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ vastvantaramupanyasyati, so 'yaṃ sādharmyeṇārthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

payomuca ityādi | ete meghāḥ śarīriṇāṃ paritāpaṃ haranti | nanu niścaye | mahatāmātmalābho 'vasthitiḥ paraduḥkhopaśāntyarthaṃ bhavati | atra pūrvārdhopasthāpitārthasiddhaye sādharmyapuraskāreṇottarārdhopanyāsaḥ sphuṭa eva ||

l.seg: vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni || 160 ||

div.p:
atrāpi priyatamena svayaṃ kāntāhṛdaye samāropitāyāḥ srajaḥ prema﻿-
kāraṇamupanyasya jalāviladoṣavatyā api srajo yadatyāgakāraṇaṃ tadiha vaidharmyadvāreṇa pratipāditamato vaidharmyeṇāyamarthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

priyeṇetpādi | kācinnārī jalāvilāmapi srajaṃ mālāṃ na vijahau na tatyāja | kīdṛśīm | priyeṇa saṃgrathya grathitvā māṃsalakucavati hṛdaye vipakṣasva sapatnyāḥ samīpe upāhitāmāropitām | atropapattimāha—hi yataḥ premṇi prītau guṇā vasanti na vastuni guṇā vasanti | atra jalāvilamālāyā apyatyāgaheturvasantītyādinā vaidharmyapuraskāreṇoktaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘jo jassa hiaadaïo dukkhaṃ dento vi so suhaṃ dei |
[yo yasya hṛdayadayito duḥkhaṃ dadadapi sa sukhaṃ dadāti |

div.p: atra sādhanasamarthaṃ vastu prathamata evopanyasya paścāt tatsādhyamabhihitamiti viparyāsādayaṃ viparyayo nāmārthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

jo ityādi | “yo yasya hṛdayadayito duḥkhaṃ dadadapi sa tathā tasya | dayitanakhaduḥkhitayorapi vardhate stanayo romāñcaḥ ||” iha yo yasya hṛdayapriyaḥ sa duḥkhaṃ dadadapi tasya tathā priya eva | atra hetuḥ—dayitanakhena duḥkhitayorapi stanayo romāñco vardhate | dadadityatra ‘nābhyastācchatuḥ 7|1|78’ iti niṣedhaḥ | atra prathamaṃ heturuktastatastatkāryamuktamiti viparītatā ||
prokta iti | pratyanīkaḥ paripanthī, pratīko 'vayava ekadeśa iti yāvat | 'aṅgaṃ pratīko 'vayavaḥ’ ityamaraḥ ||

lg.l: ‘te viralā sappurisā je abhaṇantā ghaḍanti kajjālāve |
thoaccia te vi dumā je amuṇiakusumaṇiggamā denti phalam ||’
stokā eva te 'pi drumā ye 'jñātakusumanirgamā dadati phalam ||]

div.p: te viralā ityādi | “te viralāḥ satpuruṣā ye 'bhaṇyamānā ghaṭante kāryālāpam | stokā eva te 'pi drumā ye 'jñātakusumanirgamā dadati phalam ||” iha te sajjanā viralāḥ parimitāḥ | alpā iti yāvat | ye kāryārthamālāpamājñāmabhaṇyamānā ghaṭante kāryārụ̄dhā bhavanti, te 'pi vṛkṣāḥ stokā evālpā eva ye 'jñātapuṣpodgamāḥ santaḥ phalaṃ dadati | abhaṇyamānā iti ṇijgarbhatvena dvikarmakatā | yadvā kāryālāpe kāryakaraṇe ghaṭante | kīdṛśāḥ | abhaṇyamānā anuktāḥ | ‘ālāpo vacane kṛtau’ iti śāśvataḥ | atra hetuhetumadbhāvapuraskāreṇobhayorupanyāsaḥ ||

lg.l: kṣīyante teṣāṃ virahe viralā eva saritpravāhā iva ||]

div.p: atra yadidamupakṛtyānapekṣitapratyupakārāṇāṃ gamanam, yaccākṛtapratyupakārāṇāṃ tadvirahe 'vasādanaṃ tadubhayamapi jaladharasaritpravāhayoranyonyātiśayitayorupanyasyamānaṃ pratyanīkanyāso bhavati ||

viralā ityādi | “viralā upakṛtyaiva nirapaikṣā jaladharā iva vartante | kṣīyante teṣāṃ virahe viralā eva saritpravāhā iva ||” iha ye upakṛtya upakāraṃ kṛtvā nirapekṣāḥ pratyupakārānapekṣā vartante te viralā alpāḥ | meghā iva | yathā medhā upakāraṃ kṛtvā pratyupakāranispṛhā vartante tathetyarthaḥ | teṣāmupakāriṇāṃ virahe viralā eva
kṣīyante duḥkhitā bhavanti | nadīpravāhā iva | yathā nadīpravāhā upakāriṇāṃ meghānāṃ virahe kṣīṇā bhavanti tathetyarthaḥ | kṣīyanta iti karmakartari | kṣiyo 'nātmanepaditvāt | avasadanamavasādaḥ | bhāve ghañ | atra meghanadīpravāhayormithaḥ samarthayoḥ pratyanīkabhāvaḥ pratipakṣatā | pratinidhibhūtamanīkaṃ sainyaṃ yasya saḥ pratyanīkaḥ paripanthī | 'prati pratinidhau cihne’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘anīko 'strī raṇe sainye’ iti ca ||
atra vighnaprotsāraṇasamarthāyā bāṇamokṣalakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ prathamāvayavabhūtaṃ jyāśabdaṃ dhanuṣo huṃkāramiveti tatsādhanamupanyasya pratīkanyāsanāmānamarthāntaranyāsamabhidhatte ||

kā kathetyādi | bāṇasaṃdhāne dhanuṣi bāṇāropaṇe tasya kā kathā | tena sarvasiddheḥ | yataḥ sa rājā dūrāt jyāśabdenaiva vighnānyapohati vārayati | jyāśabdena kīdṛśena | dhanuṣo huṃkāreṇeva | cāpasya huṃkāratulyenetyarthaḥ | dūrata iti pañcamyāṃ tasiḥ || vighnānīti | yadyapi ‘vighno 'ntarāyaḥ pratyūhaḥ’ ityamarādvighnaśabde puṃstvam, tathāpi ‘liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokāśrayatvāt’ iti napuṃsakatvamapi | ata eva ‘avighnamastu te stheyāḥ piteva dhuri putriṇām’ iti raghuprayogo 'pi | ‘sa hi vighnānapohatī’ ti vā pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ | atra jyāśabdasya cāpaikadeśasya nyasanātpratīkanyāsatā || ityarthāntaranyāsālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

guṇeti | viśeṣadarśanāyādhikyakhyāpanārthaṃ guṇādīnāṃ madhye yatteṣāṃ vaikalyadarśanaṃ vikalatvābhidhānaṃ sā viśeṣoktiḥ | ekaguṇahānikalpanayā śeṣaguṇe dāṛdhyaṃ
viśeṣoktiriti lakṣaṇam | evaṃ jātyādāvapyādipadāddravyasaṃgrahaḥ | viśeṣadarśanāyetyanena vibhāvanāto bheda uktaḥ | tatra hi nātiśayo vācyaḥ kiṃtu kāraṇāntaram | iha tu guṇādipratiṣedhena padārthānāmatiśaya iti | guṇādīnāṃ vaikalyādarśane 'pi sā bhavatītyāha—vaikalyeti ||
atra tīkṣṇenākaṭhoreṇa cāyudhena puṣpadhanvā trīṇi jaganti vijayata iti tasya prabhāvātiśayaḥ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratīyamānaviśeṣaheturguṇavaikalyavatī viśeṣoktiḥ ||

na kaṭhoramityādi | kāmasya praharaṇaṃ na kaṭhinaṃ na vā niśitam | tathāpyamunā kāmena lokatrayaṃ jitamevāsīt | puṣpadhanvana ityanenākaṭhoratvamatīkṣṇatvaṃ ca darśitam | puṣpasyaivāsattvāt | atra kāṭhinyādiguṇavaikalyamatiśayavijayapradarśanāyoktamiti guṇavaikalyavatīyam ||
atra devakanyakātvābhāve 'pyeṣā vedhaso 'pi tapobhaṅgaṃ vidhātumalamiti varṇanīyāyā rūpātiśayaḥ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratīyamānaviśeṣaheturjātivaikalyavatī viśeṣoktiḥ ||
na devetyādi | eṣā na devakanyā nāpi gandharvavaṃśajā tathāpi vedhaso brahmaṇo 'pi tapobhaṅgaṃ vidhātumalaṃ samarthā | atra devatvādijātiniṣedho viśeṣastu mānuṣītvena tatkāryakaraṇam ||

lg.l: na ca raktābhavaddṛṣṭirjitaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ kulam || 167 ||’

div.p: atra ‘bhrukuṭibhaṅgādeḥ’ iti ka-pustake pāṭhaḥbhrūbhaṅgāderabhāve 'pi yo 'yaṃ dviṣatāṃ jayastena varṇanīyasya pratāpātiśayaḥ pratīyate; seyaṃ pratīyamānaviśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvaikalyavatī viśeṣoktiḥ ||

na baddhetyādi | bhrūbhaṅgo na baddhaḥ, adharo 'pi na sphuritaḥ, dṛṣṭirapi na raktā vṛttā, tathāpi vīra, tvayā dviṣatāṃ śatrūṇāṃ kulaṃ jitam | atra bhrukuṭītyādikriyāniṣedhātkriyāvaikalyam | atiśayastu līlayā śatrujayaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘na rathā na ca mātaṅgā na hayā na ca pattayaḥ |

div.p: na rathā ityādi | na rathā na ca hastino nāśvā na vā padātayaḥ santi tathāpi strīṇāmapāṅgadṛṣṭyaiva kaṭākṣeṇaiva lokatrayaṃ jīyate | ‘hastyaśvarathapādātaṃ senāṅgaṃ syāccatuṣṭyam |’ ityamaraḥ | tadiha senāṅganiṣedhāddravyavaikalyam, atiśayastu tadabhāve 'pi tribhuvanajayaḥ | dravyasyāpi vaikalyenaikadeśavikalatayā aparā viśeṣoktiḥ | prathamā dravyavaikalyavatī, iyaṃ tu dravyaikadeśavaikalyavatīti bhedaḥ ||

atra rathādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmekacakratvādibhirvaikalye 'pi yadetadbhagavato bhāskarasya bhuvanatrayākramaṇaṃ tasyeha tejasvitā heturabhidhīyate; seyamabhidheyaviśeṣaheturvaikalyavaddravyā nāmāparā viśeṣoktiḥ ||

eketyādi | rathasyaikaṃ cakram, yantā sārathiranūrurvikalaścaraṇahīnaḥ, aśvā
viṣamāḥ sapta, tathāpi ravistejasvī jagattrayamākrāmati | ‘saptāśvā nava dantinaḥ’ iti nītau niṣedhaḥ | ākrāmatītyatrotkramaṇābhāvāt ‘āṅa udnamane 1|3|40’ iti na taṅ | atra rathādīnāmekadeśavikalateti dvitīyeyam ||
dravyasya yogāyogābhyāmavaikalyenāpi kvacideṣā viśeṣāyāviśeṣāya ca yathā—

atra ‘ayaṃ tathā spṛṣṭoṃ 'saḥ sa puṇyavān, tayā cāspṛṣṭaṃ śeṣamaṅgaṃ me nirarthakam’ iti yo 'yamavaikalyadarśane 'pi viśeṣastenaiṣāhetumatyāpi hetumatā viśeṣyamāṇā yathoktā viśeṣoktirbhavati | yā punarihorvaśyāmito vākyādguṇādivaiśiṣṭyāvagatiḥ‘viśiṣṭāvagatiḥ’ iti kha ga sā paryāyoktirna viśeṣoktiḥ ||

ayamityādi | ayamaṃso bāhumūlaṃ tayā striyā ratilobhānnijāṃsena nipīḍita ityeka evāyaṃ mamāṅge kṛtī ramyaḥ | śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhūmerbharo bhārajanakam | śeṣaśabdaḥ karmaghañanto vācyaliṅgaḥ | aṅgabharaśabdayorajahalliṅgatayānvayaḥ | atrāvaikalyadarśane 'pi viśeṣokteriyamanyā bhavati | yadyanena vākyenorvaśyā guṇaviśeṣavattvajñānaṃ tadoktalakṣaṇābhāvātparyāyoktirevetyāha—yatpunariti || iti viśeṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |

kriyeti | kriyā dhātvarthaḥ, kārakaṃ karmādi, saṃbandhī saṃbandhavān, sārdhyaṃ sisādhayiṣitam, dṛṣṭānto nidarśanam, vastu padārthaḥ | eṣu kriyāpadāderupaskāraḥ pariṣkāraḥ parikaraḥ | sābhiprāyaviśeṣaṇena viśeṣyoktiḥ parikara iti lakṣaṇam ||
atra ‘mārutilabdhapratyayāgataharṣam’ ityanena, ‘uraḥsthalavanamālāmṛditamadhukaram’ ityanena copagūhanakriyāyāḥ parikaritatvādayaṃ kriyāparikaraḥ ||

vavasia ityādi | “vyavasitaniveditārthaḥ sa mārutilabdhapratyayāgataharṣam | sugrīveṇoraḥ sthalavanamālāmṛditamadhukaramupagūḍhaḥ ||” iha sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ sugrīveṇopagūḍha āliṅgitaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ | vyavasitasya vyavasāyasya nivedito 'rtho yena saḥ | yadvā vyavasitaścikīrṣito rāmasāhāyyarūpo nivedito 'rtho yena saḥ | mārutinā hanūmatā labdhapratyayena prāptaviśvāsenāgataharṣaṃ yathā syādevamuraḥsthalasya vanamālāyāṃ mṛditā madhukarā yatra tadyathā syādevamityupagūhanakriyāyā viśeṣaṇadvayam | ‘pratyayaḥ sahaje jñāne viśvāsācārahetuṣu |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra pradhānakriyāyā viśeṣaṇadvayena pariṣkṛtatvātkriyāparikaratvam ||

atra ‘hastaśithilitanirodhapāṇḍurasamucchvasatkapolā’ ityanena, ‘preritavāmapayodharaviṣamonnatadakṣiṇastanī’ ityanena ca ‘janakasutā ityanena ca’ iti ga‘janakasutā’ iti ca kārakapadasya parikaritatvādayaṃ kārakaparikaraḥ ||

paḍiāa ityādi | “patitā ca hastaśithilitanirodhapāṇḍurasamucchvasatkapolā | preritavāmapayodharaviṣamonnatadakṣiṇastanī janakasutā ||” iha janakasutā
sītā patitā ca | na kevalaṃ mūrcchitā kiṃtu patitāpīti cakārārthaḥ | kīdṛśī | hastena śithilīkṛto nirodho yantraṇaṃ kapolasya ata eva pāṇipīḍanatyāgātpāṇḍuraḥ samucchvasan kapolo yasyāḥ sā | yadvā hastaprahatanirodhena tatsaṃparkātpāṇḍuraḥ pīḍanatyāgātsamucchvasan kapolo yasyāḥ sā | preritena vāmena payodhareṇa stanena viṣamastiraścīna unnato dakṣiṇaḥ stano yasyāḥ sā | vāmastanasya calanaṃ preraṇamatra rāmādacirabhāviduḥkhāpanayanamiti sūcanam | yadvā strīṇāṃ vāmaḥ stano nijo dakṣiṇaḥ puruṣasyeti tenaiva patitā | atra kartuḥ kārakatayā tadvācakapadameva pariṣkṛtam ||

lg.l: ṇijjantāṇa ṇirāā girīṇa maggeṇa patthiā ṇaïsottā ||173||’
nīyamānānāṃ nirāyatāni girīṇāṃ mārgeṇa prasthitāni nadīsrotāṃsi ||]

div.p: atroddriyamāṇagirisaṃbandhino 'prayojakā api nadīpravāhā viśeṣaṇairupaskṛtā iti saṃbandhiparikaro 'yam ||

ummūliā ityādi | “unmūlitānāṃ khaṇḍitānyutkṣipyamāṇānāmṛjukamapasṛtāni | nīyamānānāṃ nirāyatāni girīṇāṃ mārgeṇa prasthitāni nadīsrotāṃsi ||” kīdṛśānāṃ kīdṛśāni ca | unmūlitānāṃ cālanataḥ khaṇḍitāni, utkṣipyamāṇānāṃ ṛjukamavakraṃ yathā syādevamapasṛtāni, nīyamānānāṃ nirāyatāni vegavaśādavakrāṇi ca | atra nadīpravāhasya saṃbandhino viśeṣaṇaiḥ pariṣkāraḥ ||

lg.l: ‘dhīraṃ haraï visāo viṇaaṃ jovvaṇamao aṇaṅgo lajjam |
ekkantagahiavakkho kiṃ sesaü jaṃ ṭhavei vaapariṇāmo || 174 ||’
ekāntagṛhītapakṣaḥ kiṃ śiṣyatāṃ yaṃ sthāpayati vayaḥpariṇāmaḥ ||]

div.p: atra gatavayaso na dhairyam, na vinayo, na lajjeti sādhyaṃ viṣādayauvanamadānaṅgakriyādṛṣṭāntairupaskṛtamiti sādhyaparikaro 'yam ||

dhīramityādi | “dhairyaṃ harati viṣādo vinayaṃ yauvanamado 'naṅgo lajjām | ekāntagṛhītapakṣaḥ kiṃ śiṣyate yaṃ sthāpayati vayaḥpariṇāmaḥ ||” iha viṣādo dhairyaṃ harati, vinayamanauddhatyaṃ vaśitvaṃ vā yauvanamado harati, anaṅgo lajjāṃ harati | ekāntena gṛhītaḥ pakṣo yena saḥ | adbhuta ityarthaḥ | yadvāntaḥsvarūpe eko gṛhītapakṣaḥ sarvaharasvarūpo yena sa kyaḥpariṇāmo yatsthāpayati sthirīkaroti tatkiṃ śiṣyate 'vaśiṣyate, kiṃtu sarvameva haratīti bhāvaḥ | atra sādhyasya dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pariṣkāraḥ ||
atra prakṣiptamandarasamudrodāharaṇabhūtaṃ ravirathacakraṃ ‘utkaṭākṣakoṭi’ iti viśeṣaṇena sāmyasiddhaye parikaritamiti dṛṣṭāntaparikaro 'yam ||

majjhetyādi | “madhyasthitadharaṇidharaṃ kṣīyate ca samudramaṇḍalamudvelam | ravirathavegavigalitaṃ patitamivotkaṭākṣakoṭi cakram ||” iha samudramaṇḍalaṃ kṣīyate ca | caḥ pūrvāpekṣayā samuccaye | kīdṛśam | madhyasthito dharaṇidharo mandaragiriryatra tat | ata evodvelamudgatajalam | ‘velā tattīranīrayoḥ’ ityamaraḥ | sūryarathavegena skhalitamaṃnantaraṃ patitaṃ cakramiva | cakraṃ kīdṛśam | utkaṭā udbhaṭā akṣakoṭiścakrāgraṃ yatra tat | ‘akṣaścakre 'pi pāśake’ iti viśvaḥ | atra dṛṣṭāntasya sāmyārthaṃ viśeṣaṇaiḥ pariṣkāraḥ ||

atra cāmuṇḍābhṛṅgiriṭipariṣvaṅgasaṃghaṭṭitaparasparahṛdayāsthijanmanaḥ
śabdasya vastutayā parigṛhītasya ‘devī putramasūta—’ ityādibhiḥ parikaritatvādayaṃ vastuparikaraḥ ||

devītyādi | devī gaurī putramasūta sūte sma | tato he gaṇāḥ, nṛtyata nṛtyaṃ kuruka kimupaviṣṭā bhavatha iti kṛtvā udbhuje uttolitabāhau bhṛṅgiriṭau bhṛṅgināmake gaṇe cāmuṇḍayā āliṅgite sati tayorbhṛṅgiriṭicāmuṇḍayo ravaḥ śabdo vo yuṣmān pāyādrakṣatu | cāmuṇḍayā kīdṛśyā | harṣādudāhṛtoktā gīrbhṛṅgiriṭivāṇī yayā tayā | ravaḥ kīdṛśaḥ || parasparāṅgasaṃbandhena jarjaraṃ sphuṭitaṃ yajjīrṇaṃ sthūlāsthi tasmājjanma utpattiryasya saḥ | jitā devadundubherdevabheryā nibiḍadhvānasya pravṛttiryena saḥ | ‘bheryāmānakadundubhī’ ityamaraḥ | atra śabdaviśeṣasya vastutvena gṛhītasya viśeṣaṇaiḥ pariṣkāraḥ ||
kriyeti | yathā samāsena kriyā viśeṣyate tathā yadi kṛttaddhitādibhirviśeṣyate tadā kriyāparikara eva ||

l.seg: rna tvaṃ rādhe dṛśi nipatitā devakīnandanasya || 177 ||’

div.p: atra ‘tumunṇvulau kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyām 3|3|10’ ityādibhirupapadabhūtāpi kriyaiva viśeṣyate, tenāyamaparaḥ kriyāparikaro bhavati | evaṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu śatrādibhirapi draṣṭavyam ||

gehādityādi | he rādhe, tvaṃ devakīnandanasya kṛṣṇasya dṛśi netre na nipatitāsi | tvaṃ gehātsaritaṃ nadīṃ yātā gatā udakaṃ hārikā udakamāhartuṃ na punarājihīṣe na punarāgacchasi | maṅkṣyāmi snāsyāmīti kṛtvā yamunātīre vīrudhāṃ latānāṃ gṛhāṇi śrayasyāśrayasi | gosaṃdāyī gavāṃ bandhanakāriṇī satī govardhanādrervanānyeva
viśesi ca | hārikeṃti ‘hañ haraṇe’ tumunarthe ṇvul | ājihīṣe iti ‘ohāṅ gatau’ (āṅpūrvaḥ) madhyamapuruṣaikavacane ‘ślo 6|1|10’ iti dvirvacanam | ‘mṛñāmit7|4|75’ ityākārasyettvam | maṅkṣyāmīti masjerlaṭi uttamapuruṣe | ‘masjerantyātpūrva’ iti numi nakāralope ca rūpam | ‘latā pratāninī vīrud’ ityamaraḥ | gosaṃdāyīti saṃdānaṃ bandhanam | ‘chānda’ iti prasiddham | atra ṇvulādikṛtā tādarthyapuraskāreṇa kriyā viśeṣyate | evamiti | yatra ‘lakṣaṇahetvoḥ |3|2|126', ‘iṅdhāryauḥ’ śatrakṛcchriṇi 2|3|130’ ityanena lakṣaṇādiśatrādyantena kriyā viśeṣyate tatrāpi kriyāparikaro draṣṭavyaḥ | yathā puṣpāt svavṛkṣe svayaṃ gataḥ phalatastu samāyāta ityādi(?) ||

lg.l: stanopapīḍaṃ nunude nitambinā ghanena kaścijjaghanena kāntayā ||’

div.p: atra stanābhyāmupapīḍayantyāyaṃ nunude iti | arthāt kriyāviśeṣaṇamevaitadityayamapi kriyāparikaro bhavati ||
evaṃ yathāvidhyanuprayogādiṣvapi draṣṭavyam | tena kriyāyāḥ kvacidāntaraviśeṣaṇayogāvdyaṅgyatvaṃ bhavatītyapi vyākhyātam ||

salīlamityādi | kaścinnāyakaḥ priyayā jaghanena nunude preritaḥ | stanopapīḍaṃ stanābhyāmāpīḍya | jaghanena kīdṛśena | nitambinā kaṭitaṭavatā nibiḍena ca | kāntayā kīdṛśyā | salīlaṃ savilāsaṃ yathā syādevaṃ puṣpāvataṃsakaṃ samāsajantyā āropayantyā | kīdṛśam | āsaktaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ latābhūṣaṇaṃ yatra tat | stanopapīḍamiti ‘saptamyāṃ copapaḍī 3|4|49’ iti ṇamul | atra ṇamulāvyayena nodanakriyāyā viśeṣaṇaṃ parikaraḥ || evamiti | tatra hi yasmāddhātorloḍādistasmādevāgrimapratyaya iti kriyāyā viśeṣaṇatvena parikaratā ||

l.seg: śūnye tatra nikuñjaśākhini sakhi grīṣmasya madhyaṃdine

div.p: atra ‘uṣṭrāsikā āsyante’, ‘hataśāyikāḥ śayyante’ ityamūbhyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣopacaritarūpo bhāvātmā ṇvulaiva pratyāyyate | sa ākhyātābhyāṃ sāmānyarūpeṇa, ṇvulantābhyāṃ viśeṣarūpeṇa | bahuvacanaṃ ceha kutsātiśayārtham | yāhi nāmoṣṭrasya kutsāvatyo bahuprakāravatyo vakṣaḥsu āsikāḥ, yāśca hatānāmatiśayavatyastathābhūtā eva bhūyasyaḥ śāyikāḥ pratītāstābhirviśeṣarūpābhiriyamāsikā śāyikā copamānopameyasaṃbandhajanitabhedābhedaparigrahāllakāreṇāpi bahutvenaiva pratyāyyate | tenoṣṭrāsikā ivāsanāni, hataśāyikā iva śayanāni kriyante bhavantīti vākyārtho bhavati, so 'yaṃ yathoktaḥ kriyāparikaraḥ ||

śayyanta ityādi | pathi vṛkṣacchāyopaviṣṭapānthairhataśāyikā ninditaśayanānīva śayyante śayanāni kriyante | śrīkaṇṭhagṛheṣu dhārmikajanaistapakhibhiruṣṭrāsikā ivoṣṭropaveśanānīvāsyante sthīyante | yathoṣṭro yatra kutracidupaviśati tathā tapasvibhirapyupaviśyata ityarthaḥ | he sakhi, tatra nikuñjaśākhini nikuñjavṛkṣe śūnye vijane grīṣmasya madhyāhne sajjānāṃ susajjānāmabhisārikāṇāṃ priyasyābhisāraṇavyāpāre ramyaḥ kṣaṇo vartate | śayyanta iti ‘śīṅ svapne’ bhāve yak | śāyikā iti ‘dhātvarthanirdeśe ṇvul vaktavyaḥ’ iti śīṅdhātoḥ ṇvul | tathā ca śāyikāḥ śayanānītyarthaḥ | śrīkaṇṭhaḥ śivaḥ | ‘śrīkaṇṭhaḥ śitikaṇṭhaḥ kapālabhṛt’ ityabharaḥ | āsikā iti | ‘āsa upaveśane’ dhātvarthanirdeśe ṇvul vaktavyaḥ’ iti ṇvul | tena āsikā āsanānītyarthaḥ | ‘sajjaḥ syāt saṃnaddhe saṃbhṛte triṣu’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra śayitāpekṣayoviṣṭasyābhisaraṇe vāraṇīyatvakhyāpanārthaṃ vivaraṇe vaiparītyamāha—atreti | amūbhyāṃ vākyābhyām | sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ śuyyante āsyante iti sāmānyam, hataśāyikā uṣṭrāsiketi viśeṣastābhyāmuparacitamupasthāpitaṃ rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya saḥ | bhāvātmā bhāvarūpo dharma iti yāvat | pratyāyyate bodhyate | ākhyātābhyāmāsyante śayyanta ityatra | sāmānyarūpeṇa sāmānyākāreṇa | ṇvuleti | uṣṭrāsikāhataśāyikāpadābhyāmityarthaḥ | viśeṣeti | viśeṣyo tayoḥ kathanādityarthaḥ | tarhi bhāvasyaikatvādekavacanaṃ syāttatkathaṃ bahuvacanaṃ śayyante āsyante iti syādata āha—bahuvacanamiti | viśeṣakriyāgatabahutvasyaiva sāmānyakriyāyā vivakṣitatvādbahuvacavamityarthaḥ | vivakṣāmūlaṃ
kutsāpratipādanam | kutsāmevāha—yā hīti | tathā ca tadviśeṣayogādbahutvamityevāha—tābhiriti | upamānopameyasaṃbandhena janito 'bhedo yasyāḥ sā | bhedaparigrahādbhedapuraskārāt | lakāreṇa bhāvapratyayena | lakāravācyamarthamāha—teneti ||
kvacit punarbāhyamapi kṛdrūpaṃ kṛdartharūpaṃ vā kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | yathā—

l.seg: kiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punariha na vedmi bhrukuṭaya-
stathāpi kliśyanmāṃ kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣṭo viramati || 180 ||’

div.p: atra ‘vārān’ iti vāraśabdaḥ kṛdantaḥ | vārasaṃkhyāyāḥ kṛtvasujiti kṛtvasuc kṛdarthaḥ | tāvimau dvāvapyāvṛttirūpeṇa kriyāyā viśeḥ ṣaṇaṃ bhavataḥ | nanvevamuṣṭrāsikādīnāṃ ‘vārādīnām’ kha. gha vārādīnāṃ ca kriyāviśeṣaṇatvāt karmateva napuṃsakaliṅgatāpi prāpnoti | yathā—mṛdu pacati, praśastaṃ, paṭhatīti | ucyate | tridhā khalu kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati— bāhyam, ābhyantaram, bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca | tatra bāhyaṃ karmarūpaṃ vārādi, ābhyantaraṃ viśeṣarūpamuṣṭrāsikādi, bāhyābhyantaraṃ‘bāhyābhyantararūpam’ ga gha guṇarūpaṃ mṛdvādi | teṣu bāhyaṃ so 'yamityabhidhāyāsaṃbandhādabhedopacāreṇāvicalitasvarūpameva‘ca pradhānaṃ viśiṃṣat gha pradhānaṃ viśiṣat kathamiva svaliṅgaṃ jahyāt, ābhyantaraṃ tu viśeṣāparigrahādāviṣṭaliṅgasaṃkhyaṃ kathamivānyaliṅgaṃ gṛhṇīyāt | bāhyābhyantaraṃ tu guṇatvāt khaliṅgavirahe ‘guṇavacanānāmāśrayato guṇavacanāni’ iti viśeṣyaliṅgagrāhyeva‘viśeṣyaliṅgagrāhyameva’ kha bhavati ||

śatamityādi | he priyasakhi, tathāpi sa dhṛṣṭo māṃ kliśyan kṣaṇamapi na viramati na virakto bhavati | kīdṛśaḥ | paruṣairniṣṭhurairvacanaiḥ śataṃ vārānyathā syādevamuktaḥ, pade nipatitaḥ, sa ca pārṣṇihatibhiḥ pādatalaprahāraiḥ sahasraṃ vārānnirdhūtaścālitaḥ, iha viṣaye bhrukuṭayaḥ punaḥ kiyatkṛtvaḥ kiyadvārān na baddhā iti na vedmi | vārāniti ‘vṛñ varaṇe’ bhāve ghañ | tena vārapadamāvṛttivacanaṃ svata eva kiyatkṛtva iti | ‘niṣṭhuraṃ paruṣaṃ grāmyam’ ityabharaḥ | atra vāraśabdaḥ kṛdantaḥ | kiyatkṛtva ityatra vārasaṃkhyāvācakatāyāṃ kṛtvasujiti kṛdarthatā | kṛdantasya kṛdarthasya cāvṛttirūpeṇa paunaḥpunyatayā kriyāviśeṣaṇatā | ‘napuṃsakatvaṃ karmatvaṃ tulyatvaṃ ca tathaikatā | kriyāviśeṣaṇasyaiva mataṃ sūribhirādarāt ||’ iti matamanumatya klībatvamuṣṭrāsikādīnāṃ śaṅkate—nanviti | samādhatte—tridheti | yatra dharmadharmiṇorabhedopacārastatra dharmo 'jahatsvarūpa eva dharmiviśeṣakaḥ | so 'yamityādau viśeṣarūpeṇa liṅgasaṃkhyayoranvaye uṣṭrāsikādau kathamanyaliṅgagrahaḥ | ‘guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanāni’ iti guṇarūpāṇāṃ viśeṣyaliṅgatā ||

atrādyaḥ prakāravacane thāl anekavārānityarthe ‘asakṛt’ iti taddhitena, ‘paśyanti’ iti ‘kriyām’ ‘kriyāyāḥ’ vā bhavetkriyāyām, ‘valitagrīvam’ iti samāsena, ‘kimapi’ iti nāmnāvyayena, ‘sthitvā’ iti kṛtā, ‘muhuḥ’ iti kṛdarthe vīpsayā ca kriyāviśeṣaṇena saha viśeṣayati, dvitīyaśca ‘yathā bhramannayanodakaṃ nipatati’ iti śatṛlakṣitayā ‘patati’‘patanakriyayā’ ka kha iti kriyayā tamevārthamanusaṃdadhānaḥ pūrvakriyāyā eva viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, ‘yo 'yam’ ga ghaso 'yaṃ kṛttaddhita-
samāsāvyayānāṃ saṃnipātarūpe 'pi kriyāparikare ‘yathā, tathā’ ityetayoḥ prādhānyāttaddhitenaivopadiśyate ||

akṛtetyādi | etā mṛgapaṅktayastathā tena prakāreṇa nibiḍanetrajalairmukhairasakṛdvāraṃvāraṃ gaganaṃ paśyanti | yathā yena prakāreṇa nayanajalaṃ bhramat sat śṛṅgāgrebhyo nipatati | kiṃ kṛtvā | akṛtakavalodyamairāsyaiḥ kimapi valitagrīvamuttolitaghāṭākaṃ yathā syādevaṃ sthitvā | kīdṛśyaḥ | bhayena sthagite niścale īkṣaṇe yāsāṃ tāḥ | atra tathetyatra prakāravacane thāl | paśyantīti kriyāyāmanenānena kriyāviśeṣaṇena saha viśeṣayatītyanvayaḥ || asakṛditi ‘ekasya sakṛcca 5|4|19’ iti sucpratyayaḥ, sakṛdādeśaḥ saṃyogāntalopaśca | tena sakṛcchabdastaddhitādhikārīyaḥ | paścānnañsamāsaḥ | calitā grīvā yatreti samāsaḥ | nāmnā prātipadikena | ktvāpratyayaḥ kṛt | muhuriti | vāraṃvāraṃ sthitvetyatra pūrvakālikāvasthāna eva vīpseti kṛdarthe vīpsā syādevetyarthaḥ | dvitīya iti | yathetyatra thāl | tamevārthaṃ prakārarūpaṃ saṃdadhāna upasthāpayan pūrvakriyāyāḥ pradhānakriyāyāḥ paśyantītirūpāyā viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | tathā ca kṛtvasucā pratyayenoktaṃ yatsthānaṃ vāraṃvārādilakṣaṇaṃ tena yadi taddhita ucyate taddhitasya vāraṃvārārthatā bhavati tadāyaṃ parikarabhedaḥ kṛtprabhṛtīnāṃ saṃnipātarūpaḥ samanvayarūpa ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘jaha jaha ṇisā samappaï taha taha vevirataraṅgapaḍimāpaḍiamsetubandhe ‘vaḍiam’ iti pāṭhaḥ |
kiṃkāavvavimūḍhaṃ vevaïsetubandhe ‘dhoḍaï’ iti pāṭhaḥ, ‘ghūrṇate’ iti chāyā ca hiaaṃ vva uahiṇo sasibimbam || 182 ||’
[yathā yathā niśā samāpyate tathā tathā vepamānataraṅgapratimāpatitam |

div.p: atra ‘yathā, tathā’ iti kriyāviśeṣaṇayoraparamapi viśeṣaṇaṃ vīpsā bhavati | so 'yamevaṃprakāraḥ kriyāparikaro draṣṭavyaḥ ||

jaha jahetyādi | “yathā yathā niśā samāpyate tathā tathā vepamānataraṅgapratimāpatitam | kiṃkartavyavimūḍhaṃ setubandhe ‘dhoḍaï’ iti pāṭhaḥ, ‘ghūrṇate’ iti chāyā cavepate hṛdayamivodadheḥ śaśibimbam ||” iha
niśā yathā yathā samāpyate svayaṃ samāptiṃ yāti | karmakartari taṅ | tathā tathā śaśibimbaṃ ghūrṇate | kīdṛśam | vepanaśīlataraṅge pratimayā pratibimbena patitam | kiṃkartavyamatreti vimūḍhaṃ mugdhamudadherhṛdayamiva | ivaśabda utprekṣāyām | atra tacchabdayacchabdayorvaiparītyam | yathā śaśibimbaṃ ghūrṇate tathā niśā samāpyata iti vaktavye yathoktaṃ viparītam | tadviśeṣaṇayogaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇāntarayoge vīpsākāritaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘dharmasyotsavavaijayanti mukuṭasragveṇi gaurīpatestvāṃ ratnākarapatni jahnutanaye bhāgīrathi prārthaye |
tvattoyāntaśilaniṣaṇṇavapuṣastvadvīcibhiḥ preṅkhatastvannāma smaratastvadarpitadṛśaḥ prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti me || 183 ||’
