div.p: atra ‘bhāgīrathi’ iti saṃbodhanapadaṃ ‘dharmasyotsavavaijayanti’ ityādibhiḥ pariṣkriyate | tatra yathākathaṃcidapyucyamāno 'rthaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ‘kriyāviśeṣaṇam’ ka kha nātikrāmatītyayamapi kriyāparikaraḥ |

dharmasyetyādi | he bhagīrathi bhagīrathāvatārite he gaṅge, tvāmahaṃ prārthaye dharmasyotsave vaijayanti patākārūpe, he bhavānīpatermukuṭamālārūpā veṇī pravāho yasyāstādṛśe, he ratnākarasya samudrasya patni jāye, he jahnumunikanyake | prārthanāviṣayamāha—mama prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti gamiṣyanti | kīdṛśasya | tvattoyasyānte samīpe śilāniṣaṇṇāṅgasya tvadvīcibhiḥ tvattaraṅgaiḥ preṅkhataścalatastvadīyaṃ nāma smaratastvadarpitadṛśastvayi dattanetrasya ca | ‘vaijayantī patākāyām’ iti medinīkāraḥ | ‘antaḥ śeṣe 'ntike striyām’ iti ca | atra sphuṭakriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ nāstītyata āha—tatreti | viśiṣṭāyāḥ prārthanakarmatayā viśeṣaṇasyāpyanvaya iti yathākathaṃcidityasyārthaḥ ||

lg.l: mukhena dīrghojjvalalolacakṣuṣā vayasya kāntā kathaya kva vartate || 184 ||’

div.p: atra jaghanasthalādīni lakṣaṇāni mahāprathimnetyādibhiḥ pariṣkriyante; so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇaparikaraḥ ||

mahāvākyasthasaṃbandhipadairlakṣaṇādayo yatra lakṣyante sa parikara evetyuktaṃ vivṛṇoti—lakṣaṇeti || mahetyādi | he vayasya mitra, tvaṃ kathaya sā kāntā kva vartate | kīdṛśī | mahān prathimā sthūlatvaṃ yasya tena jaghanasthalena lakṣitā | mahākumbhikumbhasthalādapyuccau kucau yatra tena hṛdayena lakṣitā | dīrghe, ujjvale, nirmale, lole capale cakṣuṣī yatra tena mukhena lakṣitā ca | iha lakṣakapadānāṃ saṃbandhibhirviśeṣaṇaiḥ pariṣkāraḥ ||

lg.l: ‘tvayā jaganti puṇyāni tvayyapuṇyā‘tvayā puṇyā’ ka-gha janoktayaḥ |
nāthavantastvayā lokāstvamanāthā vipadyasemudrita uttararāmacarite ‘vipatsyase’ iti pāṭhaḥ || 185 ||’

div.p: atra prathamatṛtīyapādayoḥ ‘tvayā, tvayā’ iti hetū dvitīyacaturthapādābhyāṃ pariṣkriyete; so 'yaṃ hetuparikaraḥ ||

ādipadagrāhyaṃ hetvādi | tatra hetāvāha—hetviti | tvayetyādi | tvayā jaganti pavitrāṇi | tvayi janoktayo 'puṇyā akuśalāḥ | tvayā lokā janā nāthavantaḥ sarakṣakāḥ | tvamanāthā aśaraṇā vipadyase vipannā bhavasi | atra hetudvayapariṣkāro vyakta eva ||

lg.l: ‘anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccinmanaso ruciste |

div.p: atra ‘anena’ iti sahārthaḥ ‘yūnā, pārthivena’ iti ca padābhyāṃ pariṣkriyate; so 'yaṃ sahārthaparikaraḥ ||

anenetyādi | he rambhoru, anena taruṇena bhūpena saha tava manaso rucirabhilāṣaḥ kaccitkathayetyarthaḥ | kimartham | vanapaṅktiṣu vihartuṃ krīḍāṃ kartum | kīdṛśīṣu | siprā nadībhedastattaraṅgasaṃgivāyunā kalpitāsu | ‘kaccitkāmapravedane' ityamaraḥ | atrāneneti ‘sahayukte 'pradhāne 2|3|19’ iti tṛtīyā | tatpratipādyaḥ sahārtho 'tra viśeṣaṇābhyāṃ pariṣkriyate ||
atra ‘anyonyaśobhāparivṛddhaye’ iti tādarthyārthaḥ śeṣapadārthaiḥ pariṣkriyate; so 'yaṃ tādarthyaparikaraḥ ||

indīvaretyādi | vāṃ yuvayoryogaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parasparaśobhāsaṃpattyai bhavatu | vidyunmeghayoriva, yathā tayoryogaḥ parasparaśobhāyai tathetyarthaḥ | ayaṃ nṛpo nīlanalinaśyāmāṅgaḥ, tvaṃ ca gorocanāvat gaurāṅgayaṣṭiḥ | atra parivṛddhaye iti tādarthye caturthīti tādarthyārthapariṣkāraḥ ||

pratyakṣetyādi | tubhyaṃ namaḥ | kīdṛśāya | pratyakṣo vastūnāṃ padārthānāṃ viṣayo rūpādikaṃ yasya tasmai | yadvā pratyakṣau vastuviṣayau padārthaghaṭapaṭādī yasya tasmai | padārtha iha svargāpūrvadevatādiḥ | ‘rūpādau viṣayaḥ pumān’ iti medinīkāraḥ | jagatāṃ hitāyopakārakāya | viśvasya bhuvanasya sthitiravasthānam, pralayo nāśaḥ, saṃbhava utpattisteṣāṃ hetave | sarvaṃ vastu ātmā svaṃ yasya tasmai | sarvarūpāyetyarthaḥ | vijitau roṣakāmau yena tasmai | tribhuvanasya prabhave īśvarāya śivāya kalyāṇakārakāya ca | atra ‘namaḥsvastisvāhāsvadhālaṃvaṣaḍyogācca 2|3|16’ iti tubhyamiti namoyoge upapadavibhaktiścaturthī tadartha itarapadārthaiḥ pariṣkriyate ||
upameti | upamādīnāṃ śabdārthobhayabhaṅgibhiryatsādharmyotpādanaṃ sa parikaraḥ | śabdaścārthaścobhayaṃ ca teṣāṃ bhaṅgibhirbhajanaiḥ ||

lg.l: ‘kaha kaha viraei paaṃ maggaṃ pulaei chejjamāvisaï |
coravva kaī atthaṃ laddhuṃ dukkheṇa ṇivvahaï || 189 ||’
[kathaṃ kathaṃ viracayati padaṃ mārgaṃ pralokate chedyamāviśati |
cora iva kavirarthaṃ labdhuṃ duḥkhena nirvahati ||]

div.p: kaha ityādi | ‘kathaṃ kathamapi racayati | padaṃ mārgaṃ pralokate chedyamāviśati | caura iva kavirarthaṃ labdhuṃ duḥkhena nirvahati ||’ iha kavirarthaṃ vācyaṃ labdhuṃ prāptuṃ duḥkhena nirvahati samartho bhavatītyarthaḥ | caurasāmyamāha—kathaṃ kathamapi kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā padaṃ vibhaktyantaraṃ racayati, kutrakutrāpi vā padaṃ racayati, mārgaṃ kavivartma pralokate paśyati | anena pathā kavibhiḥ kiṃ gatamityanusaṃdadhātītyarthaḥ | chedyaṃ chedanīyamaśuddhamāviśati | caura iva | yathā cauraḥ kvāpi kathamapi padaṃ vyavasāyaṃ pādaṃ vā racayati, mārgaṃ gatāgatavartma paśyati, chedyaṃ chedārhaṃ sthānaṃ praviśati, arthaṃ sādhudhanaṃ prāptuṃ duḥkhena śaknoti tathetyarthaḥ | atra sāmyāpādakaviśeṣaṇairupamā asiddhāpi sādhitā ||

lg.l: ‘viaḍe gaaṇasamudde diase sūreṇa mandareṇa va mahie |
ṇīi maïravva saṃjjhā tissā maggeṇa amaakalaso vva sasī || 190 ||’
niryāti madireva saṃdhyā mārgeṇāmṛtakalaśa iva śaśī ||]

div.p: atra gagane samudratvena rūpite sūryasaṃdhyāśaśibhiḥ, mandaramadirā 'mṛtakalaśaiśca mathanādikriyāniveśibhirarthaiḥ parasparopamānātsādharmyamutpāditamityartho 'yaṃ rūpakaparikaraḥ ||

viaḍe ityādi | ‘vikaṭe gaganasamudre mandareṇeva (mahite) mathite | nirgacchati madireva saṃdhyā tasyā mārgeṇāmṛtakalaśa iva śaśī ||’ iha saṃdhyā nirgacchati | vikaṭe mahati gaganasamudre mandaragiriṇeva raviṇā divase mahite pūjite 'tha ca mathite sati madireva yathā mandaramathite samudre madirā nirgacchati tathetyarthaḥ | tasyāḥ saṃdhyāyā mārgeṇa yathā candro 'mṛtakalaśa ivāsti nirgacchati vā | ākāṅkṣākrameṇa nirgacchatirubhayānvayī | atra sūryādibhirarthairanyonyopamānātsādharmyopapattirityārtho 'yam ||

atra ‘priyasaṃgame 'pi madanākalpaprasādhanaṃ bhavati’ iti viruddhārthayoḥ sādharmyotpādanāyaatra ‘anyeṣvapi dṛśyate’ iti bhāvyam | apiśabdaḥ sarvopādhivyabhicārārthaḥ | tena janivyatiriktādapi dhātorbhavitumarhatīti vaiyākaraṇāḥ jale krīḍato yuvatijanasya yathoktaviśeṣaṇābhyāṃ
śabdato 'rthataścopaskāraḥ kṛta ityubhayakṛto 'yaṃ virodhaśleṣaparikaraḥ | evamalaṃkārāntareṣvapi draṣṭavyam ||

raïa ityādi | ‘racitamṛṇālābharaṇo nalinīdalotthagitapīvarastanakalaśaḥ | vahati priyasaṃgame 'pi madanākalpaprasādhanaṃ yuvatijanaḥ ||’ iha yuvatijanaḥ patisaṃgame 'pi madanasyākalpa utkaṇṭhā tadarthaṃ prasādhanamalaṃkāraṃ vahati | kīdṛśaḥ | kṛtamṛṇālālaṃkāraḥ | padminīpatrairutthagita uttambhitaḥ | āvṛta iti yāvat | pīvarakucaghaṭo yena saḥ | utthagita iti utpūrvāt ‘thagi’ (ṣṭhage) saṃvaraṇe’ karmaṇi ktaḥ | ‘ākalpakastamomohagrastābū’ (nthiṃṣū)tkalikāmudoḥ |’ iti medinīkāraḥ | yadvā madanasya ratipaterākalpakamañjanakaṃ prasādhanamityarthaḥ | atra priyasaṃgame kāmajanakameva prasādhanaṃ yuktamiha tu tadvaiparītyena viruddhārthatā | jalakrīḍāyāṃ tu mṛṇālanalinībhyāṃ yuvaterupaskāraḥ śābda ārthaśca vyakta eva ||

lg.l: ekāvalīti yā sāpi bhinnā parikarānna hi |

div.p: pūrvaṃ prati yatrottarasya vastuno vīpsayā viśeṣaṇatvena sthāpanaṃ niṣedho vā saikāvalī | iyamapi parikarādabhinnaivetyāha—ekāvalīti | ekenāparasya pariṣkaraṇamekāvalyāmapi labhyate ityanayorabheda ityarthaḥ ||

lg.l: harimiva harimiva harimiva vahati payaḥ paśyata payoṣṇī || 192 ||’

div.p: atra ‘harimiva, harimiva, harimiva’ iti śabdaikāvalyā vibhinnārthayā ‘payaḥ’ karmakārakamupaskriyate; seyaṃ śabdaikāvalī parikarasyaiva bhedaḥ ||

parvatetyādi | iyaṃ payoṣṇī nadībhedaḥ payo jalaṃ vahati tatpaśyata | vākyārthasyaiva vā karmatā | payaḥ kīdṛśam | parvatasyādrerbhedanaśīlam | adriṃ bhittvā vahanāt | pavitraṃ puṇyahetukam | narakasya nirayasya jaitramata eva bahumatamanekasaṃmataṃ gahanamagādham | haririndrastamiva | indraṃ kīdṛśam | ‘adripakṣasya chedyatvena parvatabhedī pavinā vajreṇa trāyate ‘anyatrāpi dṛśyate’ iti traḥ pavitraḥ | paścātkarmadhārayaḥ |
yadvā parvatabhedinā pavinā trāyate iti parvatabhedipavitrastam | he nara nala iti saṃbodhranam | ralayorekatra smaraṇāt | kasya bahumatamīṣanmataṃ jaitraṃ kiṃtu sarvasyaiva saṃpūrṇameva svīkṛtam | bahumatamitīṣadasamāptau bahuc | sa cādau bhavati ‘vibhāṣā supo bahuc purastāttu 5|3|68’ iti sūtreṇa | gahanaṃ kaṭhoram | hariḥ siṃhastamiva parvatasya | bhidyata iti bhedo vivaram | guheti yāvat | tatsaṃbaddhaṃ tacchāyitvāt | pavitraṃ śvetaṃ narakasya praśastapuṃso 'pi jetāram | bahurbahumānaviṣayo mataṅgo munibhedo yeṣāṃ te bahumataṅgā hastinasteṣāṃ pitṛtvena tasya pūjyatvāt tān hanti tam | harirviṣṇustamiva | parvatasya govardhanasya bhedakamutthāpakatvāt | pavervajrāt traḥ trāṇaṃ yasmāttat | viṣṇusmaraṇasya tadapi phalam | narakasya daityabhedasya jaitram | bahumataṅgān hiṃstrān hanti yastam | harirvāyustamiva so 'pyativegitvādadribhedī, pavitraḥ pavanatvāt | ata eva narakasya kaśmalasya nivārakaḥ | bahūnāṃ vātayogināṃ svīkṛtaḥ gahanaḥ kaṣṭena pariceyaśca bhavati | ‘indre siṃhe 'nile viṣṇau hariḥ śamanasūryayoḥ |’ iti śāśvataḥśāśvatakoṣe tu ‘indracandrāśvavātārkaśukabhekayamāhiṣu | kapau siṃhe suvarṇābhe varṇe viṣṇau hariṃ viduḥ ||’ iti vidyate | | atra harimivetyādiśabdarūpaikāvalyā viśeṣaṇatvena payorūpasya karmakārakasya pariṣkāraḥ ||

l.seg: na khalu likhitāḥ patrāvalyaḥ kimadya kapolayoḥ |

div.p: atra ‘ayamayamayam’ iti sarvanāmaparāmṛśyamānayā prāgupanyastakāraṇabhūtayā tato 'nyayā vā tathāvidhayārthaikāvalyā ‘paricchadaḥ’ iti kartṛkārakamabhinnārtha iva pariṣkriyate; seyamarthaikāvalī parikarasyaiva bhedaḥ ||

kimityādi | he śaśimukhi, sakhīhastāropito 'yamayaṃ vilāsārthaṃ paricchadastavāsaṃsmaraṇena kiṃcitklāmyati | tadāha—kabarī keśaveśaḥ | kimiti yādṛk tādṛk | na ramya ityarthaḥ | ‘kabarī keśaveśaḥ syāt’ ityamaraḥ | dṛśau netre akajjale
kim, kapolayoḥ patrāvalyo 'dyādhunā kiṃ naiva likhitāḥ | khaluśabdo 'vadhāraṇe vākyabhūṣāyāṃ vā | atrāyamiti sarvanāmopasthāpitayārthaikāvalyā tulyayaiva paricchadarūpasya kartṛkārakasya pariṣkāraḥ ||

lg.l: ‘ambā tuṣyati na mayā snuṣayā sāpi nāmbayā na mayā |
ahamapi na tayā na tayā vada rājan kasya doṣo 'yam || 194 ||’

div.p: atrāmbāsnuṣāsmadarthalakṣaṇairarthaistadvācibhiḥ sarvanāmabhiḥ śabdairekāvalīkrameṇa mitho 'nusyūtairmitho 'nusyūta eva ‘tuṣyati’ iti kriyāheturmayetyādibhiḥ pariṣkriyate; seyamubhayagrathitatvādubhayaikāvalī parikarasyaiva bhedaḥ ||

ambetyādi | ambā mātā na mayā tuṣyati tuṣṭā bhavati | na snuṣayā putravadhvā tuṣyati | sāpi snuṣā nāmbayā na mayā ca tuṣyati | ahamapi na tayāmbayā na tayā snuṣayā ca tuṣyāmi | he rājan, kasya doṣo 'yamiti vada | vadetyatra vākyārthasyaiva karmatā | ‘ambā mātāmbikāpi ca’ iti ratnakoṣaḥ | ‘samāḥ snuṣājanīvadhvaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atrāmbādyarthaistadvācakaśabdaiśca mayetyādeḥ pariṣkāraḥ || iti parikarālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: saṃpuṭaṃ rasanā mālā cakravālaṃ ca tadbhidāḥ || 78 ||

div.p: kriyetyādi | ekatra sthitena jātyādivācinā padena yadi sarvavākyopakāraḥ kriyate tadā dīpakam | dīpayatīti dīpakamityanvarthaṃ nāma | aṣṭadhā tadityāha—artheti | tasya dīpakasya bhidā bhedāḥ ||
atra ‘caranti’ iti kriyayā dvayorapi vākyayorādipasthayaivopakāraḥ kriyata ityādidīpakamidaṃ kriyāviṣayamucyate | evaṃ madhyāntayorapi draṣṭavyam ||

carantītyādi | tava dantino hastinaścatuḥsamudrakūlavaneṣu caranti | kundapuṣpadīptayo nirmalāstava guṇāśca cakravālasya lokālokasyādreḥ kuñjeṣu caranti gacchanti | atra kriyāvācinā carantīti padenādisthena vākyadvayaṃ dīpitam | madhyāsthitena vā kriyāpadena yatra vākyadīpanaṃ tadapi madhyadīpakamantadīpakaṃ ceti mantavyamityāha—evamiti ||

lg.l: sa eva ca natāṅgīnāṃ mānabhaṅgāya kalpate || 196 ||’

div.p: atra ‘pavanaḥ’ ityādipāde jātipadaṃ tenādidīpakamidaṃ jātiviṣayamucyate | evaṃ madhyāntayorapi draṣṭavyam ||

pavana ityādi | dakṣiṇaḥ pavano malayānilo vīrudhāṃ latānāṃ jīrṇaṃ pakvaṃ parṇaṃ patraṃ harati | sa eva pavano nāgarīṇāṃ mānabhaṅgāya kalpate śakto bhavati | atra pavanapadasya sāmānyata evobhayatrānvayājjātivācakatvamādisthatvaṃ ca | evaṃ cetyayaṃ samudāyo 'tyantamabhedamāha | madhyāntasthayorapi jātivācinordīpakaṃ tattannāmnā jñeyamityāha—evamiti ||
atra ‘śyāmalāḥ’ ityādipāde guṇapadaṃ tenādidīpakamidaṃ guṇaviṣayamucyate | evaṃ madhyāntayorapi draṣṭavyam ||

śyāmalā ityādi | prāvṛṣeṇyābhirvarṣajātābhirjīmūtapaṅkibhirmeghasaṃdhairdiśaḥ śyāmalāḥ śyāmāḥ | ramyābhirnūtanatṛṇapaṅkibhirbhuvaśca śyāmalāḥ santi | ‘kālaśyāmalamecakāḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra jāte ityarthe ‘prāvṛṣa eṇyaḥ 4|3|17’ ityeṇyapratyayaḥ | ‘ghanajīmūtamudira’ ityamaraḥ | ‘śādvalaḥ śādaharite’ iti ca | ‘śādaḥ syātkardame śasye’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra śyāmalapadena guṇavācinānādisthena dīpanam | madhyāntasthayorapi guṇavācinorevaṃ jñeyamityāha—evamiti ||
atra ‘viṣṇunā’ ityādipāde dravyapadaṃ tenādidīpakamidaṃ dravyaviṣayamucyate | evaṃ madhyāntayorapi draṣṭavyam ||

viṣṇunetyādi | dānavānāṃ danorapatyānāmasurāṇāṃ vibhūtayaḥ saṃpattayo vikrāntena viṣṇunā kvāpi nītāḥ prāpitāḥ | tenaiva devatānābhṛddhayaḥ śriyaḥ kuto 'pyavadhibhūtādānītā āsan sthitāḥ | ‘saṃśatā‘prīyate’ ga gha nāsti (?) vupacaye ṛddhiḥ’ iti nānārthaḥ | atra viṣṇuśabdo dravyapara ādisthaśca | madhyāntasthayorapi dravyavācinorevaṃ draṣṭavyamityāha—evamiti ||

lg.l: ‘hṛṣyati cūteṣu ciraṃ tuṣyati bakuleṣu modate maruti |
iha hi madhau kalakūjiṣu pikeṣu ca prīyate‘saṃpattāvupacaye ṛddhiḥ’ iti bhavet kāmī || 199 ||’

div.p: atra ‘hṛṣyati, tuṣyati, modate, prīyate’ ityetaiḥ padaiḥ sa evārtha āvartyamānaḥ sarvavākyāni dīpayati; seyamarthāvṛttirdīpakasya bhedaḥ ||

hṛṣyatīti | kāmī iha madhau vasante cūteṣu hṛṣyati hṛṣṭo bhavati | bakuleṣu tuṣyati | maruti vāte bhodate | kalaraveṣu kokileṣu ca prīyate prīto bhavati | sarvatra ciramityanvayaḥ | hiravadhāraṇe | prīyata iti ‘prīṅ prītau’ daivādikaḥ | atra hṛṣyatītyādipadairāvartamāno 'rthaḥ sarvavākyadīpakaḥ ||
atrogdrīvaṃ karoti, utkaṇṭhāvantaṃ karotītyarthayoḥ ‘utkaṇṭhayati’ iti padamāvartyamānaṃ vākyadvayamapi dīpayati; seyaṃ padāvṛttirdīpakasya bhedaḥ ||

utkaṇṭhyatītyādi | meghānāṃ paṅktiḥ, mayūrāṇāṃ vṛndaṃ samūhamutkaṇṭhayayatyugdrīvayati | adyedānīṃ kāmaśca yūnāṃ cittamutkaṇṭhayatyutsukayati | atrotkaṇṭhayatīti padamāvartyamānaṃ vākyadvayadīpakam ||
atra jayetyarthaḥ śabdaścāvartyamānaḥ sarvavākyāni dīpayati; seyamubhayāvṛttirdīpakasya bhedaḥ ||

jayetyādi | he deva mahādeva, bhuvanasya jagato bhāvana janaka, jaya | he bhagavannakhileṣu janeṣu varaprada, nigamasya‘nigamo vāṇije puryāṃ kaṭe vede vaṇikpathe’ iti medinī vedasya nidhe āśraya, jaya | ramyacandracūḍa, jaya | madananāśaka, jaya prathamaguro, jaya | ‘nigamo nagare vede’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra jayaśabdastadarthaścāvartyamānaḥ sarvavākyadīpakaḥ ||

l.seg: stvamāpastvaṃ vyoma tvamu dharaṇirātmā tvamiti ca |
na vidmastattattvaṃ vayamiha tu yattvaṃ na bhavasi || 202 ||’

div.p:
atra pūrvārdhe tvamiti śabdārthayoḥ prathamāvṛttiḥ prathamapādasthayā
‘asi’ iti kriyayā dīpyate | tatastṛtīyapāde ‘tvayi’ iti rūpāntareṇa yuṣmadartha āvartyamānaḥ kriyāntareṇa saṃbadhyate, caturthapāde punarapi tenaiva rūpeṇāstyarthena bhavatinā saṃbadhyata iti; seyaṃ vṛttīnāmāvṛttirāvalīti dīpakasyaiva bhedo bhavati ||

tvamityādi | pariṇatāḥ pariṇāmino 'rkādayastvayi tvadviṣaya evaṃ paricchinnāṃ giraṃ vāṇīṃ bibhrati dhārayanti | iha jagati yattattvaṃ vastu tvaṃ na bhavasi tattattvaṃ vayaṃ punarna vidmo na jānīmaḥ | sarvātmakatvādbhavasya | paricchinnavāṇīmāha—tvamādityastvaṃ candrastvaṃ vāyustvamagnistvaṃ jalaṃ tvamākāśam | u he | tvaṃ bhūmistvamātmā cāsīti | ‘u saṃbodhanaśeṣoktyoḥ’ iti medinīkāraḥ || atra prathamārdhe tvamitiśabdārthayorāvṛttirasītikriyayā dīpitā, tṛtīyapāde tvayītirūpāntareṇa viṣayatvena yuṣmadarthastvamityevaṃrūpo dhāraṇakriyānvayī | antyapāde 'pi tvamityeva bhavanānvayītyāvṛttīnāmāvṛttirāvalīti ||

atra ‘navapallaveṣu— ityādini ‘aśokasya’ iti; ‘lolati—’ ityādīni ‘vasantalakṣmīḥ’ iti pade dravyavācinī saṃpuṭakrameṇa mithaḥ saṃbadhyamāne mithaḥ saṃbaddhānyeva dīpayataḥ, tadetatsaṃpuṭaṃ nāma dīpakasya bhedaḥ ||

ṇavetyādi | “navapallaveṣu lolati ghūrṇate viṭapeṣu calati śikhareṣu | sthāpayati stabakeṣu caraṇau vasantalakṣmīraśokasya ||” ihāśokasya navapallaveṣu vasantalakṣmīrlolati luṭhati | tasya viṭapeṣu śākhāsu ghūrṇate, tasya śikhareṣvagreṣu calati gacchati, tasya stabakeṣu puṣpaguccheṣu caraṇau sthāpayati | lolatīti
‘lolanaiṣa dhātuḥ kvāpi dhātupāṭhe vartaṃte | ‘luḍa viloḍane’ iti, ‘loḍa unmāde’ iti ca bhauvādikau | ubhayorapi loḍatīti | ḍalayorabhedāllolatīti ca calane’ taudādikaḥ | yadvā lokatīti kvibantāttip | atra padadvayaṃ dravyavācakaṃ saṃpuṭakrameṇa mithaḥ saṃbadhyamānaṃ mithaḥ saṃbaddhānyeva padāni dīpayatīti saṃpuṭam ||
atra rasanākrameṇa mithaḥ saṃgrathitāni ‘salilaṃ vikāśikamalam’ ityādīni vākyāni ‘iha’ ityantasthitenādhikaraṇavācinā dravyadīpakena dīpyante; tadetat rasanādīpakaṃ nāmādidīpakabhedaḥ ||

salilamityādi | jalaṃ praphullapadmama, padmāni sugandhamadhunā samṛddhāni | līnaṃ yadalikulaṃ tenākulaṃ madhu, bhramarakulamapīha vasante madhuraṇitaṃ madhunā puṣparasena śabditaṃ madhau madhūkadrume vā śabditam | ‘madhu puṣparasakṣaudramadye nā tu madhudrume’ iti medinīkāraḥ | atra kṣudraghaṇṭikākrameṇa saṃgrathitāni salilādipadānyantaḥsthitādhikaraṇarūpadravyavācakeneheti padena dīpyante ||

lg.l: ‘imiṇā saraeṇa sasī sasiṇā vi ṇisā ṇisāi‘ṇisāe’ ga kumuavaṇam |
kumuavaṇeṇa a puliṇaṃ atraikamātrāyā nyūnatvācchandodoṣaḥ pratibhātipuliṇeṇa a sohae haṃsaülam || 205 ||’
[anayā śaradā śaśī śaśināpi niśā niśayā kumudavanam |
kumudavanena ca pulinaṃ pulinena ca śobhate haṃsakulam ||]

div.p: atra mālākrameṇa parasparagrathitāḥ kartāro hetavaśca śaśiprabhṛtayaḥ ‘śobhate’ iti kriyayā dīpyante; tadetanmālādīpakaṃ nāma dīpakasya bhedaḥ ||

kaḥ punarasya pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ | pūrvatra vṛtticchinnaṃ rasanāyāṃ sarvatra
iha tu svatantraṃ mālāpuṣpavat padaṃ padena yujyamānaṃ kriyādibhiḥ saṃbadhyataïti ‘tato 'yaṃ bhidyate’ ka khatato bhidyate ||

imiṇetyādi | “anayā śaradā śaśī śaśināpi niśā niśayā kumudavanam | kumudavanena ca pulinaṃ pulinena ca śobhate haṃsakulam ||” iha sarvatra śobhata iti kriyānvayaḥ | atrānyonyagrathanayā mālākramastena ca pradhānakriyāyāṃ dīpanam | parasparagrathanayā rasanāmālayorbhedaṃ pṛcchati—ka iti | uttaram | pūrvatreti | rasanāyāṃ sarvatra vṛttyā chandasā chinnaṃ bhinnībhūtaṃ padaṃ padena yujyate | mālāyāṃ tu pratyekameva padaṃ padena yujyata ityanayorbheda ityartha ||

l.seg: devākarṇaya‘devālokaya’ ka pustake yena yena sahasā yadyatsamāsāditam |
tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca ‘saptābdhayaḥ’ ityapi pāṭhaḥ ghalokatrayam || 206 ||’

div.p: atra ‘saṃgrāmāṅgaṇamāgatena bhavatā cāpe samāropite’ iti bhāvalakṣaṇākṣiptasya bhāvaviśeṣasya dvitīyapāde kārakavīpsayā yat saṃkṣepeṇābhidhānaṃ tadetaccakravālādriṇeva mālādīpakena vistāravatā veṣṭitamidaṃ cakravālaṃ nāma dīpakasya bhedaḥ ||

saṃgrāmetyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ vistāraguṇe | atra bhāvaḥ kriyā | sā ca sāmānyalakṣaṇena jñātā viśeṣamākṣipati | jñānasāmānyasya viśeṣe jijñāsodayāt tatra ca samāropaṇarūpe kāraṃkajijñāsāyāṃ sāmānyata eva vīpsayābhidhānaṃ yeneti yaditi ca | vistaravattvaina cakravālādisāmyamasya || iti dīpakālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: bhaṇanaṃ paripāṭyā yat kramaḥ sa parikīrtitaḥ || 79 ||

div.p: śabdasyeti| śabdārthayoḥ paripāṭhyā bhaṇanaṃ kramaḥ | śabdatadarthatadubhayabhedātsa tridheti vibhāgaḥ ||
atra śabdaparipāṭī dvidhā—padato vākyataśca | tayorādyā yathā—
atrālāpasmitadṛṣṭibhiḥ padārthaurvallakī‘vallakyādayaḥ padārthāḥ’ dhakundasragindīvarasaṃpadaḥ padārthā jīyanta iti śabdaparipāṭyā bhaṇanam; seyaṃ padataḥ śabdaparipāṭī kramaḥ ||

tasyā ityādi | tasyā ālāpasmitadṛṣṭibhirvacaneṣaddhāsālokanairvallakīkundasragindīvarasaṃpado vīṇākundamālānīlābjasaṃpattayo jīyante | kīdṛśībhiḥ | upacitavilāsābhiḥ | atra śabdasya padarūpasya paripāṭyā bhaṇanamiti padaghaṭitaḥ śābdakramaḥ ||

l.seg: saṃvādaḥ praṇavena yasya dalatā‘lasatā’ kha kāyaikatāyāṃ tayo-
rūrdhvadvāri‘ūrdhvadvāravicintitena’ kha ga vicintitena ca hṛdi ‘hṛdi dhyātaḥ, svarūpeṇa ca’ ka gadhyātasvarūpeṇa ca 208’

div.p: atra ‘indurmūrdhni śivasya', śailaduhiturvakro nakhāṅkaḥ stane’ iti ‘cānyārthavācinau’ ka khavācyārthavācinau śabdasamudāyau krameṇa ‘ūrdhvadvāri‘ūrdhvadvāravicintitena’ kha ga vicintiteva ca’, ‘hṛdi ‘hṛdi dhyātaḥ, svarūpeṇa ca’ ka gadhyātasvarūpeṇa ca’ iti vākyārthadvayavācibhyāṃ śabdasamudāyābhyāṃ saṃbadhyete; seyaṃ vākyataḥ śabdaparipāṭi kramaḥ ||
indurityādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ saṃmitatvaguṇe | atra vākyārthābhidhāyakau śabdasamudāyau tādṛśābhyāṃ śabdasamudāyābhyāṃ saṃbaddhāviti vākyaghaṭitaḥ śābdakramaḥ ||

l.seg: sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām || 209 ||’

div.p: atra ‘haste’ līlākamalamalakaṃ bālakundānuviddham’ ityādyarthānāṃ śaradādikālakrameṇa bhaṇanam; seyaṃ kālato 'rthaparipāṭī kramaḥ ||

haste ityādi | yatra puryāṃ vadhūnāṃ haste līlākamalam, alakaṃ cūrṇakuntalaṃ bālakundenānuviddhaṃ saṃbaddham | lodhraprasavasya lodhrapuṣpasya rajasā dhūlyā mukhaśrīḥ pāṇḍutāṃ śvetatāṃ nītā | cūḍāpāśe praśastaśikhāyāṃ nūtanakurabakapuṣpam, cāru manojñaṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ karṇe, sīmante nīpaṃ kadambapuṣpam | tvadupagamastvadīyāgamanaṃ tasmājjātam | idaṃ sarvapuṣpaviśeṣaṇam | ‘cūḍā śikhāyāṃ bāhubhūṣaṇe’ iti medinīkāraḥ| śikhāparasyāpi pāśapadasya keśaparatvemeva | atra śaradādikālakrameṇārthānāṃ kramādārthakramaḥ ||

l.seg: maulau ratnaruci‘ratnaruciḥ’ ga gha śrutau parilasattāṭaṃṅkānti‘tālaṅkakāntiḥ’ ga gha kramā-
jjātaṃ‘yātaṃ’ ga gha vakṣasi kaustubhābhamudare nābhīsarojopamam || 210 ||’

div.p: atra trivikramatonorvaikuṇṭhasya pravṛddhisamaye krameṇaiva mauliśrutivakṣaüdaralakṣaṇeṣu śarīradeśeṣu bhāsvanmaṇḍalasya cūḍāratnatāṭaṅkakaustubhanābhyambujairyo 'yamaupamyalābhaḥ; ‘umaupamyalābho ga ghaseyaṃ deśato 'rthaparipāṭī kramaḥ ||

pāyādityādi | sa devo vo yuṣmān pāyāt rakṣatāt | kīdṛśaḥ | racitā trivikramasya vāmanasya tanuḥ śarīraṃ yena saḥ | daityanāśakaśca | yasvākasmādvardhamānaśarīrasya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ maulo ratnaruci jātam, kramāt śrutau karṇe śobhamānatāṭaṅkakānti jātam, vakṣasi kaustubhadīpti jātam, udarai nābhipadmopamaṃ jātam | ‘kaustubho maṇiḥ’ ityamaraḥ | iha harernābhipadmasya śvetatayā rūpeṇa na sāmyaṃ kiṃ tvākārādinetyavadheyam | ‘vaikuṇṭho viṣṭaraśravāḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra mauliprabhṛtideśapuraskāreṇārthakramaḥ ||
ubhayaparipāṭī dvidhā—śabdapradhānā, arthapradhānā ca | tayorādyā yathā—

l.seg: vālihiṃ bimba vivillio ghattio candu ṇahahi |

div.p: atra paṅkajakuvalayabimbiphalacandramasāṃ karanayanāgharavadanairyathāsaṃkhyaṃ parājayata iti śabdaparipāṭhyaiva paṅkajāni paṅke nyastāni, kuvalayāni hṛde kṣiptāni, bimbaṃ ‘muhapūriatiṇavajja vālī’ itideśīnāmamālanusāreṇa sacchindraṃ tṛṇa vṛntamapi bhavati | ‘vṛttau’ ga ghavṛnte prakīrṇam, candro nabhasi nirasta ityādhārāṇāmuparyuparibhāvaḥ, kriyāṇāṃ ca tyāgatāratamyamityarthaparipāṭī nyagbhavati; seyaṃ śabdapradhānobhayaparipāṭī kramaḥ ||

paṅka ityādi | “paṅkajāni paṅka nyastāni kuvalayāni kṣiptāni hrade kṛttau bimbaṃ vinikīrṇaṃ nirastaścandro nabhasi | karanayanādharavadanaistasyāṃ līlāvatyāṃ nijasṛṣṭirapyutsṛṣṭeva prajāpatinā ||” iha prajāpatinā brahmāṇā tasyāṃ līlāvatyāṃ nāyi-
kāyāṁ hastanetrādharamukhairnijasṛṣṭirapyutsṛṣṭeva datteva | paṅkajādīnāmapāsanāt | tadevāha—paṅkajāni padme kardame nyastāni | nīlābjāni hrade 'gādhajale kṣiptāni | vṛttau veṣṭane bimbaphalaṃ nyastam, candro gagane kṣipta iti | ‘sraṣṭā prajāpatirvedhāḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra paṅkajādīnāṃ karādinā jaye śābdakramaḥ pradhānībhūto 'dhikaraṇānāmuparyuparibhāvaḥ, kriyāṇāṃ ca tyāgatāratamyamityārthakramaśca nyagbhūto 'pradhāna ityubhayakrame 'pi śabdapradhānatā ||

l.seg: ‘gaṅge devi dṛśā punīhi yamune mātaḥ punardarśanaṃ
saṃpraśno 'stu pitaḥ prayāga bhagavannyagrodha māṃ dhyāsyasi |

div.p: atra gaṅgāyamunāprayāganyagrodhatatpuṃbhāvāvantinagarīnāthalakṣaṇānāmarthānāṃ mukhyakrameṇa ‘ devi dṛśā punīhi’, ‘mātaḥ punardarśanam’, ‘pitaḥ saṃpraśnaḥ’, ‘bhagavanmāṃ dhyāsyasi’ iti mukhyakrameṇaiva saṃbhramadbhirvacoviśeṣairabhyarthya‘abhyarcā’ ka ‘bhavatāmeva puṃbhāvamavantinagarīnāthaṃ didṛkṣāmahe’ iti yeyamabhyarthanābhaṅgiḥ sārthaparipāṭīkṛtā tasyāṃ ca ‘gaṅge’ yamune, prayāga, nyagrodha’ iti, ‘hārāsilatāvataṃsavipulavakṣaḥsthūlāṃsa’ iti ca śabdaparipāṭī parasparamupamānopameyabhūte nyagbhavataḥ, seyamarthapradhānobhayaparipāṭī kramaḥ ||

gaṅgetyādi | he gaṅge devi, dṛśā māṃ punīhi, he mātaryamune, punardarśanamastu, he pitaḥ prayāga, bhavān svāpraśno 'stu susaṃvādo 'stu | he bhagavan nyagrodha akṣayavaṭa, māṃ dhyāsyasi, smariṣyasi | tamavantinagarīnāthamujjiyinīpatiṃ, bhojarājaṃ nṛpaṃ vayaṃ didṛkṣāmahe draṣṭumicchāmaḥ | kīdṛśam | hārakhaṅgalatākarṇālaṃkārairvipulāḥ pīnabāhumūlyuktavakṣobhujā yasya tam | bhavatāmeva puṃbhāvaṃ puruṣarūpam | svāpraśna iti | svasya
ā samantāt praśnaḥ saṃvādaḥ | yathā āpṛcchasvetyatra | vataṃsena karṇālaṃkāreṇa vipulaḥ sthūlaścāṃso bāhumūlaṃ yatra vakṣasi tat | ‘vataṃsaḥ karṇapūre syāt’ iti viśvaḥ | atrādaravatā vacanaracanenābhyarcya prārthanābhāṅgirarthaparipāṭīkṛtā | tasyāṃ ca gaṅgayā hārasya, yamunayāsilatāyāḥ, prayāgeṇa vataṃsavipulasthūlāṃsavakṣasaḥ, nyagrodhena bhujasya śābdena krameṇa mitha upamānopameyabhāvo nyagbhūta ityubhayakrame 'rthapradhānatā || iti kramālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
miṣamiti | yanmiṣam, yoktibhaṅgiḥ, yaścāvasaraḥ sa paryāyaḥ | miṣādyanyatama eva paryāya iti lakṣaṇam ||

lg.l: drutaṃ tadenāṃ karavai nicolake kayācidevaṃ miṣato viniryaye 213’

div.p: atra ‘kayācidevaṃ miṣato viniryaye’ ityudarkābhidhānenākāṅkṣā‘nirākṛternirākāṅkṣa’ ka ‘nirākṛteti’ khanivṛtternirākāṅkṣametanmiṣaṃ nāma paryāyabhedaḥ ||

mayetyādi| kayācinnāyikayā evamanena prakāreṇa miṣato vyājādviniryaye bahirbhūtam | tadevāha—mayā tyaktā vallakī vīṇā bahireva gacchet | avaśyāyakaṇairhimalavaiḥ sārdratāṃ ca vrajet | tata enāṃ śīghraṃ nicolake vastre 'haṃ karavai kariṣyāmi | 'avaśyāyastu nīhāraḥ’ ityamaraḥ | ‘nicolaḥ pracchadapaṭaḥ’ iti ca | udarka uttarakālaśuddhistadabhidhānaṃ miṣaparyāyaḥ ||
atra ‘kayācidevaṃ miṣato viniryaye’ itivadudarkānabhidhānāt sākāṅkṣametanmiṣaṃ nāma paryāyasya bhedaḥ ||

daśatītyādi | asau parabhṛtaḥ pikaḥ sahakārasya bhañjarī daśati tamahaṃ vārayiṣyāmi | tato yuvābhyāṃ svairaṃ svacchandamāsyatāmupaviśyatām | ‘svacchandamandayoḥ svairam’ iti viśvaḥ | atrodarkānabhidhānātsākāṅkṣatvam ||

l.seg: ‘rājan rājasutā na pāṭhayati maṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ
kubje bhojaya māṃ kumāra kuśalaṃ‘gamyate’ ga nādyājjuke bhujyate |

ccitrasthānavalokya ‘sacivairnādyacāpi ki bhujyate’ iti, ‘śūnyūbalabhāvaikaikamābhāvate’ iti ca kāvyaprakāśe 'prastutapraśaṃsāyāmudāhṛte 'sminneva śloke pāṭhabhedaḥveśmavalabhīṣvekaikamābhāṣate || 215 ||’

div.p: atrānayoktibhaṅgyā śūnyīkṛtārinagarasya narapateḥ kaścit pratāpaṃ varṇayati | tatra vākyasya paripūrṇatvena nirākāṅkṣatvānnirākāṅkṣeyamuktibhaṅgiḥ ||

rājannityādi | he nātha he prabho, tabāribhavane śatrugṛhe itthamanenākāreṇa veśmavalabhīṣu gṛhoparikuṭīṣu citralikhitānetānvilokya pratyekaṃ śuka ābhāṣate vadati | kīdṛśaḥ | adhvagaiḥ pathikaiḥ pañjarānmuktastyaktaḥ | ābhāṣaṇasvarūpamāha—he rājan, rājasutā kumārikā māṃ na pāṭhayati | devyo mahādevyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kṛtamaunāḥ | he kubje, māṃ bhojya | he kumāra rājabālaka, tava kuśalam | he ajjuke gaṇike, adya mayā na bhujyate | ‘devī kṛtābhiṣekāyām’ ityamaraḥ | bāhulyena kubjāyāḥ śukabhojanaṃ nṛpagṛhe karma | ‘yuvarājastu kumāraḥ’ ityamaraḥ | ‘nāṭyoktau gaṇikājjukā’ iti ca | atra pratāpavarṇane pūrṇavākyatayā nirākāṅkṣatvam | uktau tu bhaṅgarvvaktaiva ||

l.seg: kvāpi kvāpi gaṇāḥ paṭhanti ṣadaśo nātiprasiddhākṣarām |

div.p: atrānayoktibhaṅgyā brahmādyastamaye 'pyanastamitasya bhagavato maheśvarasya prabhāvo varṇyate, tatra ca ‘yadīyāṃ lipiṃ kvāpi kvāpi gaṇmāḥ paṭhanti padaśo nātiprasiddhākṣarām’ ityanenaiva vākye 'sminnākāṅkṣotthāpyate | sā ca ‘viśvaṃ srakṣyati’ ityasminnīdṛśī—brahmāṇāṃ‘brahmāṇaśca’ iti yuktaṃ pratibhāti | ‘caturyugasahasrānte brahmāṇo dinamucyate’ ityatra pramāṇam caturyugasahasrānte dinamekamiti mānenaiṣa varṣaśatajīvī viśvaṃ srakṣyati brahmeti jñāpyate, kapālaṃ cāsya bhagavato bhūṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati‘bhaviṣyatīti’ ka kha | ‘vakṣyati kṣitim’ ityasminnīdṛśī—brahmāṇāmayaṃ‘brahmāṇāmevaṃ varṣaśatena’ iti bhavet | yatra brāhme varṣe mānuṣacaturyugasahasrātmakamekaṃ dinamityarthaḥ (?) varṣaśatenaikaṃ dinamiti mānenaiṣa puruṣāyuṣajīvī kṣitiṃ vakṣyati viṣṇuriti jñāpyate, kapālaṃ cāsya bhagavato bhūṣā bhaviṣyatīti | evam ‘apāmīśiṣyate—’ ityādiṣu varuṇakāmayamendraviṣayatvena yojanīyam | seyamanekaprakāreṇa brahmādīnāṃ sākṣādanabhidhānena sākāṅkṣoktibhaṅgi ||

śāntyā ityādi | jagatāṃ patyurharasya kapāladāma lalāṭamālā vo yuṣmākaṃ śāntyai śamāyāstu | pañcavakratayā kapālānāṃ mālā | yadīyāṃ lipiṃ yatsaṃbandhinīmakṣarālīṃ gaṇā nandyādayaḥ kvāpi padaśaḥ padakrameṇa paṭhanti vācayanti | kīdṛśīm | nātiprasiddhavarṇām | ata eva kvācitkaḥ pāṭhaḥ | pāṭhaviṣayamāha—ayaṃ śivo viśvaṃ jagat srakṣyati nirmāsyati | kṣitiṃ bhūmiṃ kkṣyati dhārayiṣyati | apāmīśiṣyate jaleṣvaiśvaryaṃ lapsyate | nāgaiḥ sarpairaśiṣyate bhokṣyate | ayaṃ rāgiṣu viṣayāsakteṣu raṃsyate krīḍiṣyati | jagadayamatsyasi bhakṣiṣyati | dyāṃ svargaṃ nirvekṣyatyupabhokṣyati | iti | srakṣyatīti ‘sṛja visarge’ lṛṭū | ‘sṛjidṛśorjhalyamakiti’
6|1| 58’ ityam | vakṣyatīti ‘vaha prāpaṇe’ lṛṭ | ‘ṣạdhoḥ kaḥ si 8|2|41’ iti katvam | īśiṣyata iti ‘īśa aiśvarye’ lṛṭ | aśiṣyata iti ‘aśa bhojane’ lṛṭi karmaṇi | raṃsyata iti ‘ramu krīḍāyām’ lṛṭ | atsyatīti ‘ada bhakṣaṇe’ lṛṭ | nirvekṣyatīti nipūrvāt viśerlṛṭ | astasamaye vināśe | brahmaṇā karaṇenedṛśī ākāṅkṣa | caturṇāṃ yugānāmekasahasreṇa brahmaṇa ekaṃ dinam | anenaiva krameṇāhorātrādikam | īdṛśyākāṅkṣā | śatasaṃkhyabrahmāpavargāntaramekaṃ dinaṃ vaiṣṇavam | anenaiva krameṇāhorātrādikam | puruṣāyuṣeti acaturādau nipātitam | apāmīśiṣyata iti varuṇādayo jñeyāḥ | atra brahmādīnāṃ sākṣādabhidhānābhāvāt sākāṅkṣatā ||

lg.l: ‘atha taiḥ paridevitākṣarairhṛdaye digdhaśarairivārditaḥ‘ādita’ iti kumārasaṃbhavaṭīkāyāṃ mallināthavṛtaḥ pāṭhaḥ |

div.p: athetyādi | anantaraṃ madhurvasanto 'gre ātmānamadarśayat darśitavān | kiṃ kartum | āturāṃ vihvalāṃ ratiṃ kāmavadhūmabhyupapattuṃ bodhayitum | kīdṛśaḥ | taiḥ paridevitākṣarairvilāpākṣarairdigdharviṣāktaśarairivārditaḥ pīḍitaḥ | ‘vilāpaḥ paridevanam’ ityamaraḥ | ‘digdho viṣāktabāṇe syātpuṃsi lipte 'nyaliṅgakaḥ’ iti medinīkāraḥ | nānārthatvādeva, niyamārthaṃ śarapadamiha | atra vasantavirbhāvaprastāvo nirapekṣa eveti nirākāṅkṣatvam ||

lg.l: ‘kva nu te hṛdayaṃgamaḥ sakhā kusumāyojitakārmuko madhuḥ |
na khalūgraruṣā pinākinā gamitaḥ so 'pisuhṛdgatāṃ gatim || 218 ||’

div.p: iti yāni rateḥ paridevitākṣarāṇi tairākṛṣṭahṛdayasya madhoryo 'yamātmadarśanāya prastāvaḥ so 'yaṃ na kiṃcanākāṅkṣatīti nirākāṅkṣo 'yamavasaraḥ paryāyasya bhedaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘ajjavi bālo dāmoaro tti ia jampie jasoāe |
kahṇamuhapesiacchaṃ ṇihuaṃ hasiaṃ vaavahūegāthāsaptaśatyāṃ tu ‘vaavahūhiṃ’ ithi pāṭhaḥ, ‘vrajavadhūbhiḥ’ iti chāyā ca || 219 ||’
kṛṣṇamukhapreṣitākṣaṃ nibhṛtaṃ hasitaṃ vrajavadhvāgāthāsaptaśatyāṃ tu ‘vaavahūhiṃ’ ithi pāṭhaḥ, ‘vrajavadhūbhiḥ’ iti chāyā ca ||]

div.p: atra ‘adyāpi bālo dāmodaraḥ’ iti yaśodayā kṛtaprastāvanasya kṛṣṇasya vakre vinyastalocanayā tadrahasyavedinyā vrajavadhūmatallikayā yadetannibhṛtaṃ hasitaṃ tat tavāmbā ‘bālatvam’ gabālaṃ tvāṃ brūte, tvaṃ tu mādṛśībhirnidhuvanavidagdhābhirdivāniśaṃ yamunānikuñjodareṣu viharasītyādinārthajātena sākāṅkṣamiti sākāṅkṣo 'yamavasaraḥ paryāyasya bhedaḥ ||

ajjavi ityādi | “adyāpi bālo dāmodaka itīti jalpite yaśodayā | kṛṣṇamukhapreṣitākṣaṃ nibhṛtaṃ hasitaṃ vrajavadhvā ||” yaśodayā kṛṣṇabālya udbhāvite vrajavadhūḥ smeraṃ dṛṣṭvā kācit kasyaicit kathayati—adyāpīti | yaśodayādyāpi dāmodaro bāla evetyukte kayācidnopavadhvā kṛṣṇamukhe preṣitaṃ nyastamakṣi yatra hasite evaṃ nibhṛtamekānte hasitam | raho rahasyamekāntaceṣṭā | matallikā praśastā | ‘matallikā macarcikā prakāṇḍamuddhatallajau | praśastavācakānyamūni’ ityamaraḥ | nidhuvanaṃ suratam | ‘nidhuvanamāyojanamāhuḥ’ iti hārāvalī | atrānekenārthajāteva sākāṅkṣatā vyaktaiva || iti paryāyālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: sā ca prāyo guṇānāṃ ca kriyāṇāṃ copakalpate‘copakalpate’ ka kha |

div.p: vivakṣeti | viśeṣasya prakarṣasya lokasīmātivartinī lokamaryādātiśayitā yā vivakṣā vaktumicchā sātiśayoktiḥ | kevalasya, akhaṇḍāyā jāteścātiśayābhāvādguṇakriyayorevātiśaya ityāha—sā ceti | upakalpyate samarthyate || alamiti | na kevalaṃ prabhāvādīnāmevātiśayoktirapi tvalaṃkārāṇāmapīmāmatiśayāmidhānāmuktimekaṃ parāyaṇamāśraye vadanti | kīdṛśīm | vāgīśena vākpatinā mahitāṃ pūjitām | ‘parāyaṇamāśraye’ iti viśvaḥ ||
atraivaṃ yaśorāśoraśakyamānasyāpyatiśayoktya viśeṣavivakṣā | yena tribhuvanodaramapi saṃkīrṇamāśaṅkyate; so 'yaṃ mahattvātiśayo nāmātiśayabhedaḥ ||

aho ityādi | he bhūpāla, yasmādatra bhuvanatritayodare mātuṃ paricchettumaśakyo 'pi tava yaśorāśirmāti saṃmāti | tasmādbhuvanatritayodaraṃ viśālamatrāho āścaryam | atra yaśorāśirūpasya guṇasyātiśayena mahattvātiśayaḥ sphuṭa eva ||

lg.l: asti nāstīti saṃdeho na me 'dyāpi nivartate || 221 ||’

div.p: atraivaṃ madhyasya lokasīmatikrameṇa tānavātiśayavivakṣā yena tadasti nāstīti vā saṃdihyate; so 'yaṃ tanutvātiśayo nāmātiśayabhedaḥ ||

stanayorityādi | he priye, tava stanayorjaghanasyāpi madhye 'ntarāle madhyamavalagnamatikṛśatvādasti nāstīti saṃdeho mamādyāpi na nivartate | atra tānavasya tanutvasyātiśayaḥ | loketi | nahi lokaḥ payodharabharasthityanyathānupapattyāpi madhyaṃ niścinotītyarthaḥ ||

atraivaṃ candrālokasya lokasīmātikrameṇa bāhulyotkarṣavivakṣā | yena tasmin samānābhihāreṇābhisārikā api na lakṣyante so 'yaṃ kāntyatiśayo nāmātiśayabhedaḥ || athāsya pihitātko viśeṣaḥ | ucyate | pihite candrātapasyotkarṣeṇābhisārikātiraskāro vivakṣyate, iha tvabhisārikātiraskāreṇa candrātapotkarṣa iti ||

malliketyādi | īdṛśyo 'bhisārikā jyotsnāyāṃ candrakiraṇe 'pi na lakṣyante na jñāyante kenāpi | kīdṛśyaḥ | mallikā mālatī tasyā mālāṃ bibhrati | ‘iṣṭakeṣīkāmālānāṃ citatūlabhāriṣu 6|3|65’ iti bhāvyam‘māleṣīkāṣṭakānāṃ bhāratūlahi(ci)teṣu’ iti hrasvaḥ | sarvāṅgīṇaṃ sarvāṅgavyāpakamārdraṃ candanaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ | kṣaumavatyo dukūlayuktāśca | kṣauma iti ‘ṭukṣu śabde’ iti manin | kṣumā prajñāditvāt svārthe 'ṇ vṛddhiśca | ata eva ‘kṣumavat’ ityapi pāṭhaḥ | atra candrakānteratiśayaḥ sphuṭa eva | ‘abhihāro 'bhiyogaḥ syāt’ iti medinīkāraḥ | lokasīmātikramaśca nahi śuklāmbaratayā jyotsnāyāmabhisārikā na lakṣyanta iti lokasīmetyarthaḥ | utkarṣarūpasyārthasyobhayatra vivakṣaṇāt pihitakāntyatiśayayorabhedaḥ | kimiti pṛcchati—atheti | uttaram | pihita iti | candrātapotkarṣatayā taulye 'pi pihite tenābhisārikātiraskāra iha tu tasyāstiraskāreṇa candrātapotkarṣa iti prakārābhyāṃ tayorbheda ityāśayaḥ ||

lg.l: ‘taṃ daïāhiṇṇāṇaṃ‘bhiṇṇāṇaṃ’ ga jammi vi aṅgammi rāhaveṇa ṇa ṇimiam |
sīāparimaṭṭeṇa va ụ̄dho teṇa vi ṇirantaraṃ romañco || 223 ||’
sītāparimṛṣṭenevoḍhastenāpi‘setubandhe’ tu ‘vụ̄dho’ iti pāṭhaḥ, ‘vyūḍhaḥ’ (viśeṣeṇoḍhaḥ) iti chāyā ca nirantaraṃ romāñcaḥ ||]

div.p: atra dayitābhijñānasya yo 'yaṃ romāñcakriyāviśeṣaḥ sa kriyātiśayasyaiva bhedaḥ prabhāvātiśaya ucyate ||

tamityādi | ‘taddayitābhijñānaṃ yasminnapyaṅge rāghaveṇa na nirbhitam | sītā parispṛṣṭeneva vyūḍhastenāpi nirantaraṃ romāñcaḥ ||” iha taddayitāyā vallabhāyāḥ sītāyā abhijñānaṃ cihnaṃ maṇirūpaṃ yasminnapyaṅge rāmeṇa na nirmitaṃ na nihitaṃ tenāpyaṅgena sītayā pari sarvatobhāvena spṛṣṭeneva nirantaraṃ yathā bhavatyevaṃ romāñco vyụ̄dho dhṛtaḥ | ‘abhijñānaṃ bhaveccihne’ iti śāśvataḥ | atra romāñcahetukriyātiśayena prabhāvātiśaya eva vivakṣitaḥ ||

lg.l: appattatuṅgasiharaṃ tihuaṇaharaṇe pavạdḥdhieṇasetubandhe ‘tihuaṇaharaṇaparivạdḥdhieṇa’ iti pāṭhabhedaḥ ‘tribhuvanaharaṇaparivardhitena’ iti chāyābhedaśca vi hariṇā || 224 ||’
aprāptatuṅgaśikharaṃ tribhuvanaharaṇe setubandhe ‘tihuaṇaharaṇaparivạdḥdhieṇa’ iti pāṭhabhedaḥ ‘tribhuvanaharaṇaparivardhitena’ iti chāyābhedaścapravardhitenāpi hariṇā ||]

div.p: atra rasātalamapi mṛdnatā śeṣeṇāpi ca tasya mūlaṃ na dṛṣṭam, tribhuvanamapyullaṅghayatā hariṇāpi na tuṅgaśikharāṇi prāptānīti yadetallokasīmātikrameṇa viśeṣavyavasthayā parvatānubhāvabhaṇanaṃ so 'yamanubhūyamānamāhātmyātiśayasyaiva bhedo 'nubhāvātiśaya ucyate ||

vimalia ityādi | ‘'vimarditarasātalenāpi viṣadharapatinādṛṣṭamūlacchedam | aprāptatuṅgaśikharaṃ tribhuvanaharaṇapravardhitenāpi hariṇā ||” iha suvelaṃ kīdṛśam | viṣaparapatinā śeṣeṇādṛṣṭo mūlasya chedaḥ śeṣo yasya tam | kīdṛśena | vimarditaṃ
vimalitaṃ nirmalīkṛtaṃ vā rasātalaṃ yena tena | punaḥ kīdṛśam | hariṇā trivikrameṇāpyaprāptatuṅgaśikharam | kīdṛśena | tribhuvanaharaṇāya sarvato bhāvādvardhitena vṛddhiṃ gatena | mṛdnatā mardayatā | atra parvatānubhāvātiśayavivakṣayātiśayaḥ sa ca tairanubhūyamāna eva ||

lg.l: ‘raṇadujjao dahamuho surā avajjhā a tihuaṇassa ime |
paḍaï aṇatthotti phuḍaṃ vihīsaṇena phuḍiāharaṃ ṇīsasiam 225’
patatyanartha iti sphuṭaṃ vibhīṣaṇena sphuṭitādharaṃ niśvasitam ||

div.p: atra daśāsyaḥ samare na jīyate, surāścāmaratvānna vadhyante, tayośca parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭakriyātiśayāttribhuvanamapi kṣayaṃ yāsyatīti yeyamanyonyakriyātiśayabhaṇanāllokasīmātikrameṇa viśeṣavivakṣā so 'yaṃ kriyātiśayo nāmātiśaya evānyonyātiśaya ucyate ||

raṇetyādi | “raṇadurjayo daśamukhaḥ surā avadhyā aho tribhuvanasyāsau | patatyanartha iti sphuṭaṃ vibhīṣaṇena sphuṭitādharaṃ niśvasitam ||” iha sphuṭitādharaṃ vyaktīkṛtādharaṃ yathā syādevaṃ vibhīṣaṇena rāvaṇabhrātrā niśvasitaṃ niśvāsastyaktaḥ sphuṭaṃ vyaktameva | kutaḥ | daśāsyo raṇe durjayaḥ, surā devā amaratvādavadhyāḥ | aho āścaryamasau tribhuvanasyānarthaḥ patatīti | itirhetau | atra daśāsyasurayoranyonyakriyātiśayokteranyonyātiśayaḥ | sakalabhuvanakṣayakāritayā lokasīmātipātaḥ || ityatiśayoktyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
śleṣa iti | ekena padena vibhaktyantenānekeṣāmarthānāṃ kathanaṃ yatra sa śleṣaḥ kathyate | ekarūpānvitamanekārthaṃ vacaḥ śleṣa iti lakṣaṇam | sa ca ṣaḍvidhaḥ padādibhiḥ syāt ||

lg.l: rājñā pradoṣo māmitthamapriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate || 226 ||’

div.p: atra ‘pradoṣo rātreḥ prathamayāmaḥ kimiti priyārahitaṃ māṃ na bādhate’ ityukteryuktimāha—itthamanubhūyamānena prakāreṇa | rājñā saṃbadhnan | kīdṛśena | doṣākareṇa nakṣatrapathavartineti | yo hi doṣāṇāmākareṇa rājamārgātigāminā ca rājñā prakṛṣṭadoṣaḥ saṃbadhyate so 'priyamavaśyaṃ‘so 'pi priyam’ ga bādhata eva; tadatra pūrvasminprākaraṇike 'rthe dvitīyo 'rtho 'prākaraṇikaḥ padabhedenopaśliṣyamāṇo bhinnapadaśleṣāpadeśamāsādayati ||

doṣetyādi | prakṛṣṭo doṣo dūṣaṇaṃ yasya sa durjano māṃ kiṃ na bādhate, kiṃtu bādhata eva | māṃ kīdṛśam | apriyaṃ tasya dveṣyam | kīdṛśaḥ | itthamanubhūyamānena prakāreṇa rājñā bhūpena saha saṃbadhnan yuñjan | ātmānamityadhyāhāryam | atra karmavadbhāvo na kṛtaḥ saṃbadhyamāna ityarthatvāt | rājñā kīdṛśena | doṣāṇāṃ dūṣaṇānāmākareṇa sthānena | kṣatrapathaḥ kṣatriyamārgastatra vartituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena | paścānnakārasaṃbandhaḥ | kṣatriyadharmaśūnyenetyarthaḥ | pakṣe pradoṣo rajanīmukhaṃ māmapriyaṃ priyārahitaṃ kiṃ na bādhate kiṃtu bādhata eva | kīdṛśaḥ | rājñā candreṇetthaṃ saṃbadhyamānaḥ | kīdṛśena | doṣākareṇa rātrikareṇa | nakṣatrapathaṃ vyoma tadavasthitiśīlena ca | atra rājapadamabhinnam | śeṣapadānāṃ bhedādbhinnapadaśleṣaḥ ||

lg.l: rājā harati lokasya‘sarvasya’ ga hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ || 227 ||’

div.p:
atrāyamudīyamānaścandramā lokasya hṛdayaṃ haratītyukteryuktimāha—rājānuraktamaṇḍala udayī mṛdukaraḥ kāntimāniti | yo hyevaṃbhūto rājā
so 'vaśyaṃ lokasya hṛdayahārī bhavati | atrāpi ca prākaraṇike 'rthe 'prākaraṇika upaśliṣyamāṇaḥ padānāmabhedenābhinnapadaśleṣo bhavati ||

asāvityādi | asau rājā nṛpo mṛdubhirapīḍākaraiḥ karai rājagrāhyairlokasya hṛdayaṃ harati | kīdṛśaḥ | udayaṃ vṛddhimārūḍhaḥ prāptaḥ | kāntimān śobhāyuktaḥ | raktamanuraktaṃ maṇḍalaṃ deśo yasya saḥ | pakṣe asau rājā candraḥ karaiḥ kiraṇairmṛdubhiḥ śītalairjanasya hṛdayaṃ harati gṛhṇāti | kīdṛśaḥ | udayamudayādrimupagataḥ | kāntimān dīptiyukto raktamaṇḍalo lohitabimbaśca | ‘udayo vṛddhāvudayaparvate’ iti viśvaḥ | 'maṇḍalaṃ bimbadeśayoḥ’ iti ca | atra rājādipadānāmabhedenābhinnapadaśleṣatvam ||

atra ‘ākarṇyante, śliṣyante ca’ iti kriyāpadadvitayasya prādhānyataḥ samuccayenopāttasya ‘madhurā—’ ityādibhiḥ śliṣṭapadaiḥ ‘kokilāgiraḥ', ‘asitekṣaṇāḥ’ iti vā viśeṣyaikapadavarjaṃ paryāyataḥ saṃbandho bhavati | tadyathā—ākarṇyante | kāḥ | kokilāgiraḥ | kīdṛśyaḥ | madhurāḥ, rāgavardhinyaḥ, komalāḥ | punarapi kiṃbhūtāḥ | āsite upaveśite niścalīkṛte antaḥpramodānubhāvādīkṣaṇe yābhistāstathā | sarvo 'pi hi madhuraṃ śabdamākarṇayan niścalākṣo bhavati | śliṣyante ca | kāḥ | asitekṣaṇāḥ hariṇacakṣuṣaḥ | kiṃbhūtāḥ | madakalāḥ, kokilāgiraḥ, komalāḥ, rāgavardhinyaḥ, madhurā iti | so 'yaṃ dvayorvibhinnakriyayorbhinnārthe‘bhinnārthaikarūpāṇām’ kha ca rūpiṇāṃ padārthānāmupaśleṣo bhinnakriyaḥ śleṣa ucyate ||

madhurā ityādi | kokilāgira ākarṇyante, asitekṣaṇāḥ śyāmanetrāḥ priyānāśliṣyante ca | kīdṛśyaḥ | madhurāḥ śrutisukhā ramyāśca | rāgavardhinyo 'nurāgajanikā ratijanikāśca | komalā manojñā mṛdvaṅgyaśca | madakalā yauvanavasantādikṛta-
madamadhurāḥ | madena madyavikāreṇa kaladhvaniyuktāśca | āsite upaveśite niścalīkṛte 'ntaḥpramodānubhavādīkṣaṇe yābhistāsāṃ madhuraṃ ravamākarṇayanniścalākṣo bhavati | pakṣe 'sitekṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśyaḥ | kokilānāmiva giro yāsāṃ tāḥ | atra kriyābhedādbhinnakriyatvamitarapadānāmabhinnānāmevārthadvayabodhakatā ||

lg.l: dṛśo dūtyaśca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyān || 229 ||’

div.p: atra ‘karṣanti’ ityetasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ dṛśāṃ dūtīnāṃ ca śliṣṭapadatvenāveśādayamabhinnakriyo nāma śleṣaviśeṣaḥ | prathamayorasya vā ko viśeṣa iti cet | tatraikasyaiva prākaraṇikatvam atra tu dvayorapīti | ayaṃ ca bhinnakārako 'pi bhavati ||

svabhāvetyādi | kāntābhiḥ preṣitā dṛśo dūtyaśca priyān vallabhān karṣanti | kīdṛśyaḥ | svabhāvena sahajena madhurā lalitāḥ | taduktaṃ matsaṃgītasarvasve—'madhurā kuñcitāntā ca sabhrūkṣepā ca sasmitā | samanmathavikārā ca dṛṣṭiḥ sā lalitā matā ||’ iti | snigdhāḥ snehavatyaḥ | ulbaṇamadhikaṃ rāgaṃ lauhityaṃ śaṃsantyaḥ | pakṣe sahajamadhurāḥ | yadvā svabhāvātpriyavādinyaḥ snigdhā ātmīyāḥ | adhikaṃ rāgaṃ madyavikārakṛtaṃ śaṃsantyaḥ | yadvā rāgamanurāgaṃ kathayantyaḥ | atra priyākarṣaṇarūpaikaiva kriyā sādhāraṇītyekakriyātvam | bhinnapadābhinnapadābhyāmasya ca ko bheda iti pṛcchati—prathamayoriti | vāśabdaścārthe | uttaram—tatreti | tayorekaikasyaiva prakaraṇāpannatvamatra tu dṛṣṭaṃ dvyorapi prākaraṇikatvamiti bheda ityarthaḥ | anekakartṛkatvenāyaṃ bhinnakārakodāharaṇamapītyāha—ayamiti ||

atraikasmin pakṣe dharmadharmiṇorabhedopacārānnāgagatirgṛhyate | tatra gate-
rveṇyāśca nāgena hastinā ahinā ca tulyatvam, vapuṣa ūrvośca rambhayā kadalyā apsarobhiśca tulyatvam, oṣṭhayoḥ pāṇyośca pravālairvidrumairnavapallavaiśca ‘tulyatvam’ ka kha gatulyatvaṃ varṇanīyayoḥ śleṣaprabhāvāllabhyate; so 'yamanekakartṛkatvādbhinnakāraka iti śleṣo bhavati ||

gatirityādi | tasyā nāyikāyā gatirgamanaṃ veṇī keśaracanā ca nāgena hastinā sarpeṇa ca, tasyā vapurūrudvayaṃ ca rambhayā 'psarobhedena kadalyā ca, tasyāḥ pāṇī hastāvoṣṭhau ca pravālairvidrumaiḥ pallavaiśca sarvāṇi tulyatvamāyayuḥ | ‘nāgo hastibhujaṅgayoḥ’ iti śāśvataḥ | ‘kadalyapsaraso rambhā’ iti ca | ‘pallave vidrume cāpi pravālaḥ’ iti dharaṇiḥ | gatinānātvādāha—dharmeti | atra nānākartṛkatvādeva bhinnakārakatā ||

atra ‘he kalabhāṣiṇi, kasya te dṛṣṭirviśvāsyā bhavati’ ityukteryuktimāha—‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi karṇāvalambinī’ iti ca | yā hi kṛṣṇārjunenānurajyate kathaṃ sā karṇapakṣapātinī bhavati, yā caivamubhayagatā tasyāṃ ko viśvasiti; sa cāyamekakartṛkatvādabhinnakāraka iti śleṣo bhavati ||

kṛṣṇetyādi | he kalabhāṣiṇi madhuravacane, tava dṛṣṭiḥ kasya viśvasanīyatvaṃ viśvāsaviṣayatāṃ yāti kiṃtu na kasyāpi | atra hetuḥ kṛṣṇā śyāmā, arjunā dhavalā, anuraktā prāntalohitā ca | prādeśiko 'yaṃ kramaḥ | karṇaparyantagāminī ca | pakṣe kṛṣṇe harau, arjune pārthe cānuraktānurāgavatī karṇapakṣapātinī ca yā sā viruddhobhayagatā kathaṃ viśvasanīyā bhavati | ‘valakṣo dhavalo 'rjunaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra karturekatayābhinnakārakatā || iti śleṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: anyāpadeśo vā yastu trividhaṃ bhāvikaṃ viduḥ || 86 ||

div.p: svetyādi | nijāśayakathanamanyakathanamanyāpadeśaśca bhāvikam | bhāve kaverabhiprāye bhavaṃ bhāvikamityanvarthanāmatāpi | udbhedabhāvikayorabhedamāha—mata iti | so 'pi udbhedo 'pi ||

l.seg: vicchuhaï ahiṇiṃdae jattha ṇa so vaaṃsiā
taṃ me ‘kahahu’ ka kha gakahaü māṇaaṃ jaï me icchahi ‘jīiam’ iti ghajīaam || 232 ||
taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvanam ||]

div.p: atra ‘bhrūdbhedā’ khabhrūbhedāsaṃbhāṣaṇapriyatamāvakṣepān pratyanabhimatapratipādanarūpasyābhiprāyasya kathitatvādidaṃ svābhiprāyakathanaṃ nāma bhāvikam ||

ṇāvajjaï ityādi | “nābadhyate durgrāhyā dṛṣṭe yasmin bhrukuṭikā yatra na ca (cā) vyāhāro gṛhyate ābhāṣamāṇe | vikṣubhyate 'bhinīyamāne yatra na sa vayasyayā taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvitam ||” iha yasmin dṛṣṭe durgrahā bhrukuṭirnābadhyate samantānna badhyate yatrābhāṣamāṇe 'vyāhāro na ca gṛhyate | yatrābhinīyamāne vayasyayā sa na kṣubhyate taṃ mānaṃ mama kathaya yadi mama jīvanamicchasi | atrānākāṅkṣitarūpasyābhiprāyasya kathanam ||

lg.l: hoi ghare sāhīṇaṃ musalaṃ dhaṇṇāṇaṃ mahilāṇam || 233 ||’
bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||]

div.p: daṃsaṇetyādi | “daṃśanena valitaṃ dṛḍhakaṃ vibandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāham | bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||” ihottamastrīṇāṃ gṛhe īdṛśaṃ musalaṃ svāyattaṃ bhavati | kīdṛśam | daṃśane dhānyādimardane valitaṃ lagnam | dṛḍhakaṃ dṛḍham | svārthe kan | vigatabandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāhamatisthūlaṃ ca | mẹdhrapakṣe daṃśane bhagamardane valitaṃ saṃnaddhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ vigatabandhanaṃ dīrghamatisthūlaṃ ca | atra mẹdhrābhiprāyeṇa musalokteranyabhāvanā ||

lg.l: ‘āsāiamaṇṇāeṇa jettiaṃ‘jittiam’ ga gha tettiaṃ cia vihiṇam |

div.p: atra parakṣetrasya ghasmaravṛṣanivāraṇāpadeśena cirātparijñāta ‘vāryate’ ka khaupapatirnivāryate, tadidamanyāpadeśākhyaṃ bhāvikam ||

āsāia ityādi | “āsvāditamajñātena yāvattāvataiva bandhaya dhṛtim | uparamasva vṛṣabhātra rakṣayitvā gṛhapatikṣetram ||” iha he vṛṣabha, gṛhapatikṣetraṃ rakṣayitvā tvamuparamasva krīḍaya | ajñātena tvayā yāvadevāsvāditaṃ tāvataiva dhṛtiṃ bandhaya | atra vṛṣabhanivāraṇavyājenopapatinivāraṇamanyāpadeśaḥ ||

lg.l: ojasu ‘suddha’ iti pāṭhaḥ.muddhasuhāvaṃ saṃbhāvesu suraṇāha jāavaloam‘jā ava’ kha ga || 235 ||’

div.p: atra māyāvino mahendrasyābhiprāyaḥ satyakena vyaktamevodbhinna iti vyakto 'yamudbhedaḥ ||

mantesītyādi | “manuṣe madhumathapraṇayaṃ saṃdānayasi tridaśeśa pādaparatnam | apajahi mugdhasvabhāvaṃ saṃbhāvaya suranātha yādavalokam ||” iha he suranātha indra, yadi madhumathasya kṛṣṇasya praṇayaṃ prītiṃ manuṣe svīkaroṣi | deve pādaparatnaṃ pārijātavṛkṣaṃ saṃdadāne sati mugdhaṃ svabhāvaṃ maugdhyamapajahi tyaja | yādavalokaṃ saṃbhāvaya prīṇaya | atrendrābhiprāyaḥ satyakena tatsārathinā vyaktaḥ prakāśitaḥ ||

l.seg: netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ |

div.p: atra ‘vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam’ ityākṣepavatā ‘prakṛtodāharaṇena’ ka khaprākaraṇikodāharaṇena yadyapi dūtyā duśceṣṭitaṃ nirbhinnaṃ tathāpi na pūrvavavdyaktamityavyakto 'yamudbhedaḥ ||

niḥśeṣetyādi | he dūti, itaḥ sthānāttvaṃ vāpīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ snātuṃ gatāsi | tasyādhamasyāntikaṃ na gatāsi | he mithyāvādini, he suhṛjjanasyājñātaduḥkhāgame | snānacihnānyāha—stanataṭaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamaśeṣakṣaritacandanamasti | tavādharo 'pi tyaktalauhityaḥ | tava netre 'tyarthamañjanaśūnye | tathā taveyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tanuḥ
śarīraṃ pulakitā romāñcavatī ca | atra snānasaṃbhogayostulyacihnasyopadarśanena prakaraṇapariprāptaṃ dūtīduśceṣṭitamudbhinnam, na ca prāgvavdyaktatā ||

l.seg: karpūracchuraṇācca gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ‘na punastasyādhamasyāntikam’ ka kha pāṇḍimā |
śvāsāḥ santu ca kandukabhramibhuvaḥ kiṃtu prabhāvāhinā-

div.p: atra ‘dṛśormlānatā, gaṇḍayoḥ pāṇḍuratvam, śvāsānāṃ dairdhyam’ ityutkaṇṭhācihnanihnavāya yo 'yamavinayavatyā nīlāñjanādiprayogastasya ‘tattvābhyupagame 'pi’ ka khatathābhyupagame 'pi ‘aṅgānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate’ iti yo 'yaṃ sakhīvyāhārastena tadabhiprāya udbhinno 'nudbhinnaśca bhavatītyubhayarūpo 'yamudbhedaḥ | te 'mī trayo 'pyudbhedā bhāvikānna bhidyante ||

amlānetyādi | kiṃtu he sakhi, tavāṅgānāmamumudbhaṭaṃ kraśimānaṃ kṛśatvaṃ ko na nāmotprekṣate kiṃtūnnayata eva | yadyapi tava dṛśāvamlāne mlānihīne utpanne iva komale manojñe staḥ | kīdṛśe | nīlakajjalenāñcite | yataḥ karpūrasya churaṇāt saṃbandhāt pāṇḍimā pāṇḍuratvaṃ gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ | śvāsāśca kandukakrīḍanārthaṃ yā bhramirbhramaṇaṃ tatprabhavāḥ santu | aṅgānāṃ kīdṛśānām | prabhāvāhināṃ prabhāṃ dīptiṃ vọdhuṃ dhartuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣām | sahajaramyāṇāmityarthaḥ | avinayavatyā asatyāḥ | atrāvinayavatyā āśayaḥ kiṃcivdyaktīkṛtaḥ | kiṃciccāvyaktīkṛta ityubhayarūpatā || iti bhāvikālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||

lg.l: sā tu vyaktā tathāvyaktā vyaktāvyakteti ca tridhā || 88 ||

div.p: saṃsṛṣṭiriti | nānālaṃkārāṇāṃ saṃkaro 'pi......saṃsṛṣṭiḥ | chāyeti | pratibimbadarpaṇavadityarthaḥ | kṣīraṃ dugdham | pāṃsurdhūliḥ | citreti | citralikhitavarṇikāvadityarthaḥ ||

pinaṣṭītyādi | samudrastaraṅgāgraiḥ phenacandanaṃ pinaṣṭīva | induḥ karaistadādāya digaṅganā limpatīva | atrevaśabdābhyāmutprekṣādvyam | phena eva candanam, diśa evāṅganā iti rūpakadvyam | tadidaṃ miśritaṃ tilataṇḍulavat | yathā tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ ca mitho nirapekṣāṇāmeva saṃkīrṇatā tathātrāpi ||
atrādarśe‘atrādarśacchāyeva’ kha chāyeva hetvalaṃkāre rāmalakṣmaṇamukhayorindupadmaupamyena sadṛśāsadṛśavyatireko dṛśyate ||
nirmaletyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ vyatirekālaṃkāre | atra pūrvārdhena hetvalaṃkāre darśite tadādhāraka eva sadṛśāsadṛśayorvyatirekaḥ | sa ca darpaṇe pratibimba ivādhārādheyabhāvena vyavasthāpitaḥ ||

kṣīretyādi | vasantaśrīrvasantaśobhā 'dṛśyata janaiḥ | kīdṛśī | kṣīreṇa dugdhena kṣālitaścandro yasyāṃ sā | nīlīdravyena dhautaṃ kṣālitamambaramākāśaṃ yasyāṃ sā | ṭaṅkena pāṣāṇadāraṇenollikhita utkhaṇḍitaḥ sūryo yasyāṃ sā | ‘ṭaṅkaḥ pāṣāṇadāraṇaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atropamotprekṣayormitho milanādavyaktatā | ubhayavyañjakasya tulyakakṣatayā pravṛtteridaṃ boddhavyam ||
atra pāṃsūdakayoriva mṛtpiṇḍe‘mṛtpiṇḍaśleṣavirodhayoḥ’ gha śleṣavirodhayoravyaktayoreva vyājastutāvaṅgabhāvo 'vagamyate ||
kṛṣṇetyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ bhāvikālaṃkāre | atra yathā mṛttikāpiṇḍe dhūlijalayormitho milanādavyaktatā tathā śleṣavirodhayorvyājastutiprasaṅgataḥ saṃkara ||
atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanaraśarīrabhāgayoḥ parivṛttyalaṃkārahetūpamayoraṅgabhāvo vyaktāvyaktarūpaḥ parisphurannupalabhyate ||

rajobhirityādi | sa kīdṛśaḥ | hayakhurakṣuṇṇai rajobhirmeghatulyairhastibhiśca gaganaṃ
bhūtalamiva, bhūtalaṃ gaganatalamiva kurvan | atra yathā narasiṃhajātau siṃhanarāṅgabhāgayorvyaktāvyaktarūpaṃ sphuraṇaṃ tathā parivṛttyalaṃkāre hetūpamayoraṅgabhāvo vyaktāvyaktarūpaḥ ||
atra paṭāvayavasthānāṃ nīlādīnāmiva paṭāvayavyāśrite citravarṇe śleṣarūpakopamārthaśleṣāṇāṃ padapadārthāśrayāṇāṃ śaradvarṇanavākyāśrayiṇi samādhyalaṃkāre vyaktāvyaktarūpo 'ṅgaṅgibhāvaḥ pratīyate ||

mayūretyādi | meghā jalāni tyajanti sma | mahāṭavīṃ mahāraṇyamiva prāvṛṣaṃ varṣā ullaṅghya | kīdṛśīm | mayūraśabdamukharāṃ, saha taḍiteva latayā vartate tām | atrāvayavāśritanīlādīnāmavayavyāśrite citravarṇe yathāṅgaṅgibhāvastathā śleṣādīnāṃ samādhyalaṃkāre vyaktāvyaktarūpo 'ṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ pratīyata iti ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇe ubhayālaṃkāravivecano nāma caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ ||
caturviṃśatiriti | ityanena prakāreṇa caturviṃśatiretā upamādayaḥ kāvyālaṃkṛtaya uktā ityanvayaḥ | ajahalliṅgatātra || ubhayeti | śabdārthāśritā ityarthaḥ ||

l.seg: sā śuddhā damayantikāpi suṣuve naiyāyikaṃ yaṃ sutam |

div.head: pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ |

lg.l: śṛṅgārī cetkaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat |
sa eva cedaśṛṅgārī nīrasaṃ sarvameva tat || 3 ||
paśyati strīti vākye hi na rasaḥ pratibhāsate |
kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ tvaṃ na kāmayase katham |
navo 'rthaḥ sūktiragrāmyā śravyo bandhaḥ sphuṭā śrṛtiḥ |
sarvāsu‘sarvānugrāhiṇīm’ ka grāhiṇīṃ tāsu rasoktiṃ pratijānate || 8 ||
atha caturviśatirasoktīrāhabhāvo janmānubandho 'tha‘arthaniṣpanti’ ka kha niṣpattiḥ puṣṭisaṃkarau |
hrāsābhāsau śamaḥ śeṣo viśeṣaḥ ‘paripoṣavān’ ka khapariśeṣavān || 9 ||
svarūpamāsāṃrasoktīnām yo veda sa kāvyaṃ kartumarhati || 12 ||
vaivarṇyamaśrupralaya‘aśrupralayāvityaṣṭau’ ka kha ityaṣṭau sāttvikāḥ ‘matāḥ’ ka khasmṛtāḥ || 15 ||
smṛtirvitarka ‘vitarkaścotkaṇṭhā’ ka khautkaṇṭhā cintā capalatā matiḥ |
trāsaḥ śaṅkā gado glānirunmādaḥ saṃbhramaḥ śramaḥ || 17 ||
rasatvaṃ pratipadyante ‘pravṛddhā’ ka khaprabuddhāḥ sthāyino 'tra te || 19 ||
janitvā ye na jāyante te 'thavā vyabhicāriṇaḥ |
smṛtyādayo hi premādau bhavanti na bhavanti ca || 22 ||
ratau saṃcāriṇaḥ sarvān garvasnehau ‘garvasnehairdhṛtiṃ’ khadhṛtiṃ matim |
saṃcāriṇaṃ vā janayan sāttvikaṃ vā sa jāyate || 24 ||
yo 'syātyantamanucchedaḥ‘mavicchedaḥ’ ka kha sa śeṣa iti śabdyate || 32 ||
śṛṅgārādyā rasā ye ca ye ca śāntoddhatādayaḥ |
ye ca līlādayo yūnāṃ pariśeṣaḥ‘paripoṣaḥ’ ka kha sa kīrtyate || 34 ||
harṣāmarṣādayo ye ca jñeyāḥ saṃcāriṇo 'tra te || 39 ||
vilāsā ye varastrīṇāṃ jñeyā līlādayastu te || 40 ||
nāṭyeṣu‘nāgreṣu’ (?) ka , ‘nāṭye 'nukrimāṇāḥ’ kha kriyamāṇāste naṭairabhinayāḥ smṛtāḥ || 44 ||
ahetormeti‘ahetorneti metyukte’ ka netyukterhetorvā ‘sa na ucyate’ kamāna ucyate || 48 ||
bhṛśaṃ duḥkhāyate dīnā‘dīnaḥ’ ka karuṇaḥ sa tadocyate || 50 ||
mithaḥparīkṣā yāḥ‘parīkṣā yā premṇo’ gha premṇo nirdiṣṭāstāḥ parīṣṭayaḥ || 54 ||
kālasya haraṇaṃ cāhuḥ pratyādānaṃ ca vañcanam || 57 ||
pratyādānaṃ punasteṣāṃ karuṇe‘kāruṇe’ ga ko na manyate |
viniṣiddhaṃ tu karuṇe‘karuṇaḥ’ kha , ‘kiraṇe’ ga karuṇatvena gīyate || 66 ||
‘ghañāpi karaṇe bhāve’ gha, ‘ghañānyakārake bhāve’ kaghañānyatkārake bhāve nalopena niyamyate || 68 ||
mānyate preyasā yena yaṃ priyatvena manyate |
manute vā mimīte vā premamānaḥ sa kathyate || 69 ||
yatrāṅganā yuvānaśca vasate na vasanti ca |
pravāsayati vā yūnaḥ sa pravāso nirucyate || 72 ||
abhūtotpādanāyāṃ kṛñ dṛṣṭaḥ kuru ghaṭaṃ yathā |
abhyañjane 'pi ca yathā me pādau sarpiṣābhyañjayetyarthaḥpādau me‘pādau me kuru sarpiṣā’ ka kha ‘kurute sāhasaṃ manaḥ’ ka khasarpiṣā kuru || 75 ||
karoti ‘karoti duḥkhaṃ cittena’ ka khacittaṃ duḥkhena yo 'sau karuṇa ucyate || 76 ||
bhāve vā kārake vāpi rūpaṃ saṃbhoga iṣyate || 78 ||
svato 'pi kuṭilaṃ prema kiṃ nu‘kimu mānānvaye sati’ ka mānānvaye sati || 80 ||
karuṇānantaragato 'nubhāvārthaḥ‘ 'nubhāvārthaḥ sa kathyate’ ka kha sa kathyate |
samāsamā samupasargeṇa samāse ‘caturāścaturo 'rthān pracakṣate’ ka khacatvāro viśeṣāstamupāsatetaṃ saṃbhogam || 83 ||
sa saṃkṣipto 'tha‘saṃkṣipto 'rthasaṃkīrṇa’ ka saṃkīrṇaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ samyagṛddhimān |
nave hi saṅgame prāyo yuvānaḥ sādhvasādibhiḥ |
pratyāgate 'pi yatraiṣā ratipuṣṭiḥ priye jane‘prayojane’ ka |

aṣṭamīcandrakaḥprakīrṇakeṣu spṛhayantīvratamaṣṭamīcandrakaḥ. sa hi caitracaturthīto 'ṣṭamacaturthyāmupādīyamānaḥ kāminībhirarcyate yasyāṃ yavastrastareṣvabalā lolanti sā kundacaturthīkundacaturthī vasantāvatāradivasaḥ suvasantakaḥsuvasantakaḥ |

yasyāṃ striyo dolāmārohanti sā āndolanacaturthīāndolanacaturthyekaśālmalīekameva sukusumanirbharaśālmalivṛkṣamāśritya sunimīlitakādibhiḥ khelatāṃ krīḍā ekaśālmalī madanotsavaḥtrayodaśyāṃ kāmadevapūjā madanotsavaḥ || 93 ||

gandhodakapūrṇavaṃśanāḍīśrṛṅgādibhiryūnāṃ priyajanābhiṣekakardamena krīḍā udakakṣveḍikāudakakṣveḍikāśoyatrottamastriyaḥ padābhighātenāśokaṃ vikāśya tatkusumamavataṃsayanti sā aśokottaṃsikākottaṃsikā yatrāṅganābhiścūtamañjaryo 'vacityānaṅgāya bālarāgatvenaiva dāyaṃdāyamavataṃsyante sā cūtabhañjikā, ‘bhūtabhañjikā’ ghacūtabhañjikā |

puṣpāvacāyikāṃyatra yuvatyo madirāgaṇḍūṣadohadena bakulaṃ vikāśya tatpuṣpāṇyavacinvanti sā puṣpāvacāyikā cūtalatikāyatra kaste priyatama iti pṛcchadbhiḥ palāśādinavalatābhiḥ priyo jano hanyate sā cūtalatikā bhūtamātṛkāpañcātmanānunayantī bhūtamātṛkā || 94 ||

kadambayuddhānivarṣāsu kadambanīpahāridrakādikusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtairdvidhā balaṃ vibhajya kāminīnāṃ krīḍā kadambayuddhāni, kādambayuddhānītyapi pāṭhaḥ navapatrikāprathamavarṣaṇaprarūḍhanavatṛṇāṅkurāsu sthalīṣu śādvalamabhyarcya bhuktapītānāṃ kṛtrimavivāhādikrīḍā navapatrikā abhinavabisāṅkurodbhedābhirāmasaraḥ samāśritya kāmimithunānāṃ krīḍā bisakhādikābisakhādikā |

śakrotsavadivasaḥ śakrārcāśakrārcā kaumudīāśvine paurṇamāsī kaumudī dīpotsavo yakṣarātriḥyakṣarātrirabhyūṣakhādikāśamīdhānyānāmārdrāṇāmevāgnipakvānāmabhyavahāro 'bhyūṣakhādikā’ ‘abhyuṣakhādikā’ ityapi pāṭhaḥ || 95 ||
prathamata evekṣubhakṣaṇaṃ navekṣubhakṣikānavekṣubhakṣikā toyakrīḍāgrīṣmādau jalāśayāvagāhanaṃ toyakrīḍā nāthādidarśanaṃ prekṣāprekṣādidarśanam |

āliṅganādiglahā durodarādikrīḍā dyūtānidyūtāni rāgoddīpanāya mādhvīkādisevā madhupānam | vātsyāyanīye kāmaśāstre krīḍādvaividhyaṃ samasyā deśyāśceti medāt | tāsu kāścidvihāya sarvā api naitābhyaḥ pṛthak tatrollikhitāṣṭīkākartrā vyākhyātā ityatrāpi tadvyākhyānaṃ samuddhṛtya vilikhāmaḥ—‘samasyāḥ krīḍā āha—yakṣarātriḥ, kaumudījāgaraḥ, suvasantakaḥ | yakṣarātririti sukharātriḥ | yakṣāṇāṃ tatra saṃnidhānāt | tatra prāyaśo lokasya dyūtakrīḍā | kaumudījāgara iti | āśvayujyāṃ hi paurṇamāsyāṃ kaumudyā jyotstrāyāḥ prakarṣeṇa pravṛtteḥ | tatra dolādyūtaprāyāḥ krīḍāḥ | suvasantaka iti | suvasanto madanotsavaḥ | tatra nṛtyagītavādyaprāyāḥ krīḍāḥ | etā māhimānyaḥ krīḍāḥ || deśyā āha —sahakārabhañjikā, abhyūṣakhādikā, bisakhādikā, navapatrikā, udakakṣveḍikā, pāñcālānuvānam, ekaśālmalī, kadambayuddhāni, tāstāśca māhimānyo deśyāśca krīḍā janebhyo viśiṣṭamācareyuḥ | iti saṃbhūyakrīḍāḥ | sahakārabhañjiketi | sahakāraphalānāṃ bhañjanaṃ yatra krīḍāyām | abhyūṣa़khādikā phalānāṃ viṭapasthānāmagnau ploṣitānāṃ khādanaṃ yatra | bisakhādikā bisānāṃ mṛṇālānāṃ khādanaṃ yatra | saraḥsamīpavāsināmityete dve kvacitkaciddṛśyete | navaṃpatrikā prathamavarṣaṇena prarūḍhanavapatrāsu vanasthalīṣu yā krīḍā sā prāyeṇāṭavīsamīpavāsināmāṭavikānāṃ ca | udakakṣveḍiketi | ‘vaṃśanāḍī smṛtā kṣveḍā siṃhanādaśca kathyate’ iti | udakapūrṇā kṣveḍā yasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ sā madhyadeśyānām | yasyāḥ śrṛṅgakrīḍeti prasiddhiḥ | pāñcālānuyānam | bhinnālāpaceṣṭitaiḥ pāñcālakrīḍā yathā mithilāyām | ekaśālmalī ekameva mahāntaṃ kusumanirbharaṃ śālmalīvṛkṣamāśritya tatratyakusumābharaṇānāṃ krīḍā | yathā vaidarbhāṇām | yavacaturthī vaiśākhaśuklacaturthyā śrāvaṇaśuklatṛtīyāyāṃ hindolakrīḍā | madanotsavo madanapratikṛtipūjanam | damanabhañjikā parasparaṃ sugandhapuṣpaviśeṣāvataṃsanam | holākā ... ... .... | aśokottaṃsikā aśokapuṣpaiḥ śirobhūvaṇaracanā | puṣpāvacāyikā puṣpakrīḍā | cūtalatikā cūtapallavāvataṃsanam | ikṣumañjikā ikṣukhaṇḍamaṇḍanam | kadambayuddhāni kadambakusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtaidvidhāṃ balaṃ vibhajya yuddhāni | kadambagrahaṇaṃ kusumasukumārapraharaṇasūcanārtham | yaṣṭīṣṭakādiyuddhāni tu na kāryāṇi | yathā pauṇḍrāṇāṃ yuddhaṃ kvacitkaciddṛśyate | tāstāśceti | yā yā loke pravṛttipūrvāḥ | māhimānya iti mahimā mahattvaṃ tadvidyate yāsāmiti | ‘saṃjñāyā manmāmyām 5|2|137’ iti nipratyayaḥ | sarvadeśavyāpinya ityarthaḥ | deśe bhavā deśyāḥ | prādeśinya ityarthaḥ | janebhyo viśiṣṭamiti ghaṭādayo nāgarakāṇāmiti | samasyāstu sādhāraṇāḥ | tatra janā nāgarakāśca krīḍanti | tasmāttebhyo viśiṣṭamācareyuḥ nāgaratvadyotanārtham | saṃbhūyakrīḍā iti | āsu nāgarakāṇāṃ dravyamupahārya saṃbhūyakrīḍanāt | kandarpacūḍāmaṇikartā vīrabhadro 'pi—‘kuryācca yakṣarātriṃ sukharātriḥ sā ca kathyate loke | aikyaṃ kojāgarayā kaumudyāstatra nirdiṣṭam || suvasantako 'tra śāstre bhavati vasantasya vāsaraḥ prathamaḥ | bisakhādikā sarasyāṃ bisabhuktiḥ kīrtitā lokaiḥ || madanārthitāmrakusumairavataṃse cāmrabhañjikā proktā | abhyūṣakhādikaivaṃ jñātavyā granthataḥ parataḥ || anyonyaṃ jalasekaḥ pānīyakṣvaiḍikeritā vibudhaiḥ | kṛtrimavivāhalīlā kathitā navapatrikā ta़jjñaiḥ || kṛtrimaputrakalīlā syādanuyānaṃ tathā tu pāñcālyāḥ | śālmalyāmadhiruhya krīḍaikā śālmalī kathitā || yuddhaṃ kadambamukulaiḥ pravibhajya balaṃ parasparaṃ yatra | syāttatkadambayuddhaṃ kuryādanyāstathā līlāḥ ||’ iti jayamaṅgalākarturanuvyācaṣṭe |madhupānaṃ ca prakīrṇānīti jānate || 96 ||
nityo naimittikaścānyaḥ‘naimittikaścānyo’ ka gha sāmānyo 'nyo viśeṣavān |
tiryakṣu ca tadābhāsa‘tiryakṣu ca tadābhāsā’ ka kha iti dvādaśa nāyakāḥ || 102 ||
mugdhā madhyā pragalbhā ca vayasā kauśalena vā‘ca’ ka kha || 110 ||
mānarddheruddhatodāttā śāntā ca lalitā ca sā |
sāmānyā ca punarbhūśca svairiṇī ceti vṛttitaḥ || 112 ||
prātareti priyo yasyāḥ ‘kutaścitkhaṇḍiteti sā’ ka, ‘kuttaścitkhaṇḍitā tusā’ khakutaścitseha khaṇḍitā || 114 ||
yasyā na militaḥ preyānvipralabdheti tāṃ viduḥ || 116 ||
priyamāstīrṇaparyaṅkā‘paryaṅke’ ka kha bhūṣitā yā pratīkṣate || 117 ||
svādhīnapatikā sā tu yasyāḥ pārśvaṃ na muñcati |
priyo deśāntare yasyāḥ sā tu proṣitabhartṛkā || 119 ||
virahotkaṇṭhitā sā tu uttamādayo vilāsinyantāścaturviṃśatiḥ, khaṇḍitādavo virahoktaṇṭhitāścāṣṭāviti dvātriṃśatdvātriṃśaditi nāyikāḥ || 120 ||
avistṛtamasaṃkṣiptaṃ śravyavṛttaṃ ‘susandhi ca’ ka sugandhi ca |
‘pātrāṇāṃ varṇanātkāvye’ ka khapātrāṇāṃ varṇanaṃ kāvye rasastroto 'dhitiṣṭhati || 132 ||

div.p: atra bimboṣṭhatvādibhirmanonukūle pārvatīmukhe vilocanavyāpārānumito maheśvarasyābhilāṣaviśeṣaḥ ‘sāttviko’ ka khasāttvikāderanu‘ratyutpādāt’ katpādātsukhānubhavasyotpattimātramanumāpayati ||

lg.l: ‘‘āsīdvaraḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ’ iti mallināthoṭṭaṅkitaḥ pāṭhaḥabhūdvaraḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ khinnāṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī |
‘vṛttistayoḥ pāṇisamāgamena samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavasya’ mudritapāṭhaḥtasmindvaye tatkṣaṇamātmavṛttiḥ samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavena || 2 ||’

‘atra ca 'tayorupāntapratisāritāni’, ‘tayorapāṅgapraticālicāni’, ‘tayorapāṅgaprativāritāni’ ityevaṃvidhā aneke pāṭhāḥtayorapāṅgapravicāritāni kiṃcivdyaatrāpi ‘kriyāsamāpattinivartitāni’, ‘kriyāsamāpattivivartitāni’, ‘kriyāsamāpattiṣu kātarāṇi’, ‘tayoḥ samāpattiṣu kātarāṇi kiṃcivdyavasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni’ ityevaṃvidhā aneke pāṭhāḥvasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni |

div.p: atra hrīḥ saṃcāribhāvo jāyamāno rasasya janma jñāpayati |

atra dṛṣṭilakṣaṇaḥ śarīrārambho 'nubhāvo‘śarīrārambhe 'nubhāvo bhavan’ ka kha, ‘śarīrānubhāvo bhavan’ ga bhavan rasāvirbhāvaṃ lakṣayati | anubhāvāderanekasyaikasya vā punarutpattiranubandhaḥ | so 'nekasya yathā—
atra devyāḥ ‘śive’ ghasmarārau pūrvamutpannā ratiḥ sābhilāṣatadavalokana‘tadavalokanena’ ka khaviviktavasantādibhiruddīpyamānā romāñcāvahitthalakṣaṇābhyāṃ sāttvikavyabhicāribhyāmanubadhyate ||

l.seg: gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ || 6 ||’

div.p: atra mālatyā mādhavaviṣaye pūrvamutpannā ratirvasantāvatāra‘vasantāvatārataḥ saṃnidhiviśeṣa’ ghatatsaṃnidhiviśeṣapradarśanādibhiruddīpyamānā punaḥ punarutpannena valitagrīvakaṭākṣavikṣepalakṣaṇena śarīrārambhānubhāvenānubadhyate | atraiva‘atra ca’ gha pustake pāṭhāntaram mādhavasya mālatīviṣaye tadaharevotpannā ratistairevoddīpanairuddīpyamānā harṣadhṛtismṛtimativyādhyādibhiḥ saṃcāribhāvairvāgārambheṇa cānubhāvenānubadhyate ||

l.seg: rnikṣepa‘nikṣepaṇāya’ ka kha mudrite eva padamuddhṛtamarpayantī‘muddhṛtamudvahantī’ kumārasaṃbhavasya mudritapāṭhaḥ |

div.p:
atra janmāntarānubhavasaṃskārātpratikūle 'pi śūlini ‘śivāyāḥ’ ghaśailātmajāyāḥ sarvakālamevāvicchinnā ratiści‘ciraṃ viyuktasya’ ka kharaviyuktasya duścareṇāpi tapasā prārthanīya
-saṃgamasya tasyākasmikadarśanenoddīpyamānā sadyaḥsamupajāyamānasāttvikasvedastambhavepathūpalakṣitairharṣa‘harṣadhatismṛtyāvega-’ ka khasmṛtyāvegasādhvasādibhirvyabhicāribhāvaiḥ‘vyabhicāribhirbhāvaiḥ’ ka kha ‘vikṣepalakṣaṇena’ ka khapadanikṣepalakṣaṇena ca śarīrānubhāvena saṃsṛjyate | so 'yaṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyoge‘saṃyogaiḥ’ ka kha ratirūpeṇa raso niṣpadyate |

atra sarvadaiva śrīvatsalakṣmaṇo lakṣmīviṣaye mahākulīnataudāryasthirānurāgitārūpayauvanavaidagdhyaśīlasaubhāgyamahābhāgyādibhiḥ samutpannā ratistadavayavaviśeṣakāmanīyakavibhāvanenoddīpanavibhāvātiśayenoddīpyamānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ samakṣamapyāliṅganalakṣaṇena śarīrārambhānubhāvenānumīyamānāṃ lajjāpraṇāśalakṣaṇāṃ premapuṣṭeraṣṭamīmavasthāmadhyāste | atra cānuktā api sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇo 'nye 'pi cānubhāvaviśeṣāḥ pratīyante | śriyo 'pi ca samagrātmaguṇasaṃpadāśraye śrīvatsalakṣmaṇi tathābhūtā tadabhyadhikā vā‘ca’ gha ratiḥ pravṛddhapremapriyatamāliṅganalakṣaṇenoddīpanavibhāvevoddīpyamānā nayananimīlanānumeyāṃ samastasāttvikānubhāvavyabhicārihetuṃ premapuṣṭeruttamā‘ruttarā’ khamavasthāmāśrayati | so 'yaṃ viṣayasaundaryādāśrayaprakṛteḥ saṃskārapāṭavāduddīpanātiśayācca parāṃ koṭimāvahan rasaḥ puṣṭa ityucyate | atraiva brahmaṇaḥ śriyaṃ prati manoharā mameyaṃ sṛṣṭiriti, ratnākarasyeyamātmajeti, candrā-
mṛtādīnāmiyaṃ sodaryeti, viṣṇoriyaṃ priyatameti, kāmasyeyaṃ jananītyādibhya ālambanebhyaḥ samutpannā prītiḥ svāvāsānupaghātinā śarīrasaṃniveśena dṛṅmimīlanajanitayā ca tadupaghātaśaṅkayoddīpyamānā tatkṣaṇopajāyamānatayā āvegasmṛtivitarkonmādamohacintādibhirvyabhicāribhāvaistadanumeyaiśca stambhavepathuprabhṛtisāttvikaiḥ śivānudhyānalakṣaṇena budhdyārambhānubhāvena saṃsṛjyamānā paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī‘mārohatīti’ ka kha pratīyate ||

l.seg: krodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām || 9 ||’

div.p:
atra mādhavasya mālatyāṃ pūrvamutpannā ratistadavasthā‘tadavasthāvalokanādibhiḥ’ ga ghalokanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānā bhayaśokavismayakrodhaharṣairapi rasāntaraiḥ pṛthakpṛthagvibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogānniṣpadyamānaiḥ saṃkīryamāṇā manovāgbuddhi‘śārīrānubhāvaiḥ’ ghaśarīrārambhānubhāvairbhayādyanurūpaiśca sāttvikavyabhicāribhiḥ saṃparke paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī pratīyate | tatra cetaso vaikalyādiparibhāvanaṃ manaārambhaḥ, vākyoccāraṇaṃ vāgārambhaḥ, rāhoriva dasyoścandrakalāmiva preyasīmityādi budhdyārambhaḥ, ‘ācchidyata’ ghaācchindata ityādi śarīrārambhaḥ, bhayādīnāṃ ca pañcānāmapi yathākramaṃ rāhoriti, candrakalāmivānanacarīmiti, daivātsamāsādya me iti, dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayāditi, ācchindataḥ preyasīmityālambanavibhāvāstatsvarūpaparibhāvanānyuddīpanavibhāvāḥ, vikalam,
drutam, vikṣobhitam, ‘calitam’ kajvalitam, vikasitaṃ ceta‘vikasitaṃ ca ta’ gha, ‘vikasitamityanubhāvāḥ’ ka ityanubhāvāḥ, ātaṅkakaruṇāvismayakrodhamudanurūpāśca kampāśrustambhavaivarṇyaromāñcādayaḥ sāttvikāḥ, mohaviṣādavita‘viṣādodakoṃgratā’ ka , ‘viṣādāmarṣogratā’ kharkogratādhṛtyādayo vyabhicāriṇaścānumīyamānā niṣpattihetavo bhavanti | so 'yaṃ tulyakālabalotpattikāraṇānāṃ bhayādiniṣpattīnāṃ ratau saṃsargaḥ saṃkara ityucyate ||

l.seg: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi na ca me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ || 10 ||’

div.p: atra yoṣiti roṣākhyarasāntaratiraskārātpuruṣe ‘cānurāgā-’ kha , ‘cānyarāgā’ ghacānyarāgādratiprakarṣasya ‘hāso 'vagamyo’ ka khahrāso 'vasīyate |

lg.l: ‘vikkiṇaï māhamāsambhi ‘pāmaro pāraṇaṃ vi illeṇa’ ka, ‘pāmaro pāraḍiṃ vaïlleṇa’ kha, ‘pāmaro pāiḍiṃ vaïlleṇa’ mudritagāthāsa॰pāmaro pāraḍiṃ vaïlleṇa |

‘ṇiddhūmamummure sāmalīṣa thaṇama ṇiacchanto’ ka , ‘ṇiddhamamummura ccia sāmalīe thaṇo paḍicchanto’ iti mudritagāthāsa॰, ‘vidu samummure sāmalīe thaṇa ṇiacchanto’ khadiṭṭhiṃ samummure sāmalīa thaṇae ṇiacchanto || 11 ||’
‘‘paapāḍiaṃ’ ka ‘pāapaḍia’ khapāaḍiaṃ sohaggaṃ taṃbāe ‘usaha goṭṭhamajjhammi’ ka ‘vasahagoṭhṭhamajjhammi’ khauaha goṭṭhamajjhammi |
‘pāusalacchīe’ ka kha pāusalacchīa paoharehiṃ paḍivelliovijjho‘viṃjho’ kha || 14 ||’

div.p: ‘ete catvāro 'pi’ ka, ‘ta ete 'pi catvāro’ kataṃ ete catvāro 'pi rasābhāsā ucyante ||
ta ete ‘bhāvā daśāpi’ kabhāvādayo daśāpi rasaprakārā hāsādiṣvapi ‘prāyaśo’ khaprāyo dṛśyante | granthagauravabhayātkva‘nna kvacidudāhriyante’ kha citkvacidudāhriyante ||

lg.l: ‘nyaṅgaḥ krīḍādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘vyaṅgakrīḍādibhiḥ’ kha, sollavaco nyaṅgavācyamnyaṅgavrīḍādibhiścetovikāro hāsa ucyate |

div.p: atra ‘rādhayā vyaṅgitasya’ kharādhāyā harinyaṅgād, harestu vrīḍāto hāsasya sattāmātraṃ pratīyate ||
atra daśasthasya rāmaviyogādutpannastadguṇasmaraṇādibhiruddīpitaścintāsaṃtāpādirvāgārambheṇa cānuṣajyamānaḥ śokarūpeṇa raso niṣpadyate ||

atra yadyapi ‘vibhāvānubhāvasaṃcārisaṃyoga’ ka khavibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogalakṣaṇāyā rasaniṣpatteḥ 'adhikamatiruṣātilohitākṣyā’ iti prakarṣanimittamatiśabdopādānaṃ vidyate, tathāpyuttamanāyikāśrayaḥ priyaviṣaye na roṣaḥ prakarṣamāsādayati ||

atrābhivādanapraśnāśvāsanasamādeśanādriśikharārohaṇeṣṭadevatā‘devasmaraṇānāṃ’ ghasmaraṇānāṃ
pūrvaraṅgaparyavasāyitvenānuddīpanavibhāvatvādanutsāhānubhāvatvācca nāyamanubandho niṣpattiḥ prakarṣo vā bhavati ||

l.seg: laṅghyante karimāṃsaghasmara‘raṇātkauleyakāḥ’ ka , ‘ruṇatkauleyakāḥ’ ga gharaṇatkauleyakāḥ pallayaḥ || 21 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapi pallīnāmālambanatvam, ‘na tadiśeṣaṇayoḥ’ khatadviśeṣaṇayoruddīpanatvam, mantrajapāderanubhāvatvam, tāluśoṣādīnāṃ vyabhicāritvamiti vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogo 'sti, tathāpi mantrajapeṣṭadevatānudhyānayorlaṅghanopāyaparatvānna bhayarūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiḥ’ karasasya niṣpattiḥ | adhvanyānāṃ hi tanniṣpattāvalpasattvatayā stambhamohamūrcchāmaraṇādibhirupāyaprayogo na ghaṭate ||

l.seg: ‘‘re hasta’ ka khahe hasta dakṣiṇa mṛtasya śiśordvijasya

div.p:
atra yadyapi dvijaśiśorjīvanāya munirapi śūdro vadhya iti na rāmasyātmakarmanindā tathāpyanapakāriṇaṃ‘pyanayakāriṇaṃ’ kha jighāṃsato ‘ghṛṇā pravarttata iti sītāparityāga’ ka khaghṛṇānuvartata eva | sītā-
parityāgaviṣayatvenaivātra jugupsānugamo grahītavyaḥ | ‘śambūkaviṣaye’ kaśambukaviṣaye punarasyā janmamātrameveti ||

l.seg: satyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ka evamāha ‘muśalī’ ka khamusalī mithyāmba paśyānanam |
vyādehīti ‘vidārite tu vadane’ ka khavikāsite ca vadane dṛṣṭvā samastaṃ jaga-
nmātā yasya jagāma vismayapadaṃ pāyātsa vaḥ keśavaḥ || 23 ||’

div.p: atra śiśormuṃkhe jagaddarśanamālambanavibhāvaḥ, tatsāmagryaśaiśavādyā‘śaiśavādyālokana’ ka khalocanamuddīpanavibhāvaḥ, vismayavaśaṃ jagāmetyanenānupāttā api sarve saṃcā‘sarve saṃcāriṇo’ ityasya sthāne ‘kevalaṃ saṃcāriṇaḥ’ ka khariṇo 'nubhāvāśca gṛhyante ||

lg.l: ‘taṃ tāṇa‘taṃ tāṇaṃ’ kha haacchāaṃ ṇiccalaloaṇasihaṃ paütthapaāvaṃ |

div.p: ayaṃ ca puṣṭo 'pi sāttvikatvāt sadaivānyānuyāyīti nānubhāvādibhiranubadhyate ||

lg.l: païṇo dhaṇuravakaṃkhiṇi romaṃcaṃ kiṃ muhā vahasi || 25 ||’
khedodgamaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṅganānāṃ cakre padaṃ ‘pattraviśeṣakeṣu’ ka khacitraviśeṣakeṣu || 27 ||’
‘sahi ‘sahi sāhasaṃ teṇa’ kasāhasu teṇa samaṃ ahaṃ pi kiṃ ṇiggaā ‘pahaammi’ khapahāammi |
aṇṇacia dīsaï jeṇa dappaṇe kāvi sā sumuho || 29 ||’
[sakhi sādhaya tena samamahamapi kiṃ nirgatā prabhāte |
anyaiva dṛśyate yena darpaṇe kāpi sā sumukhī ||]

div.p: atra bāṣpaśavdena locanāśrayamaśrūcyate na kaṇṭhādyāśrayo duḥkhāveśaḥ | yathā—‘vilalāpa sa bāppagadgadam', ‘ ‘muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe’ ka khamuhurmagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīm’ ityādi‘iti’ kha ||
atra mohaśabdena mūrcchocyate, na vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇo mohaḥ ||

l.seg: mayi krūre yattatsaviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 32 ||’

div.p: atra saviśeṣā smṛtiricchayā vāgārambheṇa cānubadhyate | ‘tiṣṭhetyādayaḥ’ khaniṣpattyādayaḥ punarasyā ratyādiniṣpattiṣveva draṣṭavyāḥ | ‘ratyādayo hi smṛtimūlatatprakaṣāpakarṣāvanuvartante’ ka kharatyādayo 'smṛtimūlatvāttatprakarṣāpakarṣāvanuvartante ||

l.seg: nrūpoccayena ‘vidhinā vihitā kṛtāṅgī’ pāṭhaḥghaṭitā manasā kṛtā nu |

div.p: so 'yamasatyaḥ satyo vā smṛtijñānacintanādidvāreṇa nirṇayānto niṣpanna ityucyate ||

l.seg: pīḍyante gṛhiṇaḥ kathaṃ nu‘na’ kha tanayāviśleṣaduḥkhairnavaiḥ || 34 ||’

div.p: atra vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogāt prītirivotkaṇṭhāpi tadanuṣaṅgiṇī niṣpannā uttarārdhapratipādyena ‘tathāvidhenaiva’ khaniṣedhenaiva vismayādinābhibhūyamānā hrāsa ityucyate | prakarṣaścāsyā mamāraṇyaukasa ityanena nivāryate ||

lg.l: suṇṇaṃ kalahāantī ‘sahīhi’ khasahīhiṁ ruṇṇā ṇa‘nāvahasiā’ gha o hasiā || 35 ||’
śūnyaṃ kalahāyamānā sakhībhī ruditā na vā hasitā ||]

div.p: atra sakhīrodanena śūnyakalahaḥ, śūnyakalahena sākṣātkāraḥ, sākṣātkāreṇa cintā, cintayā tu mūlabhūtā ratiḥ prakṛṣyate ||
‘atra līlāravindabhramaṇaceṣṭayā’ ka khaatra kaścillīlāravindabhramaṇaceṣṭayā ‘kaścidindumatyai’ ka khaindumatyai tiṣṭhate ||

lg.l: yadvā na siddhamastreṇa mama tatkena setsyati || 38 ||’

div.p: atra karṇasyātmasaṃbhāvanayāśvatthā‘avajñānam’ ka kha manyavajñā prakṛṣyate ||

lg.l: aheturanivartī‘anivartyāṃ ca’ ka kha ca snehaścittārdratā matā |

div.p: atra duṣyantasya sattvadamanaḥ śakuntalātanayaḥsattvadamanadarśanādutpannastadaṅgasparśasukhādibhiruddīpitaḥ spṛhāmativitarkavāgārambhaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ sneho niṣpadyate ||

l.seg: kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe ‘yasmai’ ratnāvalyā mudrite pāṭhaḥyasminkaromi spṛhām || 40 ||’

div.p: atra vatsarājasya sarvātmanā manorathasiddhayo dhṛteḥ prakarṣamāvahanti ||
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaṃprakarṣāt’ ka kharasasya prakarṣe krodha‘kopaśokābhyāṃ’ kha śokābhyāṃ saṃkaro yathā—

l.seg: kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayo
hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti kaṇṭhādbahiḥ || 41 ||’

div.p: atrārjunasyānyāyenābhimanyuvadhādudbhūtau dīptāveva krodhaśokā‘akṛtavipratīkārotthayā’ ghavudbhūtavipratīkārotthayā tathāvidhayaiva vrīḍayā saṃkīryete | tathāhi krodhaśokayoranubhāvabhūtā dṛṣṭayo vācaśca vrīḍājaḍā‘vrīḍā iti viśeṣaṇāni’ gha iti viśeṣaṇāni saṃbadhyante ||

‘ityādidevarṣivākyādudbhūtaḥ’ dha, ‘ityādermunivākyādudbhūtaḥ’ ka khaityāderdevarṣivākyādudbhūtaḥ‘udbhūtapraharṣākāro’ kha praharṣākāro gurusaṃnidhau lajjitayā līlākamalapatragaṇanavyājena‘gaṇanena’ ka kha gauryā gopyate ||

l.seg: ‘ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ nu kiṃ kathamiti’ ka khako 'yaṃ kā vayamatra kiṃ nu surataṃ svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ 44’

lg.l: ānanena na tu tāvadīśvaraścakṣuṣā ciramumāmukhaṃ papau || 45 ||’

div.p: atra nayanaghūrṇanākāraṇasmitādayaḥ saṃmohānandasaṃbhedā‘saṃbhedā udbhavanto’ khadudbhavanto madaṃ niṣpādayanti |

atra ‘daśarathasya suhṛdaḥ’ ghadaśarathasuhṛdaḥ sumanttrasāratheḥ ‘prabhukulapratiṣṭhā’ khaprabhukulasya pratiṣṭhāmāśaṃsatastatsūnumindrajito hantāraṃ paśyato manorathāvāptyā harṣo niṣpannastadapatye 'pi vīradharmamācariṣṇau prakṛṣṭo diṣṭyetyavyayena sūcyate ||
atra ‘bhīmasya’ ghabhīmasenasya dhārtarāṣṭreṣu svasthā iti nāmno 'pya‘pyasahamānāt’ ghasahanāt lākṣāgṛhādyapakārajanmāmarṣaḥ ‘prakṛṣyate’ ghapratīyate ||

l.seg: yāni trīṇi ‘trīṇyakutomukhāni’ ka, ‘trīṇyakutobhayāni’ ka ṭippaṇyām, ‘trīṇi kutosukhāni’ khakutomukhānyapi padānyāsankharāyodhane
yadvā kauśalamindrasūnudamane‘indrasūnudalane’ ga gha tatrāpyabhijño janaḥ || 48 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapi solluṇṭhadoṣakīrtanādibhirjugupsā niṣyadyate tathāpi na tayā svaniṣpattiheturasūyā saṃkīryate ||

lg.l: ‘huṃ‘hum’ gha nāsti ṇillajja samosara taṃ ccia‘via’ kha aṇuṇesu jāi de eaṃ |

div.p: atra kasyāścit preyasi sapatnīṃ prasādayituṃ gate tanmānamamṛṣyamāṇāyāḥ samutpannerṣyā priyānunayādibhirbhṛśāyamānatayā niṣpannālaktakatilakānumeyaistatpādapatanādibhiruddīptā huṃkārākṣepabhartsanapratibhedāvinābhūtairbhrūbhaṅgatāḍanāṅgakṣepavepathusvedagadgadādibhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānā prakṛṣyate ||

l.seg: ‘vyarthaṃ yatra kapīndrasakhyamapi me kleśaḥ‘vīrya harīṇāṃ vṛthā’ ka kha kapīnāṃ vṛthā
prajñāṃ jāmbavato 'pi yatra na gatiḥ putrasya vāyorapi |
mārgaṃ yatra na viśvakarmatanayaḥ kartuṃ nalo 'pi kṣamaḥ
bhāgyādhīnamataḥ paraṃ na khalu tadvācyaṃ vadhūbandhubhiḥ || 51 ||’

div.p: atra mādhavasya prakṛṣṭāpakāriṇyaghoraghaṇṭe viṣaye prakṛṣṭameva vākpāruṣyaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyaṃ ca jāyate ||
atra loladṛṣṭitā karābadhūnanaṃ ca strīṇāṃ svabhāvabhīrutvavilāsitvābhyāmapi bhavatīti trāsāvirbhāve 'pyasamarthamiti nānubangho bhavati ||

lg.l: accaṃtapahariseṇa vi jā a muā sā muā ccea || 54 ||’
atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā ca mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||]

div.p: atra virahiṇyāḥ kārśyātiśayamudvīkṣamāṇāyāḥ kasyāścidvayasyāyāḥ snehātiśayāt 'prema paśyati bhayānyapade 'pī'ti priyāgamapraharṣātiśayabhāve 'pyasahiṣṇutayā tanmaraṇaśaṅkā prakṛṣyate ||

l.seg: ‘‘kvākāryaṃ śaśa lakṣmaṇaḥ’ vikramorvasīye | ‘kvākāryaṃ kva kalākarasya’ ca kha, ‘kva kalādharasya’ ca khakvākāryaṃ kva kalādharasya ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā
kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyo rekhaiva‘lekhaiva’ gha sānyādṛśī
cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati 57’

div.p: atra virahiṇaḥ purūravasa utkaṇṭhādibhiḥ premaprakarṣādasatpralāparūpa unmādo niṣpadyate ||
atra ratijanmā saṃbhramātiśayo ratijanmanaiva matiprakarṣeṇa saṃkīryate ||

l.seg: mukulayati ca netre sarvathā subhru khedastvayi

div.p: atra mālatyāḥ puṣpāvacayajanmā śramaḥ, mādhavāvalokanajā ca ratiḥ, svedagadgadāṅgasādanayanamukulaistulyadharmiṇau mithaḥ saṃkīryete ||

l.seg: kimapi kimapi dhyāyannāryo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 61 ||’

lg.l: ‘ghariṇighaṇatthaṇa‘pekkhaṇa’ dhapellaṇasuhelli‘ṇipaḍiassa’ ka khapaḍiassa honta‘honti’ ka khapahiassa |
‘avasaduṇaṃgara’ kha avasaüṇaṅgāraavāraviṭṭhidiahā‘diasā suhāventi’ ka kha suhāventi || 62 ||’

l.seg: nidrācchedābhitāmrā‘nidrācchedātitāmrā’ ka kha ciramavatu harerdṛṣṭirākekarā vaḥ || 65 ||’

div.p: atra dṛṣṭeḥ pratyagronmeṣajihmatādibhiḥ prabodho nādyāpi niṣpadyata iti pratīyate ||

lg.l: ‘abhyāsikī’ ka, ‘anyāsikī’ khaābhyāsikī tu tatsthāne tadudāhṛtayo yathā || 166 ||
‘mṛteti pretya saṃgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam |

div.p: atra sthāyino vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiriti ratireva śṛṅgārarūpeṇa niṣpadyate | atrāvantyā vāsavadattāyā ālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ sakāśādutpanno vatseśvarasya ratisthāyibhāvaḥ, tasyāḥ punarjīvanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāno mṛtetyādinā vāgārambhānubhāvenānumīyamānairharṣadhṛtiprabhṛtibhiḥ sukhātmakairvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ karuṇānantaraḥ saṃbhogaḥ śṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate ||

atra vasudhāvijayāderālambanavibhāvādutpannaḥ sthāyyutsāhabhāvaḥ sthairyadhairyādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaiḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumīyamāneṣu smṛtimativitarkādiṣu niṣpanno vīrarasasaṃjñayā vyavahriyate ||

atra cālambanavibhāvabhūtadevīmaraṇādutpannaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvaścitāniveśanahutāśanāṅgajvālādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāno vāgārambhānumeyairnirvedaglānivaivarṇyādibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ karuṇa iti jñāyate ||

lg.l: so 'yaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ pāpo lavdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam || 69 ||’

div.p: atra duḥśāsanālambanavibhāvāya krudhyato bhīmasenasya pūrvamutpannaḥ krodhaḥ sthāyibhāvastadavāpteḥ smaryamāṇasamakṣakṛtadraupadīnigrahakeśakarṣaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumīyamāneṣvasūyāvegavepathuśramādiṣu duḥkhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu ‘niṣpādyamāno’ khanippadyamāno raudra iti niṣpadyate ||

atra śākhināṃ pravālapuṣpaphalaśākhāsaṃpannaṃ nijaṃ rūpaṃ nandanaśākhināṃ punaḥ pravālādisthāne‘pravālādisthāneṃśukahāra’ ka khaṣvaṃśukahāramadhumandirāṇi tadetadāścaryam | ataścaitebhya ālambanavibhāvebhyaḥ kasyaciddevabhūyaṃgatasya samutpanno vismayaḥ‘vismayasthāyibhāvaḥ’ ka kha
sthāyibhāvastadīyāvayavadarśanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumeyeṣu harṣaromodgamakhedagadgadādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu niṣpadyamāno 'dbhuta ityucyate ||

atra mahendrakuliśāddhārāsaṃnihitānalādālamba‘saṃnihitānalālambana’ khanavibhāvātsmaryamāṇādapi daityastrīṇāmutpanno ‘bhayasthāyibhāvaḥ’ ka khabhayasthāyibhāvastadvidīrṇadānavamaraṇasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ ‘sagarbhapātādibhiḥ’ dhasvagarbhapātādibhiranubhāvādibhistadanumitaiśca svedastambhavepathuprabhṛtibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamāno bhayānakarasarūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ kenacidākhyāyamāno 'pi bhayānaka ityākhyāyate ||

atrālambanavibhāvabhūtebhyaḥ kauṇapebhyaḥ kasyaci‘ripuvijayāśaṃsinaḥ’ khadripujayaśaṃsinaḥ puṃsa utpanno jugupsāsthāyibhāvaḥ śiraśchedavigaladrudhiraghārāparipluta‘pravartita’ khapraṇartitakabandhakauṇapānttrabhūṣaṇaśoṇitapānādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu ‘vyabhicārādiṣu’ kavāgārambhānumeyeṣu bhayāveśaśaṅkāvahitthādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu niṣpanno bībhatsa iti nigadyate ||

atra kācit sakhīṃ pūrvaṃ bhartari ‘pragṛhītamānāṃ’ ka khagṛhītamānāṃ tenaiva nakha‘padāṅkitastanām’ khapadāṅkitastanīmālambanavibhāvabhūtāmupalabhamānāyāḥ kasyāścitsakhyā utpanno hāsaḥ sthāyibhāvastadīyamānaparigrahasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumiteṣu śaṅkāvahitthagadgadādivyabhicāriṣu ‘niṣpādyamāno’ kaniṣpadyamāno hāsyaśabdenābhidhīyate ||

lg.l: iti vetti na ‘jānāmi’ khajānāti ‘yatpriyaṃ tatkaroti sā’ ka khatatpriyaṃ yatkaroti sā || 74 ||’

div.p: atra vatsalaprakṛterdhīratayā lalitanāyakasya ‘priyānubhāva’ ka khapriyālambanavibhāvādutpannaḥ ‘snehasthāyibhāvo’ ka snehasthāyibhāvo viṣayasaukumāryātmaprakṛtyādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samupajāyamānairmoha‘mohamatidhṛtismṛti’ ka khadhṛtismṛtyādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairanubhāvaiśca‘praśaṃsādibhiḥ’ ityadhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ ka kha saṃsṛjyamāno niṣpannaḥ preyāniti pratīyate ||

atra kasyacidupaśāntaprakṛterdhīraśā‘dhīrapraśānta’ ka khantanāyakasya yathopanatamanonukūladārādisaṃpatterālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ samutpanno dhṛtisthāyibhāvo vastutattvālocanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samupajāyamāna‘smṛtimatyāsatyā’ ka 'smṛtimatyādibhiḥ’ khasmṛtyādibhirvyabhi-
cāribhāvairvāgārambhādibhiranuṣajyamāno niṣpannaḥ śānta ityabhigīyate‘iti gīyate’ ka kha ||
anye punarasya śamaṃ prakṛtimāmananti sa tu dhṛtereva viśeṣo bhavati ||

atra rāmasyodāttaprakṛternisargata eva tattvābhiniveśinī matirnākṛtyaviṣaye pravartate, na ca pravṛttopāramati, sā ca sīteyaṃ mama svīkārayogyetyevaṃrūpeṇa ‘pravṛttoparamati’ ka khapravṛttā rāvaṇaprārthanālakṣmaṇaprotsāhanābhyāmuddīpyamānā samupajāyamānacintāvitarkavrīḍāvahitthasmṛtyādibhiḥ kālocitottarānumīyamānaiśca vivekacāturyaudāryadhairyādibhiḥ ‘saṃsṛjyamāna udāttarasarūpeṇa’ kasaṃsṛjyamānodāttarasarūpeṇa niṣpadyate ||

lg.l: vimukheṣu na me khaṅgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati || 78 ||’

div.p: atra mayāsyāpakāraḥ kṛta iti ‘yatte cetasi bhayam’ khayaccetasi bhayaṃ tanmābhūt ‘na mama khaṅgaḥ parāṅyukheṣu kadācidapi prahartumutsahata’ ka kha gaparāṅyukheṣu me khaṅgaḥ kadācidapi na prahartumutsahate’ iti sarvadaiva rụ̄dho 'haṃkāraḥ pratīyate | so 'yaṃ garvaprakṛtiruddhato nāma rasaḥ | kecit punaḥ—
ityevamūrjakhītyudāttapakṣe nikṣipantaḥ pūrvoktameva garvaprakarṣodāharaṇaṃ dhṛtāyudho yāvadahamityādyuddhataniṣpattau varṇayanti ||

l.seg: pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ‘pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭam’ ka kha yadi kila bhavedaṅgamebhistaveti || 81 ||’

div.p: atra śaityasaurabhādibhirvirahija‘virahiṇa udvejanīyā’ ka khanodvejanīyā api vāyavaḥ priyatamāṅgasaṃsargasaṃbhāvanayā ‘samāliṅgyanta iti saṃsargādiyaṃ ratibhavati’ ka khasamāśliṣyanta iti saṃsargata iyaṃ bhavati ||
seyaṃ sītāviṣayiṇī ratistadupamānadarśanena rāmaṃ ‘ramayate’ ka kharamayati ||

lg.l: ‘kāmaṃ‘kāmaṃ pratyādiṣṭam’ ka pratyādiṣṭāṃ smarāmi na parigrahaṃ munestanayām |
