div.p: atra seyaṃ durvāsasaḥ śāpādvismṛtavivāhādivṛttāntasya duṣyantasya śakuntalāyāṃ ratiradhyātmaṃ bhavati ||

lg.l: hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ‘hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me’ ka me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kāṭākṣairapahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmūlitaṃ ca || 84 ||’

div.p: atra tarjanārtha—mokṣārtha—vāraṇārthānāṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ prayogānmānavatyāḥ saṃprayoge ratyutpattiḥ pratīyate ||

l.seg: ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo‘śiśirasamṛṇo’ gha mauktikasaraḥ
kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ || 86 ||’

lg.l: tathā hi śeṣendriyavṛttirāsāṃ sarvātmanā cakṣuriva praṃviṣṭā 89’
‘kasya no kurute ‘tanvi’ ka khamugdhe pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ |
‘randhaṇakammaṇiuṇie mā jūrasu‘mā ūra su’ ka, ‘mā surasu’ kha rattapāḍalasuandham |
muhamāruaṃ pianto dhūmāi sihī ṇa pajjalaï || 91 ||’
[randhanakarmanipuṇike mā ‘mā khidyasva’ iti gha-pustake cchāyākradhyasva raktapāṭalasugandham |
mukhamārutaṃ piban dhūmāyate śikhī na prajvalati ||]

div.p: ‘atra yadā ratirjāyate tadā putreṣu snihyati’ khaatra yadā yadā ratirjāyate tadā tadā putreṣu snihyati putrarūpeṇa vā jāyata iti janmāntaravāsanārūpo nisargaḥ saṃgacchate ||

l.seg: yeṣāṃ ‘kuleṣu’ ka khakule ca savitā ca gururvayaṃ ca || 93 ||’
punariva śiśurbhūtvā vatsaḥ sa me raghunandano

lg.l: avijñāte 'pi bandhau hi balātprahlādate‘prahnādate’ gha manaḥ || 95 ||’

div.p: atra sītānveṣaṇāderabhiyogādrāmasya sugrīvabibhīṣaṇayoḥ prītirudayate‘rutpadyate’ ka kha | sāṃprayogikīsthāne ābhyāsikī yathā—

lg.l: pīyante mṛdutrakrapītamarutaḥ paurāṇarītikrama‘gītikrama’ ka khavyālolāṅguliruddhaśukta‘mukta’ ka khasuṣiraśreṇīravā‘śreṇīdharā’ ka kha veṇavaḥ || 99 ||’
‘ikṣudaṇḍasya maṇḍasya dadhnaḥ piṣṭakṛtasya‘piṣṭaghṛtasya’ ka kha ca |
‘varāhasya’ ka khavarāhasya ca māṃsasya so 'yaṃ gacchati phālgunaḥ || 102 ||’
yatra ‘snuta’ gasrutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni ganghaḥ surabhīkaroti || 103’

div.p:
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenotsāhasya yuddhadānadayāvīrādayaḥ, krodhasya
‘bhīmamanyutrāsādayaḥ’ ka khabhāmamanyūtprāsādayaḥ, hāsasya smitahasitavihasitādayaḥ, ‘prasuptapralayamatyādīnāṃ’ ka khasuptapralayamatyādīnāṃ tu‘tu’ kha ka pustakayornāsti svapnamaraṇaśamādayo bhedā jāyante | tatra yadyapi ‘ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīm’ ityanena yuddhavīraḥ, ‘aniṣṭvā vividhairmakhaiḥ’ ityanena dānavīraḥ, ‘adattvā cārthamarthibhyaḥ’ ityanena dayāvīraścotsāharūpeṇa niṣpattau varṇitaḥ‘rasaniṣpattau vartate’ ka kha, ‘tathāpyekaśo 'pyetadrasaniṣpattirastīti pradarśyante’ ka khatathāpyekaśo 'pyete rasaniṣpattyai prabhavantīti pradarśyante ||

l.seg: ‘etāṃ paśya ‘purastaṭī’ ka kha puraḥsthalīmiha kila krīḍākirāto haraḥ

lg.l: ‘sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ yatasva |

div.p: krodhasya yadyapi ‘bhīkādayo’ ka , ‘krodhasya bhīmādayo’ kha bhāmādayo ‘mānabhedāḥ’ ityasya ‘viśeṣāḥ’ iti ṭippaṇarūpeṇa gha, ‘viśeṣāḥ’ ka khamānabhedāścaturviṃśatiḥ saṃbhavanti tathāpi lalitālalitobhayabhedena rūpeṇa krameṇa sarvasaṃgrahāttatra traya eva prakārāḥ pradarśyante ||
teṣu strīṇāṃ ‘lalitaḥ kopābhāvo yathā’ ka khalalitakopo bhāmo yathā—

lg.l: yatra kopaiḥ kṛtā srīṇāṃ saṃprasādārthinaḥ priyāḥ || 107 ||’
vāhaguruā‘vāhagaruī’ ka kha ‘nisammaï’ ghaṇisammaï vāhīea bahumuhe diṭṭhī || 108 ||’

div.p: nanviyamīrṣyā kasmānna bhavati, nātra ‘mānadānāmarṣaṇamātraṃvivakṣā’ ka khamānadānāmarṣamātraṃ vivakṣitamapi tu tajjanito duḥkhātiśaya iti ||

lg.l: ‘pahavaṃti ccia‘vvia’ ka purisā mahilāṇaṃ kiṃ ‘khu’ ka khatha suhaa vihiosi |
‘lolliāe’ ka kha aṇurāaṇolliāe ko doso ‘apahajāie’ ka , ‘āhijāie’ kha āhijāīe || 109 ||’

div.p: hāsasya yadyapyupahāsādayo bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti tathāpi vihasitena teṣāṃ ‘apasaṃgrahāt’ khasaṃgrahādīṣannyūnādhikamiti ‘trayastriśadbhedāḥ’ ghatrayastadbhedā udāhriyante—

l.seg: avocadyaṃ paśyetyavatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā
mā mā saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā puraḥ |
no yāvatparirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ‘kṣaṇaṃ’ ka kha

div.p: mativiśeṣaḥ ‘svapno yathā’ ‘narottamapriyā’ S.P. Pandit saṃpādite raghuvaṃśeśamo yathā—

lg.l: viśeṣāḥ prāptakālo 'tha ‘pariśeṣo’ ka, ‘paripoṣo’ khapariśeṣo ‘nigadyate’ ka khanidarśyate || 167 ||

l.seg: vāpyāṃ na rajyati na cātti mṛṇālakhaṇḍaṃ
sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat |
‘tanvaṅgyā’ subhāṣitāvalau, ‘gehinyāḥ’ khagehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ ‘mayi’ ka khamukhe |
dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhasya kesarasaṭābhārāgralagnaṃ‘bhārāvalagnaṃ rajaḥ’ subhāṣitāvalau rajaḥ || 120 ||’
kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ ‘maṇḍanena’ ga maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām || 122 ||’
‘kiṃ rūpaṃ sphuṭameva sā śaśimukhī dhatte tadatyadbhutaṃ
svalpo 'pyeṣa mama prayāti purataḥ panthā yathā dīrghatām 123’

div.p: saṃskārastridhā—ādṛtaḥ, paṭuḥ, abhyastaśceti‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ kha | tatrāśrayaguṇenādarapratyayādutpanna‘ādarādutpanna’ ka kha ādṛto yathā—

l.seg: kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ

lg.l: suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ‘mūrtirasyāṃ sneha’ mudritamahāvīracarite snehaṃ karoti me || 126 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapi viṣayaguṇāt paṭuḥ, āśrayaguṇādāhato 'pi‘ccādṛto 'pi’ ka kha pratyayaḥ, paṭumāhataṃ ca‘ca’ ka kha nāsti saṃskāraṃ ‘prasūyate’ ka khaprasūte tathāpyabhyāsātpaṭīyānāhatatamaśca jāyamāno 'bhyasta ityucyate ||

lg.l: ‘kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca ‘nistulasya’ ka nistalasya |
sā babhūva vaśavartinī ‘tayoḥ’ ka khadvayoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca 133’
tāpayanti virahe kimucyate mārayanti na yadetadadbhutam 134’
‘avaruhṇa’ ka khaavaraṇhamajjirīṇaṃ kae ṇa kāmo ‘vahaï cāvaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudritagāthāsaptaśatyām, ka kha cadhaṇuṃ vahaï || 135 ||’

l.seg: diśāṃ vaktraṃ candre sukṛtamatha tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ |
hṛdi tvaṃ hrīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ || 137’

lg.l: ‘ajja mae teṇa viṇā ‘aṇubhūasuhāiṃ aṇisaṃbharantīe’ ka khaaṇuhūasuhāiṁ saṃmaraṃtīe |
‘ahiṇavamohaṇaravo’ kha ahiṇavamehāṇaṁ ravo ṇisāmio ‘vajjapaḍahovva’ ghavajjhapaḍaho vva || 138 ||’
‘khaṇamettaṃ pi‘vi’ gha ṇa phiṭṭaï aṇudiahaṃ ‘aṇudiahaviiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘diṇṇaguruasaṃtāvā’ ghadiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā |
‘pacchaṇṇapāpasaṃkavva’ gha, ‘pacchannapāvasaṃkevva’ gāthāsapta॰pacchaṇṇapāvasaṃkavva sāmalī majjha ‘hiaāo’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘hiaāhi’ ka kha gahiaāhiṁ || 140 ||’
jaṇavāo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliaütteṇa‘haliaputteṇa’ gha || 141 ||’
‘gottakkhalaṇaṃ soūṇa piaame ajja ‘tīa’ gāthāsapta॰māmi ‘khaṇadiahe’ iti tatraivachaṇadiahe |
vajjhamahisassa mālavva maṃḍaṇaṃ se ṇa ‘uaha’ paśyata ityapi capaḍihāi || 142 ||’
‘candasarisaṃ muhaṃ se sariso amaassa muharaso tissā |
‘‘parivaṭṭa diva’ ka, ‘parivaṭṭadivaṃ’ khaparivaṭṭaṃtiva ṇisaṃsa(ma)i maṃḍaliakusumāuhaṃ va aṇaṃgaṃ |
virahammi maṇṇaï harīṇahe‘hariṇahe agatthe’ ka, ‘harīṇāhe’ ‘aṇatthe’ kha aṇatthapaḍiuṭṭhiaṃ va miaṃkam || 145’
samuhāvaḍie ko verie vi diṭṭhiṃ ṇa pāḍei || 146 ||’
[ālāpo mā dīyatāṃ lokaviruddha iti nāma kṛtvā |
saṃmukhāpatite ko vairiṇyapi dṛpṭiṃ na pātayati ||]
‘ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
‘diṭṭhe jaṃ pulaïjjasi ‘rahagharasi’ ka khatharaharasi piammi jaṃ samāsaṇṇe |
tuha saṃbhāsaṇa‘seoli’ ka, ‘seolli’ khaseulliphaṃsaṇe kiṃ vi ‘ṇijjihasi’ ka khaṇijjihisi || 148 ||’
‘‘ṇaaṇavbhaṃtara’ ka kha, ‘ṇaaṇaṃtara’ ga ghaṇaaṇabbhaṃtaragholaṃtabāhabharamaṃtharāi‘mantharāe’ ka kha ga gha diṭṭhīe |
puṇaruttapechirīe‘peccharīe’ ka kha vālaa kiṃ jaṃ ṇa bhaṇio si || 149 ||’
‘savvassammi vidaddhe(ḍ̣dhe)‘vidaṭṭe’ ka kha taha vi hu hiaassa ṇivvudi ccea |
jaṃ teṇa gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio || 150 ||’
‘katto saṃpaḍaï ‘mahampi’ ka, ‘maī’ kha maha pi piasahi piasaṃgamo paose vi |
jaṃ jiajaï‘aï’ gha gahia‘kūra’ ka khakaraṇiara khiṃkhirīśaranirmitavādyaviśeṣaḥ ‘khikkhirī ḍumbacindhalaṭhṭhīe’ iti deśīnāmamālā | ḍumbādīnāṃ sparśaparihārāryaṃ cihnayaṣṭiḥ caṃdacaṃḍālo’ ||
‘jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ jappasi jaṃ‘jaha tuma’ kāvyamālāmudritagāthāsapta॰ jaṃ ṇiacchesi |
taṃ tamaṇusikkharīe‘śikkhirīe’ kha, ‘sikkhirīe’ ityapi gāthāsapta॰ dīho diaho ṇa saṃpaḍaï || 152 ||’
‘tava sā kathāsu parighaṭṭayati śravaṇaṃ yadaṅgulimukhena muhuḥ |
sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 161 ||’

div.p: helādiṣu rāgataḥ sahasā pravṛttihetuścittollāso helā | sā striyāṃ yathā—

lg.l: ‘jave helā’ deśīnāmamālā, ‘tumutammi koue halahala’ ityapihelāhalahaliathorathaṇaharaṃ bhualaājualaṃ || 164 ||’

div.p: helaiva savacanavinyāso hāvaḥ | sa striyāṃ yathā—

lg.l: ‘jaï ṇa chivasi pupphavaïṃ purao tā kīsa‘kī so’ kha vārio ṭhāsi |
chittosi culuculantehiṁ ‘dhāviuṇa amha’ iti mudritagāthāsapta॰, ‘pahāviūṇāmbhahatthehiṃ’ ga ghapahāviūṇa maha hatthehiṃ || 166 ||’
‘loo jūraï ‘jhūraï’ ka ‘jhūraü’ khajūraü vaaṇijjaṃ hoi hou taṃ ṇāma |
ehi ‘ṇimajjasu’ mudritagāthāsapta॰ṇimajjasu‘ṇisijjasu’ ka kha, ‘ṇisajjasu’ ga gha pāse pupphavaï ṇa ei me ṇiddā || 167 ||’
[lokaḥ khidyate khidyatu vacanīyaṃ bhavati bhavatu tannāma |
ehi nimajja pārśve puṣpavati naiti me nidrā ||]

div.p: ādigrahaṇena bhāvādayo gṛhyante | teṣu bhāvāḥ striyāṃ yathā—

lg.l: jāva ṇa kuvalaadala‘sacchāhāiṁ’ khasacchahāiṁ maüleṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ || 168 ||’

[‘dehīti śeṣaḥ | desu dhaa majjha’ kvacit | atra he dhava, mamāvakāśaṃ dehīti yojyam |’ kecittu ‘desu haamajjha’ iti padacchedaḥ hatamadhya aṅgavinyāsaruddhamadhya=dehi avakāśam arthānmama ityāhuḥ’ iti gāthāsaptaśatyā vyākhyātā gaṅgādharabhaṭṭa iti gā. sa. vyākhyātāalīkaprasuptavinimīlitākṣa he subhaga mamāvakāśam |
‘jāo so vi vilakkho mae vi hasiūṇa gāḍhamuvagụ̄dho |
‘prathametyanurāgātiśayena priyasparśātpūrvameva skhalitasya vasanasya granthim’prathamāpasṛtasya nivasanasya granthiṃ vimārgayamāṇaḥ ||]
so vi hasaṃtīeĕ mae gahio vīeṇa kaṃṭhammi || 171 ||’
so 'pi hasantyā mayā gṛhīto dvitīyena kaṇṭhe ||]
‘aï diara kiṃ ṇa ‘dicchī’ ga ghapecchasi āāsaṃ kiṃ muhā paloesi |
jāāi bāhumūlaṃ mi ‘addhaandāṇa’ ka kha ga addhaandāṇaṁ paḍivāḍiṃ || 173 ||’
[ayi devara kiṃ na prekṣasa ākāśaṃ kiṃ mudhā pralokayasi |
‘asamattamaṃḍaṇaccia‘asamattamaḍaṇā via’ mudritagāthāsapta॰, ‘maṃḍaṇaṃ via’ ka vacca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa |

‘koue halahalahalam’ deśī nāmamālā, gāthāsaptaśatyanusāraṃ ca ‘halahalaasya’ pāṭhaḥ | ‘halahalakaṃ kāmautsukyamiti deśī’ kulabāladevaḥ | atra draṣṭavyā śrīpitṛcaraṇānāṃ ṭippaṇībolāviahalahalassaa[assa]putti citte ṇa ‘laggihasi’ kalaggihisi ||’

‘‘ṇavalaïāpāharaṃ’ ka dolāvilāsasamaye 'jattha palāsalayāe jaṇehi païṇāma pucchiā juvaī | akahantī ṇihaṇijjaï ṇiamaviseso ṇavalayā sā ||’ deśīnāmamālāṇavalaï pahāratuṭhṭhāi‘tuṭṭhāe’ ka kha taṃ kaaṃ kiṃ pi haliasoṇhāe |
jaṃ ajja vi juaïjaṇo ghare ghare sikkhiuṃ bhamaï || 175 ||’
yadadyāpi yuvatijano gṛhe gṛhe śikṣituṃ bhramati ||]
helā ‘bhāvaśca hāvaśca’ khahāvaśca bhāvaśca vyājo visrambhabhāṣaṇam |

div.p: tatra nāyakayoḥ prāgasaṃgatayoḥ, saṃgatayośca, saṃgataviyuktayorvā, mithodarśanaśravaṇābhyāmavasthitābhimānajanmā parasparānurāgo 'nyatarānurāgo vābhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmanavāptau satyāṃ samupajāyamānaistaistairutkaṇṭhādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairmanovāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanmabhiścānubhāvairanubaddhaḥ prāptaprāpyaprakarṣāvastho vipralambhaśrṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate | sa caturdhā—pūrvānurāgo, mānaḥ, pravāsaḥ, karuṇaśca ||

lg.l: haṃsa iva darśitāśo mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ || 176 ||’

div.p: atra puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāyāṃ prāgasaṃgatāyāṃ samutpannaḥ saṃkalparamaṇīyo 'bhilāṣastadanāptāvuktaprakāreṇa prakṛṣyamāṇastvayā me ‘sa’ khamānasajanmā dūraṃ nīta ityuttarakāmāvasthayā prakāśyate ||

lg.l: piasahi visamaṃ pemmaṃ maraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ mudritaratnāvalyāṃ tu ‘ṇa vārakkaṃ’ pāṭhaḥ, ‘na pārakyam’ chāyā ca | ‘nā ariṇavantarye’ deśīnāmamālāyāṣṭīkāyāmṇavari ekkaṃ || 177 ||’

div.p: atrāpi prāgvadeva sāgarikāyā vatsarāje 'nurāgaḥ prakṛṣyamāṇo maraṇaṃ śaraṇamityuttarayaiva kāmāvasthayā kathyate ||

lg.l: unmatsareti bahule | ‘unmūrcchanaṃ pratikūlavācā prakopanam’ iti prācīnaṭīkā gaṅgādharabhaṭṭoṭṭaṅkitāummaccharasaṃtāvo puttaa paavī siṇehassa || 178 ||’

div.p: atra premagateḥ svabhāvakauṭilyāddhetumantareṇopajāyamāno nirheturucyate sa eva saheturyathā—

lg.l: ‘‘paḍiutthiā’ ka khapaḍiucchiā ṇa jaṃpaï gahiā vi pphuraï cumbiā rusaï |
tuṇhiṃkā‘tuṇhiṃbhūā’ ka kha ṇavabahuā ‘kaāvarāeṇa’ ghakaāvarāheṇa daïeṇa || 179 ||’
[paripṛṣṭā na jalpati gṛhītāpi sphurati cumvitā ruṣyati |

div.p: atra yadyapyāliṅganāderneti netyādeḥ pratiṣedho na vidyate tathāpi tadartho 'styeveti mānalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate ||

l.seg: ‘svayamāgṛhīta’ iti Dr. R. G. Bhandarkar saṃpādite mālatīmādhaveayamāgṛhītakamanīyakaṅkaṇaḥ
‘tava’ ka gha | mudrite ca ‘viditaḥ kaitavavatsalastava’sakhi mūrtimāniva mahotsavaḥ karaḥ || 180 ||

div.p: atra vivāhānantarameva mālatyāḥ kapālakuṇḍalayāpahārānmādhavamālatyorayaṃ navānurāgaḥ pravāsa ucyate ||

l.seg: krūrastasminnapi na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ || 181 ||’

div.p: saṃgatayorevānyataravyapāye karuṇaḥ | sa strīvyapāye puruṣasya yathā—

lg.l: paralokamasaṃnivṛttaye yadanāmantrya‘yadanāpṛcchya’ iti mudritaraghuvaṃśe gatāsi māmitaḥ || 182 ||’

div.p: sa eva puruṣasya vyapāye striyā yathā—

lg.l: upacārapadaṃ na cedidaṃ tvamanaṅgaḥ kathamakṣatā ratiḥ || 183 ||’

div.p: atrānaṅgaviṣaye rateḥ ‘śokaprakarṣāt’ ka khaśokaprakarṣaḥ karuṇa ityākhyāyate ||
‘hīnapātreṣu’ ghahīnapātrādiṣu caitadābhāsā bhavanti | tatra hīnapātreṣu puṃsi premānurāgo yathā—

lg.l: ullalaï ṇaharaṃjaṇaṃ caṃdilassacandilo nāpitaḥ, caṇḍila iti tu saṃskṛtasamamiti deśīnāmamālāvyākhyā seulliakarassa || 184 ||’
‘paḍhamaghariṇīa samaaṃ ‘tuha’ ka, ‘tua’ khaua piṃḍāre‘piṇḍāraṃ’ kha daraṃ kuṇantammi |
ṇavabahuāi sarosaṃ savva ccia vacchalā mukkā || 185 ||’
navavadhvā saroṣaṃ sarve 'pi ca vatsakā muktāḥ ||]

l.seg: nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā

div.p: atraiva kariṇi‘kariṇīkarūṇo’ ka kha karuṇo yathā—

atha saṃbhogaḥ | tatra nāyakayoḥ prāgasaṃgatayoḥ saṃgataviyuktayorvā
mithaḥ samāgame prāgutpannastadānīṃtano vā ratyākhyaḥ sthāyibhāvo 'bhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmavāptau satyāṃ samupajāyamānairharṣa-dhṛti-smṛti-matiprabhṛtibhirvyabhicāribhāvaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ, ṛtūdyānopagamajalakrīḍāparvatopadeśaprasādhanagṛha‘prasādhanagraha'ga ghamadhupānendūdayādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ, savibhramabhrūkaṭākṣavikṣepālāpasaṃbhramasmitādibhiranubhāvairabhivyajyamāna īpsitamāsādayan, jihāsitaṃ vā jihānaḥ, prāptaprāpyaprakarṣārambhaḥ saṃbhogaśrṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhate | sa caturdhā—prathamānurāgānantaraḥ, mānānantaraḥ, pravāsānantaraḥ, karuṇānantara iti ||

lg.l: ‘pāṇiggahaṇe ccia‘pāṇiggahaṇe vvia pavvaïeĕ’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘pāṇiggahaṇavvia’ gha pavvaīa ṇāaṃ sahīhiṃ sohaggam |
pāṇosarantamaïraṃ gauḍavahonāmni vākpativiracite prākṛtakāvye ‘phaliyacasayaṃ imā vayaṇaṃ’ pāṭhaḥ, ‘sphaṭikacaṣakameṣā vadanam’ iti chāyā cacasaaṃ va ṇiaṃ muhaṃ bālā || 189 ||’
‘maṃgalavalaaṃ jīaṃ va rakkhiaṃ jaṃ paütthavaïāi‘capajjhiavaïāe’ ka kha |
‘ṇa muammi‘muamhi’ gha mue vi pie diṭṭho uṇa piṃaamo jiaṃtīe |
ia lajjā a ‘parihāso’ ka, ‘pahārihāso’ ca khapahariso tīe hiae ṇa saṃmāi || 191 ||’
[na mṛtāsmi mṛte 'pi priye dṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ priyatamo jīvantyā |
iti lajjā ca praharṣastasyā hṛdaye na saṃmāti ||]

l.seg: ‘induryatra na nindyate na madhuraṃ dūtīvacaḥ śrūyate
‘nālāpā nipatanti vāṣpakaluṣā’nocchvāsā hṛdayaṃ dahantyaśiśirā nopaiti kārśyaṃ vapuḥ |

lg.l: aṇamaāiṃ vva sijjhanti māṇasāiṃ ṇāi‘ṇāiṃ’ kha mihuṇāṇam 193’
‘na martyalokastridivātprahīyate mriyeta nāgre yadi vallabho janaḥ |
nivṛttameva tridivaprayojanaṃ mṛtaḥ sa cejjīvata eva jīvati 195’
‘pecchaï ‘aladdhalacchadī ha’ ka khaaladdhalakkhaṃ dīhaṃ ṇīsasaï suṇṇaaṃ hasaï |
jaï jaṃpaï aphuḍatthaṃ taha se hiaaṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ vi || 200 ||’
‘so tuha‘tujjha kae sundari’ kā. mā. mudritagāthāsapta॰ kaeṇa suṃdari taha ‘jhīṇo’ ka khajhīṇo sumahilo haliaütto |
jaha se macchariṇīa vi doccaṃ jāāe paḍibaṇṇam 201’
[sa tava kṛtena sundari tathā kṣīṇaḥ sumahilo hālikaputraḥ |
‘‘kāṇḍujjuā’ gāthāsapta॰ kāṇḍavadṛjukā, ‘kaṇṇujjuā’ iti pāṭhe karṇaṛjukā karṇadurbaletyartha iti ṭīkākṛt | ‘alasā ia ruṇṇaviambhiāi’ gāthāsapta॰kaṇṇujjuā varāī sā ajja tae kaāvarāheṇa |

l.seg: dvārāttrasyati citrakelisadaso‘citrakelisadane’ ka veṣaṃ viṣaṃ manyate |
‘tiṣṭhaḥ dvāri bhavāṅgaṇe vraja bahiḥ ‘sa preti’ khasadmeti vartmekṣate
dūtīṃ saṃdiśa saṃdiśeti bahuśaḥ saṃdiśya sāste tathā
talpe kalpamayīva nirghṛṇa yathā nāntaṃ niśā gacchati 209’
‘ramyaṃ dveṣṭiṃ pusa yathā prakṛtibhirna pratyahaṃ sevyate
gotreṣu skhalitastadā bhavati sa‘ca’ ka mudrite 'bhijñānaśākuntale ca vrīḍāvanamraściram 210’

lg.l: ‘vaeṇaaluppamuhīe tīe’ ka, ‘vaṇavaaluppamuhūe tīe’ khavaṇṇagghaalippamuhīa tīa pariuṃbaṃṇaṃ marimo || 212 ||’
jaha dūsahe vi‘vi’ ka kha nāsti gimhe aṇṇoṇṇāliṃgaṇasuhellīgāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘sukhakeliḥ’ iti cchāyā | deśīnāmamālāyāṃ tu 'suhe suhellīa’ iti, ‘suhellī sukham suhallītyanye’ iti ṭīkā ca || 213 ||’
‘jaha jaha se pariuṃbaï‘paḍiuṃbaï’ kha maṇṇubhariāiṃ’ ṇihuvaṇe daïo |
acchīiṃ uvari uvari taha taha bhiṇṇāiṃ vigalaṃti || 214 ||’
gāthāsapta॰ ‘avaūhaṇassa’ iti, ‘avagūhanasya’ iti cchāyā cauvaūhaṇassa bhaddaṃ raïṇāḍaapuvvaraṃgassa || 215 ||’
‘candrāpīḍaṃ sā ca jagrāha kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhasthānaṃ jīvitaṃ ca prapede |
tenāpūrvāṃ sā samullāsalakṣmīminduṃ spṛṣṭvā sindhuveleva bheje 217’

div.p: ‘prathamarāgānantaraṃ daśanakṣataṃ’ ka, ‘prathamānurāgānantaraṃ daśanakṣataṃ’ khaprathamānurāgānantare dantakṣataṃ yathā—

lg.l: ‘ṇāsaṃ va sā kavole ajja vi tuha daṃtamaṃḍalaṃ bālā |

‘pavaṇuvvelliasāhuli‘vatthabbhūbhuasāhāpikisarisasahīsu sāhulī cea |’ iti deśīnāmamālā, ‘sāhulī vastraṃ bhurbhujaḥ śākhā pikī sadṛśaḥ sakhī ceti saptārdhāḥ’ iti taṭṭakā ca ‘thaeva suṭhaṭhia’ ka, ‘tthaevasaṭṭia’ khaṭhaesu ṭhiadaṃtamaṃḍale ūrū |
‘caṭuāraaṃ mā duputti’ ka, ‘caṭuāraaṃ māi putti’ kha, ‘païṃ’ iti nāstveva ka khacaḍuāraaṃ païṃ mā hu putti ‘jaṇahāsaaṃ’ ka jaṇahāsiaṃ kuṇasu || 299 ||’
caṭukārakaṃ patiṃ mā khalu putri janahasitaṃ kuru ||]
‘paḍighummirā’ ka, ‘paḍighummirā a’ khaparighummirā a diṭṭhī piāgamaṃ sāhaï vahūe || 220 ||’
parighūrṇanaśīlā ca dṛṣṭiḥ priyāgamaṃ sādhayati vadhvāḥ ||]
‘purisāirīsu’ iti gāthāsapta॰purisāiasīrisu kāmo piāsu sajjāuho vasaï || 222 ||’
‘poḍhamahilāṇaṃ jaṃ suṭṭhu sikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei‘khae suhāvedi’ ka, ‘raïe suhāvedi’ kha |
‘jaṃ jeṇa’ khajaṃ jaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇaṃ taṃ taṃ ‘raïṃ’ ka khadhiiṃ deṭṭha || 223 ||’
‘haṃho kaṇṇullīṇā bhaṇāmi re suhaa kiṃ pi mā jūra‘mā jhūra’ ka, ‘bhāsura’ kha |
ṇijjaṇapāraddhīsu‘pāraddhīsu’ kha, ‘pāṇaddhī racchāe’ iti deśīnāmamālā tue kahiṃ‘kahaṃ pi’ kha vi puṇṇehiṃ laddhosi || 224 ||’
[haṃho karṇollīnā bhaṇāmi re subhaga kimapi mā khidyasva |
aṇuaṃpāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā ‘āḍhamuvaụ̄dhā’ iti gāthāsapta॰gāḍhamuvaụ̄dhā || 225 ||’
‘ajja vi seaṃjalollaṃ pavvāi ṇa tīa haliasoṇhāe |
phaggucchaṇa‘cikkhallo kaddamae’ iti deśīnāmamālācikkhi(kkha)llaṃ jaṃ taï diṇṇaṃ thaṇucchaṅge 226’
‘tatto ccia ṇenti‘honti’ iti gāthāsaptaśatyāṃ ‘bhavanti’ iti tacchāyā ca kahā ‘kiasaṃti’ ka, ‘kiāsaṃti’ khaviasaṃti tarhi ‘samatthanti’ ka, ‘samatthanti’ khasamappanti |
kiṃ maṇṇe māucchā ekkajuāṇo imo gāmo || 227 ||’
[tata eva niryānti kathā vikasanti tatra tatra samāpyante |
‘teṇa ira ṇavalaāe diṇṇo paharo imīa thaṇavaṭṭhe |
gāmataruṇīhiṃ ajja vi diahaṃ parivāliā bhamaï || 228 ||’
[tena kila dolāvilāse daktaḥ prahāra etasyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe |
parikuviā iva‘via’ gha sāhaï ‘salāharī’ ghasalāhirī gāmataruṇīṇam || 229 ||’
‘jaï so ṇa ‘vallaho vvia gottaggahaṇeṇa’ gāthāsapta॰vallaha ccia ṇāmaggahaṇena tassa sahi kīsa |
hoi muhaṃ te raviaraphaṃsavisaṭṭaṃ‘phaṃsavvisadaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘phaṃsavisaddaṃ’ gha va tāmarasam || 230 ||’
[yadi sa na vallabha eva nāmagrahaṇena tasya sakhi kimiti |

‘hūraṃ’ (?) ka dūtamiti bhavetdūiṃ ‘paṭṭhāentī’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘prasthāpayantī (saṃdiśantī vā)’ iti cchāyā ca |‘saṃdiṭṭhaṃ appāhiyam’ iti dhanapālasya ‘pāiyalacchī’ iti nāmamālāappāheṃtī tasse a gharaṃgaṇaṃ pattā || 231 ||’
‘kaha ṇu gaā kaha diṭṭhā‘diṭṭhī’ ka kiṃ bhaṇiā kiṃ ca teṇa paḍivaṇṇaṃ‘paḍivaaṇaṃ’ ka kha |
eaṃ cia ṇa samappaï punaruttaṃ ‘jaṃpmāṇāe’ ghajaṃpamāṇīe || 232 ||’
[kathaṃ nu gatā kathaṃ dṛṣṭā kiṃ bhaṇitā kiṃ ca tena pratipannam |
sotthi ccia‘vvia’ gāthāsapta॰ ṇa samappaï piasahi lehammi kiṃ lihino || 233 ||’
svastyeva na samāpyate priyasakhi lekhe kiṃ likhāmaḥ ||]

l.seg: ‘prītyā svastipadaṃ vilokitavatī sthānaṃ stutaṃ‘śrutaṃ’ kha tuṣṭayā

lg.l: ‘kiṃ kiṃ de paḍihāsaï sahīhiṁ ia pucchiāi‘pucchiāeṁ muddhāe’ gāthāsapta॰ ka kha muddhāiṁ |
paḍhamullaadohaliṇīa‘paḍhamuggaadohaṇīe’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘yaḍhamulluahalidoṇīe’ ka, ‘paḍhamullaadohaliṇīe’ kha ‘ṇavaraṃ’ gāthāsapta॰ṇavari daïaṃ gaā diṭṭhī || 236 ||’
[kiṃ kiṃ te pratibhāsate sakhībhiriti pṛṣṭāyā mugdhāyāḥ |

div.p: atraiva pragalbhāyāḥ priyavākyavarṇanena‘priyavākyavarṇanaṃ yathā’ ka kha yathā—

lg.l: ‘huṃhuṃ ‘de bhaṇasu’ ka khahe bhaṇasu puṇo ṇa suaṃti karei kālavikkheaṃ |
[huṃhuṃ he bhaṇa punarna svapanti karoti kālavikṣepam |

div.p: mānānantare striyāḥ ‘kaitavasvapne yathā—’ ka khakaitavasmaraṇena yathā—

lg.l: ‘bhiuḍīa‘bhiuḍīrhi’ ka kha puloissaṃ ṇivbhacchissaṃ‘ṇimbhacchissaṃ’ ka parammuhī hossam |
jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahio jaï taṃ ṇa pecchissam 239’
yadbhaṇata tatkariṣye sakhyo yadi taṃ na prekṣiṣye ||]
bhrūyugena sapadi pratipede romabhiśca samameva vibhedaḥ || 240 ||’
‘‘atthakkā’ ka kha acchakkāgaahiae bahuā ‘daïaṭhammi jaṇapurao’ ka kha daïammi gurupurao |
‘ūraï’ ka khajūraï vialaṃtāṇaṃ harisavisaṭṭāṇa‘visaṭṭhāṇa’ kha valaāṇam || 241 ||’
‘ramiūṇa ‘paaṃ pi gao’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘padamapi gataḥ’ iti cchāyā, ‘païmmi gae’ ka kha gapaammi gae (o)jāhe avaūhiuṃ paḍinivṛtto‘paḍiniutto’ ka kha, gāthāsapta॰ |
ahaaṃ ‘paütthapaïā vva’ iti gāthāsapta॰paütthapaïavva takkhaṇaṃ so pavāsivva || 242 ||’
‘hoṃtapahiassa jāā āpṛcchanaṃ gamanapraśna priye yāmyahamityevaṃrūpaḥ | ‘jīva’ ka khaāucchaṇajīaadhāraṇarahassam |
pucchantīṃ bhamaï gharaṃ ghareṇa piavirahasahirīo‘sihirio’ ka, ‘sihiriā’ kha || 243 ||’
‘ekko vi kālasāro ṇa dei gaṃtuṃ paāhiṇa valanto‘vasanto’ kha |
kiṃ uṇa bāhāuliaṃ loaṇajualaṃ miacchīe‘piaamāe’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maacchīe’ ka kha ga gha || 244 ||’
[eko 'pi kṛṣṇasāro na dadāti gantu pradakṣiṇaṃ valan |
‘ullāaï se aṃgaṃ ūrū vevanti ‘kūbalaṃ jaghaṇavasaṇe’ iti deśīnāmamālākūvalo galaï |
‘chuchu ele’ ka, ‘chucchurā(e)le’ khaucchucchulei hiaaṃ piāame pupphavaïāi‘puphuiāe’ ka, ‘pupphaïāie kha || 245 ||’
‘‘kiṃ ṇa bhaṇiosi’ gāthāsapta॰, ka khakiṃ bhaṇiosi ṇa vālaa gāmaṇidhūāi‘gāmaṇidhūāi’ ka kha guruaṇasamakkham |

div.p: atra ‘vakrekṣitādibhiḥ’ ga gha, ‘vaktekṣitādibhiḥ’ khavakrekṣitādibhiḥ pratiśrutyāliṅganādayo hrībhayādibhirna dīyante || māne visaṃvādanaṃ yathā—

lg.l: ‘aṇṇua ṇāhaṃ kuviā uvaūhasu‘uvahūasu’ ka kha, ‘uvahuhasu’ ga kiṃ muhā pasāemi |
tuha maṇṇusamuppaṇṇeṇa majjha māṇeṇa‘māṇeṇāvi’ ga viṇa kajjam || 248 ||’
[ajña nāhaṃ kupitā upagūhasva kiṃ mudhā prasādayāmi |
tava manyusamutpannena mama mānenāpi na kāryam ||]

div.p:
atra māninī pūrvamāliṅganādīnniṣidhya paścādayathāvatprayacchati yathā kaścidaṣṭau ‘aṣṭaśatam’ ka khaśatāni pradāsyāmīti pratiśrutyāṣṭabhira‘aṣṭābhiḥ’ ka khadhikaṃ śataṃ praya-
cchati na tvaṣṭau śatānīti | tadetavdyalīka‘viprayogādibhiḥ’ ka khavipriyādibhirāliṅganādīnāṃ nirākaraṇamayathāvatpradānatvādvisaṃvādanamevocyate ||

lg.l: ‘‘ehaï’ gāthāsapta॰ehii so vi‘vi’ ka kha paüttho ‘ahaṃ a’ gāthāsapta॰ |‘ahaṃ ca’ iti cchāyā caahaaṃ kuppejja so vi‘vi’ ka kha nāsti aṇuṇejja |
‘iaphalaï kassa vi’ ka kha ia kassa vi phalaï ‘maṇorahāṇa’ ka kha ga, ‘manorahāṇa’ ghamaṇorahāṇaṁ mālā piaamammi || 249 ||’
iti kasyāpi phalati manorathānāṃ mālā priyatame ||]
‘‘samavaṭhṭhiāṇa’ ka, ‘samavaṭṭiāṇa’ kha ga, ‘samavạdḥdhiāṇa’ ghasamasokkhadukkhaparivaḍ̣dhiāṇaṁ kāleṇa rūḍhapemmāṇaṃ‘rūḍhapemmāṇa’ ka gha |
‘bhihuṇāṇa’ ghamihuṇāṇaṁ maraï jaṃ taṃ khu jiaï iaraṃ muaṃ hoi || 250 ||’
punarakāṇḍavivartanadāruṇaḥ Dr. R. G. Bhandarkar saṃpādite mālatīmādhave ‘vidhiraho viśinaṣṭi manorujam’ ityapi pāṭhaḥpraviśinaṣṭi vidhirmanaso rujam 251’

div.p: ityayamarthaḥ saṃbadhyate | tasya ca pratyādānamevārtho bhavati ||

lg.l: ‘diṭṭhāi‘diṭhṭhāe’ ka kha jaṃ ṇa diṭṭho‘diṭhṭhā’ kha ālaviāe vi jaṃ ṇa ālatto |
uvaāro jaṃ ṇa kao taṃ cia‘via’ ga kaliaṃ chaïllehiṃ || 252 ||’

div.p: atra vrīḍādibhi‘darśanādibhiḥ’ ka kha nāstiradarśanādibhirvañca‘vañcanābhiḥ’ kha nāstinādibhirvaividhyaṃ pratīyate ||

lg.l: ‘ṇa muaṃti ‘dīhasāsaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰dīhasāse ṇa ruaṃti ‘ciraṃ ṇa honti kisiāo’ iti gāthāsapta॰ṇa honti virahakisiā o |
dhaṇṇāŏ tāŏ jāṇaṃ bahuvallaha vallaho ṇa tumam || 253 ||’
[na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsān na rudanti na bhavanti virahakṛśāḥ |
dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha vallabho na tvam ||]
‘kaïā gao pio ajja putti ajjeṇa kaï diṇā hoṃti |
ekko eddahamette ‘eddahametto’ ka kha, ‘eddahamatte’ ghabhaṇie mohaṃ gaā kuṃvarī‘bālā’ ka kha || 254 ||’
[kadā gataḥ priyo 'dya putri adyeti kati dināni bhavanti |
eka etāvanmātre bhaṇite mohaṃ gatā kumārī ||]

div.p: atraikasyāpi divasasya ‘varṣāyamānatayā’ ka khavarṣāyamāṇatayā ‘priyāliṅganādivañcanayā’ ityadhikaṃ ka khaviśeṣato dairghyaṃ pratīyate ||

lg.l: ‘āvāabhaaaraṃ cia‘via’ kha ṇa hoi dukkhassa dāruṇaṃ ‘avasāṇaṃ’ ka khaṇivvahaṇam |
ṇāha jiantīa mae diṭṭhaṃ sahiaṃ a tuha imaṃ avasāṇam ||’
nātha jīvantyā mayā dṛṣṭaṃ soḍhaṃ ca tavedamavasānam ||]
‘sā mahaï tassa ṇhāuṃ aṇusotte sovi se samuvvahaï |

div.p: atra dvayorapyekakālamanyo 'nyānurāgaḥ pratīyate tatraikā lāvaṇyādinā rajyate 'nyaḥ snehādineti ||

lg.l: ‘māmi hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe‘majjamāṇīe’ ka kha |
‘saccaṃ jāṇaï daṭṭhuṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo |
maraü ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇisyaṃ maraṇaṃ vi‘maraṇaṃ vi’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maraṇamapi’ gha salāhaṇijjaṃ se || 258 ||’
[satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ |
mriyatāṃ na tvāṃ bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇamapi ślāghanīyamasyāḥ ||]

div.p: atra na kevalaṃ lāvaṇyādinaiva rajyate kiṃ tarhyanurūpaviṣayiṇābhilāṣeṇāpīti pratīyate ||

lg.l: ‘gahavaïsueṇa samaaṃ saccaṃ aliaṃ va kiṃ viāreṇa‘viarei’ ka kha |
dhaṇṇāi haliakumāriāi‘umāriāi’ ka jaṇammi jaṇavāo‘jaṇavāde’ gha || 259 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapi saubhāgyādiprasiddhikṛtasārūpyaṃ‘ānurūpyaṃ’ ka kha na vidyate tathāpi striyā uttamaprārthanamagarhitatvādanugatameva bhavati | so 'yaṃ ‘karaṇasādhāraṇasādhanotpatti’ ka, ‘karuṇasādhāraṇa’ khakaraṇasādhanotpattipakṣe uktaḥ | bhāvasādhanapakṣe tu sahārthādiviśiṣṭā ratirdīptirvānurāgaśabdenocyate | ‘sarvatra’ ityadhikaṃ ka khaprathamaṃ copajāyamānatvādayaṃ prathamānurāga iti ‘prathate’ ityasya sthāne ‘prathamato’ ityagre ‘saṃbaddhamāste’ ka khaprathate ||
māne ‘prathamato māne’ ka, ‘prathamato mānaḥ mānyate’ khamānyate yeneti yathā—

lg.l: ‘pāapaḍaṇāṇaṁ muddhe rahasavalāmoḍia'balāmoḍicumbiavvāṇaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘balātkāracumbitavyānām’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘avvāṇa’ khacciavvāṇam |
daṃsaṇametta‘pasaṇṇe’ iti gāthāsapta॰pasijjiri cukkā ‘suhāṇaṃ bahuāṇam’ gāthāsapta॰bahuāṇa sokkhāṇaṁ || 260 ||’

div.p: atra 'māna pūjāyām’ iti dhātoḥ ‘svārthe’ ka khasvārthikaṇijantāṇṇici ghañi ca māna iti rūpam | ‘sa mānaḥ’ ghasa hi preyāṃsamasyāḥ pādapatanādipūjāyāṃ prayojayati ||

lg.l: ‘kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosario |
atthakkapphulla‘phulli’ ka kha gaaṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍaü || 261 ||’

div.p: atra ‘mana jñāne’ iti dhātuḥ | tathā hi mānaṃ priyatvena manyamānā tadapahāriṇe 'ṅkollāya kāpi māninī ‘kāminī’ khakupyati ||

lg.l: ‘jattha ṇa ujjāgarao jattha ṇa īsāvisūraṇaṃ māṇam |
‘sambā va cāhuaṃ’ ka, ‘sambāva bāhuaṃ’ khasabbhāvacāṭuaṃ jattha ṇatthi ṇeho tahiṃ ṇatthi || 262 ||’

div.p: atra 'manu avabodhane’ iti dhātuḥ | mānena hi janaḥ premāsti nāsti veti budhyate‘jano budhyate’ ka kha | tasya ca karaṇabhūtasyāpi prādhānyādatra kartṛtvopacāraḥ | tadyathā 'prajñā paśyati no cakṣurdṛṣṭiḥ sārasvatī hi sā |’ iti ||

lg.l: ‘‘ūviā’ kakuviā a saccahāmā‘saccahāsā’ ka same vi bahuāṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe |
[kupitā ca satyabhāmā same 'pi bandhūnāṃ kevalaṃ mānaskhalane |

div.p: atra ‘māṅ māne’ iti dhātoḥ ‘kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam 3|3|113’ iti kartari lyuṭ | ‘ko 'sāvanumāna’ iti bhāṣyaprayogāt | tena ca yadyapi karaṇabhūtenaivātmani rukmiṇyāṃ ca priyapremṇaḥ parimāṇaṃ satyabhāmā pratyāyayati tathāpi pūrvavadihāpyayaṃ ‘pūrvavatkartṛtvenopayujyate’ khapūrvavatkartṛtvenopacaryate ||
pravāse vasata ityupalakṣaṇenātmānamaṅganā na bhūṣayanti‘nātmānamaṅganā bhūṣayanti’ kha yathā—

lg.l: ‘sāhīṇe vi piaame patte vi khaṇe ṇa maṇḍio appā |
‘duggaapaütthavaïaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘durgataproṣitapatikāṃ’ iti cchāyā cadukkhiapaütthavaïaṃ saajjiaṃ‘saajjhiaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰ saṃṭhavaṃtīe || 264 ||’
[svādhīne 'pi priyatame prāpte 'pi kṣaṇe na maṇḍita ātmā |

div.p: atra ‘vasa ācchādane’ ityasya 'prasmarati’ ityādivanniṣedhārthakaprapūrvasya ‘ghañi ca’ ka kha ghañi ‘pravāsa’ kha nāstipravāsa iti rūpaṃ nirūpyate ||

lg.l: ‘āloaṃta‘āloanti’ ka kha disāo sasaṃta jaṃbhaṃta‘jammanta’ (?) gāthāsapta॰ gaṃta roanta |
‘mucchanta’ gāthāsapta॰mujjhaṃta ‘paḍanta khalanta’ ghapaḍaṃta hasaṃta pahia kiṃ te paüttheṇa || 266 ||’
muhyan patan hasan pathika kiṃ tena proṣitena ||]
‘saṃjīvaṇosahimmiva‘saṃjīvaṇosahammiva’ gāthāsapta॰ suassa‘piassa’ ka kha rakkhaï aṇaṇṇavāvārā |

div.p: karuṇe ‘karoteranubhūtopādānārthatve’ ka kha, ‘karoterabhūtotpādanārthatve’ ghakaroterbhūtopādanārthatve kurute mūrcchāṃ yathā—

lg.l: ‘‘visaria vioadukkhaṃ’ setubandhe pāṭhaḥ, ‘vismṛtaviyogaduḥkhaṃ’ iti cchāyā cavialiavioaviaṇaṃ takkhaṇa‘piṭhabhaṭhṭha’ setubandhaṃ, ‘pambaṭhṭha’ ka, ‘pamhavva’ gapabbhaṭṭharāmamaraṇāāsam |

div.p: atra sītāyāḥ patiśokaprakarṣeṇābhūtā‘prakarṣeṇa bhūtā’ ka mūrcchotpadyate ||

lg.l: ‘puhavīa ‘hoihi’ ka kha ga, ‘hohii’ setubandhe, ‘hoi’ ghahohii paī bahupurisavisesacaṃcalā rāasirī |
kaha tā mahaccia‘mahaṃ cia’ setubandhe imaṃ ṇīsāmaṇṇaṃ ‘uatthiaṃ’ setubandhe, ‘uaṭṭhiaṃ’ gauvaṭhṭhiaṃ vehavvam || 269 ||’

div.p: ‘atra pravāsaduḥkhena’ ka khaatra rāmaduḥkhena vilapantī ‘sītā vilapantī’ ka kha, ‘sītā’ ga nāstisītedamuccarati ||
‘avasthāpanārthatve’ ka kha gaavasthāpanārthe kurute sāhase mano yathā—

lg.l: caturaiḥ surakāminījanaiḥ priya yāvanna ‘vilobhyase’ mudritakumārasaṃbhave, khavilupyase divi || 270 ||’

l.seg: ‘dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ dvidhā‘śokodvegād’ mudrita uttararāmacarite tu na bhidyate‘na tu bhidyate’ ka kha
vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcati cetanām |
bālā vāmatayaiva ‘me 'dya sutarāṃ’ iti mudrite nāgānandapustakesaṃprati mama prītyai navọdhā priyā || 272 ||’
vāñchantī muhureṇaśāvanayanā paryākulā‘paryākulaṃ’ ka kha roditi || 273 ||’

div.p: atra premṇaḥ svabhāvakuṭilatvānmānavatyāḥ kacagrahaṇena yatpādatāḍanādirūpāḥ kuṭilā‘kuṭilā eva jāyante’ ka, ‘kuṭilā eva saṃbhogā jāyante’ kha eva saṃbhogā jāyante ||
atra ‘uttarārdhe’ ka khauttarārdhenopoṣitasyānnopayoga iva priyālokajanmā pibaterabhyavahāraḥ ‘abhyavahārārthaḥ’ khakathyate ||

atra yatheyaṃ matprāṇabhūtaivamasyā ahamapi jīvitameveti patyā visrambhajo 'nurāgaḥ‘rāga ’ ka kha patnyāḥ punaḥ pretyāpi yatsaṃgamo mayābhilaṣitaḥ so 'yaṃ jīvantyaiva jīviteśvaraḥ samāsādita iti visrambhādatisukhamevānubhūyate ||

lg.l: hiae māṇavaīṇaṃ cireṇa ‘paaṇagaruo’ khapaṇaagaruo pasammaī roso 277’
hṛdaye mānavatīnāṃ cireṇa praṇayagurukaḥ praśāmyati roṣaḥ ||]

l.seg: māsānetāngamaya‘śeṣānmāsān’ mudrite meghadūte caturo locane mīlayitvā |

div.p: atrāmunā virahivākyenāpi nirvekṣyāva iti bhaviṣyatkālopādheḥ ‘praveśānantare’ ka khapravāsānantare 'pyavirudhyamānena taṃ tamātmābhilāṣamityādinā tadānīntanasaṃbhogasya‘bhogyasya’ ka kha saṃpūrṇatvaṃ varṇyate ||

lg.l: pūrvākārādhikatararucā‘pūrvākārādhikacaturayā’ Mr. S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśe, ka ga gha saṃgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu || 279 ||’
‘muhapecchao paī se ‘savīsesadaṃsaṇummaïā’ iti gāthāsapta॰sāvi hu piarūadaṃsaṇummaïā |
do vi kaatthā puhaviṃ‘puhaïṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘amahilapurisaṃ va’ iti gāthāsapta॰apurisamahilaṃ tti maṇṇaṃti || 280 ||’

div.p: atra pūrvārdhe rañjayatyartha uttarārdhe rājatyarthaḥ prathamānurāge saha ‘siddhabhāvena siddhaḥ’ ka khabhāvena siddhastadanantare 'pi tathaivānuvartate ||
atra rañjayatyarthaḥ prathamānurāge puṃsi paścādbhāvena siddhastadanantare 'pi tathaivānuvartate ||
atra rājatyarthaḥ prathamānurāge strīpuṃsayorapyānurūpyeṇa siddhastadanantare 'pi tathaivānuvartate ||

lg.l: ‘sthāne tapo duścarametadarthamaparṇayā pelavayābhitaptam‘pelavayāpi taptaṃ’ iti mudrite kumārasaṃbhave, ‘pelavayādhitaptaṃ’ ka |
yā dāsyamapyasya labheta nārī sā syātkṛtārtha kimutāṅkaśayyām || 283 ||’

div.p:
atra pūrvārdhe rañjayatyarthaḥ ‘prathamānugatārdhattrena’ khaprathamānurāge 'nugatārthatvena siddhastadanantare tathaivānuvartate | so 'yaṃ ‘karuṇasādhanaḥ’ khakaraṇasādhanaḥ pratyayotpattipakṣa uktaḥ | bhāvasādhanapakṣe tu sarvatra sahārthādiviśiṣṭā ratirdīptirvānurāgaśabdenocyamānā tadanantare 'pi samāsasāmarthyādanuvartate | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhīlakṣaṇastatpuruṣaḥ | prathamānurāgasyānantaraḥ‘iti’ ityadhikamatrāsti ka kha prathamānurāgānantara iti | kā ca vṛttiḥ | ajahatsvārthā na hyatra nāyakau mithaḥ samāgatāvapi prathamānurāgamutsṛjataḥ | yuktaṃ punaryadajahatsvārthā parārthābhidhānarūpā vṛttiḥ syāt,
avaśyaṃ hyanena parasyārthamabhidadhātā svārtha utsraṣṭavyaḥ | bāḍhaṃ yuktam | evaṃ hi dṛśyate loke bhikṣuko dvitīyā‘na dvitīyāṃ bhikṣāṃ’ ka, ‘yaddvitīyāṃ bhikṣām’ kha bhikṣāmāsādya pūrvāṃ na jahāti saṃcayāyaiva yatate, evaṃ tārhi dvayordvivacanamiti dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti | kasyā vibhakteḥ | ṣaṣṭhyāḥ | na ṣaṣṭhīsamartho 'nantaraḥ | tarhi prathamāyāḥ | na prathamāsamarthaḥ prathamānurāgaḥ saṃbandhādhikyāt | abhihitaḥ so 'rtho 'nantarbhūtaḥ‘atrāntarbhūtaḥ’ ka kha prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpanna iti sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyati | maivam | iha prathamānurāgānantara ‘ityasmāt’ ka khaityetasmātsamudāyādvibhaktyā utpattavyam | tena ca samudāyenaiko 'rthapiṇḍo‘tena caiko 'rthaḥ’ kha mṛtpiṇḍa ivāvibhāgāpanna‘avibhāgotpanna’ ka khapāṃsūdakavibhāgo 'vayavārthaśaktyānugṛhītaḥ pṛthagavyapadeśyāvayavaśaktirabhidhīyate | tasmiṃśca samudāyārtha ekatvaṃ samavetamato vidyamānāyāmapyavayavasaṃkhyāyāṃ tadāśrayā subutpattirna bhaviṣyati ||
atraiva mānaṃ prati priyatvābhimānārthānvayo‘priyatvābhimānānvayo’ ka kha yathā—

l.seg: rnidheyaḥ‘vidheyaḥ’ ka kha preyāṃste yadi vayamanullaṅghyavacasaḥ |

lg.l: ‘dūmeṃti je muhuttaṃ kuviaṃ dāsavva je‘te’ kha pasāeṃti‘pasāaṃti’ ka kha ga |
te ccia mahilāṇa piā sesā sāmi ccia varāā‘varoā’ kha 286’
[dūnayanti ye muhurtaṃ kupitāṃ dāsā iva ye prasādayanti |
ta eva mahilānāṃ priyāḥ śeṣāḥ svāmina eva varākāḥ ||]

div.p: atrāsyāmapi premāsti ‘na ve ti’ ka kha ghanāsti veti jijñāsuḥ ‘priyaḥ’ nāsti gapriyaḥ priyāṃ kelīgotraskhalanādinā dunoti | sā ca premavatyavaśyamasmai kupyati | sa copalabdhapremā ‘na dāsavadenāṃ pravāsayati’ ka, ‘taddāsavadenāṃ prasādayati’ khadāsavadenāṃ prasādayati | athaiṣātmani premāstitvamavabudhyate‘anubadhyate’ kha | so 'yaṃ mānasiddho 'rthastadanantare 'pyanuvartate ||

lg.l: ‘surakusumehiṃ kalusiaṃ jaï tehiṃ cia puṇo pasāemi tumaṃ |
to pemmassa kisoari avarāhassaṃ a ṇa me kaaṃ aṇurūaṃ‘aṇurūvaṃ’ gha 287’
[surakusumaiḥ kaluṣitāṃ yadi taireva punaḥ prasādayāmi tvām |
tataḥ premṇaḥ kṛśodari aparādhasya ca na me kṛtamanurūpam ||]

div.p:
atra rukmiṇyāḥ surakusumamañjarī dattā mama tu suratarureva preyasā pratipannastadahamasyāḥ ‘sahasraguṇena’ ka khasahasraguṇatvena priyatameti satyabhāmā svapremāṇaṃ-
mimīte‘pramimīte’ kha | sa cāyamartho ‘mānasiddhaḥ’ ka khamānena siddhastadanantare 'pi samāsamāmarthyādanuvartate | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva | kā vṛttiḥ | ‘prathamānurāgānantaram’ ka khaprathamānurāgānantaravadajahatsvārthaiva | yuktaṃ tatra visrambhaṇādāvapi prathamānurāgasya vidyamānatvāt | iha tu mānanivṛttau mānāpagamādayo jāyante | anvayādviśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati | tadyathā—ghṛtaghaṭastailaghaṭa iti niṣikte 'pi ghṛte taile vā ghṛtaghaṭo 'yaṃ‘ayaṃ ghṛtaghaṭaḥ, ayaṃ tailaghaṭaḥ’ ka kha tailaghaṭo 'yamityanvayātpūrvapadārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | ‘bhavati’ kha nāstibhavati tatra yā ca yāvatī ‘vā’ ka khacārthamātrā ihāpi tattulyameva ||

lg.l: ‘sakaaggahataṃsuṇṇāmiāṇaṇā‘rahasuttāṇiāṇaṇā’ iti gāthāsapta॰ kha, ‘rabhasottānitānanā’ iti cchāyā piaï piaamaviiṇṇam‘piamuha viiṇṇam’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘primamukhavitīrṇāṃ’ iti cchāyā ca |
‘thoaṃ thoaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘thoatthoaṃ’ ka, ‘thoathoaṃ’ gha, ‘tthoaṃ tthoaṃ’ khathoaṃ thoaṃ rososadhaṃ‘mahaṃ va’ iti gāthāsapta॰ va māṇaṃsiṇa‘ua māṇiṇī’ iti gāthāsapta॰ maïram || 288 ||’

div.p: sakaṣāyaireva vākyairnāyakaṃ nistudantī śayanīyaṃ gacchediti mānaśeṣānvayo dṛśyate ||
pravāsānantare priyā na vasata ityarthasyānvayo yathā—

lg.l: ‘vasane paridhūsare vasānā ‘niyamakṣāmamukhī dhṛtaikaveṇiḥ’ iti mudrite 'bhijñānaśākuntaleniyamakṣāmatanuḥ kṛtaikaveṇiḥ |
atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghaṃ virahavrataṃ‘virahajvaram’ ka kha bibharti 289’

div.p: atra duṣyantena śakuntalāyāḥ pravāse vibhūṣaṇādyagrahaṇaṃ yadavagataṃ ‘tadānantare’ ka khatattadanantare 'pyanuvartamānaṃ premaprakarṣāya bhavati ||
tatraiva‘atraiva’ ka kha yuvānaḥ priyasaṃnidhau na vasantītyarthasyānvayo yathā—

lg.l: ‘samarthaye yatprathamaṃ priyāṃ prati kṣaṇena tanme parivartate 'nyathā |
ato vinidre sahasā vilocane karomi na sparśavibhāvitāpriyaḥ‘sparśavibhāvitapriyaḥ’ ka kha mudrite vikramorvaśīye ca 290’

div.p: atra purūravāḥ pravāsānmatta urvaśībudhdyā latādikaṃ ‘yadyadāsādayati’ kayadyadāsasāda ‘tattadanekaśo’ ka khatattadānekaśo 'nyathā babhūva | ‘tattatsaṃkārāt’ ka khatatsaṃskārāccāyaṃ yasyā latārūpaparivartanaṃ pratyeti so 'yaṃ priyāsaṃnidhau yūnāmavāsaḥ‘avāsaḥ pravāsaḥ’ ka kha saṃsiddhastadanantare 'pyanuvartate ||

lg.l: ‘‘abbo’ iti khedeabbo dukkaraāraa puṇo vi tartti karesi gamaṇassa |
ajja vi ṇa hoṃti saralā veṇīa taraṃgiṇo ciurā‘cihurā’ ka kha ga 291’

div.p: atra ‘pravāsodbhūta’ ka khapravāsānubhūtabhṛśotkaṇṭhādicittavāsanāḥ‘cittavāsanā’ kha pravāsānantare 'pi tasyā ‘no śāmyatīti’ ka khanopaśāmyantīti veṇikāvarṇanādinā sūcyate ||

atrorvaśī‘virahe’ ka khavirahātpurūravā uttarāṃ ‘kāmāvasthāmāpannaḥ’ ka khakāmāvasthāṃ prapannaḥ priyāprāptau pretyeva pratyujjīvitastadevānusaṃdhatte | so 'yaṃ pramāpaṇārthaḥ pravāsasiddhastadanantare 'pi samāsasāmarthyādanuvartate | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva | kā vṛttiḥ‘kātra vṛttiḥ’ ka kha | na tāvadanutsṛṣṭasvārthā, nahi proṣyasamāgatayoḥ pravāsasaṃbandho 'pi vidyate | utsṛṣṭasvārthā tadiha bhavatu | yuktaṃ punaryadutsṛṣṭasvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt | bāḍhaṃ yuktam | evaṃ hi dṛśyate lokepuruṣo 'yaṃ parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svakarmotsṛjati | tadyathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānastakṣakarmotsṛjati | nanvevaṃ sati rājapuruṣamānayetyukte puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | utsṛjannapyayaṃ svārthaṃ nātyantāyotsṛjati, yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthastamevotsṛjati | tadyathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānastakṣakarmotsṛjati na tu sthitavihasitakampitādīni | na cāyamarthaḥ parārthavirodhī viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma | tasmānnotsrakṣyati ||
atra ‘dākṣāyiṇyā’ ga ghadākṣāyaṇyā haimavatītvena karuṇānantaratvam | tatra karuṇaduḥkhena mūrcchādayaḥ prādurāsan | iha tvānandena te prādurbhavanti ||

l.seg: kliṣṭaṃ yattapasā vapuryadapi ca proktā baṭucchadmanā |

div.p: atra karuṇāvasthāyāṃ priyāpādābjayorluṇṭhatā śokena yo vilāpaḥ kṛtaḥ sa iha prakarṣālāpatvena ‘pariṇamati’ ka khavipariṇamati ||

lg.l: ‘akhaṇḍitaṃ prema labhasva patyurityucyate tābhirumā sma namrā |
‘yadaiva pūrvaṃ jvalane śarīraṃ ‘sākṣādaroṣāt’ ghasā dakṣaroṣātsudatī sasarja |

div.p:
atra yatkaruṇāvasthāyāṃ manaḥ śokaprakarṣeṇābhyaktamāsīttadiha priyāśleṣajanmānā paramānandenābhyajyate | so 'yaṃ ‘karuṇadharmasamanvayaḥ’ ka khakaruṇadharmānvayastadanantare 'pi samāsasāmarthyādbhavati | kaḥ punaratra samāsaḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva | kā vṛttiḥ | jahatsvārthā | na hyatra karuṇārthasya gandho 'pi | kathaṃ tarhyanvayaḥ | yathā mallikāpuṭaḥ campakapuṭa ityatra ‘nigīrṇāsu’ khaniḥkīrṇāsvapi sumanaḥsu mallikādirvāsanāvaśādviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati—ayaṃ mallikāpuṭo 'yaṃ campakapuṭa iti, evaṃ
nivṛtte 'pi svārthe vāsanāvaśātkaruṇo 'nantarasya viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | astu vā prathamānurāgādiṣvapi jahatsvārthaiva vṛttiḥ | nanvevaṃ rājapuruṣamānayetyukte puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | vṛttau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate | sāmarthyaṃ ca bhedaḥ saṃsarga ubhayaṃ vā | tatra rājña ityukte ‘sarvasvaṃ’ ghasarvaṃ svaṃ prasaktam | puruṣa ityukte sarvaḥ svāmī prasaktaḥ | ihedānīṃ rājapuruṣamānayetyukte rājā purūṣaṃ nivartayatyanyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ;puruṣo 'pi rājānamanyebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ‘svebhyaḥ’ ka nāsti | evamasminnubhayato vyavacchinne yadi rājārtho nivartate, kāmaṃ nivartatām | na ‘jātu kvacit’ ka khajātucitpuruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati | ‘prāk pravṛtteḥ’ kha, ‘prāk ca pravṛttaiḥ’ gaprāk ca vṛtterakṛtārthasya nivṛttau sāmarthyābhāvādvṛttireva na syāt | vṛttinimittā ca nivṛttistasmādadoṣa iti | tatra rājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra yadā tāvadavadhṛtaparāyatta‘yatra’ ga ghavṛttirayaṃ puruṣo na svatantrastadā svāmisaṃsargasyāvagatatvātsvāmiviśeṣajñānāyopādīyamāno rājaśabdaḥ svāmyantarebhyaḥ puruṣaṃ vyāvartayati | so 'yaṃ svāmyantaravyavacchedo bheda ‘iti’ kha nāstiityucyate | yadā punaranavagataparāyattabhāvasya puruṣasya svāmisaṃbandhadyotanāya rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate tadā viśeṣasaṃsargasya‘viśeṣasaṃsargaṃ cābhisaṃdhāyopasarjanasya’ kha śabdopādānatvādanavakāśo viśeṣāntarasaṃpāta ityaśabdā‘aśābdī’ ka svāmyantaranivṛttiravasīyate | yadā tvarthāntaranivṛttiṃ vārthasaṃsargaṃ ‘svātmasaṃsargaṃ ca’ ka, ‘svārthasaṃsargaṃ ca’ kha vābhisaṃdhāyopasarjanapadāni prayujyante tadā śabdārthasāmarthyayoḥ pratipattinibandhanayorabhedāpekṣayā‘abhedāpekṣāyām’ ka kha ga pustake pāṭho 'yaṃ truṭitaḥ bhedasaṃsargasamudayaḥ sāmarthyaṃ bhavati | yathā nīlaṃ ca tadutpalaṃ ceti nīlotpalam | prathamaścāsāvanurāgaśceti prathamānurāga iti,
prathamānurāgānantara ityādiṣu ca bhedasāmarthyaṃ yathā rājño bhṛtya iti | yato 'nantara ityukte 'vadhṛtamidaṃ kasyāpyavagheranantaro 'yaṃ na svatantra iti sarvo 'vadhiḥ prasaktaḥ | prathamānurāgasyetyukte sarvaḥ saṃbandhī prasaktaḥ | ihedānīṃ prathamānurāgānantara ityukte prathamānurāgo 'nantaraṃ nivartayatyanyebhyo 'vadhibhyaḥ | anantaraḥ prathamānurāgaṃ nivartayatyanyebhyaḥ saṃbandhibhyaḥ | tatra yo 'sau bhedastatsāmarthyaṃ ca, tannimittā ca vṛttiḥ | bhedanimittāyāṃ ca vṛttau satyāṃ vṛttyabhimukhasya bhedamupajanayyopasarjanasya prathamānurāgasyārtho nivartate | yasyāpi pradhānasyānantarasyāvadhimato nivartate so 'pyavadhimavacchinatti | evamubhayato vyavacchede nirjñāte 'nantaraviśeṣe samudāyārthe cānyasminprādurbhavati | yadi prathamānurāgādyartho nivartate, kāmaṃ nivartatām, na ‘jātu kvacit’ ka khajātucidavadhimanmātrasya saṃpratyayo bhaviṣyati | nanu cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jahatsvārthatvaṃ nopapadyate | tathā hi ‘prathamānurāgānantare’ ityukte kaścicchabdaḥ śrūyate | prathamānurāgetyanantareti ca pratīyamānavibhāgaḥ, artho 'pi kaścidgamyate kanyāvisrambhaṇādiravadhimattvaṃ ca | ‘mānānantare’ ityukte kaścicchabdabhāgo hīyate, kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayī | prathamānurāgeti hīyate, ‘mānyeti’ khamānetyupajāyate, atantara ityanvayī | artho 'pi kaściddhīyate, kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayī | kanyāvisrambhaṇādirhīyate, mānaśaithilyādipajāyate, avadhimattvamanvayi‘anvayitvena’ ka kha | tena manyāmahe yaḥ śabdabhāgo hīyate tasyāsāvarthaḥ; yo 'rtho hīyate, ya upajāyate tasyāyamartho; yo 'rtha upajāyate, yo 'nvayī tasyāsāvartho; yo 'rthaḥ so 'nvayīti | maivam | yato 'nanyathāsiddhābhyāmevānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdā-
rthayoḥ saṃbandhāvadhāraṇam | anyathāsiddhau cemau | tathā hi yatra bṛṃhitaṃ hīyate, hneṣitamupajāyate, reṇucakramanvayi; tatra hastino hīyante, aśvā upajāyante, pipīlikā anvayinyaḥ | na caitāvatā reṇucakrādipipīlikāḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati‘bhavanti’ kha | yatra vā kṣīraṃ hīyate, dadhyupajāyate, pātramanvayi, tatra mādhuryaṃ hīyate, amlatopajāyate, tṛptiranvayinī | na caitāvatā pātrasya tṛptiḥ kāryaṃ bhavati | avadhṛtaṃ hi sāmarthyamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravibhajyate | yathā loke badhiro 'pi cakṣuṣmānālokayati, satyapi śrotra upahatacakṣurnālokayati rūpamityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣuḥśrotrasaṃnidhāne rūpālokanaṃ cakṣuṣa eva vyavasthāpyate na śrotrasya | yasya kevalasya yo 'rtho 'vadhṛtaḥ padārthāntarasaṃnidhāne 'pi tasya sa eva | nahi rasanamasaṃnidhau darśanasya madhurādivyañjakaṃ darśanasaṃnidhau nīlādivyaktiṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ labhate | prathamānurāgaśabdasya kevalasyotkaṇṭhādiṣu, mānaśabdasyerṣyāyitādiṣu, anantaraśabdasya punaravadhimatsveva sāmarthyamavadhṛtamatasteṣāṃ tāvānevārtho bhavati | yaḥ punaḥ padayoranyonyopaśleṣādvisrambhaṇādirmānaśaithilyādirvāvadhimadviśeṣo 'nyāvadhikaḥ pratīyate vākyārthaḥ sa bhavatīti | yadi vā‘ca’ ka kha yathānapekṣitāvayavārthā vṛkṣaśrotriyaśakragopādayaḥ svasāmarthyaniyatamarthamācakṣate tathā saṃghātā evaite prathamānurāgānantarādayo rājapuruṣādayaścānapekṣitāvayavārthā yathāsāmarthyamartheṣu niviśante | nanu cāvyapadeśyapūrvāparavibhāgā ‘abhinnārthābhidhāyinaḥ’ ga ghabhinnārthābhidhāyino vṛkṣādayaḥ pratīyamānabhāgabhedānuyātāḥ saṃbandhipadārthopahitabhedavṛttyabhidhāyinaḥ punarime tatkathaṃ prathamānurāgānantarādayo vṛkṣādivadrụ̄dhiśabdā bhavitumarhanti | tadasat | rụ̄dhiśabdā yaugikā iti vibhāgo 'bhedadarśanādarśanābhyāma‘abhiniviśate’ ka khabhiniviṣṭa-
buddheḥ pratipādanopāya eva | ‘ayathābhiniviṣṭo’ khaapathābhiniviṣṭo hyayaṃ krameṇa tasmādapathā‘apadārthāt’ kannivartayitavyaḥ | tato 'syāpratyabhijñāyamānaprakṛtayaḥ śrotriyakṣatriyādayo darśyante | na hyatra prakṛtirūpamavasīyate | yataḥ prakṛtyarthāvacchinnaḥ pratyayārtho 'bhidhīyate | tato 'navasīyamānāvayavavibhāgā rūḍhayaḥ kāścidupanyasyante | yatrātyantamasaṃbhavo 'vayavārthasya yathā—śakragopāḥ, tailapāyikāḥ, ‘maṇḍapa iti’ ka khamaṇḍapeti | punaḥ kadācitsaṃnihitāvayavārthā jātiviśeṣābhidhāyinaḥ saptaparṇakṛtamālādaya udāhriyante | yataḥ prapalāśo 'pyanudbhinnapalāśo 'pi ca vanaspatiḥ sapta parṇānyasya parvaṇi parvaṇīti saptaparṇa ityākhyāyate | tathā niḥkīrṇakusumastaruranārabdhakalikājālako 'pi kṛtā mālāneneti kṛtamāla ityabhidhīyate | atha ca‘ca’ ka kha ga nāsti pañcāṅgulamivāśvakarṇa iva parṇamasyetyupacaritārthāvayavā jātivācina eva pañcāṅgulāśvakarṇādayo varṇyante | teṣu hi pañcāṅgulādivyapadeśaḥ prodbhidyamānapravālamapi yāvadanuvartate | tataḥ ‘saṃnidhīyamāne 'pi’ ka khasaṃnidhāne 'pyanāśrīyamāṇavṛttipadārthā‘padārthāḥ’ kha lohitaśālirgaurakhara‘gaurasvaraḥ’ kha ityādayo nigadyante | tatra hi sannapi varṇaviśeṣaḥ samudāyasya jātivacanatvācchabdārthatvena nāvasīyate | tadevamayaṃ śakalīkṛtavṛttipadārthābhiniveśaḥ prathamānurāgānantarādāviva rājapuruṣādāvapyavayavābhiniveśaṃ śakyate tyājayitum | ata eva prathamānurāgādīnāṃ vipralambhasaṃbhogādīnāṃ ca pāribhāṣiko 'pi saṃsargaḥ saṃnidhīyata iti ||
prakīrṇakeṣu spṛhayantīvratamaṣṭamīcandrakaḥ | sa hi caitracaturthīto 'ṣṭamacaturthyāmupādīyamānaḥ kāminībhirarcyate | yathā—
yasyāṃ yavasrastareṣvabalā lolanti sā kundacaturthī | yathā—

lg.l: ‘luliā gahavaïdhūā diṇṇaṃ va phalaṃ javehiṃ savisesaṃ |
‘ehiṃ’ khaeṇhiṃ aṇivāriameva ‘sevagohaṇaṃ’ ka, ‘sevaggehaṇaṃ’ khagohaṇaṃ ‘cavara’ kacaraü chettammi || 299 ||’
‘āsaṅghijjaï’ kaāsaṃdhijjaï kāuṃ‘kāo’ ka kha karapellaṇaṇiccalā‘ṇiccatā’ ka kha dolā || 301 ||’

div.p: ekameva ‘sukusumanirbharaṃ’ ka, ‘sukusumanirbharaśālmalivṛkṣaṃ’ khakusumanirbharaṃ śālmalivṛkṣamāśritya sunimīlitakādibhiḥ khelatāṃ krīḍaikaśālmalī | yathā—

lg.l: ‘ko esotti paloṭṭhuṃ‘paladdhaṃ’ kha ‘saṃvali’ kasiṃvalivaliaṃ piaṃ parikkhasaï |
[ka eṣa iti pratyāvartituṃ śālmalivalitaṃ priyaṃ paripātayati |
‘gāmataruṇīo hiaaṃ haraṃti pọdhāṇa‘cheāṇaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘vidagdhānām’ iti cchāyā ca thaṇaharillīo |
‘maaṇe kusumbharañjiakañcu[i]āharaṇamettāo’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘madane kusumbharāgayuktakañcukābharaṇamātrāḥ’ iti cchāyā camaaṇūsaammi kosuṃbhakaṃcuāharaṇamettāo || 303 ||’
‘‘ahaṃ’ khaaha dhāviūṇa‘dhāvijaṇa’ kha saṃjhāmaeṇa‘saṅgamaeṇa’ kha savvaṃgiaṃ paḍicchaṃti |

div.p: yatrottamastriyaḥ pādābhighātenāśokaṃ vikāsya‘vikāśya’ ka kha ga tatkusumamavataṃsayanti sāśokottaṃsikā | yathā—
yatrāṅganābhiścūtamañjaryo 'varujyānaṅgāya ‘bālarāgatvenaiva’ khabāṇatvena dāyaṃ dāyamavataṃsyante sā cūtabhañjikā | yathā—

lg.l: ‘raïaṃ pi tā ṇa sohaï raïjoggaṃ kāmiṇīṇa chaṇaṇevacchaṃ |
kaṇṇe jā ṇa raïjjaï‘jāva ṇa raïjjaï’ ka, ‘jāva ṇa rajjaï’ kha kavolagholaṃtasahaāraṃ‘kavolaghoṇantapallavasahaāraṃ’ ka kha || 306 ||’

div.p: yatra yuvatayo madirāgaṇḍūṣadohadena bakulaṃ vikāsya‘vikāśya’ ka kha ga tatpuṣpāṇyavacinvanti sā puṣpāvacāyikā | yathā—

lg.l: tuṃgasiharaggapaḍaṇassa jaṃ phalaṃ taṃ tue‘tae’ ka kha pattaṃ || 307 ||’

div.p: yatra kaste priyatama iti pṛcchadbhiḥ palāśādinavalatābhiḥ priyo jano hanyate sā cūtalatikā | yathā—

lg.l: ‘‘ṇavalaapaharaṃ’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ṇavalaïpahāramaṃge jahiṁ jahiṁ mahaï dearo dāuṃ |
‘vihalaï se ṇevacchaṃ pammāaï maṃḍaṇaṃ gaī khalaï |
bhūachaṇaṇaccaṇaammi‘ṇaccaṇapāmmi’ kha suhaa mā ṇaṃ ‘puloesu’ ka khapaloesu || 309 ||’

div.p: varṣāsu kadambanīpahāridrakādikusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtaurdvidhā vanaṃ‘dalaṃ’ ka, ‘balaṃ’ kha vibhajya kāminīnāṃ krīḍāḥ‘krīḍā’ kha ga kadambayuddhāni | yathā—

prathamavarṣaṇaprarūḍhanavatṛṇāṅkurāsu sthalīṣu śādvalamabhyarcya bhuktapītānāṃ
kṛtrimavivāhādikrīḍā navapattrikā | ‘tatra’ ghatatra ca varaṇavidhānādau teṣāmevaṃvidhāḥ parihāsā bhavanti | yathā—

lg.l: ‘tā kuṇaha kālaharaṇaṃ tuvarantammi vi vare vivāhassa‘vivālassa’ ka |
‘jāva’ ka, ‘jāvaṃ’ khajā[va] ‘paduṇahavaāi’ khapaṃḍuṇahavaāiṃ hoṃti kumārīa aṃgāiṃ || 311 ||’

div.p: abhinavabisāṅkurodbhedābhirāmaṃ saraḥ samāśritya kāmimithunānāṃ krīḍā bisakhādikā | yathā—

lg.l: ‘saccaṃ caa kaṭṭhamao‘kaṭṭamao’ kha suraṇāho jeṇa haliadhūāe‘dhoāe’ ka, ‘dhīāe’ kha |
hatthehiṁ ‘kamaladalakomalehiṃ’ ga pāṭhastruṭitaḥkamaladalakomalehiṁ chitto ṇa pallavio || 313 ||’
‘aha taï ‘mahatthadiṇṇe’ ka khasahatthadiṇṇo ‘kaha vi’ khakaha vi khalaṃtamattajaṇamajjhe |
‘tiṇṇāthaṇesu’ katissā thaṇesu jāo vilevaṇaṃ komuīvāso‘kemuīvāso’ ka || 314 ||’
‘aṇṇe vi hu‘hi’ ka, ‘asme vi hi’ kha hoṃti chaṇā ‘ṇa’ ka kha nāsti, ‘chaṇā ṇo’ gaṇa uṇo dīāliāsaricchā de‘sariccho de’ ka kha |
jattha jahicchaṃ gammaï ‘piavasadī’ ka kha, ‘piavasaī’ ghapiavasahī ‘dīavamiseṇa’ ka khadīvaamiseṇa || 315 ||’
‘‘vā aṇaggiṇā’ ka, ‘aṇaggiṇā’ khavāaggiṇā karo me ‘daddhotti’ ka khadaṭṭhotti puṇo puṇo ccia kahei‘kahehii’ ka |
haliasuā‘hāliasuā’ ka kha maliacchusadohalī‘dohalā’ ka, ‘dohasā’ kha pāmarajuāṇe‘pāmarajuvāṇe’ ka, ‘pāmarajuvāṇo’ kha || 316 ||’
[nirvāṇāgninā karo me dagdha iti punaḥ punareva kathayati |
paḍhamaṃ hiaaṃ bahuā‘bahuā’ gha ‘pavaṭhṭhā’ khapacchā gaṇḍaṃ sadantavaṇaṃ || 317 ||’
‘ṇaccihii ṇaḍo pecchihii ‘jeṇa pao’ khajaṇavao bhoio‘bhorao’ ka nāyakaḥ |
so vi dūsihii ‘jara’ khajaï ‘raṅgavihaüṇaarī’ kharaṅgavihaḍaṇaarī gahavaïghūā‘gaïvaïdhuā’ ka, ‘gahavaradhuā’ kha ṇa baccihii‘yavaccihii’ ka, ‘paviccihii’ kha ||’
so 'pi dūṣayiṣyati yadi raṅgavighaṭanakarī gṛhapatiduhitā na vrajiṣyati]

l.seg: ‘kelīdyūtavidhau’ ka khakelidyūtavidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati |

lg.l: ‘thoārūḍhamahumaā khaṇa‘pamhuṭṭhā vimhariyā’ iti dhanapālapāiyalacchīnāmamālā | 'pamhaṭṭa’ ka, ‘palhadā’ kha, ‘pamhaṭhā’ ga, ‘pamhaṭhṭhā’ ghapamhaṭṭhāvarāhadiṇṇullāvā |
hasiūṇa saṃṭhavijjaï pieṇa saṃmarialajjiā kāvi piā 321’
hasitvā saṃsthāpyate priyeṇa saṃsmṛtalajjitā kāpi priyā ||]
‘diṭṭhākuviāṇuṇaā piā sahassajaṇapellaṇaṃ pi visahiaṃ‘visahiām’ ka, ‘visahiā’ kha |
jassa ‘ṇisaṇṇaï’ kaṇisaṇṇāi ure sirīe‘sirīa’ ka pemmeṇa lahuio‘lahuaïo’ ka kha appāṇo 322’
yasya niṣaṇṇayorasi śriyā premṇā laghūkṛta ātmā ||]
avāpyate vā kathamanyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiśca tādṛśaḥ 323’
‘kuviāo‘kuviāa’ kha, ‘kuviāa’ ka ga vi pasaṇṇāo ‘oraṇṇamuhīo’ ka, nāsti |‘oṇāmuhīo’ khaoraṇṇamuhīo ‘visamāṇīo’ ityādi gāthāṃśaḥ—ga truṭita evavi samāṇīo |
jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ dhāreṃti a ṇivvaïṃ bālā || 324 ||’

[dhvanyāloke tviyameva gāthaivamudāhṛtā—‘kuviāo pasaṇṇāo oraṇṇamuhīo vihasamāṇāo | jaha gahio taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchintamahilāo ||’ [kupitāḥ prasannā avaruditavadanā vihasantyaḥ | yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ ||] iti cchāyā cakupitā api prasannā avaruditamukhyo 'pi samānāḥ |
yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ dhārayantīva nirvṛtiṃ bālāḥ ||]
‘ṇavi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūmei ‘māṇiīṇī'(?) kamāṇiṇī ahiaṃ |
‘jaï hosi ṇa tassa piā aṇudiahaṃ ṇīsahehiṁ‘dīaha’ ka, ‘aṇudiahaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥ, ‘anudivasaṃ’ iti cchāyā ca aṃgehiṃ |
ṇavasūapīapeūsamaṃtapāḍi vva‘mattapāḍivva’ ka, ‘mao pāḍivva’ kha, ‘mattapāḍivva’ gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥ kiṃ suvasi || 327 ||’
[yadi bhavasi na tasya priyānudivasaṃ niḥsahaiḥ surataśramakhinnairaṅgaiḥniḥsahairaṅgaiḥ |
navasūtapīta pīyūṣeṇābhinavadugdhena mattā pāḍīva vatsikevapīyūṣamattamahiṣīvatsikeva kiṃ svapiṣi ||]
hatthaüḍapāṇiāiṁ vi(va)‘va’ gāthāsapta॰ kāleṇa galaṃti pemmāiṃ‘vāllanti’ ka 'vāllānti’ kha || 328 ||’
‘jaha jaha jarāpariṇao hoi paī duggao virūo vi |
‘kulavāliāṇaṁ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘kulavāliāe’ ka khakulapāliāiṃ taha taha ahiaaraṃ vallaho hoi || 329 ||’
‘āṇia‘pulaobbheo’ ka khapulaübbheo savattipaṇaaparidhūsarammi vi gurue‘garue’ ka, ‘garūe’ kha |
piadaṃsaṇe pavaḍḍhaï ‘mamhaṭhṭhāṇe’ kamaṇṇuṭṭhāṇe vi ‘rummiṇīa’ karuppiṇīa pahariso || 330 ||’
‘ghariṇīa akaïavvaṃ‘kaïavvaṃ’ ka kha caṭuaṃ‘caḍulaṃ’ ka, ‘bahulaṃ’ kha piaame kuṇaṃtammi |
akaatthāiṃ vi jāāi ‘nhatti’ ka, ‘gatti’ khajhaṃti sịdhilāiṃ‘sịdhiliāiṃ’ ka kha aṃgāiṃ || 331 ||’
‘taṃbamuhakaāhoā jaha‘jaha’ ka jaha thaṇaā kileṃti kumarīṇam‘kumārīṇaṃ’ ka |
taha taha laddhāvāsovva vammaho‘mammaho’ gha hiaamāvisaï || 332 ||’
tathā tathā labdhāvāsa iva manmatho hṛdayamāviśati ||]
jaha jatthava tatthava jaha va taha va sabbhāvaramiāiṃ || 333 ||’
yathā yatraiva tatraiva yathā vā tathā vā sadbhāvaramitāni ||]
‘eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrātpituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī |
‘taṃ pulaïaṃ‘pulaïā’ kha ‘pi’ ka kha gavi pecchaï taṃ cia‘taṃcā’ ka, ‘taṃ via’ kha ṇijjhāi‘ṇijjāaïi’ ka, ‘ṇijjā aï’ kha tīa geṇhaï gottaṃ |
‘ghaïaṃ tassā maaṇe’ khaṭhāia tassa samaaṇe aṇṇaṃ vi‘pi’ ka kha ga viciṃtaammi‘vicitaṃaṇi’ kha saccia hiae ||’
[tāṃ pulakitāṃ prekṣate tāmeva nirdhyāyati tasyā gṛhṇāti gotram |
tiṣṭhati tasya samadane anyāmapi vicintayati saiva hṛdaye ||]
‘chitto jehiṃ pi piā’ ka, ‘chitto te jehi’ khachitto jehiṃ piaamo ‘mamaṃ’ itigāthāsapta॰mamamaṃ ‘pi’ ka kha gavi tehiṃ cia‘via’ kha karehiṃ || 337 ||’
spṛṣṭo yaiḥ priyatamo māmapi taireva karaiḥ ||]
‘‘taha’ khatuha ‘virahujjāgario’ ka, ‘virahajjāgario’ khavirahujjāgarao siviṇe vi ṇa‘sa’ ka kha dei daṃsaṇasuhāiṃ |
vāheṇa jahāloaṇaviṇoaṇaṃ‘choaṇaviloaṇaṃ’ ka, ‘loaṇaviloaṇaṃ’ kha pi ‘se haaṃ taṃ pi’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘tasyā hataṃ tadapi’ iti cchāyā case vihaam || 338 ||’
‘‘āi' ka khaaïkovaṇā vi ‘sāsu’ khasāsū ‘ruāviā’ ka, ‘rūāviā’ kha gāthāsapta॰roāviā ‘gaavaīe’ ka kha, ‘gaavaïa’ ghagaavaīa soṇhāe |
‘pāapaḍaṇeṇa māe’ ga ghapāapaḍaṇoṇṇaāe dosu vi‘doṇhavi’ ga gha galiesu valaesu || 339 ||’
‘‘asamaṃto vi’ khaasamatto vi samappaï ‘apariaggahia’ ka, ‘aparigāhia’ khaapariggahialahuo paraguṇālāvo‘paraguṇālāo’ ka |
tassa piāpaḍivaḍ̣dhā‘paḍivạdḥdhā’ ga gha ṇa samappaï raïsuhāsamattā vi kahā || 340 ||’
tasya priyāpratibaddhā na samāpyate ratisukhāsamāptāpi kathā ||]
aha sā bhamaï disāmuhapasāriacchī tuha kaeṇa || 341 ||’
atha sā bhramati diśāmukhaprasāritākṣī tava kṛtena ||]
‘aṇṇaha‘asāhaṇa’ kha ṇa tīraï ccia parivaḍḍhaṃtaa‘gaagaruasaṃtāpaṃ’ gha, ‘garuasaṃlāvaṃ’ ka kha, ‘garuaṃ piaamassa’ iti gāthāsapta॰garuasaṃtāvaṃ |
‘avalaṃbaha ‘māṃ saṃkaruṇarasagāha’ khasā saṃkaha ṇa imā gahalaṃghiā paribbhamaï |
‘jaṃ mucchiā ṇa a suo kalaṃbagaṃdheṇa taṃ guṇe paḍiaṃ |
iaraha gajjiasaddo jīeṇa viṇā ṇa boliṃto || 344 ||’
[yanmūrcchitā na ca śrutaḥ kadambagandhena tadguṇe patitam |
itarathā garjitaśabdo jīvena vinā na vyatikrāmet ||]
‘‘ajjaṃ pi’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ajja vi tāva ekkaṃ ‘māsaṃ’ ka khamāmaṃ ‘bāreha’ ka, ‘dhāreha’ khavārehi piasahi ruaṃtim |

kalliṃ ‘pahiūṇa’ ka kha, ‘jaï ṇa muā tā ṇa roissam’ gāthāsapta॰ | atratyasāhityācāryabhaṭṭamathurānāthaśāstriviracitāsu chāyāryāsu tu—‘adyeva tāvadekaṃ mā rudanīṃ nivārayasvāli | kalye gate tu tasmin na hi rodiṣyāmi yadi na mṛtā ||’uṇa tammi gae jaï ṇa marissaṃ ṇa roissam 345’
[adyāpi tāvadekaṃ mā māṃ vāraya priyasakhi rudantīm |
kalye punastasmin gate yadi na mariṣyāmi na roṣyāmi ||]

div.p: tā imā vipralambhajanmāno dvādaśāpi premapuṣṭibhūmayaḥ saṃbhogeṣu svānurūpāmeva premaprakarṣabhūmikāmāskandayanti ||

lg.l: ‘sa hatvā vālinaṃ vīraṃ‘vīraḥ’ iti S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśe tatpade cirakāṅkṣite |
appaṇaïaṃ pi dūmia‘dūmmia’ kapaṇaï‘paṇaï pi’ ka khaṇihiaeṇa ruppiṇīa ‘viaïṇṇaṃ’ gaviiṇṇam 351’

l.seg: itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṃ kathamapi kṣīṇā niśā jāgrato
‘ślāghyānāṃ guṇināṃ dhuri sthitavati śreṣṭhānvavāyeDr. R. G. Bhandarkar saṃpādite mālatīmādhave tu ‘śreṣṭhānvaye ca tvayi’ iti pāṭhaḥ tvayi
teneyaṃ madayantikādya bhavataḥ prītyai bhavatpreyase‘tava preyase’ mudrite mālatīmādhave

lg.l: ‘‘kahaṇṇa mā jhijjaü’ ka, ‘kahaṃ ṇa hijjaü’ khakaha mā chijjaü majjho imīa kaṃdoṭṭadalasaricchehiṃ |
‘avaūhiapubbadise samaaṃ‘samayaṃ’ ka joṇhāe seviapaosamuhe‘paosaṃ muhe’ ka kha |
māi ṇa jhijjaü ‘araṇī’ ka kharaaṇī varadisāitapacchiammi miaṅke 356’
alliaï tīraṇaliṇiṃ vāāi gamei ‘sahavariṃ’ kasahacariṃ cakkāo‘vakkāo’ ka kha 357’
āliṅgati tīranalinīṃ vācā gamayati sahacarīṃ cakravākaḥ ||]
‘rāmo 'yaṃ jagatīha vikramaguṇairyātaḥ prasiddhiṃ parāmasmadbhāgyaviparyayādyadi paraṃ devo na jānāti tam |

l.seg: ni. sā. mudrite veṇīsaṃhāre tu—‘bhīru bhrātṛśatasya yā bhujaghanacchāyā sukhopāsthitā’ iti pāṭhaḥjīvadbhrātṛśatasya me ‘bhujavanacchāyāṃ’ kabhujabalacchāyāṃ sukhāmāśritā
‘śaktyā vakṣasi magnayā saha mayā mụ̄dhe plavaṅgādhipe
nidrāṇeṣu ca vidravatsu kapiṣu prāptāvakāśe dviṣi |
‘tapo vā śastraṃ vā mudrite mahāvīracarite tu ‘vyavaharati’ iti pāṭhaḥvyapadiśati yaḥ kaścidiha vaḥ
sa darpādu‘uddāmaṃ dviṣamasahamānaṃ’ ka, ‘uddāmastviṣamasahamānaḥ skhalayatu’ iti ca mudrite vīracariteddāmadviṣamasahamānaḥ kalayatu |
arāmāṃ niḥsīradhvajadaśarathīkṛtya vasudhā‘jagatīṃ’ iti mudrite vīracarite-
rdyūtai rātririyaṃ jitā kamalayā devī prasādyādya ca |

lg.l: svāpahetura‘anupāśrito 'nyayā’ iti mudrita uttararāmacaritenupāsito 'nyayā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te || 365 ||’

l.seg: stena svāśayaśuddhireva sukarā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ |
mithyāmānini manyase yadi tadā nityaṃ manovartinī
dhyātā tāmarasākṣi citrapaṭake‘citraphalake’ ka, ‘cittaphalake’ kha kā vā tvadanyā mayā || 367 ||’
prakṛtisubhagā hyete‘hyante’ kha bhāvā madasya ca hetavo
vrajati puruṣo yairunmādaṃ ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ‘navāṅkuśāḥ’ ka kha || 368 ||’
‘kiyatkṛtvā’ khakiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punariha na vedmi bhrukuṭaya-
stathāpi kliśyanmāṃ kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣṭo viramati || 371 ||’

lg.l: anena kalyāṇi mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam |
prasādamākāṅkṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate ||’
‘sabbhāvakomalapulāiaṃ’ ka , ‘sabbhāva komacchapulāiaṃ va’ khasabbhāvakomalaṃ pulaïaṃ ca ṇamimo sumahilāṇaṃ || 374 ||’
‘gahavaïhahūā’ khagahavaïbahuā ‘dullaṅghivāurā haa iha ggāmo’ ka, ‘dullaṅghivāudāhaapa iha ggāmo’ khadullaṃghiavāurā iha ggāme‘ihaa ggāme’ gha || 375 ||’
‘‘takiṃ khaṇa’ khataṃ kira khaṇā virajjasi taṃ kira ‘uvaharasi’ ghauvahasasi ‘alamahilāo’ ka khasaalamahilāo |
ehehi vāravālii ‘aṃsūmaïmalaṃ’ ka khaaṃsū maïlaṃ samuppisimo‘samuppisio’ kha, ‘samuppusimo’ gha || 376 ||’
‘sahiāhiṁ bhaṇṇamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusuṃbhapupphaṃ‘laggakumbhapupputi’ kha tti |
‘paḍivakkhamaṇṇuuṃje‘maṇṇupuñje’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maṇṇuuḍe’ ka, ‘mattaüje’ kha lāvaṇṇaüḍe‘lāvasaüde’ kha aṇaṃgagaakumbhe‘aṇaṅgaakumbha’ kha |
‘‘khiṇṇassa ure païṇo ṭhatrei’ gāthāsapta॰khiṇṇassa ‘ṭhaveiü païṇo’ ka, ‘vaceira païṇo’ khaṭhavei ure païṇo gimhāvaraṇharamiassa‘gimhāvaraṇaharaṇamiassa’ kha |
ollaṃ galantaüpphaṃ‘galantakusumaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ṇhaṇasuandhaṃ ciurabhāram || 379 ||’
‘ṇa vi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūnei māṇiṇī ahiam‘hiaam’ ka |
‘jaï’ ghajaha ‘dūre viamhia’ ka, ‘dūraviamhia’ ga gha, ‘dūre viamia’ khadūraviambhia‘garūa’ khagaruarosamajjhatthabhaṇiehiṃ || 380 ||’

div.p: ‘yatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā’ gha, ‘ayatnāpaneyamānā dhīrā’ ga, ‘ayatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā’ ka kha, ‘apalāyane 'pamānā 'dhīrā’ iti, evaṃ prathame 'pi bhede 'palāyane 'pamānā dhīrā’ itiayatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā yathā—

lg.l: ‘avalaṃbiamāṇaparaṃmuhīa‘parammuhīe’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘ta etassa’ khaeṃtassa māṇiṇi piassa |
‘puṭṭha’ gāthāsapta॰ | ‘puṭhṭhi pulagāmo’ khapuṭṭhipulaüggamo tuha kahei ‘saṃmuhaṭhiaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰saṃmuhaṭṭhiaṃ hiaaṃ || 381 ||’
‘dhariṇīa‘ghariṇīe’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ mahāṇasakammalaggamasimaliieṇa‘masimaïleṇa’ ka kha hattheṇa |
chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā‘gaa païṇa’ ka, ‘gaha païṇā’ kha || 382 ||’
spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā ||]
‘vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṇḍo‘eraṇṇo’ ka, ‘eraṇo’ kha sāhaïvva‘sāhaïvva’ ka taruṇāṇaṃ |
‘ābhā (bhāā?) mi’ khabhāāmi ghare eāiṇitti‘eāiṇi vi’ kha ṇiṃto‘ṇitto’ ka kha paī ruddho || 384 ||’
bibhemi gṛhe ekākinīti niryan patī ruddhaḥ ||]
‘kassa karo bahupuṇṇaphalekkataruṇo tuhaṃ ‘ṇisammihii’ ka kha, ‘ṇisimmihii’ ga gha, ‘visammihaï’ gāthāsapta॰visimmihii |
thaṇapariṇāhe mammahaṇihāṇakalaso vva‘ṇihāṇakalasovva’ ga ‘pārohe’ ka kha ga gha, ‘nidhānakalasevva pāroho’ iti gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥpāroho || 385 ||’
‘paṇaaṃ ‘upaṇaaṃ’ ka , ‘upaṇaaṃ paṇaaṃ’ khapaḍhamapiāe ‘rakkhina(u?) kāmo vi mahurerhi’ karakkhiukāmo vi ‘madhuramadhurerhi’ kha , ‘mahuramahurehi’ ga ghamahuramahurehiṃ |
‘aṇṇamahilāpasaṃgaṃ de deva‘dai dekka’ ka, ‘de dekka’ kha, ‘de devva’ gha karesu amha daïassa‘daraassa’ ka |
purisā ekkaṃtarasā‘ekatarassa’ kha ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti || 388 ||’
puruṣā ekāntarasā na khalu doṣaguṇau vijānanti ||]
‘‘jāṇāi’ kajāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ ‘aṇuṇaaviddaviamāṇaparisesaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘anunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam’ iti cchāyā ca; ‘vihīṇarīamāṇaparisesaṃ’ kaaṇuṇaavihurīamāṇaparisesaṃ |

‘aïrikkami vi’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘vijane 'pi’ iti cchāyā ca | atha ca tatra 'païrikaśabdo 'tirikte païrikketi vijane deśīti kecit | tadā ‘païrikkami vi’ iti pāṭhaḥ | vijane 'pītyarthaḥ’ iti kulabāladevaḥraïvikkamammi viṇaāvalaṃbaṇaṃ sa ccia kuṇantī‘paṅkuṇantī’ ka || 389 ||’
‘jaïā pio ṇa dīsaï bhaṇaha halā kassa kīrae māṇo |
aha diṭṭhammi‘diummi’ ka vi māṇo tā tassa piattaṇaṃ katto‘kaṃso’ ka, ‘kanto’ kha || 390 ||’
[yadā priyo na dṛśyate bhaṇata halā kasya kriyate mānaḥ |
‘‘kaṃḍūe’ ka, ‘kaḍae’ khakaḍue ‘dhūmaṅghāre’ ka, ‘dhūmaghāre’ khadhūmaṃdhāre ‘adbhuttaṇamaggiṇo’ ka, ‘abbhuttaṇamāgāṇo’ khaabbhuttaṇamaggiṇo ‘samappahii’ ghasamappihii |

‘mayena nirmitāṃ padyametat ka nāsti | atha ca ‘taha sā jāṇaï’ ityādigāthātrodāharaṇatvena vartate ‘ātmacchandā svairiṇī yathā’ ityetadīyāvataraṇikāpi nāstyeva | ‘laṅkāṃ labdhvā’ khalabdhvā laṅkāṃ mandodarīmapi |
‘taha sā jāṇaṃi ‘jārā’ khapāvā loe ‘pacchaṇṇām’ khapacchaṇṇamaviṇaaṃ kāum‘kāram’ kha |
jaha paḍhamaṃ cia saccia‘saccia’ kha nāsti ‘lii’ kalikkhaï majjhe carittavaṃtīṇa || 394 ||’
[tathā sā jānāti pāpā loke pracchannamavinayaṃ kartum |
yathā prathamameva saiva lekhyate madhye caritravatīnām‘carittavattīṇa’ ka, ‘carittavatīṇa’ kha ||]
dhūma ccia pajjaliāṇaṃ bahu mao surahidārūṇa || 397 ||’
dhūṃma eva prajvālitānāṃ bahu mataḥ surabhidārūṇām ||]

‘‘paccūsāgaa raṃjitadeha piāloa loaṇāṇaṃda’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘pratyūṣāgata rañjitadeha priyāloka locanānanda’ iti cchāyā ca | atha ‘pratyūṣāgatto dvīpāntarāt, pakṣe mahilāntarāvasathāt | anuraktadehaḥ svabhāvataḥ, pakṣe tadaṅgasaṃgatakuṅgumādinā | trailokyalocanānanda, atha ca strīlokalocanānanda | anyatra dvīpāntare, pakṣe nāyikāntaragṛhe kṣapitaśarvarīka | nabhobhūṣaṇa, pakṣe parastrīdattanakhabhūṣaṇa | bhāsvāniva dūrādevābhivandanīyastvaṃ na tvabhigamya iti ṭīkānirgalitārthaḥ | ‘paccasāgaaṇuravāavattaṃ taïloaloaṇāṇandam’ ka , ‘paccasāgaaṇuratāavattaṃ taïloaloṇāṇanda’ khapaccūsāgaaṇurattadeha taïloaloṇāṇanda |
aṇṇatthakhaviasavvaria ṇahabhūsaṇa diṇavaï‘vaï’ kha ṇamo de || 398 ||’
‘aha so vilakkhahiao mae ‘ahavvāeṁ agahiāṇuṇao’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘abhavyayā agṛhītānunayaḥ’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘ahavāi’ ga ghaahavvāi agaṇiappaṇao |
paravajjaṇaccirīhiṁ tumhehiṁ uvekkhio jaṃ(jeṃ)to‘ṇeṃto’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘niryan’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘janto’ ka, ‘jeto’ kha || 399 ||’
‘aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ vvia‘cia’ ka ga gha, ‘via’ kha, ‘vvia’ iti gāthāsapta॰ vāṇīravaṇammi ‘cukkasaṃkeo’ kacukkasaṃkeā |
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï‘viaggaï’ ka, ‘vimāgaï’ kha pabbhaṭṭhaṇihāṇaṭhāṇaṃ va‘nihaṇaṭāṇava’ ka, ‘nihāṃṇaṭhāṇāvva’ kha || 400 ||’
‘ehii pio tti ṇimisaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīa paḍhamaddhaṃ |
[eṣyati priya iti nimiṣamiva jāgṛtaṃ yāminyāḥ prathamārdham |
‘sāloe ccia‘vvia’ iti gāthāsapta॰ sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï‘dhuaï’ ka kha hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 402 ||’

‘gammihisi ‘gammahisi’ ka, ‘rammihisi tassa ṇaṃ saṃmāra sūrasu’ khatassa pāsaṃ mā ‘jhūrasu’ ka, ‘sundari mā turaa’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘sundarimā tvarasva’ iti ca cchāyājūrasu taruṇi vaḍḍhaü‘vaṭṭhaü’ kha miaṃko |
‘ule duddhammi vaha’ khaduddhe duddhambhiva‘mia’ iti hāthāsapta॰ caṃdiāe‘candiāi’ gāthāsapta॰ ko pecchaï‘pecchāi’ ka muhaṃ de || 403 ||’
[gamiṣyasi tasya pārśvaṃ mā khidyasva taruṇi vardhatāṃ mṛgāṅka |
dugdhe dugdhamiva candrikāyāṃ kaḥ prekṣate mukhaṃ te ||]
‘āsaü’ ka khaāsasu paütthavaïe ṇa hoṃti ṇavapāusabbhāiṃ || 404 ||’

l.seg: stheyaṃ putri nirannayā tadadhunā kiṃcinmukhe dīyatām |
paryaste 'hani kalpitaśca kavalo dhautaśva ‘dhārāmbubhiḥ’ ka khadhārāśrubhiḥ || 405 ||’

lg.l: ‘‘jadicchaśe’ iti Bombay Sanskrit Series mudrite mṛcchakaṭike | ‘paliśca le’ gā, ‘paliṃśca le’ ghapalicca le ‘lambadaśāviśālaṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭikelaṃbadaśākalāaṃ pāvālaaṃ ‘śuttaśadehiṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭikeśuttaśadeṇa ‘juttaṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike, ‘chatram’ ka khachattaṃ |

maṃśaṃ ca khāduṃ‘khāduṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike kha ‘taha tuṣṭi kāduṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike, ‘tuha tuṭṭi kāduṃ’ khatuha oṭṭhakāṃhiṁ cuṃkuścakuścucukuścukuṃti‘cuhū cuhū cukku cuhū cuhūtti’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike || 406 ||’
māṃsaṃ ca khādituṃ tava oṣṭhakābhyāṃ cukuścukuścukkucukuścukuṃti ||]

l.seg: ‘‘kaṃbalivāṇṇie’ ka, ‘kaṃbalavāṇie’ kha, kaṃbalavālie’ vakaṃbalivālie kaṃtti‘katti’ ka kha ‘kuṭṭaṃmaladanti’ ka khakuḍammaladanti
sahiṃ kharāvidupopphali‘pupphali’ kha ṇa lekīsi‘lokī’ ka kha ṇa āgasi || 407 ||’

div.p: amātyādirādirāsanārhaḥ pāṣaṇḍādirvā pīṭhamardaḥ | tayoramātyeṣu mālyavān yathā—

l.seg: ‘hā vatsāḥ kharadūṣaṇatriśiraso vadhyāḥ stha pāpasya me
hā hā vatsa vibhīṣaṇa tvamapi me kāryeṇa heyaḥ ‘sthiteḥ’ iti mudrite mahāvīracaritesthitaḥ |
hā madvatsala vatsa rāvaṇa mahatpaśyāmi te saṃkaṭaṃ
vatse kaikasi‘naikaśi’ ka, ‘naikaṣi’ ga, ‘naikapi’ gha hā hatāsi ‘na cirāt’ iti mudrite vīracaritena ciraṃ trīnputrakāndrakṣyasi 408’
thambhemi tassa vi raïssa‘radassa gaī’ ka kha, ‘ravissa rahaṃ’ iti ca kāvyamālāmudritakarpūramañjaryām rahaṃ ṇahaddhe |
taṃ ṇatthi bhūmivalae‘bhūmivalaye’ ka maha jaṃ ṇa ‘sajjam’ ka kha mudritakarpūramañjaryāṃ casajjham || 409 ||’

lg.l: [darśayāmi tamapi śaśinaṃ vasudhāvatīrṇaṃ stabhnāmi tasyāpi rave rathaṃ nabho 'rdhe |
ānayāmi yakṣasurasiddhagaṇāṅganāstannāsti bhūmivalaye mama yanna sādhyam ||]

l.seg: ‘te kiṃ ca’ Harvard Oriental Series mudritāyāṃ karpūramañjaryām, kāvyamālāmudritāyāṃ caruccaṃti muddhaviaïllapasūṇapuṃjā || 410 ||’

lg.l: [puṣpotkaraṃ kalamabhaktasamaṃ vahanti ye sinduvāraviṭapā mama vallabhāste |
ye gālitasya mahiṣīdadhnaḥ sadṛkṣā rocante mugdhavicakilaprasūnapuñjāḥ ||]
‘śakāra kiṃ prārthanayā prāvāreṇāmiṣeṇa vā‘prāvāreṇa miṣeṇa vā’ ka, ‘prāvāreṇāmiṣeṇa vā’ gha |
‘ākāryavarjaṃ’ gaakāryavarjaṃ me brūhi kimabhīṣṭaṃ ‘karoti’ ga karomi te || 411 ||’
yasya vīryeṇa kṛtino vayaṃ ca bhuvanāni ca || 413 ||’
nītā ‘katipayāhena’ Dr, R. G. Bhandarkar mudrite mālatīmādhavekatipayāhobhiḥ sakhī visrambhasevyatām || 416 ||’
‘jāṇaï siṇehabhaṇiaṃ mā raaṇiaritti me ‘jaüchase’ ghajuucchasu vaaṇam |
ujjāṇammi ‘vaṇimmi’ kavaṇammi a jaṃ surahiṃ taṃ laāṇa ‘geṇhaï’ kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhegheppaï kusumaṃ 417’
[jānaki snehabhaṇitaṃ mā rajanīcarīti me jugupsasva vacanam |
udyāne vane ca yatsurabhi tallatānāṃ gṛhyate kusumam ||]

l.seg: siddhā ‘sātha’ ga ghasāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo
rvanamasi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā |
kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa kava priyaḥ || 421 ||’

lg.l: ātmakarmakṣamaṃ dehaṃ kṣāttro dharma ivāśritaḥ‘ivāsthitaḥ’ ga || 422 ||’

l.seg: ‘ko 'yaṃ bhāmini bhūṣaṇaṃ kitava te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ kuṅkumā-
tkūrpāsāntaritaḥ priye vinimayaḥ paśyāparaṃ ‘kāsti’ khakvāsti me |

lg.l: ‘kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te |
ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti || 425 ||’

l.seg: ‘‘jñātā’ mudrite mahāvīracaritekhyātā eva vayaṃ jagatsu caritairvāgbhiḥ kimākhyāyate
saṃyatto bhava ‘satyamasti’ mudrite vīracariteśaktirasti bhavataḥ satyaṃ manuṣyo bhavān |
śastrairavyavadhīyamānayaśasaḥ‘vijayāḥ’ mudrite vīracarite prāyo vayaṃ teṣu ce-
tprāhuste nanu santi‘grāhaste sukhamāśvasanti’ mudrite vīracarite te 'pi girayo yairvānarāḥ śastriṇaḥ || 428’

lg.l: ‘‘mānuṣībhyaḥ’ khamānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya saṃbhavaḥ |

l.seg: ‘‘bhrabhaṅge’ mudritaratnāvalyāmbhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi‘sahasā kṛte 'pi’ ka vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā-
mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajalīkṛtaṃ‘antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ’ kha, mudritaratnāvalyāṃ ca prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ
kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na ‘pratyayaḥ’ khapratyayaḥ || 431 ||’

lg.l: ‘tāṃ nāradaḥ kāmacaraḥ kadācitkanyāṃ kila prekṣya pituḥ samīpe |
kaha tā ‘ācintijjaṃ’ ka khaciṃtijjaṃtaṃ‘cintiasulahaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhe mahilāsarisaṃ ṇa saṃpaḍaï me maraṇaṃ || 433 ||’
kathaṃ tāvaccintitasulabhaṃ mahilāsadṛśaṃ na saṃpadyate me maraṇam ||]
‘‘caturaghariṇī’ ka kha, ‘catvaraghariṇī’ ga, ‘catvaragharaṇī’ gha, ‘cattaraghariṇī’ ca gāthāsapta॰cattaraghariṇī piadaṃsaṇā a ‘taruṇī’ gāthāsapta॰bālā paütthavaïā‘paütthapaïā’ gāthāsapta॰ a |
‘asaïsaaṇṇaā’ ka, ‘asara(i)saajjiā’ kha, ‘asaīsapajjiā' gāthāsapta॰asaī saajjhiā duggaā a ṇa hu khaṃḍiaṃ sīlam || 437 ||’
asatī prativeśinī durgatā ca na khalu khaṇḍitaṃ śīlam ||]

l.seg: ‘alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā‘śrutastvayā’ iti mudrite kumārasaṃbhave

div.p: pākabhaktiṣu ādāvasvādu, ante svādu mṛdvīkāpākaṃ yathā—

l.seg: serṣyā vo 'vatu caṇḍikā caraṇayostaṃ pātayantī patim |
‘kurvantyabhyadhikaṃ’ khakurvantyābhyadhikaṃ kṛte pratikṛtaṃ muktena maulau muhu-

div.p: ādyantayoḥ svādu nārikelīpākaṃ‘nārikelīrītipāko’ ka, ‘nārikelīpākaṃ’ gha yathā—

lg.l: ‘jaha icchā taha ramiaṃ jāā pattā ‘padaṃ’ khapaïṃ gaā dhūā |
gharasāmiassa‘gharasāmiassa assa’ kha ajja vi ‘sokoūhachāi aïm' ka, ‘sokouhacchāi acchīi’ kha sakouhallāiṁ acchīiṃ || 443 ||’
[yathecchā tathā ramitaṃ jāyā prāptā patiṃ gatā duhitā |

l.seg: ‘‘sītāṃ hitvā’ S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśehītvā sītāṃ daśamukharipurnopayeme yadanyāṃ
sā ‘durvāraṃ kathamapi’ kha mudrite raghuvaṃśe cadurvāravyathamapi parityāgaduḥkhaṃ viṣehe || 445 ||’

div.p: ‘yadapaiti na ca śobhate ca’ kayadapaiti ca śobhate ca tatkusumbharāgaṃ yathā—

lg.l: ‘vahuvallahassa jā hoi vallahā kaha vi paṃcadiahāiṃ |
sā kiṃ chaṭṭhaṃ ‘maggaī’ gāthāsapta॰maggaï katto ‘miṭhṭhaṃ a’ iti gāthāsapta॰miṭṭhaṃ ca bahuaṃ ca‘bahuaa’ iti gāthāsapta॰ || 446 ||’
[bahuvallabhasya yā bhavati vallabhā kathaṃ kathamapi paścadivasāni |
sā kiṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ mārgate kuto mṛṣṭaṃ ca bahukaṃ ca ||]

div.p: ‘yannāpaiti api ca śobhate’ khayannāpaityati ca śobhate tanmañjiṣṭhārāgaṃ yathā—

lg.l: pemmasahāvavimuhiaṃ ‘vīāvāsagamaṇūsuaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhe, ‘dvitīyāvakāśagamanotsukaṃ iti cchāyā cavīovāsagamaṇūsuaṃ vāmaddham || 447 ||’

l.seg: sā gotraskhalanādapaitu ca divā rādheti bhīroriti |
rātrāvasvapato divā ca vijane ‘nāmeti cābhyasyatā rādhāṃ॰’ kalakṣmīti cābhyasyato
rādhāṃ prasmarataḥ śriyaṃ ramayataḥ khedo hareḥ pātu vaḥ 448’
yenoktāsi vinā tvayā mama jagacchūnyaṃ kṣaṇājjāyate
so 'yaṃ dambhadhṛtavrataḥ priyatamaḥ kartuṃ kimapyudyataḥ‘kimabhyudyataḥ’ ka kha || 449 ||’
‘nidrocchedavivartaneṣu’ ka khanidrācchedavivartaneṣvabhimukhī nādyāpi saṃbhāvitā‘saṃbhāṣitā’ ka kha |
anyastrījanasaṃkathālaghurahaṃ svapne tvayā lakṣito‘vīkṣito’ ka kha
doṣaṃ paśyasi kaṃ‘kim’ ka kha priye parijanopālambhayogye mayi || 450 ||’
‘dauṣṣantim’ khadauṣyantimapratirathaṃ tanayaṃ prasūya‘niveśya’ iti mudrite śākuntale |
‘tatsaṃniveśitabhareṇa sahaiva bhartrā’ ka khamartrā tadarpitakuṭumbabhareṇa sārdhaṃ
‘advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranuguṇaṃ‘anugataṃ’ iti mudrita uttararāmacarite sarvāsvavasthāsu ya-
dvisrambho‘viśrāmo’ ka kha mudrita uttararāmacarite ca hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ |
kālenāvaraṇātyayā‘pariṇateryat’ kha gatpariṇate yatsnehasāre‘premasāre’ iti mudrita uttararāmacarite sthitaṃ
‘bhadre’ gha, ‘bhadra’ (dre vā draṃ?)gabhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi yatprāpyate‘tatprārthyate’ ka mudrita uttararāmacarite ca | ‘yatprārthyate’ kha || 453 ||’

div.p: ityuktaṃ tatra ‘alaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ’ itīyatyeva‘ityeva’ ka kha vaktavye nānālaṃkāragrahaṇaṃ‘nānālaṅkāragrahaṇaṃ’ kha guṇarasānāmupasaṃgrahārtham | teṣāmapi hi kāvyaśobhākaratvenālaṃkāratvāt || yadāha—

tatra ‘kāvyaśobhākarān’ ityanena śleṣopamādivadguṇarasabhāvatadābhāsapraśamā‘prasādādīn’ khadīnapyupagṛhṇāti‘anuguhṇāti’ ka | mārgavibhāgaṃkṛdguṇānāmalaṃkriyopadeśena śleṣādīnāṃ guṇatvamivālaṃkāratvamapi jñāpayati—

lg.l: iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ |
teṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo ‘gauḍavartmani lakṣyate’ kalakṣyate gauḍavartmani ||

div.p: iti śleṣādīnāṃ daśānāmeva ‘mārgapratibhākāritāṃ’ kamārgapravibhāgakāritāṃ bruvankāvyaśobhākaratvena guṇāntarāṇāmapyalaṃkāratvamupakalpayati || tadāha, ‘kastānkārtsnyena ‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ kavakṣyati’ | yuktamidamuktam | ayuktaṃ tvidamuktaṃ rasānāmalaṃkārateti ||
teṣāṃ guṇānāmivālaṃkāravyapadeśābhāvāt | nāyuktam | ‘uktotkarṣāṇām’ khayuktotkarṣāṇāmūrjasvirasava‘preyānāmupadeśena’ katpreyasāmalaṃkāreṣūpadeśāt | tad yathā—

tatrorjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṃkāramityanena ātmaviśeṣaniṣṭhasyotkṛṣṭā‘utkṛṣṭajanmano’ khadṛṣṭajanmano 'nekajanmānubhava‘saṃskārā hi taddrạdhimnaḥ’ khasaṃskārāhitadrạdhimnaḥ ‘saṃgrāmeṇa sampadutpādātiśayahetoḥ’ kasaṃgrāme guṇasaṃpadutpādātiśayahetoralaṃkāra‘alaṃkāraviśeṣasya’ ityasya sthāne ‘viśeṣasya’ khaviśeṣasyopasaṃgrahādahaṃkārābhimānaśrṛṅgārāparanāmno rasasya mānamayavikārarūpeṇābhimānināṃ manasi jāgrataḥ parāṃ koṭimupavarṇayati | rasa-
vadrasapeśalamityanena vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisāttvikasaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiriti ratyādirūpeṇānekadhāvirbhavato 'bhivardhamānasya‘vivardhamānasya’ ga paraprakarṣagāminaḥ śrṛṅgārasya ‘madhyamāvasthām’ ka khamadhyāvasthāṃ sūcayati | preyaḥ ‘pre[yaḥ pri ?]yatarākhyānam’ ka, kha pustake ‘priyaḥ’ nāstipriyatarākhyānamityanena samastabhāvamūrdhābhiṣiktāyā rateḥ ‘paraprakarṣādhigamāt’ ityasya sthāne ‘prakarṣādhigamāt’ khaparaprakarṣādhigamād ‘bhāvanābhigame’ ka khabhāvanādhigame bhāvarūpatāmullaṅghya premarūpeṇa ‘pariṇatāyāmupādānāt’ ka, ‘pariṇatā [yā] upādānāt’ gapariṇatāyā upādānād bhāvāntarāṇāmapi paraprakarṣādhigame rasarūpeṇa pariṇatiriti ‘jñāpayannalaṅkārasyottarāṃ’ kha jñāpayannahaṃkārasyottarāṃ koṭimupalakṣayati | sarveṣāmapi hi ratyādiprakarṣāṇāṃ ratipriyo raṇapriyaḥ parihāsapriyo 'marṣapriya iti ‘premaṇyeba’ ka, ‘premṇaeva’ kha premṇayeva paryavasānaṃ bhavati | yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tat trayamityanenāyuktotkarṣāṇāṃ trayāṇāmapyūrjasviprabhṛtīnāṃ guṇatvameva nālaṃkāratvamityavasthāpayati | tathā hi—aurjityaṃ bhāvikatvaṃ bhāvikaṃ preya’ ka kha preya iti guṇeṣūpadiśyate,‘guṇeṣu bhaṇyate’ ka kha kutaḥ punaridamekadorjasvi—rasavat—preyasāmalaṃkāratvamanyadā guṇatvam‘anyadā guṇatvam’ ka |

yathā gomān deśaḥ, vācālo baṭuḥ, vāgmī vipaścit, ‘phalino vṛkṣāḥ’ kakṣīriṇo vṛkṣāḥ, balavān mallaḥ‘mando’ ka daṇḍī, gomatī ‘śoṇeti’ kaśāleti | tatrorjasvirasavatoralaṃkāratvavivakṣāyāmatiśāyane‘atiśāyane vā’ ka kha bhūmni vā ‘matubarthīyaḥ’ ka khamatvarthīyaḥ | guṇatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu
praśaṃsānityayoriti yogayoriti draṣṭavyam | nityo hi kāvye guṇayoga iva rasādiyogaḥ | guṇavato rasavataśca niścitaivāsya praśaṃsā | saṃsargastu guṇānāmavaśyamupādāneṣu | nindā punardoṣahānernāvatarati‘doṣahānerna’ vitarati’ ka, ‘doṣahānena vitarati’ kha | guṇeṣu ‘prema iti’ khapreya iti rūpābhedāt kathamalaṃkāratve tadutkarṣapratītiḥ | yathā ‘yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śreṣṭhatamaḥ kurūṇām’ iti tatrātiśāyikāntareṇa‘tatrātiśāyiguṇāntareṇa’ ka kha tadavagatiriti cet ihāpi ‘yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayam’ iti vākyāntareṇa bhaviṣyati | na cātiśāyikā svārthātiriktaṃ kimapi bruvate, api tu prakṛtyupāttameva prakarṣādikaṃ gamayanti | svārthikeṣu hyete vidhīyante | evamavasthāpite guṇarasānāmalaṃkāratve ‘ṣaṭprakārako’ kaṣaṭprakāro rasālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃbhavati—guṇasaṃkaraḥ, alaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, rasasaṃkaraḥ, rasaguṇasaṃkaraḥ, ‘rasālaṃkārasaṃkaraśceti’ ka kharasālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ iti | ‘nanvatra’ ka khananu ca guṇānāṃ saṃkaravyavahāro nopapadyate bahuṣvapi guṇeṣu guṇavadityeva vyapadeśāt | maivam | trividhā guṇāḥ—śabdaguṇāḥ, arthaguṇāḥ, doṣaguṇāśca | te tu pratyekaṃ dvidhā—ullekhavantaḥ, nirullekhāśca | tatra śabdaguṇeṣu samādhimādhuryaudāryagāmbhīryādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śleṣaprasādasamatā‘saukumāryādayo’ ka khamādhuryādayo nirullekhāḥ | arthaguṇeṣu prasādarītikāntyādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, arthavyaktisaukṣmya‘gāmbhīryādayo’ khagāmbhīryasaṃmitatvādayo nirullekhāḥ | doṣaguṇeṣu grāmyapunaruktāpārthānyārthādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śabdahīnasaṃbhramāpakramaviṃsandhyādayo nirullekhāḥ | tatra sajātīyānāṃ sollekhānāmevaṃ, ‘vijātīyānāṃ vijātīyānāṃ tu’ ghavijātīyānāṃ tu nirullekhānāmapi saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate ||

lg.l: ‘ṇavapallavesu lolaï gholaï ‘vilavesu’ ka kha gaviḍavesu valaï siharesu |
thavaï thavaesu a ‘mahā’ katahā vasaṃtalacchī asoassa || 455 ||’

div.p: atrānyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ pṛthakpadatā mādhuryaṃ, ‘bandhavigūḍhatvam’ khabandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ‘ 'dhvanimattā’ ghadhvanimattā, gāmbhīryamiti sajātīyāḥ saṃkīryante | yato vasantalakṣmīraśokasyeti padayoḥ śabdadhvanirapi parisphurati | yathā kasyacidaśokasya mānino 'ṅgeṣu priyāṅganā savilāsaṃ ceṣṭate tathāsyeyamiti ||

l.seg: tatastāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatimasau vindatu ‘yathā’ ka khayayā

div.p: atra ‘saṃvidhāneṣu sūtratā’ khasaṃvidhāne susūtratā śleṣaḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, utpattyādikriyākramo rītiḥ dīptarasatvaṃ kāntirityarthaguṇāḥ sajātīyāḥ saṃkīryante ||

atra hanyata ‘ityasaṅgatārtham’ khaityamaṅgalārtham, varārohetyaślīlārtham, ‘hanyate’ ka khahanyate hanyata
iti punaruktam, cārusarvāṅgītyuktvā ‘uktau’ ka khavarāroheti vyartham, ta ete sajātīyāścatvāro 'pi doṣaguṇāḥ saṃkīryamāṇāḥ kasyacidunmattabhāṣiṇo 'nukampādyatiśayavivakṣāyāmabhyanujñāyante || yadāha—
‘atha sajātīyām’ kha ghaarthāsajātīyānāṃ śabdaguṇānāmarthaguṇānāṃ ca saṃkaro yathā—

atra yāvadarthapadatā ‘sasmitatvam’ khasaṃmitatvam, samyagbandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ‘ślāghyaviśeṣaguṇayoga’ ityasya sthāne ‘viśeṣaguṇayoga’ ka khaślādhyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇāḥ, uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, rụ̄dhāhaṃkārataurjityamityarthaguṇāḥ saṃkīryante ||

l.seg: cumbāmi mūrdhani ‘cirāya’ ka kha mudrite mahāravīracarite caciraṃ ca pariṣvaje tvām |

div.p:
atra bhāvato ‘vākpratipattiḥ’ ka khavākpravṛttirbhāvikatvam, prasiddhārthapadatā prasādaḥ, ‘priyārthapadopādānam’ ka khapriyārthapadopādānaṃ preya iti śabdaguṇāḥ, ehyehīti punaruktam, vatse-
tyuktvā tvatpādābjadvayaṃ vanda iti viruddham, mūrdhni cumbāmi hṛdi vahāmītyādau vanda iti kriyāsvanupayogāt ‘pūrṇacandranidarśanādi—’ khapūrṇacandretidarśanādikriyopayogi vyarthaṃ ceti ‘doṣaguṇāḥ parasparaṃ saṃkīryante’ ka khadoṣaguṇāḥ saṃkīryante | rasākṣiptacittādau hi punaruktādayo ‘na’ ga nāstina duṣyanti ||

atra dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhirityarthaguṇāḥ, daivahatike viṣapādapo 'yaṃ pāpa ityamaṅgalārthaṃ grāmyaṃ, kimanena saṃvardhitenetyatra madanajvarasaṃnipātā ityatra ca kṛtyaprayojanādervirahiṇo draṣṭurityādeścādhyāhārādasaṃpūrṇavākyatāyāmarthavyaktiviparyayaḥ | asminvikāsavikārabhājīti vikāsaśabdasya puṣpaviṣayatvādvṛkṣe 'pi prayogo 'vācakatvādasamartha iti doṣaguṇā mithaḥ saṃkīryante | yato rasākṣepātparihāsaleśoktyāmaṅgalam, praviśa piṇḍīṃ dvāraṃ bhakṣaya iti nyāyātprasiddhādhyāhāraḥ, ‘darī vadati, mañcāḥ krośantī’ ti prayogadarśanādādhārādheyayorabhedopacāraśca viruddhalakṣaṇādibhiḥ prayujyamāno na doṣāyeti ||

sa yadyapi vyaktāvyaktobhayātmatayā tilataṇḍulakādibhedaiḥ pradhānāṅgabhāvasamakakṣatābhyāṃ purastāduktaḥ tathāpi teṣāṃ guṇādisaṃkarāsādhāraṇa-
tvātsaṃprati sādhāraṇaḥ prakāra ucyate | sa ṣọdhā śabdālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, arthālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, ubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ śabdārthālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, ‘śabdobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ’ khaśabdārthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, arthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraścaatra ‘ca’ ityadhikaṃ ka kha | teṣu śabdālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—

lg.l: ‘haṃsānāmālī paṅktiḥ | ambaramākāśamaramatyantamārụ̄dhā | kiṃbhūtā |’ bhayena cañcalā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarasā rasasahitā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarāsāḥ saśabdā ye sārasāsteṣāṃ rāsaḥ krīḍā yasyāstathā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | ārāse śabde yo rasastatsahitā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarasaṃ saraḥ gamanaṃ tenāsyate kṣipyate sarāsaḥ | sarasi bhavaḥ sārasaḥ | sa cāsau sa ca | evaṃvidho rāsaḥ krīḍā yasyāstatheti’ gha pustakasyāyuṣi ṭippaṇīhaṃsālī bhayataralā sārā sarasā sarāsasārasarāsā‘sarāsusā’ ka |

div.p: atra saṃskṛtaprākṛtabhāṣāsaṃśleṣaḥ, gatapratyāgataṃ citraṃ, ‘pādāvṛttiyamakam’ ka khapadāvṛttiyamakaṃ, varṇānuprāsaśceti catvāraḥ ‘śabdālaṃkārāḥ’ ka khaśabdālaṃkārāḥ saṃkīryante ||

atra tāmracūḍavayasāṃ kūjitairityanumānam, yatra tamo ghūrṇata iti jñāpakahetuḥ, kukūlakūṭavisarajjhampāghanamiti sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭa-
lacchāyājaṭālamiti ca kārakahetuḥ, jāyamānapadārthasvarūpābhidhānaṃ jātirityarthālaṃkārāścatvāro mithaḥ saṃkīryante ||

lg.l: ‘ṇa hu ṇavaraṃ dīvasihāsāricchaṃ‘saricchaṃ’ kha caṃpaehiṃ‘campaehi’ kha paḍivaṇṇam |
kajjalakajjaṃ ri ‘kajjammi’ kakaaṃ ‘ābhamantehi bhamalehi’ khauari bhamantehiṁ bhamarehiṁ || 462 ||’

div.p: atra campakādīnāṃ pradīpaśikhābhirākārakāntibhyāmupamā,‘ākārakāntimupamāṃ’ ka virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyā‘virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyamadyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ’ ka, ‘virahiṇīhṛdayadāhapradyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ’ khanadyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ sāmyaṃ, ‘kajjalapaṭalānāmivopari’ ka, ’kajjalapaṭalānāmupari’ khakajjalapaṭalānāmiva bhramarapaṭalānāmupari melanānmelitaṃ, campakadīpakalikayoriva bhramarakajjalapaṭalayoraupamyādisaṃbandhātsamuccaya ityubhayālaṃkārāścatvāro‘catvāro mithaḥ saṃkīryante’ ka, ‘catvāro 'pi saṃkīryante’ kha mithaḥ saṃkīryamāṇā upalabhyante ||

l.seg: ‘jyeṣṭhe’ khagrīṣme māsi kharārkatejasi kathaṃ pāntha vrajañjīvasi || 463 ||’

div.p:
