atrāvantikā rītiḥ, padamudrā, vibhaktimudrā, anuprāsaśceti śabdā-
laṃkārāḥ, jātiḥ, ‘jñāpakakārakahetū’ kakārakajñāpakau hetū, citrahetuścetyarthālaṃkārā ‘mithaḥ śabde saṃkīryante’ khamithaḥ saṃkīryante |

atra samunmīlatīti vibhaktimudrā, stokastokamastaṃ gataṃ‘astaṃ gacchatītyādiḥ’ kha gacchatītyādiranuprāsaśca śabdālaṃkārāḥ, hetūpamā, samādhiḥ, anukramaḥ, samuccayoktiścetyubhayālaṃkārā mithaḥ saṃkīryante ||

l.seg: gandhaṃ muñcati siktalā‘siktajālasurabhi’ ka, ‘siktalājasurabhiḥ’ khajasurabhiṃ varṣeṇa dagdhā sthalī

div.p: atra jātiḥ, anumānam, kārakajñāpakahetū cetyarthālaṃkārāḥ, rūpakopamā, hetūpamā, utprekṣopameti ‘ceti ubhayālaṃkārāḥ’ ka khacobhayālaṃkārā mithaḥ saṃkīryante ||

etena guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | ‘ato’ ka khayato yadyapi guṇavatyeva vākye 'laṃkā‘saṃkarayogaḥ’ ka kharayogastathāpi kvacid guṇasya prādhānyaṃ kvacidalaṃkārasyeti pradhānāṅgabhāvena guṇālaṃkārayoḥ saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate | sa ṣọdhā—śabda-
guṇapradhānaḥ, arthaguṇapradhānaḥ, ‘doṣālaṃkārapradhānaḥ’ kadoṣaguṇapradhānaḥ, śabdālaṃkārapradhānaḥ, arthālaṃkārapradhānaḥ, ubhayālaṃkārapradhānaśca‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ ka kha ||

lg.l: ‘prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi ‘mathituṃ mandaraṃ vā’ kha | padyametad dhvanyāloke (2|30) 'pyudāhṛtammayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyānnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva‘nāpyahaṃ tarkayāmi’ ka saṃbhāvayāmi |
setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyātastvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata‘vidadhati’ ka ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ 466’

div.p: atra hetūtprekṣābhidhāne tvayītyādau pade viṣṇoḥ svarūpādhyāsena tadbhāvāpattau samādheriha prādhānyaṃ‘samādheḥ prādhānyamiha’ ka kha pratīyate | nanu cāyamarthasya prākaṭyātprasādo 'rthaguṇaḥ kasmānna bhavati | asminnapi tavdyapadeśena śabdaśakterādhikyāt | nanu ca tvayi iti, eṣa iti, asya iti, ‘yuṣmadetadidamadaḥ’ ka, ‘yuṣmadasmadidamāṃ’ ghayuṣmadetadidamāṃ na kaścana‘kaścinna viṣṇuvācī’ ka viṣṇuvācī ‘sa kathaṃ varṇanīye vastuni tamarthamabhidadhyāt’ ka khasa kathaṃ varṇanīye nyastastaṃ tamarthamabhidadhīta | ucyate, sarvanāmatvenaiṣāṃ sarvavācitvāt | sarvanāmāni hi ‘sarvanāmābhidhāyīnyapi’ ka khasarvābhidhāyīnyapi ‘prakaraṇādigamyaṃ viśeṣamarthaṃ ca bruvate’ ka, ‘prakaraṇādigamyaviśeṣamiva bruvate’ khaprakaraṇādigamyaṃ viśeṣameva bruvate sa ca iha prāptaśrīrityevamādimirabhivyakta‘abhivyaktamevābhigamyate iti’ ka, ‘abhivyakta evābhigamyate iti’ khamevāvagamyata iti ||

atra ‘vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅkaḥ’ iti jñāpakahetoḥ ‘khaṃ vyālikhanniva’ iti utprekṣāvayavācca, devāsurairiti ‘nityavivakṣāyāma’ khanityavairāvivakṣāyāṃ bahuvacanam, ‘amṛtamambunidhirmamanthe’ iti dvikarmakeṣvapi mathiprabhṛtīnāmupasaṃkhyānamiti amṛtaśabdāddvitīyā iti doṣaguṇayoḥ prādhānyaṃ pratīyate | nanu cātrārthasya ‘prādhānyaṃ na bhavati’ ka khaprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ bhavati tadviṣayasya jñāpakahetunāpahṛtatvātso 'pyarthālaṃkāra eva | guṇālaṃkārayośca tulyakakṣatāyāmalaṃkāraḥ pradhānaṃ bhavati na guṇaḥ | guṇairhi guṇabhūtairevālaṃkārāḥ prāya ārabhyante | tadyathā—

lg.l: ‘gauḍīyāṃ tāṃ’ ka khagauḍīyeti vijānanti rītiṃ rītivicakṣaṇāḥ ||
madhurāṃ ‘sukumārīṃ ca’ khasukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ ||
prasādi svabhidhānaṃ ca yamakaṃ kṛtinā matamcāyāmakaṃ kṛtināṃ matam’ ka kha ||’ iti |

div.p: mā bhūdalaṃkāratulyakakṣatayā arthasya prādhānyaṃ‘arthapradhānodāraguṇasya’ kha śabdaguṇasya tu ślāghyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udāttamityādeḥ kimiti prādhānyaṃ na bhavati doṣaguṇānāmatīvollekhavattvena‘matīvollekhavidhitvena’ ka kha prādhānyāt‘pra(prā)dhānyāt’ ka ||
doṣasya yo guṇībhāvaḥ sa tato 'pyadhikaṃ prakāśata iti ||
atrārthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ vibhavotkarṣa udāttatā mṛduprasphuṭonmiśravarṇānāmavaiṣamyaṃ samatā, bandhagāḍhatā, aurjityamityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena śabdālaṃkārānuprāsaḥ pratīyate ||
atra bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ślādhyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam‘udāttatā’ ka kha, vibhavotkarṣa audāryam, dīptarasatvam, kāntirityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena jātirarthālaṃkāraḥ pratīyate |

atroktiparipāṭīḥ‘uktiparipākaḥ’ ka praụdhiḥ, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, āśayotkarṣa udāttatvam, arthaprākaṭyaṃ, prasādaḥ—ityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ śleṣopasarjanā viśeṣoktirubhayālaṃkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate || rasasaṃkaro 'pi cālaṃkārasaṃkaravadeva | bhāvarasābhāsapraśamānāṃ tilataṇḍulādiprakāreṇa saṃkaraḥ ‘ṣaṭprakāro’ ka khaṣaṭprakārako bhavati | tatra bhāvānāṃ tilataṇḍulaprakāro yathā—

l.seg: ‘nyakkāro hṛdi vajrakīla iva me tīvraḥ parispandate
ghīrāndhe tamasīva majjati manaḥ saṃmīlitaṃ lajjayā |
‘tātavipattijo’ kha, ‘tārkṣyasajātīyatvāt tārkṣyo 'tra jaṭāyurabhidhīyate’ gha pustakasyāyuṣi ṭippaṇīśokastārkṣyavipattito ‘dahati yannāstyeva’ kadahati māṃ nāstyeva yasminkriyā
‘marmāṇīva’ khamarmāṇyeva punaśchinatti karuṇā sītāṃ varākīṃ prati || 472 ||’

div.p: atrāmarṣalajjāśokānukampāḥ samakakṣatayā mithastilataṇḍulavatsaṃkīryamāṇā rāmasya virahiṇo vāgārambhānubhā‘anurāgoktiparatayā’ ka khavoktiparatayā pratīyante ||

l.seg: dhūrtasya tasya hi guṇā nu paraṃ jayanti || 473 ||’

div.p: atra sakhīṣu roṣaḥ priyaguṇeṣu cāsūyā, kṣīranīravanmithaḥ ‘saṃkīryamāṇau’ ka, ‘saṃkīryamāṇe’ khasaṃkīryamāṇau māninīvāgārambhaparatayā ‘pratīyete’ ka khapratīyete ||

lg.l: saṃpratyeva haṭhāttadeṣa‘tadeva’ ka kha kurute ‘keśoccayotkarṣaṇa’ ka khakeśoccayākarṣaṇatrāsottānitalolalocanapatadbāṣpaplutaṃ rāvaṇaḥ || 474 ||’

div.p: atra krodhābhāse chāyādarśanyāyena ratyābhāsaḥ ‘saṃkīryate’ ka khasaṃkīryamāṇa upalabhyate ||

atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanaraśarīrabhāgausiṃhanaraśarīravāgārambhānusāreṇa’ ka kha sahakāravarṇanāvāgārambhānusāreṇa sakhīviṣayānukampā sahakāraviṣayā ca kutsā mithaḥ saṃkīryete | tathā hi ‘daivahatikeśabdena’ ka khadaivahatike itiśabdena labdhāyāṃ niyatyupādhau sarvathaivānukampyamānatāyāṃ sahakārasaṃvardhananibandhanatvamevāsyāḥ kalā dyotyate | evaṃ nāma tvaṃ daivopahatāsi yatsahakārachadmānaṃ viṣapādapaṃ‘sahakāraviṣapādapaṃ’ ka kha dvāri saṃvardhayasīti‘iti’ ka kha nāsti | viṣapādapaśabdena ca‘ca’ ka kha labdhāyāṃ sahakārasya sarvathaiva kutsāyāṃ ‘vikāsakāla’ ka ghavikāsakāle kāminīnāmasahyasmarajvarasaṃnipātahetukatvamevāsyāḥ kapratyayena‘kanpratyayena’ ka pratyāyyate || taduktam—

lg.l: na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā śabdabhede pratīyate |
‘yujyate’ khapūjyate kutsitatve 'pi praśastatve 'pi kutsyate‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ ka ||
‘eka iha jīvaloke jīvatirūpaṃ nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ‘nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ’ iti ka pāṭhastruṭitaḥ | ‘na rūpamabhyudaye’ iti kha pāṭhaḥ |
yaḥ ‘premamātrapāśe’ ka, ‘yaḥ premamāśayāśe’ khapremapāśapāśe ‘mṛgavanna mṛgīdṛśāṃ’ khamṛga iva na mṛgīdṛśāṃ patita || 476 ||’

div.p: atra svasaubhāgyavarṇanā mṛtpiṇḍe ‘pāṃśūdakayoriva’ gapāṃsūdakayorivāvibhāgamāpādyamānayorasūyāgarvayoḥ saṃkara upalabhyate‘upapadyate’ ka kha ||

l.seg: stadauddhatya kvāpi vrajati vinayaḥ prahvayati mām |
mahārghastīrthānāmiva‘kimiha mahatāṃ’ ka hi mahatāṃ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ || 478 ||’

div.p:
atra vīrauddhatyasvātantryavyarasānāmānandapraśamapāravaśyarasaistiraskriyamāṇānāṃ ‘paṭavarṇanīlādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘paṭanīlādibhiḥ’ khapaṭa iva nīlādibhiḥ ‘sitādīnāṃ’ kasītādīnāṃ praśamā rāmadarśanaprabhāvodbhave-
lavasya vismayātiśayapraśamajanmani ‘vāgārambhānubhāvopamādbhavedetaccitravarṇavat’ ka, ‘vāgārambhānubhāvopamodbhavecitravarṇavat’ khavāgārambhānubhāvopamāpade citravarṇavatsaṃkīryamāṇāḥ samupalabhyante ||

nanu ca ‘nanu doṣahāniriva’ kha , ‘doṣahāni namiva’ ca ghadoṣahānamiva guṇopādānamapi niyamanirvartyam‘niyamanivartyam’ ka | alaṃkārayoga iva rasāviyogo 'pyavaśyaṃ vidheyaḥ | kadācidalaṃkārayogo 'pi tyajyate ‘nanu rasādivyabhicaritasaṃbandhāviti’ ka ga pustake ca ‘natu’ ityasya sthāne ‘nanu’ iti vartatena tu rasāviyogo guṇayogaśca vyabhicaritasaṃbandhāviti | atrocyate | yatra citra‘varṇavat’ gavarṇavannarasiṃhavatpāṃsūdakava‘pāśūdakavacca’ ga ccāvayavāvayavinyāyena jātivyaktinyāyena ‘vāpṛthak’ ka cāpṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ‘prayatnānirbartyānāṃ’ ka guṇarasānāṃ vākye saṃniveśastatra saṃkaravyavahāro na pravartate ||

lg.l: śṛṅgāra eva ‘sarveṣu’ kamadhuraḥ paraprahlādano rasaḥ‘paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ’ iti dhvanyāloke (2|8) |
‘tadvyaktihetū śabdāthāṃvojo 'dhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati’ ka, dhvanyāloke tu ‘tadvyaktihetū śabdārthāvāśrityojo vyavasthitam |’ iti pāṭhaḥtavdyaktihetū śabdārthāvojodhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati ||
‘samarpakatvaṃ vāpyasya’ ka, dhvanyāloke tu 'samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya’ itisamarthakatvaṃ vākyasya yattu sarvarasānprati |

div.p: seyaṃ guṇānāṃ rasārambhakatve saṃkarāprasiddhiḥ | evaṃ rasānāṃ guṇārambhakatve 'pi | tadyathā—rụ̄dhāhaṃkārataurjityam, ‘bhāvato vākpravṛttiḥ’ ka, ‘bhāvayato vākyavṛttiḥ’ khabhāvato vākpravṛttirbhāvikatvam, ‘krodhādāvapyasya tīvratvaṃ’ ka, ‘krodhādāvapi tīvratā’ khakrodhādāvapyatīvratā, mādhuryam, āśayotkarṣaḥ, udāttatvam, arthasyābhīṣṭatamatā, ‘arthasyābhīṣṭatanmayatā’ khapreyaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ, kāntiriti | yatra tu tilatandulavat‘tilataṇḍulavat’ ka kha kṣīranīravacchāyādarśavat tulyakakṣatayaiva guṇarasānāṃ ‘vākye pṛthak prayatna’ ka khavākye 'pṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ viniveśastatra saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartata eva | sa ṣọdhā—guṇapradhānaḥ—rasapradhānaḥ, ubhayapradhānaḥ, ubhayāpradhānaḥ, guṇādhikaḥ, rasādhika iti ||

lg.l: devī vyapāsya śayanaṃ dhṛtamānatanturantaḥpuraṃ gatavatī saha sauvidallaiḥ || 479 ||’

div.p: atrārthaprākaṭyaudāryayorarthaśabdaguṇayoḥ ‘prādhānyaṃ na ratikrodhayoḥ’ ga nāstiprādhānyaṃ ‘na bhavati krodhayoḥ’ khana ratikrodhayoriti guṇapradhānaḥ ||
atra ślādhvaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇāḥ sādhvasavilāsānurāgasaṃgamarasairatiśayyanta iti rasapradhānaḥ ||
atra bhaṇitiviśeṣa uktiḥ saṃvidhāne ‘svasūtratā’ khasusūtratā śleṣa iti śabdaguṇayorlāvaṇyavilāsavarṇanīyarasayośca tulyakakṣatayā nirdeśa‘nirdiśatyubhayapradhānaḥ’ ka ityubhayapradhānaḥ ||

atra svādukrūramasṛṇaklaibya‘vaktraklaivya’ kamityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣādīnāṃ caturṇāmapyarthānāṃ svādvādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇādilakṣitānāṃ prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapāt iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāmupakrameṇa nirvahaṇaṃ‘nibarhaṇam’ kha rītiḥ, pādacatuṣṭaye caturṇāmarthānāṃ vibhaktyasamatvena niveśaḥ saṃbhitatvamiti catvāro guṇāḥ, catvāraśca ratyamarṣaviṣādajugupsātmāno rasāḥ kālāvasthānivedanaparatvena pratīyanta ityubhayāpradhānaḥ ||

lg.l: mā yāciṣi mā seviṣi mā sahiṣi parābhavaṃ dhaninaḥ || 483 ||’

div.p: atra suptiṅvyutpattiḥ‘vyutpattisauśabdyam’ kha sauśabdyam, vākyānāṃ paripūrṇatvamarthavyaktiḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, vibhūteranutpattau kāmā na pūryante, aparipūrṇakāmo yācate, yācamānastadanāpnuvan dhaninaḥ sevate, sevamānastu taiḥ paribhūyata ityutpattyādikriyākramo rītiriti guṇāścatvāraḥ, rasastu nirveda evaika iti guṇādhikaḥ ||

atra kamalamanambhaṃsi kamale kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām ityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyamityaślīlāmaṅgalārthau doṣaguṇāvapi, ślādhyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udātta-
tvam, vikaṭabandhatvamudāratā, upakramābhedo rītiḥ, ‘arthasya prākaṭyaṃ’ kaarthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, aniṣṭhuratā saukumāryam, ‘ābhīṣṭatamatā’ kaabhīṣṭatamatā preyaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇā daśa, rasāstu ratyutkarṣaharṣadhṛtyutkaṇṭhāvegavismaya‘mati’ kha nāstimativitarkacintācapalatāhāsotsāhastambhagadgadonmāda‘vrīḍāvahitthābhayaśaṅkāḥ’ kavrīḍāvahitthabhayaśaṅkāḥ viṃśatirvāgārambhānubhāve śrṛṅgāriṇaḥ priyācāṭukārasya kasyacitpratīyanta iti rasādhikaḥ ||

lg.l: ekenaiva prayatnena ‘nivartyante’ ka kha ganirvartyante mahākaveḥ || 173 ||
apṛthagyatnanirvartyaḥ ‘so 'laṃkāro dhvanau mataḥ’ iti dhvanyālokeso 'laṃkāraḥ prakṛṣyate || 174 ||
alaṃkāranibandho yaḥ sa kavibhyo na rocate || 175 ||

div.p: tatra rasālaṃkārasaṃkaro dvidhā—rasapradhāno 'laṃkārapradhānaśca | ‘tayorye’ ka tayoryonubhavitraiva varṇyate sa rasapradhānaḥ | tatra hyalaṃkāravato vākyasya vāgārambhānubhāvatvaṃ bhavati ||

lg.l: roso vi haraï hiaaṃ ‘maaaṃpaṃkova’ ka, ‘maaaṃkovva’ khamaapaṃko vva mialaṃchaṇammi‘maatadbalaṇṇi nisaṇṇe’ ka ṇisaṇṇo 485’
roṣo 'pi harati hṛdayaṃ madapaṅka iva mṛgalāñchane niṣaṇṇaḥ ||]

div.p: atropamātiraskāreṇa rasavato harervacasi vāgārambharūpe rukmiṇīpradattapārijātamañjarīvilokanaprabhavaṃ satyabhāmāyā ‘eva’ kharoṣarāmaṇīyakaṃ prādhānyataḥ pratīyate ||

l.seg: meghairantaritaḥ priye tava ‘mukhacchāyānukāraḥ’ ka khamukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |

div.p: atra virahiṇo rāmasya priyāvayavasādṛśyadarśanenātmānaṃ vinodayata ‘upāyabhraṃśāratiprabha’ kaupāyabhraṃśādaratipramavaviṣādavāgārambhe svarūpābhidhāne prakṣīṇaśaktiraprāghānyenopamā pratīyate ||

lg.l: ‘kiṃ gurujahaṇaṃ ‘aha thaṇa’ ka khaaha thaṇabharo tti ‘bhāvaakaraa’ kabhāakaraalaggatuliāe‘tūliāe’ kha |
vihiṇo ‘khattaṃguli’ kakhuttaṃgulimaggavibbhamaṃ‘yagā vimbhama’ ka, ‘thaṇacibbhamaṃ’ kha vahaï se‘sa’ ka tivalī || 487 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapi ratiprabhavebhyo vismayādibhyaḥ saṃśayahetūtprekṣopamā‘upamābhyaḥ’ kadibhyaśca paryāyālaṃkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate tathāpyasau vāgārambhānubhāva iti ‘ratāvapyaprādhānyam’ ka kharatāvaprādhānyamevānubhavati ||
atra vatsarājena svadṛṣṭau prāṇidharmāḥ samādhīyamānāḥ sāgarikā‘darśanārthe’ ka khadarśanottha‘rati—’ ka kharativāgārambhe nyagbhavanti ||

l.seg: muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati ‘bāṣpastanataṭī’ ka, ‘vāṣpastanataṭīṃ’ gabāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ
priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam || 489 ||’

div.p: atra yadyapyākṣepeṇa vākyopasaṃhārastathāpi priya ityādibhiḥ prādhānyenābhidhīyamānaḥ śleṣa eva śrṛṅgāriṇo vāgārambhānubhāvā‘anubhāvāṅgatvaṃ’ kaṅgatāmaṅgīkaroti ||

lg.l: ‘muktāḥ kandharayā ‘kṛtāḥ’ ka, ‘dhṛtāḥ’ kha dhṛtā stanataṭenottuṅgutā kumbhayorūrubhyāṃ pariṇāhitā kramavatī hastasya pabhdyāṃ gatiḥ |
etadvaḥ karighātinastu kaṭhinaṃ carmaiva ko 'yaṃ haṭhaścaṇḍīti tripurārikelivacanairā‘āryānvitaṃ’ karyāsmitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 490 ||’

div.p:
atra bhagavataścāṭūktivāgārambhe devyāḥ paryāyavarṇanā ‘śleṣabhāvaṃ’ ka khaśeṣabhāvaṃ labhate-
ya‘yatra’ ka kha udāsīnena varṇyate so 'laṃkārapradhānaḥ sa hi rasabhāvādeḥ saṃkaraprakāramabhidhitsuḥ svabhāboktiṃ vakroktiṃ vāvalambate ||

lg.l: hoi a dūrapaāsaṃ ‘uaha’ ka khauhaarasāaṃtavibbhamaṃ‘bibbhaṃtīa’ kha tīa mukham || 491 ||’

div.p: atra satyabhāmāyā roṣasyāpasarpataḥ‘apasajjataḥ’ ka praharṣasya ca prasarpato ye 'nubhāvā jihnāvalokanamukhaprasādādayasta iha saṃkīryamāṇāḥ kavinobhayarasāyattavibhramamityanena‘ubhayarasāyattamityanena’ kha yathāvadavasthitā bhavantīti vidhimukhenābhidhīyante ||

lg.l: ‘dhīreṇa māṇabhaṃgo ‘māṇakavalaṇeṇa sahāyaṃ garuadhīrārambho’ kha māṇaksvalaṇeṇa garua dhīrārambho |
‘ulalaï tulite’ khaullalaï tulijjaṃte ekammi vi se thiraṃ ṇa laggaï hiaaṃ 492’
ullalati tolyamāne ekasminnapyasyāḥ sthiraṃ na lagati hṛdayam ||]

div.p: atra yadyapi hetūpanyāso vartate tathāpi tasya ‘bhāvākhyānaparikaratvena’ khasvabhāvākhyānaparikaratvenāprādhānyena hṛdayakriyāsvarūpameveha‘svarūpameva hi’ ka niṣedhamukhenābhidhīyata itīyaṃ jātireva bhavati ||

l.seg: rhastenāṃsataṭe 'valambya‘hastenāsa ta eva’ ka, ‘hastenāṃsata eva’ kha caraṇāvāropya tatpādayoḥ |
rādhāyāḥ suciraṃ jayanti gagane vandhyāḥ karabhrāntayaḥ 493’

div.p: atra rādhāyāḥ preyasi harau ‘yathāvadavasthitā adbhuta—’ khayathāvadastitodbhūtavṛttisnehaśaṅkotsāhā mithaḥ saṃkīryamāṇā bhayāvegasmṛtimativitarkādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairālambanacaraṇākramaṇasahakṛtāyāṃ karabhrāntau śarīrārambhānubhāve pratīyamānā aspṛṣṭagovardhanā vandhyā iti niṣedhamukhena jayantīti vidhimukhena cābhidhīyante ||

lg.l: ‘‘corā bhaasatahaṇaṃ puṇo pesavati divvīo | ahirasthianihikalase thayokkahalapūikhaṇutsaṅge’ kacorā sabhaasataṇhaṃ puṇo puṇo pesaaṃti diṭṭhīo |
ahirakkhiaṇihikalase vva ‘poḍhavaïāthaṇucchaṅge’ gāthāsapta॰., ‘prauḍhapatikāstanotsaṅge’ iti cchāyā capoḍhamahilāthaṇucchaṃge || 494 ||’

l.seg: tau saṃkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā || 495 ||’

div.p: atra nigadenaiva ‘vyākhyāyate’ kavyākhyāte spaṣṭatayaivopamāyāḥ ‘prādhānyena’ ghapradhānatvena pratītiḥ ||

atra kasyāścitsakhīvikhyātamānasaṃvidhānakopānmānavatyāḥ priyasaṃdarśanādālambanavibhāvādutpannaprakṛṣṭaratiprabhave‘ratiprabhavaharṣasthāyibhāve’ ka, ‘ratiprabhave’ praharṣasyāpi bhāve’ kha praharṣasthāyibhāve ‘tatpārśve 'pi samarpaṇādibhiḥ’ katatpārśvopasarpaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne‘uddīpyamāneṣu’ ka samutpadyamāneṣu‘samutpadyamāneṣu’ ka nāsti ‘pulakādiṣu samutpadyamāneṣu vyabhicāriṣu’ ka khapulakādiṣu mukhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu nayananimīlanādhomukhyanīvīvisraṃsa‘viśraṃsanādibhiḥ’ khanādibhiranubhāvaiḥ prakarṣaṇāropaṇādānandarasa‘ānandarasānām’ khatāmāpādyamāne sthāyini prabalavirodhibhāvāntarodayādetebhya eva kāraṇebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇamapacīyamānayorlajjāroṣayoḥ praśamasaṃkarābhibhūya prādhānyenopamāsahoktiḥ ‘saṃkīryate’ ka khaprakāśate ||
śleṣādyalaṃkārasāmarthyāttu kvacidavāstavamapi rasābhāsasaṃkaraṃ kavayaḥ prakalpayanti‘varṇayanti’ ka, ‘kalpayanti’ kha ||
atra bībhatso rasaḥ śleṣarūpakasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi śrṛṅgārarasena saṃkīrṇa iva pratīyate ||

lg.l: ‘‘asyārthastatra vīrarase tāvat—ho ityāścaryasaṃbodhane | daṣṭauṣṭhaasilatāghātaḥ khaṅgaprahārastavāpi mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api | atha ca suṣṭhu pānti ye yodhāstān rāṃtyādatte tādṛśāneva mahāvīrānsvīkaroti īdṛśī yā kuvalayaprāptā sakalamedinīmaṇḍalaprāptā lakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na na janayati | lagrā vakṣasi kākvā janayatyevetyarthaḥ | api ca vipralambhaśrṛṅgāre he daṣṭauṣṭha pītādharāmṛta bhogaśīlaka, ghātaḥ arthāttava prāṇasamāyā nakhāghāto 'pi te tava mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api atha ca suṣṭhupayodharau stanau yasyāḥ sā | kuvalayapattrālākṣī nīlotpaladalasamānanayanā na lagnā vakṣasi kathaṃ na mohaṃ na janayati | api tu janayatītyarthaḥ | sahṛdaya hṛdayaṃgama |’ gha ṭippaṇīdaṭṭhoṭṭha ho asilaaghāo‘asilavāaccāo’ kha devi maülāvaï loaṇabhaüho‘loaṇabhaünto’ ka, ‘loaṇabhaoho’ ga gha ve |
supaohara‘kuvalaapattilacchi’ ka, ‘kuvalaya’ khakuvala apattalacchi ‘kahamonubhāiṇagājaṇavacchi’ kakaha moha ṇa jaṇaï ṇa laggavacchi ||’
[daṣṭauṣṭha ho asilatādhāto devi mukalayati locanabhruvau dve api |
supayodharakuvalayapattralakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na janayati na lagnā vakṣasi ||]

div.p: atra vīro rasaḥ śleṣasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi vipralambhaśrṛṅgāreṇa saṃkīryate ||

l.seg: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa ‘haratu’ khadahatu duritaṃ śāmbhabo vaḥ śarāgniḥ 499’

div.p: atra karuṇo rasaḥ śleṣopamāsāmarthyenāvidyamānenāpi vipralambhaśṛṅgāreṇa saṃkīryate ||

l.seg: kiṃ kāntā surataiṣiṇī nahi nahi vyāghrī karālānanā || 500 ||’

div.p: ‘iha’ ka khaatra śleṣasāmarthyādapāramārthikī śṛṅgāra‘pratītiḥ’ ghapratītiḥ pāramārthikena bībhatsarasena vyāvartamānā taddharmāṇāṃ mithaḥ ‘saṃsargavadbuddhim’ kasaṃsargabuddhimutpādayati ||

lg.l: etāḥ śoṇitapaṅkakuṅkumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ pibantyasthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅganāḥ || 501 ||’

div.p: atra vībhatso rasaḥ śabdasāmarthyākṣiptena śṛṅgarābhāsena saṃkīryate ||

atra bhayānako rasaḥ samādhirūpakādyupakalpitākalparāmaṇīyakākṣiptena śṛṅgārābhāsena saṃkīryamāṇaḥ śrotuḥ preyorasāṅgatāṃ gacchansaṃgacchate | evamiyamama‘anekaprakārasaṃsṛṣṭiḥ’ khanekaprakārasaṃsṛṣṭirguṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraprabhavābhimantavyā tatrāpi pradhānāṅgabhāvena samakakṣatayā ca vyaktāvyaktobhayātmakarūpāstilatandula‘taṇḍula’ ka khakṣīrajalācchāyādarśakādayo bhedā ‘yathāyogyaṃ’ khayathāyogamavagantavyāḥ | te kiṃ vaktavyā na vaktavyāḥ | kathamanuktā gamyante | ukteṣvevāntarbhāvāt | tadyadhā--arthobhayālaṃkārābhidhāne ‘khaṃ vaste’ iti ‘carcāṃ pārayati’ iti vibhaktimudrā, kalaviṅkaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalam iti padamudrā ca śabdālaṃkārāvapi saṃkīryamāṇau pratīyete |

‘atra—’ ityārabhya ‘duṣkaram’ ityantaḥ pāṭho ga gha nāstiatrāravindāni ‘mugdhe tava mukhaśriyamākṣipantīti’ upamā, ‘koṣa-
daṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram’ iti śleṣopasarjanārthāntaranyāsaḥ | ‘prabhavanti’ ka khabhavanti cāravindāni koṣadaṇḍasamagrāṇi ‘tena kiṃ teṣāṃ’ ka khatena teṣāṃ na kiṃcidaśakyamasti koṣadaṇḍayorvijayasādhanatvāt | etena śleṣasya ‘sādhanamānabhūtārtha’ khasādhanabhūtārthasamarthakatvādupamāyāstu prastutasādhyavastuviśeṣakatvādarthāntaranyāsaṃ pratyaṅgabhāvo vijñāyate |

lg.l: asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirni‘viphalatāṃ gatā’ ka khaṣphalatāṃ gatā || 504 ||’

div.p: ‘nanu ca tamasaśca nabhasaśca asataśca saṃbandhasamatvāt’ ka khananu cābandhaḥ samatvātsyāditi kathaṃ sarveṣāṃ tulyakakṣatayā saṃbandhotpattiḥ evaṃ manyate ye utprekṣopamādayo 'laṃkārā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhi‘vyabhicārivarṇanāparā’ ka khacāryādivarṇanāparatayā rasāderaṅgatāṃ pratipadyante tadā bhavatyeva teṣāṃ tulyakakṣateti | tatra ‘limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ’ iti dve‘dve’ kha nāsti utprekṣe, ‘asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirniṣphalatāṃ gatā’ ityupamā ca varṇanīyasya tamasa uddīpanavibhāvabhūtasya samatayaivotkarṣapratipādakatvenā‘prāgabhāvam’ khaṅgabhāvamupagateti nāsti lakṣaṇānupapattiriti | nanūpamā imāstisro 'pi kasmānnocyante | ivo hi vākyāntareṣūpamāyā eva dṛśyate | ‘naivam’ ka maivam | upamānopameyaśabdapratipannasya‘upamānopameyaṃ prati yattasya’ kha sādṛśyārthasya dyotanamivena kriyate na ca limpatītyādāvupamānamupameyaṃ vāsti yatsādṛśyadyotanaya ivaḥ ‘prayujyate’ khaprayujyet | na ca tiṅantenopamānamasti tasya sādhyārthābhidhāyitvenāsattvārthatvāt‘asattvārthakatvāt’ kha ||

na copamāyāmevevaśabdo bhavati | tadyathā kathamivaitadbhaviṣyati | astu vā limpatitamasorupamānopameyabhāvastathāpi tulyadharmo na dṛśyate ya upamānopameyabhāvāya prabhavati | kimanyaina lepanameva bhavati tarhi limpatinā‘nalimpatinā’ ka kena bhāvyam | na hi lepanaṃ limpeḥ pṛthagmavitumīṣṭe | nanu ceha dvayaṃ cakāsti thāturlimpati tadarthaśca‘śabdārthaśca’ ka lepanam | maivam | evaṃ sati limpatiriveti syāt na tu limpatīveti | atha yathā rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti bhedābhāve 'pyavayavāvayavibhāvastatheha dharmadharmibhāvo bhaviṣyati | maivam | upamānopameyabhāvasya bhedasādṛśyapratipattinibandhanatvāt tadabhāve 'pi yastanmanute sa kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt |

taduktam—‘sa eva dharmo dharmī cetyunmatto 'pi na bhāṣate |’ astu tarhi tiṅvācyaḥ‘tiṅāṃ yaḥ’ kha kartā upamānamiti cet nyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpade | kathaṃ punarasau kriyāpade‘kriyāvayave’ kha nyagbhūto bhavati | śrūyatāṃ, ṣaḍarthāstiṅantena pratīyante kriyā kālaḥ upagrahaḥ sādhanaṃ saṅkhyā puruṣaśceti | teṣu kriyākālātmanepadaparasmaipadanimittāni prakṛtirabhidhatte pratyayaḥ sādhanaṃ, saṅkhyāṃ puruṣaṃ ca | eteṣāṃ tu kriyārthatvātkriyā pradhānaṃ, kālātmanepadanimitte kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena, saṅkhyāpuruṣau sādhanaviśeṣaṇatvena tayoreva nyagbhavataḥ | sādhanaṃ punaḥ ‘prakṛtipratyayau‘prakṛtipratyayārthau’ kha ‘yatra sahārtha brūte’ kasvārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ’ iti nyāyāt ‘pradhānabhūtamapi bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata’ iti nyāyena kriyāsiddhāvutpa-
nnavyāpāraṃ parārthaṃ tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ nyagmavati | tenāyaṃ kartā svakriyāsidbhābākulaḥ‘svakriyāsiddhā vā kutaḥ’ kha kathamupamānatvenopameyatvena ‘cānyadapekṣitaṃ’ ka, ‘vānyadapekṣitaṃ’ khavānyadapekṣituṃ kṣamate | evaṃ tarhi yo 'ṅgāni limpati tena kriyopalakṣitena kartrā tulyaṃ tama ityarthaḥ pratipatsyate | maivam | kriyopalakṣitasya karturupamānabhūtasya śabdanvāyabalāpratipattiḥ | śabdo hi mukhyāgauṇīlakṣaṇābhirarthaprakaraṇādisaṃpāditasācivyādā‘sācivyādibhiḥ’ ka khabhistisṛbhireva vṛttibhirarthaviśeṣapratipattinimittaṃ bhavati | tadyathā—gaurityayaṃ śabdo mukhyayā vṛttyā sāsnādimantamarthaṃ pratipādayati sa eva tiṣṭhanmūtratvādiguṇasaṃpadamapekṣya vāhīkādau prayujyamāno gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavati | yadā tu mukhyayā gauṇyā vopāttakriyāsiddhau sādhanabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthastadā lakṣaṇayā svārthāvinābhūtamarthāntaraṃ lakṣayati yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasatīti gaṅgāśabdo viśiṣṭodakapravāhe nirụ̄dhābhidhānaśaktirghoṣakartṛkāyāḥ prativasanakriyāyā adhikaraṇabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthaḥ svārthāvinābhūtaṃ taṭaṃ‘yattaṭaṃ’ ka lakṣayatīti | na caitāsāmihānyatamāpi vṛttiḥ saṃgacchate | tathā hi limpateḥ kriyāvacanatvānna mukhyā‘kriyāvacanatvānmukhyā nāpi kriyākartāraḥ sādṛśyena’ ka | nāpi kriyākartrorasādṛśyena śuktikādau rajatādivattadbhāvāpattiḥ kriyāguṇānāṃ kartaryasaṃbhavāt | sākṣādiva prayogācca na gauṇī kriyāyāśca svayameva dharmarūpatvāt | buddhiḥ paśyatītivadanyadharmāṇāmanyatrādhiropaṇamupacāra iti na gauṇībheda upacāritā‘upacaritā’ ka, ‘upacaritaḥ’ kha | ivaśabdasya cāsādṛśye 'pi darśanānna lakṣyeta | yadi hīvaśabdaḥ sādṛśyameva vidyotayati tadā limpatikriyāyāḥ sattvabhūtena tamasā sādṛśyaṃ na saṃbhavatīti svārthāvinābhūte kartāra-
mākṣipati | na ceha lakṣitalakṣaṇāviruddha‘iha lakṣaṇāviruddha—’ khalakṣaṇādayo 'pi vartante, yathā ‘priye jane nāsti punaruktaṃ’, ‘svalpairasāvapi na dṛśyata eva kālaiḥ’ iti | na ca ‘śabdānyavilambinī’ ka, ‘śabdānyapavilambitaprāyavilambinī’ khaśabdanyāyavilaṅghinī padārthavyutpattiḥ prekṣāvadbhirādriyate | yadyapyadhyāhārādibhiridamapi syāttathāpi tulyadharmo mārgaṇīyastadvadeva vipratipatteḥ || na cendumukhādivadanabhidhīyamānasyāpi tulyaguṇasya pratyayo bhavatīti vācyam |

vākyavadeva prabandheṣvanaucityaparihāreṇa guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraniveśo bhavati | tatrānaucityaparihāro yathā—māyayā kaikeyīdaśarathābhyāṃ rāmaḥ pralambhito na mātāpitṛbhyāmiti nirdoṣadaśarathe; rāmameva yodhayan rāmeṇa vālī nihato na sugrīveṇeti mahāvīracarite; rudhirapriyarākṣasena duḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ pītaṃ na bhīmaseneneti veṇīsaṃhāre; durvāsaso 'padhyānādduṣyantaḥ śakuntalāsvīkāraṃ visasmāra, ‘nānavasthitānurāgatayā’ ka khanānāvasthititānurāgatayeti śākuntale; lavaṇaprayuktarākṣasābhyāṃ vā sopaskareṇa ‘tadanabhidhāya’ kha nāstitadabhidhāya sītā parityājitā na kaikeyīmantharābhyāmiti chalitarāme; kiṃca dagdhāyāmapi
vāsavadattāyāṃ vairapraticikīrṣayā padmāvatī mayọdhā, avasite ca samīhite tathā vinā kṣaṇamapi na jīvāmītyavijñātavāsavadattāsaṃnighervatsarājasyāgnipraveśādhyavasāyaḥ priyāhṛdayato vyalīkaśalyamuccakhāneti tāpasavatsarāje; ‘macīcākṣaḥ’ khanīcākṣaḥ svāmikāryaṃ sādhayāmīti prabhubhaktyā niraparādhāmapi preyasīṃ hitvā svāmikāryāpekṣayāhamevaitāvanti dināni jīvitaḥ, adya tu kṛtasvāmikāryastāmevānugacchāmīti śivagaṇaḥ śūdrakanimittāṃ māyāmayīṃ citāṃ priyāsamakṣaṃ praviveśa, sāpi tatpremāvadānadarśanāpahnutapriyabyalīkā‘priyavyalīkāt’ kha tadviyogakātarā tatraivātmānaṃ praticikṣepeti vikrāntaśūdrake, iti tadetaddoṣahānam || guṇopādānaṃ tu samyag guṇayogena saṃvidhāne susūtratā, api ca caturvṛttyaṅgasaṃpannamiti catasro vṛttayo bhāratī ārabhaṭī kaiśikī sāttvatī ceti | tatra—

lg.l: yā vākpradhānā nṛpatiprayojyā strīvarjitā ‘saṃskṛtayā prayuktā’ khasaṃskṛtayātha yuktā |
svanāmadheyairbharataprayojyā sā bhāratī nāma bhavettu vṛttiḥ ||
citrāṇi yuddhāni ca tatra vṛttimetādṛśīmārabhaṭīṃ vadanti ||
yā sāttvikenātmaguṇena yuktā tyāgena vṛttena samanvitā ca |
harṣotkaṭā saṃhṛtaśokabhārā sā sāttvatīti prathiteha vṛttiḥ ||

div.p: āsāmaṅgāni ṣoḍaśa—teṣu prarocanā, vīthī, prastāvanā, prahasanamiti catvāri bhāratyaṅgāni ||
uddhātyakādīnāmaṅgānāṃ pravṛttiḥ vīthī uddhātyakaḥ kathoddhātaḥ prayogātiśayaḥ pravartako 'valagitamiti |

lg.l: ‘ko jayati jayati śarvaḥ kena jitaṃ jitamanaṅgadahanena |

l.seg: yaḥ paulastyamahan sa pātu bhavato rāmābhidhāno hariḥ 508

lg.l: ‘‘utthāpitam’ ka, ‘atyāhitam’ khayūthāyitamavatu hareḥ kṣmāmuddharato varāhavapuṣo vaḥ |

l.seg: prāptaḥ śaratsamaya ‘eva’ kaeṣa viśuddhakāntaḥ‘viśuddhakīrtiḥ’ ka kha |

div.p: avalagitaṃ yathā,—amumeva śaratsamayamāśritya gīyatām, tathā hyasyām‘tathā hyasyāḥ’ kha 'tathā hyasyām’ gha nāsti
‘svadharmavipracalitānām’ ka, ‘svadharmavitpracalitānāṃ’ khasvadharmātpracalitānāṃ tāpasādīnāmupahāsaparaṃ vacaḥ prahasanam | yathā—
saṃkṣiptikā, avapātaḥ, vastūtthāpanam, saṃsphoṭaḥ, iti catvāri ārabhaṭyaṅgāni ||

lg.l: nīyate rakṣasā tena lakṣmaṇo yudhi saṃśayam || 514 ||’

div.p: avidravaḥ savidravo vā sarvarasabhāvasamāso vastūtthāpanam | yathā—

l.seg: tkrodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām 515’

div.p: narma, narmasphijaḥ, narmasphoṭaḥ, narmagarbha, iti catvāri kaiśikyaṅgāni ||
teṣu sthāpitaśṛṅgāraṃ vaco viceṣṭitaṃ vā saparihāsaṃ narma | yathā—

lg.l: ‘vayaṃ tathā nāma yathāttha kiṃ vadāmyayaṃ tvakasmādvikalaḥ kathāntare |

div.p: prathamasaṃbhoge navāvasthānaṃ saṃbhogāśrayavākyādi karma narmasphijaḥ | yathā—

l.seg: kiṃ jānāsi vinodayiṣyati manaḥ saṃtaptamevādya me
durvātyeva nivartayiṣyati na bhostāṃ devayānīṃ prati || 518 ||’

div.p: utthāpakaḥ, parivartakaḥ, saṃlāpakaḥ, saṃghātyakaḥ, iti catvāri sātvatyaṅgāni |

l.seg: ‘api tu’ khamayi tu kṛtavighāte kiṃ vidadhyāḥ parasmāt |

lg.l: madanamupadadhe sa eva tābhyo duradhighamā hi gatiḥ prayojanānām || 522 ||

div.p: ‘catura’ ityanena śāstrīyalaukikavyavahāravedino nāyakasya dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu vaicakṣaṇyamucyate | ‘udātta’ ityanena āśayavibhūtyorābhijātyayauvanādīnāṃ cotkarṣaḥ prakāśyate | caturvargaphalaṃ ‘prabandhe’ khaprabandhaṃ ko vā na bāndhavīyatītyanena śrotṝṇāṃ rāmādivadvartitavyam, na rāvaṇādivaditi vidhiniṣedhanibandhanasya‘nibandhasya’ ka prabandhasyābhīṣṭatamatvamākhyāyate | ‘mukhaṃ pratimukham' ityādinā pañcāṅgaṃ prabandhaśarīramabhidhīyate | tadaṅgāni copakṣepaparikarādīni catuḥṣaṣṭirapi mukhādiṣvevāntarbhavanti | atastadvadeva pañcasaṃdhyekamapi vākyaṃ prabandhavyapadeśamāsādayati | tadyathā—

‘kathamapi kṛtapratyāsattau priye’ iti mukham, ‘skhalitottare’ iti pratimukham, ‘virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prajalpitamaśrutam’ iti garbhaḥ, ‘asahanasakhīśrotraprāptiprasādasasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā’ iti vimarśaḥ, 'śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ ‘tadā’ ka, ‘(muhuḥ)’ khasametam’ iti nibarhaṇam | etena prācīnaprabandhārthe 'pi ekavākyoktena prabandhatvamityākhyātaṃ na bhavati | tadyathā—

‘avistṛtamasaṃkṣiptam’ ityanena vistārabhīrūṇāṃ kathārasavicchedaśaṅkināṃ ca cittamāvarjyate | ‘‘śravyāntairityanena’ khaśravyavṛttam’ ityanena vṛttāntarairāśvāsakādi-
parisamāptiriti pariśrāntāḥ śrotāra aśvāsyante, sragādisaṃniveśādivatsaṃdarbhe cāśvādayo vibhāvyante | ‘puropavane’ ityādinā ca deśakālapātrasaṃpadupavarṇanādālambanoddīpanavibhāvāḥ kathyante | udyānasalilakrīḍādyupalakṣaṇena kāminīnāṃ divāceṣṭāḥ, madhupānaratotsava ityanena ca rātriceṣṭā ucyante | vipralambhā ityanena catvāro 'pi prathamānurāgādayaḥ parāmṛśyante | ‘vivāha‘vivāhā’ ka kha’ ityupalakṣaṇena prathamānurāgo vivāhāntaḥ, mānaḥ premāntaḥ, pravāsaḥ, saṃgamāntaḥ, karuṇaḥ, pratyujjīvanāntaḥ, ‘prabandhaḥ’ khaprabandhe kartavya ityupadiśyate | ‘mantradūta’ ityādipuruṣakārāyatta‘puruṣākārāyatta’ kasiddhi‘sūcanena dyūtatādinirāsāt’ khasūcanenādyūnatādinirāsānnāyakasya sattvotkarṣaḥ prakāśyate | ‘nāvarṇanaṃ nagaryāderdoṣāya’ ityādinā tu puruṣārthāsattvopakāritvena‘puruṣārthāsannopakārakāritvena’ ka, ‘puruṣārthāsannopakāritvena’ kha śailartūdyānacandrodayamadhupānaratotsavādīnāṃ mantradūtaprayogājināyakābhyudapādīnāṃ‘mantradūtaprayogādyanāyakābhyudayādīnāṃ ca’ ka, ‘mantradūtaprayogātināyakābhyudayādīnāṃ ca’ kha ca niyamena prayogaḥ, śeṣāṇāṃ tu prabandhaśarīrānurodheneti pratipādyate | ‘guṇataḥ’ prāgupanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām | nirākaraṇam’ ityanena guṇavatā bhāvyaṃ na guṇadveṣiṇeti jñāpyate | ‘vaṃśavīryaśrutādīni’ ityādinā punarābhijātyauddhatyaśauṇḍīryavīryādaya‘śauṭīryavīryādayaḥ’ ka kha eva śatrorvarṇanīyā na tvavacchedahetavo nyāyyācaraṇabinayādaya iti pratyāyyate | ‘dhinoti naḥ’ iti tvayameva pakṣaḥ śreyāniti granthakāreṇa svābhiprāyaḥ prakāśyate ||

div.trailer: iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇālaṃkāre rasavivecano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
